column2: Newcastle 2-0 Arsenal: Nta kibanza dukwiye muri Champions League ku rukino nk'uru - Granit Xhaka
column3: Umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal Granit Xhaka aranegura abakinyi bagenziwe inyuma yo gutsindwa na Newcastle 2-0 mu rukino rwa nijoro ku wa mbere, akavuga ati: "Iyo wumva ubwoba guma muhira". Uyu mukinyi wo hagati ku ruhande rw'inyuma abona ko umurwi wiwe wananiwe no guhangana n'ibihe bitoroshe mu rugamba rwo kurondera kuba muri ine ya mbere mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza. Iyo iramuka itsinze yari kuja imbere ya Tottenham, gutyo ikabandanya ifise amahirwe yo kuronka ikibanza mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Ligue des Champions/Champions League)  mu gihe hasigaye urukino rumwe. Ati: "Iyo umuntu yumva afise ubwoba mu rukino nk'uru, guma muhira. "Nta kuraba imyaka. Iyo wumva ufise ubwoba, guma hanze canke ugume muhira. Hakenewe abantu baza ngaha biteguye gukina. Rwari rumwe mu nkino nyamukuru kuri twebwe. Twumva ducitse intege ku bantu baje ngaha". Hagati aho, mu kiganiro n'imboneshakure y'inkino Sky Sports, uwahoze akina inyuma muri  Manchester United Gary Neville aranegura amajambo ya  Xhaka. Ati: "Yama ashwanira abakinyi mu cumba co kwihinduriramwo. "Nibaza ko atari akwiye kunegura aba bakinyi bakiri bato kuko na we nyene yagiye abateza urubwa kenshi, ahabwa amakarata atukura n'ibindi. Aho yarabashize mu ngorane". Kugira ngo Arsenal igire amahirwe yo kuja muri zine za mbere, itegerezwa gutsinda umurwi wa Everton ku kibuga cayo ku wa Mungu hanyuma Tottenham nayo -  iyisumvya amanota abiri ikanayirusha n'ibitsindo vyinshi - itsindwe na Norwich yamaze kumanuka mu cicaro ca kabiri. Xhaka yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Twashaka gukina urukino rwiza ariko vyanse. "Abantu bama bata ishavu ku burongozi. Ntituriko dukina tennis, turiko dukina umupira w'amaguru. Iyo umuntu yumva afise ubwoba mu bihe bigoye nk'ibi, guma muhira. "Ntushobora kuza ngaha hanyuma ngo ukine nk'uku. Twakinye nabi cane uno musi. Integuro zacu twari dufise ziratandukanye  rwose n'ingene twakinye. Twakinye urukino atari rwo na gatoya. "Batunesheje kuva ku munota wa mbere gushika ku wa 96. Ukina gutya, ntukwiye kuja muri Champions League. "Ikibazo ni uko turi mu bihe bigoye. Iyo udashoboye kwifata neza mu bihe bigoye, ibintu birangira nk'uko vyarangiye uno musi. Biboneka ko ata kintu dushoboye iyo turi mu bihe bigoye". Igitsindo Ben White yitsinze mu minota ya mbere y'igice ca kabiri c'uru rukino catumye Newcastle irusha Arsenal imbere y'uko Bruno Guimaraes atera ica kabiri mu minota ya nyuma. Xhaka yongerako ati: "Mu gihe Tottenham yotsindwa natwe tugatsinda, ivy'umupira ni akananirabahinga". "Ni ngombwa ko twizera. Imbere y'urukino, ibintu vyose twari tubifise mu minwe. Twakinye urukino rutari rwo na gato". Uru rukino rwabaye urwa gatandatu Arsenal itsinzwe mu nkino 11 za Premier League  - hakaba hari haciye imisi ine itsinzwe 3-0 na Tottenham - mbere n'umumenyereza Mikel Arteta akaba yemera ko Newcastle yarushije umurwi wiwe mu bice vyose. Ati: "Ni ibintu bitoroshe kwemera, ariko nta nkeka Newcastle yari ikwiriye iyi ntsinzi mu buryo bwose. "Vyari ngombwa ko duhangana n'aya majoro [harimwo n'iryo twatsinzwe na Tottenham] ariko vyanse. "Newcastle badusumbije incuro 100 zose.  Mu bice vyose, utegerezwa kuvyifatamwo neza, ariko ntavyo twashoboye. "Dutegerezwa kwigora tukemera ko umukino wacu ataho uhuriye na gato n'uwa Champions League. "Nacitse inguvu bidasanzwe. Ni ikintu kibabaje cane. Ibintu vyari mu minwe yacu uno musi ariko vyaducitse. Ni ngombwa ko dutsinda Everton hanyuma tukarindira ko Norwich yotsinda Spurs. Igihe cose hama hari amahirwe matoya mu mupira w'amaguru. "Kuva ku wa kabiri, tuzoba turiko twitegurira Everton. Vyose birashoboka mu biharuro". Newcastle yagiye ivyifatamwo neza kuva igihe iguriye abakinyi bashasha mu kwa mbere, ariko kandi n'umumenyereza wayo Eddie Howe yarahinduye abakinyi batari bake yasanzeho.

column2: Umusunikano muri Israel: Ababibonye baravuga ingene abantu 'batererwa mu kirere'
column3: Abantu bari ahabereye umusunikano waguyemwo abantu benshi mu rugendo rw'idini baravuga ingene ''batwawe n'umukuba w'abantu, abandi nabo batererwa mu kirere". Nibura abantu 44 bapfuye abandi benshi barakomereka mu rugendo rwo guhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Lag B'Omer ku mucamo w'umusozi Meron. Igiporisi cabwiye ikinyamakuru Haaretz ko uwo musunikano wabaye kubera  bamwe mu bari muri urwo rugendo  banyereye ku ngazi, bituma abandi batemba. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari bitavye urwo rugendo rweranda. Umugabo yatanze izina ryiwe nka David yavuze ko yari yinjiye kuraba ingene batsa igicaniro/icoto bunonyene haza ''umupfunda uvuye hanze". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Ynet ati: ''Batumijuye. Abantu banuzwe mu kirere - abandi  barahonyorwa'' ''Hari umwana yagumye yumiye ku kuguru kwanje, agwanira ubuzima. Twarindiriye gutabarwa iminota 15-20 muri uwo musunikano uteye ubwoba". Umwe mu barokotse yajanywe mu bitaro yabwiye television ya reta  Kan ati "Nta n'umwe yari azi ico ari bukore". "Intango n'ukubera abantu benshi cane. Hejuru yanje hari abantu benshi. Nanje nari ndamye hejuru y'uwundi atari agishobora guhema. Hari amaborogo, urudubi. Nabonye abana bari munsi yanje. Icanciye mu mutwe gusa kwari uko umwana wanje atoba impfuvyi". Uwundi yari ahari yavuze ko abantu bazungazunga iburyo n'ibubamfu. ''Inyuma y'iminota 20 nibaza ko abantu bari batanguye kutabasha guhumeka neza gutyo barondera gusohoka, ariko nta n'umwe yashoboye gusohoka. Munsi yanje hari abanrtu batari bagihema. Hari amaborogo menshi y'abavuga ngo "birasanse ko mpema". Uwundi yari ahari, Shlomo Katz,  yavuze ko yari arindiriye abagenzi biwe aca abona abaforoma biruka kandi bongera bagerageza  guhembura abana. Ati: "Ambulance zaguma zinjira zongera zisohoka". Dov Maisel, akora mu rwego rw'abatabara vyihuta rwa United Hatzalah Emergency Services yavuze ko abantu bari ''barundanyeko nk'ipaki y'ikarata''. Avuga ko abakora mu nzego zo gutabara nabo vyabaye ngombwa ko bahabwa inama zo kudahahamuka. Dov Maisel yagize ati: "Abantu benshi bakomeretse., abandi bapfuye ngaha. Abakorerabushake mubona ngaho bakoranijwe bakorerwa inama yo kubafasha kudahahamuka, - kuko babonye ibintu bigoye" Umwe mu bari bahari  yafashije abakomeretse yabwiye Haaretz ati: "Nari nicicaye ngira mfungure nca numva amaborogo. Twaciye twiruka gufasha hanyuma tubona imivyimba. Ubwa mbere bari nka 10, none ubu ni benshi".

column2: USA itangaza ko abasirikare bayo 34 bagize ibibazo vyo mu bwonko mu gitero ca Irani
column3: Ubunyamabanga bwo kwivuna abansi bwa Amerika, Pentagone, bumenyesha ko abasirikare 34 b'ico gihugu bagize ibibazo vyo mu bwonko (TBI)  bivuye kuri ca gitero ca Irani ku kirindiro cazo muri Irak. Umuvugizi w'ubwo bunyamabanga avuga ko gushika ubu, abashika 17 aribo bakiriko baravurwa. Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yari yatangaje ko ata musirikare wa Amerika n'umwe yigeze agira ingorane muri ico gitero ca Irani co ku wa 08 z'uku kwa mbere, mu kwihora igandagurwa ry'umusirikare mukuru wa Irani. Bwana Trump akaba yavuze ivyo ashaka gusigura ingingo yafashe yo kudasubiza ico gitero. Hagati aho mu ndwi iheze, Pentagon yari yamenyesheje ko abasirikare 11 bariko bavurwa kubera ibibazo vyo mu mutwe bagize bivuye kuri ico gitero. Abajijwe uko kuvuguruzanya mu gihe yari mu nama yerekeye ubutunzi kw'isi mu Buswisi, Bwana Trump yishuye ati: "Narumvise ko hari abari bamenetse umutwe, n'ibintu ataco bivuze, ariko mvuga nti, kandi ndavyemeza, si ibintu bikomeye". "Si mfata ko ari ububabare bukomeye nk'ubwo nabonye". Pentagone ivuga ko ata musirikare n'umwe yapfuye muri ico gitero ca Irani c'igisasu ca misire ku kirindiro ca Ain al-Asad, kuko hafi bose bari mu buraro bwo mu kuzimu igihe ivyo bisasu vyaterwa. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umuvugizi w'ubunyamabanga bujejwe kwivuna abansi, Jonathan Hoffman, yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko abasirikare umunani mu bagize ibibazo batahukanywe muri Amerika kugira ngo babandanye bavurwa, mu gihe abandi icenda nabo batwawe mu Budagi. 16 bavuriwe muri Irak uwundi umwe nawe muri Koweit imbere y'uko abo bose 17 basubira ku bikorwa vyabo, k'uko abategetsi babivuga. Bwana Hoffman avuga ko umunyamabanga ajejwe kwivuna abansi, Mark Esper atashotse aronka amakuru y'uko hoba hari abasirikare bari bagize ibibazo mu minsi yakurikiye ico gitero. Ishirahamwe ry'abakukuruke bahoze barwana mu ntambara za Irak na Afghanistani, riranegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona butashotse bumenyesha ko hari abasirikare bagize ibibazo. Paul Rieckhoff, uwatanguje iryo shirahamwe avuga ati: "ico ni ikintu gikomeye. Leta ya Amerika yategerezwa guha Abanyamerika amakuru ku vyerekeye ubuzima bw'abana babo. Nta kindi kintu gisumba ico". Igisirikare ca Amerika kimenyesha ko izo ngorane zikunda gushika mu burere bw'intambara. Ejo ku wa gatanu, abanyagihugu ba Irak ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barihaye amabarabara ku mugwa mukuru Baghdad biyamiriza abasirikare mvamakungu baharurwa mu 5000. Inama nshingamateka ya Irak iherutse gusaba abarwanyi mvamakungu bose - harimwo n'abanyamerika - kuva muri ico gihugu.

column2: Coronavirus: Papa asaba ko urucanco n'imiti bishikira bose kw'isi
column3: Papa Francis yateye akamo abategetsi bo kw'isi ngo bafashe kugira abantu bose bashobore kuronka urucanco rwa coronavirus ata nzitizi. Mw'ijambo rya Noheli yashikirije ku rubuga rwa internet ubwa mbere, Papa yagabishije kudashiraho "uruhome" kubakeneye imiti. Ico kiza catumye ubutumwa bwa Urbi na Orbi budatangirwa ku rubaraza rwa Bazelike St Pierre ku bantu benshi, nk'uko vyari bimenyerewe. Ahubwo Papa yatanze ubwo butumwa ari mu cumba i Vatikano. Uko kugabisha kwa papa kuje inyuma y'amakenga y'ingene ibihugu bitunze  bigura incanco zitagira uko zingana gusumba ibihugu bikenye. Yavuze ati:"Ese umwana w'Imana yogarukana mu bategetsi ba politike n'amareta agatima ko gufashanya n'amakungu, bahereye ku magara y'abantu, kugira ngo bose boshobore gushikirwa n'urucanco hamwe n'imiti. "Imbere y'iki kibazo kitagira imbibe, ntidushobora kwiyubakirako uruhome. Twese hamwe turi mu bwato bumwe." Papa yavuze ko ingaruka y'iki kibazo c'amagara y'abantu zerekanye ko ubumwe bw'amakungu bukomeye cane. "Muri iki gihe c'akahise, tugeramiwe n'ibibazo vy'ibidukikije hamwe n'ubusumbasumbane mu butunzi no mu mibano vyagiye kunyurwa n'ikiza coronavirus, birakenewe cane ko twemerana nka benewacu na bashiki bacu." Papa yateye akamo ngo habe umutima wo gufasha no gushigikira abakozweko n'ico kiza, adoma urutoke cane cane ku bapfasoni bahohotewe muri iki gihe abantu bugaranywe. Avuga ku zindi ngorane ziri kw'isi, yahamagariye abantu gukomeza ubumwe no gusubiza hamwe muri Syria, Yemen, Libya, Nagorno-Karabakh, Sudan y'epfo , Nigeria, Cameroun na Irak. Vyitezwe ko azogira urugendo muri Irak mu kwezi kwa gatatu, urugendo rushobora kuba rubaye urwa mbere rwa Papa mu gihugu cazahajwe n'intambara.

column2: Rwanda: Abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi basaba leta guhagarika ingingo y'ugukata umushahara w'abakozi
column3: Amashyaka (imigambwe) abiri atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda, ariyamiriza ingingo ya leta y'ico gihugu yo gukata umushahara w'abakozi, ibice bingana na 0.5% buri kwezi aja mu kigega c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi muri ico gihugu kizwi nka RSSB. Victoire Ingabire, umukuru w'umugambwe DALFA-Umurinzi,  hamwe na Bernard  Ntaganda w'umugambwe PS-Imberakuri, bakorera mu Rwanda, bagiriza umugambwe FPR uri ku butegetsi mu Rwanda ko ugomba kunyaga abakozi ku nyungu zawo. Leta yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe mu ntumbero yo gushigikira umusanzu w'ubwisungane mu kwivuza, ikanavuga ko yafashwe habanje kuba ibiganiro bitandukanye. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC Gahuzamiryango, Victoire Ingabire avuga ko iyo ngingo ya leta yafashwe hahonyanzwe ibwirizwashingiro ry'ico gihugu hamwe n'itegeko rigenga akazi "kuko umushahara w'umuntu ni umutungo wiwe bwite, ni ntavogerwa, ntabwo umuntu apfa kuwufataho uko yishakiye". Yagiriza ikigega  RSSB c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi ko cabaye igikoresho c'umugambwe FPR/RPF uri ku butegetsi. Ati: "Kiriya kigo gishirwamwo amafaranga y'ubwishingizi n'ayo gutegekaniriza abakozi RSSB, ni ikigo cabaye nk'inka y'imvyeyi ririya shyaka rivomamo". Umupfasoni Ingabire avuga ko atarwanya uwo mugambi wa leta wo kwunganira umusanzu w'ukwivuza, akabona ko ahubwo leta  ikwiye kuronderera mu bindi bisata maze amafaranga agashobora kuboneka. Avuga ko ingorane nyamukuru ari ingene ayo mafaranga yegeranywa akoreshwa, akabona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: "Ntabwo ari ikibazo c'ibura ry'amafaranga, ikibazo ni uburyo amafaranga yo mu bwisungane bwo kwivuza acungwa. Imbere y'uko baja kurondera amafaranga ni babanze bacunge neza n'ayahari". "Iyaba ayahari bayacunga neza, ntabwo uyu munsi baba bariko baja gusonga abakozi bababwira ngo barabakata amafaranga". Leta y'u Rwanda yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe ku nyungu z'umunyagihugu muri rusangi. Gaspard Musonera,  umunyamabanga uhoraho (ntayegayezwa mu Kirundi) mu bushikiranganji bw'abakozi n'akazi mu Rwanda, avuga ko amafaranga asanzwe atangwa n'umukozi hamwe n'ayo umukoresha amutangira ari ayo kwivuza be n'umuryango wiwe gusa. Avuga ko hakenewe ubundi buryo kugira ngo abanyagihugu bandi nabo bashobore kuvurwa, ari co ayo mafaranga bazokatwa azokora. Ati: "Ayo 0.5 % ku mushahara wabo bwite batahana ku kwezi ni inkunga yabo ku kigega c'ubwishingizi mu kwivuza kuko ayo abaturage basanzwe batanga ni make cane ugereranije n'ayakenewe kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza mu buryo bukwiriye". "Rero ni ngombwa ko hashakwa izindi nzira zo kwunganira ico kikega kugira ngo abaturage bashobore guhabwa serivisi z'ubuzima zikwiriye, inzego z'ubuzima nazo zishobore kugira ubushobozi bwo kubafasha neza". Avuga ko ibivugwa n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi y'uko ikigo RSSB gikora gihomba kandi ko iyo ntererano isanzwe ikoreshwa nabi, bidafise ishingiro "kuko nta bindi bari kuvuga". Ati: "Ikigo c'ubwisungane RSSB nta kibazo gifise, aho ikibazo kiri, ni uko abaturage basabwa amafaranga makeya ugereranyije n'ayo bategerezwa gutanga kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza". Bwana Musonera avuga ko imbere y'uko iyo ngingo ifatwa habaye ibiganiro bitandukanye vyari bifise intumbero yo kurondera inzira zo kwegeranya ubwo buryo harimwo n'abakozi, akabonako ata mpamvu y'uko yojamwo impari. Ati: "Ivyo ari vyo vyose jewe ico numva abantu bashira imbere ni ukumva akamaro bifitiye buri Munyarwanda wese ndetse n'uyo mukozi". Ku wa 26 z'ukwezi guheze, ni ho umushikiranganji w'abakozi ba leta n'umurimo mu Rwanda yasohora itangazo risaba abakoresha bo mu nzego za leta n'abikorera utwabo gukata 0.5% ku mushahara wa buri kwezi ku bakozi babo  maze bakawushikiriza ikigo c'Ubwisungane mu Rwanda (RSSB). Ni ingingo ishingiye kw'itegeko ry'umushikiranganji wa mbere c'ico gihugu ryo ku wa 13 z'ukwa mbere uno mwaka nyene, ryerekeye ubwisungane mu kwivuza, rikanerekana inzira zitandukanye uburyo bushobora kuvamwo.

column2: Kuba wararwaye Covid-19 bishobora gutanga 'amezi y'ubudahangarwa'
column3: Benshi mu bantu barwaye Covid-19 baba bakingiwe gusubira kuyandura mu kiringo nibura c'amezi atanu, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icigwa cakozwe na Public Health England. Kuba warigeze kuyirwara bituma ugira amahirwe ashika kuri 83% yo kudasubira kuyandura, ugereranije n'ababa batarigera bayirwara, nk'uko abahinga babitoye. Ariko baragabisha ko abantu basubira kwandura Covid-19 kandi bakanduza abandi. Abategetsi rero bahimiriza abantu kwubahiriza amategeko yo kuguma mu ngo zabo-baba barigeze canke batigeze bandura uwo mugera. 'Rokora ubuzima' Umwigisha wa kaminuza Susan Hopkins, yari arongoye ico cigwa, avuga ko ivyavuyemwo bitera intege, avuga ko ubudahangarwa bumara igihe kirekire gusumba uko abantu bavyibaza, ariko agashimangira ko kwikingira arico gikomeye gusumba. Avuga ko vyateye umutima uhagaze kubona abasubiye kwandura babasangamwo urugero runini cane rw'uwo mugera, n'iyo boba ata bimenyetso berekana, kandi bakaba bashobora kwanduza abandi. Avuga ati: "Ibi bisigura ko naho woba wibaza ko wamaze kurwara iyo ndwara none ukaba ukingiwe, umenye ko ufise amahirwe menshi yo kudasubira kurwara cane ariko biguma bishoboka ko wandura kandi ukanduza". Ati :"Ubu gusumba na mbere, birakenewe cane ko tuguma i muhira kugira dukingire igisata cacu c'amagara y'abantu twongere turokore ubuzima." Kuva mu kwezi kwa gatandatu gushika mu kwa cumi na rimwe mu 2020, hafi abantu ibihumbi 21.000 bakora kwa muganga mu Bwongereza bwose baragiye barapimwa kugira basuzumwe ko; Mu batasanganywe abasirikare b'umubiri bo kurwanya uwo mugera, bisigura ko atawo bigeze bandura, 318 barawanduye muri ico kiringo nk'uko ibipimo vyavyerekanye. Ariko ku bantu 6.614 bari bafise abasirikare mu mubiri, ico gitigiri cabaye  44 gusa. 'Amahirwe y'igihe kirekire' Abahinga bazokomeza gukurikirana abakozi bo kwa muganga mu kiringo c'amezi 12 kugira barabe igihe ubudahangarwa bushobora kumara. Bazokurikiranira hafi kandi abanduye ubwoko bushasha bwa corona-kuko butari bwakwiragire cane igihe iki cigwa cakorwa-bongere barabe ubudahangarwa bw'abahawe urukingo. Muganga Julian Tang, umuhinga w'imigera kuri  kaminuza ya Leicester, avuga ko ivyo batoye muri iki cigwa bihumuriza abakozi bo kwa muganga. Yongeye ati: "Guhabwa urukingo imyuma yo gukira Covid-19 nta kibazo...kandi bishobra kwongereza ubudahangarwa umuntu asanganywe. "Turabibona no ku rukingo rw'igihe ku bicurane. "Twizigiye ko ibiri muri iki cigwa bizogabanya amakenga ya bagenzanje b'abakozi bo kwa muganga bafise ubwoba bwo kandura Covid-19 ubugira kabiri."

column2: Papa asaba ko haboneka inyishu "ruhasha" ku bihe mu butumwa kuri BBC yonyene
column3: Mu butumwa bw'ijwi yahaye BBC yonyene, Papa François asaba abategetsi b'isi bazohurira  ku ndwi iza mu nama ya ONU  ku bihe i Glasgow (muri Ecosse), gutanga "inyishu ziri n'ico zishikako" ku vyihutirwa ku bidukikije no guha "icizere gifadika" abariko bararuka. Muri ubwo butumwa bwafatiwe amajwi i Vaticano  bugahabwa ikiganiro Thought for the Day ca Radio 4 ya BBC, Papa yagarutse ku bihanze isi birimwo ikiza ca Covid -19, ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, aca asaba abarongoye isi kubitorera inyishu mu buryo bw'icerekezo n'ingingo ruhasha , kugira "amahirwe" atangwa n'ivyo bihanze isi "ntatakare". Umwungere wa Ekereziya Katorika yavuze ati: "Duhangana n'ivyo vyugarije isi mu nzira za  nyamwigendako, kwigumizako ivyacu no gukoresha ivy'abandi, canke tukabibonamwo amahirwe nyayo y'impinduka". Yagarutse ku kuba hakenewe "ugusubira kwumva uruhara dusangiye rwo kwitaho isi yacu", yongerako ati "umwe wese muri twebwe - uwo ari we wese n'aho ari hose - ashobora kugira  ico aterereye mu guhindura inyishu ya twese ku ngeramizi zitari bwigere ziboneka  kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe n'itituka ry'inzu dusangiye." Papa mu mwanya uza aja kubonana na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden. Imigambi ya Biden ku bijanye n'ibihe mu gihugu iwe iracari mu mayira abiri inyuma y'aho umugambwe wiwe wigirije inyuma gutora itegeko rigenda  integuro z'amafaranga yo gukoresha. Ubwo butumwa n'ubwibutsa ingene Papa François yashize imbere ibijanye no gukingira ibidukikije mu burongozi bwiwe bwa Ekereziya. Mu majambo ashikiriza, aramaze kugaruka kenshi ku kaga k'ibihe, mu 2015 akaba yasohoye ikete rya  Papa (enciclyque), ryitwa  Laudato Si' rishimikiye kuri ico kibazo. Muri iyo nyandiko inyito yayo yahinduwe mu zindi ndimi nka "Ku kwitaho inzu dusangiye" , yiyamirije ugusambura ibidukikije, yerekana ko hakenewe ingingo zofasha  kugabanya iryo hindagurika, aca yemeza ata guca hirya no hino ko ihindagurika ry'ibihe ahanini riterwa n'ibikorwa vy'umuntu. Iryo kete ryasohotse imbere y'uko haba inama ya ONU y'i Paris mu 2015, COP21, rikaba ryabonywe nk'iryagize ico rifashije mu gutuma abategetsi bashika ku masezerano. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, abategetsi b'isi bariko baritegurira gukoranira i Glasgow mu nama y'uyu mwaka, COP26. Mu gihe biguma bigaragara ko ivyiyemejwe i Paris bitariko birashikwako kugira  ukwiyongera kw'ubushuhe bw'isi ntikurenge 1.5C, ugereranije n'urugero rw'imbere y'uko hatagura amahinguriro,  Papa François yasubiye gushimika kuri ico kibazo  yizigiye ko ijambo ryiwe rizosubira kugira ico rifashije nka mbere.

column2: Mesut Ozil avuga ko azoguma muri Arsenal gushika amasezerano arangiye mu 2021
column3: Mesut Ozil, umukinyi wo hagati w'umurwi Arsenal, avuga ko azoguma muri uyo murwi "gushika ku munota wa nyuma" w'amasezerano yiwe ategekanijwe kurangira mu kwa gatandatu 2021. Kuva inkino za Premier League zisubiriye gutangura mu kwa gatandatu, uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 31 ubu - yigeze kuba ari mpuzamakungu w'Ubudagi -  ntiyigeze akinishwa n'umumenyereza Mikel Arteta, avuga ko ari ukubera "ibibazo bijanye n'urukino". Amasezerano afitaniye na Arsenal amuha umushahara w'amapawundi 350.000 ( amadorari y'abanyamerika 458,421) ku ndwi. Ozil yahakanye amakuru avuga ko uyu murwi woba uriko urondera kumwishura umushahara wose w'umwaka umwe asigaje muri ayo masezerano. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Athletic ati: "Nivyo ibintu vyaragoranye ariko ndakunda Arsenal. Nije nzohitamwo igihe nzogira, si abandi bantu bampitiramwo umunsi wo kugenda". Yongerako ati: "Nzokwitangira umurwi uko nshoboye kwose. Ibintu nk'ibi ntaco bizongira, ahubwo bimpa ingoga. Muri kahise narashoboye kwerekana ko nshobora kwivyukiranya kandi nzosubira ndavyerekane". Ozil, umukinyi yinjiye muri Arsenal mu 2013 aguzwe muri Real Madrid ku mapawundi imiliyoni 42.4, yaramaze igihe adakina igihe uyu murwi wamenyerezwa na Unai Emery, mu nyuma arasubira mu kibuga igihe wamenyerezwa vy'imfatakibanza na Freddie Ljungberg. Igihe Arteta afatiye ibintu mu minwe mu kwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze, Ozil yarakinishijwe mu nkino zose cumi za Premier League Arsenal yakinye imbere y'uko iri higanwa rihagarikwa vy'agateganyo mu kiringo c'amezi atatu kubera coronavirus kuva mu kwa gatatu. Hagati aho, mu nkino zose 13 za Arsenal ihiganwa risubiye kwugururwa, Ozil ntiyigeze akinishwa na rimwe. Mu kwa kane Arteta n'abakinyi biwe baremeye ko bakatwa ibice 12.5%, maze Arsenal nayo itangaza ko itegura guhagarika abakozi bayo 55 kubera ibibazo vy'amafaranga vyavuye ku kiza karanda ca coronavirus. Hagati aho, Ozil wewe ntiyemeye ko umushahara wiwe ugabanywa, akavuga ko abakinyi "bafashwe gihutihuti". Amenyesha ko iyo ngingo ishobora kuba ari yo yatumye ataronswa amahirwe yo kwinjira mu kibuga. N'aho yubaha ingingo ya Arteta yo kutamukinisha, Ozil abona ko yari kuba yarahawe akaryo ko kwerekana ivyo ashoboye mu kibuga. Ati: "Urashobora kudakina mu nkino cumi zose zikurikirana kubera urwaye, ariko atari kubera ko utabishoboye canke kubera ufise ingeso mbi". Avuga kandi ko atari we wenyene yanse gukatwa umushahara, ariko ko izina ryiwe ari ryo ryabonetse gusumba.

column2: DR Congo: Umunyamuziki General Defao yapfuye
column3: Umunyamuziki rurangiranwa wo muri Repubulika ya Demokrasi ya Congo Lulendo Matumona azwi kw'izina rya General Defao yapfuye. Defao, yari afise imyaka 62, yapfiriye aho yari asanzwe arwariye mu bitaro vya Laquintinie i Douala, muri Cameroun ejo ku wa mbere. Uyu munyamuziki yavutse mu 1958 azwi mu ndirimbo n'intambo zaryoheye abakunzi b'umuziki batari bake. Abaririmvyi Ferre Gola na Fally Ipupa bari mu banyamuziki ba mbere batanze ubutumwa bw'akababaro, bavuga  ko uru rupfu ari uruhombo runini kuri Afrika. General Defao yavukiye i Kinshasa ku wa 31 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri 1958, akaba yatanguye kuririmba mu 1978 mu murwi wa Suka Movema. Yararirimvye mu gihe gito mu mirwi Fogo Stars na Somo West imbere y'uko yinjira muri  Grand Zaiko Wawa, mu nyuma akaba yagiye kwimukira mu murwi Choc Stars wari watangujwe mu 1983 n'abaririmvyi Ben Nyamabo hamwe na Bozi Boziana, ari naho yerekaniye ubuhinga bukomeye aranamenyekana cane. Defao yahavuye ava mu murwi Choc Stars mu mpera za 1990 aca atanguza umurwi Big Stars ari kumwe na Djo Poster. Hagati aho, ibintu ntivyagenze uko yavyipfuza, biba ngombwa ko arondera abandi baririmvyi Djo amaze kugenda. Defao yari yashitse muri Cameroun mu ndwi iheze akaba mbere yaragiye mu myimenyerezo y'igiteramo ciwe c'Umwaka Mushasha, ari naho yatanguye kwumva atameze neza, nk'uko amakuru ava i Douala abivuga. Defao yahavuye asimbanwa ku bitaro Laquintinie ari naho yahavuye asandabira.

column2: Russia yahaye amasaha indwi ingabo za Ukraine ziri i Mariupol ngo zikishikane, zanse
column3: Nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko ingabo za Ukraine zirwanira mu gisagara ca Mariupol cugarijwe zihava zishikana ku ngabo z'Uburusiya, nk'uko zari zatewe akamo n'iki gihugu kimaze igihe cugaye iki gisagara kiri ku nkengera y'inyanja mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine. Umuhanuzi w'umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol, Petro Andriushchenko, yavuze abicishije ku rubuga rwa Telegram ko "n'aho Uburusiya bwatanze 'akanya ko kwishikana' ku ngabo zacu zisigaye" muri ico gisagara "abarwanyi bacu barabandanya urugamba". Umushingamateka wa Ukraine aserukira akarere ka Odesa, Oleksiy Goncharenko, yabwiye BBC ko ingabo za Ukraine ziri i Mariupol zitazokwishikana ku ngabo z'Uburusiya. Ati: "Naravuganye nabo ejo, kandi ndazi ko bazorwana gushika ku wa nyuma". Uburusiya bwari bwemereye ingabo za Ukraine zirwanira mu gisagara ca Mariupol ko zishobora kuticwa - ariko gusa mu gihe zari gushira ibirwanisho hasi kuri uyu wa Mungu zikishikana. Reta y'Uburusiya yavuga ko ingabo za Ukraine "n'abacangero mvamakungu " bakirwana i Mariupol -  igisagara Uburusiya buvuga ko bwigaruriye hafi cose - bari bafise amahirwe yo gushira ibirwanisho hasi hagati y'isaha cumi na zibiri z'agatondo (06h00) gushika isaha indwi z'umurango (13h00) mu masaha ya Moscou hanyuma bagashobora gukira. Yavuga ko abakora ivyo bashobora gufatwa neza hisunzwe amasezerano ya Geneva agenga impfungwa z'intambara. Iri tangazo ntirivuga icoba mu gihe hogira umusirikare n'umwe wa Ukraine yokwanka gushira ikirwanisho ciwe hasi - ariko rikavuga ko reta yemeye ibi "mu kwubahiriza iteka rya kiremwamuntu". Uburusiya buvuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zigisigaye muri ico gisagara zazibiriwe mu gace gatoya ka Azovstal gahingurirwamwo ivyuma. Iri tangazo ryavuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya "zari kubandanya zisohora" ibiri mu vyo izi ngabo za Ukraine zikiri i Azovstal zemerewe uko iminota 30 iheze ijoro ryose. Uburusiya buvuga ko ingabo za Ukraine ni zemera kwishikana, ingabo z'Uburusiya zari kumanika amabendera atukura isaha cumi na zibiri hanyuma iza Ukraine nazo zigashobora kumanika amabendera yera. Rihimiriza kandi izo ngabo ko zitorinda kurindira uruhusha ruva i Kyiv kugira ngo zishikane, ariko ko zokwifatira ingingo zo nyene. Imbere y'aha, Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky yari yatangaje ko "guhonya" abarwanyi bakirwanira i Mariupol gushobora gutuma ibiganiro n'Uburusiya bihagarara burundu. Ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'intara ya Donesk iherutse gutangazwa n'Uburusiya ko ari igihugu cigenga (Donetsk People's Republic, DPR) atangarije ko abarwanyi ba Ukraine basigaye i Mariupol bazokwanka kwishikana bazohonywa. Afatiye ku kungene igisagara kiri hafi ya Kyiv casambuwe n'ibibombe, Perezida Zelensky yabwiye urubuga ngurukanabumenyi Pravda  ati: "Mariupol ishobora kuba nka Borodyanka incuro cumi". Muri ino ndwi, Moscou yatangaje ko abasirikare ba Ukraine barwanira mu mazi barenga 1000 bishikanye i Mariupol, ivyo Ukraine yoyo yahakanye. Inyuma y'aho ejo ku wa gatandatu Uburusiya buhereye amasaha make yo kwishikana ingabo za Ukraine zirwanira i Mariupol, Perezida Zelensky yaremeye ko ingabo za Ukraine zigisigaranye agace gatoya gusa ka Mariupol, anavuga ko reta iguma ivugana n'abo bacirwanako. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters risubiramwo Zelensky avuga ko ibintu bimeze nabi cane. Ariko ntiyavuze ku bivugwa n'Uburusiya ko igisirikare cabwo cakubuye udusigarira tw'ingabo za Ukraine mu gisagara cose kimaze igihe gisatirwa, kiretse izari zikiri ku ruganda rwa Azovstal - uruganda rukomeye ruhingura ubutare bw'icuma. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya yavuze ko ingabo za Ukraine zababa 2500 ari zo zikiri muri urwo ruganda, kandi ko ata saganirizo zisigaranye kuko zugaraniweyo n'abasirikare b'Uburusiya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta TASS. BBC ntiyashoboye guhinyuza aya makuru. Icegera c'umukuru w'ikambi y'umunani mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya, Vladimir Petrovich Frolov, yasize ubuzima mu ntambara muri Ukraine, nk'uko bitangazwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ry'Uburusiya TASS. Aya makuru yemejwe na buramatari wa St Petersburg,  Alexander Beglov. Beglov avuga ati: "Vladimir Petrovich Frolov yapfuye nk'intwari mu ntambara n'intagondwa za Ukraine". Uyu muburamatari avuga ko Frolov "yitanze kugira ngo abana, abagore n'abatama mu ntara ya Donbas ntibasubire guterwa amabombe". Ariko amabombe menshi aterwa muri Ukraine aterwa n'Uburusiya. Muri ino ntambara, abajenerali b'abarusiya batari bake n'izindi ntwazangabo mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya bavugwa ko bahasize ubuzima. Ni ibintu bidasanzwe kwumva intwazangabo zo ku rwego nk'urwo bishira mu kaga mu kwegera cane urubuga rw'intambara, amakuru ava mu bihugu vyo mu burengero akavuga ko bakora gutyo mu ntumbero yo kuraba ko bofata urugamba mu minwe mu gihe, hamwe hamwe rwagenze nabi.

column2: Umunyamabanga w'ubudandaji wa Amerika Wilbur Ross avuga ko coronavirus izotuma ubuzi bwiyongera
column3: Umunyamabanga ajejwe ubudandaji wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Wilbur Ross, avuga ko ikiza ca coronavirus mu Bushinwa gishobora gutuma ubutunzi bwa Amerika bwiyongera. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na televiziyo imwe, Bwana Ross yavuze ati: "Ndibaza ko kizofasha mu kugarukana ubuzi bwinshi muri Amerika ya Ruguru". Ayo majambo yiyamirijwe bikomeye n'abanegura ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Donald Trump. Ikwirakwira ry'ico kiza ryatumye haba ubwoba ko ubutunzi bw'Ubushinwa bushobora kugira ibibazo. Yishura ku kibazo yari abajijwe na televiziyo Fox Business nimba ico kiza gishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwa Amerika, Bwana Ross yavuze ati: "Si nipfuza kuvuga ko ari intsinzi ntoya mfatiye ku ndwara nk'iyo ije guteza ibibazo, indwara mbi cane". "Ariko ikiriho ni uko ivyo bituma amakompanyi aronka ikindi kintu afatirako mu bikorwa vyayo n'aho akorera... Rero ndibaza ko ivyo bizotuma ubuzi bugaruka muri Amerika ya uguru". Mu nyuma niho ubunyamabanga bw'ubudandaji bwasubiramwo amajambo yiwe buti : "Nk'uko umunyamabanga Ross yabisiguye, igikorwa ca mbere ni ukurwanya uwo mugera no gufasha abawanduye". Umuvugizi wabwo ati: "Ariko kandi ni ngombwa kwihweza neza ibijanye no gukorana n'igihugu kimenyereye kunyegeza ibibazo bihanze abanyagihugu baco n'isi yose". Ayo majambo yiyamirijwe bikomeye n'umushingamateka w'umu Démocrate Don Beyer abona ko ari ugukina ku muvyimba abantu mu gushaka kwungukira ku kiza ruhonyanganda nk'ico. Eka n'abahinga muvyo ubutunzi baneguye ayo majambo ya Bwana Ross. Simon Baptist umuhinga muvyo ubutunzi wo mu gihugu ca Singapour yabwiye BBC ko yakubiswe n'inkuba yumvise amajambo ya Ross. Avuga ko uwo mugera ushobora kugira ingaruka mbi kuri Amerika aho kuzana akarusho. Ati: "Ikiriho ni uko Amerika izohahombera cane kuko n'aho bimeze uko bimaze, Amerika irashorera cane mu Bushinwa. Rero iyo ubutunzi bw'Ubushinwa bugize ibibazo bikomeye, bigira ingaruka mbi kuri Amerika". Ishami ry'ishirahamwe ONU ryitaho amagara kw'isi OMS ryatangaje ko isi iri mu bihe bidasanzwe kubera uwo mugera  ubandanya ukwiragira hanze y'Ubushinwa. Umaze guhitana abantu bashika 213 mu Bushinwa, mu gihe umaze gushika mu bindi bihugu 18. Abahinga muvyo ubutunzi bavuga ko Coronavirus ishobora kugira ingaruka mbi cane ku butunzi bw'isi gusumba ikiza ca SARS co mu mwaka 2002-2003. Ico kiza candukiye abantu barenga 8000, abarenga 700 nabo bahasiga ubuzima, bikaba vyasavye imiliyaridi zirenga 30 z'amadolari kugira kirwanywe. Muri kino gihe, uwu mugera coronavirus watumye amakompanyi mpuzamakungu akomeye harimwo ay'ubuhinga bwa none, ayakora n'ayagurisha imiduga ahagarika vy'agateganyo ibikorwa vyayo mu Bushinwa.

column2: Coronavirus-Afrika: ibitigiri vy’abanduye bigenda vyiyongera muri Algeria na Senegal
column3: Igitigiri c'abamenyekanye ko banduye wa mugera ruhonyabanyu wa coronavirus muri Algeria caraye kiduze gushika kuri 17 muri iri joro ryakeye ku wa gatatu, mu gihe Senegal nayo itangaza ko abantu bantu babiri bawanduye bakaba baheruka i Bulaya. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Algeria atangaza ko abantu icenda bo mu muryango umwe baba mu karere ka Blida mu buraruko bw'ico gihugu ku birometero 30  uvuye ku mugwa mukuri Alger, basanze baranduye. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ritangaza ko mu kwezi guheze uyo muryango wari wakiriye incuti zabo z'Abafaransa bapimwe bagasanga baranduye bamaze gusubira mu Bufaransa. Nayo muri Senegal umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu avuga ko hari abandi babiri banduye ejo ku wa gatatu, gutyo igitigiri c'abanduye muri ico gihugu gica gishika kuri bane. Umwe mu batangajwe ko banduye ni umwongerezakazi afise imyaka 33 yinjiye ku mugwa mukuru w'ico gihugu, Dakar, ku wa 24 z'ukwa kabiri avuye i Londres. Uwa kabiri ni umufaransakazi w'imyaka 68 yinjiye ku wa 29 z'ukwa kabiri. Hirya y'ejo ku wa kabiri, umugabo wiwe yari yapimwe basanga yaranduye. Abo bantu babiri bashasha banduye barwarijwe mu bitaro, aho bivugwa ko amagara yabo atabangamiwe. Muri Afrika, igitigiri c'abamaze kumenyekana ko banduye coronavirus gishitse kuri 26:  Algeria 17, Senegal bane, Misiri babiri, Maroc, Nigeria na Tuniziya umwe umwe.

column2: Umukinyi Ndikumana Selemani yakuwe ku rutonde rw'Intamba mu Rugamba muri CAN 2019
column3: Umusatirizi Ndikumana Yamini Selemani yakuwe ku rutonde rw'abakinyi 23 bagize umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Uburundi bagiye guserukira igihugu mu nkino z'ihiganwa ry'igikombe rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu ritangura kuri uyu wa gatanu i Cairo mu Misiri. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Burundi, FFB,  rikaba ririko rirahererekanwa ku mbunga hwaniro, iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe n'abamenyereza b'umurwi kubera indero nke uyo mukinyi yerekanye. FFB ivuga ko iyo nyifato iteye kubiri  « n'ivyumvikanyweko na bose mu ntumbero yo guserukira neza igihugu guhera kuwa 22 z'uku kwa gatandatu 2019 ». Ni kuri uyo munsi umurwi w'Intamba mu Rugamba uzoba ukinye urukino rwa mbere, aho uzohura na Super Eagles wa Nijeriya. Iryo tangazo rivuga ko « abandi bakinyi 22 bose bameze neza kandi barangwa n'ishaka ryo guhangana na Nijeriya » mu gisagara ca Alexandia.  Tubandanya tubakurikiranira iyo nkuru. Nibwo bwa mbere Uburundi bwinjiye muri izi nkino za nyuma z'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu vya Afrika. Kuri uyu wa gatanu, niho ryugururwa, aho igihugu ca Misiri cakiriye izo nkino kiza gutana mu mitwe n'igihugu ca Zimbabwe isaha zine mu masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda. Akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko kaserukiwe n'ibihugu vya Uganda, Kenya, Uburundi na Tanzaniya.

column2: OMS ivuga ko ikiza ruhonyanganda ca Ebola atari akaga gahanze isi yose
column3: Ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi , OMS, ryafashe ingingo yo kudafata ikiza ca Ebola kiri mu gihugu ca Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi nk'ikibazo gihanze isi yose. OMS ivuga ko Ebola "ari ikiza gihanze cane" akarere, ariko ko atari ingorane y'isi yose. Hagati aho, rirababazwa n'uko ibihugu bitanga amahera make cane, angana n'igice gusa, c'amahera akenewe kugira ngo bashobore guhangana n'iyo ndwara. Ico kiza kimaze guhitana abantu barenga 1400 muri ico gihugu, kikaba kigize kabiri muri kahise. Muri iyi ndwi, hari abarwaye babonetse mu gihugu ca Uganda, mbere batatu muri bo barahasiga ubuzima, n'aho uwo mugera utarakwiragira hose. Ingingo y'ugutangaza ko indwara kanaka ko ari ingorane iahnze isi yose, iri mu  ngingo zikomeye cane zishobora gufatwa n'ishirahamwe OMS. Rimaze kubikora incuro zine gusa, harimwo iyafashwe ku kiza ca Ebola cari ciziziye akarere ka Afrika y'Uburengero, kigahitana abantu barenga ibihumbi 11. Mu bisanzwe ingingo nk'iyo isigura ko haca haboneka ayandi mahera n'abandi bakozi kugira ngo bashobore kurwanya ikiza kanaka - canke ingingo za politike zishobora guhagarika intambara kugira ngo abavuzi bashobore guhangana naco. Ntiyabaye ingingo yoroshe gufata. Dr Preben Aavitsland arongoye vy'imfatakibanza umurwi wa OMS ujejwe ibibazo bidasanzwe, avuga ko habaye impari ndende  n'ukutumvikana mu nama yihutirwa yabereye i Geneve ejo ku munsi wa gatanu kuri ico kiza. Ico kiza kirakwije ibikenewe kugira ngo citwe ko ari ikiza c'isi yose kuko ari ikibazo kidasanzwe kandi ko gishobora gukwiragira no mu bindi bice vy'isi. Ariko, utwigoro turiko dukorwa n'abari ku rubuga "ntidushobora gutsimbatazwa" mu kuvuga ko ari ikiza kidasanzwe. Dr Aavitsland avuga ati: "Iki si ikibazo gihanze isi yose, gihanze igihugu ca Kongo, kandi kirakomeye". Ariko, amenyesha ko ugutangaza ko ari ingorane ihanze isi yose bishobora gutuma n'imbibe zugarwa, eka n'indege zigahagarika ingendo zazo muri Kongo, ivyo navyo bikaba vyokwica gusumba gukiza. Avuga ati: "Nta nyungu yoboneka, ahubwo uruhombo rwoba runini". OMS yari imaze kugira inama zibiri zose yiga nimba ikiza ca Ebola muri Kongo gishobora gutangazwa nk'ingorane ihanze isi yose. Kuri izo ncuro zompi, iyo ngingo ntiyashoboye gufatwa kubera cari ikiza kiri mu karere gusa, kitari mu bindi bihugu. Ico kiza catanguye muri ico gihugu mu kwezi kw'umunani umwaka uheze wa 2018 kikaba ciganje mu ntara zibiri, Kivu y'Uburaruko na Ituri. Abarenga 2100 baramaze kuyandura, abarenga nabo 1400 ikaba yarabahitanye. Muri iyi ndwi, hari abarwaye babonetse mu gihugu ca Uganda, mbere babiri muri bo barahasiga ubuzima, n'aho uwo mugera utarakwiragira hose. N'aho OMS ivuga ko ivyo "biteye ubwoba", ivuga ko ata cemezo na kimwe cerekana ko umugera uriko urakwiragira muri Uganda . Abantu 27 nibo bikekwa ko boba barashikiranye n'umuryango wabonetsemwo iyo ndwara, bakaba bugananiwe ku mihana yabo aho bazoronkera urucanco rwa Ebola. OMS ivuga ko impinga ikiri ndende, ikamenyesha ko igikeneye imiliyoni 54 z'amadolari  mu miliyoni 98 ivuga ko yari ikeneye hagati y'ukwezi kwa kabiri n'ukw'indwi  kugira ihangane n'ico kiza.

column2: Amwe mu mafoto yaranze akarere n'ayavuye ahandi muri ino ndwi ya 13 gushika 20 z'ukwa kabiri 2022
column3: Amwe mu mafoto meza twabacaguriye mu karere, muri Afrika n'ahandi kw'isi aya mahpto yose afise abo yitirirwa.

column2: Covid-19: 'Natakaje akazi kanje kubera nticandagishije'
column3: Danielle Thornton yari mu kibanza basanzwe barindiriramwo abanyeshure arindiriye abana biwe igihe amenya ko ategerezwa guhitamwo ingingo ishobora guhindura ubuzima bwiwe: kwicandagisha canke gutakaza akazi kiwe amazemwo imyaka hafi icenda muri banki ya Citigroup. We n'umugabo wiwe bari bamaze amezi atari make bakurikirana ingene abakoresha bashiraho amategeko yo kwicandagisha, akaba yari azi neza ko umuryango wiwe ushobora guhura n'iki kibazo. Niho rero mu butumwa bwa email yaronse kuri terefone yiwe, yagiye abibona. Ati: "Twaragize ibiganiro vyinshi, vyinshi kuri iki kibazo, ariko twafashe ingingo ntabanduka ko uburenganzira bwacu ari bwo buri hejuru gusumba amafaranga". Danielle ni umwe mu bihumbi n'ibihumbi muri Amerika bahisemwo gutakaza akazi kabo hakwiteza incanco za covid-19. Ariko ni inkehwa. Abakoresha hafi bose barafashe izi ngingo - hafi ica gatatu c'amakompanyi manini manini mu gihugu hamwe na 15% z'amakompanyi matomato - avuga ko benshi mu bakozi babo bayakurikije. Muri Citi, yoyo isanzwe yarihanganiye abafise imvo zishingiye ku magara n'idini, abakozi bayo barenga 99% barakurikije ibisabwa n'iyo banki ifise abakozi bangana na 65.000. Abahinga bavuga ko izi ncanco ata ngorane zifise kandi ko ari yo nzira yonyene yo kurwanya ubwandu, ariko ingingo zitegeka abantu kwicandagisha - ziboneka nk'inzira yo guhatira kwiteza izi ncanco ku banyamerika bangana na 25% bataricandagisha - ziriko zirarwanywa bikomeye mu gihugu cose, aho abatari bake babona ko  ziriko zihonyanga ubwigenge bwabo. Muri kuno kwezi, sentare nkuru y'igihugu yarahagaritse ingingo ya Perezida Joe Biden yategeka ko ubuzi bwose buhuriramwo n'imiburiburi abantu ijana ababukoramwo bategerezwa kwicandagisha canke bakambara udupfukamunwa hanyuma bakama bipimisha buri ndwi ku mafaranga yabo. Abacamanza bo muri iyo sentare nkuru y'igihugu bavuze ko iyi ngingo ari "ihonyangwa rikomeye" ry'imibereho y'imiriyoni n'imiriyoni z'abakozi - maze bahagarika icizere c'uko hashobora kuba ingingo nk'izi mu gihugu cose zitegekanywa mu bihugu bimwe bimwe nk'Ubudagi. N'aho amasentare ya Amerika yagiye yemerera amareta n'amakompanyi gufata ingingo nk'izi ku giti cayo, abazirwanya baracari benshi cane. Abakozi hafi 55% barashigikiye ingingo zifatwa n'abakoresha babo zibategeka kwicandagisha, ariko abarenga ica gatatu babandanya baziyamiriza, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icigwa cakozwe n'ikigo Gallup mu kwa cumi na kabiri. Mu gisagara ca New York mu ci riheze, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baragiye mu myiyerekano biyamiriza ingingo z'abarongoye intara zitegeka abakozi bo mu gisata c'ubuvuzi, abigisha hamwe n'abakozi ba reta kwicandagisha. Iyi ngingo yafashwe igashika no mu gisata c'abigenga kuva ico gihe, yatumye abakozi bo muri ico gisagara baja mu karuhuko igihe yatangura gushirwa mu ngiro, mu gihe ibitaro vyo muri iyo ntara yose vyirukanye abakozi. Donna Schmidt aba mu karere ka Long Island akaba yari amaze imyaka 30 akora nk'umuforoma afasha abibarutse ariko akaba yarahagaritse akazi kiwe kubera amategeko yo kwicandagisha avuga ati: "Si nemera ko reta ari yo ifise uburenganzira bwo gutegeka ku bintu biri hagati ya kiremwamuntu n'umuremyi wabo". Uyu mupfasoni w'imyaka 52 avuga ko yakunda akazi kiwe ariko akaba aterekwa incanco ku mvo z'idini n'uburenganzira bwo kwihitiramwo ico ashatse we nyene ubwiwe. Ubu ariko yigira uwuharanira agateka ka zina muntu, akaba ariko ategura ishirahamwe New Yorkers Against Medical Mandates rihurikiyemwo abantu bangana na 26.000. Avuga ati: "Nta guhigitanya kwabayeho. Ivyabaye biteye agahinda. Ni ukuri nditaho abarwayi banje, rero kwumva ikigo ca reta kimbwira kiti: 'nta kibanza ugifise hano' - ni ibintu bitoroshe. Danielle, yari asanzwe akorera muhira i  Missouri muri banki Citigroup, avuga ko atari umunyaporitike kandi ko atari "umuntu arwanya incanco". Ariko uyu mukenyezi, nyina w'abana bane mbere yanduye Covid umwaka uheze imbere y'uko incanco zikwira hose, ntiyashatse guterwa urucanco, nk'uko we nyene abivuga, "rusa n'urutarwanya uwu mugera". Umusi wa nyuma aherukirako gutonda hari ku wa 14 z'uku kwa mbere. Avuga ko ari igihamana yagize kuba ata kibazo c'amafaranga yagize inyuma yo guhagarika akazi kiwe ata migambi yari afise yo kurondera akandi kazi ubu. Nta n'uko yigeze yiruhisha aja kurondera ko yogirirwa ubuntu ku mvo z'idini canke z'amagara. Ati: "Nategerezwa kuronswa uburenganzira bwo kwihitiramwo, ariko gusa abantu biyumvira kwinshi...ni ihinduka rikomeye ku muryango wacu". Amakompanyi yafashe izi ngingo zo kwicandagisha yemeza ko aya mategeko ari yo yafashije kwumvisha abakozi kwicandagisha. Mw'ihinguriro ry'imfungurwa Tyson Foods, abakozi bababa 60.000 - canke 40% b'abakozi baryo - baricandagishije inyuma y'aho rishingiye iyi ngino mu kwa munani, rivuga ko "ari co kintu nyaco conyene dushobora gukora kugira dukingire abakozi bacu". Mw'ikompanyi y'indege United Airlines, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa Scott Kirby avuga ko ingingo zafashwe na kompanyi yiwe zagabanije igitigiri c'abakozi baja mu bitaro, akavuga ko n'imiburiburi umuntu umwe buri ndwi yapfa imbere y'uko bafata izi ngingo. Mu rwandiko yandikiye abakozi, yanditse ati: "N'aho nzi ko hari abantu gushika ubu batemera poritike yacu, United iriko irerekana ko gutegeka abantu kwicandagisha ari co kintu nyaco co gukora kuko urucanco rwararokoye ubuzima". Hampande y'inyungu mu bijanye n'amagara, amakompanyi afise ayandi mategeko atoroshe ashingiye ku kazi n'amafaranga. Amafaranga yo kwivuza, akenshi usanga igice kimwe kirihwa n'umukoresha, ari hejuru ku bantu baticandagishije, kandi bisanga mu gihamana kibi co gutakza akazi kubera uburwayi. Emily Dickens, umukuru w'igisata kijejwe ibibazo vya reta mw'ishirahamwe rishinzwe abakozi, Society for Human Resource Management, ryakoze icigwa rigasanga 75% y'abo ryabajije batari kwicandagisha canke ngo bame baja kwipimisha buri  ndwi iyo ritaba itegeko rya reta, avuga ko amakompanyi afise impungenge ku ngaruka z'izi ngingo zitegeka abantu kwicandagisha hamwe n'ikena ry'abakozi muri iki gihugu gisanzwe gifise akahise gashingiye kw'isoko rikomeye ry'abakozi. Muri rusangi, Abanyamerika bagera kuri 63% baramaze kwuzuza incanco, ugereranije na 84% mu Bwongereza (kuva ku myaka 12 kuduga) bamaze kwiteza incanco zibiri.

column2: Mali: Macron yatangaje ivanwa ry'ingabo inyuma y'imyaka icenda muri ico gihugu
column3: Ubufaransa n'ibihugu bifatanije mu ngabo za Buraya bigiye kuvana ingabo zavyo muri Mali inyuma y'imyaka hafi cumi, nk'uko vyatangajwe na prezida Emmanuel Macron. Izo ngabo zari zimaze iyo myaka ziri mu  rugamba rwo kurwanya intagondwa z'aba Islam muri ico gihugu kuva mu 2013. Prezida Macron yavuze ko ingingo yo kuva muri ico gihugu  yatewe n'itituka ry'imigenderanire, mu gihe akagawi k'abasirikare bafashe ubutegetsi muri Mali kabandanya kugaragaza ko katerekwa Ubufaransa. Izo ngabo zica zirungikwa mu bindi bihugu vy'ako karere ka Sahel. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru i Paris ku wa kane, prezida Macron yavuze ati: "Ntidushobora kubandanya turi mu bikorwa vya gisirikare dukorana n'abantu bihariye ubutegetsi, bafise imikenyuro n'imigambi yinyegeje tutemera". Yahakanye ibivugwa ko kuva muri Mali ari ukwemera ko bananiwe aca ashimika avuga ko Ubufaransa buzoguma mu gikorwa co kurwanya ibikorwa vy'intagondwa z'aba Islam muri ako karere. Yamenyesheje ko igihugu ca Niger cemeye kwakira zimwe muri izo ngabo zizoba zikuwe muri Mali. Yavuze ati: "Ubufaransa bwagize uruhara rwo guhuriza hamwe inguvu  muri ico gikorwa mpuzamakungu co gufasha Sahel. "Tuzobandanya urwo ruhara rwo guhuriza hamwe". Igikorwa co kuvanayo izo ngabo, gitegekanijwe kumara ikiringo kiri hagati y'amezi ane n'amezi atandatu, catangajwe inyuma y'inama y'abategetsi ba Buraya na Afrika ku biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubufaransa, Champs Élysée, ku wa gatatu mw'ijoro. Mw'itangazo ryasohotse kuri uyu wa kane mu gitondo, ibihugu bifise uruhara mu mugwi wa Tabuka urongowe n'Ubufaransa rivuga ko bumvikanye ko gushika mu kwezi kwa gatandatu hazoba hashizweho imigambi yo kuguma bafasha  muri ako karere, na cane cane muri Niger no mu bihugu vy'ikigobe ca Guinee. Hafi ingabo 5.000 z'abafaransa ziri mu butumwa bwo kurwanya intangondwa z'aba Islam muri Sahel mu gikorwa kizwi nka Barkhane, izishika 2.400 zikaba ziri mu makambi atatu mu buraruko bwa Mali. Iyo karata iri aho munsi irerekana akarere ka Sahel n'ibihugu karimwo Ariko imigenderanire y'Ubufaransa na Mali, kimwe mu bihugu bikenye cane kw'isi, yaratitutse cane muri iyi minsi kuva igisirikare gifashe igihugu mw'itembagazwa ry'unbutegetsi ryabaye mu kwezi kw'umunani mu 2020. Ibintu vyunyutse kuruta mu kwezi guheze igihe abo basirikare bisubirako ku mwumvikano bari bemeye wo gutunganya amatora mu kwezi kwa kabiri hanyuma bakavuga ko bazoguma ku butegetsi gushika mu 2025, mu nyuma bagahava bakirukana uwuserukira Ubufaransa. Mu kwezi kwa 12, ibihugu birenga 10 vyo mu Burengerazuba vyiyamirije kandi  umuzo w'abacangero b'umugwi ushingiye mu Burusiya wa Wagner muri Mali. Uwo mugwi umaze kugira uruhara mu ntambara zitari nke zikomeye mu bihugu nka Syria, Mozambique, Sudan na Centrafrique. Amatohoza ya BBC yerekanye ko uwo mugwi ufise aho uhuriye n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara muri Libya. Macron yagabishije avuga ko uwo mugwi waje "gukingira inyungu zawo n'iz'abari ku butegetsi ubwabo". Inkuru y'uko Ubufaransa bukuye akarenge ntiyakiriwe kumwe muri Mali. Umugabo umwe yabwiye BBC ko ivyo "bizozana amahoro mu buraruko bw'igihugu cacu kuko Uburusiya na Wagner ata nkeka ko bazoshigikira ingabo zacu", mu gihe uwundi yavuze ko  ingabo z'Ubufaransa muri Mali zananiwe. Ariko hari abandi bashikirije amakenga ko ibintu biriko birunyuka. Umwe mu bafise impungenge yabwiye BBC ati: "Ejo harabaye igitero  mu gice c'uburaruko bwa Mali... Abasirikare bacu bari mu gice co hagati. Bavuga ko ingabo ziriko zirigarurira uturere. Ariko aho ni mu majahagati y'igihugu gusa. Mu zindi ntara ho gute?" Ivanwa ry'ingabo z'Ubufaransa muri Mali rizogira ingaruka z'umutekano ku bindi bihugu vyo mu karere ka Sahel  navyo nyene bisanzwe bihanzwe n'intagomdwa za Islam. Umukuru wa Côte d'Ivoire Alassane Ouattara yagabishije ko iyo ngingo izosiga igihengeri kizosaba utundi twigoro ama reta y'ibihugu vyo mu karere. Ouattara ati: "Bizodusaba kwongereza ingabo kandi turushirizeho gukingira imbibe zacu." Ariko umukuru wa Senegal Macky Sall avuga ko atahura igituma Ubufaransa bwafashe ingingo yo kuva muri Mali, kandi yizeza ko urugamba rwo kurwanya intagondwa za Islam muri Sahel  ruzokomeza. Hagati aho umukuru wa Ghana  Nana Akufo-Addo yavuze ko ari nkenerwa cane ko ingabo za ONU ziguma zikora muri Mali n'ubwo Ubufaransa buvuyeyo. Umuvugizi wa ONU yavuze ati uko bigenda kwose hazoba "ingaruka ku bikorwa." Hari n'amakenga kuri kazoza k'intumwa za Buraya zo kwigisha abasirikare muri Mali , inyuma y'aho umushikiranganji w'Ubudagi ajejwe  kwivuna abansi Christine Lambrecht  avugiye ko  ata cizere afise ko Ubudagi buzobandanya ubwo butumwa. Yavuze ati: "Twamenye  ingingo y'Ubufaransa yo kuva  kuva muri Mali no kurangiza ubutumwa bwabwo muri ico gihugu, ingingo ata nkeka izogira ingaruka kubo bari bafatanije ubutumwa."

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mbappe, Laporte, Ndombele, Sarr, Duarte, De Jong, Diallo
column3: Umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22 ari ku rutonde rw'abakinyi bashobora kuronderwa na Manchester Uniteds mu ci ry'umwaka uza. (ESPN) Manchester City yemeye kurekura Aymeric Laporte ku miriyoni zababa 82 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu gihe hogira umurwi woza urondera uyu mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 27 akomoka muri Espagne. (Mail) Umukinyi wo hagati, umufaransa Tanguy Ndombele w'imyaka 24 yabwiye  Tottenham ko yipfuza kuva muri uwu murwi wiwe.  (The Athletic - subscription required) Mu misi mike iri imbere Chelsea izofata ingingo yo kurondera uwundi mukinyi wo hagati canke yo kuvyihoza, ni mu gihe umunya Espagne akinira Atletico Madrid  Saul Niguez w'imyaka 26 aboneka ko ari we ashobora kuronderwa.  (Fabrizio Romano via Twitter) Thomas Tuchel amenyereza aba Blues aripfuza cane umukinyi w'inyuma. Umufaransa Jules Kounde w'imyaka 22 akinira Sevilla hamwe na mugenziwe  Aurelien Tchouameni w'imyaka 21 wa Monaco ni bo bari ku rutonde rw''abashobora kuronderwa na Chelsea. (Mirror) Tottenham iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Metz umunya Senegal Pape Matar Sarr, w'imyaka 18. (90min) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Granada umunya Portugal Domingos Duarte w'imyaka 26, na we nyene araronderwa na  Tottenham. (Express) Amakuru ava i Old Trafford avuga ko Manchester United ata mugambi ifise wo kugurisha canke gutiza umukinyi wayo wo ku ruhande umunya Pays de Galles Daniel James w'imyaka 23 muri rino ci. (The Athletic - subscription required) West Ham iiriko iraraba ko yogura umusatirizi wa  Sevilla umunya Hollande Luuk de Jong w'imyaka 30. (90min) Aba ba Hammers bavugwa kandi ko bariko bararondera umusatirizi w'umufaransa Mohamed Bayo w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina muri Clermont, umurwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa, Ligue 1. (Le10Sport - in French) Umukinyi wo hagati, umudagi Leon Goretzka w'imyaka 26 yiteze guhagarika ibimuvugwako vy'uko ashobora kwimukira muri Manchester United aho yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri Bayern Munich. (Goal) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza Nat Phillips w'imyaka 24 yiteze kuronka uruhusha rwo kuva muri Liverpool mu gihe hogira umurwi wemera kumugura ku miriyoni 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Liverpool Echo) Sheffield United ihanganye na  Atalanta yo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutariyano Serie A mu rugamba rwo kurondera ko Manchester United yoyitiza umunya Côte d'Ivoire akina ku ruhande Amad Diallo w'imyaka 19. (TuttoAtalanta, in Italian) Manchester United iri mu biganiro n'abaserukizi b'umukinyi wo hagati wa  Monaco  umufaransa Aurelien Tchouameni w'imyaka 21 kugira ngo irabe ko yomuronka muri rino ci. (Mirror) Umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu muri Manchester United  umwongereza Brandon Williams w'imyaka 20 avugwa ko yafashwe ibipimo ku wa gatanu  kugira yimukire muri Norwich . (Football Insider)

column2: Britney Spears: Se yasavye guhagarika guhagararira inyungu ziwe zose
column3: Se wa Britney Spears yatanze impapuro muri sentare ya Los Angeles asaba kurangiza ubuhagarikizi yari amazemwo imyaka 13 bwatuma akurikirana ubuzima n'amatungo vy'umukobwa wiwe. Jamie Spears yanditse ko Britney "afise uburenganzira ko iyo sentare yokwihweza yitonze ko ubwo buhagarikizi butagikenewe". Britney yaragerageje kumwaka ubwo burenganzira incuro zibiri zose mu myaka ibiri iheze. Uwo muririmvyi rurangiranwa wa Pop yavuga ko imigenderanire bafitaniye yari iyo "agacinyizo" aranahagarika kuremesha ibiteramo igihe yari akimuhagarariye. Se wiwe yandikiye sentare inyuma y'amezi abiri uwo muririmvyi afata ibiyayuramutwe atangiye ubuhamya bukarishe muri sentare, asaba ko ubwo buhagarikizi burangira vuba na bwangu. Muri izo mpapuro zarungikiwe sentare nkuru ya Los Angeles handitswe ngo:" Ibiherutse kuvuga kuri ubwo buhagarikizi bwazanye ikibazo co kumenya nimba icatumye buhaba carahindutse ku buryo bitagikenewe ko bubandanya?" Urwo rwandiko rurabandanya, avuga ko umukobwa wiwe yipfuza kwikurikiranira ibibazo vyo kwa muganga hamwe n'ivyerekeye amahera. Rubandanya rugira ruti "Nk'uko Spears atahengeshanije kubivuga, ico ashaka gusa n'icobera ciza umukobwa wiwe." "Niyaba Britney Spears ashaka kurangiza ubwo buhagariki kandi akaba yumva ko ashobora ashobora gufata mu minwe ivyerekeye ubuzima bwiwe, se wiwe Spears avuga ko akwiye guhabwa ayo mahirwe." Britney Spears yigeze kuvuga ko se wiwe amufata nabi cane kandi ko yigeze kumutera ubwoba ko azomubuza kuraba abana biwe mu gihe atokwemera ivyo amusaba. Mu kwezi kw'indwi, yabwiye umucamanza ko yipfuza kwitwarira se wiwe, w'imyaka 69, ko yakoresheje nabi ububasha bwo guhagarikira inyungu ziwe. Twashitse aha gute? Ubuhagarikizi bwategetswe gushirwaho mu 2008 igihe hari amakenga ku magara yo mu mutwe y'uwo muririmvyi. Sentare yahaye uburenganzire Jamie Spears kugenzura inzu y'umukobwa iwe hamwe n'ibindi bintu bijanye n'ubuzima bwiwe. Ubwo buhagarikizi bwari mu bice bibiri. Kimwe kubijanye n'inzu hamwe n'amahera, ikindi cerekeye umukobwa wiwe ubwiwe nk'umuntu. Spears yatanze imihoho mu bijanye no gukurikirana umukobwa wiwe mu 2019 kubera ubugwayi yari afise, ariko abandanya kuraba ivyerekeye ibikorwa vyiwe bimwinjiriza amahera.

column2: South Africa yashinguranye iteka Musenyeri Desmond Tutu
column3: Abanya Afrika y'Epfo biriwe mu birori vyo gushingura wa musenyeri Desmond Tutu  yarwanije intwaro y'ivanguramoko ya Afrika y'Epfo, ibirori vyabereye mw'isengero nkuru ya Anglican  i Cape Town. Tutu, yagize uruhara rukomeye mu kurangiza intwaro y'ivanguramoko muri Afrika y'Epfo akanahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel, yapfuye ku wa Mungu afise imyaka 90. Perezida  Ramaphosa wa Afrika y'Epfo ni we yashikirije ijambo rikuru muri ibi birori vyo gushingura uyu musenyeri kuri uyu wa gatandatu, ibirori vyari vyitabiriwe n'abantu 100 gusa kubera amategeko yo kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Ramaphosa  yavuze ko Tutu  ari "umuvyeyi w'imitima w'igihugu cacu gishasha". Kuva yitavye Imana ku wa Mungu uheze, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baragiye kumwunamira kw'isengero  St George's Cathedral,  aho ikiziga ciwe cari. Tutu ni umwe mu bantu bakomeye barwanije cane intwaro y'amacakubiri n'ivanguramoko yashizweho n'inkehwa z'abazungu mw'ikubagurwa bakoreye nyarwinshi b'abirabure, kuva mu 1948 gushika mu 1991. Perezida Ramaphosa yavuze ko Tutu yari "umurwanyi mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ubwigenge, ubutungane, amahoro n'uburenganzira kuri bose. Atari muri Afrika y'Epfo honyene...ariko kandi no kw'isi yose". Ati: "Niba dushaka kumenya akarorero k'umuntu w'igihagararo kidasanzwe, w'imico idasanzwe kandi yitaho abantu, nta nkeka ko ari uyu mugabo turiko turashingura uyu musi". Mu bitabiriye ibi birori kw'ishengero rikuru rya Cape Town harimwo abagenzi, umuryango, abarongoye ishengero n'abanyaporitike. Tutu yari yasavye ashimitse ko mu kumushingura hatoba "ugusesagura canke gukoresha uburyo buhanitse", kandi bagakoresha "isandugu izimbutse ishoboka". Yasavye kandi ko amashurwe yonyene yoba ari mw'isengero yoba "urugori rw'amashure rw'umuryango wiwe", nk'uko bivugwa n'ibigo  Archbishop Tutu IP Trust hamwe na Desmond and Leah Tutu Legacy Foundation. Vyitezwe ko ibisigarira vyiwe bihambwa inyuma ya arutari mw'isengero nkuru St George's Cathedral - isengero nkuru yamaze imyaka 35 arongoye. Mu butumwa yatanze mu buryo bwa videwo, Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasiguye ingene Tutu "yamurikiye isi yose". Avuga ko icubahiro yahaye Tutu ari nk ' "imbeba yunamira inzovu". Umukobwa wa Tutu Mpho yavuze ko urukundo berekanye kuri se wiwe "rwatsimbataje imitima yabo". Ati: "Kubera twamusangiye n'isi, namwe muradusangije igice c'urukundo mwari mumufitiye". Igihe ikiziga ciwe cashirwa ahagaragara muri Cape Town, abantu benshi baraje kumusezera ubwa nyuma. Umugabo umwe, Wally Mdluli, yagenze ibirometero birengo 1000 kuva Bloemfontein gushika Cape Town agenda arasaba ko bamwunguruza kuri gusa (lift)  - aca mu ncuti n'abagenzi asaba ko bomufasha kugira ashobore gukora urugendo rwiwe, mbere akaryama muri station y'igitoro igihe yari ku rugendo. Yabwiye umunyamakuru wa BBC i Cape Tow ati: "Numva nuzuye umunezero inyuma y'aho mboneye isandugu y'ikiziga. Ni nk'uko umengo umutima wiwe uri muri jewe". Tutu yarakoresheje igihagararo ciwe mu kwiyamiriza agahotoro kakorerwa abirabure mu gihugu ciwe, akama avuga ko yabikora kubw'ukwemera atari ku mvo za poritike.

column2: Burundi: Leta ikemura gute ikibazo c'ikena ry'amahera y'agaciro?
column3: Leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata ingingo mu gisata c'ubutunzi n'urudandazwa benshi bavuga ko zigamije kugerageza kubungabunga amahera y'agaciro ari muri ico gihugu. Muri urwo rwego, Banki ya Republika y'u Burundi iherutse gufata itegeko riraba abinjirana amafaranga muri ico gihugu, harimwo n'abanyamahanga. Iryo tegeko ribabwiriza gukoresha amafranga y'amarundi mu kugura ibintu vyose imbere mu gihugu. Baterezwa kandi  kuvunjisha mu bigo vyemewe n'amategeko amafranga y'agaciro baba bafise, bashaka kuyakoresha. Iyo ngingo yakurikiranye n'iyindi igenga ukudandaza ubutare n'ayandi mabuye y'agaciro muri banki y'igihugu. Ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafatanga y'agaciro mu Burundi bivugwa ko coba kiva ahanini ku bihano u Burundi bwafatiwe n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya, ryahagaritse amahera ryaha ico gihugu kuva mu 2015 igihe hatangura ingorane za politike. Mu gushaka kumenya vyinshi kuri izo ngingo leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata, Florentine Kwizera yavuganye na Faustin Ndikumana, umuhinga mu vy'ubutunzi. Ushobora kwumva ico kiganiro ngaha

column2: China: Umufotozi yasavye imbabazi kubera ifoto ya Dior y''amaso mato'
column3: Umufotozi w'Umushinwakazi  akorana n'abanyamideri yasavye imbabazi kubera ''kutamenya" inyuma y'aho ifoto yafashe igakoreshwa na kompanyi y'imideri yo mu Bufaransa Dior yiyamirijwe n'abatari bake. Ifoto ya Chen Man yerekanye umugore bamwe mu Bashinwa bakoresha internet cane (netzens) bavuga ko ikomeza kubandanya yerekana ingene Abanyaburaya bishizemwo ingene Abanya-Asia basa. Madame Chen w'imyakab 41, yahavuye yandika ku rubuga-hwaniro rwa Weibo ati: "Ndiyagiriza jewe nyene kuba nkiri ikitazi [mu bikorwa maze gukora]." Dior yavuze ko iyo foto iherutse gukoreshwa mw'ihayanishwa i Shanghai, kuva ico gihe yaciye ivanwako. Iyo kompanyi y'ivyambarwa bigezweho yanditse kuri konte yayo ya Weibo ku wa gatatu ku mugoroba iti: "Dior, nk'uko yama, irubaha ingene Abashinwa biyumva... bishitse hakaba ukwihenda, [Dior] itegerezwa kwuguruka ikakira ivyo abantu bavuga hanyuma igakosora mu mwanya mwiza", yongerako iti "iyo foto ntiyari iyo gukoresha mu kwamamaza". Iyo foto yatanguye kuja ahabona ku wa 12 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa  11),  ariko buno nyene ica iriyamirizwa na bamwe mu bakoresha internet cane - hamwe n'ibinyamakuru vy'aho mu Bushinwa. Urukoba rwera n'amaso manini nivyo ku bisanzwe bifatwa nk'ibimenyetso vy'ubwiza mu Bushinwa - akenshi mu kwamamaza hakaba hakunze gukoreshwa imideri iriko ivyo bimenyetso. Mu kwerekana igihushaneb, kimwe mu binyamakuru vyo mu Bushinwa, Beijing  Daily, mu nkuru y'ibanze canditse ko iyo foto ya Dior yerekana "isura yijiriwe" kandi y''amaso y'ikibi". Iyo nkuru y'ibanze yavuze iti: "Haheze imyaka myinshi abagore b'Abanya-Asia bama berekanwa bafise amaso mato  n'ikibibi (freckles) nk'uko Abanyaburaya bavyishizemwo". "Umufotozi yerekanye uko Abanyaburaya babibona." Abashinwa bakoresha imbuga hwaniro baciye bafatira ngaho,  bavuga ko amafoto ya Madame Chen ari "igitutsi" c'ingene Abanyaburaya bibaza ko abagore b'Abashinwakazi basa. Umwe mu bakoresha Weibo yavuze ati: "Uko niko Abanyaburaya bibaza ko dusa, bongerako ko Chen Man yakagoboreyemwo. Benshi bongeyeko ko batazogura ibihingurwa n'iyo kompanyi igurisha ivyo abifise. Bamwe mu Bashinwa bakoresha imbuga hwaniro bavuze ko iyo foto ya Madame Chen yibutsa urukurikirane rw'amafoto yiwe yo mu 2012, yari yafatiye i-D Magazine. Ariko si bose bavyumva uko. Bamwe barashigikiye Madame Chen, aho umwe mu bakoresha Weibo yavuze ati: "Kuki umugore w'Umushinwakazi w'amaso mato adashobra gufatwa ko ari mwiza? Je nta  ngorane n'imwe  ndabibonamwo." Mw'itangazo ryiwe ku wa gatatu, Madame Chen yavuze ko "yavyiyumviriye cane" akumva ko ategerezwa gusaba imbabazi amaze kwihweza buri "kintu cose kibi " cavuzwe ku gikorwa ciwe. Avuga ati: "Navukiye kandi nkurira mu Bushinwa. Ndakunda cane igihugu canje . Nk'umuhanzi, ndazi neza ico njejwe mu kurondera kumenya neza imico y'Ubushinwa kugira ngaragaze ubwiza bw'Ubushinwa mu vyo nkora." "Ubu ngiye kuzokwiga neza kahise k'Ubushinwa, nitabe ibiteramo bishobora kumfasha kuruta, hanyuma nteze imbere ivyiyumviro nsanzwe ngenderako...Nzokwihatira kuvuga Ubushinwa ndabicishije mu vyo nkora." Madame Chen n'umufotozi azwi cane mu gisata c'imideri mu Bushinwa. Amaze gufata amafoto menshi yakoreshejwe mu binyamakuru vy'imideri bizwi cane, yarafotoye na ba rurangiranwa nka David Beckham na Fan Bin Bing. (Uko isekeza ry'ubwiza bw'abiraburekazi hagiyemwo politikek

column2: Kuki abasaba ubuhingiro bariko barungikwa mu Rwanda, hagenda bangahe?
column3: Bamwe mu bashika kurondera ubuhungiro muri UK bazorungikwa mu Rwanda kugira ivyabo vyo gusaba ubuhungiro vyigwe n’ico gihugu. Uwo mugambi ugiye kugeragezwa ku kiringo c’imyaka itanu uzorungika bamwe mu mpunzi mu Rwanda, kugira baje gusaba ubuhungiro muri ico gihugu. Aba mbere bitezwe kurungikwa kuri uyu wa kabiri itariki 14 ukwezi kwa Ruheshi (kwa 6). Uwo mugambi werekeye cane cane abimukira bakiri bato kandi bakiri bonyene (celibataires) bashika baciye mu buryo reta ivuga ko  ‘’bunyuranye n’amategeko, bubangamye canke budakenewe,” nko mu bwato canke mu kwinyegeza mu ma kamyo. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w’Ubwongereza Boris Jonhson yavuze ko Urwanda arirwo ruzokwitaho abarungitsweyo, rubahe amahirwe angana mu kuronka ubuzi  n’ibindi vya nkenerwa. Uwari we wese yinjiye mu Bwongereza inyuma y’itariki ya 1 Nzero (ukwezi kwa mbere) ashobora kurungikwa, ataho kugarukiriza ku gitigiri, nk’uko umushikiranganji wa mbere yavuze. Ubwa mbere abantu 37 ni bo bari kurungikwa ku wa kabiri, ariko ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu bwabwiye BBC ko intambamyi zifatiye ku mategeko zagabanuye cane ico gitigiri. Ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati buvuga ko abantu umunani aribo baja kurungikwa muri iyo ndege, ariko ishirahamwe ry’abagiraneza Care4Calais rivuga ko abo bantu ari indwi gusa. Umunyamabanga wa reta ajejwe imigenderanire Liz Truss yashimangiye ko indege yo ku wa kabiri ija guhaguruka, n’aho yoba itwaye abantu bari ku rushi. Yongeyeko ati: ‘’N’ubwo boba batari ku ndege y’uyu munsi, bazogenda mu ndege zikurikira zizoja mu Rwanda.” Amashirahamwe y’abagiraneza n’abashingwamanza bahagarariye  abarondera ubuhungiro batanguje urugamba rushingiye ku mategeko rwo kurwanya uwo mugambi , bavuga ko bafise amakenga ku gateka ka zina muntu. Ku wa mbere sentare isubiramwo imanza  yanse kubuza indege kujana mu Rwanda aba mbere mu basaba ubuhungiro ku rubanza rwari rwashingishijwe na  sendika Public and Commercial Services Union hamwe n’amashirahamwe y’abagiraneza Care4Calais na Detention Action. Hari n’izindi ntambamyi zishingiye ku mategeko nazo zija kwumvirizwa muri sentare imbere y’uko indege ihagaruka. Asylum Aid ivuga ko ukurungika abarondera ubuhungiro ari akarenganyo kuko ata mwanya ukwiye uhari kugirango baronke ubwunganizi mu mategeko kandi bunguruze urubanza rw’uburenganzira bwo kuguma mu Bwongereza. Ayandi mashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu afise amakenga niba Urwanda koko ari igihugu gitekanye co kurungikamwo abo bantu, akagabisha ko uwo mugambi uteye kubiri n’amasezerano y’ishirahamwe rya Buraya yerekeye agateka ka zina muntu. Umushikirangani wa mbere yavuze ko reta yari yabonye hakiri kare ko hazoba ‘’abashingwamanza bakerebutse” bazobera intambamyi uwo mugambi. Yagirije abaharanira uburenganzira kurondera ko  “ikibazo c’abimukira  kirabwa imiryango yuguruye”, avuga ko   bikenewe cane ko ”hahagarikwa ibikorwa vy’imigwi vy’inkozi z’ikibi” vyo kujabutsa abantu mu kinyegero. Amakuru avuga ko Urwanda rwasubiyemwo amazu y’uburaro hafi y’umurwa mukuru Kigali kugura azokwakire abo bimukira barungikwa bavuye mu Bwongereza. Ico gihugu gisanzwe gihaye indaro impunzi 150.000 ziva mu  bihugu bibanyi vy’Uburundi  na Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo. Rusanzwe ruhaye indaro kandi abimukira bagerageje kujabuka Mediterranee baja i Buraya baciye muri Libya. Bamwe bakora nk’abarimyi, abandi nk’abakozi bo mu ngo. Benshi nta kazi bafise, babeshejweho n’imfashanyo ya reta y’ama pound 35 (arenga ibihumbi 40 vy’amafaranga y’Urwanda) ku kwezi. Reta y’Urwanda ivuga ko igihugu cakoze ‘’igitangaro’’ c’iterambere kuva mu 1994, igihe jenoside yahitana abantu barenga 800.000. Amafaranga umunyagihugu yinjiza ku mwaka yariyongeye cane kuva ico gihe. Imyaka yo  kuramba  yiyongeye incuro icumi kuva mu 1990 ishika ku 69. Ariko abashika 70 kw’ijana ku  banyagihugu miriyoni 13, babeshejweho n’ukurima, bisigura ko barya, badashora ivyo bimbura. Reta ivuga ko ugusaba ubuhungiro mu Bwongereza ubu bitwara miriyaridi 1,5 z’ama pound ku mwaka, ayarenga miriyoni 4,7 z’ama pound akaba akoreshwa buri munsi mu kuriha amahoteri abimukira batagira uburaro  bashirwamwo. Kubakura mu Bwongereza n’indege zakoteshejwe vyatwa ama ama pound arenga 13.000 ku muntu mu 2020. Umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati Tom Pursglove yavuze ko amafaranga angana miriyoni 120 z’ama pound y’ibanze azoheza agakurikirwa n’ayandi azohabwa Urwanda mu gihe ruzoba rubandanya kwakira abandi. Ubwongereza bugiye gushira kandi miriyoni 120 z’ama pound mw’iterambere n’izamuka ry’ubutunzi vy’Urwanda. Yavuze ko amafaranga azosohoka “asa n’ayangana n’ayo dusanzwe dusohora muri iki gihe ku basaba ubuhungiro”, kandi ko “ku gihe kirekire, mu kugabanya umuzo, ivyo bizodufasha kubika amafaranga”. Ariko, uwukurikirana ibibazo vyo mu ntwaro hagati mu mugambwe utavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi Yvette Cooper yavuze ko “amafaranga yose azokoreshwa azoba menshi kurusha”. Habaye igereranywa n’amafaranga Austrialia isohora kugira ama dosiye y’abarondera ubuhungiro muri ico gihugu yigirwe hanze, ayo nayo akaba yangana na miriyoni 546 z’ama pound mu 2021-22. Liz Truss  yanse kuvuga amafaranga indege yo ku wa kabiri izotwara, ahubwo avuga ko ikiguzi ku gucuruza abantu no kurondera ubuhungiro mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko bitwara amafaranga  “menshi cane” umutangakori. Uwo mugambi wo mu Rwanda wamenyeshejwe ubwa mbere na reta y’Ubwongereza itariki 14 Ndamukiza (ukwezi kwa kane). Hagati y’itariki 18 Ndamukiza na 5 Ruheshi (ukwa gatandatu), abarondera ubuhungiro bashika 3.599 nibo bizwi ko bajabutse mu bwato buto buto, hakurikijwe ibitigiri bitangwa n’ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi. N’ubwo abo bantu ari bake ugereranije na 4.554 binjiye hagati ya Ndamukiza na Ruheshi 2021, igitigiri gishobora kwiyongera  niyo haboneka  ibiharuro vyose vy’ikiringo co hagati ya Ndamukiza na Ruheshi. Mu mwaka wose wa 2021, abantu 28.526 bazwi ko bajabutse mu bwato buto buto – bavuye ku 8.404 mu 2020. Igitigiri cose c’uyu mwaka citezwe ko kizoba kiri hejuru cane kuruta mu mwaka uheze, nk’uko bivugwa  n’abarongoye sendika Border Force. Mu 2021, 75 kw’ijana y’abaje bari abagabo bari hagati y’imyaka 18 na 39. Abashika 5 kw’ijana bari abagabo bafise imyaka irenga 40, 7 kw’ijana bari abagore bafise imyaka irenga 18, abana bafise munsi y’imyaka 18 bangana na 12 kw’ijana (muri abo batatu kuri bane bakaba bari abahungu). Imbere y’aho abanya-Iran nibo bari benshi mu baza - 80 kw’ijana mu 2018, na 66 kw’ijana mu 2019. Ubu vuba abantu barushirijeho kuba uruvange rw’ibihugu barurukamwo. Abanya-Iran bashika 30 kw’ijana y’abaza mu bwato buto buto mu mwaka uheze, mu gihe 21 kw’ijana bari abanya-Iraq, 11 kw’ijana abanya-Eritrea na 9 kw’ijana b’abanya-Syria hakuwrikijwe ibiharuro bitangwa n’ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati.

column2: Bob Marley: Kwibuka imyaka 40 iheze iyo mboneza ipfuye
column3: Imyaka 40 iraheze kuva umuririmvyi wa reggae yasize izina Bob Marley yishwe na cancer i Miami, ku myaka 36, hari ku wa 11 ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 1981. Uwo munyamuziki n'umwe mu bakundwa kandi bemewe cane muri kahise k'umuziki, ku ndirimbo nyinshi zabiciye bigacika nka No Woman No Cry, One Love, na Redemption Song. Indirimbo yiwe Buffalo Soldier niyo yabaye rurangiranwa kurusha izindi mu Bwongereza, aho yagiye mu kibanza ca kane mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 1983. Album [urukurikirane rw'indirimbo] yo mu 1977 Exodus yiswe Album y'Ikinjana n'ikinyamakuru Time Magazine. Marley yavutse mu 1945, kuri se w'umuzungu na nyina w'umwirabure, muri Jamaica. Nk'umwana yakuriye mu bukene kandi nta migenderanire myinshi bari bafitaniye na se, uwo akaba yari asanzwe ari umusirikare wo mu mazi yakorera reta y'Ubwongereza. Yavuye iwabo ku myaka 14 aja gutangura umwuga w'umuziki i Kingston. Mu  1972, Marley yashitse mu Bwongereza n'umugwi wiwe The Wailers kuremesha ibiteramo na Johnny Nash mu ntumbero yo kugerageza kumenyekana ku rubuga mpuzamakungu. Mu mwaka ukurikira, The Wailers basohoye album yabo Catch a Fire baca bakora igiteramo cabo ca mbere kuri television kuri BBC. Ico giteramo cagize ingaruka nini cane gica kibazanira abakunzi benshi ku bo bari basanganywe. Inyuma y'urundi rugendo rw'ibiteramo mu 1975, yafashe amajwi ikibiriraho indirimbo No Woman No Cry kuri The Lyceum, i Londres, ica isohoka yonyene (single) ibera Bob Marley indirimbo yiwe mbere yagiye ku rutonde rw'izikundwa cane mu Bwongereza. Uwo muririmvyi yaciye aja mu murongo w'abaririmvyi bakomeye kw'isi aca aba izina rizwi mu aho uciye hose. Marley yari azwi ku kwemera kwiwe gushingiye kuri  Rastafarism, hamwe n'umugore wiwe, Rita, idini rikaba ryaragaragara mu ndirimbo ziwe. Uwo muririmvyi yarakunda kandi cane umupira w'amaguru, vyari bizwi ko acishamwo akaja gukina iyo afashe akaruhuko mu gihe co gutegura indirimbo (muri studio) canke imbere yo kuremesha igiteramo. Mu kiganiro mu 1980 yavuze ati: "Nkunda umuziki imbere yo gukunda umupira." "Gukina umupira w'amaguru no kuririmba n'ibintu bibangamye kuko umupira urimwo kubabazanya. Ndirimba amahoro, urukundo n'ibindi nk'ivyo, urabona uriko urakina ntawuzi igishobora gushika, "Umuntu aguteze akakubabaza umenga ibaye intambara." Igiteramo c'ikibiriraho ca nyuma ca Bob Marley mu Bwongereza cabaye itariki 13 ukwezi kw'indwi mu 1980 muri New Bingley Hall, Stafford. Marley yaciye apfa mu mwaka ukurikira ahitanywe n'indwara ya melanone acral-lentigineux yari yatowe mu 1977. Yashinguwe aho yavukiye muri Jamaica mu kigwati ca Nine Mile. Amafoto yose n'aya nyeneyo.

column2: France: Abapolisi batatu bahagaritswe mu kazi i Paris bazira gukubita umwirabure
column3: Abategetsi b'Ubufaransa bahagaritse abapolisi batatu inyuma yo kuboneka kuri video bariko barakubita umwirabure akora mu vy'umuziki hagati mu gisagara ca Paris. Ivyo vyashitse ku musi wa gatandatu vyatumye haduka agashavu ku nyifato y'abajejwe umutekano mu Bufaransa. Ku musi wa mbere, igipolisi cagirijwe gukoresha inguvu nyinshi zidakenewe mu gihe cariko kirasambura ikambi y'abimukira i Paris. Ivyo bishitse mu gihe reta iriko iragerageza gushiraho itegeko ribuza kwerekana isura z'abapolisi. Abaterekwa iryo tegeko bavuga ko iyo ataba ayo masanamu ata kintu na kimwe muri ivyo vyabaye mu ndwi iheze cari kumenyekana. Ku musi wa kane, umukinyi rurangiranwa w'umupira w'amaguru, Kylian Mbappe, na we nyene w'umwirabure, yarifatanije na bagenzi we b'umurwi nserukiragihugu hamwe n'abandi banonotsi mu kwiyamiriza inyifato y'abo bapolisi. Iruhande y'ifoto y'uwo mugabo  yiswe Michel yuzuye amaraso mu maso, yanditse ati:" Video ibabaje, ubunyamaswa budakwiye kwihanganirwa. Iyamirize amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba!" Kuri uyu wa kane  ni ho amasanamu ya video yashirwa ku rubuga rwa Loopsider. Yerekana abapolisi batatu bariko basunagura, bakubita ingumu banakoresha n'indembo kuri uwo mugabo amaze kwinjira muri 'studio' yiwe. Loopsider ivuga ko ubwa mbere yari yahagaritswe yagirizwa kuba atambaye agapfukamunwa. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Michel kandi avuga ko yatutswe ivyerekeye urukoba rwiwe mu minota itanu yamaze ariko arakubitwa. Yarapfunzwe  anagirizwa kurwana no kwanka guhagarikwa, ariko abashikirizamanza bamirira kure ivyo birego, ahubwo bakaba baciye batanguza amatohoza kuri abo bapolisi. Igihe yashika ku cicaro gikuru c'igipolisi ku wa kane, ari kumwe n'uwumuburanira kugira buguruze urubanza, Michel yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ati: "Abantu bategerezwa kunkingira bangizeko igitero. Nta kintu na kimwe nari nakoze ngo nkorerwe ibintu nk'ibi.  Nshaka ko gusa abo bantu batatu bahanwa hakurikijwe amategeko." Uwurongoye igisagara ca Paris, Anne Hidalgo, yavuze ko "ababajwe cane" n'ico "gikorwa kidakwiye kwihanganirwa". Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu Gérald Darmanin yabwiye televiziyo y'Ubafaransa ko ashobora gusaba ko abo bapolisi bahagarikwa mu kazi, avuga ko "bacafuje umwambaro w'igihugu". Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, Darmanin yari yategetse igipolisi kumushikiriza icegeranyo inyuma y'aho basamburiye ikambi y'abimukira ku mugwa mukuru, bagatana mu mitwe na bo hamwe n'abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu. Yanditse kuri Twitter ko bimwe muvyahabereye "Biteye isoni".

column2: Amatora ya US: Abarepubulika bisubije Inama nshingamateka
column3: Abarepubulika baronse intebe igira 218 yari isigaye kugira ngo biganzire Inama nshingamateka inyuma y’indwi imwe habaye amatora yo hagati muri manda, nk’uko bitangazwa n’ikinyamakuru CBS News gikorana na BBC muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. N’aho ubwiganze bw’uyu mugambwe mu nama nshingamateka ari buto cane, burahagije kugira ngo uhagarike imigambi ya Perezida Joe Biden mu myaka ibiri iri imbere. Ariko aba-Democrats bazobandanya biganziye inama nkenguzamateka. Haracasigaye intebe nkeya zo guhiganira. Abarepubulika ntibavyifashemwo neza muri ano matora yabaye mu ndwi iheze, mu gihe bari bizeye ko bari gushobora kwiganzira inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka. Ariko ejo ku wa gatatu baratsindiye intebe bari bakeneye kugira biganzire inama nshingamateka igihe Mike Garcia asubiriye gutsindira intebe y’akarere ka 27 k’intara ya California. Ubu umugambwe w’Abarepubulika witeze gutsindira intebe hagati ya 218 na 223 muri ino nama nshingamateka igizwe n’abantu 435, nk’uko CBS ibitangaza. Ariko, mu gihe ivyavuye mu matora bitaramenyekana mu turere tutari duke, ubwiganze bwabo bushobora kutaboneka neza mu kiringo c’imisi canke amayinga. Kevin McCarthy yatowe ku wa kabiri n’abanywanyi basanzwe b’umugambwe w’Abarepubulika kugira ngo azosubirire umu-Democrat Nancy Pelosi nk’umukuru w’inama nshingamateka, yishimiye kubona inama nshingamateka ihindutse. Ku wa gatatu mw’ijoro, uyu mushingamateka wo muri California yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Abanyamerika bariteguriye inzira nshasha, kandi abashingamateka b’Abarepubulika bariteguye kubakorera”. Kugira ngo ashobore gutorwa nk’umukuru w’inama nshingamateka, uyu mukuru w’inkehwa z’abarepubulika ategerezwa gushigikirwa na benshi muri ino nama nshingamateka yose igizwe n’abashingamateka 435. Ariko umupfasoni Pelosi avuga ko adashobora kurekura uko nyene, aho mw’itangazo ry’ejo ku wa gatatu yavuze ko umugambwe wiwe uzotera “igitsure gikomeye bano ba Repubulika babasumba gato cane”. Umupfasoni Pelosi, umugore wa mbere yagenywe muri iki kibanza, ntavuga muri iryo tangazo nimba ategura kubandanya nk’umukuru w’inkehwa, mu gihe i Washington havugwa vyinshi kuri kazoza kiwe. Perezida Biden yakeje McCarthy amwemerera ko azokorana n’Abarepubulika ku nyungu z’Abanyamerika. Ati: "Nk’uko nabivuze mu ndwi iheze, kazoza ni keza ku buryo kadashobora kugwa mu mutego w’intambara”. "Abanyagihugu ba Amerika bakeneye ko tubakorera. Bakeneye ko twitaho ibibazo vyabo ngirakamaro no kubaha ubuzima bwiza”. Umugambwe wa McCarthy wari wizeye ko, kubona umukuru w’igihugu yari yataye icizere, ibiciro bibandanya biduga, vyari kubongerereza amajwi mu matora yo hagati muri manda. Donald Trump  yahoze arongoye igihugu hamwe na Mitch McConnell  arongoye inkehwa z’Abarepubulika mu nama nkenguzamateka nibo bagirizwa ko batumye umugambwe wabo utavyifatamwo neza. Ari iwe i Mar-a-Lago muri Florida, ku wa kabiri mw’ijoro, uyu yahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu yaratangaje ku mugaragaro ko azosubira kwitoza mu kibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu mu 2024. I Washington ejo ku wa gatatu, McConnell yasubiye kugenwa nk’umukuru w’inkehwa mu nama nkenguzamateka, maze abona kwikiza mugenziwe Rick Scott, umurepubulika wo muri Florida. Amajwi atari ay’abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka arabandanya ashika buke buke inyuma y’indwi irenga habaye amatora. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Karen Bass yaratsindiye ikibanza c’umukuru w’igisagara ca Los Angeles, igisagara kigira kabiri mu bunini muri Amerika, atsinze umutunzi ruhebwa Rick Caruso. Uyu mu-Democrat agiye kuba umugore wa mbere atsindiye iki kibanza hamwe kandi n’umwirabure agize kabiri arongoye iki gisagara.

column2: Coronavirus: Dexamethasone niwo muti wa mbere umaze kuboneka ko ushobora gukiza
column3: Umuti uzimbutse kandi uri mu burere bwose bwo kw'isi umaze kugaragara ko ushobora kurokora ubuzima bw'abarwayi ba coronavirus basanzwe baremvye. Abahinga b'abongereza bavuga ko uwo muti, uzwi kw'izina rya dexamethasone ari intambwe ikomeye cane mu rugamba rwo kurwanya iyi ndwara ruhonyabantu. Niwo muti wa mbere kw'isi umaze kuboneka ko ukomeye mu miti yose iriko irageragezwa kw'isi mu kuvura coronavirus. Uwo muti ushobora kurokora ku rugero rw'ica gatatu ubuzima bw'abantu basanzwe bariko bavurwa hakoreshejwe vya vyuma bifasha guhema. Ushobora kandi kurokora ku rugero rw'ica gatanu ubuzima bw'abarwayi nabo bariko bavurwa mu guhabwa impemu zo guhema. Abashakashatsi babona ko iyo uwo muti uba warakoreshejwe mu kuvura abarwaye iyo ndwara kuva mu ntango mu Bwongereza, ubuzima bw'abashika 5000 buba bwararokotse. Uwo muti uboneka kandi ko ushobora kugira akarusho kadasanzwe mu bihugu bikenye bifise ibitigiri binini vy'abarwaye Covid-19. Leta y'Ubwongereza ku ruhande rwayo yarategekanije mu bubiko bwayo uwo muti wo kuvuga abantu bashika 200.000. Ivuga ko igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu NHS kizoronswa uwo muti kugira ngo kiwuhe abarwayi bizoba ari nkenerwa ko bawuhabwa. Hafi 19 kuri 20 banduye coronavirus barayikira batarinze kurazwa mu bitaro. Nayo ku basanzwe barajwe mu bitaro, abenshi barakira ariko hari bamwe biba ngombwa ko bahabwa impemu canke bakambikwa vya vyuma bibafasha guhema. Abantu nk'aba rero nibo barwayi baba babangamiwe, bikaba ngombwa ko bahabwa dexamethasone. Mu bikorwa vyo kugerageza uwo muti vyari birongowe n'ishure kaminuza rya Oxford, hafi abarwayi 2000 bari barwariye mu bitaro barahawe dexamethasone baca bakorerwa umwihwezo bagereranije n'abandi 4000 batahawe uwo muti. Ku barwayi bariko baravurwa hifashijijwe vya vyuma bibafasha guhema, urugero rwo gushobora gupfa rwaragabanutse kuva ku bice 40% gushika kuri 28%. Ku barwayi bari basanzwe bariko bahabwa impemu, urugero rwo gushobora gupfa rwaragabanutse kuva ku bice 25% gushika kuri 20%. Umwigisha Peter Horby yari ajejwe amatohoza avuga ati: "Uwu niwo muti wonyene gushika ubu werekanye ko ushobora kugabanya urugero rw'abahitanwa n'iyo ndwara - kandi wararugabanije biboneka.
