Ni intambwe ikomeye cane". Umwigisha Martin Landray arongoye ubwo bushakashatsi avuga ko mu vyo batoye, uwo muti ushobora kurokora ubuzima: Ati: "Hariho koko akarusho kagaragara. Uwo muti umurwayi awukoresha gushika ku minsi 10 ukagurwa hafi amadolari 6.29 kuri buri murwayi. "Rero mu bisanzwe kugira ubuzima bw'umurwayi burokorwe, hakenewe amadorari hafi 44. Uwu ni umuti uri mu burere bwose kw'isi". Umwigisha Landry avuga ko aho bishoboka, abarwayi bakwiye gutangura kuwuhabwa vuba bishoboka. Hagati aho, si ukuvuga ko abantu boca baja kuwugura ngo bawufatire muhira. Dexamethasone bisa n'uko atari umuti wo gufasha abantu bafise ibimenyetso bito  vya coronavirus atari ba bandi ari ngombwa ko bafashwa guhema. Umuti witwa hydroxychloroquine usanzwe uvura malaria ukaba wariko ugeragezwa mu kuvura coronavirus kuva mu kwa gatatu uherutse guhagarikwa kubera ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko ushobora gusongera isibe aho gukiza. Hari uwundi, remdesivir, uvura imigera wowo uriko urarwizwa mu bigo vya NHS kuko wabonetse ko ufise akarusho mu kuvura coronavirus kuko ufasha kugira ngo abarwayi bakire ningoga.

column2: Maroc iri mu bihugu vya mbere bishora cannabis i Buraya
column3: Maroc iri mu bihugu vya mbere bishora cannabis i Buraya naho ico kiyovyabwenge kitemwe n'amategeko muri ico gihugu

column2: BBC Gahuzamiryango yabateguriye amwe mu makuru makuru makuru yavuzwe cane mu Rwanda
column3: Mu Rwanda haravuzwe cane umubano mubi n’igihugu c’u Rwanda, inyuma y’aho impande zompi zibandanije ziterana amajambo, u Rwanda rwagiriza Uganda ko ibandanya ifasha imirwi ishaka guhungabanya umutekano w’igihugu, kandi ko ihohotera abanyarwanda bari ku butaka bwayo. Uganda nayo yagiriza u Rwanda gukorera ibikorwa vy’igendereza ku butaka bwayo. Imigenderanire hagati y'u Rwanda na Uganda yagiye kuba nabi gusumba kuva mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa kabiri uno mwaka, aho u Rwanda rufatiye ingingo yo kwugara umupaka wa Gatuna hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri, rukabuza amakamyo guca kuri uwo mupaka kubera ibikorwa vy'urwubako. Haravuzwe kandi vyinshi mu biraba umutekano muri ico gihugu, aho Perezida Kagame atarya umunwa mu kuvuga ko uwuzohirahira akarondera guhungabanya umutekano bazomuhigisha uruhindu. Bimwe ni nk’ ibitero bibiri vy’inyeshamba vyakozwe mu kibira ca Nyungwe hafi y’umupaka n’u Burundi, ivyatumye u Burundi bushirwa mu majwi n’u Rwanda ko bufasha abashaka guhungabanya u Rwanda. Umuhari FLN niwo watangaje ko ariwo wakoze ivyo bitero, uciye ku wari umuvugizi wawo majoro Callixte Nsabimana "SANKARA". Mu nyuma niho uyo majoro Sankara yahavuye afatwa, amakuru akavuga ko yafatiwe mu birwa vya Comores. Haravuzwe umuhari RNC uyobowe na Jenerali Kayumba Nyamwasa, aho abarwanyi bawo 15 bashikanywe muri sentare ya gisirikare bagirizwa ivyaha bitari bike harimwo gukorana n’igihugu c’amahanga mu ntumbero yo guhungabanya umutekano. Ibihugu vya Uganda n’u Burundi vyaravuzwe ko vyariko bifasha uwu murwi. Haravuzwe kandi ifatwa ry’abahoze ari abategetsi b’umuhari w’inyeshamba FDLR, aribo koroneri Jean Pierre Nsekanabo alias Abega yari ashinzwe igendereza muri uyo muhari, hamwe na Ignace Nkaka alias La Forge Fils Bazeye yari umuvugizi. Bafashwe n’gisirikare ca DR Congo ku mupaka wa Bunagana bavuye muri Uganda mu kwezi kwa 12 umwaka uheze bavuye mu gihugu ca Uganda, bakaba barengukishijwe mu bucamanza ubwa mbere. Muri politike, haravuzwe ivyerekeye Victoire Ingabire yahoze ayoboye umugambwe (Ishyaka) FDU – Inkingi, akaba yarasezeye uwo mugambwe atanguza uwundi yise (Development and Liberty For All), DALFA - Umurinzi. Iyo ngingo yatangaje benshi, aho bamwe bavuze ko agurishije bagenziwe bahoze basangiye kuyobora umugmbwe FDU, abandi nabo bati yaguzwe n’umugambwe uri ku butegetsi, ivyo ahakana. Mu biraba inkino, haravuzwe ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’umupira w’amaguru ca Afrika, aho ibihugu vy’akarere, Tanzania, Kenya, Uganda, Uburundi na Repubulika y’Itwaro Rusangi ya Congo vyashoboye kuronka uburenganzira bw’ukwitabira izo nkino, ariko u Rwanda rukaba rutashobore kuronka ayo mahirwe. Hagati aho, rurishimira ko rwashoboye kwubaka inyubakwa y’agatangaza, Kigali Arena, mu ntumbero yo guteza imbere  umupira w’amaboko (Basketball). Perezida Kagamwe ati: “Ntabwo iyi nyubako twayikoreye kubera ko isa neza gusa canke kuza kuyiraba gusa (…) tukishima, twayikoze kugira ngo ibihangange vy’u Rwanda, vya Afrika muri uyu mukino bishobore kuhitoreza, kuhakinira, kuhatsindira…”. BBC Gahuzamiryango yarabashikirije kandi ibiganiro vyinshi bivuga ku bikorwa n’ubuzima bw’abagore. Umviriza amakuru aramvuye aho hejuru.

column2: Uganda - DR Congo: Hatanguye ibitero vy'indege ku bagwanyi ba ADF
column3: Igisirikare ca Uganda catanguje ibitero vy'indege n'ibikoho vya rutura ku bagwanyi b'umuhari wa Allied Democratic Forces (ADF). Umuvugizi w'igisirikare ca Uganda Brigadier General Flavia Byekwaso yemeje ivyo bitero ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter. Yavuze ko ivyo bitero vyabaye bafashanije na RD Congo ku muhari wa ADF, ariko nta zindi nsiguro yatanze ku turere twabereyemwo ivyo bitero. Bisanzwe bizwi ko abagwanyi ba ADF bafise ibirindiro mu buseruko bwa RD Congo. Abategetsi ba Uganda bagiriza ADF, ifitaniye ubucuti n'icitwa Islamic State (IS), ibitero bitandukanye vya bombe muri ico gihugu kuva mu kwezi kwa cumi. Mu ndwi iheze, umukuru w'igihugu ca Uganda, Yoweri Museveni yavuze ko umuhari Allied Democratic Forces (ADF) ugendera ku vyiyumviro vya Islam utegerezwa kwishikana, agashimangira ko reta yavuye hasi mu kuyirwanya. Mw'ijambo yashikirije inyuma y'ibitero bibiri vya bombe vyakozwe ku wa kabiri ku mugwa mukuru Kampala, Museveni avuga ko ADF yibaza ko ikomeye cane rwose kubera abayo bashobora kwigira utwo bashatse ku birindiro vyabo muri DR Congo, kandi kubera babona bimba ubutare bakanagurisha n'imbaho uko bashatse . Avuga ko Uganda izobandanya kubahiga buhongo, agatera akamo abo bose batarasubiza ibirwanisho hasi kubikora vuba bwango. Mu ndwi zibiri ziheze, umuhari wa IS waremanze ibitero vya bombe vyabereye rimwe k gituro c'igipolisi kiri hanze y'umugwa mukuru Kampala n'iruhande y'inama nshingamateka. N'imiburiburi abantu batanu ni bo basize ubuzima muri ivyo bitero vya bombe, bimwe muri ivyo vyari ivyo ubwiyahuzi nk'uko bivugwa n'igipolisi ca uganda. Mu ndwi iheze, umuhari wiyitirira Reta ya ki Islam canke Etat Islamique/Islamic State (IS) warigamvye ibitero vy'ubwiyahuzi vyawo vya mbere muri Uganda, haciye ukwezi kumwe uvuga ko utanguye gukorera muri ico gihugu. IS yiyitiriye ibi bitero iciye mu citwa Intara yayo yo muri Afrika yo hagati, ISCAP, ikorera kandi no muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo hamwe na Mozambike. Abategetsi ba Uganda bagirije umuhari Allied Democratic Forces (ADF), umuhari wo muri Uganda wiyitirira idini rya Islam uherutse gutangaza ko winjiye muri IS uciye muri ISCAP, ko ari wo wakoze iki gitero. Gushika ubu, IS imaze kwiyitirira ibitero bitatu muri Uganda, vyose ku mugwa mukuru Kampala. Igitero ca mbere cabaye ikibombe caturikiye ku kirindiro c'igipolisi ku wa 07 z'ukw'icumi, IS ikaba yavuze ko cakomerekeje abantu. Ica kabiri ni ikibombe catezwe ku nzu y'uburiro mu kerere kahuriramwo abantu benshi ku mugwa mukuru ku wa 23 z'ukwa cumi, hanyuma kiraturika gihitana umukozi w'iyo nzu y'uburiro. Ica gatatu, cari kigizwe n'ibitero bibiri vyakozwe n'abiyahuzi batatu, hafi y'ibiro bikuru vy'igipolisi no ku nyubakwa y'inama nshingamateka ku wa 16 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe. Umukuru w'igihugu Yoweri Museveni yavuze ko abo biyahuzi ari abanywanyi ba ADF, akaba yabise "ingurube". Amakuru aherutse gutangazwa ku bikorwa vya ISCAP mu mezi ane aheze yavuga ko hamaze gukorwa ibitero bine muri Uganda. IS ifise kuba yaharuye ko ibitero vya bombe vyo ku wa 16 z'uku kwa cumi na rimwe ari ibitero bibiri bitandukanye, ari co gituma yaciye ivuga ko ari bine imaze gukora muri Uganda. Ariko kandi, iki gishobora gufatwa nk'ica kane gishobora kuba ari icakozwe n'umwiyahuzi ku modoka yunguruza abantu ku wa 25 z'ukwa cumi hafi y'I Kampala, kivugwa ko cahitanye uwo nyene yagikoze, gusa ntawaciyitiriye. Abategetsi ba Uganda bavuga ko ico gitero c'ubwiyahuzi capfuvye cakozwe n'umunywanyi wa ADF. Mu bintu vyose ivuga, IS ivuga ko ibitero vyayo bikorwa kuri reta ya Uganda n'igipolisi cayo vy' "abapagani". Mu kwiyitirira ibi bitero, IS irigamba ko yishe canke igakomeretsa "Abakiristu" kandi ko yateye n'inama nshingamateka ya Uganda "igizwe n'abasenga ibigirwamana".' Mu gitero cayo co ku wa 23 z'ukwezi guheze ku nzu y'uburiro, uyu muhari wasiguye ko wakoze ico gitero ku "kabare" gakunzwe kugenderwa "n'abanywanyi hamwe n'abakorera igendereza rya reta y'Abapagani ya Uganda". Imbere y'ibi bitero, Uganda ntiyari ikunze kwumvikana mu butumwa bw'iterabwoba bwasohorwa na IS. Mu gusigura igituma yakoze igitero co ku wa 16 z'uku kwa cumi na rimwe, IS yavuze ko Uganda ari "kimwe mu bihugu biri mu ntambara n'abarwanyi ba Etat Islamique muri Afrika yo hagati". Mu vyo yavugiye mu kinyamakuru cayo al-Naba ku wa 18 z'uku kwa cumi na rimwe, IS yavuze ko ibi bitero vy'ubwiyahuzi "vyuguruye intambwe nshasha y'intambara hagati y'aba mujahidin na reta y'abapagani ya Uganda", kubera, nk'uko yabisubiyemwo, uruhara rwayo mu kurwanya abarwanyi biyitirira idini rya Islam muri "Afrika yo hagati". Muri ubwo butumwa yanditse, harimwo uwundi murongo uvuga ko Uganda iriko "irishura ku ruhara rwayo mu ntambara n'aba mujahidin hagati mu gihugu [Uganda] no hanze". Mu mpera z'ukw'icumi, uyu murwi usa n'uko wababajwe n'uko Uganda itemeye uruhara rwawo muri ibi bitero biheruka. Ivuga ku gitero c'ubwiyahuzi co ku wa 23 z'ukwa cumi ku nzu y'uburiro, IS, iciye mu kinyamakuru al-Naba, yaragabishije Uganda ku vyo ivuga ko ari utwigoro twa reta two gufata minenerwe ibikorwa vya IS mu kubifata ko ari ibitero bito bisanzwe bikorwa n'umuhari w'abarwanyi wo muri ico gihugu - uzwi nka ADF. IS ivuga ko Uganda yihenda cane mu kutemera ko iki gitero [ku nzu y'uburiro], ica kabiri gikozwe muri ubu buryo, cakozwe na Etat Islamique. IS ibandanya isigura ko Uganda yifatanije n'abansi bayo mu "kurungika ingabo" muri DR Congo kurwanya abarwanyi bayo muri iki gihugu, "inyuma y'aho igisirikare ca Congo kinaniriwe no gutera intambwe n'imwe ku rubuga". Ni igihe gusa kitari bwashike imbere y'uko IS yinjira muri Uganda, mu nteguro yayo yo kwagura akarere mu ntambara yayo, ahatanguriye umuhari ukorana nayo wa ADF. Ufatiye ku bivugwa na IS ubwayo, bisa n'uko uyu muhari ufata ko Uganda yongereje inguvu mu kurwanya incuti zawo mu buseruko bwa Congo, ikaba rero yikika inyuma y'ibi kugira ngo itere Uganda. N'aho hari ibiganiro hagati ya Uganda na DR Congo mu ntumbero yo gukorera hamwe mu kurwanya abarwanyi biyitirira idini rya Islam mu karere, gushika ubu nta bikorwa vyo gukorera hamwe biratangura. Ivyo kurungika ingabo muri DR Congo ni ibintu vyo kwitondera cane, ufatiye ku kungene Uganda yafashije inyeshamba zarwanya ubutegetsi bwa Congo mu myaka ya 1990. Mu kw'icumi, Perezida Museveni yatangaje ko igihugu ciwe "citeguriye kuja gufasha" kurwanya umuhari ADF ku butaka bwa Congo, "mu gihe abategetsi ba reta ya Congo bovyemera". Ariko gushika ubu nta tangazo rivuga ivyo gukorana ririgera rishirwa ahabona. Kubona rero ibitero vy'i Kampala bibaye muri kino gihe, bishobora kuba ari amayeri ya IS yo guhamagarira abanya Uganda ngo biyamirize irungikwa iryo ari ryo ryose ry'ingabo za Uganda muri DR Congo. Abarwanyi ba ki Islam bashobora kwama bikika kuri iri rungikwa ry'ingabo muri Congo mu gutera abasivire ba Uganda. Nk'akarorero, ni igitero c'ubwicanyi gikomeye giheruka gukorwa i Kampala mu 2010, ciswe "World Cup"bombings, kubera cabaye ku bantu bariko barorera urukino  rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi yose mu mupira w'amaguru kigahitana abantu 74. Umuhari al-Shabab ni wo waciyitiriye, uvuga ko washaka kwihora Uganda kubera yarungitse ingabo muri Somalia. Ku wa 23 z'uku, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Uganda Henry Okello-Oryem yasubiwemwo n'ikinyamakuru Red Pepper avuga ko ata gikorwa na kimwe co kurungika ingabo muri DR Congo gishoboka abategetsi ba Kinshasa badatanze uruhusha. Ati: "Ni ngombwa ko ubironkera uburenganzira. Ntushobora kwishora ku butaka bw'uwundi uko nyene". IS iri mu rugamba rutoroshe mu buseruko bwa DR Congo kuva mu kwa gatanu aho reta yatangaza ibihe bidasanzwe muri ako karere ica ishinga ubutegetsi bwa gisirikare mu ntara za Kivu ya Ruguru na Ituri ziri ku rubibe ico gihugu gihana na Uganda, akarere IS isanzwe ikoreramwo cane. Igotwa ry'izi ntara ryagumye ryisubiriza kandi n'ubu riracabandanya. Inyuma y'ukwezi iri gotwa ritanguye, IS yakoze kw'itama reta ya Congo ko yananiwe no guhagarika ibikorwa vyayo mbere iranigamba ko yakoze igitero "ca mbere" hagati mu gisagara ca Beni c'intara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Ico gihe, yatangaje ko abarwanyi bayo ari bo bakoze igitero ca bombe kw'isengero hamwe n'ikindi c'ubwiyahuzi mu kabare, ari co ca mbere muri DR Congo. Imbere y'aho, ibitero vyabera hanze y'igisagara ca Beni. Mu kw'icumi, umunyamakuru Nicaise Kibel'Bel Oka, umwanditsi w'ibitabo vyinshi bivuga ku ntambara ya ki islam mu karere ka Beni, yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Intumbero y'igisirikare mu kugota aka karere ni uguhagarika uruja n'uruza rwa ADF ku butaka bwa DR Congo, mu ntumbero yo kurondera kubirukana bagasubira muri Uganda". Iki gitero gishasha ca IS muri Uganda kiri mu rwego rw'ibikorwa vy'uyu muhari vyo kurondera kwimukira muri Afrika kuva mu 2019, inyuma y'aho utakarije ibirindiro vyawo vya nyuma mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo hagati, hamwe n'umugambi wawo wo kurondera kwiyagurira akarere. Ubucuti ufitaniye na ADF muri Uganda buwuha akaryo ko gukorera muri Uganda mu buryo bworoshe. Butuma kandi uyu muhari wa IS wegera buke buke iyindi mihari ikorana nawo muri "Afrika yo hagati", neza na neza muri DR congo, Uganda na Tanzania aho IS imaze kwiyitirira ibitero bibiri gusa, hamwe rero na Mozambike.

column2: Isi iri mu bibazo bikomeye vya Covid, monkeypox n'intambara - OMS/WHO
column3: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi (OMS/WHO)  agabisha ko isi ihanganye n'ibibazo "bitoroshe", harimwo Covid, intambara yo muri Ukraine hamwe na monkeypox/variole du singe. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus yashikirije ibi mw'ijambo yavugiye i Genève/Geneva, aho abahinga b'iri shami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu bariko baganira ku ngwara y'icaduka ya monkeypox/variole du singe (ubundi variole mu kirundi n'ikinyarwanda ni ibihara, monkey/singe nayo ni inkende), imaze kwibonekeza mu bihugu 15 hanze ya Afrika. Abantu barenga 80 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye iyi ndwara i Bulaya, muri Amerika, Canada, Australia na Israel. Hagati aho, ingaruka ku banyagihugu benshi bivugwa ko zikiri hasi. Monkeypox/variole du singe - umugera ukunze kwibonekeza mu turere two mu misozi muri Afrika yo hagati n'iy'uburengero  - isa n'uko itoroherwa gukwirakwira hagati y'abantu kandi mu bisanzwe ni indwara itabangamye. Abantu bose bandura iyi ndwara bakira mu ndwi nkeya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo c'Ubwongereza kijejwe amagara y'abantu, NHS. Iki kiza cahababuye abahinga, Ubwongereza bukaba bwasohoye ibwirizwa rishasha, aho buvuga ko abikekwa ko babonanye n'abanduye bokwitaramura mu kiringo c'indwi zitatu. Ku wa gatanu, Ububirigi cabaye igihugu ca mbere catangaje ikiringo c'indwi zitatu co kwitaramura ku bantu banduye. Ikinyamakuru Guardian kivuga ko mu Bwongereza hitezwe ko abandi banduye batangazwa kuri uno wa mbere. Mw'ijambo ryo kwugurura ikoraniro ry'ishiraahamwe OMS arongoye ku wa Mungu, Dr Tedros yavuze ati: "Ni vyo koko, ikiza karanda ca Covid si co kibazo conyene gihanze isi yacu. "Muri kano kanya turiko turavuga bagenzacu kw'isi yose bahanganye n'ibiza vya Ebola muri Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo, monkeypox n'indwara y'igitigu tutazi ico ivako hamwe n'ibibazo vy'imibereho y'abanyagihugu muri Afghanistan, Ethiopia, Somalia, Sudani y'Epfo, Syria, Ukraine na  Yemen. "Duhanganye n'uruvangatirane rw'indwara, kigoyi n'intambara,  bitewe n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere, ubusumbasumbane n'ugukebana muri poritike z'igihugu". OMS yari yavuze ko hari abandi bikekwa kwandura monkeypox bariko bakorwako amatohoza  - ariko akaba ata bihugu yavuze  - ikagabisha ko hashobora gutangazwa n'abandi banduye. Inyuma y'aho habonekeye umuntu wa mbere yanduye iyi ndwara mu Bwongereza, umugera waciye utangura gutorwa i Bulaya hose - aho ibisata bijejwe amagara y'abantu muri Espagne, Portugal, mu Budagi, mu Bubirigi, mu Bufaransa, mu Buholande, mu Butaliyano no muri Suede vyatangaje ko vyatoye abanduye. Abandi banduye batangajwe muri Autriche n'Ubuswisi ejo ku wa Mungu. Igisata kijejwe gukinga indwara mu Bwongereza (Health Security Agency, UKHSA) kivuga ko kimaze gutora abantu 20 banduye gushika ubu, umuhanuzi mukuru waco ajejwe ubuvuzi Dr Susan Hopkins akaba yabwiye ikiganiro Sunday Morning  ca BBC  ati:  "Tubandanya dutora abandi banduye ku musi ku musi". Avuga ko uwu mugera uriko urakwiragira mu bantu - aho abatowe banduye batigeze babonana n'umuntu n'umwe yagendeye Afrika y'Uburengero, aho iyi ndwara isanzwe yariraye. Ariko, Dr Hopkins avuga ko ingaruka ku banyagihugu muri rusangi zikiri "ntoya cane", aho abenshi mu bamaze gusanga baranduye ari abo mu bisagara bimwe bimwe hamwe n'abo muri wa murwi w'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye. N'aho ata rucanco rwihariye rwa monkeypox ruraboneka, ibihugu bitari bike bivuga ko biriko biregeranya incanco z'ibihara, zikora ku rugero rwa 85% mu gukingira umuntu kuko iyi migera ibiri isa. Ntibiratomoka neza igitumye iki kiza caduka ubu. Kimwe mu bishoboka ni uko umugera ufise kuba warihinduye ukuntu, n'aho ata vyemezo bikomeye vy'uko ari umugera wihinduye. Iyindi nsiguro ni uko umugera wisanze mu kibanza nyaco mu gihe nyaco co kugwirirana. Monkeypox ishobora kandi kwiyongera mu buryo bworoshe gusumba uko vyari bimeze muri kahise, igihe urucanco rw'ibihara rwakoreshwa ahantu henshi.

column2: Haribonekeza ubukene bwa Amstel ndende na bock mu Burundi
column3: Haraciye igihe mu Burundi hibonekeza ubukene bw'ikinyobwa ca Amstel ndende, hamwe na Amstel ngufi bita bock nk'uko abakunzi b'izi nzoga babivuga. Abihereza ivyo binyobwa bavuga ko bisigaye ari umuzi w'ibuye, bikaba ngombwa ko bihereza Primus canke Royal badakunda, canke bakanywa za skol bavuga ko ziva mu gihugu c'u Rwanda, zigurishwa ku giciro kiri hejuru. Umwe ati: "Si benshi bashoboye kwigurira skol kuko zirazimvye". Hampande y'inzoga za Amstel, haranavugwa kandi n'ikena ry'amafanta yo mu bwoko bwa coca. Ikompanyi Brarudi iremera ko izo nyobwa zikenye, ariko ko ikibazo kiri ahanini ku bakiriya b'umurengera muri kino gihe. Aho ni mu gihe hari abibaza ko vyoba bitumwa n'ikena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro. Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mw'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi, aremeza ko iyo ngorane iriho ariko ko bakora ibishoboka kugira ngo bayitorere umuti. Ati: "Mu gihe nk'iki, turonka abanywanyi b'umurengera, ariko Brarudi iriko irakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ishobore gushimisha abakiriya bayo". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu biteye imbere bimwe vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco. Ibanki y'isi ivuga ko mu 2015 ubutunzi bw'Uburundi bwagabanutse ku rugero rwa -3.9%, mu 2016 bukagabanuka ku rugero rwa -0.6%, mu 2017, ariko bukaduga kuri 0.5% nayo mu 2018 bukaduga kuri 1,6%. Iyi banki ariko ivuga ko iri duga ryo mu myaka ibiri iheze ari rito cane ugereranyije n'ivyo igihugu gikenera, ikena rikomeye ry'amafaranga y'agaciro, ihagarikwa ry'intererano z'amakungu ivyo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku rudandazwa rw'ibiva hanze.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Ronaldo, Griezmann, Kounde, Kimpembe, Kane, Neymar, Lukaku
column3: Atletico Madrid yongereje akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Manchester United umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37, mu gushira kw’isoko umusatirizi w’umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w’imyaka 31. (Times) United izokwemera gutiza Ronaldo muri rino ci igihe cose azoba yemera ingingo yo gushobora kwongerako uwundi mwaka mu masezerano yiwe kugira ngo ashobore kugaruka i Old Trafford mu mwaka w’inkino ukurikira. (Mirror) Barcelona irizeye gutsinda Chelsea mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma w’umufaransa Jules Kounde w‘imyaka 23 ku miriyoni 65 z’ama-euro arihwa bukebuke, mu kwemerera  Sevilla  ko ishobora kuba irayihaye makeya. (Sport - mu espangol). Chelsea izoca ivuvudikira umukinyi w’inyuma wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Presnel Kimpembe w’imyaka 26, mu gihe Barcelona yoyitwara Kounde. (Express) Bayern Munich yatanguye kuvugana n’abaserukizi b’umusatirizi wa Tottenham umwongereza Harry Kane w’imyaka 28, ni mu gihe ivyo kwimukira muri uno murwi watahukanye ihiganwa ry’Ubudagi mu ci riza bikaba bitamugwa nabi. (Bild – mu kidagi) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Brezili Neymar arahakana amakuru avuga ko ashobora kuva muri Paris St-Germain muri rino ci, mu gihe Chelsea na Manchester City ivugwa ko irondera uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 30. (Mail) Manchester United ifise amahirwe menshi yo kuronka umukinyi w’inyuma wo ku ruhande rw’iburyo wa Inter Milan umunya-Hollande Denzel Dumfries w’imyaka  26. (Calciomercato – mu gitaliyano) Chelsea yageze ku masezerano yemerera Inter Milan kugumana umusatirizi w’umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w’imyaka 29 mu kindi kiringo c’uwundi mwaka mu gihe umwaka wa mbere w’intizo muri uyo murwi wa Serie A uzoba urangiye. (Mail), Newcastle iripfuza cane umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Leicester  umwongereza Harvey Barnes w’imyaka 24 ariko aba ba Foxes bamushakako imiriyoni 54 z’amapawundi. (Sun) Umumenyereza wa Liverpool  Jurgen Klopp yanse ivyo kugura abandi bakinyi kiretse bishitse hakaba imvune mu bakinyi biwe canke uyu murwi ukagurisha abakinyi usanzwe ufise. (Sky Sports) Nice yegereye umunyegori wa Leicester  umunya-Danemark Kasper Schmeichel w’imyaka 35 inyuma y’aho inaniriwe no kugura Yann Sommer akinira Borussia Monchengladbach. (L'Equipe – mu gifaransa) Brighton ntirota iva ku giciro c’imiriyoni zirenga 50 z’amapawundi ku mukinyi wayo w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu, umunya-Espagne Marc Cucurella inyuma yo kwanka amafaranga “y’agashinyaguro” y’imiriyoni 30 z’amapawundi atangwa na Manchester City. (Athletic) Brighton ishobora guca irondera umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu wa Manchester United  Brandon Williams w’imyaka 21, ku giciro c’imiriyoni 15 z’amapawundi mu gihe Cucurella yoramuka agiye muri rino ci. (Mirror) Timo Werner asa n’uwushobora kuva muri Chelsea muri rino ci kubera uyu musatirizi w’imyaka 26 ashaka guhabwa umwanya ukwiye wo gukina kugira ngo ashobore kurondera ikibanza mu murwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubudagi mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose. (Sky Sports – mu kidagi) Everton iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati umwongereza Dele Alli w’imyaka 26, inyuma y’amezi atandatu gusa imuguriye Tottenham. (Sun) Roma yongereje akariro mu kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Manchester United umunya- Côte d'Ivoire Eric Bailly w’imyaka 28. (Mirror) Arsenal iri mu biganiro vyo kurondera gutiza Atalanta umukinyi w’inyuma wa Portugal Nuno Tavares, inyuma y’aho uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 22 yerekaniye ko ashaka kuva muri Emirates. (Fabrizio Romano) Newcastle iriko irakurikirana ingene ivy’umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Rennes umunya-Ghana Kamaldeen Sulemana bigenda, akaba ari ku giciro c’imiriyoni zababa 30 z’amapawundi kandi yipfuzwa na Bayer Leverkusen na Ajax. (Mail) West Ham iri mu biganiro na Napoli kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Pologne Piotr Zielinski w’imyaka 28. (Tuttomercato – mu gitaliyano).

column2: New York 'yubatswe n'ukuboko kw'Imana' - indirimbo nshasha ya Cinjire
column3: Ni umuvugizi w'Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere rusangi mu Burundi, ariko kandi abatari bake bamuzi kw'izina rya CINJIRE, uyu si uwundi ni Pierre Nkurukiye, yahawe iryo ritazirano kubera ururirimbo n'urukurikirane rw'indirimbo yise CINJIRE rwasohotse mu 2019. Cinjire aherutse gusohora ururirimbo yise New York Chante Dieu (twovuga mu kirundi tuti New York, ririmba Imana), akavuga ko yaruririmvye ari muri ico gisagara gikomeye co muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Nkurikiye alias Cinjire yabwiye BBC ko mu kuririmba iyo ndirimbo yakozweko n'ukuntu New York yubatse vy'igitangaza, ariko asanga ibibanza vyo guhimbaziramwo Imana vyariyumanganijwe. Ati: "Nshitseyo naritegereje New York ndabona ko ari igisagara cubakitse koko, n'amazu maremare cane, mugabo ngiye kurondera ibibanza canke ingoro z'Imana, nasanze ari utuzu dutoduto, umengo ntaco tumaze, ari naho naciye ngira iciyumviro co kubabwira nti baririmbe Imana. "Nahisemwo New York kuko ari bwo bwa mbere nari ngiyeyo, nabonye ibintu bitangaje, na rirya ari ikirimba c'isi yose kuko ari ho hari icicaro c'ishirahamwe ONU. "Naririmvye ivyo mbona kuko vyarantangaje kubona mu gisagara nka kiriya ata ngoro z'Imana nininini zihari kugira ngo biboneke ko nabo bayihaye ikibanza. "Rero nashimye kuhatangira ubwo butumwa kugira ngo nabo koko bahe Imana ikibanza kiyibereye kuko yabahaye ivyo vyiza bagashobora gushika kuri biriya bashoboye kwubaka". Pierre Nkurikiye alias Cinjire avuga ko yatanguye kwandika indirimbo yiga mu mwaka wa kane w'amashure y'intango. Ati: "Niho natanguriye buke buke kuririmba". Yabandanije aririmba mw'isengero kubera yari mu mihari ya Gatorika, akaba yari mu muhari w'aba Scout. Ivy'umuziki ugezweho yagiye kubitangura ageze muri kaminuza y'inyamiramabi, ari ho yatanguye gukora ururirimbo rwa mbere rukozwe muri studio, asanzwe ari intwazangabo mu gipolisi c'Uburundi. Ati: "Kuririmba n'amabanga nsanzwe njejwe biranyorohera kuko ni ubutumwa bumwe. "Mu ndirimbo zanje nsaba abantu gushira imbere ineza bakarwanya ikibi, urwego ndimwo rw'inyamiramabi narwo rujejwe kurwanya ikibi, urumva rero ko ari ibintu bijanye". Yagiye gusohora urukurikirane rw'indirimbo (album) rwa mbere mu 2019 yise CINJIRE, izina rizwi cane yahavuye yitirirwa gushika ubu. Pierre Nkurikiye alias Cinjire avuga ko mu Burundi hakiri ikibazo nyamukuru ku banyamuziki kuko umuziki utaratangura guhemba neza canke kubeshaho abawukora nk'uko bimeze mu bindi bihugu. "Abumviriza imiziki ntibaturiha, haracariho ikibazo", niko avuga, akizera ariko y'uko mu misi iri imbere ibintu bishobora guhinduka kuko hari "amategeko ariko arahinyanyurwa". Hagati aho, avuga ko akarusho gakomeye ari uko ashoboye gushikiriza ubutumwa bwiwe uko abona ibintu, "hanyuma abantu bakabwakira bakagira ico babuvuzeko, kandi bukanagira ico bubahinduyeko". Ati: "Utanze ubutumwa ntihabura n'umwe buhindura. Ururirimbo rwanje ndarutanze ntirubura n'umwe ruryohera rukamunezera, kubwanje iyo niyo nyungu ihambaye". Nkurikiye aranegura ukungene abarundi bahurumbira umuziki wo hanze, ariko akavuga ko ahanini biva ku nzira uzananamwo, inzira avuga ko ari iz'abazungu bafise intumbero zabo n'uburyo bwo gukundisha ibintu vyabo. Ati: "Abarundi barakunda ivy'iwabo ariko baraneshwa n'ibiba bivuye hanze kuko akenshi biza mu nzira z'itangazamakuru atari iz'abarundi". Abona ko amaradiyo n'imboneshakure bidaha umwanya ukwiye indirimbo n'utugenegene vy'Uburundi nk'uko biri mu bindi bihugu avuga ko amaze kujamwo, aho usanga "indirimbo n'imico kama babiha 80%", akabona ko ari ukutamenya. Ati: "Uburundi burikwije haba mu mvyino, mu ntambo, mu ngoma n'ibindi bijanye n'imico n'imigenzo vy'Uburundi". Atera akamo ibimenyeshamakuru guha ikibanza kinini ivyo "ng'aha iwacu mu Burundi", akavuga ko bifise akanovera kuko biba ari ibintu bitarononwa.

column2: Umwamikazi Elizabeth atanguye urugendo rwa nyuma, abanyagihugu baramwunamira
column3: Urugendo rwa nyuma kandi rubabaje rw’Umwamikazi  Queen Elizabeth II w’ubwongereza rwatanguye kuri uno wa Mungu, ikiziga ciwe kikaba kivanywe i Balmoral kijanwa ku kirimba c’umwami ca Holyroodhouse muri  Edinburgh. Ibihumbi n’ibihumbi baratonze ku mabarabara mu kwunamira ubwa nyuma umwamikazi. Iyi niyo ntambwe ya mbere y’ibikorwa vyo kumushingura vyitezwe mu ndwi iza i Londres/London. Ikiziga kigenda bukebuka n’imodoka gushika Edinburgh uburebure bw’ibirometero 280. Gicishwa mu bibanza bitandukanye kuva Aberdeen, Dundee, na Perth, uru rukaba ari urugendo ruza kumara amasaha atandatu. Kiza gushikanwa i Holyroodhouse – ingoro y’Umwami w’Ubwongereza ku mugwa mukuru wa Ecosse/Scotland – kikaza gushirwa mu cumba kidasanzwe. Ku muhingamo w’ejo ku wa mbere, hazoba ikigandaro mw’Isengero nkuru yitiriwe Umweranda Giles, kizokwitabirwa n’umuryango w’i bwami. Isandugu izohamara amasaha 24, kugira ngo abantu bashobore kumwunamira ubwa nyuma. Umusi uzokurikira Umuganwakazi Anne azoherekeza ikiziga ca nyina wiwe mu gihe kizoba gitwawe n’indege i Londres.  Isandugu y’ikiziga c’Umwamikazi kizovanwa ku kibuga c’indege ca Edinburgh ijanwe i Buckingham n’indege gigishijwe ku kibuga c’indege ca RAF Northolt. Ku wa gatatu, ikiziga c’Umwamikazi kizojanwa mu ngoro ya Westminster (Westminster Hall) inyuma gatoya y’isaha umunani z’umuhingamo, urugeno ruzomara iminota yaba 40, abanyagihugu bakazoronka akaryo ko kumwunamira muri uru rugendo. Niho kizoguma imbere yo gushingurwa. Ibirori vyo gushingura umwamikazi Elizabeth bizoba ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 19 Nyakanga (9), 2022 mw’isengero Westminster Abbey, nk’uko itangazo ryasohowe n’ikirimba ca Buckingham ribivuga. Uru rusengero ni urusengero rudasanzwe kuko niho abami n’abamikazi bimikirwa, harimwo n’uyu Mwamikazi nyene mu 1953, rukaba ari narwo rwabereyemwo ubugeni bwiwe n’Umuganwa Philip mu 1947. Nta birori vyo gufuba umwami vyari bwigere bibera muri uru rusengero kuva mu kinjana ca 18, n’aho ibirori vyo gushingura nyina w’uyu Mwamikazi ari ho vyabereye mu 2002. Abakuru b’ibihugu bavuye mu bihugu bitandukanye vy’isi bazofata urugendo bagiye kwifatanya n’umuryango w’I bwami kwibuka ubuzima bw’umwamikazi n’ibikorwa vyiwe. Abanyaporitike bakomakomeye n’abahoze ari abashikiranganji ba mbere b’Ubwongereza nabo nyene bazokwitabira ibi birori. Ibirori bizotangurwa no kuvana isandugu y’ikiziga c’umwamikazi mu cumba ca Westminster itwarwe mu Rusengero rwa Westminster mu modoka y’igisata ca gisirikare kirwanira mu mazi. Inyuma y’ibi birori, ikiziga kizovanwa i Westminster Abbey kijanwe ahitwa Wellington Arch, ari naho kizovanwa kigatwarwa gushingurwa i Windsor.

column2: Antonio Guterres wa ONU yemeye gushigikira igisirikare ca DR Congo
column3: Umunyamabanga mukuru w'ishirahamwe ONU yemeye ko iryo shirahamwe rizobandanya gufasha igisirikare ca Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo mu ntambara yo kurwanya imirwi irwanya ubutegetsi. Mu rugendo rwiwe  ejo ku wa Mungu mu gisagara ca Beni kiri mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu, Antonio Guterres yamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko ibitero vy'ukurwanya imirwi irwanya ubutegetsi bibandanya. Inteko mpuzamakungu zigera ku 16,000 ziri muri ico gihugu (MONUSCO), kikaba ari gitigiri kinini c'ingabo za ONU kw'isi. Amafaranga zikoresha ku mwaka arenga n'umuliyaridi w'amadolari. Bwana Guterres yemeye ko ingabo za ONU zizokorana n'igisirikare be n'igipolisi vya Congo. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC akorera muri ico gihugu avuga ko abanyagihugu bo mu karere k'ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu bidoga bavuga izo ngabo ataco zimaze. Izo ngabo zimaze imyaka irenga 20 muri ico gihugu, ariko ubukozi bw'ikibi burabandanya. Asubirwamwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP, bwana Guterres avuga ati: "Tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo duhagarike uruhagarara". Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU yarashitse no mu karere ka Mangina aho ikiza ca Ebola catanguriye, haciye umwaka. Umutekano muke muri ako karere watumye igikorwa c'uguhangana n'umugera wa Ebola kibangamirwa, mu gihe ukutamenya kw'abanyagihugu ku vyerekeye uwo mugera kwatumye utwigoro tw'ukurwanya ikwiragira ryawo ataho dushika. Abashika 2000 baramaze guhitanwa n'iyo ndwara. Bwana Guterres yaragendeye ikigo kivura abafashwe n'iyo ndwara, aho yabahimirije ko abafashwe bokwihutira kwa muganga aho kwinyegeza.

column2: DR Congo-Rutshuru: HCR ivuga ko abantu ibihumbi 11 bahungiye muri Uganda
column3: Umuvugizi w'umukuru w'intara ya Kivu ya ruguru muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo aremeza ko umuhari M23 wateye mu turere twa Chanzo na Runyoni muri Rutshuru mw'ijoro ryo ku wa mungu, bituma abantu benshi guhunga, harimwo n'abajabutse muri Uganda. Ishami rya ONU riraba impunzi HCR rivuga ko gushika kuri uyu wa kabiri riharura abantu ibihumbi 11 bajabutse umupaka bagahungira muri Uganda. Ubu babaye baracumbikirwa ahitwa Nyakabande. Ariko umuvugizi w'umukuru w'intara ya Kivu ya ruguru, jenerari Sylvain Ekenge avuga ko bamwe batanguye guhunguka. Avuga ko "umurindi ukiri muto, ariko nibaza ko mu masaha ari imbere baja gutahuka ku bwinshi". Umuvuguzi wa HCR mu karere ka Afrika yo hagati, y'ubuseruko n'ihembe rya Afrika,  Faith Kasima, avuga ko bigoye kumenya ibitigiri bishasha "ariko ico tuzi n'uko abari bajabutse umupaka bose bari ibihumbi 11". Madame Kasina avuga ko ico abo bantu babwira abakozi ba HCR ari uko bakeneye ahantu hatekanye. Ati: "Benshi muri bo ubu nta ngingo ntabanduka bashobora gufata, yo kuguma ngaha canke gusubira inyuma." Ico bashaka muri uyu mwanya ni ahantu hatekanye no kuronka imfashanyo - nk'ivyo kurya, ivyo kwifuka - ivyo nivyo HCR ifatanije n'ubutegetsi bwa Uganda turiko turagerageza kubakorera" Mu kiganiro na BBC, ku wa mbere,  jenerari Ekenge yavuze ati: "Nk'igihe c'isaha zine z'ijoro (ku wa mungu), umuhari w'abagarariji ba M23, canke ibisigarira vyawo, warateye uturere twa Chanzo na Runyoni  ufise umugambi wo guhanganya n'ibindi bice vy'intara". Jenerari Ekenge yavuze ko abateye ari abo mw'ishami ryategekwa na Sultani Makenga. Umuhari M23 wo urabihakana. Avuga ko baje bava "mu karere k'imipaka itatu " kari hagati ya Congo, Uganda n'Urwanda mw'ishamba rya Virunga". Jenerari Ekenge avuga ko abateye bikitse mu kiza c'uko ata ngabo nyinshi za Congo zari zisanzwe muri ako gace kuko hari hatekanye ku buryo  "bitari bikenewe gushira ingabo nyinshi  hafi y'umupaka w'ibihugu mufitaniye umubano mwiza". Mu kiganiro co kuri uyu wa kabiri, jenerari Ekenge yavuze ko ubu ingabo za Congo zagaruje ibirindiro vyose vyari vyatewe. Yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ati: "Kuva ejo mu masaha y'umuhingamo, ingabo zacu zaragaruje ibirindiro vyose. Ubu nizo zigenzura uruhande rwa Congo rw'umupaka bihana na Uganda n'Urwanda". Avuga ko adashobora kwemeza niba abateye baje bava hakurya y'umupaka mu Rwanda canke muri Uganda. Ati "Gusa ico twemeza n'uko ari aba M23. Ntibinyegeza. Barigaragaza, bashize no ku mbuga hwaniro ama video yabo". Ku kibazo co kumenya iyo abari bateye baroye, jenerari Ekenge yasubije ati "hari aho bari bazananye, ni naho basubiye". Hagati aho yavuze ko umukuru wabo mu ngabo yagize ingendo muri Uganda no mu Rwanda, "aho niho bazovugana hakaboneke umuco kuri ico kibazo". M23 irahakana kugaba igitero i Rutshuru Umuhari M23 waheruka kuvugwa mu 2013 ugwanya reta ya Congo uvuga ko itubahiriza amasezerano bari baragiraniye. Uburongozi bw'umugwi M23 buhakana kugira uruhara na rumwe mu gitero cagabwe i Rutshuru ngo kuko bidashobora kwumvikana. Mw'itangazo wasohoye ku mugoroba w'ejo kuwa mbere, umuhari M23 uvuga ko umaze umwaka mu biganiro na leta ya Congo bigamije gutunganiriza abahoze ari abarwanyi bawo. Iryo tangazo ribandanya rivuga yuko mu gihe ivyo biganiro biriko biraba kandi ngo bikaba bigenda neza, ata kuntu M23 yaco ica inyuma ngo yiyononere. Ngo ariko bihora bishika ko ingabo za FARDC zitagenzurwa zija gusotora abarwanyi ba M23 bari i Rutshuru kuva mu 2017, ngo ukwo gusotorwa kukaba kwatanguye mu mwaka wa 2020 ngo ariko baririnze gusubiza. Iryo tangazo rirangiza risaba ko ingabo zitagenzurwa za FARDC zokurwa mu turere twa Rutshuru zirimwo kugira ivyo bikorwa vyo gusotorana bihagarare. Ayobangira Safari, umushingamateka wa Masisi muri Kivu ya ruguru, yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ko  ibikorwa vy'inyeshyamba bimaze iminsi biri mu burasirazuba bwa DR Congo ari "ingaruka za gahunda yo gusubiza abari abarwanyi mu buzima busanzwe canke mu ngabo, idakora neza." Agira ati: "Nta kintu cakozwe mu gufasha abavuye mu mitwe y'inyeshamba, ico tuzi ni uko ubu benshi muri abo bantu bari hafi ya Bunagana ari abahoze muri M23 bagitegereje gusubizwa mu buzima busanzwe. "Turasaba leta gukora ku buryo aba basore bose bakiri mu murongo wo gusubira mu nyeshamba bafashwa gusubira mu buzima bwa gisivile canke bagashirwa mu gisirikare". Intara za Kivu uko ari zibiri zirangwamwo imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho irenga 100 imaze imyaka mirongo  ihungabanya ako karere k'ubuseruko bwa Repuburika y'intwaro ya demokrasi ya Congo.

column2: Burundi: Abarongoye Islam bavuga ko ata ngorane ihari hagari ya Islam na reta
column3: Abakuru b'idini rya Islam bavuga ko biyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe na Ndikumana Rashid, umusilamu aherutse kwifatira mu gahanga umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, iterambere rusangi n'umutekano. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ihuriro ry'imisigiti riri kumwe n'ihuriro ry'aba-Imam mu Burundi, bamenyesha ko ivyo Ndikumana yavuze yabivuze ku gatwe kiwe bitega aya mahuriro canke "umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi". Ndikumana arapfunzwe inyuma y'uko yumvikanye ahamagarira umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati n'umutekano, Ndirakobuca Gervais, gusaba ikigongwe, hari mu musigiti wa Madina uri muri zone Buterere mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Umwe mu bakuru b'idini rya Islam mu Burundi yabwiye BBC ko gushika ubu nta kibabuza gusenga uko bamye basenga na mbere. Abakuriye Islam mu Burundi mw'itangazo ryabo, bamenyesha abanywanyi babo ko "ata matati ari hagati y'umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi" na reta y'igihugu. Zuberi Mohamed, Umukuru w'inama ya bose mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi, yabwiye BBC ko bakira nk'abandi bose ivyashikirijwe na Ndirakobuca, kuko "vyaraba bose ntivyaraba aba Islam gusa". Avuga ko ivyo yavuze bitababuza gusenga uko bahora basenga. Ati: "Nta tegeko na rimwe rirasohoka ritubuza gusenga canke ritubuza guhamagarira abantu kuja gusenga. "Twebwe dufata y'uko yariko ashikiriza amakenga yoba afise canke uko abona ibintu". Zuberi avuga ko iyo habaye ingorane hagati ya reta no mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi "hariho inzira bicamwo kugira ngo tuvugane, nk'uko biri mu yandi madini". Abajijwe niba ivyasabwe n'umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano, Rashidi abona ko ata ngorane bishobora gutera. Ati: "Abatovyi mu mpande zose ntibabuze, ariko twebwe turazi ko aba Islam bahagaze neza, kandi ko ata ngorane zihava ziva muri ivyo gushika kuri uno munota nta kibazo kihari hagati ya reta n'aba Islam mu Burundi".

column2: Ethiopia: Onu irasaba gushikira abakeneye imfashanyo muri Tigray
column3: Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU rivuga ko rikeneye vyihuta gushikira abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu kangaratete muri Tigray mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe abana kw'isi, Unicef, rivuga ko amabarabara akwiye kwugururwa, indege zizana imfashanyo nazo zikarekurirwa kuzana imfashanyo za nkenerwa, muri iki gihe abana barenga 30.000 bageramiwe n'urupfu. Uwuserukira Unicef, Adele Khodr yabwiye BBC ati: "Turakeneye kandi ko hasubira kuba itumatumanako, umuyagankuba ukagarukanwa kandi tugashobora gushikira abantu bakeneye imfashanyo." Umutegetsi wo muri reta ku mugwa mukuru Addis Ababa yavuze ko abasirikare bashobora gusubira kwigarurira umugwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle, mu ndwi zitatu mu gihe vyoba ngombwa. Ico gisagara cafashwe n'abagwanyi ku musi wa mbere. Igisirikare kivuga ko cavuye muri ico gisagara kubera gikeneye kwitegurira ibindi bikigeramiye, kandi ko abagwanyi bo muri Tigray batakiri ikibazo.

column2: 338 barishwe muri Ethiopia mu ndyane z'amoko kuno kwezi
column3: Leta ya Ethiopia ivuga yuko abantu amajana atatu na mirongo itatu n'umunani bishwe mu ntango za kuno kwezi. Ni bwo bwicanyi bwa mbere bubi bushingiye ku moko butaheruka muri ico gihugu mu kiringo c'imyaka myinshi. Vyari vyavuzwe mbere yuko abantu bashika n'imiburiburi amajana abiri na mirongo itanu, bagizwe ahanini n'abo mu bwoko bw'aba-Amhara, biciwe mu gitero mu ntara ya Oromia. Umuvugizi wo mu biro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere yavuze yuko igipolisi kikiriko kirakora amatohoza. Leta yanse ivyasabwe - na ONU irimwo mu babisaba - vy'uko hakorwa itohoza ryigenga kuri ubwo bwicanyi. Umugwi witwaje ibirwanisho uzwi nka Oromia Liberation Army waragirijwe kugaba ico gitero ariko warabihakanye. Mu myaka ibiri iheze, iyindi ntara ya Tigrinya nayo yarabayemwo imirwano ikomeye hagati y'abarwanyi b'umuhari TPLF wo muri ako karere n'abasirikare ba leta. Naho ubu hasa n'ahari agahengwe, umutekano nturahagaruka neza kandi iyo mirwano yasizemwo ubuzima ibihumbi vy'abantu abandi benshi barahunga.

column2: Nigeria: Umupasitori atangisha 700$ kugira yereke abantu 'irembo ribashikana mw’ijuru’
column3: Umuvugabutumwa muri Nigeria ari mu yabira inyuma yo kubwira abantu ko azi irembo ribashikana mw'ijuru riri mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'ico gihugu, ariko ko kugira aribereke bategerezwa gutanga amafaranga. Pasitori Ade Abraham yarezwe mu gipolisi n'umwe mu banywanyi biwe avuga ko uyo mu pasitori yamutangishije 310.000 y'amanaira (amafaranga yo muri Nigeria), angana n'amadorari y'abanyamerika 750, kugira ngo bashobore kubona iryo rembo avuga ko riri mu gisagara ca Araromi-Ugbeshi, mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu muvugabutumwa yemereye BBC ko koko yabwiye abantu ivy'iryo rembo, akavuga ko ari "Imana akorera" yarimweretse mu ntumbero yo kuraba aho abanyashengero biwe bageza mu kwemera kwabo, ariko akavuga ko ata muntu n'umwe aramuha amafaranga. Ishirahamwe ry'Abakristu muri Nigeria ryasohoye itangazo ryikurako uyo mupasitori Ade Abraham, igipolisi co mu ntara ya Ekiti naco kikaba cegeranije inzandiko z'abanywanyi b'ishengero ryiwe, kikaba catanguye amatohoza. Ishengero rya Pasitori Ade Abraham ryahora rifise icicaro mu ntara ya Kogi, mu nyuma ryimukira mu ntara ya Kaduna, imbere y'uko ryimukira amaja mu bumanuko n'abanywanyi baryo, mw'ikambi yubatse mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu munyashengero yamureze ku gipolisi yaciye yisubirira muhira iwe i Kaduna kuva ico gihe, ariko umugore wiwe yaranse kumukurikira, akavuga ko "igihe c'umunezero" cari kigiye gushika vuba. Ariko uyu mugabo n'umugore badashaka ko amazina yabo amenyekana babwiye BBC ko babandanya bavugana kuri terefone umusi ku musi. Pasitori Ade, azwi kandi kw'izina rya Noah Abraham (Nowa Aburahamu), aherutse kwerekanwa mw'ireresi yazungurutse cane, aho yariko asaba abasenga Imana gutera akamo incuti zabo ziri mu mahanga gutanga intererano y'amafaranga mu rusengero rwiwe.

column2: OMS/WHO igabisha ko Africa ihanzwe n'igihuhusi kigira gatatu ca Covid
column3: Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO rigabisha ko Afrika iri hafi yo guhura n'igihuhusi kigira gatatu ca Covid-19, ko rero ari nkenerwa kwongereza incanco. Igitigiri c'abamaze kwandura iki kiza carenze imiriyoni zitanu mu gihe ibihugu bishika indwi vy'uwu mugabane ata ncanco bigifise. Umukuru wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Matshidiso Moeti, avuga ati: "Afrika irakeneye amamiriyoni yandi y'incanco muri kino gihe". Afrika y'Epfo, Maroc, Tunisia, Ethiopia na Misiri nivyo bihugu bifise abanduye benshi gusumba ibindi ku mugabane wose. Uganda na Namibia birahanzwe n'igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Covid kiriko kiriha inkumbi, aho buri musi gihitana abatari bake. OMS ivuga ko abantu 136.000 bamaze guhitanwa n'iki kiza mu bihugu bitandukanye vya Afrika. Ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus bwiswe Delta buramaze kwibonekeza mu bihugu 14, mu gihe ubundi nabwo bwiswe Beta bwatanguye kwibonekeza muri Afrika y'Epfo, bumaze kugera mu bihugu 25. OMS ivuga ko gushika ubu ata kirangamisi c'ingene izindi ncanco zizobonekera, ariko ko zikenewe mu buryo bwihutirwa.

column2: Coronavirus - Burundi: Leta imenyesha ko hari abandi 20 banduye
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu n'ukurwanya SIDA mu Burundi bumenyesha ko hari abantu 20 babonywe ko banduye umugera coronavirus. Mw'itangazo bwaraye busohoye, ubwo bushikiranganji bumenyesha ko abo 20 bari mu bantu 98 bapimwe uwo mugera kuva ku wa 01 gushika ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu. Ibi biharuro bishasha bitangajwe inyuma y'aho ishirahamwe OLUCOME rimenyeshereje amakenga yaryo ku bijanye n'amakuru ashikirizwa na leta y'u Burundi kuri mugera uriko urakora ibara kw'isi yose. Nk'uko vyama, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu ntibutanga umwidondoro w'abo bantu bashasha banduye iyi ndwara ya Covid-19. Iryo tangazo rimenyesha ko mu bari basanzwe bakirwaye iyo ndwara bashika 29, 12 muri bo bapimwe bagasanga barakize, kandi ko baronkejwe uruhusha rwo gusubira mu miryango yabo. Gushika ubu, ibiharuro vyerekana ko abantu 83 aribo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera; muri abo 45 bakaba bamaze gukira, nayo 37 bakaba ari bo bakirwaye, umwe akaba yaritavye Imana. Gushika ubu, nta ngingo zirafatwa na leta y'u Burundi mu ntumbero yo kuzibira ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera nk'uko vyagenze mu bindi bihugu vyo mu karere. Hari bamwe babona ko amakuru atangwa na leta ku vyerekeye iyo ndwara yoba atajanye n'ukuri ku kungene yifashe mu gihugu. Ishirahamwe ryigenga OLUCOME ryiyemeje kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'ubutunzi bwa leta, riherutse gusohora itangazo aho rinegura leta ko ititayeho uko bikwiye ikiza ca Covid-19. Olucome yibaza ko amakuru atangazwa ashobora kuba ari kure y'ukuri kw'ivyo Abarundi bibaza, ikanasaba leta y'u Burundi kureka kwizimagiza imbere y'iki kiza kiriko kiriha inkumbi kw'isi. Mu minsi iheze hari amakuru yakwiriye ku mbuga ntangamakuru ko hari bamwe mu bategetsi muri leta y'u Burundi boba baranduye iyi ndwara, ibihakanwa n'umuvugizi wa leta. Ayo makuru akaba yakwiragiye inyuma y'aho umutambukanyi w'umukuru w'igihugu, Denise Nkurunziza agiriye muri Kenya kuvurwa indwara itaramenyekana gushika ubu. Vyaravuzwe cane ko yagiye i Nairobi kwivuza uwu mugera, ariko ayo makuru akaba yarahakanywe n'umwe mu bakozi bo mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu BBC yabajije ariko atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana . Umugera wa coronavirus watanguye kumenyekana mu mpera z'umwaka uheze mu gisagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa, ubu ukaba ubarizwa kw'isi yose. Ku wa 31 z'ukwezi kwa gatatu niho leta y'u Burundi yatangaza umuntu wa mbere yanduye uwo mugera.

column2: UK mw'itohoza kw'ishure ryapfiriyeko abana batewe imiti ifise imigera, harimwo n'uwa SIDA
column3: Abajejwe amatohoza batanguye kwumviriza abahoze ari abanyeshure kw'ishure ry'abamugaye mu Bwongereza inyuma y'aho abana barenga 120 kuri iryo shure bapfiriye mu ciswe ikiza kitari bwigere kibaho muri kahise k'ikigo kijejwe ivy'amagara mu gihugu (NHS). Kuva mu 1974 gushika 1987, abo bana baravuwe indwara yitwa haemophilia kw'ishure ryisumbuye rya Treloar's College. N'imiburiburi abana 72 barapfuye batewe umuti urimwo imigera ya SIDA n'indwara y'igitigu(canke umwijima mu Kinyarwanda). Imbere y'uko yumvirizwa, Richard Warwick yahoze yiga kw'iryo shure riri mu karere ka Hampshire mu mpera z'imyaka ya za 70, mu nyuma akaba yagiye gupimwa agasanga yaranduye SIDA, yabwiye BBC ati: "Twaraburiye abagenzi benshi kw'ishure rya Treloar kandi ni ibintu vy'incamugongo". Iri tohoza ry'ingene hakoreshejwe amaraso yanduye ryatanguye ku wa mbere igihe humvirizwa abantu bafitaniye isano n'iryo shure. Uwahoze arirongoye, Alec Macpherson,  ni umwe mu bategerezwa kwisigura. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Vyarateye agahinda kenshi n'umujinya mwinshi abo bahungu". "Vyabashizemwo uburakari - kubera iki jewe, kubera iki ibi vyambayeko, kubera iki nafashwe n'iyi ndwara iteye ubwoba?" Lord Mayor's Treloar's College ryari ishure ry'indaro ry'abana bafise ubumuga bw'umubiri rikaba ryari rifise ikigo kidasanzwe cegukira NHS, catwarwa n'umurwi w'abaganga b'abahinga. Hagati mu myaka ya 1970, umuti mushasha wo kuvura haemophilia wari uzwi nkafactor VIII/IX, warabonetse ubwa mbere. Uwu muti washobora gufasha abo bose bari bafise ibibazo vyo mu maraso kubaho mu buzima busanzwe ata ngorane yo kuvirirana. NHS nta plasma y'amaraso ikwiye yari ifise kugira ngo ishobore guhingura uwo muti, bikaba vyari ngombwa ko iyigura mu mahanga, cane cane muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Amaraso menshi yaguzwe yari yandujwe imigera y'igitigu (hépatite/hepatitis) co mu bwoko bwa A, B na C, mu nyuma asangwamwo umugera wa SIDA, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abafise iyi ndwara ya haemophilia mu gihugu cose bakaba barandujwe iyi migera. Ade Goodyear yinjiiye kw'iryo shure rya Treloar mu 1980 afise imyaka 10. Avuga ko ubuzima bwari "buryoshe cane" kubera abigisha, abaforoma n'abagenzi bamwitaho cane. Kumwe n'abandi banyeshure batari bake kw'iryo shuri, na we yahawe umuti factor VIII kugira ngo umugabanirize kuvirirana. Ati: "Ntewe urushinge rwa mbere gusa, naciye nandura igitigu baca banshira ukwa jenyene mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri". Mu 1985 yajanywe mu biro bitoya ari kumwe n'umurwi w'abanyeshure maze abwirwa ko yanduye umugera wa SIDA - umugera wari uherutse gutorwa ico gihe, ata muti wariho kandi wica ningoga. Ati: "Muganga yarashavuye adutuma urutoke avuga ati, urawufise, hanyuma ati ntawo ufise. Naciye nsubira mw'ishure isaha indwi n'iminota 50 [13h50]. Nta n'uko naruhutse ku mutaga". "Umwe mu bagenzi yafashe agakono k'amashurwe akamena ku ruhome rw'inyubakwa y'ikigo ca haemophilia. Wari umusi mwiza, mu ci, ndibuka ukuntu naharura imisi y'akazuba nari ngiye kumara". Bakuru ba Ade babiri bahavuye bapfa inyuma yo guterwa umuti factor VIII - Jason yahitanywe na SIDA mu 1997, Gary nawe apfa mu 2015 kubera ibibazo bijanye n'igitigu co mu bwoko bwa C (hépatite C). Ku bana nka Ade na Richard, vyasigura kubaho mu buzima buteye isoni kuba wanduye iyo ndwara itari izwi cane. Abamenyeshamakuru bakora mu binyamakuru bitandukanye barihereranije abanyeshure hanze y'ishuri, bose baguma babaza ibibazo ku bijanye n'uko boba baranduye SIDA. 32 kuri 122 bari bafise indwara ya haemophilia bize kuri iryo shure kuva mu 1974 gushika 1987 baracariho uno musi. Abandi hafi bose barafuye banduye umugera wa SIDA canke hépatite C. Abantu barizeye ko iri tohoza ririko rirakorwa rizoshobora gutanga inyishu ku bibazo vyibazwa ku bijanye n'ivyabaye kw'iryo shure rya Treloar no kuri ico kigo co kuvura iyi ndwara ya  haemophilia cegukira NHS. Imiryango yaburiye kuri iryo shure ishaka kumenya igituma itamenyeshejwe izi ngorane zashobora guterwa n'umuti factor VIII imbere y'igihe hamwe n'igituma vyafashe imyaka myinshi imbere y'uko babanza guteka iyi miti kugira ngo bice imigera yarimwo. Stephen Nicholls yahoze yiga kw'iryo shuri akandura hépatite C inyuma yo guterwa uwo muti avuga ati: "Ivyabereye kw'iryo shuri vyama bigaruka kuduhahamura imisi yose gushika ubu". "Ntituzigera twibagira namba ivyabaye kw'iryo shure rya Treloar n'ivyatubayeko vyose". Ni indwara idakunze kuboneka cane, aho amaraso adatembera neza. Akenshi ikunze gufata abagabo. Abantu bafise iyi ngorane ntibaronka indemamubiri (protéines) zitwa factor VIII na  IX zituma amaraso atembera neza. Muri ino ndwi, abahoze biga kw'iryo shure hamwe n'abavyeyi bahaburiye abana babo bariko batanga ivyemezo. Ikigo co kuvura haemophilia kuri iryo shure cari kirongowe n'abaganga hamwe n'abaforoma begukira NHS, ntibari abakozi begukira iryo shure n'ubu rikibandanya ryakira abana bafise ubumuga gushika ubu. Iri shure ryasohoye itangazo aho rivuga riti: "N'aho gushika ubu ata n'umwe aravuga ko ishure rya Treloar rifise amakosa, ni ikintu kibabaje cane muri kahise kacu". "Carabaye, kandi n'ubu kiracari igihe kibabaje cane ku banyeshure bahoze biga ng'aha, imiryango yabo n'abakozi b'ico gihe". "Turashigikiye cane iri sekeza kugira aba banyeshure bahoze biga hano bamenye ukuri, baronke inyishu ku bibazo vyabo bongere batunganirizwe".

column2: Umwamkazi Elizabeth: Abaganwa William na Harry bahujwe n’urupfu rwa inakuru wabo
column3: Abandika amakuru bashobora kuba bariko bibaza ibintu vyinshi bokwandika ku bijanye “n’aba bantu bavukana bankana urunuka” canke “abavukana bahuriye mu mubabaro”. Kuba abantu babonye abaganwa bavukana, William na Harry, baramukanya n’isinzi ry’abantu bari kumwe kizoba ikintu ntibagirwa kandi kitari citezwe muri ino misi y’umubabaro. Bari kumwe n’abagore babo, Catherine na Meghan, baramukanije n’abantu i Windsor, mu buryo butari bwitezwe mu ndwi iheze, igihe aba basamuragwa basubira mu Bwongereza. Ico gihe havugwa indyane n’ukudacana uwaka hagati y’imiryango ya William na Harry . Bavugwa ko bari mu nzu zegeranye i Windsor, ariko imitima yabo iri kure na kure. Iyi miryango ntiyari bwigere ibonwa iri kumwe ku mugaragaro mu kiringo kirenga imyaka ibiri. Ibi vyose vyagiye guhinduka ku wa kane. Nimba William na Harry ata mugambi wo kubonana bari bafise, bisanze bahuriye hamwe mu buryo ata muntu n’umwe yari avyiteze. Bisa n’uko hari haciye igihe kirekire, ariko inyuma y’aho Umwamikazi, inakuru wabo, vyankiye, igihugu cose kiriko kibaza amakuru y’amagara yiwe, aba bavukanyi vyabaye ngombwa ko bompi bafata ingendo bakaja i Balmoral aho yari arwariye. Imiryango irashobora gucanamwo mu bihe vy’umubabaro. Ivyiyumviro bikaba vyinshi kandi bigahakwa no kuja ahabona. Biroroshe ko impari za kera zivyurwa n’umubabaro. Ariko kandi kubura umukunzi gushobora kugarukana umwumvikano, mukararabira hamwe ibintu hanyuma mugashira ku ruhande ibibatandukanya. Gishobora kuba igihe ciza co gusubirana. Nivyo, ku muntu atabizi, nta n’umwe yomenya ivy’ari vyo akurikiranye imboneshakure yonyene. Mbega uku kwari ukwiyerekana gusa? Boba bari babwiwe ko bategerezwa kunyegeza ibibatandukanya hanyuma bakerekana ubutumwa bwiza? Ibintu ntibigiye kworoha ariko bizoguma hagati y’aba bavukayi.  William na Harry bari bamaze kuba mu bihe bigoye cane bakiri abana, igihe nyina wabo, Umuganwakazi Diana apfa ahitanywe n’isanganya mu 1997. Ku banyagihugu bari babirindiranye igishika, mu ntumbero yo kwerekana ko bifatanije umubabaro n’umuryango w’ibwami, bararyohewe cane babonye William na Catherine, Harry na Meghan, baseruka bari kumwe. N’imiburiburi mu kiringo c’iminota mikeya, ibi bihangange bine vy’ibwami vyarasubiranye. Barifatanije n’abanyagihugu. Nk’uko amakuru ava ibwami abivuga, Umuganwa William niwe yasavye Umuganwa Harry na Meghan ko bojana muri uru rugendo. Nivyo ko iki gihe bagiye hamwe, ariko nta nkeka ko ari kandi igihe co kutumvikana gukomeye. Aba bavukanyi bari hafi yo gufata inzira zitandukanye. Igihe Umwamikazi asandavye, William yaciye aba samuragwa w’ingoma. Azotegerezwa kumenya neza igikorwa kimurindiriye. Ari ku rwego rushasha kandi rukomeye gusumba murumunawe. William ubu ni Umuganwa wa Wales, izina bompi, gushika ejo bakoresha mu guhamagara se wabo. Igihe ingoma y’Umwami Charles III itangazwa ejo ku wa gatandatu, William yari ahagaze neza inyuma y’umwami mushasha, ari we se wabo. Bisa n’uko Umwami hamwe na Camilla, uyu nawe ubu akaba ari Umutambukanyi w’Umwami, hamwe na William na Catherine, ari bo bagiye kuba inkingi y’ingoma. Aba bantu bane nibo bari bakunze kuboneka bari kumwe igihe Charles yaserukira nyina wiwe. Umuganwa Harry wewe yafashe inzira itandukanye, aho we na Meghan n’umuryango wiwe bibera muri California  mu vyabo. Bategerezwa gutangura ubuzima bwabo inyuma y’aho bavavanuriye n’ubuzima bw’ibwami, bakaba batakiri kumwe n’umuryango w’i bwami. Baravugwa cane mu banyagihugu, ariko atari neza igihe cose, bikaba bisa n’uko ibinyamakuru bibakorerako cane.

column2: Umuti wa mbere wa SIDA uterwa mu rushinge ukamara igihe kirekire wemejwe
column3: Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barwaye umugera wa SIDA bagiye guhabwa umuti uterwa mu rushinge ukamara igihe kirekire, maze bagahagarika vya binini bama bafata buri musi. Abagiraneza bishimiye cane uyu muti mushasha wemejwe n'ikigo kijejwe ubuvuzi mu Bwongereza NHS. Uyu muti utuma umugera ugabanya inguvu, ukaba ukora co kimwe na vya binini vyo gupfupfahaza bisanzwe bifatwa buri musi. Vyitezwe ko mu Bwongereza abantu bababa 13.000 bashobora guca bahindukirira uyu muti. Imiti Cabotegravir (uzwi kandi kw'izina rya Vocabria ukaba wahinguwe n'ikigo ViiV Healthcare) hamwe na rilpivirine (uwu nawo ukaba uzwi kandi nka Rekambys wahinguwe na Janssen) ni imiti iterwa incuro zibiri rumwe rumwe ukwarwo rimwe mu mezi abiri. Hagati aho, uwu muti ugirira akamaro gusa barya bantu bageze ku rugero rw'aho umugera utakiboneka mu maraso inyuma y'igihe bariko barafata vya binini. Abahinga bavuga ko uwu muti ushobora kugirira akamaro abantu benshi. Umwigisha wa kaminuza Chloe Orkin, akaba ari umuhinga mu bijanye n'umugera wa SIDA kuri kaminuza ya Queen Mary i Londres/London, avuga ko uwu muti ushobora kugabaniriza abarwayi umuzigo wo kwama bafata vya binini buri musi, kuko wowo bazowuterwa incuro zitandatu gusa mu mwaka. Muganga Sanjay Bhagani, arongoye ishirahamwe European Aids Clinical Society, avuga ati: "Iki ni ikintu gikomeye cane". "Kunenwa ni ikibazo gikomeye cane ku banduye umugera wa SIDA, kandi abatari bake ntiboroherwa no gufata ibinini imisi yose. Ibi rero bizotuma abenshi baronswa uwu muti uterwa mu rushinge". Alex Sparrowhawk w'i Manchester, asanzwe akora mw'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya SIDA rizwi nka Terrence Higgins Trust. Haciye imyaka 12 yanduye umugera wa SIDA, kuva ico gihe akaba ari ku binini vya  ART imisi yose. Avuga ko ari ikintu kiryoheye ugutwi kwumva ko hari uwundi muti ushobora kugabanya uwu muzigo. "Iyi nkuru ni ikintu abantu benshi bari bamaze igihe kirekire barindiranye igishika. "Iciyumviro co guterwa umuti incuro zitandatu gusa mu mwaka hagufata imiti ya misi yose ni ikintu gishimishije cane. Kwibuka ko wama ufata imiti ya SIDA  buri musi vyama bwikwibutsa ko urwaye SIDA  kandi ntibishobora kukuvamwo. "Hari abantu bashobora kuba babana n'abandi batazi ko banduye canke batanduye umugera, canke usanga bakora mu buzi bubatuma bazunguruka irya n;ino kw'isi, ibi bigashobora kuba inzitizi ku kwama umuntu afata imiti imisi yose". Kubw'iwe, abakwiye gushirwa imbere mu kuronswa uwu muti ni abo bose bawukeneye cane gusumba abandi, nk'akarorero abasanzwe bahura n'ikibazo co kunenwa.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya ku wa mbere itariki 05.04.2021: Neymar, Mbappe, Haaland, Messi, Rice, Soucek
column3: Umukinyi w'imbere wa Brezil Neymar, 29, yagiriraniye amasezerano na Paris St-Germain gushika mu 2026 - ubu uwo mugwi wo mu Bufaransa ukaba uriko urita ku rutare mu kugiriranira amasezerano nkayo n'umukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 22.  (Telefoot, via AS). Umukinyi w'imbere wa Borussia Dortmund, Erling Braut Haaland ashobora gutwara uwo mugwi amapawundi imiliyoni 34 kubera uwumuhagarariye Mino Raiola na se wiwe Alf-Inge bakeneye amapawundi imiliyoni 20 za komisiyo ku masezerano yiwe. (RAC1, via Marca) Mu masezerano ya Haaland azorangira muri uyu mwaka, harimwo ko ashobora kuja mu wundi mugwi ku mapawundi imiliyoni 64, ariko ashobora kuva muri uwo mugwi mw'ici riza mu gihe Dortmund itobandanya kuvyifatamwo neza mu nkino za Bundesliga, ntimaje no mu gikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo.  (Sun). Hari urukurukuru rwavuga ko Haaland, 20, ashobora kuja muri Barcelone, ariko umumenyereza w'uwo mugwi Ronald Koeman yavuze ko ingingo iyo ari yo yose yerekeye kugura abakinyi itegerezwa gufatwa na prezida Joan Laporta. (AS). Lionel Messi arindiriye kuraba imigambi ya Laporta ku mugwi Barcelone imbere y'uko afata ingingo yo kuguma muri uwo mugwi canke kuja muri PSG canke Manchester City. (Mundo Deportivo-in Spanish) Angel di Maria yavuze ko yonezerwa akinanye na Messi mu mugwi wa PSG mu gihe uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 33 yoba avuye muri Barcelone. (beIN Sports,via Goal). Umumenyereza wa Leicester, Brendan Rodgers, afise icizere co gusinyisha umukinyi wo hagati Mskoti Callum McGregor,27, wo mu mugwi wa Celtic. (Sun). Umumenyereza wa West Ham, David Moyes, yavuze ko uwo mugwi uzotega amatwi abashaka kugura abakinyi Declan Rice,22, hamwe n'umukinyi wo hagati  Tomas Soucek,26, mw'ici riza. (Mirror Manchester United na Juventus n'imigwi yerekana ko yipfuza cane kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Barcelone umufaransa Ousmane Dembele, 23, ariko Liverpool na PSG na bo baguma bamukurikiranira hagufi. (Mundo Deportivo-in Spanish). Umukinyi wa Espagne ucas Vazquez,29, amasezerano afitaniye na Real Madrid agiye kurangira muri uyu mwaka, ashobora kwerekeza mu migwi ya Manchester United, Chelsea, AC Milan na Bayern Munich.  (ABC-in Spanish) Juventus nta bushobozi bafise bwo kuriha amapawundi imiliyoni 8.5 umugwi wa Athletico Madrid mu ntumbero yo kwongerereza amasezerano umukinyi w'imbere wa Espagne Alvaro Morata y'uwundi mwaka umwe kubera ikibazo c'ubukene bw'amahera. (AS) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Everton na Colombia, Yerry Mina, 26, ashaka kwungururiza mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Butaliyano mw'ici riza, aho imigwi ya Inter Milan na Fiorentina imwipfuza cane. (Sun) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Ole Gunnar Solskjaer yavuze ko umukinyi w'imbere wa Argentine Sergio Aguero, 32, adashobora kuza muri uwo mugwi inyuma yo kurangiza ikiringo ciwe mu bakeba babo ba Manchester City muri uyu mwaka. (Goal)

column2: Umuntu agira kabiri vyemejwe ko yahitanywe na Ebola muri DRC
column3: Umurwayi agira kabiri yahitanywe na Ebola muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo nyuma yaho ikiza gishasha cadukiye mu muji wa Mbandaka, mu ntara ya Equateur. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, ryavuze yuko uwo muntu wa kabiri ari umugore wo mu muryango w'uwapfuye ubwa mbere. Mu kiganiro kuri telefone, Dr Gervais Folefack yabwiye BBC ko "vyari bigoye kugira umugwi w'abajejwe kurwanya ico kiza ushobore kumenya iyo yagiye kuko yawutorotse akaja mu masengesho". Yongeyeko ati "igihe uwo mugwi washikira uwo mugore, amazi yari yamaze kurenga inkombe. Yacikanye atararonswa ubuvuzi na bumwe. Abo bose uko ari babiri bapfubwe hisunzwe amategeko yo kwirinda". Kuwa mbere abajejwe ivy'amagara bavuze yuko abantu barenga 100 bamaze kumenyekana ko bashobora kuba barahuye n'abo bahitanywe na Ebola, hakaba hitezwe ko urucanco rutangwa muri ino ndwi. Kongo iramaze kubonekamwo ibiza vya Ebola 13, harimwo kimwe caheze mu myaka ibiri iheruka, kikaba carahitanye abantu barenga 2000. Ibipimo vyasuzumwe mu kigo gikuri gipima indwara i Kinshasa vyerekana yuko iki kiza gishasha ataho gihuriye n'ivyakibanjirije. Amatohoza arabandanya yo kumenya aho iki kiza coba carazananye. Inkingo 1.300 zirategekanywa kurungikwa i Mbandaka zivuye i Goma mu buseruko bw'igihugu, gukingira bice bitangura kuwa gatatu.

column2: France bari kwibaza abashaka gutyoza Pfizer
column3: Benshi mu  bantu bafise ababakurikira benshi ku mbuga hwaniro mu Bufaransa bavuga ko baronse ubutumwa batazi  uwaburungitse bwo kubemerera amafaranga kugira bavuge nabi urucanco rwa Pfizer. Bavuga ko ikigo kivuga ko gikorera mu Bwongereza cabarondeye kuri email (uburyo bwo kurungika ikete kuri internet)  kibasaba ko "bokorana". Léo Grasset afise abamukurikira kuri You Tube miriyoni 1,17 yanditse kuri twitter ko "hemewe amafaranga menshi" n'umukiriya "yashatse ko umwidondoro wiwe utamenyekana". Yavuze ko imyidondoro yo  kuri Linkln y'abiyita ko ari abakozi baco yari yashoboye kubona mu nyuma yanyitse , ariko yari yamaze kubona ko ''bose bakoze mu Burusiya". Léo Grasset yashize ku rubuga ivyo avuga ko ari ingingo  zo gukurikiza z'ico kigo , zamusaba kudakoresha amajambo nko "kwamamaza" canke "video yarishwe" hamwe yokwemera ko bakorana. Email yamubwira ngo: "Uzokwerekane ko ari  ingene wewe nyene ubona ibintu". Canamusaba gukwiragiza mu bamukurukira ku  mbuga hwaniro icemezo c'ububeshi ko  urugero rwo gupfa mu bantu baba batewe urucanco rwa Pfizer ruhakwa gusumba incuro zitatu ababa batewe urwa AstraZeneca. Ibigo n'bandi bantu benshi bafise ababakurikira benshi ku mbuga hwaniro mu Bufaransa, bose bari mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu n'ubuhanga (science), bavuze ko nabo baronse ubutumwa nk'ubwo. Et Ça Se Dit Médecin, yimenyereza mu bitaro akaba afise abamukurikira 85.000 kuri Instagram, yabwiye television yo mu Bufaransa BFMTV ko yemerewe ama Euros 2.050 (miriyoni hafi 5 z'amafaranga y'Uburundi) kugira ashire inkuru y'ama sekunda 30 ku rubuga rwiwe. Hagati aho umushikiranganji w'Ubufaransa ajejwe amagara Olivier Véran yabwiye BFMTV ati: "Ivyo bintu sinzi iyo bizanana, ko ari mu Bufaransa canke hanze. "Birababaje, birabangamye, uwubikora ntaco anezwe kandi ntibishobora gukora." Urucanco rwa Pfizer ruterwa incuro zibiri (izina ryose ni Pfizer-BioNtech) nirwo rukoreshwa cane mu Bufaransa. Rukorwa n'ikompanyi za  Pfizer muri Amerika na BioNTech mu Budagi. AstraZeneca, narwo ruterwa kabiri kandi rukoreshwa mu Bufaransa, rwo rukorwa n'ihinguriro ry'imiti i ry'Ubwongereza na Suede. Mu kwezi kwa kane, icegeranyo c'ishirahamwe rya Buraya cavuze ko ibinyamakuru vyegamiye reta mu Busiya no mu Bushinwa bigerageza kubiba mu bantu kwinuba incanco za Covid zikorerwa mu bihugu vya Buraya - ikirego Uburusiya bwahakanye.

column2: Aurlus Mabele: Rurangiranwa mu muziki wa Congo (Brazzaville) 'yahitanywe na coronavirus'
column3: Umunyamuzika rurangiranwa wo muri Kongo (Brazzaville) Aurlus Mabele yaguye mu bitaro ku murwa mukuru w'Ubufaransa, Paris, afise imyaka 67. Ubutumwa bwashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro n'abagenzi hamwe n'umuryango wiwe buvuga ko yahitanywe na coronavirus ariko ibi ntibiremezwa. Abafana biwe bamwita umwami wa soukous - umuziki w'umudiho unyaruka wo muri Kongo ukundwa hose muri Afrika. Umukobwa wiwe, umuririmvyi w'umufaransakazi Liza Monet, yanditse ubutumwa kuri twitter kuwa kane avuga ko se yahitanywe na coronavirus. Yanditse ati "nishwe n'amarira." Uwari mu mugwi umwe nawe wa Loketo, Mav Cacharel, nawe yanditse kuri Facebook ko yahitanywe na coronavirus. Umutunganya-bikorwa wiwe (manager), Kimmy Ouetenou, ariko yabariye BBC Afrique ko  bitaremezwa ko yahitanywe na coronavirus kandi ko yari afise ibibazo vy'amagara amaranye igihe. Yinjijwe ibitaro ejo kuwa kane aca acikana uwo munsi nyene. Mabele, azina ryiwe ry'ukuri ari Aurélien Miatshonama, yavukiye Brazaville aca yimukira mu Bufaransa mu myaka y'1980. Indirimbo ziwe zakunzwe zirimwo iyitwa Embargo. Bwana Ouetenou yavuze ko batanguye kuganira na leta ya Kongo kugira barabye ko yoshingurwa mu gihugu ciwe. Hagati aho, isandugu yiwe izoshirwa mu kibanza izobikwamwo gushika ingendo zahagaritswe kubera coronavirus zisubiriye, nk'uko bivugwa na Rose-Marie Bouboutou wa BBC Afrique. Mabele yashikanye injana ya soukous kw'isi yose Vyashikirijwe na Gaïus Kowene, BBC News, Kinshasa Akoresheje izina ryiwe Aurélien Miatshonama, Mabele yashinze umugwi Les Ndimbola Loketo ari kumwe n'abagenzi biwe i Brazaville basohora zimwe mu ndirimbo zakunzwe cane muri Afrika mu myaka 1970, nk'indirimbo Embargo, Zebola na Waka Waka. Mu nyuma, yaje kwimukira i Paris aho yashinze uwundi mugwi, Loketo, bisigura amafyinga mw'ilingala - ururima bakoresha kenshi mu ndirimbo za soukous, rukanavugwa cane mu burengero bwa Kongo-Kinsasa na Kongo-Brazzaville. Mu gihe yagurishije inkurikirane z'indirimbo (albums) zirenga imiriyoni 10 mu mwuga yari amazemwo imyaka irenga 30, Aurlus Mabele yashikanye soukous hanze y'imbibe za Afrika, ayishikana kure kw'isi.

column2: USA: Imyiyerekano muri Wisconsin irabandanya inyuma y'aho abapolisi barashe umwirabure
column3: Mu ntara ya Wisconsin muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika hadutse imyiyerekano inyuma y'aho igipolisi kirasiye amasasu menshi umwirabure. Uyo mugabo yarashwe azwi kw'izina rya Jacob Blake, araremvye aho ariko aravurirwa. Ireresi yerekanywe ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana bwana Blake ariko araraswa amasasu mu mugongo igihe yariko agerageza kwinjira mu modoka mu gisagara ca Kenosha. Abategetsi b'ico gisagara bamenyesha ko haciye hafatwa ingingo zo kuguma muhira mu masaha y'ijoro kubera imyiyerekano yadutse inyuma y'ako kabi. Abantu baharurwa mu majana mw'ijoro ryakeye bugarije ibiro vy'igipolisi. Amamodoka yaturiwe mu gihe abari mu myiyerekano nabo bumvikana bakoma induru bavuga bati: "Ntidushobora gusubira inyuma". Mw'itangazo ryo kugabisha abanyagihugu, igipolisi gisaba abacuruza bakora amasaha 24 kuraba ingene bokwugara kubera hashobora kuba ubusuma bukorwa n'abitwaje ibirwanisho. Abapolisi bakoresheje vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi mu kugerageza gushwiragiza amajana n'amajana y'abari mu myiyerekano barenze ku mategeko yo kutava muhira gushika isaha imwe z'igitondo uno munsi ku wa mbere. Buramatari w'intara ya Wisconsin Tony Evers ariyamiriza iraswa rya bwana Brake avugwa ko ata kirwanisho yari afise. Mw'itangazo yasohoye yavuze ati: "N'aho tutararonka amakuru arambuye ku vyabaye, ico tuzi neza ni uko atari umwirabure wa mbere arashwe canke akomerekejwe canke yishwe bunyamaswa kandi ari mu minwe y'abajejwe umutekano mu ntara yacu canke mu gihugu cacu". "Turiyamirije ikoreshwa ry'inguvu z'umurengera rituma ibintu biyangara iyo habaye ikibazo ku birabure wa Wisconsin". Izina rya Jacob Blake ryazungurutse cane ku mbuga hwaniro maze abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi batera igikumu ku rwandiko rusaba ko abapolisi bakoze iryo shano bashirwa imbere y'ubutungane. Igipolisi co mu gisagara ca Kenosha kimenyesha ko "umupolisi yarashe" inyuma y'isaha cumi n'imwe zo ku mugoroba ejo ku wa Mungu. Kivuga kandi ko abapolisi baciye banyarukana Bwana Blake kwa muganga mu gisagara ca Milwaukee. Nta nsiguro catanze ku vyatumye uyo mwirabure araswa. Igisata kijejwe ubutungane mu ntara ya Wisconsin kiriko kirakora amatohoza. Kimenyesha ko abapolisi bakoze ivyo baciye bategekwa kuja mu karuhuko k'igihano. Mw'ireresi yahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro, abapolisi batatu baboneka barabishije iminwa y'inkoho zabo kuri bwana Blake mu gihe yariko aja ku mudoka yiwe. Mu gihe yari yuguruye umuryango agaca yegamira ku modoka, umupolisi umwe aboneka amufashe ishati kandi ariko aramurasa. Iyo reresi yerekana ko harashwe amasasu indwi, mu gihe abari ng'aho bariko bakoma induru. Abapolisi bakoze ivyo ntibamenyekanye amazina. Ben Crump, umunyamategeko aharanira ubutungane kuri bose, yabwiye tereviziyo CNN ko abana b'abahungu batatu ba bwana Blake bari mu modoka igihe yari agiye kwinjiramwo igihe yaraswa. Yanditse ku rubuga rwiwe rwa twitter ati: "Bariboneye ingene umupolisi yarashe se wabo. Ivyo bizobahahamura ubuzima bwabo bwose. Ntidushobora kwemera ko abapolisi bahonyanga amabanga yabo bajejwe yo KUDUKINGIRA". Avuga ko bwana Blake yarashwe igihe yari ahejeje kubanguranya abariko bararwana. Eka n'ababonye ivyabaye babwiye ikinyamakuru ngurukanabumenyi Kenosha News ko Blake yari ahejeje kubanguranya abagore babiri bariko bararwana imbere y'uko igipolisi gishika. Ibi bibaye mu gihe habandanya imishamirano ikomeye muri Amerika ivuye ku bugome bw'igipolisi inyuma y'iyicwa ry'umwirabure George Floyd mu kwa gatanu. Urupfu rwiwe rwatumye haduka imyiyerekano ikomeye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika no mu zindi mpande z'isi,  mw'isekeza ryiswe Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'umwirabure ni kirumara).

column2: Abarongozi ba EAC bahuriye Nairobi ngo bige ku kibazo ca DR Congo
column3: Umukuru w’igihugu ca Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta yatumyeko inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu bigize ishirahamwe rya Afrika y’Ubuseruko (EAC) kuri uno wa mbere kugira bavugane ku kibazo c’amahoro n’umutekano  muri Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo (DRC), nk’uko biri mw’itangazo rya reta. Uhuru, ari nawe arongoye ishirahamwe EAC ku wa gatatu yasavye ko horungikwa umurwi w’ingabo za EAC guhagarika imigumuko irangwa mu buseruko bw’iki gihugu giherutse kwinjira muri iri shirahamwe. Hagati aho, DR Congo ntishaka kwumva ko Urwanda ruri mu bagize izi ngabo, ikaba mbere yarahagaritse imigenderanire na Kigali. Iki gihugu cagiriza Urwanda ko rufasha umuhari w’inyeshamba M23 ziherutse kwigarurira igisagara ca Bunagana kiri ku rubibe. Urwanda Ruhakana ivyo rwagirizwa. Mw’itangazo yasohoye, Pereziza Felix Tshisekedi yagiriza Uwanda ko rurondera kwigarurira igihugu ciwe kugira ngo rwiyimbire ubutare, mbere akaba yasavye Ubwongereza gutera igitsure Kigali kugira ngo ihagarike agasotoro kayo. Mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, icuka kibi hagati y’ibi bihugu carunyutse, mbere haraduka n’imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza Urwanda i Kinshasa no mu buseruko bwa Congo. Haciye imisi ibiri, umusirikare wa Congo yarugururiye umucanwa ku bajejwe umutekano b’Urwanda ku rubibe rwa Bukavu, akomeretsa abapolisi babiri. Kenya niyo ihagarariye ikongera ikaba n’umuhuza mu biganiro hagati ya reta ya Congo n’imihari y’inyeshamba itandukanye. Hagati aho, ibi biganiro ntaco birashikako.

column2: Chris Brown yagirijwe ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca amusambanya ku nguvu mu bwato
column3: Chris Brown yagirizwa ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca aramusambanya ku nguvu, ubu akaba ariko mu rubanza rushobora kumutwara imiriyoni 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Iki caha co gufata ku nguvu kivugwa ko cabereye mu bwato (yacht) ku wa 30 kigarama (ukwa cumi na kabiri) 2020 i Miami mu ntara ya Florida. Ikiganiro Newsbeat ca Radio 1 cagerageje kuvugana n'abaserukira Chris Brown kugira ngo bagire ico bavuze ariko gushika ubu ntaco barishura. Chris Brown asa n'uwishuye aciye ku rubuga rwa Instagram, aho avuga ko ariko arakurikiranwa kubera ariko ategura gusohora umuziki. Yanditse ati: "NDIBAZA KO ARI IVYO MUBONA MWESE....ni igihe cose ngiye gusohora umuziki canke mfise imigambi kanaka". Uru rubanza rwugurujwe n'umunyamuziki atashatse kumenyekana, azwi gusa kw'izina rya 'Jane Doe' mu nzandiko z'amategeko. Izi nyandiko zerekana ibirego bitanu bitandukanye kuri uyu munyamuziki - gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina, guturubika n'ibigirankana, guturubika umuntu kubera urwangara hamwe no gupfunga umuntu atabifitiye uburenganzira kandi amuturubitse. Uyu mugore avuga ko afise "ubwoba ko ashobora kwicwa canke gutakaza akazi" . Avuga ko yahawe ubutumire muri ubwo bwato bwegukira umunyamuziki wo mu mudiho wa rap (rapper) akongera kaba n'umu 'producer',  Diddy, ari naho habereye iki caha kivugwa. Nk'uko uru rwandiko Newsbeat yashoboye kubona rubivuga, uyu mugore avuga ko amaze gushika, Brown  yamuhaye ikinyobwa mu nyuma aca yumva "umubiri urahindutse giturumbuka mu buryo atashobora gusigura". Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko "yataye umutwe, inguvu ziramuherana, aca afatwa n'itiro", imbere y'uko atwarwa mu gitanda ariho bivugwa ko Brown yaciye amwambura impuzu amusambanya ku nguvu. Brown avugwa ko ku musi wakurikiye yahamagaye uyo mugore, amubwira ko yofata imiti kugira ntasame imbanyi. Newsbeat kandi yagerageje no kuvugana n'abaserukizi ba Diddy, ariko nta nyishu baratanga.

column2: Perezida Nkurunziza w'u Burundi hari ivyo asaba amadini kwirinda, rimwe rivuga ko 'rizovuga ukuri'
column3: Perezida Petero Nkurunziza w'Uburundi asaba abarongoye amadini ko bokwirinda kugwa mu mutego muri kino gihe u Burundi buriko bwitegurira amatora yo mu mwaka uza wa 2020. Amwe mu madini nka Ekleziya Katolika yoyo ivuga ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije yibuka imyaka ine amaze atowe n'abanyagihugu ubwabo ku ncuro ya kabiri, Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ko bokwirinda "kugwa mu mutego w'abahanuzi b'ibinyoma n'inyigisho zikomoka hanze" avuga ko zitajanye n'ivy'Imana. Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ati: "Si ivy'imbeshere, bamwe mu bakozi b'Imana baraguye, abandi barakomereka bongera bakomeretsa abayoboke babo; babera umuzimagiza abo bajejwe aho kubabera urumuri n'icitegererezo". Ntadoma urutoke kw'idini iri canke ririya, gusa Ekleziya Katolika ni yo ikunze kwagirizwa ko yivanga mu vya politike. Bavuga ko ibi ibikora cane cane mu gihe ishikiriza aho ihagaze ku biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu mu butumwa bukunda gusomwa mu masengero yose ya Katolika mu gihugu. Abasenyeri ba Katolika bobo bamenyesha ko ata nyigisho za politike batanga, ahubwo ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo "kuko iyobokamana rirangukira mu buzima bw'abantu". Mu ndwi iheze, mu birori vy'uguhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Assomption, Pascal Nyabenda arongoye inama nshingamateka, yasavye abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika kuguma hagati na hagati, ntiberekane aho bahagaze mu vya politike kuko ngo bitsitaza abakirisu. Mu kumwishura, Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, Yohakimu Ntahondereye, yamenyesheje ko bazovuga ijambo ry'Imana uko riri ata gucisha iruhande, "n'aho hari aho rigera rikababaza".

column2: Abashingamateka ba Bulaya basaba irekurwa ry'abamenyeshamakuru b'ikinyamakuru Iwacu
column3: Hari abashingamateka ba Bulaya bandikiye umushikiranganji w'ubutungane w'u Burundi bamusaba kurekura abamenyeshamakuru b'ikinyamakuru Iwacu bapfunzwe. Térence Mpozenzi, Agnès Ndirubusa, Egide Harerimana, Christine Kamikazi barapfunzwe kuva ku wa 26 z'ukwezi kw'icumi bagirizwa "kugira uruhara mw'ihungabanywa ry'umutekano w'igihugu". Bafashwe mu gihe bariko bakurikirana igitero c'abitwaje ibirwanisho mu ntara ya Bubanza cabaye ku wa 22 z'ukwezi kw'icumi. Ku wa 20/11 Sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Ntahangwa mu gisagara ca Bujumbura yafashe ingingo yo kubandanya ipfunze abo bamenyeshamakuru. Mu kwezi guheze, Umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Repubulika y'u Burundi yatangaje ko abo bamenyeshamakuru badapfunzwe kubera umwuga wabo ahubwo kubera ivyaha bagirizwa. Abo bashingamateka ba Bulaya bamenyesha ko abamenyeshamakuru badategerezwa gufatwa nk'inkozi z'ikibi kubera bashitse ahariko habera imidugararo mu ntumbero y'ukumenya ukuri. Muri iryo kete ryanditswe n'abashingamateka 38 bari mu nama nshingamateka ya Bulaya, bamenyesha umushikiranganji Aimée Laurentine Kanyana ko batewe impungenge n'uko abo bamenyeshamakuru babandanya bapfunzwe, bahorwa igikorwa cabo co kurondera amakuru. Ibiro vy'umwe mu bariteyeko igikumu vyemereye BBC ko iryo kete ari iry'aba bashingamateka. BBC ntirashobora kuvugana n'ubushikiranganji bw'ubutungane w'u Burundi kuri iri kete. Aba bashingamateka bibutsa ko ari uburenganzira bw'abamenyeshamakuru kurondera n'ukumenyesha abanyagihugu ibijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu. Bavuga ko ipfungwa ryabo rishobora gutuma abamenyeshamakuru badashobora gushikiriza amakuru ajanye n'ibibazo nkoramutima. Muri ivyo bavuga ivyerekeye imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho, ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu canke ihotorerwa rishingiye ku vyiyumviro vya politike. Bibutsa ko ibwirizwashingiro ry'u Burundi riha Abarundi uburenganzira bw'ugushikiriza ivyiyumviro vyabo, harimwo n'uburenganzira bw'ukumenyesha amakuru. "Kuri ivyo, ipfungwa ryabo rirateye amakenga kandi riteye kubiri n'ivyo u Burundi bwiyemeje mw'ibwirizwashingiro n'amasezerano mpuzamakungu". Basaba ko ikibazo cabo cosubirwamwo, bakarekurwa ata kirinze gusabwa, kandi bakareka abamenyeshamakuru bagakora umwuga wabo badatinya gufatwa canke gukubagurwa.

column2: République tchèque: Abantu ibihumbi bakoze ibirori vyo gusezera coronavirus
column3: Mu gihe ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS muri ino ndwi ryagabishije ko ikiza ca coronavirus kitariko kirahera ubu bwa vuba, mu gihugu ca Repubulika ya tchèque hoho bari mu minsi mikuru yo kugisezera. Abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi bakoraniye ku meza ipima uburebure bwa metero 500 ku kiraro Charles Bridge kiri ku mugwa mukuru Prague ku wa kabiri banywa bongera bafungura ivyo baje bitekereye. Abari batumiwe muri ico kirori basabwa gusangira n'abo begeranye kandi na ya ngingo yo gutandukana ntibayikurikije, ivyo ababa mu bihugu bikigendera kuri ya ngingo ya guma mu rugo babona nk'umugani. Muri ico gihugu kirimwo abantu bangana n'imiliyoni cumi, abashika hafi 12,000 ni bo banduye iyo ndwara, abashika 350 nabo irabahitana. Uwateguye ivyo birori yavuze ko vyashobotse kubera ata bakerarugendo bakiri muri ico gisagara kizwi ko kiri mu bisagara biteye igomwe. Amasanamu yava muri ivyo birori yerekana abari muri vyo bicaye hamwe, banywa bongera barorera abariko bakora ibikino. Ondrej Kobza, asanzwe afise inzu y'uburiro akaba ari nawe yateguye ivyo birori, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ati: "Twashatse kwigina ko coronavirus yaranduranywe n'imizi mu gutumira abantu kugira ngo basubire baramukanye kandi berekane ko badatinya kuramukanya, ko batanatinya no gusangira umukate n'abagenzi". Ibibanza vyari vyateguwe vyose vyari vyuzuye. Repubulika ya tchèque yihutiye gufata ingingo za guma mu rugo hakiri kare ikaba yarashoboye kugabanya ubukari bw'ico kiza kitarasasika inganda. Mu ndwi iheze, leta yararekuye amakoraniro y'abantu bashika 1,000. Ibibanza vy'ubwogero, amazu ndangakaranga, ibibanza vy'iyororero ry'ibikoko n'amazu y'amakoraniro ubu arashobora kwugururwa akakira abantu bose bashoboka. Amazu y'uburiro n'ay'ubunywero arashobora kwakira abakiriya mu kiringo c'ukwezi. Ikiboneka ni uko abanyagihugu b'Aba-tchèque bashoboye guhangana n'ico kiza kubera ububangutsi mu gufata ingingo ruhasha. Hagati aho, nivyo ko gutezura ingingo za guma mu rugo kutatumye ibitigiri vyiyongera; ariko hariho mu burere bwa kure cane uvuye ku mugwa mukuru Prague hakiboneka abandura, mu gihe muri ico gisagara hibonekeza abatarenga 15 gusa bandura ku munsi.

column2: OMS ivuga ko Tanzania itagomba kumenyesha ibijanye na Ebola
column3: Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS, ryagiriza Tanzania ko itariko iratanga amakuru ku vyerekeye indwara ya Ebola ivugwa ko ishobora kuba imaze kwibonekeza muri ico gihugu.
