OMS ivuga ko yaronse amakuru yavuga ko hari umwe yoba yarahitanywe n'iyo ndwara i Dar es Salaam, mu nyuma bararonka n'ayandi yavuga ko hari babiri boba barafashwe nayo, ariko ikaba itaronse amakuru atomoye n'aho yagumye ibisaba. Tanzania yoyo ivuga ko ata muntu yigeze yikekwa canke ngo yemezwe ko yanduye Ebola. Ikiza ca Ebola kiragisibije mu buseruko bwa Congo aho kimaze guhitana abarenga 2000, mu gihe Uganda nayo iriko irarwana kugira ngo ntigikwiragire muri ico gihugu. Ishirahamwe OMS rivuga ko ryaronse amakuru yavuga ko hari umuntu wa mbere ashobora kuba yaranduye iyo ndwara mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam, gisanzwe gituwemwo n'abantu benshi gusumba ibindi bisagara muri ico gihugu. Iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko uyo muntu yari yarabaye muri Uganda, akaba yarerekanye ibimenyetso vya Ebola mu kwezi kw'umunani, basanga koko yari ayirwaye, kandi akaba yaje gusandaba kw'igenekerezo rya 08 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda. Rivuga kandi ko ababonanye n'uyo mukenyezi baciye bashirwa ahantu ha bo nyene kugira bakurikiranwe. OMS ivuga ko ifise amakuru ataremezwa neza ko hoba hari n'abandi bantu babiri boba baranduye iyo ndwara. Iti: "N'aho twabisavye kenshi, abategetsi ba Tanzania nta nsiguro zihagije barashikiriza OMS  ku biraba ko hoba hari abandi bantu bamaze kuboneka ko bafise ibimenyetso vy'iyo ndwara". Yongerako iti: "Biraduteye ingorane kuko tudashobora kumenya ibishobora kuba kubera abategetsi ba Tanzania badashaka kuduha amakuru". Ku wa 14 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda, Tanzania yamenyesheje ko ata muntu yikekwa ko yoba yaranduye canke ngo yemezwe ko afise iyo ndwara ya Ebola mu gihugu. Hagati aho, nta nsiguro canke ayandi makuru yatanze kuri uyo mugore avugwa na OMS ko yoba yahitanywe na Ebola. Mu ndwi iheze, umunyamabanga wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Alex Azar, yaraneguye Tanzania kubona idashaka gutanga amakuru ku biraba ko hoba hari abanduye iyo ndwara. Biboneka ko idashaka kwemeza ko hoba hari abamaze gufatwa n'iyo ndwara kubera vyogira ingaruka mbi ku gisata c'ingenzi gisanzwe kiri mu bisata vyinjiriza Tanzania amafaranga menshi. Mu gihugu kibanyi ca Congo, ikiza ca Ebola kihadutse ku ncuro ya 10 mu mateka, kikaba ari co ca kabiri gikomeye kw'isi, aho ubu abamaze kwandura Ebola barenga 3000. Ikiza gikomeye ca mbere ca Ebola kurusha ibindi ni iciganziye ibice bimwe vyo mu burengero bwa Afrika kuva mu mwaka wa 2014 kugera mu wa 2016, kikaba cahitanye abantu barenga 11,000.

column2: Burundi -Kenya: Jules Ndayishimiye yakora ijoro n'umutaga mu kurondera umutahe wiwe
column3: Umusore Jules Ndayishimiye adandaza amandazi, ibiyoba n'ikawa muri Kenya, umutahe akaba yawukuye mu kazi ko kudandaza ifi ku murango n'ubuzamu mw'ijoro. Yavuye mu Burundi arangije kaminuza mu gisata c'uburunzi. Avuga ko yatahuye kare ko ata kazi reta igifise itanga, afata ingingo hakiri kare kukironderera. Agira ati:"Kuva ndi muri kaminuza, nari namaze gutahura ko akazi ari jewe ntegerezwa kukironderera. "Narabona abahejeje imbere yanje ko ata kazi baronka." Jules Ndayishimiye avuga kandi ko kuva aheza amashure yisumbuye yari yaciye atangura kurondera ico akora. Avuga ati:"Nahejeje amashure yisumbuye nca ntangura gukorera abantu. Narabadandariza. "Mu nyuma naramanutse i Bujumbura nsaba akazi ko gukora ijoro nkaca niga kaminuza ku murango. "Vyari bigoye, kuko nataha nk'isaha icenda z'ijoro, isaha zibiri nkaba ntonze kw'ishure." Uwo musore avuga ko yagerageje no kworora inkoko biranga, araonka umutahe wo kudandaza ntivyagenda neza ariko ko atacitse intege. Jules Ndayishimye avuga ko umugenzi wiwe asanzwe aba i Nairobi muri Kenya, ari we yamuriye akara ko ashobora kuronka akazi kotuma aronka umutahe kuko amahera yo muri ico gihugu ari hejuru gusumba amarundi. Avuga ati:"Naraje uwo mugenzi aranyakira. Nca ndonka akazi ko gukora mw'ishirahamwe rihingura amafi. "Kubera iwacu twakuze batigisha ibintu vy'imyuga, narafasha gusa ababizi bakabikora, ku mugoroba bagaca bampemba. "Sinaca ntaha, ahubwo naca ntonda ku kandi kazi k'izamu iwacu bita akazi k''ubu city'." "Inyuma y'amezi atatu, naciye mfata ingingo yo kwikorera ivyanje ndi kumwe n'uwundi mugenzi wanje. "Tudandaza ibintu bitandukanye harimwo ikawa, amandazi n'ibiyoba. Kandi bigenda neza turashima." Jules Ndayishimiye ahanura urundi rwaruka gukura amaboko mu mpuzu bagakora akazi kose kabonetse, kuko kuri we, ngo n'aho wobura, uba warondeye ntuheza ngo witeko umwikomo. Urwaruka rwinshi ruturuka mu Burundi rwaje muri kenya kurondera ubuzi, benshi bakora muvyo kwubaka, abandi mu kudandaza amandazi n'ibiyoba mu mabarabara. Hari n'abakora akazi k'izamu kazwi nk''igi city'. "

column2: Mesut Ozil na Sead Kolasinac ntibazokina igihe Newcastle yizoba akira Arsenal kubera ikibazo c’umutekano
column3: Mesut Ozil na Sead Kolasinac ntibari ku rutonde rw'abakinyi ba Arsenal bazoja guhura na Newcastle ejo ku munsi wa Mungu kubera "ibibazo vy'umutekano wabo". Abo bakinyi bompi baherutse guterwa n'akarwi nk'inkozi z'ikibi zahatswe kunyuruza amamodoka yabo, mu ndwi zibiri ziheze, mu buraruko bw'igisagara ca Londres. Arsenal ivuga ko yashikirije igipolisi ico kibazo kandi "ko ibandanya ifata mu mugongo abo bakinyi n'imiryango yabo". Iti: "Umutekano w'abakinyi n'imiryango yabo, nico gikorwa kiza imbere ya vyose". "Twafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho tuvuganiye nabo hamwe n'ababaserukira". "Twibaza ko vuba bwango tuzoba turi kumwe nabo mu murwi". Igipolisi kivuga ko kiriko kirakora amatohoza ku vyabaye. Mw'itangazo casohoye, kivuga ko kiriko "kivugana na Arsenal kandi ko kizokora amatohoza ku bukozi bw'ikibi bwose bwashikirijwe". Hampande y'ivyo, ihiganwa ry'Ubwongerezwa Premier League ryaraye ritanguye icese, aho umurwi wa Liverpool waraye ukosoye umurwi wa Norwich. Hampande ya kizigenza wa Norwich Grant Hanley yiyinjije igitsindo ca mbere ca Liverpool ku munota w'indwi, Mohamed Salah, Virgil van Dijk, na Divock Origi babandanije bereka uwo murwi winjiye muri Premier League uvuye mu cicaro ca kabiri ko ibintu bitoroshe mu Bwongereza. Liverpool yarangije igikorwa mu gice ca mbere gusa, cagiye kurangira ifise ibitsindo bine ku busa bw'umurwi Norwich, n'aho yabandanije isatira ariko biranka ko ironka ikindi. Norwich yoyo yarinanase iraronka igitsindo kimwe rudende ku munota wa 64, urukino rurangira ari bine vya Liverpool kuri kimwe ca Norwich. Uno munsi ku wa gatandatu, hategekanijwe inkino zitandatu ziza gutangura isaha indwi n'igice ku masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda, ku rukino ruza guhuza West Ham United iza kwakira Manchester City yatsindiye ihiganwa ry'umwaka uheze. Ejo ku wa Mungu, hampande ya Arsenal irindiriwe n'igishika cinshi kugira yerekane inguvu zayo aho zigera mu gihe izoramuka yakirwa na Newcastle, urundi rukino rurindiriwe cane ruzohuza Manchester United na Chelsea i Old Trafford isaha cumi n'imwe n'igice (17h30) mu masaha y'Uburundi nu Rwanda.

column2: Igikombe c’isi Qatar 2022: Twigire kuri kahise ibishobora gushika
column3: Na  Rob Haywood U﻿munyamakuru w'inkino wa BBC Ni iki ibikombe vy'isi vy'imbere y'aha bishobora kutwigisha ku vyo twokwitega muri  Qatar? Igikombe c'uno mwaka coba kigoye? Ibihugu vyaronse itike yo kuja muri iri higanwa bibanje gukina urukino rwa play-off vyohebuzwa ubu nyene? Ubwo gukinira muri Asia vyoba bizokworohera ibihugu bimwe bimwe? Turaraba ibi vyose - hamwe n'ibindi vyinshi - kugira turabe ibihugu bishobora guhabwa amahirwe muri kino gikombe c'isi yose c'uno mwaka. Hamaze kuba amahiganwa atandatu ahuriyemwo igitigiri nk'iki c'ibihugu 32 bigabuwe mu mirwi umunani umwe umwe ufise ibihugu bine bine , akaba ari ayo mahiganwa atandatu aduha inkino 384 tugiye kwihweza kugira turabe niba hari ibija biragaruka. Mu mwihwezo ukurikira, tugiye kurabiha hamwe aya mahiganwa atandatu - kuva mu 1998 gushika 2018 - - kiretse bibaye ngombwa ko tuja hanze y’aho. Mu mahiganwa atatu aheruka kubera i Bulaya, mu bibanza 16 vyo muri ca gice co gukuranamwo (canke igice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma), imigwi y'i Buraya yafashemwo 10. Iyo ihiganwa ribereye hanze y'Ubulaya, iki gitigiri caramanuka nko gushika ku ndwi. Imirwi yo muri Amerika y'Ubumanuko niyo ica ihatomborera, mu gihe igitigiri c'imigwi ya Asia ishike muri ico gice yigwiza na kabiri  iyo ihiganwa ribereye hanze y'Ubulaya. Ibikombe bitanu  ku mahiganwa atandaatu aheruka vyatwahanywe n'ibihugu vy'i Buraya -  kandi uretse Ubufaransa bwatsinze iri higanwa mu 1998 buronse itike kubera ari bwo bwari bwaryakiriye, ibindi vyose vyari vyitwaye neza mu mahiganwa yo kurondera itike. Ibindi bihugu bine vyatahukanye iki gikombe - Ubutaliyano mu 2006, Espagne mu 2010, Ubudagi mu 2014 be n'Ubufaransa mu 2018 - wasanga birangije bidatsinzwe na rimwe canke ugasanga bitsinzwe nka rimwe gusa mu nkino cumi zo kurondera itike. Urugero rw'izi nstinzi (mu gihe iyo banganije biharurwa nk'inusu y'intsinzi) rwari ku 80% no kurenga. Mu nkino zo kurondera itike mw'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka, ibihugu vyinshi vya Bulaya vyarashitse kuri uru rugero: Danemark (95%), Ubwongereza n'Ubudagi (90%), Serbia n'Ububirigi (87.5%), Espagne, Ubuswisi n'Ubufaransa ( 81.3%) hanyuma Croatia n'Ubuholande ( 80%). Twisunze urutonde rwa FIFA rw'ingene ibihugu bikurikirana kw'isi, turashobora kubona ingene iri higanwa rishobora kuzoba rikomeye.  Raba ubutandukane bw'ingene ibi bihugu 32 bihagaze kuri buri higanwa: Kubera amategeko ya FIFA agena igitigiri c'imirwi iva kuri buri mugabane, hari ibihugu bitari muri iri higanwa kandi ku rutonde rwa FIFA biri imbere ya bimwe mu vyaronse itike. Ibihugu bikomeye bitazokwitabira iri higanwa ry'uno mwaka ni Ubutaliyano - buza mu kibanza ca gatandatu - ariko  Colombia (17), Peru (23), Suède (25), Ukraine (27), Chili (29) na Nigeria (32) vyari kuba vyararonse itike iyaba urutonde rw'isi ari rwo rwakurikizwa mu kugena abaryitabira hatarabwe aho igihugu giherereye. Mu gihe ibihugu indwi vyo ku rugero rwo hasi biri muri rino higanwa bishobora kuboneka ko ari vyinshi, uravye ahubwo ni igitigiri gito kuva iri higanwa ritanguye guhuriramwo ibihugu 32. Hari amahiganwa yagiye yitabirwa n'ibihugu bishika 11 biri inyuma ya 32 vya mbere. Rero iki gihe ni ihiganwa rizoba rikomeye cane. Hanyuma turavye ingene ibihugu bihagaze, biboneka ko Ubwongereza na Pays de Galles (Wales) biri mu murwi utoroshe na gato muri  Qatar - ni wo murwi wonyene uhuriyemwo imirwi iri muri 20 ya mbere dufatiye kuri uru rutonde rwo ku wa 30 z'ukwa cumi. Imirwi yo mu gikombe c'isi yose ca 2022  n'ingene ibihugu bihagaze kw'isi (Gushika   ku wa 30 z'ukwa cumi. ) Pays de Galles mu mahiganwa ya mbere yitabiriye mu myaka 64, yamye ironka itike ibanje gukina play-offs  kumwe na Pologne hamwe na Portugal. Ukibibona ubwa mbere, womenga vyaciye mu canzo - ariko akahise ka vuba kerekana ko ibihugu bironka itike muri iyo nzira bikora ibintu bikomeye. Tugereranije imirwi ya Bulaya, 67% y'ibihugu bironka itike biciye muri play-offs  birashika mu gice co gukuranamwo, ugereranije na 57% gusa biba vyaronse itike mu buryo bworoshe. Inkino zibiri za nyuma (finales)  z'amahiganwa atandatu aheruka zahuje ibihugu vya Bulaya vyaronse itike mu ma play-offs - ibi bikaba ari Ubudagi mu 2002 hamwe na Croatia mu 2018. Vyongeye, Croatia (1998) na Turukiya (2002) vyashitse mu  gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma (demi-finales) , mu gihe ibindi bihugu bitatu navyo vyashitse mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma (quart de finales). Kuva mu myaka ya 1990, mu bihugu biba bifise igikombe, ikimaze gutsinda muri  gice c'inkino zo gukuranamwo (knockout) ni kimwe gusa, iki naco ni Ubudagi igihe butsinda Ghana mu 2006. Mu vy'ukuri, kuva mu 1962, nta gihugu kirashobora kugumana igikombe, mu gihe mu mahiganwa 14  kuva ico gihe, ibihugu bibiri ari vyo  vyonyene bimaze kugera mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Ibihugu biba bifise igikombe kenshi bitangura kugira ingorane ku rukino rwa mbere. Mu mahiganwa 12 kuva Ubwongereza butsinze urukino rwa mbere aho bwahura na Roumanie mu 1970, ibihugu bitatu vyonyene biba bifise igikombe ni vyo bimaze gutsinda urukino rwa mbere. Mbere bine muri bitanu biba bifise igikombe nta n'uko vyavuye mu nkino zo mu mirwi (phase des groupes). Kubera iki? Imyaka ine ni igihe kirekire mu mupira w'amaguru. Uravye, usanga 50% vy'abakinyi batsindiye ico gikombe ari bo batangura urukino rwa mbere rwo mu mirwi mw'ihiganrwa rikurikira. Igihe Ubutaliyano bukina urukino rwa mbere bukanganya na Paraguay mu 2010, bwakinishije batatu gusa mu bari batsindiye igikombe ca 2006. Nimba witeze ko imirwi ibiri ya mbere ari iyizoba ihagaze neza ku rutonde mpuzamakungu muri buri murwi, uzotangara. Ni ibisanzwe ko bitandatu muri 16 bikina inkino zo gukuranamwo usanga bigira gatatu na kane mu mirwi yavyo. Ni urugero rutangaje rwa 32%. Muri ano mahiganwa atandatu nyene, imirwi yo hasi yatsinze inkino zo gukuranamwo ku rugero rwa 34%. Inkino zitatu muri zine zababaje ni izatsinzwe n’ibihugu vyakiriye amahiganwa - ku ncuro zibiri biciye ku ma penalties, incuro imwe nayo biciye ku gitsindo c'inzahabu. Uko bizogenda kwose mu ndwi zitanu ziri imbere, hashobora kuba ibintu bizobabaza abantu, bitangaza, eka ibintu bizoteza impari.

column2: Swiss bemeje kubuza kwamamaza itabi inyuma cane y'ibihugu bibanyi
column3: Aba-Swisse batoye bemeza kubuza kwamamaza itabi ahantu hose abakiri bato bashobora kubibona. Mu vy'ukuri, kuba Ego ariyo yiganje muri ayo matora ya kamarampaka mu gihugu cose bizotuma kwamamaza itabi bicibwa burundu. Ivyo bizotuma Swisse ija ku murongo w'ibindi bihugu bibanyi vy'i Buraya, vyinshi vyashitse ku ngingo zikomeye zibuza canke zigabanya kwamamaza itabi haraheze imyaka itari mike. N'ubwo ari igihugu gisanzwe kizwi neza ku bijanye n'amagara meza n'ugukingira ibidukikije, Swisse yari igifise amwe mu mategeko yerekeye itabi  yoroshe cane i Buraya. Mu gihe haheze imyaka myinshi kunywera itabi mu nzu z'uburiro n'ubunywero vyari vyaraciwe mu Bwongereza, mu Bufaransa, canke mu Budagi, muri Swisse bari bakihanywera itabi. Mu masoko ya kijambere (supermarches/supermartkets), abariko barasuma hari igihe bakirwa n'abagore bakiri bato babamwenyurira mu gihe babaha imponjo za gusa z'itabi riba riherutse gusohoka. Mu gihe ivyo haheze imyaka bibujijwe, kwamamaza itabi vyari bikibandanya. Ashima ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa mungu, umushingamateka w'umu-social democrat  Flavia Wasserfallen yakeje igikorwa c'amashirahamwe y'abaganga n'abigisha bakoze isekeza ryo guca ivyo kwamamaza itabi. Yabwiye television ya Swisse ati: "Abantu barakoze cane kugira haboneke  poritike yo gushira imbere ineza y'abakiri bato". Ingingo z'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS zijanye n'itabi  - Framework Convention on Tobacco Control- zimaze imyaka hafi 20 zishitsweko mu gisagara ca Geneve. Swisse yarazishizeko umukono, ariko ntiyari bwazemeze mu mategeko -kikaba arico gihugu ca Buraya co nyene cari gisigaye - kuko gushika habe amatora yo ku wa mungu, amategeko y'ico gihugu yerekeye kwamamaza, ntiyisunga izo ngingo. Ugereranije no mu bindi bihugu vy'i Buraya, itabi muri Swisse rirazimbutse kandi 27% y'abantu bakuze muri ico gihugu baranywa itabi - urugero ruri hejuru y'urw'i Buraya muri rusangi. Ni kenshi amategeko agamije kugabanya canke guca kwamamaza itabi yari amaze kunanirwa kurengana mu nama nshingamateka. N'igihe abagira isekeza baba baronse imikono ikwiye yo gusaba ko haba amatora kamarampaka yo guca kwamamaza, reta yaca ibwira abanyagihugu gutora Oya. Abashigikiye ko kwamamaza bicibwa, bavugako ivyo biterwa n'uko muri ico gihugu hariyo amwe mu ma kompanyi akomeye cane kw'isi mu rudandazwa rw'itabi. Philip Morris, British American Tobacco na Japan Tobacco yose afise ivyicaro vyayo bikuru muri Swisse. Urudandazwa rw'itabi bigereranywa ko rwinjiriza ubutunzi bwa Swisse amafaranga arenga miriyaridi 6 z'amadorari ku mwaka, rugakoresha abantu 11.000 muri ico gihugu. Imbere y'uko amatora aba vyaragaragaye ko -nk'uko benshi bavyikeka - ko ama kompanyi y'itabi yahora asuka amafaranga mw'isekeza ryo gutora Oya. Abagwanya ko hacibwa kwamamaza, bavuga ko kubuza kwamamaza ikintu cemewe n'amategeko bidakwiye kwemerwa, kandi ko ivyo vyokwugururira imyango  ingingo ku bindi bicuruzwa, nk'isukari n'inzoga, navyo bibonwa nk'ibibangamira amagara y'abantu. Ivyapa biriko  zimwe mu mfungurwa aba-Swisse bakunda cane - vyerekanywe vyandiseko amajambo y'igabisha rikomeye ngo "ibi ni vyo bizoca bikurikira". Ariko abitavye amatora ivyo ntaco vyababwiye. Muri Swisse haharurwa abantu bashika 9.000 bapfa buri mwaka bahitanywe n'indwara zifatiye kw'itabi kandi  igisata c'amagara y'abantu gisohora amafaranga menshi yo kuvura bene izo ndwara. Biduza kandi amafaranga y'ubwishingizi, uwariwe wese ategerezwa gutanga, yaba anywa canke atanywa itabi. Imbere y'uko amatora aba, ibiharuro vyo kugereranya amajwi vyerekana ko 60% bari gushigikira  guca kwamamaza. Amaherezo babaye 56%, ariko n'ubundi bagumanye ubwiganze buhagije. Stefanie de Borba wo nw'ishirahamwe rya Swisse ryo kurwanya cancer yabwiye AFP ati: "Abantu baratahuye ko amagara ahambaye kuruta inyungu z'ubutunzi." Ubundi muri Swisse iyo abatora badatahura neza ico bahamagariwe gutora, baca bakurikiza impanuro ya reta. Ku yandi mategeko abiri bari bahamagariwe kwerekana aho bahagaze co kimwe no kuri iryo ryo guca kwamamaza itabi, reta yari yabahanuye gutora Oya, yamara yaratsinzwe. Ubu  abagize reta bakeneye akanya ko kwisuzuma niba bakiri ku murongo umwe n'abatora. Nk'uko umwe mu bandika uko babona ibintu aho muri Swisse yabivuze ku wa mungu: "Hageze guhitamwo hagati y'ubwigenge bw'ubutunzi n'amagara, abatora benshi bahisemwo ico ca nyuma…Haba uguca ukwamamaza, guca kunywa itabi canke itabi rizimvye, kunywa itabi ubu ntibigifise uruvugiro mu banyagihugu -bitandukanye no mu banyeporitike."

column2: Burundi: OLUCOME iriyamiriza ingingo yo kwugara ibiryo vy'abavunjayi (bureau de change)
column3: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'itunga ry'igihugu, OLUCOME, aranegura ingingo y'Ibanki Nkuru y'u Burundi yo kwugara amazu adandaza amafaranga  mvamakungu. Mw'itangazo yasohoye kuri uyu wa kabiri, Gabriel Rufyiri arongoye Olucome avuga ko iyo ngingo itazotorera umuti ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafaranga mvamakungu cibonekeza mu gihugu. Ku wa 07 z'uku kwa kabiri, Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yarafashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga mvamakungu mu Burundi. Iyagiriza ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu, nk'uko BRB ibivuga. Mw'iryo tangazo, Bwana Rufyiri avuga ati: "Iyo ata mafaranga y'agaciro ahari, ingingo nk'iyo siyo iza gukemura ikibazo kuko ibiciro vy'amafaranga y'agaciro bivana n'ingene aboneka kw'isoko ryayo". Yibutsa ko iryo kena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro rituma ibidandazwa bimwe bimwe mu gihugu bikena kubera hakenerwa ayo mafaranga kugira ngo hagurwe ibikoresho nkenerwa mu guhingura ivyo bidandazwa. Atanga akarorero k'isima, amafanta, ibiyeri n'ibindi, avuga ko "iyo bibonetse usanga bigurishwa ku biciro vy'umurengera". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyarahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena. Leta y'u Burundi yagiye ifata ingingo mu ntumbero yo kugenzura ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga mvamakungu, ariko cagumye ari ikibazo ngorabahizi, arico catumyeIbanki Nkuru y'igihugu yugara amashirahamwe yose adandaza ayo mafaranga. Olucome isaba leta kuvyura imigenderanire n'ibihugu bitanga imfashanyo, kwongereza ibidandazwa bishorwa hanze, guhimiriza abarwizatunga b'banyamahanga kuzana imitahe yabo mu gihugu, kunagura igisata c'ingenzi, ivyo vyose kugira ngo amafaranga mvamakungu yinjire mu Burundi.

column2: Umuyobozi wa Bujumbura agabisha ko CHOLERA yateye igisagara ca Bujumbura
column3: Umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura, Freddy Mbonimpa, aragabisha ababa muri ico gisagara ko indwara ya CHOLERA yamaze kubashikamwo. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 05 z'ukwa munani, Bwana Mbonimpa amenyesha ko abantu 126 bamaze kwandura iyo ndwara. Avuga ati: "Gushika ubu ama zone abangamiwe kurusha ayandi ni KANYOSHA, BUYENZI, BUTERERE, na CIBITOKE". CHOLERA yandukira mu kunywa amazi canke gufata imfungurwa zandujwe n'amazirantoke arimwo imigera yayo. Bwana Mbonimpa agabisha ko "hari ibibanza bikoraniramwo abantu benshi bitubahiriza isuku, nk'amazu y'uburiro n'ubunywero ...". Avuga ko ku munsi ku munsi "hibonekeza abarwayi  bashasha bane canke batanu". Umukuru w'igisagara atangaza ingingo zafashwe mu ntumbero y'uguhangana n'iyo ndwara. Muzi izo ngingo harimwo guhagarika: "Ubunywero n'uburiro bikorera mu masoko, mu ma parking y'imiduga, iruhande y'amabarabara canke ku miserege y'amazi". Meri ya Bujumbura kandi yahagaritse "uruja n'uruza rw'amasorori arimwo imfungurwa, urudandazwa rw'abatembereza amazi yo kunywa ari mu ma sachets, imitobe n'izindi mfungurwa ku ma parking n'ibindi bibanza vy'ihuriro". Meri kandi yabujije kuvoma no gukoresha amazi y'inzuzi canke y'imiserege. Freddy Mbonimpa asaba ko ahantu hose hugawe hatokwugururwa abajejwe intwaro n'amagara y'abantu batabonye ko hakwije ibisabwa  mu vyo isuku. CHOLERA ni indwara yandukira cane kandi yica ningoga mu gihe umurwayi atavuwe hakiri kare.

column2: Ubukoloni: Bemeye amabi ariko nta mpozamarira
column3: Umwami Philippe w'Ububiligi ari muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo ubwa mbere, mu ntumbero yo kunagura imigenderanire n'ico gihugu, imyaka 60 inyuma yo kwikukira. Umwami yaherekejwe n'umugore wiwe, umwamikazi Mathilde  hamwe n'abagize reta y'Ububiligi, harimwo umushikiranganji wa mbere Alexander De Croo, mu rugendo rw'imisi itandatu ku butumire bwa prezida wa RD Congo, Felix Tshisekedi. N'urugendo rw'akataraboneka muri RD Congo, kuko n'ubwa mbere  rugizwe n'umuryango w'ubwami mu myaka 12. Urwo rugendo rubaye kandi inyuma y'imyaka ibiri umwami avuze ko "yicuza" ku "bibi" vyakozwe n'abakoloni b'igihugu ciwe. Umwami Philippe yamuka ku mwami Léopold II, yatwaye mu kinjana ca 19, aho intwaro yiwe yahitanye abanye Afrika imiliyoni 10 mu bwicanyi bw'agahomerabunwa bwabaye mu gihe c'ubukoloni. Mw'ikete yandikiye Tshisekedi, mu gihe hahimbazwa imyaka 60 igihigu ca Congo cikukiye, umwami Philippe, ku ncuro ya mbere,  yaricujije, ariko adasavye imbabazi. Urwo rugendo rwafashwe nk'akandi karyo ko gusaba imbabazi ku mugaragaro  abanye Congo. Ariko si ubwa mbere umutegetsi w'i Buraya ahangana n'amabi yakozwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni. Bimwe mu bihugu vyarasavye ikigongwe ku mugaragaro, mu gihe ibindi bigiye kwemera muri iyi misi ya vuba ko hari ibintu bimwe bimwe bibi vyabaye. Abanebagura iyo ngendo bavuga ko izo mbabazi zabaye izo hejuru kuko zitadoma urutoke ku bubisha bwakozwe muri kahise hamwe n'iragi ry'igihe kirekire c'ubukoloni. Muri iyi myaka iheze, ibihugu nk'Ubwongereza, Ubudagi n'Ubufaransa, vyarashinzwe ijisho cane ku bikorwa vyakozwe n'abahoze babitwara. Aha turihweza ingene abantu bakiriye imbabazi ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya buraya vyasavye, binashira n'umukono ku masezerano yerekeye kahise k'ubukoloni. Umwami Léopold II w'Ububiligi yarahawe igice kinini c'ahazanana uruzi rwa Congo n'abategetsi ba Buraya igihe haba inama rukokoma i Berlin 1885, aho bagabangana umugabane wa Afrika. Umwami yaciye yita ako karere, 'Congo yigenga' - akarere kiwe bwite aho yari afise uburenganzira bwo gukora ico ashaka  cose. Vyihuse, haciye haba akarere kiganziwe n'intwaro y'umukazo ishingiye ku bikorwa vyo ku gahato mu kurima no mu kudandaza ibintu bimwe bimwe nka kawucu, amenyo y'inzovu hamwe n'ubutare. Abategetsi baraca ibihimba vy'abantu batashikanye ivyo bari bategerezwa gukora hakurikijwe itegeko ry'umwami. Mu gihe imyiyerekano ya Black Lives Matter yaba kw'isi yose, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'ababiligi vyarihereje amabarabara basaba ico gihugu kwihweza neza kahise kaco. Ibishushanyo vy'umwami Léopold II mu bisagara vy'ico gihugu vyaramenaguwe, hanyuma ubutegetsi bufata ingingo yo kubikura mu bibanza bihuriramwo abantu benshi. Mu rugendo rw'ubwami bw'Ubwongereza mu mazinga ya Caraïbes mu kwezi kwa gatatu, umuganwa William yarerekanye "agahinda" ku vyerekeye ubuja mw'ijambo yavuze ariko arasangira n'abategetsi ba Jamaique. Uwo muganwa yavuze ko ubuja ari icaha c'agahomerabunwa, ko " bitari bikwiye kubaho" kandi ko "vyateye iceyi ubudahanagurika kahise kacu". Ariko ababinegura bavuga ko kwerekana "akababaro" no kwemera ivyabaye muri kahise bitigera birenga aho. Urwo rugendo rwakiriwe n'imyiyerekano ihamagarira ubwami gutanga indishi ku buja, Jamaique na yo yake ikibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu umwamikazi  Elizabeth. Mu 2021, Ubudagi bwaremeye ku mugaragaroko  ko iyicwa ry'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi muri Namibia yari jenocide. Hagereranywa ko aba Ovaherero 60.000, n'ukuvuga abarenga 80% y'abanyagihugu bagize ubwo bwoko muri ako karere, aba Nama 10.000, n'ukuvuga 50% vy'abo, barishwe n'abakoloni b'abadagi  hagati ya 1904 na 1908. Amatongo yabo n'ubworozi na vyo baravyatswe mu kubahana kubera bagiye mu migumuko. Ubudagi bwariyemeje kugira "ikimenyetso mu kwemera amabi menshi babakoreye.". Ariko ntibigeze bacisha mu kanwa ivyerekeye indishi y'akababaro, ahubwo ayo masezerano yari yerekeye imfashanyo muvyo iterambere ingana na miriyaridi 1.3 z'amadolari. Ayo mahera yategerezwa gutangwa mu kiringo c'imyaka 30 ku bantu bakomoka ku ba  Ovaherero n'aba Nama. Ariko abasigwa bo muri ayo moko avugwa , nka Uahimisa Kaapei, ntiyashimye ayo masezerano. Avuga ati:"N'akajoreza ko muri iki kinjana. Dukeneye ko baza [reta y'ubudagi] gusaba imbabazi. Amahera akoreshwa gusa mu kuvuga ivyo badukoreye. Hafi ica kabiri c'ibihugu vyo muri Afrika vyarigeze kuba biganzwa n'Ubufaransa. Inyuma y'imyaka 60 vyinshi muri vyo vyikukiye, abubu baracabona ingaruka mbi y'ubukoloni. Muri uyu mwaka, Algeria yahimbaje imyaka 60 imaze yikuye mu nzara  z'Ubufaransa , inyuma y'intambara yamaze imyaka umunani , hamwe n'inyuma y'ikiringo kirenga ikinjana bari mu bukoloni gushika mu 1962. Ubufaransa co kimwe n'ibindi bihugu vy'abakoloni, vyaranse kwemenga bimwe mu vyaranze kahise k'ubukoloni. Mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2021, ibiro vya prezida Macron vyamenyesheje ko Ubufaransa "butazicuza canke ngo busabe imbabazi" ku mabi yakorewe muri Algeria mu myaka 132 bwategetse ico gihugu. Ariko ko buzokora "ibikorwa bimeze nk'ibimenyetso" bifise intumbero yo guteza imbere igikorwa co gusubiza hamwe. Ariko inyuma y'umwaka urenga, inama nkenguzamateka y'Ubufaransa yarasavye ikigongwe abasirikare ba Algeria , bitwa Harkis, bagwanye ku ruhande rw'Ubufaransa mu ntambara yo kwikukira ya Algeria, aho vyuguruye imiryango kukuronswa impozamarira. Prezida w'Ubufaransa Emmanuel Macro yari yasavye "ikigongwe" anemera ko azoshiraho itegeko rigena impozamarira hamwe n'icibutso. Igihe yariko arashikiriza ijambo mu kwezi kw'icenda mu 2021, Macron yarazomerewe  na bamwe mu banyagihugu. N'aho nyene hariho bamwe bamwe bashimye kuba yasavye imbabazi. Uwahoze ari Harki, Serge Carel yagize ati:"Bisa n'uko ku ncuro ya mbere, prezida wacu w'ubu afise ishaka ryo kuvuga ukuri." "Urakoze kuri iryo shaka, niharambe Republika, niharambe Ubufaransa". Mu myaka mirongo iheze, imigwi itandukanye n'ibihugu vyahoze mu bukoloni  bagumye basaba gutera intambwe bakava muvyo gusaba ikigongwe gusa ahubwo hagatangwa impozamarira. Mu gihe imvugo yo kwicuza no gusaba imbabazi bitanguye gusa n'ibimenyerewe, gutanga impozamarira canke ubundi buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose bujanye n'amahera biboneka gake. Uburundi na Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo vyasavye impozamarira y'imiriyaridi 43 z'ama dolari Ububiligi hamwe n'Ubudagi. Abanye Congo benshi nta cizere kinini bafise, nka Junior Bombi, umudandaza wo mw'isoko nkuru i Kinshasa. Agira ati:"Kubwanje, uru rugendo nta co ruzoshikako, kuko guhamagara umwami w'ababiligi muri Congo bimaze iki? "Badusize twenyene, atawutwitayeho, baratwara ubutunzi bwacu, ubu rero murasubiye guha ikaze umwami w'ababiligi ngaha? "Abandi bizeye ko intambwe za mbere zo gusubiza hamwe - kwemera no kwibuka abishwe mu kiringo c'ubukoloni - zizoshikwako. "Nihaba hari ikintu gikomeye twiteze, n'uko umwami agarukana ibisigarira vya Patrice Emery Lumumba nk'uko yavyemeye." Umwigisha w'akahise muri kaminuza Antoine Roger Lokongo avuga ati:" Ni co kintu gikomeye turindiriye." Lumbuma ni we yabaye umushikiranganji wa mbere, wa mbere w'igihugu aranagishikana ku ntahe yo kwikukira mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 1960. Yaciye apfungwa aca yicwa ata n'umwaka uheze. Umupolisi w'umubiligi yariyemereye ko yashize ikiziga ciwe muri acide aca aturira ibisigarira vyiwe, ariko avuga ko yabitse iryinyo. Ububiligi bwaremeye uruhara bwagize muri urwo rupfu, rukekwamwo n'igisata c'iperereza ca Amerika CIA. Igarukanwa ry'ibisigarira vya Lumumba ryari ryatebejwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus. Ariko ibirori vyo gushikiriza iryo ryinyo bitegekanijwe muri uku kwezi i Bruxelles. Muri uru rugendo, umwami yarashikirije kimwe mu bintu biranga akaranga 80.000 vyibwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni muri Congo.

column2: Reggae: Ivyo kumenya kuri The Wailers ubwo uwanyuma muri bo yashengeye
column3: Bunny Wailer niwe yari aramvye cane mu bo bashinze hamwe umugwi The Wailers, abandi babiri, Bob Marley na Peter Tosh barapfuye, uwa mbere muri 1981 ahitanywe na cancer ku myaka 36, uwa kabiri mu 1987 agandaguwe n'abasuma ku myaka 43. Bunny Wailer w'i Kingston, yakuranye na Bob Marley. Bafatanije bararimvye indirimbo zabaye rurangiranwa mu makungu nka Simmer Down na Stir Up, imbere y'uko Wailer afata inzira yo kuririmba ukwa wenyene mu 1974. Ntiyahagaritse gutera imbere kuko yararonse incuro zitatu zose agashinmwe gakomeye cane mu muziki Grammys aranambikwa ikidari ca Jamaica ca Ordre de Merite mu 2017. Yapfuye ku wa kabiri mu gitondo, ariko icateye urupfu rwiwe nticamenyekanye n'ubwo yari mu bitaro kuva agize AVC mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2020. Nta nkeka, abashimagiza uwo muririmvyi bashwaye imbuga hwaniro bakimenya urupfu rwiwe, abanyamuziki nkawe nabo bavuga ko yari "harabaye". Umuririmvyi azwi mu gutamba cane aririmba Shaggy yanditse kuri Facebook ati: "Iki ni kimwe mu bihe bibi muri kahise k'akaranga kacu. Waduteye kwishima mwami. Ruhuka neza." "Oh yemwe, Imana ihezagire Bunny Wailer," uwo nawe n'uwo muri Redd Hot Chili Peppers avuza guitare bass, Flea. Andrew Holness ministre wa mbere wa Jamaica ntiyatanzwe mu gushimagiza uwo muririmvyi, yavuze ko urupfu rwiwe ari "agahombo kanini kuri Jamaica na reggae". Bunny Wailer izina ryiwe ry'ukuri ryari Neville O'Riley Livingston. Yari yavutse ku wa 20/4/1947, amara imyaka yiwe ya mbere mu kigwati ca Nine Miles aho yarezwe na se Thaddeus yacuruza imangazini y'ivyo kurya. Aho niho yahuriye ubwa mbere na Bob Marley, ivyo bitambambuga badatevye baca baba abagenzi bakomeye, bakorana umuziki wabo ubwa mbere bari kumwe kw'ishure ry'intango n'iryisumbuye rya Stepney. Se wa Bob Marley amaze gupfa mu 1955, nyina, Cedella, yaciye abana na se wa Livingston. Abo bahungu bakuze barezwe nk'abavukana na cane cane aho cedella na Thaddeus bavyariye umukobwa, Pearl. Bamaze kwimukira Trenchtown muri Kingston, baciye bahura na Peter Tosh baca bashinga umugwi wo kuririmbira hamwe witwa The Wailing Wailers - kuko, nk'uko Bob Marley yabivuze: "Twatanguye dusemerera." Aho baba harangwa n'ubukene n'ubukozi bw'ikibi. Livingston mu nyuma yibutse ingene yakoze igitari ciwe ca mbere akoresheje "imigano, imirya akuye mu ntsinga z'amatara, n'igikopo kinini cavuyemwo sardines". Ariko umuririmvyi Joe Higgs batazira "the Godfather of Reggae" (umuhagarikizi wa reggae), yaba hafi yaciye ashira abo bahungu mu kwaha kwiwe. Abafashije, baciye  banonosora umuziki wabo, bongeramwo ijwi rya Junior Braithwaite n'abaririmvi basasira Beverly Kelso na Cherry Green imbere y'uko bagabanya izina ry'umugwi wabo ugasigara witwa The Wailers. Mu kwa 12 mu 1963, uwo mugwi wagiye muri Studio One ya Coxsone Dodd gufata amajwi y'indirimbo Simmer Down, indirimbo Bob Marley yari yanditse asaba amahoro mu ma quartiers y'abakene ya Kingston. Iyo ndirimbo ntiyatevye gukundwa, iraduga gushika ku nomero ya mbere muri Jamaica. Baciye bayikurikiza Duppy Conqueror, imbere y'uko basohora  urukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere (album) The Wailing Wailers, mu 1965. Bidatevye mu nyuma y'aho, hari akaciyemwo mu mugwi, aho Bob Marley amariye kurongora akimukira muri Amerika, nawe Livingston akamara umwaka mu munyororo kubera gufatanwa urumogi. Ariko barashoboye gusohora single (urukurikirane rw'indirimbo zitarenga 3) 28 hagati ya 1966 na 1970 imbere y'uko basohora album yabo ya kabiri, Soul Rebels. Izina rikomeye mu makungu barironse imyaka itatu inyuma y'aho kuri Catch A Fire  -indirimbo ya mbere bakoreye inzu yo gusohora indirimbo ya Chris Blackwell, Island Records. The Wailers bari  bamaze igihe baremesha ibiterambo mu Bwongereza bari kumwe na Johnny Nash, mu nyuma babura amafaranga yo kuriha ama tike yo kubasubiza iwabo. Blackwell aca yemera kubaha contrat ya Island, aca abaha ingurane (avance) yo kugura ama tike n'ayo gukora album muri Jamaica. Ariko ntibanezerejwe n'ingene indirimbo zabo zongeye guhingurwa kugira zihabwe akabirya ku bazumva mu makungu. Ariko iyo album ntiyaguzwe cane haba mu Bowngereza canke muri Amerika naho yahavuye ifatwa nk'imwe muri rurangiranwa. Mbere ikinyamakuru Rolling Stone Magazine ubu vuba cayigize iya 140  ku rutonde rwaco rwa albums 500 zirengeye ibihe (albums of all time) gifatiye ku ndirimbo zayo Concrete Jungle na Slave Driver. Ikibanza ciza kw'isoko caciye gikurikira na Burnin' yo mu 1973 ku ndirimbo nka I shot the Sheriff, Small Axe hamwe na Get Up Stand Up. Ariko niyo yabaye album ya nyuma ya The Wailers isohowe n'abatanguye uwo mugwi bari kumwe bose. Ukutumvikana kwari kwatanguye igihe Island yagurisha indirimbo zabo kw'izina rya Bob Marley and The Waliers, hamwe n'ikirangaminsi co kuzunguruka baririmba catumye Livingston amara igihe atari kumwe n'umuryango wiwe. Yaciye agenda mu 1973, avuga ko ubuzima bwo kuzunguruka budahuye n'ukwemera kwiwe kw'umu Rasta - avuga nko kurya indya zihinguwe hamwe no kuririmba mu bibanza bitabereye. Mu nyuma yavuze ko kumenyekana cane ari umwansi wo kwiyumvira ibishasha. "Umuziki uhagaze ku kugira ico ufatiyeko, iyo rero uri ahantu uri epfo na ruguru, aha na hariya, n'umuziki wawe niko uzokwumvikana," niko Livingston yabwiye The Los Angeles Times mu 1986. "Abantu baratwarwa no kuba rurangiranwa kandi ivyo bitandukanye no kuba umwanditsi, umunyamuziki, uwufasha abandi gutunganya umuziki wabo n'uwushira umuziki mu buhinga mwiza." Amaze kuva muri uwo mugwi, yaciye atangura gukora kuri album ya wenyene , Blackheart Man, yarimwo indirimbo zizwi nka Dreamland na Fighting Against Conviction, yiyumviriye igihe yari mw'ibohero. Yabandanije asohora album zakunzwe cane harimwo Rock 'n' Groove yo mu 1981 na Bunny Wailer Sings The Wailers yo mu 1980, aho yasubiyemwo zimwe mu ndirimbo bari bararirimbanye n'abandi mu mugwi. Mu myaka ya 1990 yaronse Grammy award ya album za reggae za mbere nzinza kurusha izindi incuro zitatu, aho hose akaba yagumye akomeza kandi agumya iragi rya Bob Marley na Wailers: iyo mu 1991, Time Will Tell: A Tribute to Bob Marley; iyo mu 1995, Crucial! Roots Classics; n'iyo mu 1997, A Tribute to Bob Marley's 50th Anniversary (guhimbaza imyaka 50 y'isabukuru ya Bob Marley). "Ndanezerezwa no kumenya ko ndiko ndafasha inzira yo gushikana reggae aho igeze. Ndashimishwa no kubigiramwo uruhara'', ivyo yabibwiye Washinton Post mu 2006.

column2: MISS KAYANZA: Neilla Mutoniwimana niwe yatsinze, imbonekarimwe ku Batwa mu Burundi
column3: "Ni iteka rinini kuri jewe nk'umukobwa w'umutwakazi kubona narashoboye gutsinda ihiganwa rya Miss Kayanza, ibitari bimenyerewe mu gihugu ko ubwoko bw'abatwa buja mu mahiganwa nk'ayo". Uyo ni Neilla Mutoniwimana, umwigeme w'umutwakazi yatsindiye ihiganwa rya Miss Kayanza, aho avuga ko yiteguriye no kuja mu yandi mahiganwa ku rwego rw'igihugu. Miss Kayanza ni ihiganwa rihuza abigeme bo mu ntara ya Kayanza ryatanguye kuva mu mwaka wa 2012 rikaba ritegurwa n'umurwi Umuco w'aba SCOUT. Yatowe mu bandi umunani bari muri iryo higanwa rigize icenda ryabaye ku wa 01 /01/2020, inyuma y'amezi atatu yose bari bamaze bitegura. Kubwo ishirahamwe ryateguye uyo mwigeme, intsinzi ya Neilla Mutoniwimana, ni amateka adasanzwe muri kahise k' u Burundi. Neilla Mutoniwimana ni umutwakazi yiga mu mwaka wa 12 kw'ishure ryisumbuye rya Muhanga avuka ku mutumba wa Gashibuka, ya zone na komine Muhanga  mu ntara ya Kayanza. Avugana na BBC, umwigeme Mutoniwimana ahanura abandi bigeme b'abatwakazi kureka kwikumira bakaja hamwe n'abandi, maze bashobore kugira uruhara mu kintu ico ari co cose giteguwe mu Burundi. Kubw'iwe, iyo wikumiriye, n'abandi baragukumira. Ati: "Narerekanye neza ko na twebwe dushoboye mu bintu vyose. Jewe sinikumira, iyaba narikumiriye sinari gushobora kuja muri iri higanwa. Nagize umwete kugira ngo nshobore kuvyifatamwo neza". Ku bateguye ihiganwa, uyo mwigeme yerekanye ubukerebutsi budasanzwe. Gilbert Biziyaremye arongoye  umuhari wa SCOUT mu ntara ya Kayanza ariwo wateguye iryo higanwa avuga ko vyabanezereje kuko bwari ubwa mbere babonye umwigeme w'umutwakazi asumbije abahutukazi n'abatutsikazi bari basanzwe batsindira iryo higanwa. Ati: "Mu gihe turiko turabategura twabona umengo ntavyo azoshobora, vyabonetse ko yari yibitse, maze ibintu bikomeye cane aca avyerekanira imbere y'abarorerezi". "Nivyo ko hahora hatsinda abahutukazi n'abatutsikazi gusa, ariko abibaza ko twoba twashize imbere ivyo ubwoko kugira ngo nabo baserukirwe sivyo na gato, yarabasumbije". Neilla Mutoniwimana yateguwe n'ishirahamwe Fondation FEMIDEJABAT risanzwe ririko rirategura ihiganwa MISS INAKARANGA  rizohuza abigeme b'abatwakazi mu gihugu cose. Nk'uko bivugwa na Isaac Bakanibona, umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa wa FEMIDEJABAT akaba kandi ariwe ahagarariye MISS INAKARANGA, iryo higanwa rifise intumbero yo guhimiriza abigeme b'abatwa no kubategura kugira ngo bazoshobore kwitabira ihiganwa rya MISS BURUNDI. Bwana Bakanibona  yabwiye BBC ko ari ibintu bihimbaye kubona umwana bateguye ashoboye guhiganwa n'abandi mbere akanabatsinda. Ati: " Twaramuhimirije twongera turamurungika kuja guhiganwa n'abandi bigeme bo mu Kayanza, arashikiriza imigambi y'imbonekarimwe yatangaje abari aho bose ku buryo yabonetse ko ari intwari n'incabwenge idasanzwe". Ahimiriza Abarundi n'amakungu ko boshigikira abigeme b'abatwakazi, eka n'abandi bigeme bose baboneka ko basigaye inyuma mu mateka kugira ngo nabo bashobore gufashwa, maze batere intambwe bashike ku rugero abandi bariko. Ati: "Kuko birerekana neza ko ata muntu n'umwe, iyo ashigikiye canke afashwe mu mugongo, atoshobora ikintu ico ari co cose". Mutoniwimana yarushije abariko bahiganwa nawe mu migambi yashikirije yo guteza imbere abigeme b'abatwakazi hamwe n'abandi bigeme muri rusangi, mu kubahimiriza kuja hamwe n'abandi, bakaja mu mashure bakirinda imbanyi z'ishushu zituma abigeme bamwe batabandanya amashure. Bwana Bakanibona avuga ko muri rusangi abigeme b'abatwa bakwije ibisabwa vyose muri ayo mahiganwa ahuza abigeme, ariko ko igikenewe ari ukubafata mu mugongo. Ati: "Twebwe nta bwoba dufise, no mw'ihiganwa rya MISS BURUNDI, ni ryategurwa neza, turizeye neza ko abo bana bacu tubandanya dutegura bazovyifatamwo neza bagatahana ikibanza ciza". Mu Burundi, Abarundi bo mu bwoko bw'Abatwa ni inkehwa zari zaribagiwe mu buzima bw'igihugu kuva imyaka itari mike, bamye bikumira, aho wasanga no mu kugabangana ubutegetsi bataharurwamwo. Hagati aho, amasezerano y'amahoro yateweko igikumu mu mwaka wa 2000 agatuma intambara yari yari yadutse hagati y'Abahutu n'Abatutsi mu 1993 igaharara, yarategekanijwe ibibanza vy'Abatwa mu bisata bitandukanye bigize ubuzima bw'igihugu. Haranatangujwe mbere n'amashirahamwe afise intumbero yo guhimiriza Abatwa kugira ngo bikangure baje hamwe n'abandi. Hagati aho, n'aho bamwe bariko barajijuka, haracibonekeza abatari bake bikumira, bakabona ko bobo atari nk'abandi barundi bagenzi babo b'Abahutu n'Abatutsi.

column2: DRC: umutegetsi mukuru wa Isilamu yaraye yishwe arashwe i Beni
column3: Umwe mu bategetsi bakuru b'idini rya Isilamu yaraye agandaguwe, arashwe n'abantu bataramenyekana mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo (DRC). Sheikh Ali Amini yarashwe amasasu menshi mu gihe yari arongoye amasengesho y'ejo ku mugoroba mu musigiti mukuru w'igisagara ca Beni mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Ubu bwicanyi bwabaye haciye amasaha make Perezida Félix Tshisekedi w'ico gihugu atangaje ko intara zibiri zigoswe kuva ku wa gatanu. Iki gitero cakozwe mu gihe c'Ukwezi Kweranda kwa Isilamu, Ramadan, cateye ubwoba bwinshi mu bantu. Nta murwi n'umwe uriyitirira ubu bwicanyi, ariko vyinshi mu bitero nk'ibi bimenyerewe bikorwa n'inyeshamba z'umurwi ADF zirwanya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda. Umurwi Etat Islamique (IS) nawo wariyitiriye bimwe mu bitero vyayo, ariko gushika ubu ntibiratomoreka neza imigenderanire ufitaniye na ADF. Imbere y'uko iki gitero kiba, ibigwati bibiri vyo muri ako karere vyari vyatewe n'abikekwa ko ari izo nyeshamba za ADF, umurwi umaze igihe ukiririmbira muri ako karere, kuva mu myaka ya 1990. Ibi bibaye mu gihe abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bafise impungenge ku ngingo ya Perezida Tshisekedi yo gutangaza ko intara zibiri - Kivu ya Ruguru na Ituri - zigoswe n'ingabo z'igihugu. Bafise ubwoba ko igisirikare kigiye kwongererezwa ububasha mu gihe kivugwa ko gifise amateka mabi cane y'ihohotera.

column2: 'Umukuru wa Twitter Elon Musk 'ntari hejuru y’amategeko'' - Umugenzuzi wa US
column3: Kimwe mu bigo vy’ubugenzuzi vya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kivuga ko kiriko kirakurikiranira hagufi ingene ibintu biriko biragenda muri Twitter "n’impungenge nyinshi". Ni inyuma y’aho hari abakozi bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu bajejwe amabanga hamwe no kwubahiriza amategeko bavugwa ko batanze imihoho. Umurwi w’igihugu ujejwe ubucuruzi (Federal Trade Commission,FTC) uvuga ko umukuru w'urwo rubuga mushasha Elon Musk atari  "hejuru y’amategeko ". Mu yandi makuru, Musk avugwa ko yoba yarabwiye abakozi ko n’ivyo kwugara bishoboka. Iyi kompanyi iri mu mayira abiri kuva aho Musk atanguriye kwirukana ibihumbi n’ibihumbi vy’abakozi mu ndwi iheze. Ubushobozi bwo kugura 'status' ku bakoresha uru rubuga mu gihe ari uwiyandikishije gushasha bwongereje impungenge ko Twitter ishobora kwuzura ama konte y’ibinyoma. Ejo ku wa kane, Yoel Roth, yari arongoye igisata ca Twitter kijejwe umutekano yashize umwidondoro mushasha kuri runo rubuga hwaniro amenyesha ko atakiri muri ico kibanza. Amakuru avuga ko umukuru w’igisata kijejwe amakuru y’ibanga Damien Kieran be n’umukuru w’igisata kijejwe ivyo kwubahiriza amategeko Marianne Fogarty batanze imihoho. N’uwujejwe umutekano muri iyo kompanyi Lea Kissner na we nyene yaratanze imihoho. Kubona aba bantu baragiye bishobora kwongereza ivyago vya Twitter vyo guhonyanga amabwirizwa y’ubugenzuzi. Mu kwezi kwa gatanu, iyi kompanyi yaraciwe ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 150 kubera kugurisha amakuru y’abayikoresha, bikaba vyabaye ngombwa ko yemera ko hashingwa ayandi mabwirizwa mashasha ajanye no gucungera amakuru y’ibanga. Douglas Farrar, umukuru w’igisata kijejwe imigenderanire muri FTC, avuga ati: "Turiko turakurikirana ibiherutse kuba kuri Twitter n’impungenge nyinshi”. "Nta muyobozi canke ikompanyi iri hejuru y’amategeko, kandi amakompanyi ategerezwa gukurikiza ivyo twemeranije”. Farrer avuga ko FTC ifise “ibikoresho bishasha biyiha ubushobozi bwo kugenzura ko kompanyi iriko ikurikiza ivyo yiyemeje kandi turiteguye kubikoresha”. Twitter yarishe ihadabu mu kwezi kwa gatanu inyuma yo kwagirizwa ko yari yagurishije mu buryo buteye kubiri n’amategeko amakuru y’ibanga y’abayikoresha kugira biyifashe kugurisha amatanganzo yo kwamamaza. Iruhande y’iri hadabu, yategerejwe kwemera amabwirizwa mashasha, kandi ikemera gushiraho umugambi  ukomeye wo gucungera amabanga n’umutekano vy’abayikoresha – bigenzurwa n’aba bategetsi bavugwa ko batanze imihoho. Kuva afashe mu minwe Twitter, Musk yarirukanye uwahoze ari umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa Parag Agrawal hamwe n’abandi bategetsi bo hejuru, mbere n’abajejwe ibikorwa vyo kwamamaza n’amasoko na bo nyene baragiye. Ibi vyose biza kwongereza amakenga kuba Twitter idafise abantu bakwiye bashobora gucungera nimba ibandanya igendera ku mategeko ngenderwako. Vyongeye, amwe mu makompanyi makuru makuru yamamaza yaratewe ubwoba n'inzira Musk ariko atwaramwo iyi kompanyi y’urubuga hwaniro. Twitter yinjiza amafaranga yayo hafi yose biciye mu kwamamaza, ariko amakompanyi amwe amwe yabaye arabangira kurekura amahera yayo, mu gihe acihweza impinduka Musk ariko arazana. Amakompanyi amwe amwe avugwa ko afise amakenga ko Musk azodegura mu mategeko yo kugenzura ibica ku rubuga rwiwe mbere anahindure ingingo zo kwugara imbuga z’abantu bamwe bamwe bateje ibibazo, harimwo na Donald Trump yahoze arongoye Amerika. Bivugwa ko Musk yoba yarabwiye abakozi bari mu nama ko atabona neza kazoza k’ingene ubutunzi bwiyongera muri iyo kompanyi, kandi ko atawoshira kure guhomba burundu. Twitter yarasabwe kugira ico ishikirije. Urubuga ngurukanabumenyi The Verge ari na rwo rwasohoye ijambo ryose Musk yashikirije abakozi, ruvuga ko Twitter itagifise igisata c’ukumenyesha amakuru.

column2: Megan Thee Stallion 'yakomeretse arashwe', bigasa nk'uko yakomeretse ku kirenge
column3: Umuririmvyi wa  rap wo muri Amerika Megan Thee Stallion yavuze ko "ashima kuba akiri muzima" nyuma yo kuraswa mu kirenge, ariko nta vyinshi yavuze kuri ivyo bikomere hamwe n'uko vyagenze. Uyu muririmvi w'indirimbo ikunzwe cane Savage, yavuze ko "yagize ibikomere arashwe" kuwa Mungu kandi bikaba vyitezwe ko atora mitende. Hariho Video imwerekana bisa nk'uko ariko aravirirana ku kirenge igipolisi kimaze guhagarika imodoka irimwo n'uwundi muraperi Tory Lanez. Uwo muraperi mu nyuma yagirijwe icaha co kugendana ikirwanisho kinyegeje. Igipolisi cavuze ko umuntu umwe yagize "igikomere ku kuguru". Uwo muraperi yavukiye i Texas, mu bisanzwe yitwa Megan Pete, yagiye kw'isonga ry'abaririmvyi bakunzwe muri Amerika mu kwa gatanu kubera indirimbo yiwe Savage. Iyo ndirimbo, yabaye iyikoreshwa cane n'abaja ku rubuga TikTok, yanashitse mu kibanza ca gatatu mu Bwongereza, kubera kuyisubiramwo hakajamwo na Beyonce. Megan yanabaye umuraperi w'umugore yarushije abandi mu duhembo twa BET Awards mu kwezi guheze, arusha Cardi B, Nicki Minaj na Lizzo. Vyari vyavuzwe ko yakomeretse ku kirenge akomerekejwe n'ikimanyu c'ikirahure mu vyabereye i Holliwood Hills, Lanez yafatiwemwo. Ariko yagiye kuri Instagram ejo kuwa Gatatu avuga ko "ashaka gushira vyose ku mugaragaro". Yanditse ati "kuwa Mungu mu gitondo, nararashwe ku kirenge, kubera ububisha nakorewe mu ntumbero yo kungirira nabi". "Sinigeze mfatwa, abapolisi banjanye kwa muganga aho nabazwe kugira bankuremwo amasasu. "Ndashima cane kuba ndi muzima kandi bikaba vyitezwe ko nkira neza, ariko vyari ngombwa kuri jewe ko ntanga umuco ku vyabaye muri iryo joro ritari ryoroshe." Yanditse kandi ati: "Ibi vyambayeko vyambereye icigwa gikomeye hamwe n'umuhezagiro unyegeje. Birambabaza kuba nararinze kubabara gutya kugira menye kwikingira."

column2: Ntahokatarondererwa: Ornella Uwimana yize ivyo kuvura kuri kaminuza ariko akora intebe mu mapine
column3: Umwigeme Ornella Uwimana yahejeje ivyigwa vy'amagara y'abantu muri kaminuza mu 2020 ubu akaba akora akazi ko gukora intebe mu mapine. Intebe za mbere yazikoze mu 2016 akiri ku ntebe y'ishure, umuvyeyi wiwe aca arazimugurira kugira amutere intege. Agira ati:"Naguze amapine umunani ku bihumbi mirongo ine, hanyuma nca ndayakoramwo intebe. "Mu kuntera intege, umuvyeyi wanje arazishima aca arazingurira azishira kw'ibaraza" Ornella avuga ko akunda kwiyigisha gukora ibintu bitandukanye kuri YouTube. Ahejeje kaminuza mu gisata c'ivy'amagara y'abantu "Sante Publique" mu 2020, ivyo gukora intebe mu mapine yaciye abigira umwuga. Avuga ko abona ko amaze gutera imbere ugereranije n'aho yatanguriye. Agira ati: "Natanguye nkorera muhira ariko ubu narakotesheje ikibanza nkoreramwo ndiha ku kwezi. "Nkoresha abakozi batatu baza buri musi, n'abandi bane baza igihe mba ndabakeneye." Gushika ubu avuga ko yoba ageze ku mutahe wa miliyoni zine z'amarundi. Ornella Uwimana ahanura urwaruka kwubahuka gukora ico ari co cose rubona gishobora kuruteza imbere. Avuga ko hari benshi bagaya akazi canke ntibashiruke umwete wo kugakora. Ati: "Hari abambona ndiko ndahiga amapine bagatangara. Bakanayanyima nkarinda guca ku bafundi b'imodoka "Hari n'abantwenga bambonye ndiko ndatobora amapine kandi baheruka nari nagiye gusigisha inzara. "Ubu ariko batanguye gutahura kuko babona ntanguye gutera imbere. Uburundi buherutse gushinga umugambi wa PAEEJ (Programme d'Autonomisation Economique et d'Emploi des Jeunes Diplômés), werekeye urwaruka ruhejeje amashure kugira rwishingire imigambi yo gukora. Uwo mugambi reta yawuhaye imiriyaridi 48 z'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ariko n'ubu hari abacibaza uruhara nyarwo rwa PAEEJ, mu gihe abandi bafise amakenga ko bashobora gufasha koko urwaruka kwigenga mu butunzi rukareka kuzera inze.

column2: Ingabo za Ukraine zateye intambwe mu bumanuko zitera zisugereza Kherson
column3: Ingabo za Ukraine zatoboye ibirindiro vy’ingabo z’Uburusiya ku ruzi Dnieper mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw’igisagara ca Kherson, igisagara ngirakamaro ku ngabo z’Uburusiya zikigenzura, mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine. Igisirikare c’Uburusiya n’abategetsi bashizweho n’Uburusiya nyene muri ako karere nibo batangaje aya makuru y’iyi ntambwe yatewe nabasirikare ba Ukraine, bakavuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya zihanganye nabo bikomeye. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko “hari uduce dushasha twabohojwe mu turere tutari duke”. Mu buseruko, ingabo za Ukraine zarasatiriye gushika mu ntara ya Luhansk iri mu minwe y’Uburusiya. Perezida Zelensky avuga ko "intambara zikomeye zibandanya mu turere twinshi", aho hari mw’ijambo yama ashikiriza buri mugoroba ku gihugu, ariko nta nsiguro yatanze. Ku wa gatandatu, ingabo ziwe zarabohoje igisagara gikomeye ca Lyman mu buseruko, kikaba kiri hafi y’urubibe rw’intara ya Luhansk. Uburusiya bwari bwagize Lyman ikirindiro co gushikizamwo uburyo nkenerwa bw’urugamba.. Abarwanyi begamiye Uburusiya mu ntara ya Luhansk bemeza ko ingabo za Ukraine zinjiye ibirometero bikeya hagati mu ntara ya Luhansk. Amakuru avuga ko abanya-Ukraine bariko batera basatira ibisagara biri mu minwe y’Uburusiya vya Kremenna na Svatove muri Luhansk. Mu bumanuko, Vladimir Saldo, umukuru wa Kherson yashizweho n’Uburusiya, avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zatoboye zigashika hafi ya Dudchany, igisagara kiri ku ruzi Dnieper, ku birometero hafi 30 uvuye ahahora habera urugamba. Abanya-Ukraine uru ruzi barwita Dnipro. Saldo  ati: "Hari ibigwati biri mu minwe y’ingabo za Ukraine”. Ni mu gihe hari amakuru amwe avuga ko abanya-Ukraine ubu bafashe Dudchany. Umuvugizi w’ubushikiranganji bw’Uburusiya bujejwe kwivuna abansi, Igor Konashenkov, avuga ko vya bimodoka ntamenwa “vyinshi kudusumba vyinjiye hagati”, mu bumanuko bwa Zolota Balka, ikigwati cahoze kiberamwo urugamba ku ruzi Dnieper. Avuga ko Abarusiya bishe abasirikare ba Ukraine hafi 130 muri iyo ntambara. Nk’uko Saldo abivuga, ibatayo (bataillons) zibiri za Ukraine zagerageje kwinjira ku rugomero rw’umuyagankuba rwa Kakhovka, ku birometero hafi 70 mu buseruko bwa Kherson. Uru rugomero ruri mu gisagara ca Nova Kakhovka  kiri ku nkengera. Ingabo za Ukraine ziriko zisatira mu ntumbero yo kuraba ingene zozibira amayira ajana uburyo ku ngabo zishika 25.000 z’Uburusiya ziri mu burengero bw’uruzi Dnieper, nk’uko vyandikwa n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru Reuters. Utera uva mu buraruko bushira uburengero bwa Kherson, vya muzinga vya Ukraine vyononye cane ikiraro ca Antonivsky, ikiraro gikomeye ku ngabo z’Uburusiya ziri muri ico gisagara. Kherson na Luhansk ziri mu ntara zine Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya aherutse gutangaza ko zegukira Uburusiya, inyuma y’icitwa amatora ya kamarampaka yiyamirijwe na Kyiv n’intuci zayo zo mu Burengero. Uburusiya ntibugenzura intara n’imwe yose muri izo zine. Ibintu vyagiye gukomerana igisirikare c’Uburusiya inyuma y’amasaha make gusa y’ijambo rya Putin ryo ku wa gatanu hamwe n’ibirori bikomeye mu kibanza c’amakoraniro (Place Rouge/Red Square ) i Moscou mu kwigina intambwe Uburusiya bwari buhejeje gutera yo kwihagira ubutaka bwa Ukraine. Kyiv yariyemeje ko izoruhuka ibohoje ubutaka bwose bwihagiwe n’Uburusiya, harimwo mbere na ka karere ka Crimée/Crimea kigaruriwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya mu 2014. Ubushikiranganji bw’Uburusiya bujejwe kwivuna abansi bumenyesha ko abanditswe kugira ngo binjire mu gisirikare ku kamo katewe na Putin mu kwezi guheze ubu bariko bahabwa imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare y’urutavanako mu turere tugenzurwa n’Uburusiya tw’intara za Luhansk na Donetsk. Kremlin itegura kwinjiza izindi ngabo zababa 300.000 – n’aho Putin ata gitigiri ntabanduka yashinze.

column2: Ukraine - Russia: Umukenguzamateka wa US yarakaje Abarusiya inyuma y'aho asabiye ko Putin yicwa
column3: Umukenguzamateka wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika asaba ko mu begereye Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya  hogira umwe muri bo amwica. Lindsey Graham avuga ko inzira yonyene yorangiza igitero Uburusiya bwakoze kuri Ukraine ari uko hoboneka umuntu "agakuraho uyu mugabo". Mw'itangazo yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, uyu mukenguzamateka wo mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika azwi ko atarya umunwa abaza nimba hatoboneka umuntu nka "Brutus" mu bantu ba Putin akamwirahira maze intambara igaca ihagarara. Aya majambo yarakaje uwuserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika. Umukenguzamateka Graham aserukira intara ya Caroline du Sud, yanditse ati: "Woba ukoreye igikorwa kidasanzwe igihugu cawe n'isi yose". "Nta mu Brutus mu Burusiya? Nta Colonel Stauffenberg yoba ari mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya?" Brutus yari umunyaporitike w''icahoze ari ingoma y'Abaromani (Empire Romain/Roman Empire) yishe Julius Caesar, mu gihe Koroneri (Colonel) Claus von Stauffenberg wo mu gisirikare c'Ubudagi azwi cane ko yagerageje kwica Adolf Hitler mu 1944. Anatoly Antono aserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika avuga ko aya majambo "ari mabi cane kandi adashobora kwihanganirwa". Avuga ko ata "muntu yari yiteze urwanko nk'uru ku Burusiya muri Amerika". "Ni ibintu bitumvikana kwumva umukenguzamateka w'igihugu gishira imbere ko imico myiza ari yo ikwiye kuba 'inyenyeri' imurikira isi yose ashobora kwiyumvira ko iterabwoba ari yo nzira ya Washington yo gushika ku nyungu zayo ku rubuga mpuzamakungu". Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika ariyamiriza igitero c'Uburusiya kuri Ukraine mbere akaba yarafatiye ibihano abanyaporitike harimwo na Perezida Putin we nyene ubwiwe. Avuga ko Amerika izokingira ibihugu vya OTAN/NATO ariko akaba atazorungika ingabo muri Ukraine. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Maison Blanche/White House Jen Psaki yashimangiye ko amajambo ya  Graham adasigura na gato "aho reta ya Amerika ihagaze kandi ko atari amajambo ushobora kwumva mu kanwa k'umuntu uw'ari we wese akorera ubu butegetsi". Amajambo y'umukenguzamateka  Graham yashavuje kandi umuvugizi wa Kremlin Dmitry Peskov. Igihe yatera akamo Abarusiya bose kuba umwe, yavuze ati: "Ni vyo, muri ino misi hari abantu bashobora kuvuga ibisunitswe n'impemu, si bose bashobora kugira ubwenge buri ku murongo".

column2: Itegeko rya Sharia ni iki? Rivuze iki ku bagore bo muri Afghanistan?
column3: Aba Taliban bavuga ko bazotwara Afghanistan hisunzwe ata guhesha ingingo z'amategeko  ya Islam zizwi nk'itegeko rya Sharia. Uwo mugwi washikiriye intsinzi umaze gufata umugwa mukuru Kabul, gutyo urangaza  imyaka hafi 20 y'uruhara rw'ingabo mpuzamakungu zari zirongowe na Amerika uri ico gihugu. Hariko haba iki muri Afghanistan? Mu kiganiro ca mbere n'abamenyeshamakuru inyuma yo gufata Kabul, umuvugizi w'aba Taliban yavuze ko ibibazo bimwe bimwe nk'ivyerekeye ibinyamakuru n'uburenganzira bw'abagore bizokwubahirizwa hisunzwe "itegeko rya Islam", ariko uwo mugwi nturasigura ico ivyo bizoba bivuze mu ngiro canke mu bikorwa. Uwatsinzindiye agashimwe k'amahoro ka Nobel Malala Yousafzai - yarashwe n'aba Taliban afise imyaka 15 ahorwa guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakobwa bwo kuja mu mashure muri Pakistan - yagabishije ko ingene aba Taliban batahura itegeko rya Sharia bishbora kuba akaga ku bakobwa n'abagore muri Afganistan. Yabwiye BBC ati: " Nararonse akaryo ko kuvugana na bamwe mu baharanira uburenganzira muri Afghanistan, barimwo abo mu mashirahamwe y'abagore, nabo barafise ayo makenga ko batazi ico ubuzima bwabo bugiye kuba." "Benshi baribuka ivyariko biraba mu 1996-2001, gutyo bakaba bafise amakenga menshi ku mutekano wabo, uburenganzira bwabo, ugukingirwa [no] gusubira kuja mu mashure." Igijhe aba Taliban baheruka ku butegetsi  abagore ntibari bemerewe gukora akazi canke kuja mw'ishure. Kuva ku myaka umunani, abakobwa bategerezwa kwambara burka, abagore nabo bakaba bari barekuriwe kuja ahabona  ari uko baherekejwe n'umuntu w'umugabo wo mu muryango. Abagore babirenzeko barakubitwa abantu barorera. Ministre w'Ubwongereza ajejwe intwaro yo hagati Madame Priti Patel, avuga ku migambi ya reta yo kwakira impunzi 20.000 z'abanya-Afghanistan mu Bwongereza, yavuze ko atizeye ukwizeza kwatanzwe [n'aba Taliban]. Yabwiye BBC ko uwo mugwi ufise kahise ko gukandamiza abagore, kandi ko "ivyo bitagiye guhinduka buno nyene". Itegeko rya Sharia n'indinganzizo y'amategeko ya Islam. Riva muri Koran, inyandiko shingiro ya Islam, hamwe na fatwa - imanza ziba zaciwe n'inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam. Sharia ubundi risigura  "inzira igaragara, icamwo abantu benshi igana ku mazi". Itegeko rya Sharia rikora nk'igitabo c'ingingo zigenga ukubaho aba Islam bose bategerezwa kwisunga, harimwo amasengesho, kwisonzesha no gufasha abakene. Rigamije gufasha aba-Islam gutahura ingene bategerezwa kwigenza mu kintu icarico cose c'ubuzima bwabo hisunzwe ingene Imana ibishaka. Sharia rishobora guha insiguro icarico cose kijanye n'ubuzima bwa minsi yose  bw'umu-Islam. Nk'akarorero, nk'umu-Islam atazi neza ico yokora aronse ubutumire bw'abo bakorana kugira bajane mu kabare inyuma y'akazi  ashobora kuraba inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam kugira amugire inama maze akore ibijanye n'amategeko y'idini ryabo. Ibindi bice vy'ubuzima bwa minsi yose aho aba-Islam bashobora kubaza inzobere ingene bovyifatamwo n'amategeko agenga umuryango, amafaranga hamwe n'imirimo y'ubugwizatunga. Sharia ishira ivyaha mu migwi mikuru mikuru ibiri: ivyaha vya ''hadd", biba ari ivyaha bikomeye cane bifise n'ibihano bizwi, hamwe n'ivyaja vya ''tazir'' aho igihano gishingwa n'umucamanza. Ivyaha vya ''hadd'' birimwo ukwiba, gushobora guhanishwa guca ikiganza c'uwagiriwe n'ico caha, hamwe n'ubusambanyi bw'abarenze ibigo, bushobora guhanishwa kwicishwa amabuye. Amwe mu mashirahamwe ya Islam avuga ko hari inzitizi  nyisnhi hamwe n'umurundo w'ivyemezo bikenerwa mw'ishirwa mu ngiro ry'ibihano vya hadd. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ryariyamirije kwicisha  amabuye, rivuga ko ari ''iyica rubuzo canke ubundi buryo bwo gufata canke guhana umuntu  bunyamaswa, ata buntu, butesha agaciro ko rero bubujijwe". Si ibihugu vyose vya Islam bishira mu ngiro  ivyo bihano vya hadd  kandi amatohoza amaze kwerekana ko  aba-Islam babona mu buryo butandukanye cane  ibijanye n'ibihano ruhasha. Apostasy, canke uguta ukwemera, n'ikibazo kitavugwako rumwe cane mu ba-Islam kandi abahinga bavuga ko inzobere nyinshi mu vyigwa vya Islam zivuga ko ico caha gihanishwa urupfu. Ariko hari umugwi muto w'incabwenge z'aba Islam cane cane abakorana n'ibihugu vya Buraya, bavuga ko ukuri kw'isi ya none gusigura ko ''igihano'' gikwiye kurekerwa Imana - kandi ko Islam ubwayo itageramiwe n'uguta ukwemera. Na Koroan ubwayo ivuga ko ''ata guhata'' mu bijanye n'idini. Nko ku yandi mategeko yose, Sharia rirazitanye kandi kurishira mu ngiro bihagarara ahanini ku bwiza n'ubumenyi bw'abahinga. Abanyamategeko b'aba-Islam batanga intumbero n'ingingo bashinze. Intumbero ifatwa nk'urubanza rwaciwe yitwa fatwa. Hari amashure atanu  atandukanye y'itegeko rya Sharia. Hari inyigisho zine za Sunni: Hanbali, Maliki, Shafi'i na Hanafi, hamwe rero n'inyigisho imwe ya Shia, yitwa  Shia Jaafari. Izo nyigisho zitanu zitandukanye ku buryo   zisobanura, ijambo ku rindi, inyandiko itegeko rya Sharia rikomokako.

column2: Covid-19: Afrika y’Epfo yatoye ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus
column3: Abashakashatsi batoye ubwoko bushasha (variant)  bw'umugera wa coronavirus muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ubwo bwoko bushasha C.1.2, bwatowe ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa gatanu, ubu bumaze kuboneka mu ntara zitari munsi ya 6 kuri 9 zigize igihugu. Abahinga bavuga ko bwandukira co kimwe n'ubusanzwe bwiganje mu gihugu muri iki gihe aribwo Delta. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru, ikigo c'igihugu gikurikirana indwara zandukira (NICD) cavuze ko ubwo bwoko bushasha "bushobora,  ku bice bikeya,  kunanira ubudahangarwa [ariko] incanco ziguma zitanga urugero runini rwo gukinga kurwara gushika aho uja mu bitaro canke upfa". Cavuze kandi ko n'ubwo gushika ubu atari ubwoko buteye impungenge cane - nka Delta ishobora gutera kurwara ukaremba - burandukira cane. Ikigo NICD cavuze ko ubwo bwoko bishoboka ko bwoba ubwoko buteye amakenga arico gituma abahinga bazoguma bakurikirana ingene bugenda burahindagurika - mu gihe hari amakenga ko hashobora kuba umupfunda mushasha w'indwara ya Covid mu mezi ari imbere bitewe n'ukwihindagura kw'ubwo bwoko. N'ubwo benshi mu bamaze kwandura C.1.2  bavugwa muri Afrika y'Epfo, ubwo bwoko buravugwa mu bindi bihugu bitatu vyo muri Afrika, co kimwe no mu Buswise, Portugal n'Ubushinwa - hakurikirijwe icegeranyo kirindiriye kwigirwa hamwe. Abahinga bariko barihweza ingene ubu bwoko burwana n'abasoda umubiri uhabwa kugira uhangane na coronavirus. Bariko kandi biga ukungene bugenda buhindagurika n'ingene bwandukira. Maria van Kerkhove, ajejwe igisata c'ubuhinga mu vyerekeye Covid-19 mw'ishirahamwe ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO avuga ko ubu bwoko "budasa n'uburiko burakwiragira ku muvuduko munini". Avuga ko gushika ubu, ubwoko bwa Delta ari bwo burwiriye kandi ko OMS/WHO izoburira abantu mu gihe ibi bihindutse. Gushika ubu Afrika y'Epfo nico  gihugu ca mbere kirangwamwo abantu benshi bandura umugera wa corona muri Afrika. Abamaze kwandura bashika  miriyoni 2 n'ibihumbi 700, abamaze kwicwa na Covid nabo barenga ibihumbi 80.

column2: Ni nde yanditse Bibiliya ?
column3: Na Edison Veiga BBC News Brazil Kuba Katolika, Bibiliya igizwe n’ibitabo 73. Ku baporoti hari 66, nayo aba-orthodoxe bavuga ko hari 78. Ni mu gihe Abayahudi bemera ibitabo 39 gusa, ibi bikaba ari ivyo abakirisu bavuga ko ari ivyo mw’isezerano rya kera. Aha turiko tuvuga igitabo kigurishwa cane gusumba ibindi vyose muri kahise k’isi, Bibiliya Nyeranda, ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo vyahinduwe mu ndimi zababa 3.000 – aho ibirenga imiriyaridi 3.9 bimaze kugurishwa kw’isi yose, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuryango wa Bibliya wa Brezili (Société biblique du Brésil). Ariko none, ni bande banditse ibi bitabo? Dufashe ko ari ibitabo vya kera cane, imbere y’uko abanditsi ba none batangura kwandika uko bandika, biragoye kuronkera iki kibazo inyishu nyayo. Intango y’iki kiyago ni ukubanza kumenya nimba ari ukugifatira ku bijanye n’idini gusa, canke nimba gikwiye gufatira ku buhinga n’ubumenyi. Umuhinga mu vya kahise no mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana Gerson Leite de Moraes asanzwe yigisha kuri kaminuza Mackenzie Presbyterian University avuga ati: "Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kubera hari imbono zibiri. Imbono ya mbere ishingiye ku kwemera Imana gushingiye ku masengero, aha tukaba dufise abiga ibijanye no kwemera Imana kubera bashaka kuba abapasitori/abapatiri mu muryango kanaka, imbono kama ». Kubw’iwe, inyigisho z’amasabamana ziganisha ku busaseredoti/ubupasitori, zitegerezwa « kugendera ku nyigisho z’uko ivyanditswe vyavugishijwe, ni ukuvuga ko ari ivyavuzwe n’Imana yo nyene ubwayo, iciye kuri Mutima Mweranda/Mpwemu Yera ». Avuga ati : "Ku rundi ruhande, inyigisho ku bijanye no kwemera Imana zishingiye ku buhinga ntizirajwe ishinga n’iyo mbono, ahubwo zozo zirondera kwihweza uko izi nyandiko zaje ufatiye ku bihe vya kahise ». Muri iyi nzira, turashobora gutahura ibitabo vya mbere vya Bibiliya, ibigize vya bitabo bitanu vya mbere bizwi nka Pentateuque (canke nka Torah y’Abayahudi), ko ari icegeranyo c’inyandiko zanditswe ubwa mbere imyaka hafi 1.000 imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Ibi ni Amamuko/Itanguriro, Ihunga, Abalewi, Guharura/Kubara  hamwe na Gutegeka kwa Kabiri  (Deuteronome)  - ibitabo bivuga ivyerekeye kuva kw’irema ry’isi gushika ku rupfu rwa Musa. Kubera ari ivya kera, abahinga bavuga ko bigoye kumenya neza na neza abavyanditse. Kubw’amayagwa y’idini, ibi bitabo bitanu vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe, Musa. José Luiz Goldfarb, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Katorika y’i São Paulo akaba arongoye n’igisata c’imico y’ikiyahudi mu murwi A Hebraica, avuga ati : "Nsomye nkongera nkavugana n’umusiguzi akongera akaba n’umukinyi w’ivyese, Haroldo de Campos (1929-2003), nahakuye icigwa ko hari inzira zibiri zishoboka. Iyo yo mw’isinagoga ivuga ko Musa ari we yanditse Torah. Tubifata nk’uko twama ‘twumviriza’ Musa buri ndwi [ibisomwa], kandi ibi bifise agaciro mu mico y’abantu ». Ihengama ry’abahinga ntiryemera ibivugwa ko ibi bitabo vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe. Ati : "Ku bijanye n’inyigisho za Bibiliya, tuvuga ibitabo vyanditswe mu myaka irenga 600 ». "Uku niko umwihwezo wa Harold urangira hampande y’ubushakashatsi yagize kuri Bibiliya, kubisigarira vy’ivya kera (archeoloie), ku bisigarira no ku nzandiko zo guhayagiza ». Avuga ko umwihwezo wimbitse w’izi nzandiko ufasha kubitadukanya ufatiye ku nyubako, amajambo azigize, n’ibirimwo ufatiye ku banditsi mu bihe bitandukanye vyo muri kahise. Ni iciyumviro cemerwa neza. Uri Lam wo mu muryango Templo Beth-El w’abanya-Israel muri São Paulo asigura ati: "Biragoye cane kuvuga ivy’ibihe canke abanditsi kuko umuntu atakara. Amatohoza y’abahinga yemeza ko izi nyandiko zifise imyaka iri hagati ya 2.700 na 3.000 canke gusumba aho kubera vyahererekanwa ku munwa ». Kubw’iwe, izo nyandiko zaratagatifujwe – ni ukuvuga ko zegeranijwe hanyuma zifatwa ko ari izigize Bibiliya y’Abahebreyi– amaja mu kinjana ca IV imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Lam yemera ati : "Ariko n’aho nyene, hari impari nyinshi, kandi ntidushobora kurangiza iki kibazo ». Goldfarb abona akarusho muri ibi vyo gufatira hamwe izi nyandiko hamwe no kuzifatira mu mice itandukanye. Yibaza ati : "Nimba ari inyandiko zamaze imyaka 600, ibi ni vyiza ku bantu bakunda ibikorwa. Ni bangahe bashoboye gusohora inyandiko mu karere kamwe canke akandi ? ». Muri ico gihe nyene ivy’abanditsi bitandukanye n’ivy’ubu, ingorane nk’izi nyene zo kumenya koko uwanditse zirabandanya mu bindi bitabo biri muri Bibiliya y’Abayahudi – ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo bigize isezerano rya kera muri bibliya ya gikirisu. Goldfarb ati: "Nk’akarorero, zaburi za Dawudi. Ni agatabo gato abantu bakoresha cane mu bisabisho n’indirimbo vya misi yose kegeranya indirimbo Dawudi yakunda kuririmba mw’isinagoga. "Tuvuga ko yari umuririmvyi kandi ko ibi bisabisho vyaririmbwa. Ni nde abizi ? Ni ikibazo ciza:  ku vyo nize ngasoma, jewe ntavyo nokwemeza… ». Moraes nawe ati: "Ikiri ukuri ni uko habaye benshi banditse ibiri muri Bibiliya ». "Igishoboka cane ni uko inkuru ziri mu vyanditswe muri bibiliya muri kino gihe imbere y’aha vyahanahanwa ku munwa igisekuru ku kindi. Kandi iri ryagumye ari itunga karanga ry’idini ry’aba bantu ». Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza ati: "Ni ukumenya kandi ko ivyo abitirirwa inyandiko mu gihe ca kera bitandukanye n’ivyo dufise ubu. Ico gihe, vyari bikunze kuba ko inyandiko kanaka yitirirwa umutware mukuru, umutegetsi akundwa, umuntu akomeye ». Aha niho rero, abanywanyi b’inyigisho zimwe zimwe, iyo bahinduye ivyo bazi bakabishira mu nyandiko, bakunda kuzitunganya nk’uko umengo ni ikintu canditswe na ba shebuja. Moraes  yongerako ati : "Kubiraba Torah, ushaka kuvuga ko izi nzandiko zanditswe na Musa? Bishobora kuba atari vyo. Kumbure afise kuba yarabigizemwo uruhara. Hari bamwe bavuga ko ata ruhara na rutoya yagize. "Ariko ni inyandiko zitirirwa Musa." Kubw’iwe, igikenewe ni uko izi nyandiko nyeranda birangira zitiriwe amadini. Moraes yibaza ko ari ibintu vyumvikana ko ibitabo vyeranda vyanditswe, nk’akarero, inyuma y’ishingwa ry’igihugu ca Israel gusumba ibihe bivugwamwo, nk’ibijanye n’ihunga ry’Abayahudi bava mu Misiri, barongowe na Musa. Ati: "Iyumvire igico c’abantu bayerera mu bugaragwa. Ivyo kwicara ngo bandike si vyo bibaraza ishinga. Ikiraje ishinga uwuriko arayerera mu bugaragwa ni ukurondera ingene abaho. Mu myaka itari mike, vyabaye ngombwa ko bategura intambara kugira ngo baronke ubutaka…nta n’umwe yari anezwe ivyo kwandika ibitabo." Uyu mushakashatsi ati: "Ikintu kinini gishoboka, ni uko ibi vyagiye kuba hashinzwe umuryango wiyubatse neza." Ariko zari inkuru zidakomeye cane, z’ubwoko butandukanye, vyarangiye zegeranijwe zigashirwa  hamwe n’umwanditsi umwe canke benshi. Umuhinga mu nyandiko nyeranda, Thiago Maerki akaba n’umushakashatsi kw’ishure kaminuza rya São Paulo (Unifesp), akaba kandi ari mw’ishirahamwe Hagiography Society, muri Amerika, arashima cane iciyumviro co gukoresha ubumenyi bwa none mu vy’indimi mu kugerageza gushira hamwe canke gutandukanya inyandiko zigize Bibiliya. Kubw’iwe, abanditsi nk’umwigisha wa kaminuza Robert Alter, umunyamerika yigisha kw’ishure kaminuza ya California, "babivuga neza ", nk’igihe avuga ko ari vyiza "gukoresha uburyo bumwe bumwe bukoreshwa mu kwiga ibijanye n’ivya kahise k’indimi n’inyandiko mu kwiga inyandiko za Bibiliya". Maerki ati: "Arihweza ubuhinga bw’inyandiko, impinyanyuro z’amajambo yakoreshejwe, ubudasa mu gushikiriza ivyiyumviro, imyumvikano ikurikizwa mu bwoko bumwe bumwe bw’inyandiko ya Bibiliya, na buri mwanditsi. "Igihe cose kugira ngo ntihabe kuzana ivyataye igihe." Indinganizo y’amayagwa nayo nyene ishobora kwisungwa mu mwihwezo w’ibitabo bine vy’injili, ibitabo bivuga ubuzima bwa Yezu, bikaba vyitirirwa Matayo, Mariko, Luka na Yohani. Umushakashatsi kuri kahise k’idini rya Gikristu kw’ishure kaminuza Université pontificale grégorienne i Rome akongera akaba n’umuhinga ku bijanye na Vaticano Mirticeli Medeiros, arabishingira intahe ko, ata gukekeranya, abanditse ibi bitabo bine ari abo bagabo bane. Asigura ati : "Ku vy’Injili, nta mpari zihari [kuba zitirirwa], n’imiburiburi ufatiye ku bushakashatsi bwa vuba. Aha ni ukwibuka ko babiri mu banditsi bazo, Matayo na Yohani, bari abatumwa ba Yezu/Yesu. Aba bandi babiri, Mariko na Luka, ku ruhande rwabo, bateguye inyandiko zabo bisunze ivyo abatumwa bashingiye intahe." Maerki arasangamwo ubudasa mu mpinyanyuro z’amajambo muri ibi bitabo bine. Asigura ati : "Matayo afatwa nk’umwanditsi adakoresha impinyanyuro itaziguye, akoresha impinyanyuro isanzwe. Yohani akoresha ururimi rugoye, rwuzuye imizunguruko, imvugo ngereranyo. Luka akoresha imvugo inonosoye, ihanitse." Nimba mw’isezerano rya kera hari ibibazo vyinshi gusumba ibizwi ku bijanye n’abitirirwa ibitabo, inyandiko zo mw’isezerano rishasha, n’aho ari iza vuba kandi n’abazitirirwa bavugwa hafi muri zose, naho nyene harimwo ibibazo. Birazwi ko bimwe muri vyo vyatanguye kwandikwa imyaka 30 canke 40 inyuma y’urupfu rwa Yezu. Moraes avuga ko "bishoboka cane ko aya mazina yose [y’aba banditsi b’Injili bane] yaje biciye mu mico n’imigenzo." Ashimangira ati : "Nta zina ry’umuntu yitirirwa ibi bitabo vya kera cane." Igisa n’uko ata mpari gitera ni uko iya mbere muri izi njili ari iya Mariko. Ati: "Mu gihe hari igisekuru, igisekuru cakurikiranye ubuzima bwa Yezu gushika apfe, ni ngombwa ko kigumana inyandiko ku vyabaye. Rero nico gitangura ubwoko bushasha bw’impinyanyuro y’amajambo, ari yo Njili." Mu gushira hamwe imico n’imigenzo hamwe n’ivyahanahanwa ku munwa, uyu mwanditsi w’injili arandika neza ivy’ubuzima bwa Yezu. Ariko ahagarara cane ku gice yashaka guhagararako ico gihe: aha ni ukuvuga ko ata kigoro agira ko kuvuga ku vyerekeye ivuka canke ubwana bwa Yezu, ahagarara cane cane ku gikorwa ciwe, ku rupfu rwiwe, ku butumwa bwiwe bwa Pasika. None uyu Mariko yari umuntu ki ? Umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana (théologien) arerekana ko yari umwigishwa w’intumwa Petero. Ati: "Ariko abandi bazokubwira ko yari umwigishwa wa Paulo. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ico tuzi ni uko atari umwigishwa wa Yezu." Injili ya Yohani nayo nyene irimwo amakenga. Ahari amakenga ni aho avuga  «umwigishwa yakundwa cane», aha amayagwa akerekana ko yari Yohani. Moraes ati : "Ariko hariho abahinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana babona ahubwo ko yashobora kuba ari Lazaro, kuko mu njili harimwo umurongo [mu gice kivuga urupfu rwa Lazaro] uvuga ko Yezu yarize,  ‘hanyuma raba ingene yamukunda." Mu kinjana ca 20 ni ho abakristu batanguye kmwemeza ko Yohani ari we yanditse iyi Njili. "Amayagwa yabigize uko nyene, tubandanya tumwita Yohani. Ariko ntivyoroshe kumenya uwayanditse, ishobora mbere kuba yanditswe n’umurwi wa benshi." Kubw’uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana, ni vyiza ko tugumana iciyumviro c’uko ari « Injili zanditswe na» ugaca ushirako izina rimwe rimwe muri ayo, hakubafata nk’abanditsi b’ibitabo nk’uko bafatwa mu gihe ca none. Ariko nimba ikibazo ari Isezerano rishasha, ni ukwerekana uruhaha rwa Paulo, intumwa yandikiye amabaruwa menshi imiryango ya mbere ya gikristu. Medeiros avuga ati : "Amabaruwa ya Paulo, nk’uko iri zina ribivuga, [yanditswe] na Paulo hamwe n’abigishwa biwe. Nk’akarorero, ibaruwa ryandikiwe Timoteyo, rishobora kuba ryanditswe na Paulo, rero abahinga bamwe baryita Deutéro-Paulin". "Hagati aho, hari impari ku vyerekeye amabaruwa yitirirwa Petero, kandi ashobora kuba atanditswe na we nyene ubwiwe. Co kimwe kandi n’irya Paulo yandikiye abahebreyi, rishobora cane kuba ryagiye kurangizwa n’umwe mu bigishwa biwe ». Paulo yumvikana ko ari we yatanguye kwandika kuri Yezu, kuva mu mwaka wa 57 canke 58. Moraes  avuga ati : "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba yari azi ko yariko yandika inyandiko nyeranda. Ashobora kuba atari abizi." "Hari uburyo yakoresha mu kuvugana n’amasengero hanyuma agasiga amakete. Amwe muri yo yaratakaye, amwe muyo twita ko ari amabaruwa yiwe yanditswe kumbure n’abigishwa biwe, ariko ashirwa mu murwi w’ayanditswe na Paulo." Uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana avuga ati: "Iyo tuvuga amabaruwa ya Petero, kumbure yanditswe n’abamwegereye, kuko Petero ntiyari azi kwandika, kandi arabitomora mw’ibaruwa ryiwe [rya mbere].  Yakoresha umwanditsi mu kwandika. Kumbure afise kuba yabwira icegera ciwe, yitwa Silvano, ivyo yandika."

column2: Taiwan: Umudereva w'indege yanduje abantu Covid yirukanywe mu kazi
column3: Umudereva w'indege yagirizwa iyandukiza ry'umugera wa coronavirus ubwa mbere (inyuma y'amezi menshi) muri Taiwan, yirukanywe ku kazi na kompanyi yo muri iryo zinga yitwa Eva. Ku musi wa kabiri, uwari yamanye n'uwo mudereva bamutoye uwo mugera, aca arangiza imisi 253 yari iheze ata mu ntu wo muri ico gihugu yanduye iyo ngwara. Kuva ico gihe, bimwe mu bikorwa vya Noel vyahagaritswe, reta na yo ikavuga ko abantu bategerezwa kuguma muhira mu ntango z'umwaka mushasha. Muri rusangi, Taiwan, izinga riruta gato Uburundi mu bunini,  ifise abantu bamaze kwandura bashika 777, hakaba hamaze gupfa indwi. Vyibazwa ko uwo mudereva yanduye coronavirus mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa cumi na kabiri, ariko ntiyaca agaragarako ubugwayi. Abadereva bagarutse muri iryo zinga bavuye mu rugendo bategerezwa kwigumana bonyene mu kiringo c'imisi itatu, ariko ntibapimwa kiretse gusa babonetseko ibimenyetso. Mu gihe atari abizi ko afise uwo mugera, yabandanije ingendo, bikavugwa ko yakorora igihe yari mu ndege ija Taiwan avuye muri Amerika. Bamusanganye Covid- 19 itariki 20 z'uku kwezi kwa cumi na kabiri. Inyuma y'imisi ibiri, Taiwan yaciye ironka umuntu wa mbere yanduriye muri ico gihugu muri aya mezi. Abategetsi baciye batangura kurondera nimba uwo mupfasoni atigeze yegera uwo mudereva. Abategetsi baciye uwo mugabo amande y'amadolari 10,600 kubera atigeze avuga abo babonanye n'ibikorwa yakoze ku butegetsi. Kompanyi ya Eva Air ivuga ko uwo mudereva yirukanywe kubera atubahirije amategeko ngenderwako, harimwo kutambara agapfukamunwa aho yicara ariko aratwara indege. Uretse uwo mupfasoni, vyibazwa ko yanduje babiri mubo bakorana, umudereva wo mu Buyapani hamwe n'uwundi wo muri Taiwan. Yaba abategetsi canke iyo kompanyi, nta n'umwe aravuga izina ry'uwo mudereva ariko Eva Air yavuze mw'itangazo ko "inyifato y'umukozi ku giti ciwe, yateye ikibazo mu twigoro twa buri muntu two kugwanya ico kiza" kandi akaba yateye "igihombo gikomeye kw'isura n'akaranga vy'iyo kompanyi" Kubera uwo muntu wa mbere yanduye, abategetsi baritegurira gukomeza ingingo zo kugwanya Covid mu ndege.
