column2: Filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi Muhammad yahagaritswe mu Bwongereza
column3: Ikigo cerekana za filime co mu Bwongereza, Cineworld, cahagaritse kwerekana mu mazu ya filime (cinema) yaco yose muri ico gihugu filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi w'idini rya Islamu, Muhammad, nyuma y'imyiyerekano yadutse hanze y'ama-cinema amwe amwe. Ico kigo ca cinema cavuze yuko cafashe iyo ngingo "ku bw'umutekano w'abakozi n'abakiriya bacu". Abantu barenga 120.000 bashize umukono ku nyandiko isaba ko filime yitwa The Lady of Heaven (Umudamu w'Ijuru) itokwerekanwa muri za cinema zo mu Bwongereza. Ihuriro ry'imisigiti, The Bolton Council of Mosques, ryavuze ko iyo filime ari sakirirego kandi irimwo amacakubiri afatiye kw'idini. Ariko umukenguzamateka Baroness Claire Fox yavuze ko iyo ngingo "ari icago ku bugenegene kandi ikaba ari mbi cane ku bwigenge bwo gushikiriza iciyumviro". Nayo umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe amagara y'abantu, Sajid Javid, yavuze yuko "atewe umwitwarariko cane n'umuco wo kwiyamiriza uriko uragwirirana" mu Bwongereza. Iyo filime yakuwe mu bigo vya cinema vy'ikigo Cineworld nyuma y'amakuru y'imyiyerekano mu miji wa Bolton, Birmingham na Sheffield. I Bolton, abantu barenga ijana bagize imyiyerekano hanze ya cinema, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'ikinyamakuru caho, Bolton News. Mu butumwa bwa email bugenewe Cineworld bwashizwe ahabona na Bolton News, umukuru w'urwego Bolton Council of Mosques, Asif Patel, yavuze ko iyo filime "irimwo ingengabitekerezo y'amacakubiri afatiye ku dini" kandi yuko "ivuga ukutari ko kahise k'idini ikanasuzuguza icubahiro Islamu ihabwa n'amateka yayo". Igitangazamakuru cegamiye idini rya Islamu co kuri internet, 5Pillars, catangaje kuri Twitter amafoto y'abo cavuze ko ari aba-Islamu 200, bari mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyo filime imbere y'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Birmingham ku munsi wa Mungu. Video yahanahanywe kuri internet isa n'iyerekana umuyobozi w'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Sheffield ariko arabwira abari mu myiyerekano ko iyo filime yahagaritswe kwerekanwa, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Guardian. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Umuhinguzi mukuru (executive producer) ari mu bateguye iyi filime, Malik Shlibak, yabariye BBC ko abari mu myiyerekano bigenza "nk'amabandi arenganya abandi, bakisuka muri za cinema banatera ubwoba abahakora". "Ibi ni ibintu bitari bikwiye kwihanganirwa mu Bwongereza", nk'uko yabandanije avuga, aca agabisha yuko guhagarika kwerekana iyi filime bizoha ingoga abakoresha ukwiyamiriza nk'uko muri kazoza. Yabandanije agira ati "ibi birarengeye filime. Uno munsi hifatiwe mu gahanga filime Lady of Heaven, ejo harashobora kwiyamirizwa ikindi kigushika ku mutima kurusha". Yavuze kandi yuko abakora imyiyerekano batazoshobora kubuza kubaho kw'iyi filime.

column2: Greece: Umupatiri i Athens yafashwe inyuma y'uko ateye aside abasenyeri
column3: Umupatiri yahagaritswe ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubugiriki Athens/Athènes inyuma yo gutera aside abasenyeri indwi bo mw'idini ry'aba Orthodox, nk'uko bivugwa n'igiporisi. Ibi vyabaye igihe uyu mupatiri w'imyaka 36 yariko yumvirizwa n'urwego rujejwe indero inyuma y'umutaga w'ejo ku wa gatatu, nk'uko bibandanya bivugwa n'igiporisi. Abasenyeri batatu bariko baravurirwa mu bitaro kubera ubushe batewe n'iyi aside, bakaba bahiye mu maso. Umuporisi yirutse aja gutabara abo basenyeri, na we nyene ari mu bitaro. Uwagirizwa gukora aka kabi - umupatiri ashobora kwirukanwa muri iryo dini - yagirizwa ko afise uruhara mu rudandaza rw'ibiyayuramutwe, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ANA. Nk'uko ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu bibitangaza, abo basenyeri bari bakoranye kugira ngo baganire ingene bomwirukana - bakamwambura ubupatiri - inyuma y'aho bivugiwe ko mu kwa gatandatu mu 2018 yafatanywe amagarama 1,8 y'urumogi. Ikinyamakuru Ta Nea kivuga ko uyo mupatiri yinjiye mu kigo c'ababihebeye Imana ca Petraki kiri i Athènes agiye kwumvirizwa, akaba yinjiranye "icupa rinini ririmwo iyo aside". Umuzamu yashoboye gufata uyo mupatiri ageze kw'irembo ry'ico kigo, na we nyene yaraturiwe n'iyo aside, akaba yaciye asimbanwa kwa muganga. Umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubugiriki Katerina Sakellaropoulou ariyamiriza iki gitero, nayo umushikiranganji wa mbere Kyriakos Mitsotakis akaba yavuganye n'uwurongoye iryo dini mu Bugiriki, Musenyeri mukuru wa Athènes, Ieronymos II. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mitsotakis avuga ko ababajwe cane n'iki gitero, akaba yijeje uyu musenyeri ko "reta izokora uko ishoboye mu kuvura abakomeretse kugira bashobore gukira ningoga".

column2: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje iduzwa ry’amakori mu kwihora Ubushinwa
column3: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje ko agiye kwihora igihugu c'Ubushinwa mu kuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biva muri ico gihugu, ivyatumye ibintu biyangara mu ntambara y'ubutunzi hagati y'ivyo bihugu vyompi. Hari haciye amasaha make Ubushinwa butangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biciye  imiliyoni 75 z'amadolari vyinjiye muri ico gihugu bivuye muri vya Amerika, ivyo Perezida Trump yiyamiriza. Bwana Trump avuga ko iyo ngingo y'Ubushinwa ari iya "politike", akabwagiriza ko bushaka "kugendera" kuri Amerika. Ubushinwa bwatangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori kuva ku bice 5% gushika kuri 10% ku bidandazwa birenga 5000 biva muri Amerika, harimwo ivyimburwa vyo mu burimyi, indege n'ibitoro bitarahingura. Butegura kandi gutoza ikori ryari ryarabangiriweko ry'ibice 25% ku mamodokari ava muri Amerika. Abicishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter ejo ku wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yatangaje iduzwa ry'ayo makori ku bice 5% ku bidandazwa vyinjira bivuye mu Bushinwa. Avuga ko kuva kw'igenekerezo rya 01 ukwezi kw'icumi, Amerika izoduza amakori kuri ivyo bidandazwa biciye imiliyoni 250 y'abanyamerika, kuva kuri 25% gushika kuri 30%. Avuga kandi ko ibidandazwa biciye amadolari 300 vyari vyitezwe gutozwako ikori ingana n'ibice 10% rizoduga gushika kuri 15%. Ati: "Ikibabaje, ni uko ubutegetsi bw'inyuma bwaretse Ubushinwa bukarengera inyungu za Amerika muvyo ubudandaji, ku buryo bwabaye umuzigo ku mutangakori wa Amerika. Jewe nk'umukuru w'igihugu, sinshobora kwemera ko ivyo bisubira". Bwana Trump amenyesha ko "kuri iyo mvo, yategetse" amakompanyi ya Amerika kuvavanura n'Ubushinwa bakarondera abandi bakorana, agapfuma arondera ingene yokorera muri Amerika. Izo ngingo zerekana ukutumvikana hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri ku vyerekeye ubudandaji zatumye ibintu biba nabi ku masoko y'ivunja n'ivunjwa ry'amafarangam haba muri Amerika, canke i Bulaya. Ku munsi wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yarifatiye mu gahanga umukuru w'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu ca Amerika, Jerome Powell, inyuma y'aho avugiye ko iyo ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora gutuma ubutunzi bwa Amerika bugira ibibazo. Aciye kuri Twitter, Perezida Trump yashitse kure, aho yibajije nimba uyo mukuru w'ibanku nkuru y'igihugu atoba ari "umwansi" mukuru gusumba umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubushinwa, Xi Jinping.

column2: Yoshiro Mori: Umukuru wa Olympic za Tokyo yatanze imihoho kubera kuvuga 'ibitabereye' ku bagore
column3: Umukuru w'umugwi utegura inkino za Olympic zizobera Tokyo yatanze imihoho inyuma yo kunegurwa ko yavuze ibintu "bitabereye" ku bagore. Yoshiro Mori, w'imyaka 83, vyanditswe ko yavuze ngo abagore bavuga menshi kandi ko inama n'abagore bo mu nama nyobozi ''zitwara umwanya muremmure''. Ayo majambo yaradugije ifurufumbi ry'abavyiyamiriza none Mori yarasavye imbabazi ico gihe ariko yaruhiye gutanga imihoho. Mori,yatanze imihoho  ku mugaragaro mu nama idasanzwe yabaye ku wa gatanu inyuma yo  kuvuga ivyo ku ndwi iheze. Yabwiye inama idasanzwe yabaye ku wa gatanu ati : "Igihambaye n'uko haba  inkino za Olympic kuva mu kwezi kw'indwi. Ntibikwiye ko kuba ndimwo bibera intambamyi ivyo," ari naho yaca atangaza ko atanze imihoho. Ntivyashotse bimenyekana uwugiye gusubirira Mori yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere, . Ubwa mbere yari yahisemwo umuntu azwi cane mu gutunganya inkino Saburo Kawabuch w'imyaka 84 ngo amusubirire ariko n'ibi hari abavyiyamirije. Ibigo bikomeye bishigikira izo nkino navyo vyari vyashize amajwi hejuru mu kunegura ivyo yavuze harimwo na Toyota, iri mu bakomeye bshigikira cane inkino za Olympic. Umukuru wa Toyota, Akio Toyota yavuze ko iyo kompanyi "yababajwe'' n'ivyashikirijwe. Ku wa kabiri umugwi w'abashingwamanza b'abagore bambaye impunzu zera mu kwiyamiriza ivyavuzwe na Mori, hari n'abagabo bashigikiye mu kwambara uko nyene. Ku bw'ibinyamakuru vyo mu Buyapani, abantu bashika 400 nabo baranditse bavuga ko bahagaritse gusaba gukorera ubushake mu nkino za Olympic, zitegekanijwe mu bihe biri imbere uyu mwaka. Inama y'abarongoye umugwi utegura inkino ubu igizwe n'anbantu 24, batanu muri bo bakaba ari abagore. Mu 2019,inama y'abaronmgoye uwo mugwi-ujejwe guhitamwo abayapani bazokwitaba inkino,yihaye ihangiro ryo kwongereza igitigiri c'abagore bayigize gushika ku 40 kw'ijana. Mori bivugwa ko yagize ati: "Turamutse tudugije igitigiri c'abnagore bagize inama nyobozi, dutegerezwa kubasha kugabanya umwanya bafata mu kuvuga, barafise ingorane yo kurangiza, ivyo navyo bikaba bishavuza." Mori arazwi mu gihugu kuba yakuze kugwa mu rudubi no kuvuga ibitabereye abashitsi igihe yari mu nabanga hagati ya 2000 na 2001. \yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Yapani Mainichi ko abagore bo mu muryangoi wiwe nabo bamuryagaguye kubera ivyo yavuze.

column2: Afghanistan: Umukuru w'ingabo za US ntabona neza nimba 'ba ruburakigongwe' b'aba Taliban bazohinduka
column3: Umukuru w'ingabo za Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko aba Taliban ari "umuhari ruburakigongwe" akavuga ko bitaboneka neza nimba bazohinduka. Jenerali Mark Milley avuga ariko ko "bishoboka" ko muri kazoza Amerika ishobora kuzokorana n'aba barwanyi bagendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vy'idini rya Islam mu bikorwa vyo kurwanya imirwi y'iterabwoba. Ingabo za Amerika zavuye muri  Afghanistan ku wa 31 z'ukwa munani, ikimenyetso c'uko intambara ya Amerika yari imaze imyaka 20 kuva mu  2001 igihe zikora igitero co kwomora aba Taliban irangiye. Uyu muhari ubu niwo ugenzura igihugu cose ukaba urindiriye gutangaza reta nshasha. Gen Milley yari kumwe n'umunyamabanga ajejwe kwivuna abansi wa Amerika Lloyd Austin, mu kiganiro ca mbere bagize kuva ingabo za nyuma zivuye muri Afghanistan. Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika aranegurwa cane ingene yavyifashemwo, aho yagirizwa guhuruduka mu gutahukana ingabo, ivyatumye ubutegetsi bwa Afghanistan butembagazwa. Umuvuduko udasanzwe w'aba Taliban mu kwigarurira igihugu watumye haba igikorwa kidasanzwe co guhungisha ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyamahanga hamwe n'abanya Afghanistan bakorana n'ingabo mvamakungu. Mu kiganiro cabo nijoro ku wa gatatu, aba bategetsi bompi  barashimagije ingabo zakoreye muri Afghanistan hamwe n'igikorwa kidasanzwe co guhungisha abantu benshi mu mwanya muto. Abajijwe ibijanye n'uko bakoranye n'aba Taliban mu guherekeza ku kibuga c'indege abashaka guhunga , Austin yishuye ati: "Hari ibintu bike twakoranye n'aba Taliban, kandi ni ivyo - kugira ngo dushobore guhungisha abantu benshi bashoboka". Yongerako ati: "Mu ntambara ukora ivyo utegerezwa gukora kugira ngo ugabanye ingaruka mbi ku gikorwa ujejwe no ku ngabo, ntutegerezwa gukora ivyo ushaka". Avuga ko bishoboka ko muri kazoza Amerika ikorana n'aba Taliban mu kurwanya umurwi IS-K wegamiye Etat Islamique/Islamic State, uherutse kwiyemerera ko ari wo wakoze igitero giheruka mu micungararo y'ikibuga c'indege mu ndwi iheze kigahitana abarenga 170, harimwo abasirikare 13 ba Amerika. IS-K  ni wo muhari w'intagondwa mubi cane kandi uteye umudugararo gusumba iyindi mihari yose yiyitirira idini rya Islam muri Afghanistan. IS-K irafise ibintu bikomeye utandukaniyeko n'aba Taliban, kuko ibagiriza ko bahemutse bagata urugamba. Hagati aho, Austin avuga ko ataco ashobora kuvuga ku vyo yibaza ku bijanye n'ingene bashobora kuzokorana muri kazoza. Ariko yongerako y'uko abategetsi "bazokora uko bashoboye kwose kugira ngo tubandanye dukurikiranira hagufi IS-K, tumenye neza uyo muhari, hanyuma mu gihe tuzoshakira muri kazoza, bakabazwa ivyo bakoze". Abantu  barenga 123.000 nibo bashoboye guhungishwa muri Afghanistan. Amerika ivuga ko hari Abanyamerika bari hagati ya 100 na 200 bakiri muri Afghanistan. Icegera c'umunyamabanga wa reta ajejwe ibibazo vya poritike Victoria Nuland avuga ko bariko bihweza "uburyo bwose bushoboka" bw'ukungene bovana muri ico gihugu Abanyamerika basigayeyo hamwe n'abo bose bakoranye na Amerika. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Ubwongereza Dominic Raab avuga ko atazi neza Abongereza boba basigaye muri Afghanistan, ariko ko bashobora kuba ari bake. Aba Taliban barishimiye itahukanwa ry'ingabo mvamakungu, ubu ikibaraje ishinga kikaba ari ugushinga reta. Icegera c'umukuru w'ibiro vya poritike vy'aba Taliban muri Qatar, Sher Abbas Stanekza, yabwiye igisata ca BBC candika mu rurimi rw'igi Pashto ko reta nshasha ishobora gutangazwa mu misi ibiri iri imbere. Avuga ko abagore bashobora guhabwa ibibanza ku nzego zo hasi, ariko atari ku nzego nkuru. Avuga ko abakoreye reta mu myaka 20 iheze badashobora gushirwa muri reta nshasha.

column2: Umuntu yokura iki mu rukino rw’Intamba na Nigeria?
column3: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Ku kibuga ca Alexandria Stadium mu muji wa Alexandria, ku kagoroba kameze neza izuba ryarenze ubushuhe bwagabanutse, niho Intamba mu Rugamba zaseseka mu kibuga ngo nazo zandike izina mu makungu. Ku nshuro ya mbere mw'ihiganwa nk'iri, benshi bari bazi ko bitaza kworoha kuko gutangura uhura n'ikipe y'igihangange muri Afrika nka Nigeria wari umurimo utoroshe. Ariko Intamba zari zifitiye icizere kidasanzwe, catanguye kwigaragariza mu kiganiro umumenyereza Olivier Niyungeko yahaye abanyamakuru ku wa gatanu, aho yavuga ko Intamba zitaje kurorera gusa. Mbere yanavuze ko ku rwego nk'uru rw'umukino, amakipe yose aba angana. Ivyo kandi niko vyagaragaye mu ntango z'urukino, Nigeria itangazwa n'abakinyi b'inyuma b'Intamba mu Rugamba ku kuntu bazibirira hamwe mu kwigenza neza kudasanzwe ku makipe atamenyereye amahiganwa nk'aya. Ntivyahereye kandi ku kuzibira gusa kuko iyo itaba umunyegoli wa Nigeria, ku nshuro zirenga zitatu zose mu gice ca mbere, Nigeria yari kuba yinjijwe. Abakunzi ba Nigeria bari mu kibuga, warabona ko batanguye kugira utubazo kuko abasatirizi babo ataco bariko barerekana, igice ca mbere gihera bose banganya. Vyaje guhinduka ku munota wa 77 aho Nigeria yashobora guca mu ryahumye abakinyi b'inyuma b'Intamba ikaronka igitsindo, abakunzi ba Nigeria hamwe n'abakinyi bose barigina cane ubona yuko basa n'abavuye kure. Nigeria vyaraboneka ko imenyereye gukina ku rwego rwo hejuru. Kandi ntibitangaje ku ikipe imaze gukina muri iri higanwa inshuro 17, ikaba imaze no gutwara iki gikombe inshuro zishika zibiri, ubwa nyuma bukaba bwari mu 2013. Ariko icerekanye ubudasa muri uru rukino, ni ubuhinga bw'abakinyi babiri ba Nigeria b'inararibonye, Odion Jude Ighalo akina mu Bushinwa, na Ahmed Musa akina muri Arabie Saudite, bahanahanye umupira n'ubuhinga bwinshi bashobora guca mu ryahumye abakinyi b'inyuma b'Intamba. Ni abakinyi binjiye mu gice ca kabiri bazi neza ico baje gukora, kuko kuva binjiye Nigeria yahinduye isura imbere, ibintu vyibonekeje ko wari umukenyuro w'umumenyereza Gernot Rohr. Ikindi naco ni uko ba rutahizamu b'u Burundi baterekanye ''amanyama'' akenewe kugira basatire cane mu gutera imipira iremereye, kuko uvyihweje, umunyegoli wa Nigeria ntihari kubura ikimuca mu jisho. Kuri ico umumenyereza Niyungeko nawe yaremeye ko akeneye gukorana cane na barutahizamu biwe ku kuntu bategerezwa kwitwara imbere y'igoli. Ku bwiwe ngo ni mu mutwe, si ikibazo c'ubuhinga. Muri rusangi uyu mukino warahaye icizere cane ikipe y'Intamba, kuko gutsindwa kimwe gusa na Nigeria mu mukino wa mbere mw'ihiganwa nk'iri ari ikintu cofatwa nk'intambwe ikomeye ku Ntamba. Gusa iyi kipe ikeneye kwongera ugushaka hamwe n'igikenye mu mikino ikurikira, kuko  uravye ingene ikipe ya Madagascar, nayo iri mw'iri higanwa ku nshuro ya mbere, yavyitwayemwo ihura na Guinea (2-2), harimwo ubudasa bukomeye cane kuko abasore bayo warabona ko ata gufyina kurimwo. Barakoresheje inguvu n'ugushaka kwinshi bahakura ibitsindo bibiri. Uku niko Intamba mu Rugamba zitegerezwa kuvyitwaramwo nizaba zishaka kubandanya muri iri higanwa. Ibishobisho vy'urukino rwa mbere bitegerezwa kuhava, umukino wa kigabo ugakurikira.

column2: BAL2022: Umugwi New Star usaba urundi rukino inyuma yo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaboko Basketball mu Burundi FEBABU ryandikiye ishirahamwe ry'isi yose ry'urwo rukino FIBA risaba ko umugwi wa New Star urenganurwa ku ngingo wafatiwe zo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa kubera Covid. Umugwi wa New Star wahagaritswe mw'ihiganwa inyuma yo gusanga abakinyi bane b'uwo mugwi n'ababaherekeje babiri bafise umugera wa Covid-19. Mu rwandiko rwa FIBA ruvuga ko uwabanduje ari umukinyi yitwa Brian Kavakure. FIBA ikavuga ko, hishimikijwe amategeko y'iryo shirahamwe, abakinyi bose bategerezwa guca bashirwa mu kibanza ca bonyene. Banditse kandi ko "kubera abanduye bashobora kwanduza abandi ku kibuga, hafashwe ingingo ko umugwi wa New Star wirukanywe mw'ihiganwa." Urukino rwategerezwa guhuza New Star na Cape Town Tigers rwaciye rufutwa, New Star ica itsindwa impaga. Baba abarongozi b'umugwi wa New Star canke ba FEBABU ishavu riraniga, bavuga ko barenganijwe. Bagiriza umugwi wa Afrika y'Epfo, Cape Town Tigers, wari watsinzwe na New Star mu rukino rwa mbere ko ari wo woba uri inyuma y'uko kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa. New Star ntihakana ko ari abakinyi bayo basanganywe Covid ariko bagatangazwa n'uko umugwi wa Cape Town Tigers na wo wasanganywe umukinyi afise uwo mugera ata ngingo n'imwe wafatiwe. Aho ni mu gihe ari wo bategerezwa gutana mu mitwe. FEBABU iranibaza iti: "Bigenda gute ngo FIBA ivuge ko umukinyi wacu Brian Kavakure ari we yanduje abandi ariko akaba ata Covid bamusanganye, mbere akanahabwa n'uburenganzira bwo gutahana n'abandi mu Burundi?" Ikindi ishirahamwe rya Basketball mu Burundi rivuga n'ingene umugwi bari baraye bakinye na New Star wa Cobra Sport bawuretse urabandanya ihiganwa. New Star kandi, n'aho yari ibuze abakinyi bakomakomeye, yaratonze ku kibuga kugira bakine na Cape Town Tigers, ariko abo na bo ntibitaba. Ivyo ngo bikagaragara ko ari ivyari vyateguwe ko babakubita impaga babagiriza ko bamwe muri bo batowe Covid. Kubera izo mvo zose, FEBABU isaba ko New star yobandanya ihiganwa hisunzwe amanota iyo migwi ibiri yari imaze kuronka, canke hatunganywe urundi rukino rwobahuriza ku kindi kibuga.

column2: Igitero kuri Ukraine: EU yugaye ikirere cayo ku ndege z'Uburusiya
column3: Ishirahamwe rya Buraya ryugaye ikirere caryo ku ndege z'Uburusiya nk'uko vyamenyeshejwe n'umukuru w'urwego rutwara iryo shirahamwe, Ursula von der Leyen. Yavuze ati: "Twugaye ikirere c'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya ku ndege z'Uburusiya, indege  zifise ibiziranga vy'Uburusiya canke indege zigenzurwa n'Uburusiya". Izo ndege zose, harimwo n'iz'abantu ku giti cabo z'abatunzi ruhebwa, ubu ntizizoshobora kugwa, canke kuguruka ziva  mu gihugu icarico cose c'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya canke ngo zice hejuru yaco. Indege z'Uburusiya zarankiwe kandi guca mu kirere c'Ubwongereza. Kompanyi ya mbere nini y'indege y'Uburusiya, Aeroflot, yavuze ko ica ifuta ingendo zose zo kuja i Buraya gushika ibintu bihindutse mu nzira yo kugera ingere ku yindi. Imbere y'iyo ngingo, ibihugu vya Buraya vyari vyatanguye, kwugara ibirere vyavyo  kimwe kimwe. Ubudagi bwavuze ko ingingo yabwo izomara amezi atatu. Ivyapa vyerekana urutonde rw'ingendo mu bibuga vy'indege vya  Domodedovo na Sheremetyevo vyerekanye ingendo ziharugwa mu mirongo zafuswe ku wamungu, harimwo izaja i Paris, Vienne na Kaliningrad. Kompanyi y'Uburusiya S7 Airlines yavuze kuri Facebook ko izofuta ingendo mu bihugu vya Buraya vyinshi gushika nibura itariki 13 za Ntwarante (ukwezi kwa gatatu). Uburusiya buguma bugera ingere ku yindi ku bihugu biba vyafashe ingingo. Umukuru w'urwego rutwara Ishirahamwe rya Buraya yamenyesheje ko iryo shirahamwe rigiye kandi guhagarika imirongo y'ibinyamakuru bigenzurwa na reta y'Uburusiya Sputnik na Russia Today bibonwa nk'urubuga rw'ukuvugira Kremlin. Yavuze ati: "Turiko turarondera uburyo bw'ingene duhagarika amakuru yabo yo kuyovya no guhumanya i Buraya." Izo ngingo ku ndege zizotuma  indege z'Uburusiya zifata ingendo zo kuzigura/guca kure, bituma amasaha y'urugendo aba  menshi gusumba. Indege zisanzwe zitwara abantu n'ibintu ziririnda kandi guca mu kirere ca Ukraine, Moldova na Belarus kubera igitero c'Uburusiya. Muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Delta Air Lines yavuze ko izohagarika amasezerano bari bafitaniye na Aeroflot y'Uburusiya yo gufatisha ibibanza vy'urugendo. Indege zose zifise ibiziranga vy'Uburusiya zizokorwako n'izo ngingo. Ingingo y'Ubwongereza yatumye Moscou nayo igera ingere ku yindi ku ndege z'Ubwongereza. Virgin Atlantic yavuze ko kudaca hejuru y'Uburusiya bizokwongereza hagati y'iminota 15 n'isaha ku mwanya w'ingendo zayo hagati y'Ubwongereza n'Ubuhindi na Pakistan. Kompanyi ya Australia Qantas yavuze ko izokoresha inzira ndende gusumba ku ngendo zayo ata handi ziciye  hagati ya Darwin na Londres  n'ubundi zitari zisanzwe zikoresha inzira yo guca hejuru y'Uburusiya.

column2: New York: Urubanza rwa R Kelly kw'ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina rwatanguye
column3: Urubanza rw'uyu muririmvyi wo muri Amerika aririmba umudiho wa R&B rwatanguriye muri sentare yi Brooklyn i New York. Iki camamare cagirizwa amagendu, guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina hamwe no gutanga igiturire; ivyaha amaze guhakana inshuro nyinshi. Bimwe mu vyaha bishinjwa uyu muririmvyi - asanzwe yitwa Robert Sylvester Kelly - ni ivyo kuva mu myaka 20 iheze. Niyahamwa n'ivyaha vyose yagirizwa arashobora gupfungwa imyaka mirongo. Amajambo atanguza urubanza yasomewe amugwi w'abanyagihugu baca urubanza (jury) ugizwe n'abagabo indwi hamwe n'abagore batanu, bakazofata icemezo ku coshikira uyu muririmvyi w'imyaka 54. Kelly yagirizwa kuba yari kizigenza mu gikorwa camaze imyaka mirongo ibiri aho haronderwa abagore hamwe n'abakobwa badakwije imyaka bagashorwa mu busambanyi. Icegera c'umushinjacaha Maria Melendez mw'ijambo ritanguza urubanza yavuze yuko "uru rubanza rwerekeye "inyamaswa y'impigi". Yavuze ko R Kelly "ari umuntu yakoresheje ibinyoma, kuryosharyosha, gutera ubwoba hamwe no gukoresha inguvu mu kuganza abo yahohotera kandi abikora yidegemvya mu kiringo c'imyaka myinshi". Kelly yagirizwa kuba yarabwiriza abo yahohotera kwerekana ko "bamwihaye rwose" kandi bakubaha ataguharira amategeko yiwe yose, harimwo yuko bafungura canke bakaja mu bwiherero ari uko abahaye uruhusha, ntibarabe abandi bagabo, kandi bakamwita "Daddy" (Papa). R Kelly yavuze ko ari umwere kuri ivyo vyose yagirizwa kandi ahakana yivuye inyuma ko ata kibi na kimwe yakoze. Uru rubanza, rwasibijwe kenshi kubera ikiza ca covid kandi rukaba rwitezwe kumara nk'ukwezi kumwe, vyitezwe ko ruvugirwamwo ivyagiriji vy'ihohotera ryakozwe na Kelly, harimwo ubuhamya bwa bamwe mu bagore hamwe n'umugabo ashika kuri umwe bamwagiriza. Naho yogirwa umwere, Kelly arindiriwe n'ibidi vyagiriji bifatiye ku gitsina muri Illinois na Minnesota, aho naho akaba yarahakanye ivyo ahagirizwa. Kelly amaze imyaka ibiri mw'ibohero. Yimuriwe i Brooklyn mu kwezi kwa gatandatu akuwe i Chacago ku bw'uru rubanza. Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 54 azwi cane ku ndirimbo ziwe zakunzwe zirimwo Ignition (Remix), I Believe I can Fly, Bump n'Grind na If I Could Turn Back the Hands of Time. Ari mu nzira yerekeza aho urubanza rubera, umuhinguzi w'ibiganiro wa BBC, Monica Miller yagize ati; "Ni umunsi wa gatatu udasanzwe i Brooklyn. Abashigikiye R. Kelly bariko bararengana bavugira hejuru bati "Rekura R Kelly". Kelly hamwe n'abakorana nawe bagirizwa kurondera abagore n'abakobwa batarakwiza imyaka bakabashora mu busambanyi budakurikije amategeko hamwe n'uwo muririmvyi. Ivyo vyagiriji ni ivyo kuva mu myaka y'1990, vyinshi bikibanda ku bifatwa nk'uruhigi rwarondera abakobwa b'imiyabaga. Kuri ubu R Kelly akurikiranywe mu maleta menshi agize Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ivyagiriji bikaba birimwo guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina, guhohotera uwutarakwiza imyaka, gufata amasanamu y'urukozasoni y'abatarakwiza imyaka, igiturire hamwe no kunaniza ubutungane. Ubushinjacaha bwashingiye urubanza ku bagore batandatu batavuzwe amazina. Ivyagiriji icenda vyashizwe imbere bivuga ku kugirira nabi abantu bo mu ciswe Jane Doe, batatu muri bo bikavugwa ko bari batarakwiza imyaka y'ubukuru igihe bahohoterwa. Abashingwamanza ba Kelly vyitezwe ko bavuga yuko bimwe muri ivyo vyagiriji ari ivy'abagore bari baramukunze ariko ntibaronke ico bashaka, mu gihe mu ntango bari bemeye guhuza ibitsina nawe.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa Mungu: Aubameyang, Cavani, Mata, Mbappe, Alli, Raphinha
column3: Juventus irashaka umusatirizi wa Arsenal umunya Gabon Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, 32, mu gihe kazoza kiwe muri uyu murwi wa Emirates Stadium karimwo igipfungu inyuma y'aho yakiwe ikibanza ca kizigenza. (Tuttosport - in Italian) Leeds United iriko irarondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus umunyamerika Weston McKennie, 23, ariko igategerezwa kuzoriha amafaranga yababa imiriyoni 26.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United umunya Uruguay Edinson Cavani, 34, araronderwa cane na Barcelona mu kwa mbere ariko ikeneye kubanza kuronka icemezo c'uko yakize imvune yiwe imbere y'uko igiranira amasezerano nawe.  (Sport - in Spanish) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande Juan Mata, 33, abandanya aronderwa na Barcelona, mu gihe uyu munya Espagne adakunze kuronka amahirwe yo gukina muri Manchester United. (Star) Manchester United iriteguye guhangana na Chelsea mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Jules Kounde, 23, asanzwe akinira Sevilla. (AS - in Spanish) Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp avuga ko umurwi wiwe utaragera ku mugambi wo kurondera abakinyi muri uku kwa mbere kuza, ariko akavuga ko, mu gihe vyoramuka bishitse, afise impungenge zo kuzana umukinyi ataricandagisha Covid-19.  (Mirror) Newcastle irashaka cane ko Manchester United yoyitiza umusatirizi wayo w'umufaransa Anthony Martial, 26, muri uku kwa mbere, ni mu gihe kandi ishaka n'uwundi musatirizi wa Inter Milan umunya Bosnia Edin Dzeko, 35.. (Sun) Uwujejwe kwinonora imitsi muri Paris St-Germain Leonardo ntarota aheba umusatirizi w'umufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 22, kugira atere igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n'aho Real Madrid imurondera. Mu kwa mbere, Mbappe arashobora gutangura kuvugana n'imirwi imushaka hanze y'Ubufaransa.  (AS, via Sky Sports) Paris St-Germain iriko iritegura kugerageza Barcelona kugira irabe koko ko yiteguye kugumana umukinyi wo hagati wa Espagne Gavi, 17. (El Nacional - in Catalan) Hagati aho, umumenyereza wa  Barcelona Xavi avuga ko Gavi ari we "kazoza k'umurwi" kandi ko uyu musore ata kiguzi ntarengwa kuri we kirashingwa.  (Marca, via 90 Min) Newcastle iravugwa ko izoruhira kuzana umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham umwongereza Dele Alli, 25, mu gihe bokwemera kumutiza mu kwa mbere.  (Football Insider) Uwundi mukinyi aronderwa na Newcastle umunya Hollande akina inyuma muri Lille Sven Botman, 21, ntazi nimba mu kwa mbere ashobora kuva muri uyu murwi ufise igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'ubufaransa.  (90min) Manchester City igiye gutangura ibiganiro ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Portugal Joao Cancelo mu mwaka buca utangura mu ntumbero yo kugiriranira nawe amasezerano yisumbirije n'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27.  (Star) Umumenyereza wa Tottenham Antonio Conte yavuganye na Inter Milan be n'umunya Chili akina hagati Arturo Vidal, 34, kugira ngo arabe ko yomuzana muri uyu murwi wa Londres/London. Aba bompi baratsindiye ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A igihe bari kumwe muri Juventus na Inter. (La Tercera - in Spanish) Napoli yamaze gutegura urutonde rw'abo ishobora kurondera mu kwa mbere, harimwo n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham umunya  Colombia Davinson Sanchez, 25. (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Bayern Munich igiye kwinjira ku rutonde rw'imirwi irondera umusatirizi wa Leeds umunya Brésil Raphinha, 24, mu ci riza. (TodoFichajes - in Spanish) Arsenal irarondera kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Juventus, umunya Suède Dejan Kulusevski, 21. (CalcioMercato - in Italian) Umumenyereza wa Roma Jose Mourinho asaba Tammy Abraham, 24, gufasha kwumvisha mugenziwe w'umwongereza Ruben Loftus-Cheek, 25 bahoze bakinana muri Chelsea ko yoja gukinira uyo murwi wo mu Butaliyano. (Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Danemark Christian Eriksen, 29, afise "indoto" zo gusubira gukina umupira w'amaguru inyuma y'aho asezereye muri Inter Milan, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuserukizi wiwe. (Mail) Watford iracarondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Sampdoria umunya Gambia Omar Colley, 29, mu gihe umumenyereza w'aba Hornets Claudio Ranieri ariko arondera gukomeza uruhande rw'inyuma muri uku kwa mbere. (Tuttomercatoweb - in Italian)

column2: Afghanistan: Abana bashonje bahabwa imiti yo gutora itiro hakanagurishwa ingingo z'umubiri
column3: Na Yogita Limaye BBC News, Herat A﻿banya-Afghanistan basigaye baha imiti abana babo kugira babasinzirize - abandi bagurisha abakobwa babo n'ingingo z'umubiri kugira babe baramaze kabiri. Ku gihe  c'imbeho (hiver/winter) kigira kabiri kuva aba-Taliban bagarutse ku butegetsi hanyuma imfashanyo ziva hanze zigahagarikwa,  abaharurwa muri za miriyoni bugarijwe n'inzara. A﻿bdul Wahab avuga ati: "Abana bacu baguma barira, kandi ntibasinzira. Nta vyo kurya dufise." "﻿Duca tuja kuri farumasi, tukazana ibini tugaha abana bacu kugira bashobore gutora itiro." U﻿wo mugabo aba mu nkengera za Herat, igisagara kiza ubugira gatatu mu bunini muri ico gihugu, mu kigwati  c'utuzu duto duto tw'ivyondo cagiye kiraguka kuva mu myaka iheze, kikuzura abantu bomowe n'intambara n'ibindi biza vyizana. A﻿bdul ari mu mugwi w'abantu hafi 10 baje begera aho turi. Twarababajije, tuti ni bangahe baha imiti abana babo kugira babasinzirize?  Nabo bishura bati: "Benshi, twese". Ghulam Hazrat  yaciye akora mu mufuko wiwe asokorora agapfungo k'ibinini.  Vyari ibinini vya  alprazolam - ibinini ku bisanzwe bihabwa abantu baba bafise ingorane z'umwitwarariko mwinshi. Ghulam afise abana batandatu, umuto muri bo afise umwaka umwe. Ati: "Nawe nyene ndamuha". Abandi batweretse ibinini vya escitalopram na sertraline bavuze ko baha abana babo. Ivyo navyo ku bisanzwe vyandikirwa abayinze n'abafise umwitwarariko mwinshi. A﻿baganga bavuga ko iyo ihawe abana bakiri bato kandi bataronka ivyo kurya bihagije, imiti bene iyo yonona igitigu (umwijima mu kinyarwanda), igatera 'izindi ngorane nyinshi nko kwama ufise uburuhe, n'ihungabana ryo gusinzira n'inyifato. K﻿uri farumasi imwe, twasanze ushobora kugura ibinini bitanu vy'iyo miti ikoreshwa ku ma Afghani (amafaranga yo muri Afgnistan) 10, (nka 200 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi), ayagura ikimanyu c'umukate. Myinshi mu miryango twahuye yasangira ibimanyu bikeye vy'imikate buri munsi. Umugore umwe yatubwiye ko bari bariye umukate wumye mu gitondo, mw'ijoro naho bakuwudumba mu mazi kugira worohe. O﻿NU ivuga ko ubu "akaga" kariko karaba muri Afghanistan. Abagabo benshi mu karere kari ku nkengera ya Herat bakora ibikonkwano vyo ku munsi mu mirima. Bamaze imyaka babayeho ubuzima bugoye. Hagati aho, igihe aba-Taliban bafata ubutegetsi mu kwezi kw'umunani, ariko reta yabo ntiyemerwe n'amakungu, amafaranga yaja muri Afghanistan avuye hanze yaciye ahagarikwa, bituma ubutunzi butembagara, gutyo bituma abagabo benshi kenshi bakabura  ico bakora. K﻿u munsi bagize igihamana bakaronka akazi, baca nk'ama Afghani 100 (ni ibihumbi bibiri birenga gato mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). A﻿ho twagiye hose twasanze abantu bafata ingingo zikomeye cane kugira imiryango yabo ntiyicwe n'inzara. Ammar (siryo zina ryiwe ry'ukuri) yavuze ko yabazwe kugira bamukuremwo ifyigo haraheze amezi atatu aca aratwereka n'inkovu ndende y'aho babaze - n'ahaciye inyuzi hagitukura - kuva mu kaziba k'inda utera uja mu mugongo. A﻿ri mu myaka ya 20, yategerezwa kuba  ari mu myaka iryoshe y'ubuzima bwiwe. Twanyegeje umwidondoro wiwe kugira tumukingire. Y﻿avuze ati: "Nta kundi nari kugira. Numvise ko ushobora kugurisha ifyigo ku bitaro vya hano. Nca ndajayo hanyuma ndababwira ko nshaka [kurigurisha]. Haheze amayinga make, naciye nvumva bampamagaye bansaba kuja ku bitaro." "﻿Barakoze ibipimo bikeya, hanyuma bantera umuti watumye ntasubira kumenya ubwenge. Naragize ubwoba ariko nta kundi nari kugira." Ammar bamuhaye ama Afghani hafi 270.000 (arenga miriyoni 6,2 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) kuri iryo fyigo, amenshi akaba yagiye mu kuriha amafaranga yari yaguranye kugira asumire ivyo kurya umuryango wiwe. "﻿Iyo turiye muri iri joro, irikurikira ntiturya. Maze kugurisha ifyigo ryanje, numva umenga nsigaye ndi umuntu adakwiye. Numva nihebuye. Hamwe ubuzima bwobandanya gutya, numva nzohava mpfa," niko avuga. K﻿ugurisha ingingo z'umubiri si ikintu gishasha muri Afghanistan. Vyahora bikorwa n'imbere y'uko aba-Taliban bafata ubutegetsi. Ariko n'iyo abantu bafashe ingingo nk'iyo ibabaza cane, n'ubundi basanga badashobora kuronka uburyo bwo kubaho. M﻿u nzu ata na kimwe kirimwo, yuzuye imbeho, twahasanze umugore avuga ko hari haheze amezi indwi agurishije ifyigo ryiwe. Bakoresheje ayo mafaranga mu kuriha ideni - amafaranga bari baguranye ngo bagure ubusho bw'intama. Ariko izo ntama zaciye zipfa zihitanywe n'imyuzure mu myaka iheze, gutyo baca baratakaza aho bahora bakura uburaro n'uburamuko. A﻿ma-Afghani 240.000 (miriyoni hafi 5,5 mu marundi) yaronse kuri iryo fyigo ntakwiye. "﻿Ubu nta kundi turi bugire atari ukugurisha umwana wacu w'umukobwa w'imyaka ibiri. Abatuguranye amafaranga batwamizako induru, batubwiye ngo duhe umukobwa wanyu niba mudashoboye kutwishura," niko avuga. "﻿Ndamaramazwa cane n'aho tugeze. Rimwe na rimwe numva ari vyiza gupfa kuruta kubaho gutya," ivyo navyo bivugwa n'umugabo wiwe. Kenshi cane, twarumvise inkuru z'abagurisha abakobwa babo. Nizamuddin ati: "Naragurishije umukobwa wanje w'imyaka itanu ku ma Afghani 100.000." A﻿yo ntashika ayo ifyigo rigurwa, nk'uko twabibonye. U﻿bu agateka k'abantu b'aha mu kubaho karatabagajwe n'inzara. A﻿bdul Ghafar, umwe mu ndongozi z'aho ati: "Turumva ko biteye kubiri n'amategeko ya Islam kandi ko dushira ubuzima bw'abana bacu mu kaga, ariko nta yindi nzira ihari."  M﻿u rugo rumwe twahasanze Nazia, akana k'agakobwa k'imyaka ine kariko karakina kagira utugugu na Shamshullah, musazawe w'amezi 18. S﻿e wiwe, Hazratullah, ati: "Nta mafaranga dufise yo kugura ivyo kurya, none aho nari ku musigiti natangaje ko nshaka kugurisha umukobwa wanje." N﻿azia yaragurishijwe ngo arongorwe n'umuhungu wo mu muryango wo mu ntara yo mu bumanuko ya Kandahar. Ku mwaka 14 azoca arungikwa. Gushika ubu Hazratullah amaze kwakira kabiri amafaranga yo kumugura. Hazratullah avuga ko menshi muri ayo mafaranga yakoreshejwe mu kugura ivyo kurya, ayandi imiti y'umuhungu wiwe muto. A﻿ti: "Murabe, arwaye indwara zo kurya nabi" aho akaba yaciye aduza ishati yiwe ngo atwereke ingene akada kiwe gafoye. Urugero runini rw'abana batarya ibidakwiye ni ikimenyetso c'ingaruka inzara iriko iragira ku bana bafise munsi y'imyaka itanu muri Afganistan. Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) ivuga ko igitigiri c'abana bazanwa ku mavuriro yayo yitaho abana barwaye kubera kurya nabi mu gihugu ciyongeye gushika ku 47% uyu mwaka ugereranije no mu mwaka uheze. I﻿kigo ca MSF gitanga ingaburo muri Herat nico conyene gifise ivya nkenerwa bikwiye, ariko ntigifasha abo muri ico gisagara gusa, cakira kandi abo mu ntara bihana urubibe za Ghor na Badghis aho abafise izo ngorane biyongeye gushika ku 55% mu mwaka uheze. K﻿uva mu mwaka uheze, barongereje ibitanda kugira bashobore kwakira abana bakeneye kuvurwa. Ariko n'ubu ico kigo cama kirengewe. Uko iminsi ihera, niko abana bazanwa usanga bakeneye kuvurwa indwara zirenga imwe. O﻿mid, ku mezi 4, apima ibiro 4 gusa. Abaganga batubwiye ko umwana asanzwe kuri ayo mezi aba apima nibura ibiro 6,6. Nyina, Amana vyabaye ngombwa ko agurana amafaranga kugira afate urugendo rwo gushika ku bitaro aho aboneye ko atanguye kudahwa cane.  T﻿wabajije Hameedullah Motawakil, umuvugizi wa reta y'intara ya Herat ico bakora kugira bahangane n'ikibazo c'inzara. A﻿ti: "Ibi bintu vyatumwe n'ibihano mpuzamakungu vyafatiwe Afghanistan hamwe no gufatira amatungo ya Afghanistan. Reta yacu iriko iragerageza guharura abakeneye gufashwa ingene bangana. Benshi barabesha ingene bamerewe kuko bibaza ko baca bafashwa." Ni insiguro yagumye ahagazeko n'ubwo twamubwiye ko twari twabonye ibimenyetso vyeruye vy'ingene ibintu bimeze nabi cane. Y﻿avuze kandi ko aba-Taliban bariko baragerageza kugwiza ubuzi. "﻿Turiko turagerageza kwugurura ibirombe vy'ubutare bwa fer hamwe n'umugambi wo kwubaka umuringoti utwara gaz." N﻿tibisa n'uko ari ibintu bizoba ubu vuba. A﻿bantu batubwiye ko bumva barahebwe na reta y'aba-Taliban hamwe n'amakungu. I﻿nzara ni rwica-ruhoze, ingaruka zayo ntizama zica zigaragara buno nyene. K﻿ure y'amaso y'amakungu, urugero rw'akaga kariko karaba muri Afghanistan rushobora kutamenyekana, kuko ata n'umwe ariko araharura.

column2: USA: Ibiciro vy’igitoro vyakorotse ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka yaho
column3: Igiciro c'ibitoro muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika cakorotse cane ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka y'ico gihugu. Ivyo bituma abahingura ico gitoro biba ngombwa ko babanza kuriha abakirangura kugira ngo bakibakureko, ku gutinya ko mu kwa gatanu bashobora kubura n'aho bagishira. Abagura igitoro baragabanutse rwose mu gihe ingingo zo kuguma  murugo ahatandukanye kw'isi yose zatumye abantu baguma biyugaranye. Vyatumye amahinguriro y'igitoro akodesha amatanki kugira ngo bashobore kubika ibitoro vy'umurengera, ibiciro mu gihugu cose bikoroka. Igiciro c'akagunguru muri West Texas Intermediate (WTI), ishingiro ry'igitoro ca Amerika, caramanutse kija musi y'amadorari 37.63 ku kagunguru. Stewart Glickman, umushakashatsi wo mu kigo ca Amerika Center for Financial Research and Analysis (CEFRA) kijejwe kwihweza ibijanye n'amafaranga avuga ati: "Ibiriko biraba birarengeye ubwenge. Igabanuka ry'abakiriya ryararengeye ivyo abantu bashobora kuba bari biteze". Avuga ko mu gihe izi ngingo za Guma murugo zobandanya uko ziri bishobora gutuma ibiciro vy'igitoro no mu kwa gatandatu bibandanya bikoroka. Ati: "Ni ukuri nta cizere mfise ko ibintu bishobora kworoha ku makompanyi adandaza igitoro canke ku biciro vyaco". Igisata c'igitoro kiri mu ngorane z'uko abagishaka bagabanutse kubera coronavirus hamwe n'ukutumvikana hagati y'ibihugu bisanzwe bicimbura. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, ishirahamwe OPEP/ OPEC rihuza ibihugu vyimbura igitoro hamwe n'ibihugu bicuditse vyarahavuye birashika ku masezerano yo kugabanya urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa gushika hafi 10%. Muri ayo masezerano bumvikanye ko urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa rugabanywa ku buryo butari bwigere bubaho. Hagati aho, abahinga babona ko iryo gabanywa ata kintu kinini rizohindura. Stephen Innes ajejwe ubudandaji mu kigo Axicorp avuga ati: "Ntivyafashe umwanya muremure kugira ngo abadandaza igitoro babone ko amasezerano yashitsweko na OPEP/ OPEC - uravye ingene ameze ubu - atazoshobora gutuma  isoko y'igitoro isubira ku murongo". Ku bashoferi ba Amerika, ikoroka ry'ibiciro vy'igitoro - vyamanutse hafi ku bice 2/3  kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka - ryaragize ingaruka ku giciro co kw'ipompo, n'aho ejo ku wa mbere  bitakorotse uko vyari vyitezwe. Glickman ati: "Ikiriho ni uko, n'aho woba ukeneye kuja mw'ibarabara kubera imvo iyi canke iriya, ukenera igitoro gike cane gusumba uko vyari bimeze mu mezi ane aheze". "Ingorane nyamukuru kuri benshi muri twebwe ni uko n'aho wocuzuza, uzoja he?". Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika avuga ko leta ishobora kugura igitoro gihingurwa muri ico gihugu. Ariko amakenga ahari ni uko ububiko bwaco bushobora kurengerwa, mu gihe ububiko bw'ikompanyi Cushing, ikompanyi nkuru itanga igitoro muri Amerika, bwarengewe gushika ku bice 50% kuva mu kwa gatatu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibanki ANZ.

column2: Uwahoze ari Pope Benedict ntaco yakoze kw'ihohoterwa, biri mu cegeranyo gishasha
column3: Uwahoze ari Papa Benedicto XVI yarananiwe  no kugira ico akoze ku mabi yo guhohotera abana igihe yari akiri musenyeri mukuru i Munich , nk'uko bivugwa n'amatohoza yo mu Budagi ku bijanye na Ekereziya Katorika. Papa Benedicto, ico gihe yari azwi nka  Josef Ratzinger, yari muri ico kibanza hagati ya 1977 na 1982. Yarahakanye ko ivyo vyabaye. Ariko icegeranyo gishasha ku mabi avugwa ko yakozwe muri kahise cakozwe n'ikigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi kiragiriza uwo yahoze ari umwungere mukuru. Ihohoterwa ryarabandanije igihe yari musenyeri mukuru, nk'uko bivugwa, kandi abapatiri bagirizwa bagumye mu mabanga bari bafise mu masengero bakoramwo. Uwo yahoze ari papa, ubu afise imyaka 94, yabaye indongozi ya mbere ya Ekereziya yatanze imihoho (yeguye)  mu myaka irenga 600 mu 2013, avuga ko arushe. Kuva ico gihe, abayeho mu buzima buhwekereye i Vaticano aho azwi nka papa 'emerite'. Ico cegerenyo gishasha c'ico kigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi citwa Westpfahl Spilker Wastl  casabwe na Ekereziya Katorika. Umunyamategeko Martin Pusch  ashikiriza ico cegeranyo yavuze ati: "Habiri  muri aho vyabaye  vyakozwe  ku gihe ciwe hanyuma birenzwako amaso na reta." "Kuri vyompi, ababikoze bagumye bakora amabanga y'ubupatiri yo kwitaho abantu." Hari hamwe bivugwa ko yari azi umupatiri yagirizwa guhohotera abana b'abahungu yimuriwe muri diyoseze yiwe, ariko abandanya gukora amabanga yo kwitaho abakristu  - aho hakaba harimwo rimwe na rimwe kugendera no gushigikira  abantu mu kibano iwabo. Uwo yahoze ari Papa bivugwa ko yarungitse impapuro nyinshi z'inyishu ku bibazo vy'ico kigo, aho yerekanye ko ashigikiye iryo tohoza ariko agahakana kuba yarigeze amenya canke yanka kugira ico akoze kuri iryo hohoterwa rivugwa. Ico cegeranyo, yamara, kirimwo  inyandiko zisa n'izerekana bikomeye ko yari ari mu nama aho ico kibazo cavuzwe. Vaticano yavuze mw'itangazo ko izokwihweza ido n'ido ry'ico cegeranyo niyo camara gusohoka. Vaticano yongeyeko iti: "Nk'uko twongeye guterwa  isoni n'ukwicuza twatewe n'amabi yakorewe abana bakiri bato n'abapatiri, Icicaro Ceranda kirashikirije ko gishigikiye abahuye n'ayo mabi bose kandi kiremeza inzira yo gukingira abatarakura n'uko haba ibibanza vy'aho ata kibi bashobora gukorerwa". Icegeranyo caheruka ku mabi yakozwe muri kahise mu Budagi cerekanye ko abantu bashika 3.600 mu gihugu cose bari barakorewe amabi n'abantu bo mu mu nzego za ekereziya  hagati ya 1946 na 2014. Benshi mu bayakorewe bari abana bakiri bato kandi bakora nk'abahungu b'abakorezi kuri arutari. Ico cegeranyo gishasha cibanze ku turere twa Munich na Freising  catoye vyihariye ko nibura abantu 497 bakorewe ihohoterwa kuva mu 1945 gushika mu 2019. Uretse uwo yahoze ari papa, ico cegeranyo kiranegura abandi bantu bo muri  ekereziya, harimwo umusenyeri mukuru w'iyo ntara muri iki gihe, Cardinal Reinhard Marx. Abakoze amatohoza basanze nawe hari aho ataco yakoze ku hantu  habiri havugwa ihohoterwa. Uwo mu karidinari aramaze gusaba  Papa François gutanga imihoho mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2011 avuga ko akwiye kwumva nawe hari ico yobazwa ku "kaga" k'ihohoterwa riguma rishirwa ahabona. Papa François ariko yaranse ubusabe bwiwe bwo gutanga imihoho. Imbere yaho, papa yari yahinduye amategeko ya Vaticano ajanye n'ivyaha, aho yakajije cane aho ekereziya ihagaze ku vyerekeye ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.

column2: Gukingira ibikorwa mva-bwenge mu Burundi bigeze hehe?
column3: Itariki 26 ukwezi kwa kane ni umunsi ngaruka-mwaka uzwi nka World Intellectual Property Day, canke umunsi wo kuzirikana "ibikorwa mva-bwenge". Ni umunsi ushishikariza inyungu ziva ku bikorwa bishingiye ku bwenge  birimo ubugeni, ubuvanganzo, ubusizi, birimo na muzika. Ikigaragara ni uko, mu bihugu vyinshi bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere, bene abo banyabwenge batabona inyungu z'ibikorwa vyabo n'ubwo hari amategeko abarengera. Akarorero ni  mu Burundi, aho kiretse kugira amategeko, banafise ikigo cashinzwe na leta, OBDA (Office Burundais des droits d'auteurs) co gufasha gutoza utwo turusho. Impamvu ituma ayo mategeko atubahirizwa n'izihe? Florentine Kwizera yavuganye na Francis Muhire, umwe mu bafise ibikorwa mva-bwenge, yanakurikiranye n'ivyirwa vy'amategeko ajanye no gukingira ibikorwa nk'ivyo. Yatanguye kumubaza nimba abafise ivyo bikorwa mva-bwenge bumva ko bakingiwe n'ayo mategeko (umva ico kiganiro aho hejuru). Woraba kandi n'ibi:

column2: Ghana: Igiporisi cabujije ihishurwa ry'Umwaka Mushasha ritera ibibazo
column3: Dickens Olewe BBC News Igiporisi muri Ghana cagabishije abarongoye ukwemera n’amashengero ko batokora ihishurwa basanzwe bakora ku Mwaka Mushasha kuko hari abo ritera ubwoba, abandi umwitwarariko, mbere abandi bagapfa. Uburenganzira bwo gusenga ntibutegerezwa kurengera uburenganzira bw’abandi, nk’uko igiporisi cavuze mw’itangazo. Abanegura iyo ngingo bavuga ko iteye kubiri n’uburenganzira butangwa n’ibwirizwa shingiro mu kwishira no kwizana ku bijanye no kwemera  ko rero iteye kubiri n’amategeko. Aba-Kristu baharurwa muri za miriyoni akenshi barakoranira mu masengero kugira bumve ivyo  abapasitori  babahishurira ku vyo beretswe ku bizobashikira mu mwaka mushasha. Hari abahishurirwa ivyiza bibarindiriye ariko hari n’abagabishwa ko barindiriwe n’ivyago. Iyo ngingo y’igiporisi yatanguye gusohoka mu mwaka uheze igihe abantu bari barengewe n’ukugabishwa kw’impfu n’akaga, nk’uko ikinyamakuru co kuri internet My Joy Online kivyandika. Mw’itangazo, igiporisi casavye amadini atandukanye”gafashanya” na co no “gukoresha uburyo bwemewe n’amategeko um gushurira ivyo beretswe”. Ariko umunyamategeko Sammy Sarko yavuze ko  iyo ngingo y’igiporisi “iteye kubiri n’amategeko.” Yanditse ati: “Ntikeneye no kubanza kwihwezwa na sentare ya mbere nkuru muri Ghana. Nta tegeko muri Ghana riha igiporisi ububasha bwo kugenzura ingene ivyahishuwe bimenyeshwa mu gihugu”. Yongeyeko ati : “Ubwisanzure bw’idini burenze ubwisanzure bwo gusenga muri sinagoga, isengero canke umusigiti. Bisigura ko abantu badategerezwa guca kubiri n’ivyo bemera kugira bisunge umuco canke reta kiretse buteye kubiri n’itegeko  iri canke irindi.” Igiporisi cavuze co cashinze itariki ya 27 Kigarama (12) nk’umunsi wo gutangura kwubahiriza ingingo zijanye no kumenyesha ivyahishuwe. Iryo tangazo ryavuze riti: “Uyu munsi ni uwo kutwibutsa twese, gukora ibikorwa bijanye n’ukwemera hatarenzwe akarimbi k’amategeko kugira hubahirizwe  ituze ridahungabanywa n’umwitwarariko uvuye ku mburi y’ibibi canke urupfu bigiye gushika”.

column2: Burundi: Abakozi b'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi bagabisha ko bagiye guhagarika akazi
column3: Sendika y'abakozi ba Brarudi, SYLITRAB, itangaza ko igiye guhagarika akazi inyuma y'iminsi itandatu kuva ejo ku wa kane, mu gihe ibibazo bashikirije umukuru w'iryo hinguriro ry'inzoga bitoba biratorerwa umuti, nk'uko biri mu rwandiko bamwandikiye. Dieudonné Nizigiyimana arongoye iyo sendika yabwiye BBC ko ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi ritwawe nabi cane, bakagiriza umukuru waryo ko aho gushira imbere ibiganiro ashima ahubwo gufatira ingingo abamukebura. Mu minsi iheze, Brarudi yaragirijwe ko ibinyobwa isigaye ikora vyataye akanovera, mu gihe hari ibinyobwa bikundwa mu Burundi vyigeze gukena. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Dieudonné Nizigiyimana yagiriza umukuru w'iryo hinguriro amakosa atari make, ivyo navyo ngo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku bakozi no kuvyo risanzwe rikora. Mu makosa ashirwa imbere, Bwana Nizigiyimana avuga ko harimwo ko iryo hinguriro risigaye rirangwamwo ubusuma cane cane bukorwa n'abakozi b'abacangero (Sous-traitants), kugabanya imishahara y'abakozi, kwirukana abakozi,  gutanga akazi ku kimenyane n'ibindi. Avuga ko umukuru w'iryo hinguriro aterekwa ibiganiro asabwa n'abakozi kugira ngo bigire hamwe ingene ingorane zihanze Brarudi zotorerwa umuti, ahubwo ko aca yihutira gufatira ingingo bamwe mu babaserukira mu ntumbero yo kubatera ubwoba. Bwana Nizigiyimana ati: "Abakozi babicishije ku basanzwe barongoye sendika yabo barazishikirije umukoresha kugira ngo hagire ikintu cohinduka, ariko wewe ntiyashatse kubumviriza , ahubwo yaciye yigizayo abaserukira abakozi kugira ngo yibandanirize imigambi yiwe igayitse atacamira". BBC yagerageje kuvugana na Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Brarudi kugira agire ico ashikirije kuri ivyo bivugwa na sendika y'abakozi bayo ariko akaba yamenyesheje ko ataco bafise babivugako. Hagati aho, uburongozi bw'iryo hinguriro bwasohoye itangazo inyuma y'urwo rwandiko rwa sendika y'abakozi baryo, aho buvuga ko bwubaba uburenganzira bw'abakozi bwo guhagarika akazi mu gihe cose amategeko azoba yakurikijwe. Abarongoye Brarudi bamenyesha ariko y'uko amasezerano bafitaniye n'abakozi bazoba bahagaritse akazi azoca ahagarikwa muri ico gihe batazoba bari ku kazi, kandi ko ata n'imishahara n'utundi turusho bahabwa n'akazi bazoronswa. Mu kwezi kw'icumi umwaka uheze, mushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, amahinguriro n'ingenzi yaragabishije Brarudi ko mu gihugu hari imyidogo yavuga ko ibinyobwa bihingurwa n'iryo hinguriro vyatakaje akanovera, anarikebura ko ryokwikubita agashi rigakora ibinyobwa bitonona amagara y'abavyihereza. Ku ruhande rwaryo, Brarudi yarahumurije abanyagihugu, aho yamenyesheje ko amashiramamwe HEINEKEN na Coca-Cola akorana naryo, yama akora ivyigwa kugira ngo arabe ko inzoga zihingurwa zikwije ibisabwa kandi ko n'ibikoresho vyayo bimeze neza.
