column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru: Bellingham, De Jong, Lindstrom, Mudryk, Gomes, Kiwior
column3: Borussia Dortmund imenyesha ko umurwi uwo ari wo wose urondera umwongereza akina hagati Jude Bellingham w’imyaka 19, asanzwe aronderwa na Manchester United be na Liverpool, woba uregeranya imiriyoni zababa 130 z’amafaranga y'abongereza ,pound (ni ukuvuga imiriyoni zirenga 147 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika).  (Athletic) Ikintu ca mbere Bellingham ashira imbere mu ci riza ni uko yokwimukira muri Real Madrid. (El Chiringuito kibicishije muri Marca ) Arsenal yavuganye na Jesper Lindstrom w’imyaka 22 akina muri  Eintracht Frankfurt  kugira irabe ko yoronka uyu mukinyi wo hagati w’umunya-Danemark ku miriyoni 17 z’ama-pound mu kwa mbere. (Bild ). Arsenal ishobora guhangana na Brighton mu rugamba rwayo rwo kurondera umunya-Ukraine akina ku ruhande, Mykhaylo Mudryk w’imyaka 21, asanzwe akina muri Shakhtar Donetsk, mu kwa mbere. (Express) Igiciro c’imiriyoni 30 z’ama-euro zitangwa na Everton kuri Mudryk camiriwe kure mu gihe  Shakhtar imushakako imiriyoni zirenga 50 z’ama-euros, ariko Arsenal ikaba ataco iravuga. (Fabrizio Romano) Umukinyi wo hagati Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25 akomoka mu Buhollande avuga ko "yamye yipfuza kuguma muri Barcelona" inyuma yo kwanka kwimukira muri Manchester United ku miriyoni £65 z’ama-pound mu gihe c’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi giheze. (Mirror) Icegera c’umukuru w’umurwi Flamengo wo muri Brezili avuga ko ata murwi n’umwe urigera umushikira urondera Joao Gomes w’imyaka 21, uyu munya-Brezili akina hagati akaba aronderwa na Liverpool be na Manchester United. (ESPN) Manchester United yaripfuje gutanga umubirigi akina hagati Andre as Pereira w’imyaka 28 kugira imuguze na Gomes mw’igura n’igurishwa riheze, imbere y’uko yimukira muri Fulham. (Talksport) Umumenyereza wa Celtic Ange Postecoglou avuga ko guheba uyu murwi ngo aje kumenyereza Leicester City  bitari mu mutwe iwe. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona  Sergio Busquets  w’imyaka 34 aripfuza kuja gukina muri Inter Miami ya David Beckham yo mw’ihiganwa Major League Soccer ryo muri Amerika amasezerano yiwe arangiye mu ci riza. (Sport) Umusatirizi wa Espagne Marco Asensio w’imyaka 26 ntarahebura ku mugambi wiwe wo kuva muri Real Madrid akimukira mu bakeba ba Barcelona. (Sport – kibicishije muri  El Partidazo de Cope) Amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri yateweko igikumu mu kw’indwi n’umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w’imyaka 25, arimwo igice kivuga ko uwuzomwipfuza ashobora kuzomuronka ku miriyoni 50 z’ama-euro, iki kikazobandanya gushika mu ci riza. (L'Equipe) Barcelona iragabisha ko ishobora kwitwarira ikinyamakuru El Mundo inyuma y’aho gitangarije amakuru aramvuye ku bijanye n’ibiganiro uyo murwi wagiriraniye na Lionel Messi ku bijanye n’amasezerano imbere y’uko yimukira muri Paris St-Germain. (Mail) Nta murwi n’umwe washoboye gushitsa ibisabwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi riheze ku mukinyi wo ku ruhande wa PSV Eindhoven, umunya-Hollande Cody Gakpo  w’imyaka 23, yari asanzwe aronderwa na Manchester United, Southampton, Leeds United na Arsenal. (Voetbal International kibicishije muri TalkSport)

column2: Zelensky abwira ingabo za Russia ati: ‘Vyobabera vyiza kurokoka muri muri Russia hako muza kugwa iwacu’
column3: Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko Uburusiya buriko bugerageza gusatira ingabo za Ukraine nu ntara ya Donbas iri mu buseruko. Mw'ijambo yashikirije nijoro ku wa gatandatu mw'ijoro, yavuze ko bariko "begeranya izindi ngabo mu ntumbero yo gukora ibitero bishasha muri ako karere" ariko akaba yatanze  ubutumwa bw'agasuzuguro ku ngabo z'Uburusiya. Ati: "Vyobabera vyiza murondeye kubandanya mubaho mu Burusiya gusumba gutikirira ku butaka bwacu". Ati: "Turazi ko intwazangabo z'Uburusiya ziriko zitegura abandi benshi bashasha baza guhona. Muri aba bantu, bamwe muri bo bacitse intege mu kwa gatatu n'ukwa kane, hari benshi bariko barinjizwa ariko batavyishimiye cane, mbere batamenyereye n'intambara". "Buri Murusiya arashobora kurokora ubuzima bwiwe". Zelensky avuga ko Ukraine iriko irakora "ibishoboka vyose" kugira ngo habe igikorwa co guhungisha abasirikare n'abasivire amajana n'amajana bagotewe mu gisagara ca Mariupol. Avuga ko Ukraine iriko irakorana n'incuti zayo mu gufatira Moscou ibindi bihano kandi ko yizeye y'uko ingingo yo gufatira ibindi bihano ku gitoro igihe gusohoka "vuba cane". Avuga ko ibarabara ry'ikibuga c'indege ca Odesa ryabomowe rigiye gusanurwa, yongera yemerera igihugu ko ibisagara vyigaruriwe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya, harimwo Kherson, Melitopol na Berdyansk bigiye kubohorwa. Ni mu gihe ariko Uburusiya bubandanya bushinga imizi mu gisagara ca Kherson, nk'uko umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi w'Ubwongereza abivuga, aho amenyesha ko Uburusiya bugomba gutsimbara mu nzira ya poritike n'ubutunzi muri ako karere. Iki gisagara co mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine cigaruriwe   n'ingabo z'Uburusiya mu ntango z'ukwa gatatu, kikazofasha Uburusiya gukomeza ubutegetsi bwabwo muri Crimée/Crimea, bwongere bworoherwe mu bitero amaja mu buraruko no mu burengero, nk'uko ubutumwa bw'ubushikiranganji bwacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter bubivuga. Kuva uno musi, mu ntumbero yo gutsimbataza ubutegetsi bwabwo muri ako karere, Uburusiya bwatanze ikiringo c'amezi ane kugira ngo ifaranga ryabwo, rouble, rizobe ryasubiriye irya Ukraine, hryvnia. Ni mu gihe bivugwa ko Ingabo za Ukraine zasubije inyuma iz'Uburusiya mu micungararo ya Kharkiv. Igisirikare ca Ukraine gitangaza ko ejo ku wa gatandatu cigaruriye uturere tune turi mu buraruko no mu buseruko bw'igisagara ca Kharkiv, ari two agace ka Roganka, Ruska Lozova, Slobidske na Prelesne. Ikigo Institute for War Studies, gikora ubushakashatsi ku bijanye n'ivyo kwivuna abansi hamwe n'imigenderanire, kivuga ko ibi biri mu rukurikirane rw'ibitero vyo kwivuna ingabo za Ukraine zagize hanze y'ico gisagara. Ingabo za Ukraine "zarigaruriye uduce tutari duke mu buraruko no mu buseruko mu micungararo y'igisagara", kikavuga ko ibi bizotuma uturere dutuwemwo n'abanyagihugu tumaze igihe duterwa ama bombe turonka akoyoko. Ibi bivugwa mu gihe Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya butangaza ko ingabo zabwo zirwanira mu kirere zakoroye indege z'intambara zibiriza Ukraine Su-24m mu kirere ca Kharkiv mw'ijoro ryakeye, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga kandi ko bwakoze igitero ku birwanisho Amerika n'ibihugu vya Bulaya vyari bihaye Ukraine, kandi ko bwasambuye ibarabara ry'ikibuga c'indege ca gisirikare hafi y'igisagara ca Odesa. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko bwakoresheje misire zidahusha, zizwi nka Onyx, mu gutera ico kibuga c'indege, inyuma y'aho Ukraine ikaba yaciye yagiriza ko yateye ibarabara rishasha ku kibuga c'indege ca Odesa. Umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ya Amerika Nancy Pelosi yagize urugendo giturumbuka i Kyiv aho yabonanye na Perezida Zelensky ejo k uwa gatandatu. Mw'ireresi yacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter yerekana Pelosi mu mabarabara y'umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine, Perezida Zelensky avuga ko "Amerika ari yo ifata iya mbere mu gushigikira Ukraine mu ntambaraya yayo yo kurwanya igitero c'Uurusiya". "Turabashimiye cane ku kungene mufahsa mu gukingira ubwigenge n'ubusugire bw'igihugu cacu". Uyu mukuru w'Inama nshingamateka ya Amerika avuga ko we n'intumwa yari arongoye batewe  "iteka rinini ryo kubonana n'umukuru w'igihugu wa Ukraine ejo". Avuga ko ibiganiro vyabo vyibanze ahanini "ku mfashanyo mu vyo umutekano, ubutabazi n'ubutunzi, ariko kandi no gusanura igihugu mu gihe intambara izoba irangiye".

column2: Italy 0-1 North Macedonia: Giorgio Chiellini ati 'turasambuwe kandi turahonyanzwe'
column3: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru mu Butaliyano Giorgio Chiellini yavuze ko abo bakinana 'bacitse intege' inyuma yo gutsindwa na Macedoine ya ruguru bakananirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi co mu 2022. Uwo mugwi usanganywe igikombe c'ihiganwa rya Buraya ntuzitaba inkino z'igikombe c'isi ubwa kabiri wikurikiranya inyuma yo kunanirwa kuja mu zabereye mu Burusiya mu 2018. Aleksandar Trajkovski yinjije igitego mu mwanya w'agasunuzo, yatumye haba ku ruhande rumwe umunezero ku rundi na ho amarira. Uwo mukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus yagize ati: "Igihengeri kinini kizoguma muri twebwe. "Nta hantu na hamwe baturushije muri iri joro kiretse ico gitego. Twaronse amahigwe menshi, ariko ku bw'Imana mbi, ntitwashoboye kwinjiza. Hari umwikomo munini. Kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda gushika ubu, twagiye dukora amakosa, none raba aradukozeko. "Ndishimiye uyu mugwi wakoze uko ushoboe. Nta nkeka ko twasambuwe turanahonyangwa. Nizeye ko iki gihengeri kizoduha inguvu kugira dusubire gutangura bushasha. Umumenyereza w'Ubutaliyano Roberto Mancini yashikanye igihugu ciwe ku munezero ukomeye i Buraya mu gutsinda Ubwongereza mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa rya Buraya ryo mu 2020 mu kwezi kw'indwi, ivyashimiwe cane uwo mumenyereza umugwi wiwe utahabwa amahirwe muri iryo higanwa. Uwo mugwi Azzuri wari wahejeje mw'itsinda ari uwa kabiri inyuma y'Ubusuwise, ugutsindwa na Macedoine ya ruguru bikaba bisigura ko uwo mugwi ufise igikombe ca Buraya ugiye kumara imyaka 12 utagaragaye mu nkino zikomeye z'igikombe c'isi mu mupira w'amaguru. Mancini yagize ati: "Muri iri ci narishimye cane, ubu na ho n'akababaro gakomeye. Biragoye kuvuga. "Ndifadikanije n'abakinyi mu mubabaro. Ni umugwi wakinye neza kandi watsindiye igikombe ca Buraya mw'ici riheze kandi babikwiye. Ndababajwe no kuba batazoja mu gikombe c'isi ku ncuro igira kabiri. "Uwo ni wo mupira w'amaguru. Utsinzwe, utegerezwa kubabara mu gacerere, nta kintu ushobora gukora. "Biragoye kuvuga ku rukino twateye mw'igoli incuro 40 tutinjiza, hanyuma tugatsindwa igitego ku munota wa 92. N'uko bimeze." "Abakinyi bafise kazoza keza, barakomeye kandi bafise na kazoza mu mugwi nserukiragihugu. Ni ibihe bigoye, kandi no muri iyi misi igiye gukurikira ni ko bizoba bimeze. Ni yo mategeko y'umupira." Abajijwe kuri kazoza kiwe, Mancini yagize ati: "Ubu haracari kare kuvuga kuri kazoza. Turacari mu kigandaro. "Nk'umuntu, nshobora kuvuga ko nakunze aba basore uyu munsi gusumba igihe twatsinda mu kwezi kw'indwi. Akababaro ni kenshi." Umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubutaliyano akina muri Chelsea Jorgino yemeye ko bafise uruhara ku vyavuye muri urwo rukino, avuga ati: "Birababaje cane. Ndemeza ko twakinye neza, kuko twatembereje umupira neza kandi turanabarusha gukina, ariko ntitwashoboye kwinjiza. Nta we twotako umwikomo ariko ni ko kuri. "Mu nkino zike ziheze, ntitwashoboye kwinjiza kandi twagiye turakora amakosa yadukozeko, kuko abo twakina baronka igitego bateye mw'igoli gake. Biragoye kuko dutegerezwa kuvyakira. Ntitwashoboye gukora neza - ndabifisemwo uruhara kandi birababaje." Umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubutaliyano Marco Verrati yongeyeko ati: "Biragoye gutegera ivyashitse, kuko birababaje cane. Igitego cabo mu minota y'agasunuzo ni nk'indoto. Uyu mugwi wari ufise amahigwe yo kuja mu gikombe c'isi, rero biragoye gutahura ivyashitse muri iri joro. Twe turazi ko twitanze, ubu mu vy'ukuri ni igihe c'uko twibaza twebwe nyene ibibazo bimwe bimwe." Ubutaliyano bubaye igihugu kigira kane gitwaye igikombe ca Buraya ariko kikananirwa kuja mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi, kikaba gikurikiye Tchécoslovaquie, le Danemark na Grèce.

column2: Messi ashaka Manchester City gusumba PSG, Klopp ati: 'nta wutamushaka mu murwi wiwe'
column3: Jurgen Klopp, umumenyereza wa Liverpool avuga ko ata mugambi afise wo kurondera Lionel Messi, ariko akavuga ko uyu mukinyi vyomubera vyiza agiye gukina mw'igihangwa ry'Ubwongereza, Premier League. Mu gihe kazoza k'uyu mukinyi kariko kavugwako vyinshi cane kuva amenyesheje ko yipfuza kuva muri Barcelona, Klopp avuga ko "ata mahirwe" ko uyu mukinyi akinira Liverpool. Abajijwe nimba yoba yipfuza kugura uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 33, Klopp yishuye ati: "Ni nde mumenyereza atipfuza kubona Messi mu murwi wiwe?" "Ikibazo si imyaka kuri twebwe, ariko dukeneye umukinyi mwiza, aho rero mvugishije ukuri". Messi avugwa ko yipfuza gusubirana n'uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Barça Pep Guardiola ubu asanzwe amenyereza Manchester City. Ku rundi ruhande, ikinyamakuru co mu Bufaransa L'Equipe kivuga ko Lionel Messi ashima Manchester City gusumba Paris St-Germain, nk'uko bivugwa na se wiwe, akaba ari nawe amuserukira. Ku wa kabiri, imbere y'uko amenyesha Barcelona ko yipfuza kuva muri uyu murwi, Messi yabanje no guterefona Pep Guardiola, umumenyereza wa Man city, yigeze no kumenyereza Barça. Yamubwiye ati: "Ndipfuza gutsindira imipira y'inzahabu ibiri iri imbere, kandi mbona ko ibi nobishikako mu gihe noba ndi kumwe nawe". Klopp avuga ko coba ari ikintu gikomeye mu gihe Messi yokwinjira muri Manchester City woca ukomera cane kandi bikaba ari ibintu vyogora kuwutsinda. Ni mu gihe hari amakuru yavuga ko Manchester City yashobora gutanga Bernardo Silva, Riyad Mahrez na Gabriel Jesus ikabaguza na Messi, ariko uyu murwi warabihakanye. Klopp ati: "Kuri Premier League, coba ari ikintu gikomeye, ariko sinibaza ko vyorinda guca hiyo hose". "Ntarigera akina mu rindi higanwa. Umupira w'amaguru hano uratandukanye n'ahandi. Nipfuza kubona akina hano, ariko zinsi ko bizokunda". Ni mu gihe bivugwa ko uwujejwe kwinonora imitsi muri PSG, Leonardo, yahamagaye Jorge Messi, se wa Messi amubaza ibijanye n'ivy'uyu musatirizi akomoka muri Argentine. PSG yoyo ikaba ihakana aya amakuru. Amakuru avuga ko Jorge Messi yamubwiye neza ko umuhungu wiwe yipfuza kuja gukinira Manchester City. Hagati aho, umukuru wa Barcelona, Josep Maria Bartomeu, yanse umubonano na Messi kugira ngo baganire ivyo kuva muri uyo murwi.

column2: ONU ivuga ko abantu 117 bishwe mu ndyane hagati y’aba Lendu n’aba Hema muri Kongo
column3: Icegeranyo c'intangamarara c'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU cemeza ko ubwicanyi mu gihugu ca Republika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Kongo bumaze guhitana abantu 117 mu ntara ya Ituri. Abenshi mu bapfuye ni abo mu bwoko bw'aba Hema batunzwe cane cane n'ubworozi bw'inka, mu gihe abakoze ivyo bitero ari abo mu bwoko bw'aba Lendu batunzwe ahanini n'uburimyi. Iyo mirwi ibiri yo muri iyo ntara ya Ituri izwi ko yamye ishamirana kuva kera, ariko ico cegeranyo ca ONU kimenyesha ko hashobora kuba hariyongereyeko n'izindi mvo zishingiye kuri politike be no ku butunzi. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko abo bantu baguye mu bitero vyabaye hagati y'amagenekerezo ya 10 na 13 z'uku kwa gatandatu muri iyo ntara iri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu. Umurwi w'abashakashatsi bakoze ico cegeranyo bamenyesha ko bamwe muri bishwe baciwe amazosi, kandi ko harimwo abagore n'abana. Mu gihe amazu n'ivyarimwo vyaturiwe, ishirahamwe ONU rivuga ko uravye ingene ivyo bitero vyari bikaze, vyaboneka ko abakoze ivyo bitero bari bafise intumbero yo kwomora abantu ntibasubire kugaruka mu zabo. Igisirikare ca Kongo kimenyesha ko umurwi wakoze ico gitero urongowe n'uwitwa Ngudjolo, kikavuka ko cafashe ikirindiro cawo inyuma y'intambara ikaze. Buramatari w'intara ya Ituri, Jean Bamanisa,  yabwiye BBC ko abajejwe umutekano babandanya bakora amatohoza kandi ko ababikoze bazorengutswa imbere y'ubucamanza. Kuva mu mwaka uheze, abantu barenga ibihumbi 300 baramaze guhunga kubera izo ndyane zo muri iyo ntara ya Ituri, bakaba baba mu makambi y'abateshejwe izabo be no mu ncuti ku mugwa mukuru w'iyo ntara, Bunia, hamwe no mu micungararo yaho. Muri ico gihugu kandi havugwa amakuru y'intambara zibera mu mitumba ya Minembwe mu ntara ya Kivu y'Ubumanuko. Mu gihe  hari ibihuha vyavuga ko hoba hari abasirikare b'u Rwanda bariko barwanira ku butaka bwa Kongo, umunyamakuru wa BBC, Gaius Kowene, akorera muri ico gihugu amenyesha ko abenshi mubo bavuganye bahakana ayo makuru. Amakuru atangwa n'inzego zitandukanye, haba mu baserukira ishirahamwe ONU, mu mashirahamwe adaharanira inyungu za politike, mu bamenyeshamakuru bakorera muri ako karere, mi gisirikare c'u Rwanda, eka mbere no mu gisirikare n'inzego zijejwe igendereza muri ico gihugu ca Kongo, yose avuga ko ayo makuru ari ibihuha.

column2: Burundi: Umuririmvyi Délégué Général arafunzwe kubera indirimbo yiwe "idahuje n'umuco"
column3: Umuririmvyi Olegue Baraka azwi kw'izina rya Délégué Général afunzwe kuva ku wa mungu, ejo ku wa kane yerekanywe n'igipolisi c'Uburundi. Yagirizwa ivyaha vyo "gukwegera abantu mu buhumbu no guhungabanya imico y'ikirundi". Ibi bifatiye ku masanamu y'ururirimbo gw'iwe yise "Delegue General" bavuga ko rurimo ibiterasoni. Igipolisi kivuga ko kizokurikirana n'abandi bose bakinye muri iyo sanamu nk'abanyeshure nk'uko bivugwa n'ibimenyeshamakuru mu Burundi. Amakuru y'uko uyu muririmvyi afunzwe yavuzwe bwa mbere ku wa mbere w'iyi ndwi ku mbuga hwaniro. Ururirimbo rwiwe rurimwo urwaruka ruboneka nk'abanyeshure bakinira mu cumba c'ishure bambaye impuzu z'ishure. Uru ruririmbo rwasohotse mu kwezi gushize k'umunani, ubu kuri Youtube, aho rukigaragara kugeza mu gitondo uyu munsi, rumaze kurabwa inshuro zirenga 25,000. Ubwo yerekanwa n'igipolisi, uyu muririmvyi yumvikanye avuga ko asaba ikigongwe kuko yakoze iyi ndirimbo abakuru bakamubwira ko ari amakosa. Mu gihe we ayikora ngo yumva ko ibiyirimwo ari ibintu bibaho. Ku mbuga hwaniro, abantu bamwe bavuga ko uru ruririmbo nta kidasanzwe kirimwo kitabonetse mbere cotuma Olegue Baraka n'abagenzi biwe bafunzwe ubu. Abandi bavuga ko akwiriye guhanwa kuko ayo masanamu ahushanye n'imico y'ikirundi.

column2: Papa Francis yashoboye gusoma imisa ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro inyuma yo kubagwa urura
column3: Papa Francis yashoboye kwiyereka abantu ubwa mbere kuva bamukoze kubera ingorane y'urura runini, haraciye indwi. Mu gihe yaboneka ko ameze neza, uyu mupapa w'imyaka 84 yasomye imisa yo muri ino ndwi ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro  Gemelli i Roma. Abantu baharurwa mu majana bakoraniye hanze y'ibi bitaro, bamwe bakoma akaruru ngo "Viva il Papa!" (Twogereranya na "Papa, ramba"). Vaticano ivuga ko igikorwa co kuvura Papa indwara y'urura runini izwi nka "symptomatic diverticular stenosis" cagenze neza. Papa yabwiye abari aho ati: "Ndanezerewe kubona nshoboye kurangura ibanga ryanje ryo ku wa Mungu n'aho ndi ng'aha". "Narumvise ko mwambaye hafi cane kandi ko mwansengeye. Ndabashimiye n'umutima wanje wose". Ashimira abakozi bo muri ivyo bitaro, yavuze ko "yiboneye ingene ubuvuzi bwiza ari nkenerwa, kandi bose bakaburonka, mu bindi bihugu nk'uko bimeze hano mu Butariyano". Yongerako ati: "Ntidutakaze aya mahirwe. Ni ngombwa ko tuyabungabunga". Bamwe mu bana barwariye muri ivyo bitaro babonetse bari kumwe na Papa ku rubaraza. Ntibiramenyekana ikiringo azomara muri ibi bitaro mu gihe azoba ariko ararwaruka. Indwara ya Diverticular ni indwara itera ibivyimba mu rura runini, bigashobora gutuma rwipfungānya, bigatuma umuntu yuzura inda akanababara mu nda. Francis, yavutse mu  1936 i Buenos Aires, yaratakaje igice c'ihaha ry'iburyo afise imyaka 21. Afise kandi ikibazo co mu matako kimutera ububabare buhera mu gice co hasi c'umugongo bukamanuka mu maguru. Mu 2014, yagiye ahagarika ibikorwa bimwe bimwe kubera ibibazo vyo mu mushishito.

column2: Kenya: Umupasitori yishe umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero
column3: Umupasitori wo muri Kenya yatangaje abakirisu igihe yacumita umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bari gusenga ejo ku wa Mungu, mu rusengero bafatanije gushinga mu gisagara ca Mombasa. Abakirisu bari muri urwo rusengero babwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko Elisha Misiko yari yicaye mu kibanza c'imbere, igihe umugore wiwe nawe, Ann Mghoi, yari kuri arutari ariko arasigura. Niho umugabo wiwe Misiko yamusangayo n'imbugita yari yanyegeje mw'ishati yari yambaye amucumita mu mugongo. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bapfa uburongozi bw'urwo rusengero rwitwa 3 G (Grounds for God's Gospel). Umwe mu bakirisu basengera muri urwo rusengero ati: "Twebwe twibaza ko cari ikintu yari agiye kumubwira, kumbe yari agiye kumucumita imbugita". Uwundi ati: "Uyu mugabo yari yarubakanye n'uyu mupfasoni arongoye uru rusengero, ariko bari barahukanye. Yari amaze kumutera ubwoba incuro nyinshi, kandi yari yanavuze ko azokora ivyo yakoze uno munsi". Ahejeje kumucumitaniho  nawe yaca yicumita mu nda, agerageza no kwikata izosi, mu gihe abakirisu bari bagiye gutabara. Uyo mugabo yaciye apfa ubwo nyene, mu gihe umugore wiwe yagiye gupfira mu bitaro. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bari baratandukanye bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero, aho umwe wese yashaka kuba ari we mukuru, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Daily Nation. Rwari rusigaye ruyobowe n'umugore, ivyo Pasitori Misiko, umugabo wiwe, atashaka kwumva.

column2: FAO: Ata mafaranga abonetse indege zo kurwanya inzige zirahagarara
column3: Ishami rya ONU rikurikirana uburimyi n'ivyo kurya kw'isi FAO riragabisha ko indege zaryo zose zafasha mu kurwanya inzige zongeye gutera muri Afrika y'ubuseruko zishobora kudasubira gukora hamwe ritoronka amafaranga angana na miriyoni 38 z'ama dolari ($38 million). Izo nzige zitema zigatongora imirima zongeye gutera muri Ethiopia, Kenya na Somalia aho zigeramiye imibereho y'abarimyi n'abarozi basanzwe bahanzwe n'ingaruka z'izikiza ca Covid-19 n'imyuzure muri ako karere. Ku mwihwezo wa vuba, FAO isanga izo nzige zimaze gutera mu ntara 11  muri Kenya kandi ko ziriko zitera zija mu ntara zo kw'ibahari z'ico gihugu hamwe no muri Tanzania. Zimaze kwonona kandi imirima muri Ethiopia na Somalia uyu mwaka. Ribaye irya  gatatu  muri aka karere hatera inzige mu kiringo c'umwaka umwe. Inzige zateye: Aho ziva, ibyo zangiza, uko zirwanywa...ibyo ukeneye kumenya Icyorezo cy'inzige cyageze muri Uganda na Tanzania FAO iragabisha ko hagiye kuba ikindi gitero c'inzige Izo nzige nshasha zafashijwe gushwara akarere n'igihuhusi Gati  catumye mu minsi mike hagwa imvura ingana n'iyoguye mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri. Vyatumye inzige zoroherwa mu kugwirirana. Umuhuzabikorwa w'ibikorwa vyihuta muri FAO muri Somalia, Ezana Kassa, avuga ati: "Ingaruka n'uko uburimyi n'ubworozi bihungabana cane mu gihugu kidasanganywe amaragamo mu vyerekeye ivyo kurya'' Iryo shami rya ONU rivuga ko gupompa imiti mu kirere no hasi , vyakozwe kuva izo nzige ziteye ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2020, vyari vyatumye hakizwa ibitegwa n'ibitungwa biciye amafaranga aharugwa muri miriyaridi 1.2 z'ama dolari. "Aho inzige zaheruka gutera ku rugero rusa n'uru rw'ubu, mu karere ka Sahel, vyasavye imyaka ibiri n'amafaranga arenga miriyoni 500 z'ama dolari kugira zishobore gutuzwa. Iki gitero kirakomeye gusumba, ariko ibihugu vy'a Afrika y'ubuseruko bisa n'ibizogitsinda-gusa ni bitange amafaranga y'igitoro kugira indege zigume zikora'',  bivugwa n'icegera c'umuyobozi mukuru wa FAO Laurent Thomas.

column2: Diego Maradona yaraye ashinguwe, Argentine isigaye mu marira
column3: Uyu yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa w'umupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona yashinguwe mu birori vyihariye inyuma y'umusi umwe habaye ibikorwa vyo kumusezerana umubabaro mwinshi ku mugwa mukuru wa Argentine Buenos Aires. Ibiroro vyo kumushingura nijoro ku wa kane vyabandanijwe  n'abantu bakeya bagizwe n'abanyamuryango n'incuti ziwe za hafi. Imbere y'aho, isinzi ry'abantu ryaritabiriye ibirori vyo ku musezera ubwa nyuma, abenshi buzuye amarira. Maradona yitavye Imana ku myaka 60 ku wa gatatu ahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima. Urupfu rwiwe rwababaje isi yose, ariko igihugu ciwe carababaye gusumba na rirya bamufata nk'incungu. Isandugu y'ikiziga ca Maradona  - ipfutse ibendera rya Argentine n'impuzu y'umupira w'amaguru yanditseko inomero 10 inyuma kuko ari yo yambara igihe yari agikina - yashizwe imbere y'ikirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu ku wa kane. Leta yavuga ko yari yiteze abantu bashika umuliyoni bari gushika ku kirimba gusezera Maradona ubwa nyuma. Gushika hagati inyuma y'umutaga, imirongo miremire y'abaje kumusezera yarenga ikirometero niyo yibonekeza, mbere igipolisi kikaba carashamiranye n'abashaka gushika ku kirimba amasaha yategekanywa ataragera. Hari n'amakuru avuga ko igipolisi kijejwe kurwanya imigumuko cakoresheje vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi n'amasanu ya plastiki mu gihe cariko kigerageza kuzibira isinzi ry'abantu. Umwe mu bari bahari , Rubén Hernández, abona ko igipolisi carengeje urugero. Yasubiwemwo amajambo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters avuga ati: "Twari twitekaniye dutonze umurongo, ubwo nyene igipolisi gitangura kudutera amasasu ya plastiki. Ubu ni ubusazi, jewe nishakira gusezera Diego". Vyabaye ngombwa ko abategetsi  bahagarika abantu gushikira isandugu kugira ngo umutekano ntuhungabane. Mu murwi w'Ubutaliyano Napoli, umurwi Maradona yakiniye mu kiringo c'imyaka indwi mbere agatuma utera imbere cane, abakunzi bawo basidukanye n'iyonka ku kibuga kugira bamwibuke, bagenda baririmba ngo "Diego, Diego!". Bwari bugize kabiri abanyagihugu birengagiza ingingo za guma mu rugo kubera coronavirus mu gusezera uyu mukinyi rurangiranwa, mu gihe hari hasigaye akanya gato ngo Napoli itane mu mitwe n'umurwi Rijeka wo muri Croatia muri rya higanwa rya Europa League. Muri runo rukino rwaraye rubaye nijoro aho Napoli yatsinze Rijeka 2-0, abakinyi bose ba Napoli babanje kwinjira mu kibuga bambaye udutambara twirabura n'imipira yanditseo inomero 10 Maradona yambara. Umufana Gianni Autiero yabwiye Reuters ati : "Yari umuntu adasanzwe, yatubereye vyose, yari vyose kuri twebwe abanya Napoli. Jewe mu buzima bwanje ni abantu bake cane maze kuririra, Diego ni umwe muri bo".

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Ronaldo, Mbappe, Kane, Kounde, Traore, Aubameyang
column3: Manchester City yashitse ku masezerano na Juventus yo kugura umukinyi  Cristiano Ronaldo, 36. (AS - in Spanish) Juventus ishaka imiriyoni hagati ya 25-30 z'ama euros kuri Ronaldo,  City ikaba yiteze kumuha amasezerano y'imyaka ibiri. (Guardian) Uwu murwi wo mu Butaliyano wagumye wipfuza kugumana Ronaldo ariko ubu ukaba wipfuza kugura umusatirizi wa City umunya Brésil Gabriel Jesus, 24, kugira ngo amusubirire.(Sky Sports) Ronaldo asaba umushahara wa 510.000 vy'amapawundi (yababa 698.000) ku ndwi kugira yinjire muri City, ivyomutuma aba umukinyi wa mbere ahembwa umushahara munini muri uwo murwi, ibi na vyo bigashobora gutera agashavu abandi bakinyi.  (Sun) Juventus iripfuza gusubirana nk'intizo umusatirizi w'umutaliyano Moise Kean w'imyaka 21 ubu akina muri Everton, ariko ikaronka n'akaryo ko gushobora kumugura burundu mu ci riza.  (Calciomercato in Italian) Liverpool iriko irihweza ingene yogura umukinyi wo hagati wa Brighton umunya Mali Yves Bissouma, 24, ku miriyoni zababa 55. (Express) Wolverhampton Wanderers irarahira ikarengwa ko idashobora gutiza Tottenham Hotspur umukinyi wo ku ruhande w'umunya Espagne Adama Traore, 25, kubera ikeneye kumugumana.  (Telegraph) West Ham United iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa  CSKA Moscow umunya Croatia Nikola Vlasic, 23, mu gihe ikeneye uwosubirira umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umwongereza Jesse Lingard. (Sky Sports) Watford watanguye ibiganiro na Tottenham kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa Moussa Sissoko, 32. (Fabrizio Romano) Paris St-Germain iriko irarondera abakinyi batari bake, harimwo umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umufaransa Paul Pogba, 28, hamwe n'umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umunya Norvège Erling Braut Haaland, 21, mu gihe iriko yitegurira ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka idafise Kylian Mbappe. (L'Equipe, via Mail) Real Madrid yongereje igiciro ishaka gutanga ku musatirizi wa PSG Mbappe, 22 gushika ku miriyoni zababa 199 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, inyuma y'aho aya mbere yababa n'imiriyoni zababa 188 bayankiye.  (Sky Sports) PSG ishobora guca irondera umusatirizi wa Everton umunya Brésil Richarlison mu gihe Mbappe yogenda, ni mu gihe abaserukizi b'uyu mukinyi bamaze gushika i Paris mu biganiro.  (ESPN Brazil - in Portuguese) Manchester United vyaranse ko ironka umukinyi wo ku ruhande w'umwongereza Noni Madueke w'imyaka 19, inyuma y'aho atereye igikumu ku yandi masezerano na PSV Eindhoven. (Mirror) Kizigenza wa Tottenham umwongereza Harry Keane  ari mu biganiro vyo kurondera amasezerano yoronkamwo akarusho. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 28 yiteze kuronka aya masezerano ashobora kumutuma ahembwa amapawundi 400.000 (mu madorari akaba yababa 548.346) ku ndwi, inyuma y'aho yemereye kuguma muri uyo murwi muri uno mwaka.  (Times - subscription required) Chelsea iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Sevilla umufaransa Jules Kounde, 22, ku giciro kingana n'imiriyoni  57.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sky Italia, via Star) Hagati aho, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea umufaransa Kurt Zouma, 26, yitezwe gufatwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga kugira aje gukinira West Ham mu masezerano y'imyaka itanu, ku giciro c'imiriyoni 35.6 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Tottenham yatanguye ibiganiro vyo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus  umunyamerika Weston McKennie, 22 ku giciro c'imiriyoni 54.8 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Independent) Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta yamiriye kure ivy'uko kizigenza wayo, umusatirizi w'umunya Gabon  Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang ashobora gusezera uyu murwi.  (ESPN) Everton iripfuza umusatirizi wa Brighton  umufaransa Neal Maupay w'imyaka 25. (Sky Sports) Manchester United ishobora kurondera umukinyi wo hagati imbere y'uko ikiringo c'igura n'igurishwa kirangira, ariko bigashobora kuba ngombwa ko irindira kugira irabe ko yoronka umwongereza Declan Rice, 22 akinira West Ham. (Independent)

column2: Amatora ya Kenya: kurima urumogi no kugurisha ubumara bw’inzoka, imigambi ya George Wajackoyah
column3: George Wajackoyah , umunyaporitike yahoze ari umwana wo mw’ibarabara muri Kenya, hanyuma akaja gukora akazi ko kwimba imva mu Bwongereza, yabaye igitangaza muri poritike ya Kenya mu kwiyamamariza ikibanza c’umukuru w’iki gihugu, aho yemerera abanyagihugu ko azokigira igihugu gikomeye gishora hanze urumogi, ubumara bw’inzoka hamwe n’amatengatwa y’imfyisi, n’aho hari ibibazo vyinshi ku kungene yoshobora gushira mu ngiro iyi migambi. Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza afise imyaka 63, akaba yize amategeko, yiyerekanye nk’umuntu atandukanye cane mu bakandida bane bariko biyamamariza iki kibanza c’umukuru w’ico gihugu co muri Afrika y’Ubuseruko mu matora ategekanijwe kuba ku wa 9 z’ukwezi kuza kwa Myandagaro (8). Ibiharuro ngereranyo biha amahirwe make cane uyu mukandida w’umugambwe Roots Party, mu kibanza ca gatatu – ibiharuro vya nyuma biheruka gusohoka ku wa 11 z’uku kw’indwi bikaba bimuha amajwi 4% gusa. Ariko abahinga babona ko nk’umuntu ari bwo bwa mbere yiyamamaje, ariko avyifatamwo neza kandi n’abakandida babiri bakomeye barafise ubwoba bwo gutakaza ijwi rimwe gusa ryohava rimwegukira, na rirya babona ko bitazokworoha hagati y’aba babiri, ibiharuro bigashira imbere uwahoze ari umunyaporitike akomeye atavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi Raila Odinga ku majwi 43% hanyuma icegera c’umukuru w’igihugu nawe William Ruto agahabwa 39%. Macharia Gaitho, umunyamakuru yandika mu kinyamakuru Daily Nation ca Kenya, yandika ati: "Wajackoyah ariko yiyamamaza mu buryo atari ubw’igitangaza ku buryo abantu bo mu gisagara bashobora no kumutwenga, ariko ntagushidikanya ko ariko ahurumbirwa n’urwaruka rwinshi rurakaye, rutishimiye ubutegetsi haba mu bisagara canke ruguru mu mitumba ya kure muri Kenya, kuko arengera ibintu vyose bisanzwe bitandukanya abanya-Kenya nk’amoko, intara n’imigambwe”. Mu myiyamamazo, Prof Wajackoyah yiyambarira ibisanzwe, ipantaro yo kwinonora imitsi (tracksuit), agapira n’igitambara mu mutwe, hakwambara za kositime (costume) – kugira ngo yerekane ko atari mu banya-Kenya basanzwe bari ku butegetsi, aba nabo akaba abagiriza igiturire kirenze urugero. Yerekana intoke ziwe nk’uwuriko aranywa urumogi, agasarisha abantu bitabira amakoraniro yiwe mu gutamba umuziki wa reggae. Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko aramutse atsinze azorekura ukurima no kwimbura urumogi kugira ngo rukoreshwe mu mahinguriro no mu buvuzi, mu ntumbero yo gutorera umuti zibiri mu ngorane nyamukuru za Kenya – ubushomeri n’amadeni y’umurengera. Avuga ko ashobora kwinjiriza Kenya imiriyaridi zirenga ibihumbi icenda vy’amashilingi ya Kenya  (ni ukuvuga imiriyaridi 76 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika) ku mwaka, kandi ko reta itazigera “isubira gusaba ingurane y’urufaranga na rumwe”. Yongerako ati: "Ibihugu vyo mu burengero vyaramaze gutanga uburenganzira bwo kwimbura urumogi, kubera iki tweho tutobikora?” N’aho ata bushakashatsi yishimikiza mu vyo avuga, kurekura ukurima n’ukwimbura urumogi kugira rukoreshwe mu mahinguriro no mu buvuzi nico imyiyamamazo yiwe ihagazeko. Urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw’ikigo Africa Check ruvuga ko imigambi yiwe idatomoye. Hagati aho, ibi vyamutumye avugwa cane ku mbuga hwaniro, mbere n’urwaruka rwinshi ruhanzwe bikomeye n’ubushomeri rukaba rumwirukira. Mu gihe imigambi ya Prof Wajackoyah yoshirwa mu ngiro, Kenya yoba yinjiye ku rutonde rw’ibindi bihugu vya Afrika - harimwo Lesotho, Afrika y’Epfo, Zambia na Zimbabwe – biriko biradodora kw’isoko ry’urumogi abahinga babona ko gushika mu 2028 rizoba rigeze ku miriyaridi zababa 70 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika. Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko atarigera anywa urumogi, ariko ko mu gihe rwokwemerwa n’amategeko, ko yoba uwa mbere mu kurunywa. Ati: "Nta kibi na kimwe kirimwo mu kurunywa iyo rwemewe n’amategeko kandi inzego zibijejwe zikemeza ko rushobora kunyobwa”. Ivyiyumviro vya Prof Wajackoyah biriyamirizwa na Ekleziya Katorika muri Kenya, aho ivuga ko kunywa ibiyayuramutwe vyokwunyuka mu gihe amategeko yorekura urumogi. Musenyeri James Maria Wainaina  avuga ati: "Imiryango irahanzwe n’ibiyayuramutwe biyitera gusambuka, indyane n’impfu rimwe rimwe”. Prof Wajackoyah yemereye kandi abanyagihugu gusubiramwo amasezerano yose reta ya Perezida Uhuru Kenyatta yahaye amakompanyi y’Abashinwa. Mu madeni Kenya ifitiye ibihugu n’amashirahamwe yo hanze, Ubushinwa bufisemwo 21%, ivyateje induru mu gihugu, na cane cane ko ibiri muri aya masezerano – amenshi akaba ari ay’ibikorwa remezo, nko kwubaka amabarabara hamwe n’indarayi – bitashizwe ahabona. Prof Wajackoyah abona kandi ko kworora inzoka ari irindi soko rikomeye ry’ubutunzi bwa Kenya. Avuga ko ubumara bw’inzoka – aho avuga ko “buzimvye cane gusumba inzahabu” – buzokwimburwa mu ntumbero yo kubukoresha mu buvuzi, mu gihe inyama y’inzoka nayo izoshorwa mu bihugu vyo hanze nk’Ubushinwa, aho ifatwa nk’imfungurwa ikomeye. N’aho adatanga ivyemezo ivyo ari vyo vyose, Prof Wajackoyah avuga ati: "Turashobora kwinjiza umuriyaridi w’amadorari buri mwaka tugakomeza ubutunzi bwacu”. Avuga kandi ko Kenya ishobora gushora amatengatwa y’imfyisi asanzwe akoreshwa mu buvuzi mu Bushinwa, akavuga ko ashobora kwinjiriza Kenya amafaranga menshi gusumba urumogi. Amashirahamwe ajejwe amashamba be n’ihuriro ry’abaganga b’ibikoko muri Kenya baramwiyamiriza n’uburakari bwinshi. Iri shirahamwe ry’abaganga b’ibikoko basohoye itangazo bavuga bati: "Urudandaza rw’amatengatwa y’imfyisi hamwe n’inzoka ntirwemewe kandi rwotuma ibikoko vyo mw’ishamba bihahonera”. Iri tangazo ryongerako y’uko "vyotuma haduka ikindi kiza " kuko hoba imigera ikwirakwira ivuye mu mfyinsi no mu nzoka ikabangamira kiremwamuntu. N’aho abamunegura bamwagiriza kwiyemera mu myiyamamazo yiwe (populist), abanywanyi ba Prof Wajackoyah baramwishimiye kuko yashoboye kurengana ingorane nyinshi yaciyemwo mu buzima gushika aho yiyamamariza kuba umukuru w’igihugu. Yavukiye mu mitumba ya kure mu burengero bwa Kenya. Abavyeyi biwe bamaze kwahukana, yisanzwe asigaye aba mw’ibarabara ku mugwa mukuru, Nairobi. Yagiye gutorwa n’abasenzi bo mu rugensero rwa Hare Krishna bari basanzwe bagaburira abadafise aho baba. Prof Wajackoyah yabaye mu rusengero mbere aza kuba n’umupasitori wa Hare Krishna. Yahavuye aronka ubufasha arashobora kurangiza amashure yiwe yisumbuye mu nyuma yinjira mu gipolisi ca Kenya, agenda atera imbere gushika aho yinjira mu gisata kijejwe igendereza. N'aho adatomora neza, Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko yahuye n'ikibazo inyuma yo kuronka amakuru akomeye kuri bumwe mu bwicanyi bukomeye muri Kenya, ubwakorewe umushikiranganji w’imigenderanire Robert Ouko mu 1990. Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko yahagaritswe agakorerwa iyicarubozo, amaze kurekurwa aca arahunga afashijwe n’ibiro vy’ubuserukizi bwa Amerika i Nairobi. Igandagurwa rya Ouko ryagumye ari ikinyegezwa ku banyagihugu gushika aho amatohoza y’inama nshingamateka mu 2010 yerekaniye ko yagandaguriwe kuri umwe mu mihana y’uwari umukuru w’igihugu ico gihe, Daniel arap Moi. Amaze guhunga Kenya, Prof Wajackoyah yaronse akaryo ko kuja mu Bwongereza, aho yakoze ubuzi bubayabaye aca aronka akaryo ko kwiga ku ma kaminuza, Soas University of London, University of Warwick hamwe na University of Wolverhampton. Igihe yiga  i Wolverhampton yakora akazi k’ubuzamu, akazi ko kwimba imva no kwoza ibiziga (imirambo mu Kinyarwanda) kugira ngo aronke ubuzima. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Daily Nation ko ubu buzi bwamuhaye "ukwicisha bugufi no gukura”. Avuga ko uku kwiga akora n’akazi vyatumye aronka amanota atari meza mu vyigwa vy’amategeko. Yagize uruhara mu masekeza ya poritike mu Bwongereza mu ntumbero yo guhimiriza impinduka mu turere dutandukanye tw’isi – akaba yaranakoranye n’uwahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu ca Ghana Jerry Rawlings, yashitse ku butegetsi abanje gutembagaza ubwari buhari mu 1981 akaba yarongoye igihugu gushika mu 2000. Prof Wajackoyah yahavuye yimukira muri Amerika, aho yagiye kubonanira n’umugore wiwe w’umunyamerikakazi akomoka muri Afrika. Bavugwa ko bafitaniye abana batatu. Yarize kandi no ku makaminuza atandukanye muri Amerika, harimwo na Walden University ikorera ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, ari nayo  yaronkeyemwo urupapuro rw’umutsindo rwa Doctorat (PhD). Avuga ko afise impapuro z’umutsindo za kaminuza zigera kuri 17, nyinshi zikaba ari izo mu bisata vy’abimukira, amategeko mpuzamakungu n’ay’impunzi, ivyatumye Gaitho avuga n’agahemo ko afise “impapuro z’umutsindo nyinshi gusumba umwanya yategerezwa kwiga kugira yige ivyo vyigwa vyose”. Prof Wajackoyah yagarutse muri Kenya mu 2010 avuga ko yashaka kwiyamamariza ikibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu. Ico gihe yaciye abivamwo, akaba asubiye kuvyura iciyumviro muri ano matora. Mu bindi bitabonwa kumwe yemerera abanyagihugu mu myiyamamazo yiwe, Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko azoteza imbere ubuzima bw’abakozi mu gushiraho imisi ine y’akazi mu ndwi kugira ngo ahe umwanya wo gusenga aba-Islam kuwa gatanu, Abasabato ku wa gatandatu abandi bakritsu nabo ku wa Mungu. Prof Wajackoyah avuga kandi ko azogarukana igihano c’urupfu, kandi ko abo bose bazokwagirwa no kurya igiturire bazohitishwamwo kwicwa barashwe, canke kumanikwa “bahejeje kurya ubugari”.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Bulaya kuri uyu wa gatandatu: Pogba, Zaha, Aubameyang, Lampard, Falcao, Camacho
column3: Arsenal iriteguye kugurisha umusatirizi wayo akomoka muri Gabon, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang w'imyaka 30, ariko atari muri Manchester United canke  Liverpool. (90min.com) Manchester United barizeye ko bazoshobora kugura abakinyi Sean Longstaff w'imyaka 21 wa Newcastle, na Bruno Fernandes w'imyaka  24  wa Sporting Lisbon ya Portugali. (Evening Standard) Umusatirizi wa Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 26 asaba umurwi wiwe wa Crystal Palace kumuha uruhusha ngo yimukire muri Arsenal. Palace ivuga ko uwumukeneye ategerezwa kumugura imiliyoni 80 z'amapawundi. (Mirror) Gareth Bale w'imyaka 29 ashobora kuguma muri Real Madrid inyuma  y'aho uwo murwi uburiye uwundi murwi woshobora kumugura. (Mirror) Real Madrid itegerezwa kuzoriha imilioni 150 z'amapawundi kugira ngo ishobore kuronka umusatirizi w'umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 26 asanzwe akinira Manchester United. (Mirror) Chelsea itegura gutangaza ko Frank Lampard, yari asanzwe amenyereza umurwi Derby, nk'umumenyereza wayo mushasha imbere y'uko abakinyi bava mu buruhuko mu ndwi iza kugira ngo bitegurire amahiganwa yo mu mwaka uza. (Sun) Liverpool yashitse ku masezerano n'umurwi Sporting ku mahera ashika imilioni indwi z'amapawundi kugira ngo ishobore kugura umusatirizi Rafael Camacho w'imyaka 19. (Evening Standard) Hari inama yahuje abarongozi bakuru b'imirwi ya Atletico na Real Madrid kugira ngo bumvikane ingene umusatirizi Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 28 yokwimukira muri Real Madrid. (L'Equipe) Umusatirizi wo mu gihugu ca Kolombiya, Radamel Falcao w'imyaka 33, aripfuza ko yokwimukira mu murwi wa David Beckham muri Amerika i Miami mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'umurwi Monaco yorangira. (Sun) Aston Villa iriteguye gusaba ko yogura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Southampton, Matt Targett. (Express na Star) Umumeyereza wa West Brom  Slaven Bilic aripfuza ko Julian Dicks bigeze gukinana muri uwo murwi yogaruka muri uwo murwi kugira ngo bafashanye mu vyo kuwumenyereza. (Express na Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham hotspur Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27 akomoka muri Danemark aripfuza kuja muri Real Madrid, umuryango wiwe ukaba wabonywe mu gisagara ca Madrid bariko barondera inzu. ( (Times)) Manchester United iriko iraraba ko yogura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona, Samuel Umtiti w'umufaransa  w'imyaka 25. (Mundo Deportivo) Umusatirizi w'umurwi Manchester City,  Leroy Sane w'imyaka 23 akomoka mu Budagi, abandanya aronderwa cane n'umurwi wo muri ico gihugu Bayern Munich, n'aho wari wabanje gutenyenya. (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Sporting Marcel Keizer abona ko kugumya umukinyi wo hagati wa Portugal Bruno Fernandez bitoroshe, Manchester United ni umwe mu mirwi yerekanye ko yipfuza uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 24. (Record, Manchester Evening News) Se w'umusatirizi wa Juventus Moise Kean w'imyaka 19, amenyesha ko umuhungu wiwe yipfuza kwimukira mu murwi Inter Milan. (Mirror) Atletico Madrid iriko yiyumvira ko yogura umukinyi wa Real Madrid, James Rodriguez w'imyaka 27 akomoka muri Kolombiya, asanzwe atagikenewe cane muri uwo murwi wa Real. (Cadena SER, via AS) Umwongereza Wayne Rooney yabaye rurangiranwa muri Manchester United arizeye ko azoteba aronka akazi nk'umumenyereza, akaba yanasavye Domenec Torrent yigeze kuba ari icegera ca Pep Guardiola ubu akaba arongoye umurwi New York City ko yotangura kumumenyereza muri ico gikorwa. (Sun)
