column3: Iki gikorwa co gusambura inzu z'aba-Islamu cakurikiye imyiyerekano y'aba-Islamu biyamiriza kwifatirwa mu gahanga kw'umuhanuzi wabo Muhammad, kwagizwe n'abanyepolitike...

column2: East Africa: Miriyoni 28 bashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikabije - Oxfam
column3: Abantu bashika miriyoni 28 muri Afrika y'ubuseruko barashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikomeye cane kubera iduga ry'ibiciro bitumwe n'intambara yo muri Ukraine hamwe n'ikena ry'imvura muri uku kwezi kwa gatatu, nk'uko ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza Oxfam rigabisha. Kenya, Somalia na Ethiopia vyugarijwe n'ikena ry'imvura rya mbere rikaze mu myaka 40, aho ni mu gihe Sudan y'Epfo yo ihanzwe n'imyuzure, nk'uko Oxfam ibandanya ivuga. Iryo shirahamwe ryerekana kandi ico ryita ugusamazwa kw'amakungu n'ingwano yo muri Ukraine, ituma hatitabwaho ikibazo c'ikena  ry'ivyo kurya mu karere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko. Itangazo rigenewe ibinyamakuru rivuga ko utwigoro mpuzamakungu two guhangana n'ico kibazo dufise uburyo budahagije na gato kuko ku miriyaridi 6 z'ama dorari ONU ikeneye mu 2022 kugira igarukire ku bari mu kaga muri Ethiopia,  Somalia na Sudan y'Epfo, 3% yonyene niyo amaze kuboneka. Madame Gabriela Bucher, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa mpuzamakungu wa Oxfam yagabishije avuga ati: "Ibice vya Ethiopia, Kenya, Somalia, Sudan y'Epfo n'ahandi vyimirije guhura n'akaga. N'aho imvura yogwa muri uku kwezi, kwivyukiranya bizoba nk'ibidashoboka kiretse hari igikozwe  ubu nyene." Abandanya ati: "Ingaruka z'ingwano yo muri Ukraine kw'ihererekanywa ry'indya kw'isi zizoshika mu bice vyose vy'isi, ariko abasanzwe bari bakenye n'abafise intege  nke nibo zizosesereza cane kuruta abandi kandi  vyihuse kuruta." Ibihugu vya Afrika y'ubuseruko bivana  90% y'ingano bikenera muri Ukraine n'Uburusiya, nk'uko itangazo ribandanya rivuga. "Kubera uruzuba,  indogobwa zacu zarapfuye, izo dusigaranye nazo ziragoyagoya ku buryo zidashobora gukwega intunduguru  z'imizigo", ivyo bivugwa na Ahmed Mohamud Omar, umurimyi  wo muri county ya Wajiir muri Kenya. "Nguma nibaza ico umuryango wanje uzorya, aho ico bazorya ejo kizova,  niba ejo nzoronka indobo canke ibido y'amazi."

column2: Big Fizzo yoba yariganye indirimbo ya Diamond Platnumz?
column3: Umuririmvyi rurangiranwa mu Burundi, Desire Mugani, azwi cane kw'izina rya Big Fizzo, avuga ko atiganye indirimbo ikunzwe cane ya Diamond Platnumz wo muri Tanzania. Big Fizzo yatanguye kumenyekana mu Burundi mu myaka 1996 aho yaririmba mu mugwi wavuza injana ya rap witwa N***a Soul. Ico gihe, naho igihugu cari mu bibazo bitoroshe vy'intambara, ari mu baririmvyi bake baremesha ibiteramo bihimbaye mu Burundi. Nyuma y'imyaka irenga mirongo ibiri ari muri uyu mwuga, Fizzo aracari ku rwego rwo hejuru mu muziki ndundi uvuzwa henshi wokwita pop music mu Congereza. Indirimbo ziwe zigezweho ubu nka Konzi, You na Sugua, zirirwa zisamirana ku maradiyo mu Burundi n'ahandi, mu butambiro eka mbere no ku mbuga nka Youtube, aho usanga zinaherekejwe n'amasanamu ahinguye bigezweho. Ariko bamwe mu bakunzi b'umuziki hamwe n'ababikurikiranira hafi, batanguye kwibaza niba Big Fizzo atoba ariko arafata inzira ya hafi mu kwandika indirimbo ziwe. Indirimbo Tetema y'umuririmvyi Diamond Platnumz yaririmbanye na Rayvanny imaze kurabwa kuri Youtube inshuro zirenga imiriyoni 27, kuri ubu ikaba iri mu zirabwa cane z'uwo munyamuzika. Uyumvirije ugaca unumviriza Sugua ya Big Fizzo yaririmbanye na Elly's Boy, Double Jay na Kirikou A-Kili bo mu kigo c'umukizi Bantubwoy, ntiwogenda udakozweko n'ugusa kwazo. Uhereye ku mudiho, ku ntambo co kimwe na hamwe hamwe mu majambo, ufise ugutwi kw'umuziki urashobora kwumva ko harimwo ibija gusa. BBC Gahuza yashatse kumenya ico uwo muririmvyi avuga kuri ukwo gusa kw'izo ndirimbo, ica ivugana nawe aho asanzwe ari mu gihugu c'Ubutariyano. Big Fizzo yatanguye ahakana ko ata ntumbero n'imwe yigeze agira yo kwigana iyo ndirimbo Tetema ya Diamond Platnumz. Yagize ati: "Abantu bavuga ivyo amatwi yabo agomba kuba atumva neza. Ntushobora kuvuga ko indirimbo zisa kubera ko gusa zifise umudiho umwe. "None duce tuvuga ko zouk zose zisa? Canke ko reggae zose zisa? Ku ntambo naho, imiziki myinshi abantu batamba bimwe, none ni kangahe batamba ndombolo mu miziki yo muri Kongo?" Fizzo kandi abandanya avuga ko mu ndirimbo nyinshi abantu bandika bimwe, gusa bigatandukanywa n'umudiho w'indirimbo canke injana. Ati: "None nk'ubu noreka kuririmba ngira nti 'ndagukunda' kuko hari uwundi yabivuze? Ivyo ntibishoboka. Amajambo ategerezwa gusa, ariko uburyo tubiririmba nibwo buzana ubudasa". Iyindi ndirimbo bivugwa ko Big Fizzo yiganye ni indirimo You, aririmba asa n'uwiyama abamuzanako ingorane mu buryo butandukanye. Iyi ndirimbo nayo uyumvirije, hanyuma ugaca wumviriza indirimbo yitwa F*** You y'umuririmvyi Kizz Daniel wo muri Nigeria, uca umengo hahindutse ururimi n'umurindi gusa. Fizzo yagize ati: "Kuri iyi ndirimbo yoyo sinobesha, kuko Kizz Daniel yampaye 'inspiration'. Harimwo vyinshi bisa muri izo ndirimbo zibiri. Wumvirije nko ku gitari hoho uravyumva." Big Fizzo yabandanije avuga ko ari ibintu bisanzwe kwisunga abandi baririmvyi, mu gihe ugerageje ukazanamwo umwihariko wawe. Abaririmvyi basubiramwo indirimbo z'abandi canke bifashisha bimwe mu biri mu ndirimbo z'abandi bariho, kandi si ibintu vya vuba eka mbere na barurangiranwa mu muzi barabikoze. Aha twotanga nk'akarorero ka Michael Jackson ku ndirimbo ya Manu Dibango yitwa Soul Makossa. Umuhisi Michael Jackson yafashe amajambo "ma-mako, ma-ma-sa, mako-mako ssa", ari mu iyo ndirimbo, ayakoresha mu ndirimbo yiwe "Wanna be starting something". Michael Jackson yaremeye ko yitije ayo majambo ayashira mu ndirimbo yiwe, aca yemera kuriha amahera Dibambo bitarinze guca muri sentare. Mu mwaka uheze, vyaramenyekanye ko hatanguye urubanza rwarezwemwo Ed Sheeran ku ndirimbo yiwe "Thinking Out Loud", urubanza rukibandanya. Umuryango wa Ed Townsend, yandikiye hamwe na Marvin Gay indirimbo rurangiranwa "Let's Get it On", wareze Ed Sheeran kwigana iyo ndirimbo ntegerwa yo mu 1973. Gutera imbere kw'ikintu ico ari co cose kuvana n'ubwira abagikora bagishiramwo hamwe n'umwihariko gifise mu kwitandukanya n'ibindi bikorerwa ahandi. Mu gihe vyotangura kwibazwa ko abaririmvyi mu Burundi atakindi bakora atari gukoporora indirimbo z'abandi, kazoza k'umuziki wo mu Burundi koba kageramiwe. Vyoba ari ibintu bitangaje kuko u Burundi bwamye bufise abaririmvyi bandika indirimbo nziza zibereye ugutwi nka ba Canco Amisi, Christophe Matata, Africa Nova, Kidumu eka mbere na Big Fizzo. Mu gutera imbere kw'umuziki ni ngombwa ko urwaruka rugitangura kwumva imuziki mu gihugu kinaka, rwumvishwa umuziki wihariye wo muri ico gihugu. Iki ni igikorwa cega abanyamuziki bo nyene, ariko cane cane amaradiyo ategura ibiganiro vy'urwaruka harimwo umuziki.

column2: OMS - COVAX: Birakenewe ko incanco zishika mu minwe y'abari muri Afrika
column3: Ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, WHO/OMS, rivuga ko ivyo amakungu yemeye vyo gutanga incanco za Covid muri Afrika bikeneye gushirwa mu bikorwa mu 'gutanga' izo ncanco kuri uwo mugabane. Uwurongoye OMS mu karere ka Afrika Dr Richard Mihigo yabwiye BBC Newsday ati: "Twagiye tubona imihango myinshi batanga muri kahise… yose yari myiza ariko ico dukeneye cane n'uko incanco zishika mu minwe y'abantu bari ku rubuga." Ivyo bivuzwe mu gihe Onu isigura ko uko ibintu vyifashe ari nko 'kwitako umwikomo', mu gihe abarenga ibice 90% vy'abanye Afrika bataracandagwa. Ashikiriza ijambo inama ya bose kuri uyu wa mbere, umunyamabanga mukuru wa Onu, António Guterres yagize ati: "N'ibiterasoni. Twaratoye ubuhinga bwo gupima. Ariko turi ku rudome F uravye inyifato." Dr Mihigo avuga ko Afrika yavyifashemwo neza mu gusaranganya incanco nke yaronse, n'aho zimwe zashitse hasigaye akanya gato ngo zirenze ikiringo. Abategetsi ba OMS bavuga ko umugambi mpuzamakungu wa Covax wo gutanga incanco, ufise intumbero yo gufasha ibihugu bikenye, wagenze neza n'aho utashoboye kuronka incanco zikwiye. Umugambi wa Covax watanze ibice 37% vy'incanco imiliyoni 177 zatanzwe muri Afrika, izindi zikaba zabonetse biciye mu migenderanire n'imfashanyo zivuye ahantu hatandukanye. Dr Mihigo yateye akamo ibihugu gushigikira uwo mugambi mu gucisha imfashanyo yavyo muri Covax.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Ronaldo, Raphinha, De Jong, Tielemans, Neves, Gnabry, Dembele
column3: Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Manchester United  Richard Arnold ariko arakora uko ashoboye kugira ngo yumvishe umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37, guhagarika ivyo kurondera kuva muri uno murwi. (Times) United kandi yagiranye ibiganiro na Stuttgart kugira irabe ko yoronka umusatirizi wa Autriche Sasa Kalajdzic w’imyaka 25. (Sky Germany – mu kidagi) Barcelona yemeye igiciro c’imiriyoni 65 z’amapawundi zisabwa na Leeds United ku mukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Brezili Raphinha w’imyaka 25, ubu uyu murwi wo muri Espagne ukaba urajwe ishinga no kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umunya-Hollande Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25 muri  Manchester United.(Mirror) Chelsea isa n’iyiri inyuma ya Barcelona mu rugamba rwo kugura Raphinha, aba-Blues bakaba bashobora guca bavuvudikira umusatirizi wa Bayern Munich umudagi Serge Gnabry w’imyaka 26. (Mail) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Leicester City umudagi Youri Tielemans w’imyaka 25, hamwe n’umunya Portugal akina hagati muri Wolves Ruben Neves w’imyaka 25, bari ku rutonde rw’abo Manchester United ishobora kwikorako mu gihe itoronka De Jong. (Talksport) Brentford iri hafi yo kuronka umwongereza akina ku ruhande mu murwi nserukiragihugu w’abatarenza imyaka 21 Keane Lewis-Potter w’imyaka 21 ku miriyoni 16 z’amapawundi avuye muri Hull City. (Athletic) Brentford kandi irizeye ko izotsinda Manchester United mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunyegori wa Albania, Thomas Strakosha w’imyaka 27 asanzwe yirebanga. (Mail) Amasezerano y’umusatirizi w’umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w’imyaka 25 mu murwi Barcelona arangira muri rino ci, ariko akaba yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha azotuma abandanya akina muri Nou Camp gushika mu 2024. (Marca) Wolves yanse igiciro c’imiriyoni 25 z’amapawundi zitangwa na Everton ku mwongereza akina hagati Morgan Gibbs-White w’imyaka 22. (Mail) Everton kandi iripfuza umwongereza akina hagati Conor Gallagher w’imyaka 22, ariko Chelsea izovyihoza gushika mu mpera z’iri ci imbere y’uko ifata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe. (The i) Fulham imaze kuvugana na Tottenham mu kurondera kugura umukinyi w’inyuma wa Pays de Galles/Wales Joe Rodon w’imyaka 24. (Football Insider) Fulham iri mu biganiro bigeze kure mu rugamba rwo kugura umukinyi w’inyuma, umuswisi Kevin Mbabu w’imyaka 27, asanzwe akina mu murwi w’Ubudagi wa Wolfsburg mu masezerano y’imiriyoni zitanu. (Evening Standard) Sevilla iripfuza umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu wa Tottenham umunya-Espagne Sergio Reguilon.(Mail) Arsenal yemeye gutanga imiriyoni 5.9 z’amapawundi ku mukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu wa Benfica umunya-Espagne Alex Grimaldo w’imyaka 26, inyuma y’aho umunya-Ecosse Kieran Tierney amariye iminota 30 yonyene mu kibuga asubiriye gukina inyuma y’imisi yari amaze yaravunitse. (Star) Juventus na Roma yerekana ko yipfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal Lucas Torreira inyuma y’aho  Fiorentina ifatiye ingingo yo kutagura uyu munya-Uruguay w’imyaka 26 yari amaze umwaka w’inkino akina muri uno murwi wo mu Butaliyano yari yaratijijwemwo. (Evening Standard)

column2: Omicron: Ubwongereza bwisubiyeko bwemerera ingenzi zo muri Afrika kwinjira
column3: Ubwongereza bwakuye ibihugu 11 vyo muri Afrika ku rutonde rutukura, ibintu vyari bibangamiye cane ingendo hagati y'ivyo bihugu na UK. Abongereza gusa canke abo muri Irlande canke abafise uruhusha rwo kuba mu Bwongereza nibo gusa bari bemerewe kwinjira mu gihugu. Ukwo gukumira kwashizweko mu kwezi guheze kugira hagabanywe ukwiyongera kw'ubwoko Omicron bwa Covid-19. Bamwe mu bavyiyamirije bavuze ko iyo ngingo ari "mvangura-rukoba" kuko ibihugu vyo muri Afrika gusa ari vyo vyari kuri urwo rutonde rutukura. Mu ntango ibihugu vyose vyari ivyo mu bumanuko bwa Afrika, birimwo Afrika y'epfo na Botswana aho Omicron yatowe ubwa mbere, ariko na Nigeria yaje kwongerwako mu nyuma. Ivyo bihugu 11 ni: Angola Botswana Eswatini Lesotho Malawi Mozambike Namibia Nigeria Afrika y'epfo Zambia Zimbabwe Guhagarika ingingo yo kubikumira biraja mu ngiro kuwa gatatu itariki 15/12/2021 saa 04:00 GMT (06:00 mu Rwanda no mu Burundi). Mu gukurako iyo ngingo umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe amagara, Sajid Javid, yabwiye inama nshingamateka ati: "Mu gihe ubu hamaze gutangura kwanduzanya Omicron hagati mu Bwongereza kandi Omicron ikaba imaze gukwira hose mu gihugu, urutonde rutukura nta kamaro rugifise mu kugabanya Omicron yoza ivuye hanze".

column2: Burundi - Rwanda: CIRGL igiye gukora itohoza ryayo ku gitero c'i Mabayi
column3: Inama mpuzamakungu ijejwe akarere k'ibiyaga binini (CIRGL/ICGLR) yashinze umurwi ugiye gukora amatohoza ku gitero giheruka ku kirindiro c'ingabo z'u Burundi muri komine Mabayi mu ntara ya Cibitoke. Umunyamabanga mukuru w'iyo nama, Zachary Muburi-Muita, yabwiye BBC ko uwo murwi washinzwe, ariko nta nsiguro yatanze kuri wo. Ikirindiro ca gisirikare c'i Marura caratewe n'umurwi witwaje ibirwanisho ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kwa 11 uyu mwaka wa 2019, leta y'u Burundi ikaba yavuze ko abagize ico gitero bavuye mu Rwanda bakongera bagasubirayo. Urwandiko rugena uyo murwi rwateweko igikumu na koloneli Léon Mahoungou arongoye umurwi uhuriyemwo bose ujejwe ubugenzuzi muri iyo nama (MCVE) ruvuga ko ico gikorwa categerezwa gutangura kuri uyu wa kabiri itariki 03/12/2019 kikarangira ku itariki 10/12/2019. Uyo murwi w'abantu 17 ugizwe n'abasirikare 13 n'abasivire 4, uzotegerezwa gushika ahabereye ico gitero ku ruhande rw'Uburundi, ushike no mu Rwanda. U Burundi bwaragabishije u Rwanda ko ''buzofata ingingo zikwiye kuko budashobora kwihanganira ibitero vyisubiriza n'agasomborotso'' buvuga ko bikorwa n'u Rwanda. Leta y'u Rwanda yoyo ivuga ko ibivugwa n'u Burundi bifise intumbero y'ugusamaza amakungu ku kibazo nyamukuru kiri mu karere, kandi ko atari ubwa mbere. Kuva mu mwaka wa 2015 aho hadukiye uruhagarara rwa politike mu Burundi, u Burundi n'u Rwanda vyakomeje kwagirizanya kimwe cose ku ruhande rwaco, ko mukeba afasha imirwi y'inyeshamba ishaka guhungabanya umutekano kubutaka bwaco.

column2: Rwanda - Coronavirus: Katolika yafashe ingingo zijanye no gukinga ico kiza
column3: Ekleziya Katolika mu Rwanda ihamagarira abakirisu gukurikiza amategeko atangwa n'inzego zijejwe amagara y'abantu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda wa mugera ruhonyabantu coronavirus, yiswe Covid-19. Ivyo biri mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe na Antoine Kambanda, Umwepiskopi mukuru wa Diyoseze nkuru ya Kigali akaba n'icegera c'Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, aho amenyesha ingingo zafashwe mu makoraniro zizofasha abakirisu babo kudakoranako ngo bahave bandukizanya. Ibihugu bishika umunani ku mugabane wa Afrika bimaze gutangaza ko uwo mugera wamaze kubishikamwo, leta z'u Burundi n'u Rwanda zikaba ziherutse gutangaza ingingo zafashe mu ntumbero yo kwirinda no gukinga uwo mugera. Mw'iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda isaba abakirisu "guhana amahoro ya Kristu ku mutima gusa ata guhana ibiganza canke guhoberana". Isaba kandi ko "mu gihe co gusangira (guhazwa mu Kinyarwanda) ari ugutega ibiganza, atagutega ururimi". Iyo nama yafashe kandi ingingo yo gukura "amazi y'umugisha" (amazi ahezagiye mu kirundi) mu twombo yashirwamwo mw'isengero, maze abakirisu bakaja barayakoramwo mu kugira urumenyetso rw'umusaraba. Basaba abakirisu kudasubira gukora aho yahora ashirwa kuko atakirimwo "kugeza igihe ikibazo kizoba gikemutse". Muri iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepisikopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, yemereye abakirisitu ko izobandanya ikurikirana uko bimeze, ikazofata n'izindi ngingo zo kwikingira ni vyaba ngombwa. Gushika ubu, ibihugu birenga 80 biramaze guterwa n'uwo mugera watanguriye mu gisagara ca Wuhan c'intara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, ibihugu vya Togo, Nigeria, Senegal, Misiri, Algeria, Tuniziya, Afrika y'Epfo na Cameroon nivyo bimaze guterwa n'uwo mugera. Mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwo mugera, ibihugu vy'u Rwanda n'u Burundi biherutse gutangaza ingingo vyafashe mu ntumbero yo gukinga ko ishika muri vyo. U Burundi  bwatangaje ko ingenzi zivuye mu bihugu vy'u Bushinwa, Koreya y'epfo, Iran, Ubutaliyani, Ubudage, Ubufaransa, Ubuyapani na Espanye zizobanza gushirwa mu kibanza categuwe ukwazo nyene mu kiringo c'iminsi 14. Nayo mu Rwanda, leta isaba abanyagihugu "kugabanya ingendo zitari ngombwa" mu bihugu birangwamwo coronavirus, yongera kandi itangaza n'ingingo zitandukanye harimwo n'izo isuku, kugira ngo birinde kwandura.

column2: Gutwaririza: Mbe ni kubera iki abagore bibungenze bifuza cane ivyo kurya bimwe bimwe?
column3: Twese turamaze kwumva inkuru y'umugore iyo yibungenze usanga hari indya imwe gusa canke zibiri ashaka kuguma afungura, akavyura umugabo hagati mw'ijoro ngo azimuronderere. Canke na twebwe ubwacu turamaze gushikirwa no gushaka cane ikintu kinaka co kurya. Kenshi biravugwa ko gutwaririza indya iyi canke iriya ari uburyo bwo kwironsa ingaburo umugore n'umwana yibungenze bakeneye, kandi hari n'ikiganisha ku ciyumviro c'uko vyoba biterwa n'ingene umubiri uremye. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ni igice kigoye gutegera c'ikintu rimwe na rimwe kitoroha. Kwirema kw'umuntu mu nda y'uwundi bisanzwe bitwara igihe, bikarusha, bikagora umubiri, kandi iyo hari impamvu yo gushaka cane kurya tacos (indya zo muri Mexique zikundwa cane), ntibikunda kwiyima. Ariko, iyo wihweje ico ubushakashatsi mu bumenyi bubivugako, uhasanga inkuru itangaje kandi isa n'iyisiga ubwenge. Gutwaririza nk'ikintu kiri aho ntibishikira bose mu mico itandukanye, nk'uko abashakashatsi babibonye. Kandi mu bihugu vy'imico y'abatavuga icongereza aho bivugwa ko abagore batwaririza, usanga ivyo batwaririza bitandukanye cane n'ivy'abagore bo muri Amerika canke mu Bwongereza, nk'akarorero. Nko mu Bayapani, iyo bavuze ivyo gutwaririza, usanga umuceri ari co gifungurwa kivugwa cane. Twegeye imbere, ivyigwa vyo kumenya nimba ivyo kurya bitwaririzwa cane hari ingaburo zihariye bitanga zifasha imbanyi, vyasanze ivyo vyo kurya ata ngaburo nk'izo bifise. Mu bisanzwe, abagore batwaririza usanga bagira umuvyibuho kurusha uko biba vyitezwe ku mbanyi y'umugore afise amagara meza, ivyo navyo bigashobora guteza ibibazo. Ariko ntibisigura yuko abagore batwaririza ari ivyo bigira, gusa ni uko ukwo gutwaririza gushobora kuba guterwa n'ikindi kintu ataho gihuriye n'ibibera mu mubiri. Kurabira hamwe muri rusangi igituma abantu bashaka cane ibifungurwa bimwe bishobora gutanga icerekezo, nk'uko bivugwa na Julia Hormes, umwigisha w'inyifato kuri kaminuza ya State University of New York, Albany, yize ibijanye no gushaka cane ivyo kurya mu buryo butandukanye. Nk'akarorero, Hormes avuga ko hafi ya 50% vy'abagore muri Amerika bavuga ko bashaka cane shokola mu ndwi ibanziriza kuja mu butinyanka. Abahinga barihweje niba ukwo gushaka cane shokola gufitaniye isano n'ingaburo ngirakamaro ziyirimwo, canke niba bijanye n'uko haba hari uguhindagurika kw'imisemburo mu mubiri. Mu cigwa kimwe, umuhinga mu nyifato yasavye umugore kwugurura agasaho bahawe agafungura ibirimwo niyasubira kwumva ashaka cane ico arya. Tumwe mu dusaho twarimwo shokola ikoranye amata (ifise ingaburo zose usanga muri shokola hamwe n'uburyo ishongera mu kanwa). Utundi twarimwo shokola yera, itarimwo igiterwa ca cocoa kigumye gisanzwe giha shokola ikoranye amata ibara ryayo ry'umugina, ariko ikagira imfato nziza. Hanyuma, udusaho dusigaye twarimwo ibinini vya cocoa, birimwo ibigize cocoa bigumye ariko bidateye nka shokola isanzwe iribwa. Shokola yera niyo yashoboye cane guhaza abifuza kuyirya, bigasigura rero ko atari ingaburo ngirakamaro canke ibindi birungo vya cocoa igumye bitera ukwo kuyishaka cane. Ibindi vyigwa vyibanze ku kwifuza cane shokola vyasanze ata sano ririho n'urugero rw'imisemburo mu mubiri. Mu bisanzwe, abagore baciye imvyaro babandanya kuvuga ko bakigira ukwifuza kwa cane kwa shokola, nk'uko Hormes abisigura. Ico ibi vyose vyerekana ni uko ukwo kwifuza kwa cane igifungurwa guterwa n'imico hamwe n'ibiri mu mutwe. Kwifuza cane igisuguti c'amavuta menshi canke akamanyu ka shokola, amafiriti, bishobora kuza nk'iciyumviro gisanzwe, kigacikamwo buke buke ukwifuza kwa cane kugoye kwiyumanganya. Muri ico gihe nyene, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, hamwe n'ahandi hatandukanye, kwiyumvira ivyo kurya bikwega ijisho - amajambo akoreshwa n'abashakashatsi mu kuvuga ivyo kurya birimwo kuva kuri ice cream gushika ku makaroni atekanya foromaji - bizanana no kwicuza. Hormes agira ati "haraba kwijijanya imitima. "Biraryohera umubiri, ariko kandi nkaba mba ahari umuco umbwira ko ntategerezwa kurya iyi shokola." Yongerako ati "Ndayishaka cane, ariko sinarinkwiye kuyirya - twibaza ko urwo ari rwo ruhande rw'umuco rutuma haba ico gikorwa." Ku buryo bwihariye, iyo wari umaze igihe wiyima - waramaze gushira mu mutwe ko utazosubira kwiha igifungurwa kinaka - birakugora cane kwihangana iyo ufise ico gifungurwa. Rero nyuma yo kwihereza ikimanyu ca keke, aho kwumva unyuzwe ubuzima bukabandanya, uca urya ibindi bimanyu bitatu. Vyongeye, abagore barashobora kwiyima ibifungurwa bimwe iyo bibungenze, nkumbure barondera amagara meza kubera impanuro za muganga ku bijanye n'indya nka sushi, inyama za deli hamwe n'ibindi bifungurwa. Ibi vyose bituma, n'imiburiburi mu bice bimwe vyo kw'isi, gushaka ibifungurwa cane bishika kandi bikagorana kuvyirinda, bigashobora no gutuma haba kwongera ibiro kwa cane. Kwibungenga navyo birashobora gufatwa nk'igihe kwifuza cane ibifungurwa binaka bishobora kwihanganirwa. Hormes agira ati "Uyu muco kandi uratuma tumenya ibihe hamwe n'inyendamuvano aho usanga vyihanganirwa ko abagore barya ibintu mu bisanzwe babwirizwa kwigira kure". "Guca imvyaro no kwibungenga ni ibihe ikibano gisa n'icemerera abagore kwirekura." Hormes ahanura yuko mu gihe ushaka cane shokola, wari ukwiye gufata iyo ku rwego rwo hejuru, ukarya utumanyu nka tubiri ku munsi, ubuzima bukabandanya - ivyo birashobora gutuma ingaruka zavyo zivaho. Uburyo bumwe ni ubwo gukoresha kwisamaza - hari ivyigwa vyakozwe hakoreshejwe ibisamaza vyo kuraba canke kwimotereza. Ubundi buryo ni kwita ku bibera mu mutwe hamwe no kubaza umutima nama, ukemera ko ukwo kwifuza ugufise ukakureka kukakuvamwo. Iyo ari ibijanye no gutwaririza, harashobora kuba hari ikindi kijanye n'umuco: kwibungenga biragora, kandi birashobora kunanirana iyo ata bufasha buhari. Icigwa cibanze ku bagore bo mu caro muri Tanzaniya bavuze ko batwaririza inyama, ifi, intete, ivyamwa, imboga, casanze kubaronsa ivyo vyo kurya bashaka ari ikimenyetso co gushigikirwa n'umugabo hamwe n'umuryango. Kandi koko, gusaba inkoko yokeje saa saba z'ijoro bisaba ukwitanga gukomeye ku wutumwe kuyirondera, rero bitanga icizere ko uwo muntu koko ahari kugira afashe. Mu gihe amababa y'inkoho asanzwe aryoha ubwayo, kuba hari umuntu ukunda ayakuzaniye biyongera agaciro karengeye ingaburo afise.

column2: Frank Lampard: Ibintu bishobora kuba nabi muri Chelsea, niko Chris Sutton abibona
column3: Ibintu "bishobora kuba bibi" kuri Frank Lampard muri Chelsea mu gihe itoronka intsinzi vuba bwango, nk'uko bivugwa na Chris Sutton yahoze ari umusatirizi w'Ubwongereza. Mu nkino zitanu zose ikinye, Chelsea yatahiye amanota ane yonyene inyuma y'aho urukino rwa nijoro ku wa mbere rurangiriye inganya igitindo kimwe na Aston Villa, ica ija mu kibanza ca gatandatu mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, Premier League. Sutton yabwiye Radio 5 Live yegukira BBC ati: "Muri iki gihe, bari mu bibazo kuko bariko bakina nabi". "Bacitse intege, Frank akeneye ko umurwi wiwe utsinda n'imiburiburi inkino nkeya vuba bishoboka kuko, nk'uko tubizi, ibintu bishobora kuba nabi muri Chelsea". Frank yahoze ari rurangiranwa muri uyu murwi yagenywe kuba umumenyereza wawo mu mwaka uheze, maze ashobora kuwushikana mu mirwi ine ya mbere, anawushikana mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'Ubwongereza, FA, catahukanywe na Arsenal. Yarahawe uburyo bwinshi cane kugira ngo ashobore kugura abakinyi, aho yakoresheje imiriyoni zirenga 270 z'amadorari y'Abanyamerika mu kugura Hakim Ziyech, Timo Werner, Kai Havertz, Ben Chilwell hamwe na Edouard Mendy. Ariko Sutton abona ko Lampard atarashobora gushikana uyu murwi ku rugero wategerezwa kuba uriko. Sutton ati: "Tuvyanka tuvyemera, uyu mwaka si mwiza cane kuri Frank. Araremerewe; yakoresheje amahera menshi. Ubu ari mu mazi abira". "Si nipfuza guca urubanza hakiri kare kuri Chelsea na Frank kuko nk'ubu ari nka hamwe botsinda inkino nka zibiri bikurikiranya, barashobora kwisanga mu kibanza ca kabiri, maze icizere co gutsinda ihiganwa kigaca gisubira kuvyuka". "Ariko sinibaza ko Chelsea ishobora gutsinda iri higanwa. Ni babanze bagere ku rugero rwo gukina uko bategerezwa gukina". N'aho Sutton abona nabi ibintu muri Chelsea, ikizwi ni uko mu nkino 14 zayo zose yakiniye ku kibuga cayo, yatsinzwe urukino rumwe rudende, itsinda 10, urwo rukino rukaba ari urwayihuje na Liverpool mu kw'icenda, rurangira itsinzwe 2-0. Hanyuma kandi tugiye muri rya higanwa rya Buraya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo, UEFA Champions League, Chelsea ni iya mbere mu murwi E, kandi mu nkino zose imaze gukina ntirigera itsindwa. Mu gihe Chelsea yamara inkino 17 zose idatsindwa - ivyarangiye itsinzwe na Everton - Lampard yavuze yijiriwe ko ibintu bitararangira. Aho rero nijoro aho umurwi wiwe unganirije na Aston Villa kandi wari muhira, yasubiye kuvuga ko abakinyi biwe bakeneye kwongereza inguvu gusumba uko bariko barakina muri kino gihe. Ati: "Iki nico gihe kigoye muri uno mwanya. Dutegerezwa gukura amaboko mu mpuzu tukarwana urugamba, kandi ndazi ko tuzosubira tukaduga". "Mu gihe nk'iki c'umwaka, uba ukeneye amanota. Ndumva abakinyi bacitse intege kuko bakeneye gutsinda". "Mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, abantu badufata nk'umurwi ushobora gutahukana iri higanwa. Ubu ibintu ntivyoroshe. Ndizeye ko abakinyi bashasha bazogenda bamenyera uko imisi izogenda". Muri aba bakinyi baguzwe ku mahera y'umurengera mu ci riheze, Mendy na Chilwell ni bo bonyene batanguye mu kibuga. Sutton ashira amakosa yose kuri uyu yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Leipzig, Timo Werner, ariko ngo na Kai Havertz ntiyavyifashemwo neza. Werner yinjije ibitsindo 34 mu Budagi mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, ariko mu nkino 16 zose amaze gukina muri Premier League, amaze gutsinda bine gusa. Bitegekanijwe ko ku wa Mungu Chelsea yakira Manchester City, ariko nta wuzi ko ruzoba, kuko na nijoro urukino rwari guhuza City na Everton rwingurujwe kubera abakinyi batari bake bayo banduye wa mugera wa coronavirus.

column2: Burundi – Covid: 'Twahisemwo kuba turatenyenya' ku ncanco
column3: Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi avuga ko ico gihugu cahisemwo kubangira ku bijanyanye n'incanco za Covid-19 zatanguye gutangwa  mu bihugu bitari bike birimwo n'ivyo mu karere. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru harangiye inama y'umugwi ujejwe kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19 mu Burundi, Ministre Thadée Ndikumana yamenyesheje kandi ko abandura n'abarwara iyo ndwara ubu bagabanutse ugereranije no mu ntango z'uyu mwaka. Asaba abantu kwipimisha iyo biketseko ibimenyetso vya corona, aha akanegura abantu bize ngo bateba kuja kwipimisha. Mu gihe umwaka uri hafi guhera hatowe umuntu wa mbere yanduye umugera wa corona, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi avuga ko abamaze kwandura bose ari 2618, abamaze gupfa ni 6, abari ku miti ubu ni  192. Ku bahitanwa n'iyo ndwara, umushikiranganji avuga ko hatangazwa ibiharuro vy'ababa bipimishije  bagatorwa corona, bakavurwa mu nyuma bigashika bagapfa. Ni mu gihe bivugwa ko abamaze kwicwa na corona mu Burundi bashobora kuba barenga kure abo batandatu bazwi  ku mugaragro. Ministre Thadée Ndikumana avuga ko ku bayirwaye, abashika 96 kw'ijana bayikira. Yamenyesheje kandi aho reta y'Uburundi ihagaze ku kibazo c'inkingo zatanguye gutangwa mu bihugu vyinshi vyo kw'si harimwo n'ibihugu bibanyi nk'u Rwanda, Uganda na Kenya. Yagize ati: "Ku bisanzwe abakoze zirya ncanco barafise  umwanya, ico bita recul, wo kuraba ko ata ngaruka mbi canke nziza urucanco rugirira uwo baruteye. "Nabo nta recul bariha... rero igihugu cose kiraraba kiti twoba turazikoresheje mu kurindirako ubushakashatsi bubandanya... Turavye rero ngaha mu Burundi ibitigiri vy'abashobora gukira, twavuze tuti tube turatenyenya, ntitwanse incanco". Ministre Ndikumana asaba abantu kubandanya kwubahiriza ingingo zo kwirinda kwandura no kwanduza, no kunyaruka kwipimisha iyo biketseko ibimenyetso. Aranegura abantu bize avuga ko baja  kwipimisha batevye bigaca bigora kubavura. Ikindi  anegura cane, ni bimwe mu bitaro vyigenga  avuga ko vyihutira gukora ibipimo vy'amafaranga menshi  cane hakubanza gukoresha uburyo bworoshe kandi burihwa na reta, bikaja kwibaza gupima corona ari uko umuntu amaze gusinzikara. Ati: "Ugasanga abantu aho kumugirira test rapide [igipimo cihuta] acinjira, yoroshe, atariha, ugasanga bamugiriye scanner ...y'ibihumbi amajana atatu...birababaje". Avuga ko agiye kugira inama na bene ivyo bitaro kugira bibukanye ingene ibintu vyokorwa neza gusumba.

column2: Imiti 2 yageragejwe ishorora gukiza ingwara ya Ebola
column3: Abahinga bavuga ko Ebola igiye kuba mu misi ya vuba  ingwara ikingwa ikongera ikavugwa inyuma y'igeragezwa ry'imiti 2 yerekanye impinduka nziza ku bagwayi. Ubwoko bw'imiti 4 bwageragejwe ku bagwayi ba Ebola mu Republika ya Democrasi ya Kongo, ahantu ikiza ca Ebola gikomeye. Ubu buhinga bwerekana ko abagwayi barenga 90% bashobora gukira bafashe iyo miti hakiri kare. Abayobozi b'abaganga bavuga ko iyo miti izokoreshwa mu kuvura abagwayi bose ba Ebola muri  Republika ya Democrasi ya Kongo. Ku musi wa kabiri  ikigo co muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe bwa Amerika kigwanya ingwara zandukira  n'ukuziriranirwa, US National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, kiri mu vyafashije mw'igeragezwa ry'uyo muti, camenyesheje ko igeragezwa ry'iyi miti ryatanze ''inyishu nziza cane'' mu kugwanya ikiza ca Ebola. Imiti bita REGN-EB3 na  mAb114, ikora abasirikare bica  umugera wa Ebola, bigatuma  uturemangingo  dutoyi turanga umuntu ataco tuba. Muganga Anthony Fauci, umukuru w'ikigo ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe bwa Amerika kigwanya ingwara zandukira  n'ukuziriranirwa yavuze ko iyi  miti ari iya mbere mu bushakashatsi bukomeye bwerekanywe mu kugabanya abagwayi  bicwa na Ebola. Imiti REGN-EB3 na  mAb114 yageragejwe hakoreshejwe  abasirikare batera umugera wa Ebola ku bayigwaye. Umugera wahitanye abantu barenga 1800 muri Rpublika ya Democrasi ya Kongo kuva mu mwaka uheze. Iyindi miti ibiri ZMapp na  Remdesivir yarakuwe mu yokoreshwa  kubera basanze ifasha bisanzwe cane. Ubwo bushashatsi bwo ku rwego mpuzamakungu bwari buhagarikiwe n'ikigo mpuzamakungu kijejwe amagara y'abantu, bwatanguye mu kwezi kwa 11  mu mwaka uheze. Kuva ico gihe, imiti 4 yariko irageragezwa ku bagwayi  hafi 700  biraheza bitanga ivyegeranyo vya mbere ku bagwayi bamenyekanye  499. Kuri abo bantu bose bafashe iyo miti, ico kigo cakoze ubushakashatsi kivuga ko 29% bafashe imiti  REGN-EB3 na 34% bafashe  mAb114 baphuye. Iki kigo c'abashakashatsi kivuga  ariko ko 49% b'abafashe umuti  ZMapp hamwe na 53% b'abafashe umuti  Remdesivir baphuye . Ico kigo kimenyesha kandi  ko abantu,  bari  banduye ku rugero rusanzwe  ico kiza,  barokotse  bashika   94%  mugihe  bafashe umuti REGN-EB3 hakiri kare hamwe  na  89% ku bafashe umuti witwa  mAb114. Muganga Sabue Mulangu yavuze ko ubushashatsi bw'ingwara ziva ku micafu bwasanze  abategetsi b'amagara y'abantu bashobora guhumuriza abantu ko abarenga 90% bashobora kurokoka  ikiza ca Ebola bacivuje hakiri kare. Hakurikijwe ivyiza ubu bushakashatsi bwashitseko, umuyobozi k'ikigo c'abagiraneza Wellcome Trust global health charity Jeremy Farrar,  yavuzeko ata nkeka ko iyi miti izokiza  abantu. Bwana  Farrar yavuze ko bwerekana ko abashakashatsi bariko baregera intambwe y'uko ikiza ca Ebola gikingwa. Yongeye avuga ati: ''Ntituzokuraho rwose  Ebola ariko dushobora guhagarika ibiza vya Ebola bikwiragira ku rwego rw'igihugu canke  mu turere''. Iciyumviro c'uko Ebola idakira, ikongera igakwiragira  bivuye ku kutizera abakozi bajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Republika ya Democrasi ya Kongo vyaragabanije inguvu zo  guhagarika ikwiragira ry'iyi ngwara. Muganga Fauci yavuze ati hari icizere c'uko iyi miti, yakozwe n'ububiko bw'imiti bukora imiti buri muri  Amerika  bufasha mu kuvura iyi ngwara, igiye kwongera icizere ku  bagwayi bigatuma baja kwa muganga hakiri kare. Yongeye agira ati: ''Ariko inzira nziza yo guherengeteza iki kiza ni urucanco rwiza''. Urucanco ni ubwoko bw'umuti bwongerera inguvu abasoda bo mu mubiri ku ngwara kanaka,   mu nzira yo kuyikinga. Ikigo mpuzamakungu kijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi  kivuga ko incanco zikinga ikiza ca Ebola zemewe ko zishobora gukoreshwa, ku mpuhwe z'abagwayi imbere y'uko zemegwa biciye mu mategeko zerekanye ko zivura neza. Iki kiza catanguye mu buseruko bwa Republika ya Democrasi ya Kongo mu kwezi kwa 8  kw'umwaka uheze kandi kiza kw'isonga mu bihugu 10  vyashikiwe n'ico kiza kuva mu 1976, igihe ico kiza catorwa. Mu kwezi kwa 7 ikigo mpuzamakungu kijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi camenyesheje ko Ebola ari ikiza giteye amakenga ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Ariko ni bake ugereranije n'abaguye muri Afrika y'uburengero hagati yo mu 2014 na 2016, igihe abantu 28.816 bandura ico kiza cane cane mu bihugu vya Gwine, Siera Leone na Liberia. Abantu 11.310 basize ubuzima muri ico kiza ca Ebola kitari bwigere kiboneka.

column2: Umumenyereza wa Maroc ati ‘Africa izotsindira igikombe c’isi mu myaka 15-20’
column3: Afrika izotsindira igikombe c’isi yose “mu myaka 15-20”, niko umumenyereza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Maroc Walid Regragui avuga, akaba ari na we mumenyereza wa mbere wa Afrika ahatswe gushika kuri iyo ntumbero. Barongowe na Regragui, Les Lions de l'Atlas, babaye umurwi wa mbere wo ku mugabane wa Afrika ushitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi, aho bagiye gukurwamwo n’Ubufaransa buhejeje ihiganwa muri mu kibanza ca kabiri. Uyu mumenyereza w’imyaka 47 yizeye ko Afrika izoronka akarusho mu myaka iri imbere, aho izoba iserukirwa n’ibihugu birenga bitanu ku ncuro ya mbere kuva mu 2026 no kubandanya. Regragui ati: "Mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi kiri imbere, tuzoba dufise ibibanza icenda, ibi bikazodufasha kwiga gusumba. "Mu myaka 15-20, ndazi neza ko umurwi wa Afrika uzotsindira igikombe. Kuko igihe cose tuzokwama tuhigira vyinshi, rero urwaruka rwacu ruzoba rufise mu maraso igikombe c’isi”. Kuva mu 1994, Afrika iserukirwa n’ibihugu bitanu – ibibanza bike cane ugereranije na 13 vya Bulaya, ikaba isumvya ikibanza kimwe Amerika y’ubumanuko isanzwe ifise ibihugu bike cane rwose, ikanganya na Aziya (iyo itaramutse yakira igikombe). Nyamara iki giharuro kuri Afrika kizokwiyongera hafi incuro zibiri  mbere gishobore gushika no kw’icumi mu gihe hogira igihugu cayo corengana inkino mpuzamigabane za play-off /barrage zo guhiganira ibibanza vy’abazokwitaba ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi. Uyu mugabane ntiworoherwa gushika muri ca gice co gukuranamwo, aho mu 2018 ata murwi n’umwe washoboye gushikayo,  igihe cose ikama iserukirwa n’umwe gusa urengana inkino z’amatsinda kuva mu 1994 wongererejwe igitigiri, kiretse mu 2014 na 2022, aho imirwi ibiri ari yo yashoboye kurengana. Uyo yahoze akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Maroc avuga ati: "Ingorane zacu nk’imirwi ya Afrika, ntarinze kunegura cane, ni uko dufise ibibanza bitanu gusa, rero ibi bigasigura ko muri kino gihe Misiri itari kubamwo, canke Nigeria, Afrika y’Epfo, Mali, n’ibindi. "Rero, igihe cose, kubera twama duhanganye (mu kurondera itike), ntivyoroshe na gato (gushobora kwigira ku gikombe c’isi)”. Inyuma y’aho itsindiwe na Croatia mu rukino rwo kurondera ikibanza ca gatatu ku wa gatandatu, yama iheza iri mu bibanza vya mbere mu mahiganwa atandatu y’igikombe c’isi imaze gukina, Regragui avuga ko bari kuri urwo rugero kubera bobo bama baja muri aya mahiganwa. Uyu mugabo yatsindiye ihiganwa ry’imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Afrika mu ntango z’uno mwaka agira ati: "(Jose) Mourinho – igihe yari muri Manchester United – yaravuze ivyerekeye ADN/DNA y’uyo murwi, ariko ndibaza ko ikintu nk’iki kibaho no mu mirwi nserukirabihugu”. "Kubera iki igihe cose imirwi ya Bulaya (yama ishika mu nkino za nyuma z’igikombe c’isi)? Croatia – kubera iki badutsinze bakarangiza ihiganwa bari mu kibanza ca gatatu? Ni uko bamenyereye cane izi nkino, igihe cose bama baronka itike yo kuja mu gikombe c’isi yose. "Iyo wama witabira buri higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi, ukama ukina izi nkino igihe cose, zirakwigisha, abakinyi bakiri bato barahigira vyinshi. Ibi bituma mw’ihiganwa rikurikira aba bakinyi bakiri bato bazosubirayo bakomeye cane”. Inyuma y’imyaka 20, Maroc yagarutse mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi mu 2018, isubira uno mwaka, ibitari bwigere bibaho ko yikurikiranya uku kuva aho iherukira mu 1994-1998. Muri Qatar, Maroc yateye intambwe zidasanzwe n’aho yahuye n’imirwi y’ibihangange kw’isi: Ububirigi (2), Espagne (7), Portugal (9), ikongera kandi, mu nkino zo mu matsinda, igaca imbere Croatia yari yahejeje ari iya kabiri mu 2018. Umumeyereza wa Maroc yongerako ati: "Twaharonkeye inyigisho z’imyaka myinshi iyo uronse akaryo ko guhura na Croatia incuro zibiri mw’ihiganwa rimwe, igihugu kiza mu kibanza ca gatatu kw’isi”. "Gukina na Espagne, Portugal, Ubufaransa, Ububirigi, na Canada, ni ibintu bidasanzwe – inkino zose zikomeye”. Inyuma yo kwinjizwa igitsindo kimwe gusa mu nkino zitanu za mbere muri Qatar, mu nyuma vyahavuye vyanka kuri Maroc igihe itsinzwe n’Ubufaransa 2-0 mu nkino z’igice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma ku wa gatatu, imbere y’uko itsindwa na Croatia 2-1 ku wa gatandatu. N’aho Regragui yababaye cane kubona Maroc itashoboye kuba umurwi wa mbere wa Afrika wari kuba ushitse mu rukino rwa nyuma canke ngo uhereze mu kibanza ca gatatu, ariteze ko intambwe idasanzwe umurwi wiwe washitseko igiye kwibonekeza ubu bwa vuba. Ati: "Turababaye, ariko ni twikangura tuzomenya neza igikorwa kidasanzwe twashitseko. "Inyuma y’uru rukino rwa nyuma, tuzokwihweza ngene ibintu vyagenze, ndazi ko tuzosanga Maroc yakoze ibintu bikomye cane. Ubu rero, ndazi ko dufise igikorwa kidasanzwe imbere yacu”. Uyu mumenyereza yiteze neza ko n’iyindi mirwi ikomakomeye y’umugabane nayo nyene igiye gukurikiranirwa hagufi muri kazoza. "Ubu hagiye kuba vyinshi vyitezwe ku yindi mirwi ya Afrika irondera gushika ku vyo twashitseko. "Maroc irerekanye ko (imirwi ya Afrika) ishoboye kandi itari kure cane (y’imirwi y’ibihangange), rero itandukaniro hagati y’imirwi ya Bulaya n’iya Afrika ni rito cane gusumba uko vyahoze, kandi ni utuntu duto cane. “Ibi bigiye gutera intege umupira w‘amaguru muri Afrika”.

column2: Burundi: Impano zinyegeje za Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye
column3: Abakoresha imbuga hwaniro benshi batamariwe babonye umukuru w'u Burundi, Evariste Ndayishimiye, mu mwambaro w'abatimbo, atera imvyino yongera avuza umurisho. Ku mafoto na za video vyahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro, Prezida Ndayishimiye aboneka ari ku nkiranya (ingoma ija imbere hagati) yambaye umwambaro ukwiye w'abatimbo (abakarazi mu kinyarwanda). Yambaye kandi n'ibisharizo bijana birimwo n'ikirezi, afise n'imirisho hanyuma agatera abandi batimbo nabo bakitabira. Umurisho uraheza ugatangura, Prezida Ndayishimiye, biboneka ko akanyamuneza kari kose, agatamba atarika agacishamwo akanasimba. Ku rubuga twitter rw'ikirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu, Ntare Rushatsi House, basiguye yuko Prezida Ndayishimiye yariko "arasozera akaruhuko ka leta". Ubwo butumwa bugira buti "mu gusozera akaruhuko ka leta, Prezida wa Republika aherekejwe n'umutambukanyi wiwe yagendeye ikibanza ca Gishora kugira ashike mu kibanza cubashwe c'Ingomba z'u Burundi zashizwe mu murage w'isi." Iyo nyandiko ibandanya igira iti "nk'umuvuzi w'ingoma abikunda kuva akiri muto, Prezida Ndayishimiye ntiyingingiwe kwifatanya n'abavuzi b'ingoma ba Gishora mu kuvuza umurisho kama w'akataraboneka." Ikibanza c'iteka ku ngoma z'u Burundi ca Gishora nico kibitswemo ingoma za Ruciteme na Murimirwa zimaze imyaka 119. Ico kibanza kandi carakoreshejwe nk'ingoro y'Umwami hakaba ari naho Umwami Mwezi Gisabo yashinze ibirindiro ariko arategura kwivuna igitero c'Abadage. Ingoma za Gishora kandi ziri muri bimwe biratirwa ijisho mu bukerarugendo mu Burundi. Muri urwo rwego nyene, Prezida Ndayishimiye yaheruka kugaragara kandi ku mbuga hwaniro, ari kumwe n'umuryango wiwe, agendera ibibanza bitandukanye vy'ubukerarugendo vyo mu Burundi, harimwo n'ibiyaga vyo mu buraruko bw'igihugu.

column2: Tanzania-Dr Philip Mpango:Video y'umushikiranganji abeshuza ko yapfuye yaneguwe cane
column3: Video ibabaje y'umushikiranganji  wa Tanzania ajejwe ikigega ari imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru kubeshuza ibihuha vy'uko yapfuye yaneguwe cane, benshi bakavuga ko bitari bikenewe kandi  ari ukumugirira nabi. Ku ndwi iheze prezida John Magufuli yari yebeshuje ivyo bihuha , avuga ko Dr Philip Mpango akiriho kandi ariko aratora mitende. Ku wa kabiri, Dr Mpango, ahagatiwe n'abakozi bo kwa muganga babiri , batambaye udufukamunwa, yasomye itangazo imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru mu bitaro vyitiriwe Benjamin Mkapa ku murwa mukuru Dodoma. Yarakoroye   aranahagirika kenshi  kugira abashe gusubira guhema neza igihe yariko arasoma iryo tangazo. Ntibizwi indwara agwaye iyariyo ariko yavuze ko yari afise "ingorane zo guhema" kandi ko yari akeneye  umwuka(oxygene). Yavuze kandi ko yakize. Uwutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Tundu Lisu yaneguye abategetsi baretse ngo iryo tangazo rigenewe abamenyeshamakuru risomwe. Ati: "Ninde yaretse umuntu arwaye ngo akore ivyo, yarakorora kandi ntiyari yambaye agafukamunwa. Yategerzwa kuba ariko araruhuka  anavurwa.'' Lissu yongeyeko ati uko "n'ukwigira sindabibazwa'' Dr Mpango yageze ahantu ikigumbagumba kiramufata igihe yariko arahoza ababuze yongera asaba imbabazi ko atashoboye  imigirwa yo gusezera icegera ca mbere c'umukuru wa Zanzibar Sef Sharif Hamad, yapfuye ku ndwi iheze ahitanywe na Covid-19,n'umunyamabanga mukuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu John Kijazi n'uwahoze ari umukuru wa banki nkuru y'igihugu Prof Benno Ndulu. Dr Mpango ati: "Narababaye kubona  ata n'umwe nashoboye guherekeza ariko ndabifuriza amahoro adashira." Hamaze kuvugwa impfu nyinshi zifatiye kuri Covid-19 muri Tanzania ariko ntizigeze zemezwa icese canke naho vyavuzwe ko umugera wa corona atari wo waziteye. Ariko ubu Tanzania  ubu bwa vuba yarahinduye imvugo, ubu abategetsi ntibakivuga koi co gihugu ata Covid-19 ikirangwamwo ahubwo bagahamiriza abanyagihugu kwubahiriza amategeko yo kwikingira harimwo kwambara agafukamunwa.

column2: Intamba z'Uburundi n'Imisambi ya Uganda ni iyihe izotsinda ikaja muri CHAN 2020?
column3: Intamba mu Rugamba z'Uburundi ziteze guhura n'Imisambi ya Uganda mu nkino z'igice ca kabiri z'uguhiganirwa kuja mu gice ca nyuma c'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu igizwe n'abakinyi bakinira iwabo (CHAN 2020) rizobera muri Kameruni. Mu rukino rwabaye ejo ku wa Mungu, Intamba zatsinze  Sudani y'Epfo ibitsindo bibiri kuri kimwe mu rukino rw'ugusubiza, mu gihe mu rukino rwa mbere rwabereye i Bujumbura ku wa 27 z'ukw'indwi zari zatsinze Sudani ibitsindo bibiri ku busa. Urwo rukino rwabereye i Kampala muri Uganda kubera ikibuga ca Sudani y'Epfo kiriko gisubirwamwo. Mu rundi rukino rwabaye muri aka karere, Tanzania yasezereye Kenya kuri za penelite. U Rwanda rwo rwaronse uburenganzira bwo kubandanya mu gice ca kabiri kuko rufise amanota meza mu mahiganwa ya CHAN y'imbere, rwakinye CHAN 2011, 2016 na 2018. Mu 2016 rwageze mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Sudani y'Epfo niyo yatanguye kwinjiza igitsindo mu ntango z'urukino, ariko Iddy Muselemu na Olivier Dusabe batsindiye Intamba ibitsindo bibiri mu gice ca kabiri c'urwo rukino. Iyo ntsinzi yatumye Uburundi busezerera Sudani y'Epfo ku bitsindo 4-1 vyose hamwe biteranijwe. Imisambi ya Uganda yo yasezereye Somalia inyuma y'ukuyitsinda ibitsindo indwi mu nkino zibiri zahuje ivyo bihugu, urukino rw'ejo rukaba rwarangiye Uganda ikubise Somalia ibitsindo bine kuri kimwe. Kahise k'Imisambi n'Intamba. Imirwi y'ibi bihugu araheruka yompi mu nkino z'igikombe ca Afurika, n'aho muri iri higanwa iba ikinisha abakinyi barimwo n'abakina hanze y'ibihugu vy'iwabo. Intamba mu Rugamba zimaze kuja muri CHAN incuro imwe, hari mu 2014 muri Afrika y'Epfo,  Imisambi ya Uganda yoyo imaze kuja muri iryo higanwa incuro zine kuva ritanguye mu mwaka wa 2009. Kuva mu 2000, mu nkino cumi zimaze guhuza ivyo bihugu muri rusangi, Uganda imaze gutsinda incuro indwi, Uburundi butsinda incuro zibiri gusa, aho hari mu 2001 na 2011, binganya mu rukino rumwe mu mwaka wa 2017. Muri iryo higanwa rya CHAN 2020, Uburundi, Sudani y'Epfo, na Uganda bihurikiye muri Zone y'uburasirazuba bwo hagati kumwe n'ibihugu vya Somalia, Ethiopia, u Rwanda, Tanzaniya, Djibouti, Sudani na Kenya. Muri aka karere, mu gice gikurikira imirwi izohura mu kwezi kw'icenda n'ukw'icumi muri ubu buryo; Uganda v Burundi, Tanzania v Sudan,  Ethiopia v Rwanda Imirwi izotsinda muri izi nkino izoca ironka uburenganzira bwo kwitaba igice ca nyuma c'ihiganwa rya CHAN 2020.

column2: Papa Francis yemeye ko yananiwe kwihangana akubita urushi umukenyezi yariko amukwega
column3: Papa Francis yasavye imbabazi  inyuma y'aho akubitiye urushi ku kuboko umwe mu bakirisu bari mu rugendo rweranda bakoraniye ku kibanza citiriwe umweranda Petero i Roma. Papa yariko aramutsa abana n'abandi bari bakoraniye muri ico kibanza hanyuma agize ngo aragiye, umukenyezi umwe muri bo amukwega ukuboko n'inguvu nyinshi gushika n'aho ahakwa kumugwisha hasi. Ivyo vyatumye Papa ahindukira agerageza kumwikura vyanka, aca amukubita urushi ku kuboko ashavuye abona kumurekura. Niho mu nyuma Papa yemera ko vyanse ko yihangana aremera ko nawe nyene acumura nk'ikiremwamuntu nk'abandi. Ati: "Kenshi biranka ko twihangana. Naje birashobora kunshikira. Nico gituma nsavye imbabazi ku vyashitse nijoro". Ivyo vyatangaje benshi kuko imbere y'aho, mu gihe yashikiriza ijambo ry'ukwipfuriza umwaka mushasha abakirisu, yariyamirije ihohotera rikorerwa abakenyezi.

column2: Ubutunzi bwa Afghanistani buteye ahatemba
column3: Ku musi wa kabiri, itariki 23 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), hari hakwiye imisi 100 kuva abatalibani bagarutse ku butegetsi muri Afghanistani. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC, Yalda Hakim yaragendeye akarere ka Kabul, kurondera inkuru yerekeye ubutunzi bwagabanutse kuva imfashanyo y’amakungu ihagaritswe, bituma haba akaga ku bantu.

column2: France: Benzema ntazokinira igikombe c'isi kubera igikomere co kw'itako
column3: U﻿mukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa ntazoja mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi ca 2022 muri Qatar inyuma yo gukomereka kw'itako ari mu myimenyerezo. B﻿enzema yatsindiye 'Ballon d'Or' ya 2022, agashimwe gahabwa umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi buri mwaka mu mupira w'amaguru, inyuma yo gufasha umugwi wiwe wa Real Madrid gutwara igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo n'ico ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne, La Liga. U﻿mugwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa uvuga ko yagize ikibazo kw'itako, ko hari igihe atoshobora kuja muri iryo higanwa. W﻿ongeyeko uti:"Umugwi wose usangiye umubabaro na Karimi kandi umwipfurije gukira vuba." I﻿shirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru ry'Ubufaransa rivuga ko ibipimo vyemeje ko yakomeretse kw'itako "bikaba bimusaba kumara indwi zitatu kugira atore mitende". U﻿bufaransa buri mu mugwi wa D, bukaba buzokina na Australia itariki 22 z'ukwezi kwa Munyonyo (11), na Danmark itariki 26 z'ukwezi kwa Munyonyo (11) hamwe rero na Tunisia itariki 30 z'uko kwezi nyene. U﻿mumenyereza mukuru Didier Deschamps afise gushika ku wa mbere ngo abe yatanze izina ry'uwumusubirira, kandi ikikomere ca Benzema w'imyaka 34, amaze gutsindira Ubufaransa ibitego 37 mu nkino 97, n'ikindi gihombo gikomeye kuri uwo mugwi waheruka gutwara ico gikombe c'isi. B﻿ari basanzwe badafise abakinyi bo hagati Paul Pogba na N'Golo Kante kubera gukomereka, aho ni mu gihe n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United Raphael Varane ariko aragerageza kwimenyereza kugira azoshobore gukina inyuma yo kutagaragara mu nkino z'itanu z'umugwi wiwe. K﻿u musi wa gatatu, umukinyi w'imbere wa RB Leipzig Christopher Nkunku yarakuwe muri mu mugwi w'abazokina muri iryo higanwa inyuma yo gucumbagira bari mu myimenyerezo, aho haciye hahamagarwa umukinyi wa Frankfurt Randal Kolo Muani ngo amusubirire. U﻿mukinyi w'imbere wa Manchester United Anthony Martial n'umwe mu bashobora guhamagarwa kuza gusubirira Benzema, yari amaze imisi afise ikibazo co mw'itako kuva mu kwezi kwa cumi. U﻿wo mukinyi wa Real Madrid amaze gukinira uwo mugwi iminota idashika 30  mu nkino zitandatu ziheze. Y﻿aciye aja gupimwa inyuma y'imyimenyerezo yo ku wa gatandatu - Bwari bubaye ubwa mbere agize imyimenyerezo akayirangiza kuva abagize umugwi uzoja mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi bagiye hamwe bose mu ndwi iheze. D﻿eschamps yagize ati:"Ndatewe ikigongwe cane na Karim yari yagize intumbero nya mukuru iki gikombe c'isi. "﻿N'aho ibi bibaye, ndacafitiye icizere umugwi wanje. Tuzokora uko dushoboye kugira turangize igikorwa kitoroshe kiturindiriye."

column2: Abanduye coronavirus muri Afrika y’Epfo barenze igice c’umuliyoni
column3: Abantu barenga igice c'umuliyoni nibo bamaze kumenyekana k banduye wa mugera coronavirus muri Afrika y'Epfo, nk'uko umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'ico gihugu abivuga. Zwelini Mkhize amenyesha ko ejo ku wa gatandatu abantu bashasha10.107 ari banduye, igitigiri cashikanye abantu 503.290 bamaze kwandura, nayo 8.153 bakaba bamaze guhitanwa nawo. Afrika y'Epfo nico gihugu ca mbere gisinzikajwe n'uwu mugera muri Afrika yose, igice c'abamaze kwandura ku mugabane wose bakaba ari abo muri ico gihugu. Kw'isi yose kigira gatanu mu bihugu bifise abarwayi benshi b'iyo ndwara inyuma ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Brezili, Uburusiya hamwe n'Ubuhindi. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko ibitigiri vy'abahitanywe n'uwu mugera bishobora kuba birengeye kure ibitangazwa. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Afrika y'Epfo bagabisha ko ibitigiri vy'abandura bigenda vyiyongera ku murindi uteye ubbwoba, abenshi muri bo bakaba baba ku mugwa mukuru Pretoria. Ica gatatu c'abamaze kwandura bose hamwe bari mu ntara ya Gauteng, intara bukiriro bw'ubutunzi bwa Afrika y'Epfo, ikaba ari nayo ntara yabaye iyinjiriro ry'uwo mugera mu gihugu cose. Hagati aho, hari icizere ko ibiharuro bishobora kutaduga ku rugero runini mu kwezi kuri imbere. Leta ya Afrika y'Epfo yarafashe ingingo ruhasha za guma mu rugo mu kwa kane n'ukwa gatanu, ivyatumye umurindi w'ikwirakwira ugabanuka. Mu kwa gatandatu, yaciye itangura gutezura izo ngingo, ariko mu kwezi guheze hari izasubiye gushirwa mu ngiro, harimwo niyo kubuza kudandaza inzoga, kubera ibitigiri vyasubiye gufata umurindi udasanzwe. Harafashwe kandi n'ingingo zisa n'izo igihugu kiri mu ntambara, zikazobandanya gushika ku wa 15 z'uku kw'umunani. Ubwinshi bw'abandura bwatumye ibitaro vya Afrika y'Epfo birengerwa. Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa w'ico gihugu mu kwezi guheze yatangaje ko ibitaro vyaronkejwe ibitanda 28.000 kugira bishobore kwakira abandura Covid-19, ariko ico gihugu kikaba kigihanganye n'ikibazo c'ikena ry'abaganga n'abaforoma. Mu ndwi iheze, ishami ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ryaragabishije ko ibiriko biba muri Afrika y'Epfo bishobora kuba biriko vyerekana ibishobora gushika mu bindi bice vy'umugabane wa Afrika.

column2: Ubwa mbere mu mateka ya Katolika, Papa yagenye umugore muri sinodi y'abepiskopi
column3: Ubwa mbere mu mateka ya Ekleziya, Papa yagenye umugore nk'icegera c'umunyamabanga w'inama nkuru y'Abeposkopi. Umubikira Nathalie Becquart, ava mu Bufaransa, azoba afise uburenganzira bwo gutora muri iyo nama, isanzwe ihanura Papa kandi ikaganira ku bibazo bimwe bimwe nkoramutima muri Ekleziya Katolika. Umubikira Becquart yari asanzwe akorana n'iyi sinodi y'Abepiskopi (inama nkuru y'abasenyeri yiga ibibazo nkoramutima vya Ekleziya Katolika) kuva mu 2019 nk'umujenama. Umunyamabanga mukuru w'iyi nama nkuru, Kardinali Mario Grech avuga ko iri genwa ryerekana ko "umuryango wuguruye". Avuga ko iyi ngingo yerekana ko Papa yipfuza ko "abagore bagira uruhara runini mu gufata ingingo muri Ekleziya". Umunyamakuru wa BBC John McManus avuga ko iyi ngingo iterekana ko abagore bashobora kwatirwa mw'ibanga ry'ubusaserdoti, n'aho bamwe mu badashima iyi ngingo babona ko ari yo ibintu bitera bija. Luis Marín de San Martín, umupatiri wo muri Esupanye, na we nyene yagenywe kuba icegera c'umunyamabanga w'iyi nama. Muri ino myaka iheze, Sinodi y'Abepiskopi yaraganiriye ku bibazo nkoramutima bijanye n'ukwemera kw'Ekleziya, harimwo ikibazo c'ingene bakwiye gufata Abakatolika bubatse n'abapfakaye. Iyi ngingo ije haciye ikiringo kidashika ukwezi Papa Francis ahinduye itegeko rya Ekleziya kugira ngo yemerere abagore gusangiza no kurangura amabanga ya Arutari, n'aho iri tegeko rishimangira ko ibanga ry'ubusaserdoti ribandanya kuba iry'abagabo gusa. Hagati aho, mu mwaka uheze, Papa yaragenye abagore batandatu mu nama nkuru ijejwe gukurikirana ikigega ca Vaticano.

column2: I﻿tiro: Kubera iki ari ngombwa gusinzira n'imiburiburi amasaha atanu buri joro?
column3: N﻿k'uko abashakashatsi babivuga, itiro ry'amasaha atanu n'imiburiburi rishobora kugabanya ingorane z'amagara ku bantu barengeje imyaka mirongo itanu. Bemeza ko i﻿ngorane z'amagara zishobora gutuma utaronka itiro, ariko gusinzira nabi bishobora kuba ikimenyetso  c'amagara mabi. Biamaze kwemezwa ko itiro rituma umuntu aruhuka, umubiri n'umushaha bigasubira itoto, ariko  kuba umwanya umuntu amara asinziriye ushobora kuba ari ngirakamaro ntibizwi neza. I﻿cigwa ca PLoS Medicine carakurikiranye amagara n'itiro ku bakozi ba reta b'abongereza. I﻿kibazo gikurikira ni co cabajijwe umwe wese ku bantu 800 bagizweko amatohoza: "Musinzira amasaha angahe mw'ijoro mugereranije buri indwi?" B﻿amwe muri bo bari bafise isaha ku kuboko yo gukurikirana itiro ryabo. K﻿andi baragiriwe ibipimo vy'ingwara zidakira harimwo ingwara y'igisukari (Diabete), kansere (cancer)  n'ingwara ziterwa n'umutima, mu kiringo c'imyaka 20. A﻿basinzira n'imiburiburi amasaha atanu bafise imyaka 50 bagaragara nk'abashobora kugwara ingwara ku bice 30% kurusha abaryama amasaha indwi. Ivyo vyigwa vyerekanye  kandi  ko k﻿uryama umwanya muto ufise imyaka 50 ushobora gupfa, cane cane uzize ingwara zidakira. Kenshi abahinga basaba ko umuntu asinzira amasaha indwi canke umunani, nk'uko bivugwa n'abashakashatsi bo muri kaminuza za College London na Paris  Cite. A﻿bahinga ntavyo baramenya neza, ariko birazwi ko itiro rifasha ubwonko kuguma bwibuka no kugumana akanyamuneza no gukora udakebaguzwa. I﻿tiro kandi n'akaryo ku bwonko ko kwigizayo imicafu. P﻿rof Derk-Jan Dijk arongoye ikigo Surrey Sleep yabwiye BBC News ati: "Ivyo bikorwa vyaje kwemeza ko kuryama umwanya muto atari vyiza kuri twebwe. Muri rusangi, si vyiza ku magara yacu - n'aho kuri bamwe, bisa n'uko ataco bitwaye. "﻿Ikibazo gikomeye n'ukumenya kubera iki abantu bamwe bamwe baryama umwanya muto. Biva kuki? Hari ico dushobora kubikorako? Itiro n'ikintu gishobora gutuma ubuzima buhinduka ku ruhande rumwe." I﻿gihe kirekire co kudasinzira neza gishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku kungene umuntu abaho. A﻿baganga ubu bandikira gake abagwayi imiti yo gusinzira, ishobora kugira ingaruka zishobora gutuma umuntu aca ayimenyera. A﻿riko ingorane z'itiro zishobora gutorwa inyishu  kandi uburyo bwo gufashwa buriho.

column2: Menya umushakashatsi wa Kaminuza ya Harvard yahagurukiye indwara zibonwa 'nk'izo abakene'
column3: "Nahereye ubushakashatsi bwanje ku ngwara zisigaye zibonwa nk'iza 'kahise' mu bihugu bitunze, ubu naho ngiye gushira inguvu kuri Coronavirus", Mireille Kamariza, umushakashatsi wo muri Kaminuza ya Harvard yibanda ku ngwara zibangamiye ibihugu bikenye.

column2: Mastodynie: Menya ivy'iki kibazo gitera kubabara kw'amabere
column3: Muri iki kiganiro Bazamuganga, Dr Gaspard Ntahonkiriye, arasigukira ikibazo co kuvyimba no kubabara amabere ku bagore, bizwi nka mastodynie mu gifaransa canke mastodynia mu congereza.

column2: Ethiopia: Umusigiti wa mbere muri Africa, al-Nejashi, wasambuye n'ibibombe muri Tigray
column3: Reta ya Ethiopia yemeye ko igiye gusanura umusigiti wa kera cane wasambuwe mu kwezi guheze mu ntambara ya Tigray mu buraruko bw'ico gihugu. Umusigiti wa al-Nejashi uvugwa ko watewe ibibombe, ivyari muri wo biranyagwa, eka mbere n'imva z'abategetsi b'idini rya Isilamu bo muri kahise zirononekara. Reta ivuga ko n'urusengero rwasambuwe muri ico gihe c'intambara na rwo nyene ruzosanurwa. Abanyagihugu baba muri ako karere bazi ko umugisiti wa al-Nejashi wubatswe n'Aba-Isilamu ba mbere bimukiye muri Afrika mu gihe c'Intumwa Muhammad. Bari bahunze amabi bariko barakorerwa i Makka baca bahabwa ubuhungiro mu cahoze ari ubwami bwa Aksum. Aba-Isilamu bo muri ako karere bazi ko abasangirangendo 15 b'Intumwa Muhammad bahambwe muri izova zasambuwe . Bazi kandi  ko uwo musigiti ari wo wa mbere watanguye kwubakwa muri Afrika, n'aho hari abandi bavuga ko uwa mbere wubatswe muri Afrika uri muri Misiri. Uwo musigiti uri mu gisagara ca Wukro kiri ku birometero hafi 800 uvuye ku mugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa. Urusengero Emanueli Mweranda (Saint Emmanuel) rw'Abakristu b'idini rya Orthodoxe na rwo nyene rwarasambuwe ariko nta nsiguro zatanzwe. Mu mwaka wa 2015 hari ishirahamwe ryo muri Turukiya ryatanguje ibikorwa vyo gusanura uwo musigiti, rivuga ko ryashaka "kubungabunga uwo mutungo wo muri kahise", rigahindura ako karere kugira ngo gashobore kwirukirwa n'ingenzi. Uwu musigiti hamwe n'urusengero rwari hafi yawo vyasambuye mu bitero vya gisirikare vyamaze ukwezi kumwe  bifise intumbero yo kwomora ubutegetsi bw'umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) wari urongoye akarere ka Tigray. Ishirahamwe ryigenga ry'Ububirigi rikorera muri Afrika rivuga ko ku wa 18 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri uwo musigiti wa al-Nejashi "wabanje guterwa ibombe mu nyuma unyagwa urukombamazi n'abasirikare ba Ethiopia na Eritrea". Iryo shirahamwe rivuga kandi ko ibinyamakuru vya Tigray vyatangaje ko abantu batari bake bishwe bariko bagerageza gukingira uwo musigiti. Reta ntaco irashikiriza kuri ivyo vyegeranyo vy'iryo shirahamwe. Ariko, reta za Ethiopia na Eritrea zompi zirahakana ko hari abasirikare ba  Eritrea bari muri Tigray gufasha mu ntambara yo kurwanya TPLF. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC igisata ca Amharic, icegera c'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe gukingira umurage wo muri kahise, Abebaw Ayalew, yavuze ko ko komite idasanzwe izoshikanwa muri ako karere kugira ngo yige ingene uwo musigiti n'urwo rusengero vyasambuwe imbere y'uko ibikorwa vyo gusanura bitangura. Ati: "Ubu burere ntibuzwi gusa ku bijanye n'ugusenga, ariko kandi ni umutungo wo muri kahise kuri Ethiopia yose". Mu ntango z'ukw'icumi na rimwe, intambara yaradutse mu karere ka Tigray igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, yagomora ingabo mu ntumbero yo gutuza abarwanyi ba TPLF. Hari haciye amezi atari make hari ukutumvikana hagati ya reta ya Abiy n'abategetsi ba TPLF, umugambwe wari urongoye Tigray.

column2: Ethiopia: umuhari urwanira mu ntara ya Oromia wishize hamwe na TPLF mu kurwanya reta
column3: Umuhari w'inyeshamba Oromo Liberation Army wo mu ntara ya Oromia wishize hamwe n'inyeshamba za Tigray zirwanira mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia kugira ngo barwanirize hamwe ubutegetsi bw'iki gihugu. Umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) nta tangazo urasohora kuri aya masezerano, ariko umuvugizi w'uwu muhari yemeje aya masezerano mu kiganiro yagiriraniye n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Bloomberg. Mu kwa gatanu, reta ya Ethiopia yatangaje ko iyi mihari yompi ari iy'iterabwoba, ariko ukwishira hamwe kwayo gushobora gutera ibibazo umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed. Uretse inyeshamba za TPLF zirwanira mu ntara ya Tigray, ingabo za reta ya Ethiopia zihanganye n'iyindi mirwi mu turere dutandukanye tw'igihugu. Mu ntara ya Oromia isanzwe ibamwo ubwoko bunini muri ico gihugu kandi ari nayo umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed avamwo, reta ihanganye n'uwu muhari, Oromo Liberation Army, OLA. OLA isanzwe irondera ubwigenge bw'abanyagihugu bo mu bwoko bwa Oromo nta ntambwe ya gisirikare  iboneka yigeze itera, ariko ibandanya itera umutekano muke mu turere dutandukanye tw'iyo ntara. Myinshi mu mishamirano yo hagati mu gihugu muri Ethiopia iri ku rugero ruto kandi ikaba ishingiye ku bibazo bwite vy'abanyagihugu - rero kubona OLA igiye hamwe n'inyeshamba za Tigray ibintu bishobora guhinduka. Mu misi iheze, ingabo za reta zagiye zitsindwa mu buraruko bw'igihugu gushika aho zitakaza intara ya Tigray yigaruriwe n'inyeshamba za TPLF. Vyabaye ngombwa ko reta ihagarika agahengwe yari yatangaje maze itera akamo ingabo z'igihugu n'abazishigikiye kurandurana n'imizi umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front, TPLF.

column2: Itegeko rya Islam Sharia rirabuza umuziki, kubera iki? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
column3: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia.

column2: US iriko izibira Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, umunyafrika wa mbere kurongora WTO
column3: Igenwa ry'uwahoze ari umushikiranganji w'ikigega wa Nijeriya kurongora  ishirahamwe rijejwe ubudandaji kw'isi, OMC/WTO, rishobora kuburizwamwo inyuma y'aho Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zankiye iki cemezo. Ejo ku wa gatatu, umurwi ujejwe kugena abashaka kurongora iri shirahamwe wasavye ibihugu 164 bihurikiye muri iri shirahamwe gushigikira umupfasoni Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala. Yoba abaye umugore wa mbere kandi umunyafrika wa mbere arongoye WTO. Ariko Amerika isanzwe inegura imikorere ya WTO mu budandaji mpuzamakungu, ishaka ko iri shirahamwe rirongorwa n'uwundi mugore, umunya Koreya y'Ubumanuko, Yoo Myung-hee, ivuga ko yozana impunduka muri iri shirahamwe. Umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala avuga ko "ari iteka rinini cane" kuri we kubona yizigirwa. Ariko iki gikorwa kimaze amezi ane yose co kugena uwushobora kurongora WTO cahuye n'inzitizi zikomeye igihe Amerika ivugiye ko izobandanya ishigikira uyu mushikiranganji w'ubudandaji wa Koreya y'Ubumanuko. Mw'itangazo rinegura WTO, ibiro vya Amerika bijejwe ubudandaji, ari navyo bihanura Perezida Donald Trump ku bijanye na politike y'ubudandaji, bivuga ko iri shirahamwe "ritegerezwa kurongorwa n'umuntu nyawe afise uburambwe muri kino gisata". Umupfasoni Yoo afise "ubuhinga yisangije" nk'inzobere mu bijanye n'ubudandaji kandi "afise ubumenyi bukwiye bwo kurongora neza iri hirahamwe" nk'uko tubisoma muri iryo tangazo. Ryongerako riti: "Iki ni igihe kigoye kuri WTO n'ubudandaji mpuzamakungu. Mu myaka 25 yose iheze nta biganiro vyigeze bihaba ku bijanye n'ibiciro, integuro yo gukemura ibibazo nta kigenda, hanyuma kandi ibihugu bike cane biri muri iri shirahamwe nivyo vyashoboye gukurikiza ingingo shingiro zijanye no gukorera mu muco. WTO irakeneye cane rwose impinduka". Hagati aho, muri iri tangazo, nta na hamwe harimwo izina ry'uyu mupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala. Mu gatondo k'ejo ku wa gatatu, inyuma y'umubonano w'intumwa za WTO  wo guhanahana ivyiyumviro ku bijanye n'iri genwa, umuvugizi waryo Keith Rockwell yavuze ko igihugu kimwe gusa ari co kitashigikiye umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala. Ati: "Uno munsi, intumwa zose zashigikiye cane rwose ingene igikorwa cagenze ...n'ivyakivuyemwo. Kiretse iz'igihugu kimwe". 'Igikorwa kidasanzwe' Bwana Trump avuga ko WTO ari "akaga" kandi ko yegamiye ku ruhande  rw'Ubushinwa, ni mu gihe hari bamwe bari bagenywe muri iri shirahamwe bamaze guhagarikwa. WTO yaciye itumako iyindi nama ku wa 09 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe - inyuma y'amatora ya Amerika - kugira ngo basubire bahanahane ivyiyumviro kuri iki kibazo. Kubona Amerika yanka igenwa ry'uyu munya Nijeriya si ukuvuga ko adashobora kugenwa, ariko Washington ishobora kugira uruhara rukomeye mu gufata icemezo ntabanduka. Bwana Rockwell yabwiye abanyamakuru ko hashobora gusabwa igikorwa kidasanzwe kugira ngo igenwa ry'uyu mupfasoni  Okonjo-Iweala rishigikirwe na bose. Gushika ubu, arashigikiwe n'umuryango w'ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Bulaya. Iri shirahamwe ryatakaje uburongozi bwaryo igihe uwari arirongoye Roberto Azevedo  atangiye imihoho mu kw'umunani kw'umwaka uheze. Kuva ico gihe, ivyegera bine nibo bafise ibintu mu minwe. Umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala w'imyaka 66 niwe mupfasoni wa mbere yabaye umushikiranganji w'ubutunzi hamwe n'uw'imigenderanire wa Nijeriya kandi akaba yaramaze imyaka 25 yose ajejwe ibibazo vy'iterambere mw'Ibanki y'isi yose. Muri kino gihe, ari mu barongoye urubuga rwa Twitter, akaba arongoye ihuriro rya GAVI rijejwe incanco, kandi akaba n'intumwa idasanzwe y'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO mu rugamba rwo kurwanya Covid-19. Mu gihe umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala yogenwa, azoba afise igikorwa kidasanzwe. WTO isanzwe ihanganye n'ikibazo c'ibiganiro vy'ubucuruzi vyahagaze hamwe n'icuka kibi hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, yavuze ko uburambe bunini afise mu mu guhindura imikorere bwamutumye aboneka ko ari we nyawe ashoboye gufasha WTO kusubira ku murongo.

column2: Germany: uyu musi ni amatora yo kurangiza imyaka 16 y’ubutegetsi bwa Angela Merkel
column3: Ubutegetsi bwari bumaze imyaka 16 yose bugiye kurangira mu Budagi. Abadagi bari mu matora y'inama nshingamateka mu rugamba rutoroshe rwo kurondera umusubirizi w'umushikiranganji wa mbere yari amaze igihe kinini ku butegetsi. Kuri uyu wa Mungu, igenekerezo rya 26 z'ukw'icenda, Abadagi bari mu matora arangiza ubutegetsi bwa reta yari irongowe na Angela Merkel. Amatora yatanguye isaha zibiri z'igitondo (8:00) bikaba vyitezwe ko arangira isaha icumi na zibiri z'umugoroba (18:00). Hari vyinshi biteye inkeke ku vyerekeye ibizova mu matora,  ariko ikizwi coco ni kimwe: uwuzotsinda amatora uwo ari we wese, ni ngombwa ko ashinga reta ihuriwemwo na bose. Vyitezwe ko imigambwe ishika itatu ari yo ishobora kuronka ibibanza bikwiye mu nama nshingamateka y'Ubudagi, izwi nka Bundestag, ari nayo ishobora kuzotora umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha (chancelier/chancellor). Dutahuzanye mu majambo make kandi aciriye hagufi ingene amatora agenda mu Budagi n'ingene bigenda gushika hashingwe reta nshasha. Abadagi baja mu matora kugira ngo batore abashingamateka mu nama nshingamateka y'igihugu, Bundestag. N'aho kuri uyu musi buri muntu yitaba ku biro vy'itora kugira ngo atange ijwi ryiwe, itora hakoreshejwe amabahasha riza ryaramaze gutangura. Abadagi bashika imiriyoni 60.4 bakwije imyaka 18 ni bo bashobora gutora. Bundestag igizwe n'imiburiburi n'abashingamateka 598, ariko akenshi bararenga. N'aho mw'ijoro ry'uyu musi umugambwe uzotahukana intsinzi uza kumenyekana, gushinga reta nshasha bizofata umwanya utari muto kuko bisaba ko umugambwe watsinze amatora uzobanza kurondera iyindi migambwe igiranira urunani na wo kugira ngo ushobore kugira ubwiganze mu nama nshingamateka. Ibi bizotuma habanza guca igihe kitari gito kugira ngo izina ry'umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha azosubirira Angela Merkel rimenyekane. Mu bisanzwe, umugambwe ufise intebe nyinshi mu yigize urunani ni wo ugena umushikiranganji wa mbere. Ariko gushinga urunani birafata umwanya kuko imigambwe yose irugize itegerezwa kubanza kwumvikana igashika ku masezerano y'ingene abashikiranganji bazogenwa. Bamaze kwumvikana ku bintu vyose, niho rero abagize inama nshingamateka baca bakorana kugira ngo bemeze umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha. Iyo Abadagi bagiye mu matora, batora ibintu bibiri. Ica mbere, batora umushingamateka w'akarere. Hari uburere bw'amatora (circonscriptions électorales/ electoral districts) bushika ku  299 ; ibi bivuga ko umushingamateka umwe aserukira hafi abantu 250.000. Umukandida yaronse amajwi menshi ni we atsindira intebe mu nama nshingamateka. Aya yitwa "amatora ya mbere". Mu matora agira kabiri, azwi nk' "amatora ya kabiri", abatora batora intonde z'imigambwe muri buri reta. Rero ibi bibanza 299 bisigaye bigenda bigabaganywa bivanye n'amajwi muri mugambwe wagiye uronka. Rero umukandida ari ku rutonde aronka ikibanza mu nama nshingamateka hakurikijwe urutonde rwatanzwe n'umugambwe wiwe. Uku rero niko Bundestag ishingwa. Kugira ngo umugambwe uronke ikibanza mu nama nshingamateka utegerezwa kuronka n'imiburiburi amajwi 5% mu matora agira kabiri. Ibi vyateguwe uku kugira ngo imigambwe mito mito, akenshi usanga igendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze ntije mu yigize ubutegetsi. Rero, ufatiye ku kungene amatora ateguwe mu Budagi, inama nshingamateka ishingiye ahanini ku vyavuye mu matora agira kabiri. Kuri ivyo rero, amatora agira niyo yerekana ibibanza buri mugambwe ushobora kugira muri Bundestag hamwe n'amahirwe ushobora kugira muri reta. Iki ni igice kitoroshe gutahura. Igitigiri c'intebe mu nama nshingamateka kirashobora kwiyongera iyo hari ubusumbane hagati y'ivyavuye mu matora ku mugambwe umwe umwe muri ano matora abiri. Aha rero, aho kugirwa n'abashingamateka 598, ishobora kugirwa n'abashingamateka 709. Inama nshingamateka ya kino gihe yari igizwe n'abashingamateka 730. Dufatire ku karorero k'ibishobora gushika mu mugambwe kanaka: Nk'akarorero, umugambwe CDU uronse intebe 110 mu matora ya mbere yo mu burere, hanyuma ugaca uronka intebe 100 mu matora agira kabiri y'intonde z'imigambwe. Muri iki gihe, CDU izosanga ifise intebe 10 irengeje ku zo yategerezwa kuronka, ufatiye ku matora agira kabiri, ari yo akomeye cane. Rimwe na rimwe, abatora barashobora gushima umukandida, ari na we atorwa mu ya mbre, ariko ugasanga ntibashimye umugambwe wiwe ntibawutore mu matora agira kabiri. Dufatiye kuri aka karorero, vyumvikana ko CDU izogumana izi ntebe 10 zirenzeko, zizwi nka Überhangmandate, canke "intebe z'inyongera". Kuri ivyo, CDU izosanga ifise intebe 10 zirenze ku zo yategerezwa kugira nk'umugambwe, bikayiha akarusho gasa n'uko umengo irenganije iyindi. Rero kugira no ntihabe nkunzi, iyindi migambwe ica ironswa icitwa Ausgleichsmandate, canke "intebe z'indishi y'akababaro". Ibi bica bituma ibitigiri vy'abashingamateka bava mu yindi migambwe vyiyongera bivanye n'amajwi baronse. Dufatiye kuri aka karorero, ibibanza bitegerezwa kwiyongera ku rugero rwa 10% vy'ivyavuye mu matora kugira ngo bakosore ubu busumbane. Abatsinze n'abatsinzwe baza kumenyekana inyuma y'amasaha make ibiro vy'amatora vyugaye. Ni nako vyagenze mu matora y'inama nshingamateka aheruka mu 2017, igihe Angela Merkel ashikiriza ijambo ritaryoshe yerekana ko umugambwe wiwe waronse amajwi make. Ariko gushinga reta bishobora kurangwamwo impari nyinshi bigatuma ibiganiro bifata indwi zitari nke kugira ngo bashike ku masezerano. Ni nako vyagenze mu 2017, igihe umugambwe CDU, umugambwe L'Alliance 90/Les Verts ukunze kwitwa The Greens,  hamwe n'uumgambwe FDP inaniriwe no gushinga urunani.

column2: Anglican ya UK yabujije umukobwa wa Desmond Tutu kuyobora ibirori vyo gushingura
column3: Ishengero rya Anglican ishami ry’Ubwongereza ryabujije umukobwa w’umuhisi Desmond Tutu kuyobora ibirori vyo guhamba kubera yubakanye n’umugore nka we. Mpho Tutu van Furth ni umupasitori mw’ishengero Anglican muri diyoseze ya Washington, akaba yari yasabwe kuyobora imisa yo guhamba uwari umuvyeyi wiwe w'ibatisimu, Martin Kenyon, ahitwa Shropshire mu Bwongereza ejo ku wa kane. Tutu van Furth yabwiye BBC ko kumwankira “bisa n’ubugome kandi bibabaje”. Diyoseze ya Hereford ivuga ko vyari "ibintu bitoroshe". Ishengero rya Anglican ishami ry’Ubwongereza (Church of England) ntiryemerera abavugabutumwa baryo ko barongorana n’abo basangiye ibitsina kuko inyigisho ritanga ari uko ukwubakana biba hagati y’umugabo n’umugore. Hagati aho, ishengero rya Anglican rigenzi ryaryo muri Amerika, rizwi nka Église épiscopalienne des États-Unis /The Episcopal Church, riremerera abavugabutumwa baryo kwubakana n’abo basangiye ibitsina. Itangazo rya Diyosezi ya Hanoford rivuga riti: "Hatanzwe impanuro hisunzwe aho inama y’Abepiskopi ihagaze ku bijanye n’abarongorana basangiye ibitsina”. Uwahoze ari musenyeri wa Liverpool, Paul Bayes asanzwe ari mu bahimiriza ko ishengero rihindura aho rihagaze ku bijanye n’igitsina, avuga ko “atari vyiza kuvuga ngo ibintu ntivyoroshe”. "Ni ngombwa ko vuba bwango kami ka muntu, umwitwarariko mu butumwa, hamwe n’urukundo, bihabwa ikibanza”. Umuryango wa Kenyon umaze kubwirwa iyi ngingo y’Urusengero, waciye wimura igisabisho co gusezera ikivana kw’isengero St Michael ikijana kuri All Angels ahitwa Wentnor, hafi y’ikigo ca Musenyeri, ahantu hazwi cane, hafi y’aho uyu muvugabutumwa aba kugira ngo umupfasoni Tutu van Furth ashobore guhagarikira iki gisabisho avuge n’ubutumwa. Tutu van Furth  yabwiye BBC ati: "Birababaje cane. Vyumvikana ko ari ingingo y’abategetsi ba ruburakigongwe." Kenyon yari incuti ya hafi cane n’uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru muri Afrika y’Epfo umuhisi Desmond Tutu. Tutu van Furth yategetswe guhagarika ivyo kuvuga ubutumwa nka pasitori muri Afrika y’Epfo inyuma y’aho yubakaniye n’umugore nkawe, Marceline van Furth, umwigisha wa kaminuza wo mu Buholande, mu 2015. Se wiwe Desmond Tutu - yitavye Imana muri Kigarama (12) 2021 - yaratsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel mu 1984 kubera  uruhara yagize mu kurwanya ya ntwaro y’ivangura ya apartheid muri Afrika y’Epfo. Nawe nyene yararwaniye uburenganzira bw’abahuza ibitsina babisangiye yongera ashigikira ukurongorana hagati y’abasangiye ibitsina. Mu 2013 yavuze ati: Nopfuma mpeba kuja mw’ijuru ryanka abatinganyi. Oya, novuga nti mbabarira, nshaka kuvuga ko nopfuma nja mu kindi kibanza. “Sinosenga Imana yanka abatinganyi kandi uku niko ndavyumva cane”. Yongeyeko ati: " Muri rino sekeza, mfise ishaka nk’iryo nari mfise mu kurwanya apartheid. Kuri jewe, bimeze co kimwe”.

column2: Burundi – Covid: Incanco z’iki niba leta itazihimiriza?...Impari ku ngingo ya reta
column3: Ingingo ya reta y'Uburundi yo kwemera kuronswa incanco za Covid-19 ariko itazohimiriza abantu kwicandagisha irabonwa ugutandukanye mu benegihugu. Bamwe bagaragaza ko bari kumwe na reta y'Uburundi kuri iyi ngingo igihe abandi babona ko ataco bimaze kuba reta yemera kuronswa incanco idafise umugambi kuri zo. Izo ncanco ntizirashika mu Burundi. Abategetsi bajejwe amagara y'abantu bamenyesha ko poritike ya reta ihari kuri iki kiza ari ukugipima, kuvura abakirwaye no guhimiriza abantu kucirinda, ariko ko ivyo kwicandagisha bitarimwo. Reta ariko ubu yugururiye imiryango incanco ishobora kuronswa na Banki y'isi kugira ngo "uwuzoshaka ariwe azokwicandagisha", nk'uko umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu yabivuze. Gushika ubu reta y'Uburundi ntishigikiye ivyo gucandaga Covid nk'uko vyumvikana mu mvugo z'abategetsi, ibi vyongereza amadidane mu benegihugu batari bake ku bushobozi bw'incanco za Covid zemejwe n'abahinga. Ingingo yo kwemera kuronswa incanco ariko reta ntizihimirize abenegihugu benshi bayivuzeko ibitandukanye ku rubuga rwa Facebook rwacu. Bimwe bimwe ni ibi ngaha: Japhet Céle Abafash iy ngingo bubahwe baciye ubwenge. Icambere hari igihe bokwanka bagasanga bahomvye uruncanco rumeze neza. Ku rundi ruhande hari igihe bokwemera bagasanga bemeye ibitwicira ubuzima. Rero ndakunze ukuntu batabaye nk'imbata imenya ko imize ikintu kitarika aruko camaze gushika mu muhogo. Umurundi wese ahari afate kamwe ndaje kuriha kuko kirazira kwigerezako Fabien Ndayizeye Novuga ko biteye isoni kuri Leta Mvyeyi    !Wemere ko bakuzanira urucanco,hanyuma ngo sinzosaba abantu banje kwicandagisha?Quelle irresponsabilité !!!Hari amaleta yemeye neza izo ncanco,kandi n'abakuru b'ibihugu bakaziterwa.Hako basesaguza Banque mondiale ng'izane incanco batazozikoresha,nibazihe abazikeneye bareke kwigenza nk'abariko bakina comédie !!! Gusa ntaho woshobora gukwepera umuzungu ntanahamwe. Abashatse kubigerageza urabona kobahise basezera isi vyihuse, Kandi bose urabona kobapfuye impfu zimwe bose imitima yarahagaze Magufuri, Peter. column2: Iragi rya Bob Marley ryatewe iteka n’umwuzukuru wiwe mu giteramo i Birmingham
column3: Ibiserukuru bitatu vy’umuryango wa Bob Marley baza kuba bari mu giteramo co kuri uno wa kabiri mu gisagara ca Birmingham mu Bwongereza -  imyaka 50 inyuma y’igiteramo ca mbere uyu muririmvyi yagiriye muri ico gisagara. Umwuzukuru wiwe Skip Marley araza kuririmba muri kino giteramo kiza kuba gihagarariwe n’uwari umugore akongera akanafasha kuririmba uyu yahoze ari umunyamuziki rurangiranwa, Rita, ari kumwe n’umukobwa wiwe Cedella. Iki giteramo kiza kuba kigizwe n’indirimbo ziwe zisubirwamwo mu murwi w’abaririmvyi  Chineke! Orchestra  baza kuba bari kumwe na Skip n’abandi. Trevor Nelson niwe aremesha iki giteramo – kizocishwa kuri BBC hanyuma. Iki giteramo kiri mu bikorwa bitegekanijwe na BBC vyo guhimbaza imyaka 60 igihugu ca Jamaica  - ari co gihugu ciwe c’amavukiro - kimaze cikukiye, hamwe kandi no mu birori vyo gutanguza inkino za Commonwealth 2022 zitegekanijwe kubera i Birmingham. Skip Marley ati: "Nditeguye kuririmbana na Chineke! Mu gutera iteka umuziki wa Sokuru. “Kuririmba mu giteramo co mu Bwongereza aho umuziki wa sokuru usanzwe ukundwa cane rwose biza kuba ari ibintu bidasanzwe”. Skip Marley ni umunyamuziki w’imyaka 26 yavukiye muri Jamaica, nyina wiwe ni Cedella Marley umunyamuziki akomeye kandi yatsindiye  udushimwe dutatu twa Grammys awards akaba ari umukobwa wa Bob Marley. Haraciye imyaka 41 Bob Marley asandavye yishwe na kansei i Miami muri Reta Zujnze Ubumwe za Amerika, ku myaka 36.

column2: Umunyamuziki Neil Young, yitwariye Trump kubera akoresha umuziki wiwe atabimusavye
column3: Neil Young yitwariye abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Donald Trump ariko yiyamamariza ikindi kiringo kubera bakoresha umuziki wiwe batamusavye uruhusha. Uyo muririmvyi rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa rock avuga ko uyo mukuru w'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yahonyanze amategeko akingira umuziki mu gukoresha indirimbo ziwe mu myiyamamazo n'amakoraniro ya politike. Uyo mucuraranzi akomoka muri Canada yanse ko babandanya bakoresha indirimbo ziwe Rockin' in the Free World na Devil's Sidewalk kubera ico yise "isekeza ry'ubujuju n'urwanko, ibintu bitari mu mico y'Abanyamerika". Abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Trump ntaco barashikiriza kuri ivyo birego. Young yavuze ko yitwariye Bwana Trump amwagiriza ko yakoresheje umuziki wiwe kuva mu 2015, ariko akinumya "n'ibigirankana". Uyo mucuraranzi, ubu afise ubwenegihugu bwa Amerika inyuma yo kuba muri iki gihugu imyaka iharurwa muri za mirongo, arasaba indishi y'amadolari agera ku 150.000 aho hose bagiye bakoresha umuziki wiwe. Aha harimwo ikoraniro rya Trump i Tulsa mu ntara ya Oklahoma mu kwa gatandatu, hamwe n'urugendo Trump yagize kuri Mount Rushmore mu kw'indwi. indirimbo ijanye n'icivugo Muri ino dosiye bashize ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'uyu mucuraranzi, abunganizi ba Young banditse bati: "Uru rubanza ntirufise intumbero yo gusuzugura uburenganzira n'ivyiyumviro vy'abanyagihugu ba Amerika kuko ni uburenganzira bwabo gushigikira umukandida bipfuza". "Hagati aho, nyene kwitwara ntashobora kwemerera ko umuziki wiwe ukoreshwa nk'  'indirimbo y'icivugo' mu ntumbero yo kubiba amacakubiri, 'ingendo y'ubujuju n'urwanko, ibintu bitari mu mico y'Abanyamerika". Uyu mucuraranzi w'imyaka 74 siwe munyamuziki wenyene ashavuriye Perezida Trump kubera akoresha indirimbo ziwe. Mu kwezi guheze, umurwi The Rolling Stones wo mu Bwongereza waragabishije Perezida Trump ko ashobora kwitwarirwa mu butungane mu gihe yobandanya akoresha imiziki yabo mu myiyamamazo yiwe. Abanyamuziki Mick Jagger na Keith Richards baragiye hamwe n'abandi banyamuziki barimwo Aerosmith na Elton John mu gutera igikumu ku rwandiko bandikiye abanyapolitike babahamagarira kubanza gusaba uruhusha imbere y'uko bakoresha imiziki yabo mu myiyamamazo n'amakoraniro ya politike. Ishirahamwe rishinzwe guharanira uburenganzira muvyo umuziki, BMI, rivuga ko impusha zitangwa ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa ry'umuziki mu biteramo n'ayandi makoraniro, zitaraba amakoraniro ya politike. Abakora imyiyamamazo ya politike bategerezwa gusaba uruhusha rusabwa n'amashirahamwe ya politike (Political Entities Licence) rubaha uburenganzira bwo gukoresha indirimbo zishika imiliyoni 15. Rero abajejwe imyiyamamazo ba Trump urwo ruhusha ntarwo bafise. Ariko abacuraranzi bafise uburenganzira bwo gukura indirimbo zabo kuri urwo rutonde. The Rolling Stones barabikoze, ariko Young ntatomora nimba nawe yoba yarabikoze.

column2: Uyu muririmvyi wo muri Afrika y'epfo yahuye n'ikibazo co guhohoterwa
