column2: Kenya: Abasoromyi b'icayi bajanye urubanza muri sentare ya Scotland
column3: Abakozi indwi bo mu mirima muri Kenya  bitwariye muri sentare yo muri Ecosse (Scotland ) imwe muri kompanyi zikomeye cane kw'isi zimbura icayi  basaba indishi ku mvune batewe n'akazi. Abo basoromyi b'icayi bavuga ko bagize imvune nyinshi  kubera uburyo bakoramwo mu mirima ya James Finlay  Kenya Ltd. Iryo ni ishami rimwe ry'iyo kompanyi ikorera henshi kw'isi ifise amamuko muri Glasgow mu kinjana ca 18. Iyo kompanyi ntiyemera urwo rubanza mu gushigikira ingingo zayo zijanye n'amagara n'umutekano mu kazi. Finlays batanguye bacuruza ipampa muri Ecosse mu 1750 ubu bakaba bafise  ibikorwa mu migabane itanu y'isi, Starbucks ikaba ari umwe mu bakiriya babo. Iyo kompanyi ni nini  cane ku buryo yimbura icayi gikwiye igikenerwa ku mwaka mu Bwongereza bwose. Iyo kompanyi yimuye icicaro cayo gikuru ikivana Glasgow ikijana Londres haraheze imyaka 15 ariko n'ubu yanditswe ko ikorera Aberdeen, ivyo bigatuma imanza irimwo zijanwa muri sentare za Ecosse. Abo bagabo n'abagore indwi bitwaye basaba indishi ingana n'ibihumbi 15 mu mafaranga y'abongereza £15.000, umwe umwe muri sentare ya Sheriff Personal Injury muri Edinburgh. Uwubunganira muri Kenya, Isaac Okero, avuga ko bagize imvune zitandukanye harimwo no mu ruti rw'umugongo. Yabwiye BBC Scotland ati: "Abo bakozi bo mu cayi bavuga ko baravye imyaka bamaze bakorera James Finlay Kenya Ltd, n'uburyo bakoreramwo, bagiye baragira imvune buhoro buhoro gushika aho zigira ingaruka ku buzima bwabo." "Izo mvune zifatiye ku mubiri no mu mutwe." Okero avuga ko bamwe bari bagikora igihe urwo rubanza rwatanguzwa muri ico gisagara kiri ku birometero birenga ibihumbi bitandatu uvuye muri Kenya, ariko ubu umwe wenyene ni we agikora. Abandi barungitswe mu kiruhuko canke naho ntibaba bagishobora gukora. Yibaza ko urwo rubanza ruzogira ingaruko irenze aho. Yavuze ati: "Twizeye ko ruzotuma iyo kompanyi ihindura cane uburyo abakozi bakoreramwo, uru rubanza rero rukazotuma haba akarusho gafadika mu masezerano n'uburyo vy'akazi k'abasoroma icayi, hanyuma harangire ivy'uko hari abakozi b'abanyaKenya bagira invune zibakurikirana ubuzima bwose nk'uko aba bakozi indwi vyabashikiye." Umuhinga mu bijanye n'imvune z'akazi David Short wo mu kigo ca Balfour and Manson co muri Edinburgh ni we  ahagarariye abo basoromyi b'icayi. Yavuze ati: "Mu rubanza rwo muri sentare kimwe mu bintu vya mbere  ubanza kuraba n'aho witura, ni iyihe sentare izotwemerera kwakira urubanza. "Ngaha dufise kompanyi yanditswe muri Ecosse, gutyo rero ikibanza ciza c'urwo rubanza ni muri sentare yo muri Ecosse. "Twitwaye mu rubanza ku bisanzwe  rwobereye muri Kenya. Rwerekana uburyo abakozi babo bakoreramwo n'ubutunzi bwabo." Imyaka ibiri urubanza rumaze gutangura mu 2017, umucamanza yategetse ko Finlays ireka abunganira mu mategeko abo basoromyi bagashika mu mirima yayo muri Kenya, ikabareka bakaraba uburyo abantu bakoreramwo. Finlays yaciye ishingisha urubanza rwo kuvyanka mu masentare yo muri Kenya iranarutsinda ivuga ko ingingo yo muri Ecosse idashobora gushirwa mu ngiro kiretse ibanje kwemerwa na sentare yo muri Kenya. Abasoromyi b'icayi barunguruje kuri iyo ngingo, uruzocibwa rukaba rwitezwe gusohoka mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Short avuga ati: "Bitwaza ngo ntivyemewe mw'ibwirizwanshingiro. "Naho vyoba biri uko, ni kuki batatureka ngo tuje kuraba? Ndakeka ko ari uko badashaka ko tubona uburyo buteye ubwoba abo bantu bakoreramwo." Mu kwezi kwa kabiri, abo basoromyi b'icayi barerekanye uburyo abakozi bo mu yindi kompanyi yo muri Kenya bakoreramwo, abunganizi babo bo mu Bwongereza barabiraba. Gwen Morgan-Evans, wo mw'ishirahamwe ry'abashingwamanza Hugh James, avuga ati: "Twaragiye muri Kenya turi kumwe na babiri mu bahinga bo mu Bwongereza kugira barabe ingene icayi gisoromwa kugira bagire inama sentare yo muri Ecosse y'ingene ubwo buryo bwo gukora buhungabanya amagara. "Ico kibazo gishika kure. Hamwe urwo rubanza borutsinda, abarushingishije bizigiye ko vyozana akarusho ku bakora mu cayi muri Kenya." Ikinyamateka ca vuba ca Finlays 1750 cashimikiye ku bikorwa vyayo muri Kenya. Umukuru w'iyo kompanyi Guy Chambers yakibwiye ati: ''Turemera ko vyose bitera ngo de kandi ko hama hari ivyo gukora neza gusumba. "Ariko abatunegura rimwe na rimwe barirengagiza urugero rw'utwigoro twagize mu gufasha ab'aho dukorera." Mw'itangazo umuvugizi yagize ati: ''James Finlays [Kenya] Ltd  yiyemeje kwiregura ku birego vyose vyashikirijwe haba muri sentare nkuru ya Nairobi canke iya All Sheriff Personal Injury." Iyo kompanyi ivuga ko ibikorwa vyayo vyo kurima no guhingura icayi muri Kericho na Bomet birimwo abakozi ibihumbi 8 n'ubundi buzi bushamikiye ku cayi vyose ''bitanga inyungu ifadika muri ako karere". Iryo tangazo rirabandanya riti: "Twama turondera gushika ku rugero rwo hejuru rwo kwitaho amagara, umutekano n'ineza y'abantu bose dukorana. "Dufise ingingo twashizeho kuva kera zijanye n'amagara n'umutekano aho hose dufise ibikorwa kw'isi, harimwo no muri Kenya." Mu myaka ya 1980, imyiyerekano yarabaye hanze y'ahariko harabera inama rusangi ya buri mwaka ya Finlays i Glasgow ku buryo bwo gukoramwo mu mirima yayo y'icayi mu Buhindi. Umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano mu 1984 yari Roger Jeffery, ubu akaba ari umwigisha muri Kaminuza ya Edinburgh mu gisata c'ivyigwa vya poritike. Yavuze ati: "Uwurongoye iyo kompanyi ico gihe yavuze ko turi abantu bahiga isoko hose, tuja ahantu hose turondera kuronka inyungu ku banyamitahe bacu kandi avuga ata kivyerekana na kimwe ashize ahabona ko ari abakoresha beza kandi ko abantu baronkera akarusho mu bikorwa vyabo." Agira ico avuze ko urwo rubanza rw'ubu, Prof Jeffrey yavuze ati: "Uvyihweje neza muri rusangi, wokwemera ko kurima icayi ari igikorwa kibangamye,  kandi ntibashobora gutangura guha abakozi babo imishahara nk'iyitangwa i Buraya, ariko nemera ko bashobora gusumvya  uko biri ubu."

column2: India: Umukoresha yanebaguwe ku ciyumviro co gukora amasaha 18 ku musi
column3: Umukuru w'ikompanyi imwe mu Buhindi yanebaguwe inyuma yo kuvuga ko abakozi bashasha mu kazi akari ko kose bategerezwa gukora amasaha 18 mu myaka yabo ya mbere ine canke itanu bakironka akazi. Shantanu Deshpande, yatanguje kompanyi yo kumwa ya Bombay Shaving Company, asaba abakozi bakiri bato "gukunda akazi" no kutaguma bidoga nk'uko yavyanditse ku mbuga hwaniro. Abantu bashavuye banditse ku mbuga hwaniro bamwagiriza gukokeza "umuco w'akazi k'uburozi". Ubuhindi bufise amategeko genga akazi akaze cane, ariko abaharanira agateka k'abakozi bavuga ko abategetsi bakeneye gushiramwo inguvu nyinshi kugira ashirwe mu ngiro. Mu 2020, umwe mu batanguje ikompanyi ya Infosys yaranebaguwe cane aho yavuga ko abahindi bategerezwa bakora amasaha 64 buri ndwi mu myaka ibiri canke itatu mu ntumbero yo kuzibira igihengeri c'ubutunzi catewe n'iyugaranwa rivuye kuri coronavirus. Urugero rw'icizere c'abakozi rwa LinkedIn mu 2020 ruvuga ko abakozi babigize umwuga babiri  kuri batanu mu Buhindi baramaze kugira ikibazo co kugira umutima uhagaze n'umwitwarariko. Ku rubuga rwa LinkedIn ku musi wa kabiri, Deshpande   yavuze ko "hakiri kare" ku bakiri bato kumenya ingene bokwifata hagati y'akazi n'ubuzima igihe ari ho bagitangura akazi. Umwe mubakoresha urubuga rwa Twitter yavuze ko Deshpande yariko arashigikira "umuco w'akazi k'uburozi" igihe  "vyari vyabaye ibisanzwe ko amakompany menhsi agitangura yirukana abantu benshi." Uwundi wo kuri Twitter nyene yavuze ko Deshpande atigeze avuga ko "yoriha amahera y'agasunuzo" abantu bakoze amasaha menshi. Yagize ati:"Amakompanyi afise intumbero yo kurya imitsi abantu bakora amasaha menshi. Kenshi na kenshi bigatuma baruha kare bakiri bato, bigatuma bashira mu kaga akazi kabo." Kubera inebagurwa ryakwiye hose kubera ivyo yanditse, Deshpande yongeyeko ati:" Urwo rwanko rwose ruvuye ku masaha 18 y'akazi?" Yongeyeko ko abo biyumvira ku muco wo gukora muri kompanyi yiwe bahawe ikaze kubiyaga n'abakozi biwe. Ivyo Deshpande yavuze vyakurikiye igihe ijambo "Hagarika mu mutekano" ryakwiragira ku mbuga hwaniro. Iryo jambo risigura gukora ivyo ujejwe gusa ata kindi urengejeko. Ryatangujwe muri video y'umunyamerika ari ku rubuga rwa TikTok ahanura "akazi si ubuzima bwawe". Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Perisha Kudhail yanditse ko iryo sekeza rishobora kuba ryatanguriye mu Bushinwa , aho ijambo ubu ryabujijwe gukoreshwa #tangping risigura "ryama urampije" ryakoreshejwe mu kwiyamiriza umuco wo gukoreshwa amasaha menshi.

column2: Amatora mu Burundi: Batandatu ku ndwi batanguye imyiyamamazo
column3: Uno munsi abazokwitoza mu matora ategekanijwe ku wa 20 z'ukwa gatanu, niho batanguza ibikorwa vy'imyiyamamazo mu mihingo itangukanye y'igihugu. Mu bakandida indwi bazokwitoza ku rwego rw'umukuru w'igihugu batandatu muri bo bashoboye gutanguza ibikorwa vyo kwiyamamaza, umwe akaba amenyesha ko azotangura kwiyamamaza ejo ku wa kabiri. Evariste Ndayishimiye azokwitoza kw'izina ry'mugambwe CNDD-FDD yugururiye ibikorwa vyiwe muri komine Bugendana y'intara ya Gitega asanzwe avukamwo, imigambwe ishika kuri 27 yahisemwo gushigikira uwo mugambwe ikaba yari yagiye kumushigikira. Ku ruhanderwiwe, Agathon Rwasa azokwitoza kw'izina ry'mugambwe CNL yatanguriye ibikorwa vyiwe ku kibuga ca Muremera ku mugwa mukuru w'intara ya Ngozi nawe nyene asanzwe avukamwo. Leonce Ngendakumana azokwitoza kw'izina ry'umugambwe Frodebu hamwe na Dieudonné Nahimana azokwitoza kugiti ciwe batanguriye ibikorwa vyabo mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, muri Karitiye Kinama kuruhande rwa Frodebu hamwe no muri komine Muhakuri kuri Bwana Nahimana. Domitien Ndayizeye azoserukira urunani Kira Burundi yatanguje ibikorwa vyiwe mu ntara ya Muramvya, mu gihe Gaston Sindimwo azoserukira umugambwe Uprona yatanguriye imyiyamamazo yiwe muntara ya Mwaro. Uwitashoboye kwugurura ibikorwa vyiwe uno munsi ni Francis Rohero avuga ko azovyugurura ejo ku wa kabiri. N'aho ivyo bikorwa vyashoboye gutangura, hari ibibazo vyagiye vyibonekeza irya n'ino, vyagenda bibuza abanywwanyi b'abiyamamaza gukomeza ingendo zabo. Abo ni nk'abanywanyi ba CNL bari bafashe ibarabara rya Gitega - Ngozi bavuga ko bankiwe kubandanya urugendo rwabo bageze ahitwa Bitare muri komine Bugendana hariko habera ibirori vya CNDD-FDD, iyindi nzira bari gucamwo nayo basanga ikiraro cabomotse. Bivugwa ko ku mugwa mukuru w'intara ya Kayanza gushika mu masaha icenda hari hakirengana amamodokari menshi yo mu bwoko bwa Fuso yuzuye abanywanyi b'uwo mugambwe aja i Ngozi kubera ivyo bibazo. Eka n'imodoka harimwo iyitwaye Agathon Rwasa azokwitoza kw'izina ry'uwo mugambwe, zagize ikibazo zigeze muri komine Matongo y'intara ya Kayanza, aho basanze ikamyo itwara igitoro yari yakikamye mw'ibarabara. Vyabaye ngombwa ko abanyagihugu bafasha mu kumucira inzira kugira ngo ashobore kurengana. Haravugwa kandi n'isanganya ry'imodoka  yari itwaye ivyuma vyongereza amajwi vy'umugambwe CNDD-FDD  yagize isanganya ivuye i Ngozi ija i Bugendana, bikavugwa ko hoba hari abantu babiri bahasize ubuzima,n'abandi bakomeretse. Iyo myiyamamazo yatanguye ikazobandanya gushika ku wa 17 z'ukwa gatanu hasigaye iminsi itatu ngo amatora nyezina abe.

column2: South Korea: Kompanyi y'amata yasavye imbazi kubera yerekanye abagore nk'inka
column3: Kompanyi ya mbere nini y'amata muri Korea y'Epfo vyabaye ngombwa ko isaba imbabazi kubera video yo kwamamaza (publicité, advert) yerekana abagore nk'inka. Iyo video ya Seoul Milk yerekana umugabo ariko afata rwihishwa amashusho y'abagore bari mu murima, mu nyuma baca bahinduka inka. Imaze kunegurwa cane, iyo kompanyi yaciye ivana iyo publicité kuri YouTube, ariko kuva ico gihe imaze guhererekanywa cane inyuma yo gusubizwa  ku mbuga n'abakoresha internet. Bamwe bagereranije kandi inyifato y'uwo mugabo na "molka", ingeso itemewe yo gufata amashusho abantu rwihishwa. Ishami rya Seoul Milk, Seoul Dairy Cooperative ryavuze mu mbabazi ryashize kuri internet riti: "Turasavye imbabazi bivuye ku mutima ku muntu wese yababajwe n'iyo publicité y'amata yasohotse itariki 29 mu kwezi guheze". "Twemera ko iki kibazo gikomeye kandi tozokwisuzuma, hanyuma turushirizeho kwiyubara kugira ibintu nk'ibi ntibisubire gushika muri kazoza. Turicishije bugufi mu gusaba imbabazi". Iyo video itangura yerekana umugabo afise camera ariko yitembereza mu gahinga. Ijwi ry'umugabo ryumvikana rivuga ngo: "Amaherezo twashoboye kubafata amashusho na camera mu kibanza ciza cane". Aho haca hakurikira uwo mugabo yinyegeje mu bisaka, ariko afata amashusho rwihishwa umugwi w'abagore bariko baranywa amazi mu mugezi bongera bagira yoga. Hagera aho uwo mugabo ahonyora atabishaka kw'ishami ry'igiti, abo bagore bagaca bikanga buno nyene bagaca bahinduka inka. Iyo publicité irangizwa n'aya majambo: "Amazi meza, indya nziza, amata ya Seoul Milk ni  100%. Amata atagira akanenge, avuye mw'iraro ritagira akanenge mu murima uteye igomwe wa Cheongyang." Iyo publicité/advert yatumye haba impari zikomeye mu gihugu ku bijanye n'ivangura n'ibindi bibazo bishingiye ku bitsina ariko ibineguro ntivyagarukiye ku kwerekana abagore nk'inka gusa. Bamwe barerekanye amakenga yo kuba umugabo afata rwishishwa amashusho y'abagore, mu gihe ivyaha vyo gufata amashusho rwishishwa vyagwiriye cane muri Korea y'Epfo muri iyi myaka. Molka, bisigura "camera yinyegeje", ubu yabaye ikibazo kidasanzwe ku bagore muri Korea y'Epfo. Si ubwa mbere Seoul Milk ivugwa mu binyamakuru kubera imvo zitari nziza. Mu 2003, iyo kompanyi yatunganije agakino aho abanyamideri bari gusa basukanako ikivuguto   (yoghurt). Umukuru w'igisata co kwamamaza muri Seoul Milk hamwe n'abagize uruhara muri ako gakino baratangishijwe ihadabu kubera kwerekana ibiterasoni.

column2: Abarokotse kanseri ‘barakarirwa n’indwara z’umutima’
column3: Hari icigwa giherutse kwerekana ko abarenga umwe kw'icumi mu barwayi ba kanseri baruhira gupfa bahitanywe n'indwara z'umutima hamwe n'ukuziba kw'imitsi, gusumba uko bicwa n'iyo ndwara. Ikinyamakuru European Heart Journal candika ku vyerekeye indwara z'umutima cakoze icigwa ku barwayi imiliyoni zitatu muri Amerika, barwaye ubwoko 28 butandukanye bwa kanseri, mu kiringo c'imyaka irenga 40. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko kubona ibitigiri vy'abarwaye kanseri vyiyongera bivuga ko bokwitwararikwa cane gusumba kugira ntibandure indwara z'umutima zifatira mu bwonko. Abahinga b'abongereza bavuga ko abaganga bakwiye kubimenya gusumba bagakurikirana abarwayi uko bikwiye. Mu barwayi imiliyoni zirenga zitatu bagizweko ubushakashatsi, ibice 38% nibo bahitanywe na kanseri abandi 11% nabo bahitanwa n'indwara z'umutima zifatira mu bwonko (AVC) - muri bo, bitatu vya bine bikaba vyavuye kuri iyo ndwara y'umutima. Igitigiri c'abarwaye kanseri bapfa bahitanywe na AVC cari kinini cane mu bantu barwaye indwara z'amafyigo, imihogo, udusaho tw'intangangabo, igitereko, amara n'amabere. Ku mwaka wa mbere, ivyo bishobora gutumwa n'ingaruka z'imiti ya kanseri canke ibipimo vya radiyo mu mibiri y'abantu. Ico cigwa kivuga ko abarwayi ba kanseri "bagumye babangamirwa gusumba" abantu basanzwe. Muganga Nicholas Zaorsky, umuhinga mu kuvura indwara za kanseri mu kigo Penn State Cancer Institute kijejwe kvura iyo ndwara niwe yari arongoye ico cigwa. Avuga ko iyo umuntu amenye ko ashobora kubangamirwa n'iyo ndwara bishobora gutuma abaho igihe kirekire. "Mu gihe abarwayi ba kanseri bomenya ko bashobora kubangamirwa gusumba bishobora kubatuma bafata ingendo y'ukwinengesera ishobora gutuma batandura AVC, ariko kandi ishobora gutuma batongera kurwara kanseri". Naho Martin Ledwick wo mu kigo Cancer Research UK kijejwe ubushakashatsi mu Bwongereza avuga ati: "Abaganga bategerezwa kumenya ibiri muri buno bushakashatsi busaba ko abarwayi bakeneye gukurikiranwa gusumba inyuma y'ugufata imiti, kugira barabe ntibahave bandura indwara z'imitima". "Hagati aho, ico cigwa ntikitubwira igituma abarwayi bamwe bamwe ba kanseri bashobora guhitanwa n'izo ndwara z'imitima". "Kuri bamwe, bishobora kuba ari ingaruka z'ukuvura iyo ndwara - ibipimo vya radiyo mu gikiriza n'imiti imwe imwe bishobora gutuma bafatwa n'indwara z'umutima. "Hagati aho, hari ubwoko bwa kanseri bwakozweko amatohoza buboneka ko bufatanya  n'imibereho y'abantu mu gutera indwara z'imitima - nk'akarorero ubuvyibuhe burenze n'itabi, navyo bishobora gutuma kanseri yiyongera. "Ni naco gituma ari nkererwa ko umwe umwe wese yokwitaho imibereho yiwe yotuma agira amagara meza".

column2: Eritrea ‘yigaruriye ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyegukira katolika’
column3: Amakuru ashikira BBC igisata c'ururimi rwa Tigrinya, amenyesha ko leta y'igihugu ca Eritrea yategetse Ekleziya Katolika gushikiriza ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyose bisanzwe vyegukira iryo dini. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, abategetsi basavye abarongoye ivyo bigo  gutera igikumu ku rwandiko rwemeza ko babishikirije. Ariko abarongoye ivyo bigo nka bose baranse gushira umukono kuri urwo rwandiko, basaba ahubwo ko bovugana n'abarongoye iryo shengero. Inyuma y'aho, abajejwe umutekano bategetse abakozi bavyo gusohoka, baca baravyugara. Nta wuzi igituma ubutegetsi bwa Eritrea bufashe iyo ngingo. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane uno mwaka, abasenyeri ba Ekleziya Katolika muri Eritrea barasavye ko hotanguzwa umugambi w'ukunywanisha mu gihugu, ivyotuma abanyagihugu bose batunganirwa. Mu rwandiko rw'impapuro 30 rwanditswe n'abo basenyeri inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro hagati y'ico gihugu na Ethiopia, bamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko abanyagihugu bonywanishwa kugira ngo igihugu gikire. Basavye ubutegetsi ko bwogira impinduka zotuma abanyagihugu batipfuza guhunga igihugu.

column2: Burundi - Ingoma: Reta yahagaritse abavuzi b'ingama b'umugwi Amagaba mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu
column3: Ubushikiranganji bujejwe akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, urwaruka, inkino hamwe n'akaranga bwahagaritse abatimbo b'umugwo Amagaba ikiringo c'amezi atandatu bagirizwa kuvuza ingoma bahonyanze amategeko azigenga. Abo bavuzi b'ingama canke abatimbo bagirizwa kurenga kw'itegeko ryo ku wa 20 ukwezi kwa cumi mu 2017 rigena uko ingoma zivuzwa haba mu Burundi canke mu makungu. Mu ngingo y'ubwo bushikiranganji bugira buti: "Twishimikije ko dutegerezwa kugikingira no kubungabunga akaranga k'Uburundi, duhagaritse mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu abavuzi b'ingoma  bo mu mugwi Amagaba mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu. "Abo batimbo bavugije bongera batamba ingoma bahonyanze akaranga k'abarundi." Muri ico kiringo, nta muntu n'umwe wo mri abo batumbo azoba afise uburenganzira bwo kuja mu biteramo vy'akaranga canke kuja mu wundi mugwi canke abantu berekana akaranga k'abarundi. Ku musi wa mbere itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa kabiri mu 2022, igihe hariko harugururwa igiteramo ca Buja Sans Tabou, abavuzi b'ingoma b'wumugwi Amagaba bagaragaye bavuza ingoma bambaye amakoti n'amakaruvati. Iyo nyifato ikaba yarateye impari ku mbuga hwaniro, aho bamwe babitera ivyatsi abandi bavuga ko ari ibisanzwe kuko imico igenda ihindagurika uko imisi igenda irahera. Mw'itangazo Amagaba yasohoye itangazo aho bavuga ko bakiriye nkama ibihano bafatiwe. Bagira bati: "Kubwo abatimbo b'Amagaba, turakiriye nkana igihano ubushikiranganji bwadufatiye kw'ikosa ryadushikiye ryanatirimukije abatari bake n'aho atari yo ntumbero yacu." Inyuma y'umusi umwe igiteramo Buja Sans Tabou gitanguye, ubushikiranganji bujejwe akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, inkino hamwe n'akaranga bwaciye bufata ingingo yo kugihagarika kubera ivyo vyabaye.

column2: Ukraine: 'ntihagire ikindi mugurira muri Russia kiretse umwavu n’ingano' - niko US igabisha Africa
column3: Uwuserukira Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mw’ishirahamwe ONU  yaragendeye ibihugu vya Afrika, kimwe mu vya mugenza, kwari ukugabisha ko bitohirahira ngo bigurire ikintu kindi mu Burusiya kiretse intete n’umwavu, anagabisha ko bishobora gufatirwa ibihano. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru i Kampala muri Uganda, Linda Thomas-Greenfield yavuze ati:  “Uburusiya bwama buvuga ngo ibihano bwafatiwe ku mfungurwa no ku bindi bifitaniye isano n’uburimyi vyatumye ibiciro biduga mu bihugu bitari bike. [...] Nagomba kumenyesha ko ata bihano twafatiwe ibintu ivyo ari vyo vyose vy’uburimyi biva mu Burusiya. “Uburusiya burashobora gushora hanze ibidandazwa vyabwo vyo mu gisata c’uburimyi, harimwo umwavu n’ingano, kandi n’ibindi bihugu birashobora kubigura”. “Nayo ku bihano vyafatiwe Uburusiya”, niko Linda Thomas-Greenfield abandanya avuga, “nk’akarorero ku bitoro, mu gihe igihugu cofata ingingo yo gukorana n’Uburusiya mu bisata bwafatiwemwo ibihano, aho coba gihonyanze ibi bihano[…].  Aha rero tugabisha ibihugu ko bitohirahira ngo birenge kuri ibi bihano”. Ibihugu hafi vyose vya Afrika bishima kutegamira kuri Ukraine muri ino ntambara yayo n’Uburusiya. Ibi mu bisanzwe bisigurwa n’ukutagirira icizere Uburengero, imyaka vyamaze mu bukoloni, be n’impuhwe z’incabwenge mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika zize mu Burusiya. Aho nyene, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika ni abakiriya bakomeye b’intete za Ukraine, bakaba bahanzwe n’ikibazo c’ubukene bw’imfungurwa kigenda ciyongera. Ni mu gihe ku rubuga, intambara zibandanya ziha inkumbi muri Ukraine. Mu turere tw’intara ya Donetsk tugenzurwa na Ukraine, abasivire batanu baraye bishwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya, nk’uko bivugwa n’umukuru wa gisirikare muri Donetsk Pavel Kirilenko. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Telegram ati: "Kw’igenekerezo rya 5 Myandagaro (5), Abarusiya bishe abasivire batanu ba Donbass. Abandi 14 barakomeretse”. Ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko hari igice kigira kabiri c’imfashanyo Amerika iha Ukraine gifise agaciro k’umuriyaridi umwe cimirije gutangwa. Isoko ryabwiye Reuters ko ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu wa Amerika mu ndwi iza - ari nko ku wa mbere – bizotangaza iyindi mfashanyo ingana n’umuriyaridi w’amadorari y’abanyamerika izorungikirwa Ukraine. Muri ino mfashanyo harimwo ibisasu vya za muzinga zitera ibisasu vyinshi, zizwi nka HIMARS, ibirwanisho vyo gukorora indege vyo mu bwoko bwa NASAMS, hamwe n’ibimodoka ntamenwa vyo m ugisata c’ubuvuzi, bizwi nka 50 M113. Perezida Joe Biden ntaratera igikumu kuri uru rupapuro, bikaba bishoboka ko ibigize iyi mfashanyo, ibi navyo bikaba ari ibitigiri hamwe n’ubwoko bw’ibirwanisho, bishobora guhinduka. Mu gihe Biden yoterako igikumu, iyi yoba ari yo mfashanyo nini cane itangiwe icarimwe ihabwa Ukraine kuva intambara itanguye. Amerika imaze kurungikira Ukraine imfashanyo y’agaciro k’imiriyaridi 8.8 igizwe n’ibirwanisho n’ibindi vya nkenerwa. Maison Blanche/White House yanse kugira ico ishikirije ku vyerekeye iyi mfashanyo yimirije.

column2: Imvo n'Imvano ku musi mukuru wa Noheli abakristu kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu
column3: Ndabaramukije nongera ndabaha n'ikaze mu kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano co kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 25 ukwezi kwa 12 mu 2021. Imvo n'Imvano y'uyu musi yerekeye umusi mukuru wa Noheli, aho abakristu hirya no hino kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu. Buri mwaka, abemera Kristu imiliyoni n'imiliyoni hirya no hino kw'isi barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli. Noheli y'uyu mwaka, ibaye mu gihe ikiza Covid kibandanya kuvugwa mu bihugu bitandukanye kw'isi no mu gihe haherutse kugaragara ubundi bwoko bita Omicron bwandukira ku buryo bwihuta. Muri kino kiganiro, twahisemo guha umwanya abakunzi b'Imvo n'Imvano bifuje kutubwira uko bariko barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli, ari na ko tugenda tubashikiriza uturirimbo dutandukanye two guhimbaza uyu musi. None Noheli yiteguriwe gute muri iyi misi ikiza coronavirus cakwiragiye kw'isi? Ababa mu karere k'ibiyaga binini n'abari mu bindi bihugu eka mbere n'abari mu makambi y'impunzi bariko bayihimbaza gute? Inyishu ni muri kino kiganiro. Mugiye kuba hamwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo, muri studios za BBC i Nairobi.

column2: Passports za Covid: Zikora gute kw'isi?
column3: Uko iminsi ihera, niko ibihugu biba vyinshi mu kwiyumvira gukoresha urupapuro rw'inzira, murekarengane, canke passeport ya Covid, nk'uburyo bwo kwugururira no kurekura abantu ngo batembere. Bene izo passeports zikunze kuboneka umuntu aciye kuri app (application) yo kuri telefone ngendanwa yiwe  canke hamwe hamwe hakanatangwa iz'impapuro zisanzwe. Ibihugu bimwe bimwe biramaze gushiraho passeports zavyo za Covid zemerera abantu kuja mu manza canke ibirori bihuriramwo abantu benshi. Ariko mu gihe hari ibihugu bikiri inyuma cane mu bijanye no gutanga incanco, hari ubwoba ko bimwe bizosigara inyuma.  Aha turaraba ingene ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyatunganije ikibazo c'ama passeports y'urucanco n'ibijanye nazo. Gushika ubu, "ibibanza vy'urugero runini rwo gushobora kwandura" nk'inzu z'ubutambiro ntibisaba icemeza ko watewe urucanco. Ariko, umushikiranganji wa mbere Boris Johnson yatangaje imigambi y'uko "kuba warakwije incanco bizoba ngombwa kugira winjire mu mazu y'ubutambiro n'ibindi bibanza bihuriramwo abantu benshi cane" kuva mu mpera z'ukwezi kw'icenda. Hisunzwe izo ngingo nshasha, abantu bazokwerekana ko bakwije incanco bakoresheje ikimenyetso bahabwa na app y'ikigo NHS. Ico kimenyetso ca NHS - canke ikimeze nk'ico mu bindi bice vy'Ubwongereza (UK) - kizotuma abantu bakuze bakwije  incanco badasabwa kwikumira iyo bagarutse bava mu bihugu biri ku rutonde rw'ibisaba abantu kuguma ukwa wenyene iminsi cumi no kwipimisha corona kabiri muri ico kiringo (amber-list countries). Ariko n'ubwo boba bafise ico kimenyetso, bazotegerezwa guca baguma ukwabonyene i muhira iwabo bashitse mu Bwongereza mu gihe  bavuye mu Bufaransa. Ku bwa reta, ibihugu birenga 30 birimwo Ubugiriki na Espagne ubu biremera ico kimenyetso ariko abagifise bategerezwa kubanza kuraba neza amategeko yo kwinjira iyo bagomba kuja imbere yo gufatisha itike kandi bakaguma basuzuma imbere yo gufata urugendo. Passeport y'urucanco y'ibihugu vya Buraya igiye gushirwaho mu bihugu 27 bigize iryo shirahamwe - hongeweko Ubuswise , Islande, Norvège na Liechtenstein. Abanyagihugu bo muri ivyo bihugu bashobora gukura iyo passport kuri app canke bakaronka iy'urupapuro - ata mafaranga batanze. Ishobora kuronkwa kandi n'abanyamahanga bafise uburenganzira bwemewe n'amategeko bwo kuba muri ivyo bihugu. Kubera Ubwongereza butakiri muri iryo shirahamwe, iyo passeport nta Bongereza benshi bashobora kuyironka. Urwo rupapuro rushobora gutangwa iyo umuntu yaronse urucanco, aheruka gupimwa bagasanga nta Covid afise canke aheruka gukira uwo mugera. Uwariwe wese afise urwo rupapuro  ubundi ntaheza ngo asubire gupimwa canke ngo ashirwe ukwa wenyene iyo ajabutse urubibe mu bihugu bigize EU. Ibindi bihugu bigize ishirahamwe navyo birafise impapuro zavyo bwite zihabwa abaronse urucanco. Abategetsi bashizeho urupapuro ruzoha uburenganzira abantu bwo kwinjira mu mazu y'uburiro, ubunywero, indege hamwe n'amatereni (gariyamoshi). Gushika ubu, ibibanza bihuriramwo abantu barenga 50 vyaratanguye gusaba icemeza ko waronse urucanco canke urupapuro rw'uko ata Covid bagusanganye mu bipimo. Iyo murekarengane (pass) izosabwa abantu bose bakuze kuva mu kwezi kw'icumi ariko harimwo n'abana barenza imyaka 12 kuva itariki 30 z'ukwezi kw'icenda. Kugira uronke urwo rupapuro, abantu bategerezwa kwerekana ko bakwije incanco, ko bapimwe mu minsi mike iheze bagasanga nta mugera bafise canke ko baherutse gukira umugera. Kw'itariki 24 ukwezi kw'indwi, hafi abantu ibihumbi 160 baragize imyiyerekano mu gihugu biyamiririza iyo murekarengane ya Covid n'ingingo y'uko abakozi bo kwa muganga bategerezwa guterwa incanco. Israel yashizeho murekarengane y'urucanco mu ntango z'uyu mwaka. Yasaba abantu kwerekana icemeza ko baronse incanco canke ko barwaye umugera mu minsi ya vuba. Iyo murekarengane yatumye ibitigiri vy'abiteza incanco vyiyongera, cane cane mu bakiri bato. Ibiharuro vy'abandura bimaze kugabanuka, abategetsi baciye bafata ingingo yo kuvanaho iyo ndinganizo. Ariko ubu reta yatangaje imigambi yo kuyisubizaho mu gihe ibiharuro vy'abandura vyasubiye kuduga. Indinganizo nshasha izotuma abantu barenza imyaka 12 baronse incanco, baherutse gukira Covid canke bapimwe ntibatorwe uwo mugera, bashobora kuja mu manza canke ibirori vy'abantu benshi no kwinjira ibibanza bimwe bimwe bigenewe bose, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Times of Israel. Iyo murekarengane nshasha yari gutangura gukoreshwa kuva itariki 29 z'ukwezi kw'indwi. Iyo murekarengane izokora ku biteramo vy'akaranga n'inkino, inzu zo kunonoreramwo imitsi (gym), inzu z'uburiro, ahabera amanama (conference), ahagenderwa na ba mukerarugendo hamwe n'ibibanza vy'amasengesho. Ubushinwa bwashizeho indinganizo ya QR code mu mwaka uheze ishira abantu mu migwi hakoreshejwe amabara atandukanye. Ibara ry'urwatsi rubisi rirekurira abantu gutembera ata na hamwe bimiriwe, mu gihe umuntu afise ibara ry'umuhondo ashobora gusabwa kuguma i muhira mu kiringo c'iminsi indwi. Izo QR codes ziba zirimwo amakuru ku rugero rwagutse hamwe n'ayatangwa n'abazikoresha ubwabo. Vyinshi mu bibanza bigenewe uwariwe wese mu Bushinwa birasaba abantu kwerekana QR yabo kugira bemererwe kwinjira. Mu kwezi kwa gatatu Ubushinwa bwashizeho urupapuro rw'amagara rwo mu buhinga bwa none (digital) rwerekana niba uwurufise yaricandagishije canke atarabikora hamwe n'icavuye mu bipimo. Urwo rupapuro n'abanyamahanga bashobora kururonka mu Bushinwa co kimwe n'Abashinwa. Hizigiwe ko Abashinwa bazoshobora kurukoresha nka murekarengane y'urucanco mu bindi bihugu muri kazoza. Ntiharamenyekana ibihugu Ubushinwa buriko buravugana navyo kugirango urwo rupapuro rwabwo rwemerwe. Ibihugu vyinshi vyahisemwo kudashiraho murekarengane y'urucanco. Mu kwezi kwa kane, ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu (White House/Maisom Blanche) vyamenyesheje ko hatazoshirwaho passeport y'urucanco ku rwego rw'igihugu, bivuga ko uburenganzira bw'abanyagihugu ku mabanga y'ubuzima bwabo butegerezwa gukingirwa. Ariko hari ama reta ane afise apps z'urucanco zikora, nk'uko vyerekanwa na MIT Technology Review. Ariko hari n'ayandi ma reta yahisemwo gushiraho ingingo zayo zo kugerageza kuduza urugero rw'abateza urucanco. California izosaba abakozi ba reta bose hamwe n'abakozi bitaho amagara y'abantu  kwerekana ikigaragaza ko batewe urucanco canke bace bapimwa buri ndwi guhera mu kwezi kuza. Igisagara ca New York kizokurikiza ingingo isa n'iyo kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda hagati mu gusaba abakozi b'igisagara - harimwo abaporisi n'abigisha - kwiteza urucanco canke gupimwa buri ndwi. Gushika ubu, abantu batewe urucanco muri Australia barafise urupauro rwo mu buhinga bwa none (digital) mu materefone yabo ariko nta burenganzira bujanye narwo. Umushikiranganji w'ico gihugu ajejwe ubukerarugendo Dan Tehan yavuze ko passeport y'urucanco ishobora guha abantu ''uburenganzira bwo gushobora gusohoka imbibe iyo hari ingingo zo kwiyugarana canke iyo hari ibice vy'intara biri mu ngingo zo kwiyugarana, kubera icaduka c'indwara". Yanavuze ko kwongera ukwishira no kwizana abatewe urucanco bishobora gutuma abandi barwiteza.

column2: Sergio Aguero: Uyu yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Barcelona na Man City arakukurutse
column3: Sergio Aguero avuga ko yishimiye ivyo yashitseko mu mupira w'amaguru inyuma yo kwemera gufata iyi "ngingo igoye cane" yo gusezera muri uru rukino kubera ikibazo c'umutima. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 33 yarize igihe yatangaza iyi nkuru, hari haciye amezi atarenga atandatu yinjiye muri Barcelona. Mu rukino rwiwe rwa nyuma ku wa 30 z'ukwa cumi rwarangiye Barca inganya na Alaves 1-1, yavanywe mu kibuka ajanwa mu bitaro inyuma y'aho agiriye "ibibazo vyo mu gikiriza". Aguero ati: "Iyi ngingo mfashe, ndayifashe bivuye ku bibazo vy'amagara". Umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola ni umwe mu bantu bake bariko bakurikirana Aguero igihe atangaza iyi nkuru hafi y'ikibuga ca Barcelona, Nou Camp. Inyuma y'ibitsindo 427 yinjije mu nkino 786, Aguero vyamufashe umwanya kugira fiyate mu marira yari afise imbere y'uko atangura ikiganiro, hanyuma avuga ati: "Iki kiganiro ni ico kumenyesha ko nafashe ingingo yo guhagarika gukina umupira w'amaguru. Ni igihe kitoroshe. "Igihe bampima ubwa mbere kwa muganga, abaganga barampamagaye bambwira ko bishoboka cane ko ntazoshobora kubandanya nkina. Kuva ico gihe, naciye ntangura kwitegura ariko ntivyari vyoroshe. Umwe mu baganga yarambwiye amenya ati 'aho birarangiye'. "Ndashaka kubwira bose ko nakoze ibishoboka vyose. Natanguye kugira indoto zo gukina football mfise imyaka itanu nkaba ari ho natanguriye gukora ku mupira. Sinibaza ko nari gushika i Bulaya, rero nashaka gushimira cane uwo ari we wese ntaravye aho nakoreye imyimenyerezo. "Ndishimira ivyo nashitseko kandi ni igihamana ciza kubona ibi bimbayeko ubu bitambayeko imbere y'aha. Sinzi ikindindiriye mu buzima bw'imbere, ariko ndazi ko hari abantu benshi bankunda kandi banyipfuriza ineza". N'aho igihe amaze muri Barcelona kitamwereye, nta nkeka ko yabaye umwe mu basatirizi b'ibihangange mu kinjana ca 21. Yatanguriye mu murwi witwa Independiente wo muri Argentina, mu nyuma yimukira muri Atletico Madrid, aho yatsindiye ihiganwa rya Europa League mu 2010, yongera yinjiza ibitsindo 101 mu nkino 234. Ibi vyateye amero menshi Manchester City yahavuye itanga imiriyoni hafi  50 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira imuzane i Etihad Stadium (ikibuga ca Man City). Kuva ico gihe, yanditse izina mu murwi no mw'ihiganwa Premier League mu kiringo c'imyaka cumi yose yamaze mu Bwongereza. Aguero yavuye muri City mu ci riheze ari we mukinyi wa mbere yinjije ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi bose, aho yinjije  ibitsindo 260 mu nkino 390, harimwo 16 yatsinzemwo bitatu bitatu (ibizwi nka hat-tricks). Ni we mukinyi wa mbere mvamahanga muri Premier League yinjije ibitsindo vyinshi bigera kuri 184, akaba asumvya umufaransa Thierry Henry wa Arsenal ibitsindo icenda. Abahoze ari abasatirizi  Alan Shearer (260), Wayne Rooney (208) na Andrew Cole (187) ni bo bazwi ko bamaze gutsinda ibitsindo vyinshi muri iri higanwa. Ariko nta n'umwe muri bo anganya na Aguero urugero rw'iminota yinjirizako ibitsindo muri Premier League. Ibiharuro vyerekana ko yagiye yinjiza igitsindo uko iminota 107.9 iheze. Akurikirwa na Thierry Henry, aho azwi ko yinjije igitsindo uko iminota 121.8 iheze. Uyu munya Argentina kandi aribukwa cane muri Premier League mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2011-2012, igihe yinjiza  igitsindo mu misegonda ya nyuma mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Premier League catumye Manchester City  itsinda umurwi Queens Park Rangers, gica kiyiha igikombe ca mbere ca Premier League kuva mu 1968, igikombe yatwaye isumbije ibitsindo gusa umukeba wayo ruhebwa, Manchester United. Kuva ico gihe, Aguero yatsindiye ibikombe bitanu vya Premier League, igikombe kimwe ca FA, hamwe n'ibindi bitandatu vya League Cups muri ico gihe cose yamaze mu Bwongereza. Ubugenzi budasanzwe Aguero yari afitaniye  na Lionel Messi bwamutumye agira umunezero udasanzwe igihe yemererwa kuva muri Manchester City. Yari yashoboye kwereka umumenyereza wa City Pep Guardiola ko ari igihangange, na rirya mu ntango yari afise amakenga ko uyu musatirizi atari gushobora kujana n'ubuhinga yari azanye mu murwi, n'aho imvune zamubereye inzitizi mu mwaka wa nyuma i Etihad Stadium. Ariko, kuva yimukiye muri Barcelona ibintu vyatanguye nabi cane. Ibibazo vy'amafaranga vyari bihanze uyu murwi vyasigura ko wari ufise ingorane zo kudashobora kwakira abandi bakinyi, harimwo mbere na Aguero. Ni ibi bibazo nyene vyanatumye Messi asezera uyu murwi akimukira muri Paris St-Germain. Aguero amaze kwakirwa, yagize ibibazo vyo ku nyama ya kibizi, bituma adahonyoza ikirenge mu kibuga gushika mu kwezi kw'icumi. Igihe Barcelona itsindirwa ku kibuga cayo n'umukeba wayo ruhebwa, Real Madrid, Aguero yagiye kwinjiza igitsindo kimwe co kwihanagura amosozi ku munota wa nyuma, aha hari ku wa 24 z'ukwa cumi, haciye imisi itatu abona gutanguzwa mu kibuga. Ariko igihe Barcelona ihura na Alaves ku wa 30 z'ukwa cumi, Aguero yavanywe mu kibuga mbere biba ngombwa ko akorerwa "ibipimo vy'umutima", akaba yavuze ko yategerezwa gukurikiza impanuro y'abaganga ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe. Yavuze ko yategerezwa kumara imisi 90 ataco akora kugira arabe ingene bizomugendera, ico gihe hakaba hari amakuru yavuga ko bamusanganye ingorane z'umutima watera nabi, ibizwi nka arythmie cardiaque/cardiac arrhythmia. Gusa ingingo yiwe yitezwe gutangazwa muri ino ndwi, ishitse imbere y'igihe. Urukino rwa nyuma yakiniye umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina, La Albiceleste,  ni urwa Copa America, aho yinjiye asubiriye uwundi mukinyi, hari mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, Argentina ikaba yatsinze Ecuador/Equateur, biyituma ibandanya gushika itsindire iki gikombe, ubwa mbere inyuma y'imyaka 28 yose.

column2: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Coronavirus: Yoba ifitanye isano n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere?
column3: Muganga Leonard Nduwayo akorera mu Bufaransa arasubiza ikibazo ca Shema Olivier, abaza ati "mbe Covid-19 yoba ifitaniye isano n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere?"

column2: Abantu bakomakomeye Africa yabuze mu mwaka urangiye: abaperezida, abahoze ari abaperezira n'abandi
column3: Mu gihe umwaka waraye urangiye uwundi nawo ukaba utanguye, turabire hamwe bamwe mu bantu bakomeye bapfuye kuri uno mugabane wa Afrika. Turabe cumi muri aba bantu tutakiri kumwe. Mamma Sarah, nk'uko bamutazira, yagiye kumenyekana cane kw'isi igihe umwuzukuru wiwe Barack Obama abaye umukuru w'igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2009, ariko imbere y'aho, yari azwi cane mu karere yamukamwo mu burengero bwa Kenya aho yari yarongowe n'umugabo yari akuze cane nawe akiri umuyabaga - nk'uko imico n'imigenzo yabitegeka. Mu myaka mirongo, yari arongoye ikigo co gufasha kwigisha impfuvyi n'abakobwa, ikintu yiyumvamwo cane kubera we nyene ubwiwe atari azi gusoma. Mu 2014, ONU yaramuhaye agashimwe ku gikorwa ciwe. Barack Obama  yavuze ko kwitangira indero vyatanguriye ku bana biwe, ati: "N'ubwo atari nyina wiwe w'amaraso, Nyokuru yarareze dawe nk'umwana wiwe, kandi urukundo rwiwe ruri mu vyatumye dawe ashobora guhangana n'ingorane aritwara neza mw'ishure gushika aho aronka uburenganzira bwo kuja kwiga kw'ishure kaminuza ryo muri Amerika". Barack Obama yavuze ko mu buzima bwiwe, Sarah Obama yagiye abona impinduka zitari nke uko ibihe vyagenda "ariko ubutwari bwiwe  - kugira umutima rugabo, yiyemera, akunda ibikorwa, adatwarwa n'ibihuhusi hamwe n'ubugwaneza vyiwe - ntibwigeze buhungabana". Sarah Obama yapfuye ku wa  29 z'ukwa gatatu 2021 Urupfu rw'uyu yari umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania rwatangajwe mu kwa gatatu inyuma y'indwi zirenga zibiri zari ziheze ataboneka. Reta yatangaje ko yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima, ariko rero abakeba biwe bamwe bamwe ba poritike bavuze ko yari yanduye Covid-19. John Magufuli, uwakuriye mu muryango w'abarimyi, yagiye kuba umukuru w'igihugu mu 2015 akaba yari mu bategetsi bari bubashwe muri Afrika. Kw'izina ry'iritazirano nka Tingatinga (The Bulldozer), abamurwanya bamwagiriza ko yari umutegetsi yatwaza umukazo yarwanije ibinyamakuru, agatera ubwoba abatavuga rumwe nawe, yongera atuma abantu benshi bahitanwa na ca kiza ca coronavirus kubera yafashe minenerwe imigambi yo kukirwanya. Muri iki gisata, twatakaje kandi : Umukuru w'igihugu wa Tchad Idriss Déby, yiciwe ku rugamba, hamwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Côte d'Ivoire Hamed Bakayoko, yahitanywe na kanseri. Abahoze ari abakuru b'ibihugu vya Algeria - Abdelaziz Bouteflika, Madagascar - Didier Ratsiraka, Somalia - Ali Mahdi Mohamed na Chad - Hissène Habré, nabo nyene barapfuye. Icegera c'umukuru w'izinga rya Zanzibar Seif Sharif Hamad, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Zimbabwe Sibusiso Moyo hamwe n'umushikiranganji yari ajejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu Joel Biggie Matiza nabo bose barapfuye bahitanywe na  Covid-19. UMUNYAMUZIKI Alemayehu Eshete, 80 Uyu azwi nka Elvsi wa Ethiopia, Alemayehu yabaye rurangiranwa muri Ethiopia mu muziki wo mu mudiho wa jazz kuva mu myaka ya 1960 akaba yabandanije aryohera abantu gushika umwaka wanyuma w'ubuzima bwiwe. Kuva akiri muto, yari azwi cane mu gusubiramwo indirimbo za Elvis Presley, ariko mu 2008 yabwiye ikinyamakuru Guardian ko James Brown ari we yahavuye aba icitegererezo kuri we. Ati: "Nambara nk'umunyamerika, ndatereka imishatsi yanje, nkama ndirimba Jailhouse Rock na Teddy Bear - rimwe na rimwe twararirimba Strangers in the Night. Ariko kuva igihe ntanguriye kuririmba indirimbo z'iki amharic, abantu barankunze bimwe bidasanzwe". Alemayehu Eshete yapfuye ku wa 02 z'ukw'icenda, abanya Ethiopia bakimukunda cane. Muri iki gisata c'abanyatugenegene, twaratakaje kandi : umunyamuziki wa Afrika y'Epfo Sibongile Khumalo, yaririmvye kuva ku midiho ya jazz gushika ku midiho kama; umucuraranzi w'itarumbeta wa Afrika y'Epfo Jonas Gwangwa;  umuririmvyi w'indirimbo zihayagiza Imana n'umudiho wa jazz  Wambali Mkandawire; umwe mu banyamuziki ba Senegal bakomeye cane Thione Seck; umunyamuziki wa Cameroun  Wes Madiko; umunyamuziki w'umunyarwanda wo mu mudiho wa rap Jay Polly, yari yapfunzwe yagirizwa gutunga ibiyayuramutwe; umunya Namibia yaririmba mu mudiho wa hip-hop Kanibal hamwe n'umwe mu baririmvyi ba Algeria  bakunzwe cane Rabah Deriassa UMUHINGA mu kuremura ibihimba vy'umubiri Matolase Mtonga, 34 Nk'umwe mu bahinga ba Zambia mu vyo kubaga mu kuremura ibihimba vy'umubiri vyonionekaye  (chirurgie plastique/plastix surgery),  Mtonga yagiye kubona umuhamagaro wiwe igihe yariko aravura abarwayi bahiye, ico gihe akaba yari umunyeshure yiga ivy'ubuganga. Ishirahamwe ReSurge ryanditse riti: "Ni ukuri yari icitegererezo c'umugore w'akarorero, kandi yari mu nzira yo kuba umugore wa mbere muri Zambia yose w'umuhinga mu bijanye no kuremura ibihimb vy'umubiri vyononekaye. Uru ni uruhombo rukomeye cane, atari gusa kuri twebwe twari tumuzi, ariko kandi no kuri kazoza muri iki gisata, haba mu gihugu ciwe eka mbere no kw'isi yose". Mtonga yapfuye mu kwa cumi na kabiri haciye igihe gito avuye mu nama ya chirurgie plastique yari yabereye muri Amerika. Rwabaye urupfu rubabaje cane. Ubutumwa bwacishijwe kuri Facebook ni ubwo umugabo umwe yavuriye umugore wiwe mu myaka mike iheze, aho yanditse ati: "Dr Mtonga yageze kure akoresha amafaranga yiwe kugira agure ivyari bikenewe kugira ngo ashobore kuvuga umugore wanje, aho hose yashaka ko umugore wanje akira ukuboko kwiwe kw'iburyo n'intoke". Twatakaje kandi: Umwigisha wa kaminmuza wa Nigeria akongera akaba n'umuhinga mu bijanye n'imigera David Olufemi Olaleye hamwe na John Baptist Mukasa, umwe mu bahinga bake ba Uganda mu bijanye n'ukubaga imitsi, yari yiyemeje kwigisha abandi baganga ku nyungu za kazoza. Uyu munya Afrika y'Epfo yahanganye n'ubutegetsi bw'ivanguramoko bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yinjiye mw'ishengero rya Anglican  aratera imbere gushika aho aba umwirabure wa mbere abaye Musenyeri mukuru  wa Cape Town mu 1986  - haciye imyaka ibiri ahawe ka gashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel ku ruhara rwiwe mu kurwanya intwaro y'inkehwa z'abazungu. Kw'izina ry'iritazinaro rya The Arch, yahavuye agenwa kurongora umurwi wo kumenya ukuri n'ukurekuriranira inyuma y'aho Nelson Mandela atsindiye amatora ya mbere y'inyuma ya apartheid mu 1994. Nk'umuntu yafatwa nk'umuhanuzi muri Afrika y'Epfo, Tutu ntiyatinya kunegura bikomeye ubutegetsi bw'inyuma ya apartheid muri ico gihugu yataziriye The Rainbow Nation.  Tutu yapfuye mu kwezi guheze kwa cumi na kabiri, iyi ndwi yose ikaba iheze bariko baramwunamira, bikaba bitegekanijwe ko ashingurwa kuri uyu wa gatandatu. Twatagkaje kandi : FW de Klerk, umukuru w'igihugu wa nyuma w'ubutegetsi bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yasangiye agashimwe ka Nobel na Mandela mu 1993 kubera yafashije mu biganiro vyarangije ubutegetsi bwa apartheid. TB Joshua yapfuye ku wa 05 z'ukwa gatandatu. Ubutumwa bwacishijwe ku rubuga  rwa Facebook rw'uyu muvugabutumwa wa Nigeria  bwavuga buti: "Imana yisubije Umukozi wayo". Bwatumye imiriyoni n'imiriyoni y'abanywanyi b'ihsengero ryiwe kw'isi yose Synagogue Church of All Nation baja mu kigandaro. Uyu muvugabutumwa yari asanzwe afise abanyaporitike bo hejuru mu banywanyi biwe, yagiye kuba rurangiranwa kubera "ibitangaro" vyiwe, mbere akaba yatangaje ko yari afise ububasha bwo gukiza indwara z'ubwoko bwose, harimwo n'umugera wa SIDA. Muri iki gisatan yene twaratakaj: Umukardinali wa Cameroun Cardinal Christian Tumi, aho urupfu rwiwe rwashize hamwe mu mubabaro iki gihugu kirangwamwo indyane,  Alexandre José Maria dos Santos, umupatiri wa mbere w'umwirabure wa Mozambike yagiye kuba mu nyuma umu kardinali wa mbere w'ico gihugu, umutegetsi wo mw'idini rya Islam muri Tunisia  Hichem Djait hamwe n'umusenyeri mukuru wa Katorika muri Sudani y'Epfo Paulino Lukudu Loro. Abanonotsi ba Kenya baracitse intege bamaze kwumva ko mugenzi wabo yaciye umuhigo kw'isi yacumiswe imbugita gushika yitabe Imana mu kw'icumi. Umugabo wiwe, Ibrahim Rotich, avuga y'uko ata ruhara afise muri ubu bwicanyi. Tirop yaboneka ko yari agiye kuba umwirutsi rurangiranwa inyuma yo guca umuhigo ku birometero 10 ku ruhande rw'abagore mu kw'icenda, mbere akaba yaraserutse mu nkino za Olempike i Tokyo. Twatakaje kandi: Umunyonzi w'ikinga wa Eritrea Desiet Kidane, yapfuye agonzwe n'imodoka igihe yari mu myimenyerezo, umunya Senegal yahoze arongoye ishirahamwe ry'abanonotsi kw'isi (IAAF) Lamine Diack, umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wa Afrika y'Epfo Ryder Mofokeng yabaye kizigenza w'umurwi Kaizer Chiefs mu kiringo c'imyaka 11, hamwe n'umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Nigeria Yisa Sofoluwe, yari azwi mu murwi nserukiragihugu nka "Defence Minister" (umushikiranganji w'ukwivuna abansi). Uyu mwami w'Abazulu muri Afrika y'Epfo, yari umuntu akomeye cane yaharanira akaranga n'imico kama mu myaka 50 yose yari amaze ku butegetsi. Yari uwo mu muryango w'Umwami Cetshwayo, yayoboye Abazulu muri ya ntambara yabahuza n'igisirikare c'Ubwongereza mu 1879. N'aho uyu mugabo, se w'abana 28 yavyaye ku bagore batandatu, ata butegetsi bwa poritike bwite yari afise, yaserukira abafise ivyiyumviro vy'uko Afrika y'Epfo itiyigeze yibagira akahise kayo, n'aho yahindutse ikaba igihugu ca none. Umwe mu bagore biwe, umwamikazi Queen Mantfombi Dlamini-Zulu, yaramusubiriye mu kwa gatatu, ariko yaciye apfa haciye ukwezi kumwe gusa. Twatakaje kandi: Sulutani Sultan El-Hadj Ibrahim Mbombo Njoya w'umunya Cameroun, umwami w'abanyagihugu bo mu bwoko bw'aba Pedi muri Afrika y'Epfo, Victor Thulare III na Kefa Sagbadjou Glele, umwami w'aba Abomey muri Benin. Uyu mukinyi w'amareresi wo mu Misiri yamaze imyaka 50 akina amareresi. Yarakinye amareresi ateye ubwoba ariko kumbure yari azwi cane kandi akundirwa ubuhinga bwiwe bwo gutwenza. Kuri bamwe, izina rya El-Bably ryibutsa imyaka ya 1950 na 1960 igihe sinema yabica bigacika. Mu nyuma yahavuye amenyekana cane kuri televiziyo akina udukino mu mareresi yakunzwe cane mu buzima bwa buri muryango igihe cose ca Ramadani. Soheir El-Bably yapfuye k uwa 21 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe. Twatakaje kandi : Umunyarwenya w'umusomalia Ibrahim Ismail, azwi cane ku ritazirano rya  Soran, hamwe na Abdi Muridi Dhere uwundi munyarwenya w'umunyasomalia nyene. Uwundi umwe mu banyarwenya ba Nigeria rurangiranwa Baba Suwe na we nyene yarapfuye. Uyu yarwaniye ukwikukira kwa Zambia yapfuye mu kwa gatandatu, yari umwe mu bategetsi ba nyuma ba Afrika barwanije intwaro za gikoloni. Yavuga ko icipfuzo ciwe ari ukubona buri munya Zambia afise igi ku meza mu mfungurwa ziwe zo mu gitondo, agacupa k'amata - kandi buri munya Zambia akambara ibirato. Kw'izina ry'iritazirano rya KK, yarakunda kuvuza igitari, akaba yari umwigisha imbere y'uko yinjira mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ukwikukira, mbere akaba yari mu bantu bari bafashe mu mugongo utwigoro two kurandurana n'imizi ubutegetsi bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yongera afata mu mugongo imihari yo kwibohora muri Mozambike no muri Zimbabwe.

column2: Covid: Afrika y’Epfo ihamagarira abagabo kwicandagisha ku bwinshi
column3: Afrika y'Epfo itera akamo abagabo ko bokwitabira ku bwinshi igikorwa co kwicandagisha Covid kuko ibitigiri vyabo biri hasi ugereranije n'ivyabagore. Hafi ibice 60% vy'incaco nivyo bimaze guhabwa abagore, nk'uko bivugwa n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu kuri uwu wa gatanu mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ku  vyerekeye utwigoro twa reta two kurwanya iki kiza. Ibi bibaye mu gihe reta ifise intumbero yo kuzoba yacandaze n'imiburiburi ibice 70% vy'abanyagihugu b'ico gihugu gushika mu kw'icumi na kabiri. Nicholas Crisp, umutegetsi wo muri ubwo bushikiranganji, avuga ko kugira ngo bashike kuri iyo ntumbero, abantu imiriyoni 28 nibo bazotegerezwa kuba bamaze gucandagwa, mu gihe gushika ubu hamaze kwicandagisha imiriyoni zine gusa. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Joe Phaahla, ntarota atezura ingingo zafashwe mu number yo kuzibira ikwirakwira rya covid n'aho ibitigiri vy'abandura "biriko biragabanuka". Avuga ko urugero rw'ubwandu rukiri hejuru kandi ko ibitaro bigifise ibibazo kubera ubwinshi bw'abanduye. Afrika y'Epfo gushika ubu imaze kugira abantu 2.568.511 banduye ikiza karanda ca Covid, kikaba kimaze guhitana ubuzima bw'abantu 76.243. Nico gihugu ca mbere gifise igitigiri kinini c'abanduye ku mugabane wa Afrika.

column2: Qatar 2022: Messi, Ronaldo, Mbappé, Neymar n’ibindi bihangange vyiteguriye inkino za 1/4
column3: Na Shamoon Hafez BBC Sport i Doha Imirwi umunani gusa niyo isigaye mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ca 2022 muri Qatar, yose ifise indoto imwe yo guterura igikombe ku wa 18 z’uku kwa cumi na kabiri. Inyuma y’ihiganwa ryo mu matsinda ryabereyemwo ibitangaza, ubu turi mu nzira y’igikorwa nyaco, igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma kikaba cuzuye abakinyi b’ibihangange. Itandatu mu mirwi isigaye ni iyigeze gutsindira iri higanwa canke yashitse muri finale – kandi hagati yayo imaze gutsindira iki gikombe incuro cumi. Ariko gusa ibitangaza vyovyo bishobora gushika, aho Maroc ubu irondera kuba igihugu ca mbere ca Afrika coba gishitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma, inyuma yo gushika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma ku ncuro ya mbere muri kahise k’umupira w’amaguru muri ico gihugu. BBC Sport, igisata ca BBC gikurikirana inkino, irihweza bimwe mu vyitezwe, mu gihe abakinyi barondera kwerekana ubuhinga bwabo muri uru rubuga rw’umupira w’amaguru. Ku wa gatanu: Croatia v Brezili (17:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda), Ubuholande v Argentina (21:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda). Ku wa gatandatu: Maroc v Portugal (17:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda), Ubwongereza v Ubufaransa (21:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda). Kubona ibihugu nk’Ubudagi n’Ububirigi bisezererwa mu nkino z’amatsinda mu buryo butangaje  - hamwe n’ugutsindwa kwa Espagne mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma – ni ibintu bizoguma mu mitima y’abantu igihe kirekire kubona ibihugu nk’ibi binanirwa no gushika muri iki gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Lionel Messi na Cristiano Ronaldo ni amazina agaruka cane mu binyamakuru, ariko ibihangange nka Neymar, Harry Kane, Kylian Mbappe na Luka Modric baracahagaze. Ubwongereza n’Uburafansa – igihugu gisanzwe gifise iki gikombe – bigiye guhurira mw’ihiganwa rikomeye ku ncuro ya mbere mu myaka cumi, ikaba ari n’incuro ya mbere mu gice co gukuranamwo. Iyi mirwi yaheruka guhura muri Euro 2012 mu nkino zo gukuranamwo aho yanganije 1-1, ariko ubwa nyuma iheruka guhura mu gikombe c’isi yose hakaba hari mu 1982. Bryan Robson yateye ibitsindo bibiri mu rukino Ubwongereza bwatsinze 3-1, ico gihe kizigenza w’Ubufaransa akaba yari igihangange Michel Platini. Umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza, uzwi nka, Three Lions, ntiwashoboye kubandanya ngo utsindire ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose uwo mwaka muri Espagne, ariko igihe conyene baherukira kugitwara – ni ukuvuga mu 1966 – umwe mu mirwi batsinze mu rugendo rwabo, kumbure ushobora kuba uwikeka, ni Ubufaransa. Si ikimenyetso kibi. Hagati aho, bafise igikorwa kitoroshe co guhura n’umusatirizi rutura Mbappé, ari na we ari imbere mu bitsindo muri rino higanwa, aho amaze kwinjiza bitanu, akaba akinana n’umukinyi mugenziwe ari na we amaze kwinjiriza Ubufaransa ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi muri kahise k’umupira w’amaguru muri ico gihugu, Olivier Giroud. Kizigenza w’Ubwongereza, Kane, ati: "Ku wa gatandatu ntibizoba vyoroshe. Ubufaransa ni umurwi ukomeye, ari na wo ufise igikombe, rero turazi ko uzoba ari umugoroba utoroshe na gato. "Nibaza ko nimba ushaka gutsindira igikombe c’isi yose, utegerezwa guhura n’imirwi y’ibihangange kw’isi, Ubufaransa rero buri imbere”. Ku wa Mungu, igenekerezo rya 18 Kigarama. Urugamba rutoroshe ku kibuga ca Lusail i Doha. Ibihangange bibiri kw’isi mu gihe cabo bararwanira ubugabo, akaryo kabo ka nyuma  ko kurwanira iri teka ry’igikombe c’isi yose. Ubutigu bwageze. Messi wa Argentina hamwe na Ronaldo wa Portugal bamaze imyaka baterana inkokora umwe wese arondera kwandika amateka. Muri rino higanwa ryonyene, Messi yinjije igitsindo ku rukino rwiwe rwari rugize 1000 igihe bahura na Australia mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma, mu gihe Ronaldo nawe yabaye umukinyi wa mbere yinjije ibitsindo mu mahinganwa atanu yose y’igikombe c’isi yose. Bompi baramaze gutsindira igikombe c’amahiganwa ku migabane yabo – Messi yatsindiye Copa America mu mwaka uheze, mu gihe Ronaldo yari yatsindiye ihiganwa rya Bulaya mu 2016 – ariko iki gikombe ca mbere nyamukuru kw’isi kiracari umugani kuri bo. Ku myaka 35 Messi aboneka ko ari ryo higanwa rya nyuma ry’igikombe c’isi yose kuri we, mu gihe Ronaldo wewe azoba afise imyaka 41 mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose kizokurikira. Aha ata nkeka biraboneka ko ari yo mahirwe ya nyuma kuri bo yo gushobora guterura iki gikombe c’iteka. Hagati aho, vyabaye ngombwa ko Ronaldo yemera ko yari afise uruhara ruto mu rukino rwa Portugal rw’igice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma - aho yashizwe ku rutonde rw’abagombora, mu gihe uwamutwaye ikibanza Goncalo Ramos w’imyaka 21 yakoze ibintu bidasanzwe mu gutera bitatu wenyene mu rukino rwabo n’Ubuswisi. Nko mu gihe vyoshika ibi bihangange bigahurira muri finale, ivy’ari vyo vyose n’abatagira aho begamire bogira amero. None twizere ko impari kuri ‘GOAT’ (impfunyapfunyo ya Greatest Of All Time, twogereranya na ‘Igihangange c’ibihe vyose) zishobora kuba zigiye guhera? Imbere y’aho, birashoboka ko turorera urukino ruryoheye ijisho rwo mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Mu gihe yompi yorengana Croatia n’Ubuholande uko ikurikirana, urugamba rw’agakura muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko ni rwo rwokurikira hagati ya Brezili na Argentina ku kibuga ca Lusail. Brezili, igihugu kimaze gutahukana iri higanwa incuro zitanu kandi kikaba ari co gihabwa amahirwe menshi, yarerekanye ubuhinga bwayo mu kwirahira bikomeye Korea y’Epfo, mu gihe Argentina yari ikeneye ubuhinga bwa kizigenza wayo Messi kugira ngo ishire Australia ku ruhande. Iyi mirwi imaze guhura incuro zine mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, ariko ubwa nyuma iheruka guhura hakaba hari mu 1990, igihe igitsindo ca Claudio Caniggia mu minota ya nyuma y’urukino cahaye akaryo Argentina ko kwinjira mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Amahirwe yo kuvana iki gikombe i Bulaya ari cane cane mu minwe y’ino mirwi ibiri, Brezili ikaba ari co gihugu ca nyuma kitari ico ku mugabane wa Bulaya giheruka gutsindira iki gikombe, hari mu 2002. Igihangange Neymar yarakize imvune yo mw’ivi yari yanduye mu rukino rwabo rwa mbere, yongera araninjiza igitsindo mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma na Korea y’Epfo, ubu akaba akeneye igitsindo kimwe gusa kugira ngo anganye n’igihangange Pele ku bitsindo 77 mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Brezili, uzwi nka Selecao. Ariko Croatia ya Luka Modric hamwe n’Ubuholande bwa Virgil van Dijk navyo bifise ijambo rikomeye mu kwemeza nimba iki kirori kizoshoboka canke kitazoshoboka. Tugiye ku Buholande, uyu murwi wa Louis van Gaal hamwe na Argentina ni abakeba bamenyeranye cane muri rino higanwa, biteze guhura ku ncuro ya gatandatu barwanira itike yo mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Ni isubiramwo rya finale yo mu 1978, aho uyu murwi wo muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko ari wo watahukanye intsinzi, mu gihe urukino rwa nyuma iyi mirwi yaheruka guhuriramwo ari urwabaye mu myaka umunani iheze, Argentina ikaba ari yo yatsinze ku ma penalties. Ariko kimwe mu bihe ntibagiranwa - atari gusa hagati y’ibi bihugu ariko muri kahise k’igikombe c’isi yose – ni icabaye mu 1998 igihe Dennis Bergkamp yinjiza igitsindo ciza cane cahaye akaryo Ubuholande kubandanya mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. "Dennis Bergkamp, Dennis Bergkamp, Dennis Bergkamp," niko umunyamakuru w’Ubuholande yiha karuru avuga igihe uyu mukinyi yakinira Arsenal yakubita icenga n’ubuhinga bwinshi ku mupira yari ahawe na Frank de Boer, aca aroba Roberto Ayala maze yinjiza igitsindo ciza cane. None Cody Gakpo arashobora gukora nk’ibi muri kino gihe...? Penalty ya Achraf Hakimi muri wa mwanya w’ama penalties ari nayo yahaye intsinzi Maroc kuri Espagne yatewe neza cane, umupira uca neza neza hagati mw’igori aho umunyegori yari avuye, uva mw’igitsindo casarishije abarorerezi mu kibuga ca Education City. Itsinzi yabo yatumye bashika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yashimagijwe n’ubwami bw’ico gihugu, aho umumenyereza Walid Regragui yahamagawe kuri terefone n’umwami  wa Maroc Mohammed VI urukino ruheze. Umurwi upanze neza kandi ugoye gutsinda, Maroc ni urutare,  ntirigera itsindwa na rimwe muri rino higanwa ry’iki gikombe c’isi yose, ikaba imaze kwinjizwa igitsindo kimwe gusa mu nkino zabo indwi ziheruka. Maroc kibaye igihugu ca kane c’umugabane wa Afrika gishitse mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, kikaba kiriko kirondera itike yo gushika mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Hagati aho, ni ikindi gipimo gikomeye kiyirindiriye imbere y’uyu murwi w’i Bulaya – na rirya Portugal nayo iriko irondera kwandikisha amateka mu kurondera gushika mu gice ca nyuma ku ncuro ya mbere.

column2: DR Congo: Umuririmvyikazi rurangiranwa Tshiala Muana  yasandavye ku myaka 64
column3: Umuririmvyi akongera akaba n'umutamvyi rurangiranwa wa Congo Tshala Muana yasandavye ku myaka 64, nk'uko bivugwa n’uwumufasha akongera akaba n’umugenzi wiwe, Claude Mashala. Inkuru y’urupfu rwiwe yasohorewe ku rubuga rwa Facebook rwa Claude Mashala, aho yanditse avuga ati: «Mu gatondo ka kare, Imana rugira vyose yafashe ingingo yo guhamagara Tshala Muana. "Imana ihabwe icubahiro ku bihe vyiza Tshala Muana yaduhaye kuri ino si. Igire n’amahoro Mamu». Mu kwa gatandatu 2020, haradutse igihuha cavuga ngo yapfuye, ariko ntivyari vyo, yari arajwe mu bitaro kubera indwara y’imitsi ifatira mu bwonko. Élisabeth Tshala Muana Muidikay (yavutse ku wa 13 Rusama [5] 1958), asanzwe azwi kw’izina rya Tshala Muana yari umunyamuziki azwi cane muri Repubulika y’intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, yandika indirimbo akongera agatamba. Afatwa nk’ “Umwamikazi wa Mutuashi", umudiho w’umuziki n’intambo vyo mu ntara ya Kasai asanzwe avukamwo, iri hagati mu gihugu. Akunzwe kwitwa "Mamu National”, ni ukuvuga nyina w’igihugu. Azwi cane ku ndirimbo zitari nke nka "Karibu Yangu", « Malu », «  Tshianza », « Tshibola »  n’izindi nyinshi. Yarazungurutse mu bihugu bitari bike, atsindira ubushimwe butari buke haba mu gihugu, ku rwego rw’umugabane canke ku rwego mpuzamakungu, akaba yashoboye gusohora inkurikirane (albums) zirenga 20. Umuziki wiwe urumvikana mw’ireresi y’umuziki izwi cane yo mu 1987 muri Congo  La Vie est Belle na Aya of Yop City. Yari azwi ko ashigikiye uwahoze ari umukuru w’ico gihugu Joseph Kabila n’umugambwe wiwe - Parti du peuple pour la reconstruction et la démocratie (PPRD). Mu 2020 yarahagaritswe na reta ya Perezida Félix Tshisekedi bikavugwa ko hari kubera indirimbo yiwe "Ingratitude" yavugwa ko yanegura umutegetsi atavuzwemwo izina.

column2: Inama ya G7 yemeje integuro yo gusohora amafaranga kugira ihangane na China
column3: Abategetsi b'ibihugu bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bihurikiye mu citwa G7 bemeje integuro yo gufasha ibihugu bikenye n'ibiri mu nzira y'amajambere mu bikorwa vy'iterambere, ni mu ntumbero yo guhangana n'Ubushinwa. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko ashaka ko umugambi wo gufasha ibihugu bikenye ushigikiwe na Amerika, wiswe Build Back Better World (B3W), uba uwo ku rwego rwo hejuru ugasubirira umugambi nk'uwo w'Ubushinwa. Umugambi w'Ubushinwa uzwi nka Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), uramaze gufasha ibihugu bitari bike mu kubironsa amagari ya moshi, kwubaka amabarabara n'ibivuko. Ariko ni umugambi unegurwa cane, uvugwa ko winjije ibihugu mu madeni y'umurengera. Mw'itangazo basohoye inyuma y'inama yariko ibera mu karere ka Cornwall mu Bwongereza, abategetsi ba G7 bavuga ko bazoshira imbere ubucuti bushingiye ku "kwubahiriza indangagaciro, bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru hamwe no gukorera mu muco". Hagati aho, ntibatomora iyo amafaranga azova mu gushira mu ngiro uwu mugambi. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubudagi Angela Merkel avuga ko batari bwagere ku gihe co gusohora amafaranga. Amerika iranegura cane Ubushinwa ku nteguro yabwo y'ugukomeza igifatwa nk'imigenderanire "ishingiye ku madeni". Abategetsi ba G7, umurwi w'ibihugu indwi bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bivuga ko bishira imbere intwaro rusangi, bavuga kandi ko biyemeje gushiraho iyindi nteguro y'ingingo zo kurwanya ibindi biza bishobora kwiyadukiza muri kazoza. Muri izi ngingo harimwo kugabanya ikiringo co gukora no kwemeza incanco n'imiti yo kurwanya Covid-19 kikaja musi y'imisi ijana. Kuri uyu wa Mungu niho bategekanya gutangaza iyi nteguro, hampande y'itangazo rirangiza iyi nama barimwo. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson niwe arongoye iyi nama y'imisi itatu iriko ibera mu karere ka Carbis Bay. Ni ibiki ibihugu vy'uburengero bw'isi vyoba bimaze gukorera Ubushinwa gushika ubu ? Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Amerika, Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Ubwongereza hamwe na Canada vyafatiye ibihano Ubushinwa. Ibi bihano vyafatiwe abategetsi bo hejuru mu ntara ya Xinjiang bagirizwa ihonyanga ry'agateka ka zina muntu bakorera aba Islam  bo mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur, muri vyo hakaba harimwo ukubuza ingendo muri ivyo bihugu hamwe no gufata amatungo yabo. Abantu barenga umuriyoni bo  mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur z'izindi nkehwa nibo bazwi ko bapfungiwe mu makambi ari muyi iyo ntara yo mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'Ubushinwa. Reta y'Ubushinwa yagirizwa gutera ubugumba abagore b'aba Uyghur no gusambura imiryango, mu gutandukanya abana n'abavyeyi babo. Itohoza ryakozwe na BBC ryashizwe ahabona mu kwa kabiri ririmwo amakuru yemeza ivyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina hamwe n'iyicarubozo bikorerwa abapfungiwe muri ayo makambi. Ubushinwa bwaciye bwihora mu gufatira ibihano abategetsi b'aba nya Burayi.

column2: Amafoto meza ya Afrika muri iyi ndwi:12-18 Munyonyo 2021
column3: Amafoto meza yatoranijwe ku mugabane wa Afrika no mu yindi mihingo. Amafoto yose afise uburenganzira bwo gukoreshwa.

column2: Ethiopia: Antony Blinken wa reta ya US baganiriye na Abiy Ahmed ku kibazo ca Tigray
column3: Umunyamabanga wa  reta ajejwe imigenderanire wa Reta zunze ubumwe za Amerika yaganiriye n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia ku kibazo ca Tigray. Antony Blinken yerekanye amakenga ku kungene ibintu vyifashe mu karere ka Tigray mu biganiro bagiranye na Abiy Ahmed. Blinken yahamagariye Abiy kureka imfashanyo zigashika muri ako karere mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ko abantu baguma bapfa. Yanavuze ko Amerika ishigikiye ibikwiye guhinduka muri Ethiopia hamwe n'amatora. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia yashimiye umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika "kuba bashigikiye ibiriko birahinduka muri Ethiopia kandi bakaba babibandanya ata kudebukirwa". Ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Abiy yagize ati: "Icipfuzo co gutsimbataza demokrasi no kwubaka igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro n'iterambere kuri bose, bishoboka biciye mu gutsimbataza ubucuti hagati ya Ethiopia na Amerika." Abasirikare bo mu karere ka Tigray batanye mu mitwe n'aba reta ya Ethiopia mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barahunze iyo ntara hanyuma amashirahamwe na yo atanga imfashanyo ntarashobora gushika muri ako karere.

column2: Saido Ntibazonkiza inyuma y'igitsindo yatsinze Tanzania, Young Africans yamutwaye
column3: Saido Ntibazonkiza, yahora abarizwa mu mugwi wa Vital'o, yagiriraniye amasezerano yo gukinira umugwi wa Young Africans wo muri Tanzania nk'uko iyo kipe ibimenyesha. Uwo mukinyi rurangiranwa w'imbere w'Uburundi, agiye muri uwo mugwi inyuma yo gutsinda igitego kimwe ku busa Uburundi bwatsinze Tanzania mu rukino rwa kivukanyi ku munsi w'Imana. Amasezerano hagati y'umugwi wa Young Africans na Vital'O kuri uyu mukinyi ntarashirwa ahagaragara. Saido Ntibazonkiza yaheruka gukinira Intamba mu rugamba haraciye imyaka itanu, mu rukino rwari rwabahuje n'izinga rya Morise (Maurice), aho ivyo bihugu bibiri vyari vyanganije igitego kimwe ku kindi. Muri urwo rukino rwabereye mw'izinga rya Morise, Ntibazonkiza ari kizigenza, yaragirijwe kwitwara nabi harimwo no kubuza bagenziwe gukina, bituma ahagarikwa n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Burundi, FFB, gusubira gukinira igihugu ciwe. Umurundi Ntibazonkiza, muri Young Africans asangayo Haruna Niyonzima wo mu gihugu kibanyi c'u Rwanda, na ho nyene Saido azwi cane n'aho atahakinye. Mu 2005, yaraguzwe n'umugwi wa Rayon Sports, we na Bernard Mwarara, ariko bankirwa gikina muri uwo mugwi. Bompi ntibahawe impapuro zibarekurira gukinira Rayon Sports, ikibazo cateje impari zikomeye ico gihe hagati y'abafana ba Rayon Sports bagiriza umugwi  bakebana wa APR FC kubigiramwo uruhara. Saido Ntibazonkiza amaze gukina mu migwi myinshi mu bihugu bitandukanye mu karere, na Buraya nko muri Holande, Polonye n'Ubufaransa. Azwi mu gihugu ciwe nk'umukinyi kizigenza yagiye afasha bagenziwe bo mu mugwi nserukiragihugu mu kubafashisha intererano y'uburyo mu gihe igihugu caba cakehaniwe.

column2: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w’ Ubuyapani aragabisha Afrika ku madeni y’umurengera
column3: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani aragabisha abategetsi ba Afrika ku ngaruka z'ugufata amadeni menshi, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'itororokaniriza ry'amakuru AFP. Ayo majambo ya Shinzo Abe afatwa nk'igabisha ku ruhara rw'Ubushinwa muri Afrika mu gihe buvugwa ko bushira imbere amakompanyi yabwo mu migambi ikomeye kuri uwo mugabane. Yabwiye abategetsi bari mu nama i Yokohama muri ico gihugu yerekeye iterambere rya Afrika ko Ubuyapani bwipfuza guteza imbere imitahe "ngirakamaro" yoshigikirwa n'amashirahamwe y'Ubuyapani. AFP ivuga ko ico gihugu gitegekanya kwigisha abahinga 30 bava mu bihugu vya Afrika  mu myaka itatu iri imbere ku buryo bwo guhangana n'ibiza n'amadeni ku gihugu. Avuga ko abakora imigambi y'iterambere boterwa intege kugira ngo bashobore guteza imbere ubutunzi ku mugabane wa Afrika. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani yasubiwemwo amajambo avuga ati: " Mu gihe ibihugu bigenzi vyugarijwe n'amadeni y'umurengera, bica biba inzitizi kuri uyo wese yari afise imigambi y'ukuzana imitahe yabo". Bwana Abe ari mu barongoye inama mpuzamakungu ya Tokyo kw'iterambere rya Afrika (Ticad), ikaba yateguwe mu gihe Ubushinwa buriko bushinga imizi muri Afrika. Ubuyapani buvuga ko intumbero bufise kuri Afrika ari ukuyifata mu mugongo mu buryo bw'amafaranga n'ikoreshwa ryayo, intumbero itandukanye n'iyo Ubushinwa.

column2: Umugwizatunga Rujugiro ashima icemezo ca sentare kuri UTC ngo ariko ntibikwiye
column3: Umugwizatunga w'Umunyarwanda Tribert Rujugiro avuga ko ashima icemezo ca sentare y'akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko ku vyerekeye inyubako yagurishijwe na leta y'u Rwanda. Ariko uwo mugwizatunga atakiba mu Rwanda kubera kutumvikana na leta y'ico gihugu, avuga ko kumuha amafaranga atari vyo yashaka kuko adashaka kugurisha. Iyo nyubako ivugwa ni inyubako izwi nka Union Trade Centre (UTC) iri mu muji wa Kigali iberamwo ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji, izi zizwi mu Congereza nka Shopping Mall. Sentare y'Ubutungane ya Afrika y'Ubuseruko yafashe icemezo c'uko Bwana Rujugiro ahabwa amafaranga iyo nyubako yagurishijwe akanahabwa ayo yari imaze kwinjiza igihe yari imaze ikora kuva yagurishwa. Ariko we avuga ko naho ashima ingingo ya sentare, ivyo adashobora kuvyemera kuko agaciro k'iyo nyubako ari kanini cane ugereranije n'ayo yoba ahawe. Yagize ati: "Umwanzuro narawushimye kuko weretse amakungu ko rirya tegeko bakoresheje na birya vyo kugurisha bitajanye n'amategeko. "... ngirango umuntu wese azi guharura, inzu yinjiza $1,500,000 ku mwaka, yobona agaciro kayo. Kandi amafaranga bayigurishije ni $6,800,000". Mu 2017 ikigo kijejwe amakoli mu Rwanda cafashe ingingo yo kugurisha inyubako UTC ya Bwana Rujugiro kimwagiraza ko agiheraniye amakoli. Ikigo Kigali Investment Company ni co cegukanye iyo nyubakwa cemeye gutanga amahera arusha ay'abandi (6,877,150,000). Ku vyerekeye kumwagiriza kutariha iryo koli, Bwana Rujugiro avuga ko sentare yabisiguye neza. Yagize ati: "Bwa mbere iyo nzu bari bayifise (urwego rushinzwe amakoli) kuva mu 2013. Iryo deni ry'ikoli bavuga ko mfise barizanye mu 2017, bamaranye inzu imyaka ine. "Noneho waraba amafaranga bafashe yagera ku miriyoni $5 zirenga. Kandi itegeko bagendeyeko ryavuga ko amafaranga yose avuye mu nzu bafashe, 50% bizoja bija muri Banki Nkuru akazohabwa nyene umutungo igihe yoboneka. "Urumva yuko nibaba bari bafise $2.800.000, ideni rikaba ryari $1.100.000, kuki batafashe muri ayo ngo barihe?" Abajijwe niba azokwunguruza ku ngingo ya sentare mu gihe we avuga ko adashaka kugurisha inzu yiwe, yavuze ko yabihaye abashingwamanza biwe nihafatwa ingingo akazoyitangaza. BBC yagerageje kuvugana n'uruhande rwa leta y'u Rwanda ariko batubwira ko ata co bashobora kuvuga kuri ico kibazo.

column2: Red Flo Bio ya John Chris yamuronkeje ikidari c'inzahabu k'inzoga iryoshe cane ya 2021
column3: Mw'ihiganwa ry'inzoga nziza riba buri mwaka ritegurwa n'ikigo Monde Selection, muri iyi ndwi inzoga yengwa n'umurundi John Chris Kavakure yatahukanye ikidari c'inzahabu c'inzoga ya mbere iryoshe cane muri uyu mwaka. Iyo nzoga yitwa Red Flo Bio yahiganishijwe n'ubundi bwoko bw'inzoga 3,100 zivuye mu bihugu 90 vyo mu mihingo itandukanye y'isi muri iri higanwa ryaba ku ncuro ya 60. Inzoga ziza muri iryo higanwa ziba zifise urugero rwo gukara rwa 7.5 Ihiganwa Monde Selection ni iry'ikompanyi yitwa International Quality Institute yo mu Bubiligi, ivuga ko ifise uburambe mu kuraba no kumva neza ibikorwa bifise akanovera kandi vyiza mu guteka, kwenga, amagara, eka n'ubwiza bw'imico kw'isi. John Chris Kavakure umubiligi kandi w'umurundi ashima ico kidari ngo kuko cerekanye ko abanye Afrika muri rusangi n'abarundi vy'umwihariko bashoboye. Yagize ati:"Kuba ndonse ico kidari ndi umurundi, avuka mu Bwiza, biha inguvu urundi rwaruka ko mu bikorwa bakora, ko ejo hashobora kuboneka umu John Chris mu burimyi, mu gushona, mu kworora." Kavakure amaze gukora ubwoko burenga 20 bw'inzoga mw'ihinguriro ryiwe rya Les Brasseries de Flobecq riri mu Bubiligi, akaba ashobora gukora ama 'hectolitres' 30.000 ku mwaka. John Chris avuga ko umwuga wo kwenga inzoga yawukundishijwe na nakuru wiwe. Ati:"Nyokuru ni we yatumye nkunda kwenga inzoga kuko namubona ariko arenga impeke ngaca nkurikirana ingene abigenza n'ivyo ashiramwo." Ivyo vyatumye agira ishaka ryo kwiga ubuhinga bwo kugana inzoga ziryoshe muri kaminuza aho yaronkeye impapuro z'imitsindo. Avuga ko umwambiro akoresha kugira inzoga iryohe ari ibanga ryiwe, ariko ko hariho iyo akura muri Afrika. John Chris ntakora inzoga gusa, aranubaka amahinguriro y'inzoga, aho hirya no hino kw'isi amaze gufasha kwubaka ayashika umunani harimwo n'ihinguriro ry'inzoga rigira kabiri mu Burundi riri mu ntara ya Ngozi muburaruko ryitwa Burundi Brewery rikora inzoga zitwa Soma Burundi. Ibindi bihugu birimwo amahinguriro yubatse ni nko muri Amerika, Ubuhinde, Ubudagi, Ubutaliyano no mu Bubiligi aho asanzwe aba nk'uko abivuga. Ikindi kidari c'inzahabu yaheruka kukironka mu 2018 ku nzoga yahinguye yitwa Flo58.

column2: France: Umuriro wadutse mw’isengero nkuru rya Nantes
column3: Isengero rikuru Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul  ryo mu gisagara ca Nantes mu Bufaransa ryatewe n'umuriro w'icaduka. Abajejwe kuzimya imiriro y'ivyaduka barenga 60 nibo bashitse kuri iryo sengero kugira bagerageze kuwuzimya nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiyamakuru vyaho. Nta wuzi icateye uwu muriro. Amasanamu ava aho ivyo biriko biba yerekana umuriro n'umwotsi biva muri iyo nyukabwa. Uyu muriro wadutse haciye umwaka umwe gusa uwundi muriro ukoze ibara kw'isengero rikuru Notre-Dame mu gisagara ca Paris, rimwe mu mitungo ya kahise k'u Bufaransa. Televiziyo BFM TV, itangaza ko abapolisi muri ico gisagara ca Nantes kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'u Bufaransa batumweko hafi isaha imwe n'iminota 44 mu gatondo. Umwe mu babibonye avuga ko yashobora kubona uwo mucanwa ari muhira, hafi y'iryo sengero. Avuga ko yakanguwe n'urwamo rudasanzwe rw'inkengeri. Ati: "Ku vyo mbona, ni uko umwotsi utera wongerekana". Iryo sengero sibwo bwa mbere riterwa n'umucanwa. Mu 1972, umuriro warasambuye igisenge caryo, bituma ryugarwa mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu ririko rirasubirwamwo.

column2: Akazi: Woshika gute ku bintu vyinshi ukoresheje umwanya muto?
column3: Ukivyumva, bishobora kuba ata nsiguro bifise. Wokora gute umwanya muto kugira uronke umwimbu mwinshi? Aha turabasigurira ingene ivyo bishoboka n'ingene bishobora kubafasha mu migambi imwe imwe. Cal Newport, ikigo c'ubuhinga mu kugwiza umwimbu, kiratanga impanuro ku kungene ushobora akazi ku rwenge. Izo mpanuro harimwo ikintu citwa "gukora udakebaguzwa". Mu gutahura ico ari co gukora udakebaguzwa, birakenewe kumenya ico ari co akazi kadashemeye. Kusoma ubutumwa bwa mail, kuraba imbuga hwaniro, gukoresha amanama ku bintu bitihuta cane, ivyo vyose bishobora gufatwa nk'akazi kadashemeye. Ushobora kutavyirengagiza gose, ariko ushobora kubikura ku rutonde rw'ibintu vyo gukora mu mwanya umwe, kugira wihatire ku kandi kazi udakebaguzwa. N'ukwihatira cane ku bikorwa bikenewe cane no kuvyitondera cane. Ushobora no kwiherera kugira ntusamare. Ni vyo umwanditsi Maya Angelou yakunda gukora, mu gihe umugwizatunga Bill Gates azwi nk'umuntu yakunda kwiyugarana ahantu hiherereye kugira akore. Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo gushika ku ntumbero mu buzima. Umugwizatunga Warren Buffet ahanura kugira urutonde rw'ibintu 20 nkenerwa vyo gukora mu buzima, hanyuma ugaca akarongo musi y'ikigira gatanu. Hanyuma, ibindi 15 biri kuri urwo rutonde ivyihoze, gushika ubonye uhejeje ivyo bitanu vya mbere. Umwarimu wa kaminuza Angela Duckworth n'umuhinga muvyo inyifato yateguye indinganizoy'intumbero umuntu yipfuza gushikako. N'ukubigaburamwo ibice vyinshi, ikija hejuru kikaba ari co gekenewe cane (nko kuba umuganga canke gutwara umudari wa olempike). Intera ikurikira irimwo intumbero zito zito zikenewe kugira ushike ku ntumbero nyamukuru. Nk'akarorero, ubushakashatsi bukenewe kugira ukore ibibazo vyotuma uba umunyeshure wa kaminuza muvyo amagara y'abantu, canke imyimenyerezo ikenewe kugira wirukw imetero 100 kugira uronke umudari w'inzahabu. Intera yo hasi irimwo ibikorwa bishigikira ibiri mu ntera yo hejuru, gutyo gutyo gutyo. Mu gihe akazi kamwe katagushikana ku ntumbero nyamukuru, intera iyo ari yo yose kariko, ntugakore. Gukora umusi wose akazi ku muvuduko wa 100km/h si ikintu ciza. Akaruhuko karakenewe, kandi nawe karashobora kugufasha. Francesco Cirillo, umuhinga mu gukoresha neza umwanya, yaratoye igipimo c'akaruhuko ku cuma giharura iminota gifise iforoma y'urutomati yasanze mu gikoni ciwe. Ubwo buhinga buzwi kw'izina rya pomodoro (kivuye mw'izina urutomati mu gitaliyano), bukora mu kugabura akazi kawe mi bice vy'iminota 25. Ugakurikizako iminota 5 y'akaruhuko ifasha mu mwimbu. Sohoka hanze gutembera gato hakuguma uraba imbuga hwaniro - ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko utwo turuhuko dushobora umererwa neza gusumba mu kwitegurira iyindi minota 25 y'akazi. Cal Newport arafise uko afata akazi umuntu adakebaguzwa, ariko arazi kandi kugahagarika no kugira umwanya wiwe. Kugira aheraheze umusi w'akazi, yari afise akamenyero ko guhagarika. N'ukuvuga kumenya ko umusi uheze, kwihweza akazi katashoboye kurangira, gutegura ibizokorwa bukeye, no kugara inyabwonko ngendanwa canke ikaye y'imyimenyerezo no kuvuga ijambo nka "ndaheje kugara burundu". Uko wobivuga kose bikuvako, ariko ayo majambo ategerezwa kwerekana ko uhejeje akazi k'uyo musi n'intango y'akaruhuko, ko widegemvya ushobora kwinezereza. Ako kanya utegerezwa kukaronka! Inkuru yo kuri  BBC Bitesize

column2: Khadar Ahmed: Ingene uwabuze aho yiga gukora film ubu ariko aratahukana udushimwe no gukundwa na benshi
column3: Film 'The Gravedigger's Wife' (umugore w'umwimvyi w'imva), yatahanye agashimwe, wogira ngo yatunganijwe n'umuntu abifisemwo uburambe, ariko niyo film ya mbere ya Khadar Ahmed. Ingene igenda, umwanya imara n'ubwiza bwayo vyerekana ukwiyemera gufiswe n'uwo mugabo w'imyaka 40 atagira uburambe muri uwo mwuga. Yahunze n'umuryango wiwe  intambara yo muri Somalia amaherezo baruhukira muri Finlande afise imyaka 16 - kandi ntiyigeze ahonyoza ikirenge mw'ishure ryo kwiga gukora no gutunganya film (cinema). Yabwiye BBC ati: "Imana yonyene niyo izi kangahe nasavye ishure ryo kwiga film ariko nkaba ntigeze ndarironka." Ariko guteza imbere film ziri mu rurimi rw'igi-Somali yabigize ihangiro - kugira yerekane akaranga n'amamuko vyiwe abicishije muri film. Ku bwa Ahmed, kubona yatahanye agashimwe ka mbere mw'ihiganwa rya Afrika ry'ama film Fespaco mu kwezi guheze, vyerekana ko inkuru mu rurimi rwiwe zishobora  gukundwa n'ahandi. Bitandukanye na Bollywood The Gravedigger's Wife ni inkuru y'urukundo irimwo hamwe hamwe hababaje ariko mu buryo butwenza y'aho umuntu ashobora gushika kugira arokore ubuzima bw'uwo akunda. Uwo mwimvyi w'imva - Guled, akinwa na Omar Abdi - yicaye imbere y'ibitaro ari kumwe na bagenziwe,  afise igipawa, arindiriye ko hagira umurwayi apfa. Aho bibabarije, n'uko kugira  Nasra,  umugore wiwe arwaye, abandanye kubaho,  Ahmed ategerezwa kuronka  amafaranga, ayo nayo akaboneka ari uko hagize abapfa. Uwo mugore akinwa na Yasmin Warsame, ari ku mpfiro kubera amafyigo yiwe atagikora. Kubera amafaranga menshi akenewe kugira   abaganga bamwiteho abandanye kubaho, bisaba Guled gufata ingingo zikomeye cane. Iyo nkuru ata  bintu vyinshi vyo kuyiryohora birimwo, yakorewe amasanamu arimwo ibice vyinshi ata  majambo wumva n'ibirere vyagutse cane, ntaho ihuriye n'inkuru Ahmed yakuriyemwo. Yibutsa film za Bollywood ziba zirimwo umuziki, ugutamba n'ukurangira mu kanyamuneza.   Ahmed avuga ati: "Ntaco nari nzi kuri izo film, nta film nari mfise kugira ndabireko mu gukora iyi. "Gutyo rero nayikoze uko jewe nyene binjemwo n'uko ndabibona". Mu vy'ukuri, ntaho yibuka yoba yarabonye film y'igi-Somali ikozwe hakurikijwe ubuhinga nyabwo bw'umwuga. Nyina wiwe yagumye  akorora amasozi  mu mwanya wose bamaze bariko bararaba The Gravedigger's Wife ubwa  mbere mw'ihiganwa rya sinema rya Cannes mu kwezi kw'indwi.  Ahmed avuga ati nyina "yararengewe. Hari benshi batigeze baronka urweze n'amahirwe yo kwibona muri film. N'ivyo nashaka gushikako." 'Kwumva wishimye' The Gravedigger's Wife ibera, kandi amasanamu yayo yafatiwe ku rubuga, muri Djibouti, bihana urubibe na Somalia, ariko ntirerekanwa muri ivyo bihugu. Avatar yongeye kuba film yinjiza cyane ku isi Abantu benshi b'aba-Somali, n'abandi bafise amamuko yo muri Somalia, barabonye iyo film mu kwezi kw'icenda mw'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ry'ama film i Toronto muri Canada. Ahmed avuga ko "bose bumvise bishimye. Vyari biryoshe kubaraba ingene baryohewe no kuyiraba hanyuma bagaca banzako". Uwo atunganya ama fiml avuga ko inzira yaciyemwo mu gukora iyo film ishobora gutanga icitegererezo. Ntiyigeze aja mw'ishure ryigisha ivya film, nta n'aho yigeze aronka uwumwigisha ivyo gutunganya ama film, nta na film y'uwundi muntu yari bwigere akorako. Yatanguye urugendo rwiwe rwo gutunganya iyo film mu myaka 10 iheze igihe yandika integuro yayo. Yari afise ishaka ryo kuba ariwe ubwiwe yoyitunganiriza mu gi-Somali ku buryo yabanje kubika  iyo nteguro  kugira yige ingene bikorwa mu kurabira ku ma film yakunda. Amaze kuraba Bollywood, yaciye azunguruka amazu y'ama cinema kw'isi, harimwo muri Korea y'Epfo na Iran. Ariko izamutereye ivyiyumviro cane ni fim zakorewe muri Afrika. Arakunda cane cane igikorwa c'umunya-Mauritania Abderrahmane Sissako, yari umukuru w'umugwi w'abatanga udushimwe twa Fespaco uyu mwaka. Umunya-Chad  Mahamat-Saleh Haroun nawe ari mu bo Ahmed yafatiyeko, akaba yibuka ingene yatangariye ubwiza bwa film yiwe yo mu 2010, A Screaming Man. Amaze  kwiga izo film akagerageza kwuva ubuhinga bw'ingene zikorwa, yaciye atunganya film zibiri ngufi mu  hanyuma yandika mu ki-Finlande imbere y'uko akora  The Gravedigger's Wife. Ubu rero aribaza niba iyo aba yaragiye kw'ishure ryo kwiga ingene film zikorwa  hari ico kuba  vyahinduye mu nzira mbi canke nziza. "Nshaka gutera intege abanya-Afrika bakiri bato bakora film, abadasanganywe amahirwe menshi, gufata camera hanyuma bakore film zabo, bandike inkuru zabo, bafate amasanamu yabo kandi bavyikorere bo nyene, kuko si bose baronka basanganywe ubushobozi bwinshi."
