We nyene avuga ko afise ishaka ryo kubandanya akora ama film muri Afrika: "Namuka muri Afrika kandi nemera ko kazoza k'ama film ari muri Afrika. Hari inkuru nyinshi zidashobora gukinirwa mu bihugu vya Buraya."

column2: Burundi: Girumuco Téline atambukira inzu y'imideli Yves St Laurent ati: 'Nakunze umudeli kubera dawe'
column3: Umurundikazi Girumuco Téline Féerie afitaniye amasezerano y'umudeli n'inzu rurangiranwa yo mu Bufaransa Yves Saint Laurent, avuga ko yabikunda kuva akiri umwana. Uwo mwigeme avuga ko yatanguye umwuga w'umudeli mu 2016 mu nzu [agence] yitwa Winners' fashion. Agira ati:" Nabikunze nkiri umwana. Ngira aho nabirabira cane hari ku muvyeyi wanje, dawe; yakora mu bintu vy'impuzu." Indoto za Téline ngo zari izo kwambika abantu, agakora impuzu mu Burundi abantu ntibabe bakizikura mu mahanga. Uwo mwigeme yiga mu gisata co gutumatumanako amakuru ngo afise umugambi wo kuva muri ico gisata aje gutangura kwiga gushona imideli. Agitangura ivyerekeye imideli mu Burundi ngo abantu ntibabibona neza. Agira ati:" Abantu babona umenga ndiko ndata akaranga. Abavyeyi banje naragize Imana barantahura bakaza baranshigikira, ariko nk'abandi babibona mu mibano, ntibabibona neza, ariko ubu bariko barabitahura kubera babona urwego maze gushikako." Abandanya avuga ko akiri mu Burundi yagize ivyigwa nkarisha bwenge vyo gushona impuzu, abantu bakabifata nabi, kuko ntibatahura ingene yari azi ubwenge mw'ishure ariko akaja mu vyo gushona impuzu. Yaragira kandi n'ibindi vyigwa bijanye no gushona ku buhinga bwa internet, abamwigisha bakaba bari mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. Téline afise uburebure bwa metero 1.76, akaba apima ibiro 48. Atera akamo urwaruka na cane cane abigeme gukora cane kuko kenshi mu Burundi imyuga itamenyerewe badakunze kuyishigikira, bigasaba kugira inguvu nyinshi. Nta Mwuga Udakiza ni ikiganiro c'uruhererekane (Series) kizajya gihita kuri radio buri wa gatatu, no ku rubuga rwa BBC Gahuzamiryango. BBC Gahuzamiryango ihaye ikaze ibitekerezo vyanyu kuri iki kiganiro.

column2: Ikipe y’Intamba mu Rugamba ngo yiteguriye kwitanga ku rukino rwa kabiri
column3: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Ikipe y'intamba mu Rugamba, ivuga ko itazemera gusubira gutsindwa, mu gihe vyoshika izoca isezera igikombe ca Afrika 2019. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru, umumenyereza Olivier Niyungeko ntiyacishije kure mu kwerekana akamaro urukino wo kuwa kane na Madagascar ufitiye Intamba mu Rugamba. U Burundi buhirahiriye bugatsindwa urwo rukino, nta nkeka bwoca busezererwa muri iri higanwa butarenganye umuce wa mbere, ariko iyo kipe ngo ntiyiteze gukorwa mu jisho kabiri. Bwana Niyungeko yagize ati: " Iyi ni finale (urikino rwa nyuma) ya kabiri tugiye gukina, kuko tutayitsinze bizoba biheze. "Iya mbere yari umukino na Nigeria, kuko bose bavuga ko iyo kipe iza kuduhamba, ariko nayo yadutsinze twarwanye kigabo". Ikipe ya Madagascar u Burundi buzohura nayo ntawoyigereranya na Nigeira mu bukomezi, ariko nayo yarerekanye ko atari iyo gupfa guta mu ndasa aho yakina na Guinea. Madagascar nayo ni ubwa mbere igiye muri iri higanwa, yarihagazeko inganya 2-2 na Guinea. Umukino wayo urimwo igikenya cinshi, ukaba utandukanye n'uw'Intambamu Rugamba. Aho Intamba zobonera akoyoko, ni uko umumenyereza wa Madagascar, Nicolas Dupuis, yavuze ko ikipe yiwe yakuye imvune n'umuruho mu rukino rwa Guinea. Ku rupapuro Intamba zisumvya gato amahirwe Madagascar,  gusa kuri ibi kizigenza w'Intamba, Saido Berahino, yavuze ko ivyo atariko babibona. Saido yagize ati: "Dutegerezwa kububaha kuko twarabonye ko ari abakinyi bakomeye. "Turiteguye neza mu mutwe no ku mubiri, kandi buri mukinyi arazi ingene uru rukino ruhambaye. Tuzoba twameze magabo kuva ku firimbi ya mbere". Nigeria, iri imbere mu mugwi B n'amanota 3/3, yagaragayemwo ibibazo aho bivugwa ko abakinyi uno munsi banse kwimenyereza bivuye ku gashirukabute kabo batarahabwa. Umumenyereza wa Nigeria, Gernot Rohr, yaje wenyene mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru, abajijwe igituma ata mukinyi bazananye nk'uko vyategerezwa avuga ko hari abarwaye abandi nabo bakaba bari mu 'nama yihutirwa'. Ariko mu nyuma vyaje kumenyekana ko ari ikibazo c'imishahara abakinyi batarahabwa, ibintu vyashavuje abakunzi benshi ba Nigeria, berekanira ishavu ryabo ku mbuga hwaniro. Umugwi B ejo kuwa gatatu uzobamwo umukino hagati ya Nigeria na Guinea isaha 16h30, kuwa kane naho u Burundi buhure na Madagascar kuri ayo masaha nyene. Ushaka kumenye uko amakipe ahagaze mu migwi, uko ahura, uko atsindana hamwe n'amanota afise, urashobora kuja NGAHA.

column2: Burundi: BRB yugaye amashirahamwe agurisha amafaranga
column3: Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yaraye ifashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro yari asanzwe yemewe. Mwitangazo ryasohowe n'umukuru w'iyo banki, Ciza Jean, avuga ko iyo ngingo izotangura kuja mu ngiro mu ndwi iza, igenekerezo rya 15 z'uku kwa kabiri. Yagiriza ayo mashirahamwe ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyo ngo bikaba vyaragize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu. Mu kwezi kw'icenda umwaka uheze, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Muri iryo tangazo, Bwana Ciza ategeka abafise amazu yo kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga y'agaciro gukuraho vuba na bwango ivyapa n'ibindi bimenyetso biyaranga. Amenyesha ko kuva ubu, amazu yemerewe kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga mvamakungu ari ayegukira amabanki. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe ku wa 15 z'ukw'icenda umwaka uheze wa 2019, buri shirahamwe ryategerezwa kuvunja amafaranga ryisunze igiciro cashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu "ritarengeje inyungu y'ibice 15%". Iyo ngingo isa n'iyagoranye gushira mu ngiro, ari co catumye mu kwezi kwa 11 umwaka uheze, BRB isohora itangazo, aho yagabisha ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: Akaririmbo k'uyu mu Somaliakazi karakunzwe cane ku mbuga...
column3: Urashobora kuba umaze kwumva akaririmbo kakunzwe cane ku mbuga k'uyu mu Somaliakazi. Aha ariganira BBC ingene vyagenze.

column2: Abaganga b'abanyamahanga 'bavunishwa akazi' bafitiye impungenge abarwayi mu Bwongereza
column3: Paul Kenyon & Anna Meisel File on 4 & Newsnight Abanganga barondewe bava mu bihugu bimwe bimwe bikenye cane kw’isi kugira baje gukora mu bitaro vyo mu Bwongereza  bavuga ko bakoreshwa vy’umurengera – kandi bakemeza ko bakoreshwa amasaha menshi cane ku buryo bafise ubwoba bwo gushira mu kaga amagara y’abarwayi. Amatohoza ya BBC yaronse ivyemeza ko abaganga baturuka muri Nigeria bahabwa akazi na kompanyi y’ubuvuzi yo mu Bwongereza aho baba bitezwe gukora mu bitaro vy’abigenga mu buryo butemewe mu gisata c’igihugu citaho amagara y’abantu, National Health Service, NHS. Ishirahamwe ry’abaganga mu Bwongereza (British Medical Association, BMA) rivuga ko ivyo bintu “bishegeshe” kandi ko ico gisata gitegerezwa gushirwa ku murongo w’ingene akazi gakorwa muri NHS. BBC yavuganye n’abaganga benshi – harimwo umuganga w’umunya-Nigeria akiri muto yakoze mu bitaro vy’abigenga mu bitaro vya  Nuffield Health Leeds mu 2021. Augustine Enekwechi avuga ko amasaha yiwe y’akazi yari menshi birengeje -izamu ry’amasaha 24 ku  munsi indwi yose ata munsi uciyemwo - kandi ko atashobora kuva mu kigo c’ibitaro. Avuga ko gukora aho hantu yumva ari nko kuba ari “mu munyororo”. Uburuhe bwari bwinshi cane, ku buryo avuga ko hari igihe yumva ubwoba ko adashora kurangura imirimo neza. Avuga ati : “Nari nzi ko gukora urushe  bituma abarwayi  bashobora kugira ivyago kandi ko nanje bishobora kunshira mu vyago, bigashobora no gukwega imanza. “Numva ntafise uko nogira …ataco nshoboye, urumva, umwitwarariko wa buri igihe no kuguma nibaza ko hari igishobora kwononekara.” Komanyi Nuffield Health irahakana ivy'ayo masaha y’umurengera, ikavuga ko abaganga bayo buri igihe bahabwa umwanya w’akaruhuko, iminsi yo kuruhuka hagati y’ibiringo vy’akazi, hamwe no gushobora kuguza ibiringo vy’akazi iyo bikenewe. Iyo kompanyi yongerako ko “amagara n’ukubaho neza kw’abarwayi n’abakozi b’ibitaro” arivyo bishirwa imbere. Augustine yarungitswe gukora mu bitaro Nuffield Health Leeds na kompanyi yigenga – NES Healthcare. Iyo kompanyi isanzwe ikoresh abaganga bava mu bindi bihugu, benshi baturuka muri Nigeria, bakabakoresha nk’abaganga bariko barimenyereza akazi ( Resident Medical Officers, RMOs)  – akenshi usanga mu bitaro vy’abigenga. Augustine avuga ko yari ashashaye cane kuronka ako kazi ku buryo atanaravye ibiri mu masezerano yiwe y’akazi. Mu vy’ukuri ayo masezerano yamukura mu mategeko asanzwe akingira abakozi bo mu Bwongereza ku masaha y’akazi y’umurengera -ico bita Working Time Directive – kandi agatuma asanga hari amahera menshi yokatwa ku mushashara nk’igihano. Augustine siwe wenyene, haba na gato. BMA n’ishirahamwe riza imbere mu kubavugira, Doctors’ Association,  yemereye ibiganiro File on 4 na Newsnight vya BBC kuraba ivyavuye mu nyishu zatanzwe n’abaganga b’aba RMOs 188 bakozweko amatohoza. Benshi mu baganga bakoreshwa na NES ariko hari bamwe bamwe bakoreshwa n’ibindi bigo. Vyagaragaye ko 92% muri abo baganga bari barondewe muri Afrika  kandi benshi -81% - bava muri Nigeria. Ubwiganze bwabo bidogera amasaha y’akazi y’umurengera hamwe no gukatwa amafaranga mu buryo babona ko baba barenganijwe. Haheze imyaka myinshi ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw’isi (OMS) rigabishije ku kuronderera cane abaganga n’abaforoma  mu bihugu biri mu nzira y’amajambere aho abakizi bo kwa muganga basanzwe ari bake cane. OMS yakoze urutonde rw’ibihugu nk’ivyo 47- vyinshi muri ivyo bikaba biri muri Afrika. Reta y’Ubwongereza urwo rutonde yarushize mu  gitabo c’ivyo yisunga mu gukora- irwita “urutonde rutukura”. Ubu Nigeria reta y’Ubwongereza yayigize igihugu atari ico kuja kurondereramwo abakozi bo kwa muganga. None ubwa mbere ho abo baganga vyagenze gute ngo baje gukora mu Bwongereza? Twarashitse muri Nigeria turabona urundi ruhande rw’iyo nkuru. Mu  ntangaro nini yo gukoreramwo ibibazo i Lagos, igisagara ca mbere kinini muri ico gihugu, twasanze umurongo w’abanganga amajana batonze ngo bakore ikibazo citwa ico gusuzuma ubumenyi  bw’umwuga n’ururimi (Professional and Linguistic Assessments Board)  canke PLAB 1. Ico kibazo gitegurwa n’inama y’ubuganganga i Londres  (General Medical Council, GMC) kandi akaba ariyo ntambwe ya mbere isabwa n’abategetsi bajejwe ivy’amagara mu Bwongereza kugira umuntu aronke uruhusha rwo gukora akazi mu Bwongereza. Abanganga twavuganye bavuga ko bahurumbira imishahara yisumbuye n’uburyo bwo gukoreramwo bwiza kurusha. Ikoreshwa ry’ico kibazo ryari ricungerewe n’abakozi mu mu buserukizi bw’Ubwongereza (British Council)- bwegukira ubushikiranganji bw’Ubwongereza bujejwe imigenderanire. GMC iratanga ico kibazo kandi mu bindi bihugu vyinshi biri ku rutonde rutukura -Ghana, Sudan, Pakistan na Bangladesh. Yaba GMC yaba n’ubuserukizi bw’Ubwongereza birahakaba kuba bigira uruhara rweruye mw’ironderwa ry’abakozi  bikavuga ko vyo ico bikora ari ugufasha kurondera ibikenewe abaganga bashaka kuja mu Bwongereza ku giti cabo – ivyo navyo bikaba vyemewe n’ingingo ngenderwako. Ku bijanye na Augustine, yariko arigira igice ca kabiri c’ivyo bibazo vya PLAB mu Bwongereza, ari naho NES yamurondera hanyuma ikamwemerera kumufasha kuronka uruhusha rwo kuba mu Bwongereza  n’ugushobora kuronka akazi. Mu gihe ivyo bidasa no kurondera umukozi vyeruye -NES ivuga ko atavyo yakoze, kuko idasanzwe ari ikigo kirondera abakozi kandi,  uko biri, ivugana n’abaganga bava mu bihugu vyo hanze, baba basanzwe bariko barangurira umwuga mu Bwongereza. Ariko igisata c’amagara y’abantu no kwitaho imibereho y’abantu batubwiye ko igitabo cabo c’ingingo ngenderwako gikora no kuri NES, ko rero ico kigo caciye kubiri naco. Twavuganye n’abaganga benshi b’abanya-Afrika barondewe muri iyi nzira  na NES.  Bose bari bafise inkuru zisa ku bijanye n’ico amasezerano yabo y’akazi avuga mu vy’ukuri, iyo bamaze kurungikwa gukorera mu bitaro vy’abigenga mu Bwongereza. .  Muganga Femi Johnson yarungitswe mu bindi bitaro bitari ivyo Augustine yarungitswemwo, ariko nawe nyene avuga ko yategerezwa gukora amasaha ari hagati ya 14 na 16 ku munsi kandi agaca arara izamu. Avuga ati: “Narananirwa cane. Narakenera kuryama. Nta muntu ashobora gukora gutyo iminsi yose indwi yose.” Ariko, akeneye kuruhuka kuko yaba yarushe cane ku buryo adashobora kubandanya akora, NES yari ifise uburenganzira bwo kumukata amafaranga ku mushara wiwe. Iyo kompanyi ivuga ko ayo mafaranga ari ayo kurondera umuganga amusubirira, ariko Femi avuga ko bituma abaganga ba NES babura ayo bacira n’ayo bamira. “Mu bihe nk’ivyo, nama nca nivugana imbere muri jewe – ‘Femi ubwo uriko urigirira neza wewe ubwawe kandi uriko uragirira neza umuryayi?’ “Aho bibabarije, n’uko bitama binshobokera kuronka inyishu kuri ico kibazo.” Bamwe mu baganga ba NES bararonse ubufasha bwa Muganga Jenny Vaughan wo mw’ishirahamwe Doctors’ Association. Aronka imyidogo myinshi y’aba RMO kandi avuga ko urwego rwa reta rw’amagara y’abantu rufise ingingo ngenderwako zibiri zitandukanye -imwe y’abanga ba NHS, n’iyindi y’abavuye mu bindi bihugu bakorera ibigo vyigenga. Abaganga ba NHS bakoreshwa amasaha atarenga 48, canke naho babisavye, amasaha 72 ku ndwi. Dr Vaughan avuga ati: “Nta muganga wo muri NHS akoreshwa amajoro ane akurikirana kuko turazi vy’ukuri ko atari vyiza. “Ivyo  n’akazi kameze nk’ako abaja (abacakara) …amasaha y’umurengera, ibintu twagira ngo bimaze imyaka 30 bitakibaho. “Ntawovyemera ku mutekano w’abarwayi. Ntawovyemera ku baganga.” Ivyo twatoye twarabijanye muri BMA – no  ku cegera c’umukuru wayo, Emma Runswick. Yatubwiye ko ivyo bintu ari akamaramaza ku “buvuzi bw’Ubwongereza”. “Bagenzi bacu bavuye mu bindi bihugu baciye kure kugira bashike ngaha hanyuma basanga uburyo bakoreshwamwo atawokwibaza ko bwobayeho.” NES Healthcare yo yatubwiye ko “ingene  abaganga bavuga”  ku gukorana n’iyo kompanyi “ari vyiza cane”. Ivuga ko ifasha abaganga kuronka “inzira nziza yo kubandanya umwuga baba bahisemwo muri NHS  no mu gisata c’ubuvuzi mu Bwongereza muri rusangi, kandi ko igikorwa cabo ari “ngirakamaro cane ku bantu bo mu Bwongereza.”

column2: Tanzania: Perezida Magufuli yirukanye umukozi wa leta yatabuye Ikorowani
column3: Perezida John  Magufuli wa Tanzania amenyesha ko yirukanye burundu mu kazi umukozi wa leta yatabuye igitabo ceranda c'Ikorowani, maze akwiragiza isanamu ku mbuga hwaniro ariko arayitabura. Yatangaje iyo ngingo uno munsi mu gihe yari mu birori vyo kwugurura ibiro vy'akarere ka Kigamboni mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. Ati: "Nyakwubahwa Jafo, hirya y'ejo niho numva, ko hari umuntu hariya i Kilosa yatabuye igitabo ceranda". "Ndagushimiye cane kubona warafashe ingingo yo kuba uramuhagarika, ariko jeho ndamwirukanye burundu. Mwandikire ikete ko yirukanywe burundu". "Atsinda urubanza canke atsindwa, uyo ntakiri umukozi wa leta, ntidushobora kubandanya dukorana n'abakozi b'ibijuju nk'abo muri ino leta". Mu ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutegetsi bw'intara n'amakomine, Selemani Jafo, yategetse ko umukozi w'ibiro vy'akarere ka Kilosa mu ntara ya Morogoro, Daniel Elimringi, ahagarikwa, ku caha co gutabura igitabu c'idini rya Isilamu, Ikorowani. Jafo ati: "Ni ukuri, iki kintu cakozwe n'umukozi nk'uyu nta ciza kizanira igihugu cacu kubera abanyagihugu bacu mu madini yose basanzwe babanye mu mahoro kandi bubahana mu butandukane". Iyo ngingo ya Jafo yafashwe inyuma y'aho isanamu yerekana uyo mukozi wa leta mu gisata c'ubudandaji mu biro vy'akarere ka Kilosa ariko aratabagura ico gitabo, ikwiragijwe ku mbuga hwaniro zitandukanye. Ikinyamakuru Mtanzania co muri ico gihugu kimenyesha ko uyo mukozi yamaze kurengutswa muri sentare, kandi ko yankiwe kuburana yidegemvya. Ico kinyamakuru gitangaza ko urwo rubanza ruzosubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 20 z'uku kwa kabiri.

column2: Madagascar: umuti Covid-Organics w'umukuru w'ico gihugu nturashobora guhagarika Covid-19
column3: Ibitaro vyo muri Madagascar bivuga ko biriko birarengerwa n'ibitigiri vyabandura Covid-19, mu gihe umukuru w'ico gihugu wewe abandanya ahimiriza umuti utaremezwa, avuga ko ushobora gukiza iyo ndwara, n'aho ishami rijejwe amagara kw'isi OMS rigabisha kw'ikoreshwa ry'imiti itaremezwa. Ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus vyaraduze incuro zine mu kwezi guheze muri ico gihugu co mw'ibahari Indiano, aho abarenga 13.000 banduye, abarenga 162 nabo barapfa kubera coronavirus yakwiragiye mu ntara zose kiretse imwe gusa. N'aho ivyo bitigiri bigenda biduga, umukuru w'igihugu Andry Rajoelina abandanya yizigiye uwo muti ukozwe mu biti kama wiswe Covid-Organics, umuti watanguye gukwiragizea mu kwa kane. Uhingurwa n'ikigo ca Madagascar kijejwe ubushakashatsi mu giterwa citwa artémisia - igiti gisanzwe gihingurwamwo imiti ya malaria- hamwe n'ibindi biti vyo muri Madagascar. Ni ikinyobwa kiriko kiradandazwa nk'umuti wo kuvura no gukinga - mu gihe kuva amezi ane aheze gihabwa abana mu mashure. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi igihe yariko atanga imfashanyo igizwe n'umuceri, amavuta, isukari n'ibindi nkenerwa kuri ba ntahonikora ku mugwa mukuru Antananarivo, umukuru w'ico gihugu yaboneyeho no kubaha uwo muti, Covid-Organics. Yaraneguwe bikomeye igihe yakoranya abanyagihugu mu gihe igihugu cari mu ngingo za guma mu rugo, ariko wewe akaba yabandanije afise icizere aho avuga ati: " Iki kiza ntikizokwamaho, tuzoruhira kugitsinda". Yavuze kandi ko ibitigiri vy'abandura bitari umurengera mu burere bw'igisagara bwari buherutse kuronswa uwo muti ku buntu. Ishirahamwe OMS rivuga ko ryakiriza yompi utwigoro two kuvura iyo ndwara hakoreshejwe uburyo kama, ariko rigasaba ivyemezo bivuye mu bushakashatsi imbere y'uko imiti kama ikoreshwa. Gushika ubu nta nyishu ziratangwa ku bipimo vyakozwe, ariko ico nticabujije ko uwo muti uhabwa ibihugu biharurwa muri mirongo vya Afrika. Leta ya Madagascar yoyo ibandanya yishigikira imbere y'abayinegura, haba mu gihugu canke mu makungu. Rinah Rakotomanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu ati: "Si uko dufise udukingirizo ko twoca twijajara imbere ya SIDA kandi ntibivuga ngo SIDA yaraheze! Nico kimwe". "Abenshi mu bafashe uwo muti ata zindi ndwara z'ivyuririzi bafise barakize neza, turishimiye uwo muti. Ni mu mico yacu gukoresha imiti kama nk'iyi. Mu gihe bigenda neza, nta bindi vyo kugerageza uwu muti bikenewe". Hagati aho, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu burinengesera, bugahanura ibitaro guha uwo muti aberekana ibimenyetso bito bito kandi ata zindi ndwara basanzwe bafise nk'igisukari. Ni ngombwa kandi ko n'abarwaye babanza kuvyemera. N'aho umukuru w'ico gihugu wewe yerekana ko afise ivyizigiro, abapfa bahitanywe na coronavirus bama bapfa umunsi ku munsi. Mu kwezi guheze, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu yarateye akamo amakungu ngo abafashishe ibikoresho, kuko yari afise amakenga ko ibitaro vyariko birarengerwa, ivyatumye ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu bimugabisha. Mu nyuma y'aho, ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bwaciye butera akamo ko kurondera abaganga n'abaforoma bofata mu mugongo ikigo co kuvura uwo mugera kiri ku kibuga ca  Mahamasina i Antananarivo. Ico kigo cuguruwe mu ntango z'uku kwezi kikaba kimaze kwakira abarwaye batari bake. Bimwe mu bitaro vyarengewe n'abarwayi ni ibitaro vya kaminuza vya Andohatapenaka i Antananarivo - vyakira indembe gusa za coronavirus cane cane abanduye basanzwe bafise n'izindi ndwara. Ishirahamwe rihurikiyemwo abaforoma n'abakirizi rivuga ko akakozi bo mu gisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu baharurwa muri mirongo banduye Covid-19. Ubwo bwoba bwagiye kwiyongera igihe leta ihagarikiye ingingo za guma mu rugo zari zimaze amezi atanu mu ntara ya Analamanga, isanzwe irimwo umugwa mukuru. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije kuri televiziyo y'ico gihugu, umukuru w'igihugu Rajoelina yavuze ko izo ngingo zitari kubandanya kuko zifise ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'abanyagihugu. Yavuze ko iyi ndwara yari yahagaritswe kandi ko abandura bagabanutse ku mugwa mukuru. Hagati aho, intara ya Analamanga iriziziwe cane n'iki kiza kandi kibandanya gikwirakwira mu zindi ntara z'iryo zinga.

column2: Abavugabutumwa bo muri Africa bariko basabira Trump ngo atsinde amatora
column3: N'aho asanzwe afise imvugo y'agasuzuguro kuri Afrika, Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arakunzwe cane na bamwe mu bihaye Imana bo kuri uyu mugabane. Mu nyigisho ziwe yatanze mu kwa gatandatu, Pasitori wo muri Nijeriya, Chris Oyakhilome, umuvugabutumwa azwi cane ku mboneshakure, yagize ati: "Mumusengere [Trump] kuko iyo Imana ishize imbere umwe mu bana biwe, shetani rimwe na rimwe ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo imusambure". Agabisha kandi ko abanegura uyu mukuru w'igihugu akomoka mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika ariko arondera kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu kwa cumi na rimwe banka urunuka abamushigikiye. Uyu mupasitori akunzwe cane kw'isi yose, harimwo na Amerika avuga ati: "Bafitiye ishavu ryinshi Trump kubera arwanira abakristu/abakristo, ico mukimenye. Rero abankwa ni mwebwe abakristu". Ikigo Pew Research gikora ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y'abantu kivuga ko mu gihe Perezida Trump azwi ko ari umutegetsi yacanishijemwo isi, mu bihugu nka Nijeriya na Kenya arakundwa cane nk'uko amatohoza y'iki kigo yavyerekanye mu kwa mbere uno mwaka. Kivuga ko amajambo yavuze mu 2018 yo kugereranya ibihugu vya Afrika "nk'imisarani" bobo ko ata kibazo ateye. Ibi bihugu vyompi bisanzwe bizwi ko bigendera cane ku madini. Mu bumanuko bwa Nijeriya, igihugu ca Afrika gifise abantu benshi, harangwamwo amashengero menshi, mu gihe muri Kenya naho abanyapolitike bakoresha cane amashengero mu gutanga ubutumwa ku banywanyi babo, ari naco gituma amadini afise ikibanza kinini muri ibi bihugu. Amashengero menshi ya kikristu muri Afrika, asanzwe arwanya cane ivyo gukorora inda, abubakana bahuje ibitsina, bakongera bagashigikira Israyeli, ntibigeze biyumvamwo uwasubiriwe na Trump, umu Democrate Barack Obama, n'aho afise amamuko muri Kenya. Richard Chogo, Pasitori mu rusengero rwa Deliverance ku mugwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwarahimirije umugambi w'ukwigenga (liberalisme) hano muri Afrika, kandi uwu mugambi wateje impungenge mu bategetsi bamwe bamwe b'amadini. Rero kabaye agahengwe ku butegetsi bwa Trump yahisemwo gusubiza ibirenge inyuma". Arashimagiza ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona bwarashoboye guhagarika imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe nka Marie Stopes, yafasha mu buryo bwo kugabanya imvyaro n'ugukoroza inda mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika. Iri shirahamwe ryaraneguye iyi ngingo ya Amerika yo guhagarika izi mfashanyo, rivuga ko rishira "ubuzima bw'abakenyezi mu kaga". Impari ku bijanye no gukoroza inda zimaze imyaka n'imiburiburi irenga 40. Kuva ico gihe, abavugabutumwa b'abazungu bagize uruhara rukomeye mu matora ku ruhande rw'aba Repubulika kandi ivyiyumviro vyabo vyarakwiye kw'isi yose, cane cane muri Afrika. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe Abaporotesanti b'abirabure benshi muri Amerika bashigikiye umugambwe uharanira Demokarasi kandi bakanegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump, nk'uko icegeranyo gishasha ca  Pew Research kivyerekana. Emeka Ezeji, umupasitori mukuru mw'ishengero rya Anglicani mu ntara ya Enugu iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nijeriya, avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vya politike bishingiye "ku vyanditswe" gusa. Avuga ati: "Abakristu ba Afrika bazi ko umukuru w'igihugu w'umu Repubulika ari we mwiza kuri Amerika no kw'isi". Abandanya asengera Perezida Trump ko yotsinda umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi Joe Biden mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe, kandi ko yari yafashe umwanya iminsi yose wo gusengera uyu mukuru w'igihugu ngo akire igihe aheruka mu bitaro  kubera coronavirus. Nk'uko bimeze kuri Pasitori Chogo, na we nyene abona ko "intege nke" za Trump zidategerezwa kurengera "inyungu rusangi". Nk'akarorero, ariyamiriza rya sekeza rya Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), isekeza Trump afata ko ari "ikimenyetso c'urwanko", akavuga ko "ryanyazwe intumbero yaryo". Yibaza ibibazo vyinshi aho avuga ati: "Abandi bantu atari abazungu nta vanguraruhu bakorerwa? Ubuzima bw'umwirabure abayabaye ubu bwoba ari bwiza ugereranije n'imyaka indwi iheze? Canke umwirabure abayabaye ubu yoba ageramiwe ubu kuri Trump gusumba kuri Obama?" Bwana Trump arirata ko ari we mu perezida wa Amerika amaze gukorera ivyiza vyinshi Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika gusumba abandi baperezida bose  mu mateka ya  Amerika, kenshi agafatira ku rugero ruto rw'ubushomeri mu myaka itatu ya mbere y'ubutegetsi bwiwe, ico Bwana Ezeji akenguruka cane. Ubunyamabanga bujejwe akazi buvuga ko igitigiri c'abashomeri b'abirabure mu kw'icenda ari co gitigiri gito cane cabayeho kuva butanguye kwegeranya ibiharuro nk'ibi mu myaka ya 1970, n'aho ibi vyahindutse kubera coronavirus. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji  avuga ko Bwana Trump agifise igikorwa kinini ategerezwa gukora ku neza ya bose, aha akaba afatira ku mwami Cyrus (Kuro) w'umu perse avugwa muri Biblia ko yari yatoranijwe n'Imana kugira ngo yigarurire Babiloni, maze abanya Isirayeli bari bahunze  banona gusubira i Yerusalemu. Avuga ati: "Trump niwe we Kuro wa kino gihe". Bwana Emeka  avuga ati: "Imana irabivuze....ni umusuku wanje azorangura ishaka ryanje". Pasitori Juliet Eyimofe Binite ari mu gisagara ca Lagos muri Nijeriya aremeranya nawe. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Yatowe n'Imana". Buri ku ndwi, uyu mupasitori w'umugore yama asengera  Trump ngo atsinde amatora ku ncuro ya kabiri. Avuga ko Imana yamuhaye ubutumwa imbere y'amatora ya 2016 ko hari umuntu atunze cane yinjiye muri politike kandi ko ashigikiye ubwigenge bw'amadini, abakristu babona ko bubangamiwe. Avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yariko irarondera umukozi, umuntu w'intungane kubera hari ibikorwa bimwe bimwe abantu beza badashobora gukora". "Dukeneye umuntu ashobora kurwanira agateka k'abemera". Avuga kandi ko Trump ataronka amashimwe akwiriye kuri politike yiwe mpuzamakungu, nk'akarorero amasezerano y'amahoro hagati ya Isirayeli na Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abararu (Emirats Arabes Unis). Pasitori Chogo na we nyene niko abibona: "N'aho woba uri Saddam Hussein cane Muammar Gaddafi, ntihabuze nk'ikintu kimwe canke bibiri vyiza wakoreye abanyagihugu bawe". Avuga ko Trump ashigikiwe ku mugabane wa Afrika kubera ukuntu atarya umunwa, aho avuga ko abategetsi ba Afrika bakeneye kubwirwa mu majambo yeruye kugira ngo bashobore gutunganya ibihugu vyabo. Mu butumwa butandukanye yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Bwana Trump aherutse kwibutsa abakristu bamushigikiye ko ubwisanzure mu vyo gusenga hamwe n'urugamba rwo kurwanya umugenzo wo gukoroza inda bishobora gukwama mu gihe atotsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji afata ibintu yishimikije ubuhanuzi bwa Bibiliya buvuga ibihe vya nyuma. Ati: "Ko azotsinda canke atazotsinda, ico si ikibazo ca Trump, ahubwo ni ikibazo c'ivyo Imana ivuga". "Trump ni nka ca giti co muri Biblia abihweza ibirere bafatirako mu kwihweza ibimenyetso vy'ibihe...aramutse atsinze, tuzoba tugifise igihe co kubaho, nayo akaramuka atsinzwe nta gihe tuzoba tugisigaje".

column2: Izinga rya Man ryahaye u Burundi imiriyoni £1.3 nk'imfashayo yo kurwanya ihindagukira ry'ibihe
column3: Reta y'izinga rya Man yahaye ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza imfashanyo  ingana n' imiriyoni 1.3 z'amapawundi ( yababa imiriyaridi 3 .5 mu mafaranga y'amarundi) mu ntumbero yo gufasha kurwanya "ingaruka z'ihindagurika ry'ibihe". Iri shirahamwe International Development Partnership (IDP) ryacishije iyi mfashanyo mu rindi shirahamwe Send a Cow risanzwe rirangurira imigambi mu Burundi. Richard Granville ajejwe ibijanye n'imfashanyo muri iryo shirahamwe, avuga ko aya mafaranga yatanzwe agiye gufasha "umugambi w'imyaka ibiri" mu "ntara ya Mwaro". Reta y'iryo zinga ryo ku mugabane w'Uburayi isanzwe yarategekanijwe amafaranga y'ama pawundi agera ku miriyoni 2.5 y'imfashanyo mpuzamakungu. Igisata c'ihindagurika ry'ibirere ni kimwe mu bisata bibiri iri shirahamwe  IDP ryahisemwo gufasha mu kiringo ca 2021-2023. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Howard Quayle avuga ati: "Ikiza karanda ca coronavirus carerekanye ingene twese dukeneraniye kw'isi yose kandi ndanezerewe kubona iri zinga rya Man rishobora gufasha muri iki gikorwa kidasanzwe". Granville avuga ko Uburundi bwama "buhura n'ingaruka zikomeye z'ihindagurika ry'ikirere" mu gihe ibice 94% vy'abanyagihugu "babeshejweho n'uburimyi bwo ku rugero ruto kandi bushingiye ku mvura". Domothile Niyonzima w'imyaka 43 asanzwe aba i Mwaro, avuga ati: "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni uko ata mfungurwa zikwiye turonka, kubera tudafise intabire yo gutabira isi yacu". Unicef ivuga ko abantu barenga 114.000 mu Burundi bataye izabo kubera ibiza bishingiye kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe Send a Cow mu Burundi Gloria Nimpundu avuga ko iri shirahamwe rifasha abarimyi mu  "kubaha amazi n'isi ndimwa nziza" kandi ko "akarusho kariko karibonekeza". Avuga ko "ikibazo c'imvura igwa nabi nabi kandi itizewe kigenda ciyongera" gituma bigorana "kwitegurira irima n'iyimbura". "Muri iyi myaka iheze, izuba ryaratikije ibiterwa mu nyuma naho imyuzure iratikiza imirima". Yongerako y'uko uwu mugambi uriko urarangurirwa i Mwaro uzofasha imiryango ishika 5250 "kwikenura mu buryo bw'amafaranga mu guhangana n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere, biciye mu kurima n'ukworora kijambere".

column2: Sengazi, umuhinga wa mbere mu gutwenza w'i Burundi n'i Rwanda' aronse 'RFI Talent du Rire'
column3: Michael Sengazi niwe muhinga wa mbere mu gutwenza mu Burundi no mu Rwanda ubu yatsindiye igihembo citiriwe 'RFI Talent du Rire' gitanzwe ku ncuro ya gatanu. Sengazi ni umuhinga mu gutwenza yavukiye i Gitega mu Burundi kuri se w'Umurundi na nyina yavukiye i Burundi ariko akomoka mu Rwanda. Igihembo RFI Talent du Rire catangujwe n'umuhinga mu gutwenza yitwa Mamane akomoka muri Niger, asanzwe kandi ategura amakuru y'ugutwenza kw'iradiyo y'abafaransa RFI Gondwana. Ni igihembo kironswa umuhinga muvyo gutwenza yabaye uwa mbere mu bandi. Iki gihembo kijana n'ama €4 000 azokironswa mu kwezi kuza kwa umi na kabiri. Bwana Sengazi ati: "Kano gashimwe rero kuri jewe ni ikintu gikomeye, cerekana ko babonye kandi bemeye ko akazi kanje ndagakora neza, kandi ko nshobora n'ukugera kure gusumba ng'aha". Muri Afrika, aka gashimwe gatanzwe ku ncuro igira gatanu, Michael Sengazi rero akaba ariwe yatowe ku rwego rwa Afrika yose. Bwana Sengazi yize amashure y'intango mu Burundi n'ayisumbuye kuri Michel Archange i Bujumbura, yiga amategeko muri Kaminuza ya ULK i Kigali mu Rwanda. Ahejeje ivyigwa yahisemwo gukora umwuga wo gutwenza. Ati: "Nacaguye gukora ibijanye na comedie kuko nabona ko ariyo mpano Imana yampaye". Avuga ko hari abantu badatahura ko uyu nawo ari umwuga. Ati: "Ndabumva cane kuko ni ibintu batamenyereye, badasanzwe bakora canke babona". Michael yinjiye neza na neza muri ico gisata mu 2010 akina theatre, mu nyuma ahura na bagenzi we baciye batanguza umugambi w'ugukora ivyo gutwenza i Kigali. Agitangura abavyeyi biwe nabo ntibavyumva ariko mu nyuma baramufata mu mugongo. "Umuvyeyi yumvise ko mvuye mu vy'amategeko ngiye gukina ivyo gutwenza, yaciye abona ko ngiye kwonona amafaranga y'ishure yantangiye" - Bwana Sengazi. "Ku muvyeyi, kugira ngo umuntu atere imbere ni uko akora akazi nyene k'abantu bakomeye, bwa buzi nyene buzwi n'abantu benshi. Ako kazi gashasha rero gashasha ntibashoboye kugasobanukirwa canke ngo bakumve, ariko naragerageje kubibumvisha". Michael atera akamo abandi bavyeyi gushigikira abandi bana bashobora kuba bafise intumbero bashaka kujanamwo ubuzima bwabo, mu gihe atari ikintu kimwicira ubuzima canke gituma amera nabi. Agira ati: "Ni ukumuba hafi kuko ni yatsitara ni wewe uzohangayika kuko ni umwana wawe".

column2: Lady Gaga n'umufana bituye hasi bavuye hejuru ku butambiro i Las Vegas, batanguza imitwe
column3: Lady Gaga yaraguye atanguza umutwe amaguru aja hejuru agwa mu barorerezi mu giteramo giheruka mu muji wa Las Vegas. Uwo 'musani' yari yahamagaye umufana wiwe azwi nka Jack ngo aze ku butambiro, aca asimbira mu maboko yiwe - ariko uwo mufana abura intege bose baca batembera hasi. Umwe mu bariko bararorera igiteramo yanditse agira ati "n'ukuri twari tuzi yuko apfuye". Ahubwo Gaga yaciye agaruka ku butambiro aririmba indirimbo Million Reasons na Jack amuri impande. Yagize ati "Birahimbaye. Turakundana cane ku buryo twaguye twese tuva ku butambiro." "Twagwanye mu maboko. Turi nka Jack na Rose bo muri Titanic. "Ndibaza ko tuza gusangira icayi nyuma y'aha." Abafana bari bagize ubwoba bibaza ko Gaga yababaye kuko asanzwe afise uburwayi buzwi nka fibromyalgia, uburwayi amaranye igihe butuma ababara umubiri wose. Ubwo burwayi bushobora kandi gutuma ababa birengeje, akaruha, inyama z'umubiri zikagumirwa, kwibuka bikamugora kandi akabura itiro. Mu 2013, yahagaritse ibiteramo vy'urukurikirane Born This Way amaze kuvunika ikiyunguyungu. Ariko uwo muririmvyi kugwa kw'ejo kuwa kane ntaco kwamutwaye, ahumuriza abarorerezi hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano bamufashije guhaguruka. Kanda ngaha urabe ingene Lady Gaga n'umufana baguye Yagize ati: "Vyose ni sawa. Ikintu kimwe kitagenda ni uko dukeneye ingazi kuri ubu butambiro kugira nsubire hejuru." Uwo 'musani' yanahojeje Jack, yari yarenzwe n'umwosori kubera ivyari bihejeje kuba. Gaga yagize ati: "Ntugire ingorane, vyose ni sawa. Si ikosa ryawe. Urashobora kunyemerera ikintu? Urashobora kwibabarira ubu nyene kubera ibihejeje gushika?" Nyuma muri ico giteramo, Gaga yarerekanye yuko ukwo kugwa ata na kimwe kwamutwaye aca akora ikarasisi rikomeye ariko araririmba indirimbo yiwe ikunzwe, Bad Romance.

column2: DR Congo: Ekleziya Gatorika isaba abapatiri bavyaye kuva mu mabanga
column3: Urwandiko rw'Inama y'Abepiskopi ba Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, CENCO, rwanyereye rugashika mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru rusaba abapatiri bo muri Congo bavyaye abana gutanga imihoho mu mabanga yabo y'ubusaserdoti, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru RFI. Inama y'abepiskopi CENCO, itegeka ko kizira y'uko abapatiri barangura amabanga y'abubatse. Urwo rwandiko rusohotse mu gihe Papa Francis yimirije kugendera Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo muri Mukakaro (7) uyu mwaka. Muri uru rwandiko rw'impapuro 19 rwiswe "A l'école de Jésus-Christ. Pour une vie sacerdotale authentique" (ni ukuvuga: Kw'ishure rya Yezu/Yesu Kristu/Kristo. Ubuzima nyabwo bw'ukwihebera Imana), abasenyeri bavuga ko ubuzima bw'igipatiri budashobora kubangikanwa n'ubuzima bw'ukuba serugo. CENCO isaba uwihebeye Imana uwo ari we wese afise umwana "gusaba uruhusha Papa rwo kuva muri ayo mabanga", nk'uko bisubirwamwo na RFI. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko mu gihe hogira abihebeye Imana bovyanka, musenyeri ashobora kwitura Vaticano kugira ngo ifate ibihano vyo ku rwego rwa nyuma, ibi bigasigura kwirukanwa burundi muri Ekleziya. Hari igice kimwe muri uru rwandiko rwa CENCO kivuga ibijanye n'abana b'aba bapatiri hamwe na ba nyina babo. Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi ivuga ko ishaka "gushira ibintu ahabona" ku bijanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze kuri bo, ikibutsa ko muri rusangi usanga "banenwa mu kibano". Ico gice kigira kiti: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima".i: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima". Ikibazo c'abihebeye Imana bavyara abana muri Ekleziya Gatorika ni ikibazo giteje impari no mu bindi bihugu vy'akarere no kw'isi. Mu mpera z'umwaka uheze uwari Musenyeri mukuru wa Paris, Musenyeri Michel Aupetit, yasavye imbabazi aca atanga n'imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera "umubano udasanzwe n'umugore". Ico gihe kandi, Patiri Wenceslas Munyeshyaka w'umunyarwanda, yahagaritswe ku kuba padiri wa paruwasi ya Brionne mu Bufaransa inyuma y'uko bimenyekanye ko yemeye mu nzego z'ubutegetsi ko ari se w'umuhungu yavutse mu kw'indwi 2010.

column2: Umunonotsi Olivia Breen yashavuriye umutegetsi yamubwiye ko yambara udukariso tugufi cane
column3: Uyu munonotsi amaze gutsindira imidari y'inzahabu incuro zibiri mu mikino y'abafise ubumuga (Paralympics), Olivia Breen avuga ko yashavuye cane abura n'ico avuga inyuma y'aho abwiriwe ko yokwambara agakabutura "kabereye gusumba". Breen w'imyaka 24 avuga ko umutegetsi wo mu gisata kijejwe amahiganwa mu Bwongereza yamubwiye ku wa Mungu ko udukariso yambara ari "tugufi cane kandi tumugaragaza cane". Uyu munonotsi yiruka ku metero ngufi akongera agasimba ku ntera ndende (saut en longueur/long-jump) avuga ko yashize ahabona ibi kugira ngo ntibize bishikire n'abandi. Breen ati: "Ibi vyanshavuje cane kandi si vyiza na gato". "Erega tahura ko ata burenganzira bafise bwo kuvuga ku vyo dushobora canke tudashobora kwambara". Breen yatsindiye umudari w'inzahabu mu mahiganwa ahuza abafise ubumuga kanaka ya ralley (T35-38 4x100m) mu 2015, hamwe no mu 2017 mw'ihiganwa ryo gusimba ku ntera ndende, kandi yamye yambara uducupi tumwe ari mu mwuga wiwe. Yabwiye ikiganiro Woman's Hour ca BBC Radio 4 ati: "Zimeze nka bikini zigera hejuru". "Ndazambaye  mu kiringo c'imyaka icenda, nta ngorane nigeze ngira kandi twategerezwa kwumva ko ata ngorane dufise ku vyo twambaye". "Dushaka kwumva ko tubangukiwe uko bishoboka kwose iyo turi mu mahiganwa, ntitwumve ko turemerewe, kandi tutisanzuye". "Ni uburenganzira bwacu kwambara uko twiyumva". Breen - yatsindiye kandi umudari wa bronze mu mikino ya Paralempike yabereye i Londres mu 2012, avuga ko ivyamushikiye vyabaye ahejeje guhiganwa mu gusimba ku ntera ndende i Bedford. Ati: "Nari mpejeje ihiganwa ryanje ndiko nshimira abategetsi kubona baramfashije bakamba hafi ariho rero uyu mutegetsi yanyegera akambwira ati 'ndashobora kuvugana nawe?' nanje nti ego nta ngorane, hari ikibazo nyabaki'?". "Yambwiye ati 'nibaza ko agakariso wambaye kakwerekana cane, nibaza ko ukwiye kuraba ingene wogura agakabutura'. Narabuze ico mvuga, icanjemwo kwabaye kumubaza nti 'uriko urifyinatira?'." Breen avuga ko abanonotsi b'abagabo/abahungu badashobora gukurikiranwa gutyo canke ngo banegurwe, amaze kwandika ku mbuga hwaniro ivyo yabwiwe, yavuze ko n'abandi banonotsi b'abagore bamubwiye ko na bo nyene bahuye n'ivyo bibazo. Yongera ko ati: "Nta ngorane nari bwigere numva, ariko ivyabaye ejo vyaranshavuje cane, kandi ndavye inyishu naronse kuri  Instagram na Twitter, vyarabaye no ku bandi bakobwa benshi ndetse n'abanonotsi bakiri bato, kandi ibi bitegerezwa guhinduka". "Nibaza ko abantu batubahuka kubishira ahabona kubera batinya, nipfuza ko abantu biyemera bakabishira ahabona kuko ivyabaye si vyo kandi ni ngombwa ko bihagarara". "Ibi nzobigeza kure hashoboka, ngomba gutanga ubutumwa kugira ngo mpindure ibintu mu bijanye n'ukwinonora imitsi ku bagore n'abakobwa kugira ngo abantu bareke kuvuga ku vyo dushobora canke tudashobora kwambara". Uwundi munonotsi w'umwongerezakazi nyene, Amelia Stricker atera ibiremereye (lanceuse de poids/shot putter), avuga ko uyu mutegetsi yavuze aya majambo "atagira akamaro" atari akwiye guhagarikira inkino, iciyumviro asangiye na Breen. Ati: "Egooo, ndavyemera cane". "Bakora igikorwa kidasanzwe kandi ndashima ingene badufasha, ariko ntibategerezwa kudutegeka ivyo twambara. Bari ng'aho ku kazi kabo no kudufasha, ariko atari kuvuga ubujambojambo ku vyo twambaye, ntibibaraba". Umuvugizi w'igisata kijejwe ukwinonora imitsi yavuze ko bazi ico kibazo kandi ko bagiye gukora amatohoza. Ati: "Ni ngombwa ko abari mu mahiganwa bose bumva ko bagononokewe kugira ngo bashobore guhiganwa neza".

column2: Burundi - Miriyaridi 7 ziranyuruzwa buri mwaka mu matagisi y'amasoko ya Bujumbura
column3: Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere rusangi mu Burundi agabisha abatoza amakori (taxes) mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura ko bagiye gufatirwa ingingo hamwe bobandanya kuba intambamyi mu kwinjiza mu kigega c'igisigara amafaranga yose ategegerezwa gutozwa mu masoko. Ingingo ya mbere ija imaze gufatwa. Inyuma y'inama bagirishijwe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura na General Gervais Ndirakobuca, hafashwe ingingo yo guhagarika abari bajejwe gutoza amakori n'ama taxe mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura. General Ndirakobuca yavuze ko  ubushikiranganji bwo nyene bwitoreje ayo mafaranga buca burenzako miriyoni 121 ku ndwi, ''kandi aba commaissaires b'amasoko ntibigeze batworohereza''. Ati: "Mwonsigurira gute ko amafaranga atozwa muri mairie mu ndwi imwe, turavye n'inzitizi twahuye nazo, ubushikiranganji buriko buratoza burenzako miriyoni 121? Ntimwumva ko igihugu capfuye?" Yavuze ko ashobora no gushika miriyoni 150 ku ndwi, bisiguye ku mwaka ko arenga  miriyaridi ndwi (ashika miliyoni $3.5). Mu ma komine yo hagati mu gihugu ho ,  umushikiranganji Ndirakubuca yavuze ko basanze muri rusangi reta itakaza miriyaridi 40  ku mwaka. Yabwiye ibitavye iyo nama harimwo abajejwe gutoza amakori mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura ati: "Inyuma y'iyi nama, uwusubira kuvyivangamwo, ibimushikira ntagire ngo n'ubushikiranganji…..ntavuge ngo reta mvyeyi itwara abantu ku Musaga'', imvugo iciye hirya yo kubagabisha ko bazofatwa, bagapfungwa-ku  Musaga niho hari ibohero rikuru rya Mpimba. Reta y'Uburundi isanzwe ishigikira imirimo y'amakomine ku mafaranga angana na miriyaridi 63  ku mwaka. Umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca  avuga ko hamwe ama komine yokwinjiza amafaranga yose ategerezwa kuboneka, ayo reta itanga yoheza agakora ibindi. Uburundi buri mu bihugu vya mbere kw'isi birangwamwo ibiturire cane, hakurikijwe icegeranyo c'uwu mwaka ca Transparency International, ikigo gikurikirana ibijanye n'ibiturire mu bihugu vyose vyo kw'isi.

column2: Isi ihanzwe n'akaga katari bwigere kabaho kuva ku ntambara ya kabiri y’isi yose - Putin
column3: N﻿a  Yaroslav Lukov BBC News Perezida Vladimir Putin  w’Uburusiya agabisha ko isi ishobora kuba ihanzwe "n'akaga katari bwigere kabaho" kuva intambara ya kibiri y’isi yose irangiye. Mw’ijambo rirerire yashikirije ku wa kane, yagerageje gusigura igitero c’Uburusiya kuri Ukraine, ingingo yatumye amakungu abukumira. Putin kandi yagiriza ibihugu vy’Uburengero gutera ubwoba Uburusiya vyihishije inyuma y’ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vya nikleyeri mu ntumbero yo kubwonkora ku ncuti zabwo. Uburengero buriyamiriza amajambo y’iterabwoba rya nikleyeri aherutse gushikirizwa na Kremlin (Ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu w’Uburusiya). Mu ntango z’ino ndwi, ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwanshi hamwe OTAN/NATO ryariyamirije ibirego bitagira ishingiro vy’’Uburusiya bivuga ko Ukraine ishobora gukoresha “ibombe y’umwanda”  - amabombe yemewe gukoreshwa ariko avanze n’ubumara. Umunyamabanga mukuru wa OTAN Jens Stoltenberg avuga ko ibihugu bihurikiye muri uru runani vyiyamiriza ibi birego, kandi ko “Uburusiya butohirahira ngo bugikoreshe nk’icitwazo co kugira ibintu vyunyuke”. Perezida Putin yavuze ibi mw’ijambo yashikirije ikoraniro ry’umwaka rya Valdai inyuma y’imisi ingabo ziwe zimaze zitsindwa ku rugamba muri Ukraine n’ishavu ribandanya ryiyongera mu banyagihugu ritewe n’ingingo yo kwinjiza mu gisirikare Abarusiya bandi 300.000 mu twigoro tw’iyi ntambara. Umusi umwe imbere y’ijambo ryiwe i Moscou, yari yagaharikiye imyimenyerezo ya buri mwaka y’ingabo z’igisata ca nikleyeri mu gisirikare c’Uburusiya, yarimwo ukwimenyereza gukora igitero ca nikleyeri mu gihe umwansi yoramuka akoze igitero ca nikleyeri ku gihugu ciwe. Yabwiye abari aho ati: "Ntabwo twigeze tuvuga ikintu kijanye n’uko Uburusiya bushobora gukoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri busotowe. Twishuye gusa ku majambo yavuzwe n’abarongoye ibihugu vy’Uburengero”. Perezida Putin yahagaze ku wahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere w’Ubwongereza Liz Truss ku majambo yavuze ari mu myiyamamazo mu kw’umunani ko yari yiteguye gutera ibisasu vya nikleyeri mu gihe vyoba ngombwa ko akora gutyo. Avuga ko yatangajwe n’ingene incuti z’Ubwongereza zitavyiyamirije: "None twari kugira gute? Kunuma? Kwigira nk’uko ataco twumvise”? Hagati aho, abandanya agabisha ko Uburusiya buzokoresha “uburyo bwose bufise” mu kwikingira, amajambo afatwa nk’iterabwoba rya nikleyeri ryeruye. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yagiriza umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya gukinisha amajambo “mabi cane” kw’ikoreshwa ry’ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru ba Amerika, Biden yabajije ati: "Kubera iki aririmba ivy’ubushobozi bwo gukoresha ibirwanisho vy’ubumara? Nimba ata mugambi afise, kubera iki yama ariko arabivuga?”. Yasubiyemwo amajambo yo kwifatira mu gahanga Uburengero, n’ico yita “umukino wiwe mubi, ucafuye kandi wo gusesa amaraso” wo kwaka ibihugu ubusugire n’ubwigenge bwavyo. Ico gihe, Putin yari yavuze ko “ukwiganza kutagira urugero”  kw’Uburengero mu buzima bw’isi ubu kuriko kurarangira. "Turi ku musozo mu mateka y’isi. Igihe kiri imbere kumbure nico gihe c’akaga gakomeye, kidatomoye kandi aho nyene gikomeye cane kuva intambara ya kabiri y’isi yose irangiye”. "Uburengero nta bushobozi bugifise bwo kwiganzira isi – ariko 'buriko bwita ku rutare ngo bufate ibintu mu minwe'”. Avuga ko “iyindi ntumbero ya kazoza k’isi iriko irategurwa turorera”, aca yagiriza Uburengero burongowe na Amerika ko buriko bugerageza gusambura Uburusiya, ariko akaba atatanze ivyemezo. Ijambo ryiwe ryerekana isi uko Vladimir Putin ayibona, isi aho Uburusiya butagira akanenge, akagiriza Uburengero ko ari bwo ntandaro ya vyose, kuva ku ntambara yo muri Ukraine gushika ku ngorane z’imfungurwa zihanze isi, nk’uko umunyamakuru Steve Rosenberg, umwanditsi mukuru ku Burusiya abivuga. Mw’iryo jambo, Putin ntiyigeze yicuza ku ntambara yatanguje muri Ukraine.

column2: Manchester City 4-3 Real Madrid: ubwo City izoshobora gusezerera Real?
column3: Igihe Carlo Ancelotti ahura ubwa nyuma na Manchester City ku kibuga cayo, vyabaye ibiterasoni kuri we mu gukubitwa 5-0 muri urwo rukino rwabaye urwa nyuma kuri we nk'umumenyereza wa Everton, hari ku wa 23 rusama (5) 2021. Igihe uyu mutaliyano  w'umukambwe mu vyo ubumenyereza, ubu afise imyaka 62, aramvuriye amaboko araba abo bakorana, akaraba kw'isaha yiwe afise amakenga ko inyuma y'iminota 11 gusa umurwi wiwe wari umaze gukubitwa 2-0 mu gihe yari asubiye kuri ico kibua ca Etihad Stadium, kumbure ubwoba bwaramurenze ko yagomba abone nk'ayo yabonye kuri uwo musi. City yaraguruka mu kirere! Real yari yarengewe. Uyo murwi wa Premier League umaze igihe urondera gutsindira iki gikombe ca Bulaya waboneka ko wari wigaruriye urukino bimwe ntasubirwamwo. Ariko rero impera ya vyose, mu buryo butangaje kuri abo bose bashoboye kurorera urwo rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru rwari ruteye igomwe, Ancelotti aho yibereye ku mpande z'ikibuga yari yuzuye akamwemwe, mu maso aboneka ko yishimiye cane ingene uru rukino rwa mbere rurangiye atsinzwe kuri 4-3. Si ukuvuga ko yabonetse nk'uko ari kibirengeye nk'abandi kubona Real itagiye akagirire, muri uru rugamba rwo kurondera gukina urukino rwa nyuma rw'iri higanwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champons League). Abakinyi ba City nta mubabaro bari bafise - ivyo ntivyari kuba kuko berekanye urukino rwiza cane mbere rurangira barutsinze. Hagati aho, baraboneka mu maso ko ibintu vyari kuba ibindi iyo bagashobora kurushiriza aho bagatsinda vyinshi nk'uko bavyibaza, imbere y'urukino rwo gusubiza ruzobera ku kibuga ca Real Madrid, Bernabeu. Ijoro ryakeye ryari iridasanzwe, aho vyose vyari biryoheye ijisjo mu bijanye n'umupira w'amaguru wo kuri uru rugero rudakunze kuboneka, aho City, igihe cose, yari iteye ubwoba. Ariko rero... Iyo hageze muri Champions League, Bernabeu yama ikora ibitangaza kandi n'aho kumbure City ishobora kudaterwa inkokora nk'izo yatewe bigakomera igihe ihura na Atletico Madrid  mu rukino rugira kabiri rw'igice ca nyuma gishira ica kane, kizoba ikibazo gikomeye kuri bo ni bashobora kubandanya mu gihe bafise igitsindo kimwe gusa basumvya Real. City barasamaye barareka Real ibaca mu ryahumye, kahise kagashobora kutwereka ko iri rishobora kuba ikosa riremereye cane. Ancelotti, co kimwe n'abandi benshi muri Real, baramaze guca mu bintu nk'ibi bakarengana, n'aho kumbure bazotegerezwa kwemera ko barushijwe bimwe biteye ubwoba mu kiringo kitari gito c'uru rukino. Ariko kandi ntibashobora kubura ivyizigiro ko impera n'imperuka bashobora kurengana bagahura na Liverpool canke Villarreal mu rukino rwa nyuma ruzobera i Paris. Inkuru nziza kuri City ni uko, n'aho ata ntsinzi nini baronse, baramaze igihe kitari gito basumvya cane urukino Real, aho na Luka Modric n'ubuhinga bwiwe hagati yananiwe kwerekana ibidasanzwe. City bari babangutse, berekana ubuhinga bwinshi, bagakina neza, kandi bafashe umupira bari abantu bateye ubwoba. Ibi ni vyo bizoba biri mu mitwe yabo mu gihe bazoba bari mu rugendo ruzobashikana i Madrid. Ariko kandi ... Ni nde yoshobora kumenya urugero Real ikwiye gutsindwa kugira ngo itahe, mu gihe mu rukino ruzokurikira izoba ashigikiwe n'isinzi ry'abakunzi i Bernabeu muri uno murwi ufise kahise gakomeye muri iri higanwa? Mu rukino urwo ari rwo rwose ruhambaye nk'uru muri iki kibuga c'amateka, uyu murwi wama ukora ibitangaza. Guardiola yarerekanye icari mu mutwe igihe City iteye ica kabiri, Real iboneka koko ivyayo birangiye. Uyu munya Espagne yatewe n'uburakari igihe Riyad Mahrez akoze icaha gikomeye cane mu kwigungirako umupira, aza kuwutera inyuma kandi Phil Foden yari wenyene imbere y'igori arindiriye ko amuha umupira ngo atereremwo. Kuri 3-0, nta wuzi ko ibintu bitari kuba birangiye. N'uburakari bwinshi, Guardiola yakome induru ati: "Riyad. Riyad". Arazi neza ko ari ikosa rinini guha akanya na gato Real, kandi uyu murwi rutura wa Espagne waravyerekanye koko. City binjije ibitsindo bibiri vyose ku ncuro zitatu gusa bateye mw'igori, bakinye neza, urukino ruryoheye ijisho. Ariko, ifirimbi ya nyuma ivuze, bashobora kuba baricujije kuri ayo mazinda atari akenewe bagiye bagira muri urwo rukino rwa nijoro.

column2: India: Ingene umwambaro wa hijab wambarwa n'abagore bo muri Islam uteje ibibazo
column3: Intara yo mu Buhindi yugaye amashure yisumbuye na kaminuza biturutse ku kibazo c'umwambaro wa hijab kiriko gikurikiranirwa hagufi n'amakungu inyuma y'aho uwuharanira agateka ka muntu Malala Yousafzai yatsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel avyinjiriyemwo. Reta y'intara ya Karnataka iri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi yafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho abanyeshure bihereye amabarabara mu myiyerekano ishingiye ku bakobwa bambara uwu mwambaro wo mw'idini rya Islam, imyiyerekano yandurutsemwo imigumuko. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, sentare nkuru y'iyo ntara itegekanya kwiga ku rwandiko ruvugira abagore b'aba Islam. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho abanyeshure batandatu b'urwaruka bagiriye imyiyerekano imbere y'ishure ryegukira reta ku kibazo co kwambara hijab, imyiyerekano yaciye ikwiragira ku yandi mashure. Abanyeshure batari bake b'aba Hindu nabo baciye biha amabarabara bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ibara ry'ikimenyetso c'idini rya Hindu - mu kwiyamiriza abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab. Ejo ku wa kabiri, umupfasoni Malala - umugore yarokotse igitero c'aba Taliban muri Pakistan afise imyaka 15 ahorwa ko yariko avugira abakobwa ko boronswa uburenganzira bwo kwiga  - yateye akamo abategetsi b'Ubuhindi ko bogira ico bakoze kugira "bahagarike inenwa abagore b'aba Islam bakorerwa". Uyu mupfasoni w'imyaka 24 yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Kubuza abakobwa kuja kw'ishure bambaye hijab zabo ni ibintu bibabaje. Ivyo gufata nabi abagore birabandanya - kubera uko bambaye". Mu Buhindi, uru ruhagarara rwongereje ubwoba n'ishavu mu nkehwa z'aba Islam bavuga ko ibwirizwashingiro ribaha uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ivyo bambara. Ejo ku wa kabiri, amareresi yakwiragiye cane yerekana umukobwa w'umu Islam ariko azomerwa n'ikirwi c'abagabo bakiri bato  bamuvugiriza induru, n'impari zikomeye hagati y'abanyeshure bambaye hijab n'abandi bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu bintu bidakunze kuba, umucamanza ariko arakurikirana uru rubanza yateye akamo abanyeshure hamwe n'abandi "kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano". Ikibazo catanguye kuja hejuru igihe abanyeshure batandatu biga kw'ishure ryisumbuye ryo mu karere ka Udupi mu ntara ya Karnataka batangura imyiyerekano kubera bari babujijwe kuja mw'ishure bambaye hijab. Udupi ni kamwe mu turere dutatu tugize intara ya Karnataka iri ku nkengera - ari naho higanje umugambwe Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) w'umushikiranganji wa mbere Narendra Modi. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bafata ko iyo ntara ari icicaro gitegurirwamwo poritike y'aba Hindu ari na bo benshi mu gihugu. Umugambwe BJP kandi ni wo urongoye iyi ntara ya Karnataka. Iri shure rivuga ko ryemereye abanyeshure kwambara hijab mu gihe bari mu kigo, ariko bagasabwa gusa kuzikura iyo bari mu masomero. Ariko abari mu myiyerekano  - bose bakaba bari mu mwambaro w'ishure - bavuga ko ari ngombwa ko bemererwa gupfuka imishatsi yabo mu masomero. Umwe muri aba banyeshure Almas AH, yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Turafise abigisha bakeya b'abagabo. Rero ni ngombwa ko dupfuka imishatsi yacu imbere y'abagao. Ni co gituma twambara hijab". Aba banyeshure barahakana ivyo bagirizwa ko bazambara babitegetswe n'umurwi Campus Front of India - ishami ry'umurwi w'abanyeshure ugendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vya Islam, Popular Front of India - ari na wo ubavugira. Si kenshi abagore bakunze kuboneka bambaye hijab na burka (umwitwikiro w'umubiri wose mw'idini rya Islam) mu Buhindi, aho kwerekana ibimenyetso vy'idini ku mugaragaro ari ibintu bisanzwe. Ariko umukuru w'iri shure avuga ko ari ngombwa ku mwigisha kubona abanyeshure mu maso, kandi ko umwambaro w'ishure utuma ata vangura riba mu banyeshure. Inama z'urutavanako hagati y'abanyeshure, abarongoye ishure hamwe n'abaserukira reta ntaco zashitseko. Ikibazo c'abanyeshure b'abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab carakwiye mu yandi mashure makuru makeya y'i Karnataka, ariko cagiye kurenga inkombe igihe amasanamu y'aba bakobwa bari mu myiyerekano i Udupi akwirakwirijwe. Ubwo nyene, abanyeshure b'aba Hindu mu yandi mashure amwe amwe baciye batangura kuza mu masomero bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ivyatumye abarongoye ishure bategeka ko iyi myambaro yompi itemewe mu bigo. Mu ndwi iheze, ireresi yafatiwe kw'ishure rikuru rya Kundapur mu karere ka Udupi yerekana abanyeshure bambaye hijab bankiwe kurengana bariyeri, yatumye ibintu biyangara. Imirwi y'abanyeshure b'aba Hindu  - abahungu n'abakobwa - nabo baciye batangura imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza bagenzi babo bigana bambaye hijab. Gusa nta mishamirano yari bwabe gushika ejo ku wa kabiri - hasigaye amasaha makeya ngo sentare itangure kwiga urwo rwandiko - aho baciye batangura guterana amabuye mbere baranaturira mu bisagara bimwe bimwe. Abategetsi b'abakere baciye bashira mu ngiro ingingo ya 144 (Section 144) - itegeko ryo mu gihe c'ubukoloni ryabuza abantu barenga bane gukoranira hamwe - mu ntumbero yo guhagarika iyi migumuko. Mu karere ka Shivamogga, umurwi w'abanyeshure b'abahungu bafashwe amashusho baduza ibendera ry'umutugutu kw'ishure ryabo, reta ica itangaza ko hagiye gukorwa amatohoza. Mu karere ka Mandya, ireresi yazungurutse cane yerekana umukobwa yambaye burka asugerezwa n'umurwi w'abagabo bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu gihe babandanya bamuzomera bavuga ngo Jai Shri Ram (twogereranya na 'Mana nziza'), nawe yarihagarayeko, ashira ijwi hejuru ati "Allah Akbar" (Imana ni yo nkuru) mu gihe abarongoye ishure bamuherekeza bamuvanaho. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Mu nyuma, uyo mugore azwi kw'izina rya Muskan yavuze ko umukuru w'iryo shure yamwemereye ko azomushigikira. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru The Indian Express ati: "Hari abandi bakobwa b'aba Islam na bo nyene bazomerewe nk'uku. Abarongoye ishure be n'umukuru waryo ubwiwe ntibigeze batubuza kwambara burka, none ni kubera iki nokwumviriza abo hanze?" Umutegetsi mukuru mu gipolisi yabwiye BBC Hindi ko ibi ari "ikibazo gito" kandi ko bafise ibintu mu minwe. Reta y'intara ivuga iki? Umushikiranganji w'indero w'intara ya Karnataka Nagesh ashigikiye abategetsi b'ishure bavuga ko, vyaba ibitambara n'ibisikafu vy'umutugutu, vyaba ibitambara vy'imyitwikiro, vyose ntivyemewe mu bigo vy'amashure. Avuga kandi ko aba banyeshure bagumuwe "n'inkozi z'ikibi". Afatiye ku kungene ishami rya poritike ry'umurwi Popular Front of India ririko rigerageza gushinga imizi mu karere ko ku nkengera, Nagesh yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Vyose bishingiye kuri poritike. Ibi vyose biriko biba kubera amatora yimirije mu mwaka uza". Sentare ivuga iki gushika ubu? Sentare yahawe inzandiko zibiri zivugira abari muri iyi myiyerekano. Rumwe ruvuga ko ibwirizwashingoro ry'Ubuhindi ritanga uburenganzira kuri buri muntu guhitamwo ivyo yambara. Urundi narwo rukarwanya itegeko riherutse gushingwa na reta y'intara ritegeka inyambaro yemewe mu mashure, ribuza ibitambara vyo mu mutwe n'ama hijab. Imbere y'uko urubanza rutangura kwigwa, igihe umushingwamanza yari asavye ko rwunguruzwa, umucamanza Krishna Dixit yaranse. Ati: "Ibishobisho vyose bigume hanze. Ibwirizwashingiro ni Bhagavad Gita (igitabo ceranda c'aba Hindu). Jewe nzokorera ku ndahiro nagize igihe ntangura akazi. Si vyiza ko abanyeshure baguma hanze". Uyu mushingwamanza aburanira abari mu myiyerekano avuga ko itegeko rya reta ribuza hijab riteye kubiri n'amategeko kandi ko rihonyanga ibwirizwashingiro - agasaba kandi ko sentare ifata ingingo mfatakibanza yokwemerera abanyeshure kubandanya biga imbere y'uko ibibazo bitangura.

column2: Burundi: Hilaire Manirakiza afasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi'
column3: Hilaire Manirakiza yize bimugoye kubera uburyo aho yagiye arahagarika ubu akaba akora akazi katamenyerewe rwose ko gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro na YouTube kwongereza ababakurikirana (Views). Uwo musore avuga ko yize ivyerekeye ubuhinga bwa none bw'itumatumanako mu mashure yisumbuye, avuga ko yize bimugoye bituma atabandanya kaminuza. Avuga ati:"Nahagaritse imyaka itanu ntiga kubera ubukene, ngaruka kubandanya umwaka w'icenda abo twigana bahejeje. "Narasubiriye ndamara umwaka ntiga banyirukanye kuko nari maze imyaka ibiri ntariha amahera y'ishure." YouTube, iriha abafise 'accounts' bivanye n'igitigiri c'abaraba video bashirako n'igihe bazimarako. Mu Burundi hari benshi bamaze gushinga YouTube channels bashirako videos bafise intumbero yo gukorera ayo mafaranga, vyuzi rero ni wo mukate wabo. Kuri Manirakiza n'abafise ubuhinga nk'ubwiwe n'abo guha vyuzi abo bafise. Ni ubuhinga bushasha bwo kurondera amahera n'aho hari abanebagura uko bukora, hamwe  n'ubwoko bw'amakuru ashirwa kuri izo mbuga mu kurondera vyuzi. Hilaire Manirakiza avuga ko agiheza ishure yaciye aronka akazi ko gufata amasanamu ku mboneshakure yo ku mbuga hwaniro, ariko mu nyuma amasezerano bari bafitaniye aza guhagara. Avuga ko yaciye yigira inama yo kwiga uko yobaho mu gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi' (views). Agira ati:"Abafise imbuga hwaniro bampemba hakurikijwe igikorwa bantumye ico ari co. "Uwo mfashije kuronka nk'ama vyuzi 1000 ku musi, ampa ibihumbi 15 vy'amarundi. "Birantunze kuko kuva bampagaritse ku kazi, inzu nguma ndayiriha uko nahora, gufungura canke kwambara ni kwa kundi." Mu kwezi kumwe amaze atanguye ico gikorwa, Manirakiza Hilaire amaze gufasha abantu barenga cumi kuduza ama vyuzi. N'akazi akorera aho ari ho hose, kuri telefone ngendanwa canke ku nyabwonko, ariko akavuga ko afise umugambi wo kwugurura ibiro vyo gukoreramwo. Ahanura urundi rwaruka kwicara rufise ikintu ruzi gukora ku buryo n'aho bokwirukana mu kazi k'ivyo wigiye, ushobora guca wikorera ivyawe.

column2: Bayern Vs Bremen: Hari ubwoba ko Mane atazokina muri Qatar 2022 kubera imvune yaraye yanduye
column3: Imvune ya Sadio Mane yateje igipfungu intsinzi ikomeye ya Bayern Munich yaraye yirahiye Werder Bremen 6-1 mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubudagi, Bundesliga. Vyabaye ngombwa ko Mane ava mu kibuga akaja kuvurwa inyuma y’iminota 20 kubera imvune yo mw’ivi, aca asubirirwa na Leroy Sane. Ibi bibaye mu gihe hasigaye imisi 13 gusa imbere y’uko Senegal ya Mane ikina urukino rwayo rwa mbere mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ca 2022 cimirije gutangura muri Qatar, ikazohura n’Ubuholande. Hagati aho, Bayern yatahukanye intsinzi ikomeye cane, aho Serge Gnabry yateye bitatu wenyene. Uyu musatirizi Mane yahoze akinira Liverpool yaciye agenda ubutarariye mu cumba c’ukwihinduriramwo amaze gusubirizwa kugira ngo abadanye avurwa. Nk’umukinyi mwiza w’umwaka wa Afrika incuro zibiri, Mane ni kirumara mu murwi nserukira gihugu wa Senegal iherutse gutahukana igikombe ca Afrika mu mupira w’amaguru, aho uzohura n’Ubuholande mu rukino rwa mbere rw’itsinda A ku wa 21 Munyonyo (11), imbere y’uko uhura na Qatar yateguye iri higanwa, hanyuma na Equateur/ Ecuador. Igitsindo ca nyuma ca Mane kuri penalty mu rukino rwa nyuma rwabahuje na Misiri catumye Senegal itsindira igikombe ca Afrika ku ncuro ya mbere, hari mu ntango z’uno mwaka. Imvune ya Mane ntiyabujije Bayern gusayangana maze ishobora kurangiza inkino zo hagati muri ino ndwi ari iya mbere muri Bundesliga. Jamal Musial ni we yinjije ica mbere ku munota wa gatanu w’urukino, ariko rero haciye akanya gato Bremen iragikurayo ku mupira mwiza bagiye bahanahana imbere y’uko Anthony Jung atsinda umunyegori Manuel Neuer. Bayern yaciye ihindura umukino maze yinjiza ibitsindo bitatu mu minota umunani, aho Leon Goretzka  yijije kimwe, Gnabry nawe atera bibiri, maze mu minota 30 Bayern imaze kunyagira Bremen 4-1. Ibintu vyari kuba vyamaze kuba nabi gusumba muri uwo mwanya iyo umunyegori Jiri Pavlenka adakurayo penalty y’umunya-Cameroun Eric-Maxim Choupo-Moting ku munota wa 17. Bayern yabandanije yiyoroheje gushika mu mpera z’urukino, aho ku munota wa 82 Gnabry yinjije igitsindo ciwe kigira gatatu, ata n’akanya gaheze umusore w’umufaransa  Mathys Tel aca asongera isibe.

column2: Jane n'umugabo wiwe Donah Omondi bamaze imyaka 12 bubakanye, nta mwana bararonka
column3: Uravye indirimbo ziwe ku mbuga hwaniro, ntushobora na gato kwibaza ko Jane Aller ari mu bibazo bingana ukuraha mu buzima bwiwe. Kuva bubakanye, we n'umugabo wiwe Donah Omondi ntaco batakoze kugira ngo bikunde baronke ikibondo. Ariko hageze neza ko Imana ibahezagira, umugisha ukabaca mu myanya y'intoke. Jane avuga ko uru ari urugendo abagore benshi bagira mu gacerere ntibubahuke kubivugira hejuru. Jane, umuririmvyi w'indirimbo zo guhayagiza Imana muri Kenya, avuga ko yafashe kuvugira ku mugaragaro amageragezwa ahura nayo kugira ngo atere intege abandi. Jane Aller amaze imyaka 12 yubatse. Imyaka ine ya mbere yaranzwe n'ibigeragezo  bidasanzwe. Ati: "Maze umwaka umwe gusa, narasamye inda, ngira umunezero udasanzwe, co kimwe n'umugabo wanje. Ariko rero ku gihamana kibi, iyi mbanyi yarikoroye yo nyene imaze amezi atatu gusa". Kubera vyari bibaye ubwa mbere, yibajije ko ryari isanganya risanzwe, nta mutima wasimvye. Yari azi ko umwanya n'umwanya yari gusama iyindi mbanyi kandi akibaruka. Mu bijanye no gusama imbanyi, mu bisanzwe igi ry'umugore rihura n'urubuto rw'umugabo mu karingoti nyabavyeyi (trompe de Fallope), maze rigaca rija mu gitereko. Nibwo umwana aba atanguye kubaho. Ariko rero kuri Jane, ivyo gusama imbanyi ya kabiri vyabereye hanze y'igitereko. Inda nk'izo zizwi nka ectopique canke extra-utérine. Ati: "Ku munsi ugira kane natanguye kuva amaraso mu gitereko, aho si nari nzi ko imbanyi yanje yari yononekaye kandi ko ndi ku manga y'urupfu". "Muri iyo minsi ine yose numva mfise ububabare butagira izina. Kubera ko umuganga yari asanzwe ankurikirana atari ho yari ari, vyabaye ngombwa ko ndindira mpaka agarutse". "Muri ico gihe cose, sinari nzi ko umwana yari yamaze gupfa, kandi ko igitereko canje cari cuzuye amaraso yari yafatanye". Vyabaye ngombwa ko uyu mugore ashirwa mu bitaro akabagwa kugira ngo bashobore kurokora ubuzima bwiwe. Avuga ko iki cabaye igihe c'ububabare budasanzwe, atari ku mubiri gusa, ariko n'umwikomo mwinshi cane kubona abuze umwana wiwe ku ncuro ya kabiri. Jane ati: "Imbere y'uko banjana mu cumba co kubaga, vyabaye ngombwa ko muganga amfata amaraso kugira ngo ampime bisanzwe. Aho rero niho yambaza ingene nari nkiri muzima mu gihe amaraso yanje yari yavuze". Ico gihe, Jane yaciye atangura kwibaza ibibazo vyinshi cane, yuzura umwikomo mwinshi abaza Imana igituma yemeye ko aca muri ayo mageragezwa. Jane avuga ko basubiye muhira ata mwana bafise. Haciye umwanya yarasubiye arasama iyindi mbanyi, ariko yoyo nta mwanya wahaciye idakorotse. Uyu mukenyezi avuga ko n'aho yari umukozi w'Imana, we n'umugabo wiwe harageze igihe bashavura cane, nawe yuzura umubabaro mwinshi. Nta nyishu baronse ku bibazo vyiwe, mbere n'abaganga nta nyishu bamuhaye kuko igihe cose yabwirwa ko igitereko ciwe ata ngorane n'imwe gifise. Ati: "Igihe imbanyi yanje ya gatatu ikoroka, nari mu bikorwa vyo kuririmba, hanyuma kubera nari nabazwe, umushono watanguye kugira ibibazo ndiko ndaririmba nyene". "Muri uwo mwanya sinatahuye igituma nariko nca muri ayo marushwa kandi ndi umukozi w'Imana, ndiko ndirimbira Imana". Uyu mukenyezi avuga ko atumva ingene Imana yamukoresha gukiza imibiri n'imitima y'abantu aciye mu kuririmba, mu gihe wewe yabandanya abura abana igihe cose asamye imbanyi. Nico gituma ico gihe, arinze afata mikoro aririmba, yari amarira gusa, amosozi akamurenga. Avuga ati: "Aho rero ndiko ndarira abantu bibaza ko nari mu mpwemu, ntibari bazi ko ndiko ndira kubera amarushwa yo kubura abana banje". Rero igihe asama imbanyi igira kane, yumvise umunezero, ariko Jane n'umugabo wiwe bahisemwo kuja kwa muganga kugira ngo bamupime barabe ko ata ngorane afise. Inyishu zavuye mu bipimo bamukoreye zarabaciye intege. Muganga yamubwiye ko imbanyi yayisamiye mu mutsi, kandi ko mu gihe uwo mutsi wosaduka, ubuzima bwiwe bwoba bugiye mu kaga. Yagiriwe inama rero ko ari ngombwa ko bakurayo iyo mbanyi kugira ngo ntapfe. "Maze gukorora imbanyi ya kane, ibintu ntivyanyoroheye, nararize iminsi myinshi cane, mbere sinshake no kuraba impuzu nagira ngo nguriye abana  banje.  Hanyuma kandi nkaguma nibaza nti kubona maze gukorora inda zine zose, ubwo uyu mugabo wanje aracankunda"? Jane avuga ko umugabo wiwe yamubereye urutare, kuko yamugumye iruhande igihe cose yagiye agira ibibazo vyo kubura abana biturutse ku mbanyi zakoroka. Bamaze kubura umwana wabo agira kane, Jane yaciye amara imyaka itari mike adasubiye gusama iyindi mbanyi. Mu mwaka uheze, niho yasubiye gusama imbanyi igira gatanu. Iyi mbanyi imaze amezi atatu gusa, yaciye ikoroka. Ikintu kidasanzwe nk'uko Jane we nyene avyivugira, ni uko bwa bubabare yagira ubwa mbere ubu atabwo yumvise. Avuga ko yaciye abona ko ata kundi ategerezwa kubifata uko biri, maze yizera ko igihe ni cagera Imana izomuha umwana. Jane Aller nk'umuririmvyi, umugabo wiwe niwe ategura akamufasha no gutunganya indirimbo ziwe. Ubuvugabutumwa be no gukunda kuririmba, ibi nivyo vyashoboye kubanywanisha. Uretse ko ari umugabo n'umugore, biyumvirira hamwe ibijanye n'ibikorwa vyabo vya minsi yose ibi navyo bikaba ari ukuririmba. Uyu mugore avuga ko umugabo wiwe yamubereye inkingi nyamukuru mu buzima bwiwe cane cane muri aya makuba y'imbanyi ziwe zikoroka. Ikibazo nyamukuru kuri we cabaye ingene ababanyi bafata ibimubako, ariko Jane avuga ko incuti ziwe za hafi nk'akarorero inabukwe wiwe yamubaye hafi cane. Kandi iyo ariko atanga impanuro ku bantu baca mu bibazo nk'ivyo acamwo abasaba kudacika intege. Ati: "Ico womenya ni uko hari abantu bahukanye kubera kubura abana, kandi n'igihe basubiriye kwubakana  gushasha bongera guhura n'ivyo bibazo nyene". "Ni nkenerwa ko abantu baca mu bibazo nk'ibi bihangana, bagakomeza urukundo rwabo bakabandanya bihanganiranira". Jane avuga ko ubuzima ari nk'ukugendesha igari, kugira ngo ntuyumbayumbe utegerezwa kubandanya urinyonga. Rero ibintu bizima biza ku bantu babandanya bizeye mu gihe ataco bafise bishimikiza mu kwizera. Jane Aller n'umugabo wiwe Donna babandanya bizeye ko umunsi umwe bazoterura umwana wabo mu maboko. Imbanyi gukoroka ni ikintu gikunze kwibonekeza cane ku bagore benshi kw'isi yose. Hari igihe ivayo hakiri kare cane mbere ugasanga n'umugore ntiyari bwamenye ko yari yaramaze gusama. Kwandura indwara zica mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, ihahamuka, ibibazo vyo mu mutwe, ibi ni bimwe mu bishobora gutuma inda zikoroka hakiri kare. Imbanyi kandi irashobora gukoroka kubera umugore yibungenze yagumye hafi y'isumu canke imiti kanaka irimwo isumu. Si ibintu vyoroshe igihe cose kumenya igituma inda zikoroka, ariko vyinshi mu bituma birashobora kwirindwa. Ingorane zo gukorora inda zirashobora gutorerwa umuti mu kuvura abagore bafise ico kibazo indwara zibibatuma, canke mu kubafasha kwirinda kwegera ahantu hari isumu canke hatameze neza. Hagati aho, hari abandi bagore inda zama zikoroka buri mwanya mbere ugasanga igituma ntikizwi. Abagore bafise ico kibazo c'imbanyi gukoroka igihe cose bategerezwa gupimwa, bakavurwa n'abahinga banonosoye ivy'izo ndwara, kugira ngo bashobore kurondera igituma biba, hanyuma bakabafasha kwibungenga gushika bashikane.

column2: Caster Semenya agiye kwungururiza muri sentare ya Bulaya urubanza rw'abanonotsi b'igitsinagore bafise testosterone irenze urugero
column3: Umunonotsi  wa mbere mu kwiruka 800m Caster Semenya agiye kwunguruza urubanza muri sentare ya Bulaya y'agateka ka zina muntu ku ngingo ibuza guhiganwa abagore n'abakobwa bafise urugero runini rw'inkabuzo/umusemburo (hormone) ya testosterone. Semenya ntiyemerewe guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na mile (1.609,34m) atabanje gufata imiti igabanya testosterone, kuva urwego rw'ubunonotsi World Athletics rubihinduye mu 2019. Uwo munya-Africa y'Epfo yatsinzwe urubanza yunguruje muri sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise mu kwezi kw'icenda ariko n'ubu aracafise icizere ko ashobora kwemererwa kuhiganwa mu nkino zo mu Buyapani uyu mwaka kugira  arwanire  kugumana ikibanza ca mbere muri Olympic. Yavuze ati: "Nta kindi dusaba atari kutureka,rimwe kandi rizima,  tukiruka ata nkomanzi, nk'abagore b'inguvu kandi badatinya nk'uko twamye na mbere hose." Abashingwamanza biwe bazosigura ko Ubuswise bwananiwe mu nshingano zabwo zo kumukingira ihonyangwa ry'uburenganzira bwiwe. Urwego rw'ubunonotsi rwashinze ingingo ivuga ko abanonotsi bafise uko bateye kurenze urugero rusanzwe rw'abandi bahuje igitsina (differences of sex development,DSD) bategerezwa gufata imiti kugira bahiganwe hagati ya 400m na mile canke  biruke ku zindi metero. Abanonotsi bafise DSD bagira urugero ruri hejuru rwa testosterone kama, urwego rw'ubunonotsi rukavuga ko  ivyo bibaha ico barusha abandi  mw'ihiganwa. Sentare ijejwe amatati mu nkino yimye agaciro urubanza rwungurujwe na Semyenya kuri iyo ngingo mu 2019. Sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yaciye iba irahagaritse iyo ngingo vy'agateganyo, ariko mu nyuma yisubirako. Vyasigura ko Semenya yabaye uwa mbere  ku 800m mu nkino za Olympic za 2012 na 2016 , yaciye yamburwa uburenganzira bwo gusubira guhiganwa mu nkino z'isi za Doha kuko atari yatsinze urubanza rwo guhagarika iyo ngingo y'urwego rw'ubunonotsi. Mw'itangazo inyuma y'ingingo ya sentare  y'Ubuswise mu  kwezi kw'icenda, World Athletics yagize iti : "Mu myaka itanu ishize, World Athletics yaragwaniye ukungana kw'uburenganzira n'amahirwe ku bagore  n'abakobwa bose mu nkino zacu ubu no muri kazoza. "Nico gituma dushimye ingingo y'uyu munsi ya sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yo kwemeza amategeko yacu ajanye na DSD nk'uburyo bubereye kandi buri hagati na hagati bwo gukingira uburenganzira bw'abanonotsi bose b'igitsinagore mu kwitaba inkino zacu mu buryo atawe burenganya kandi bwumvikana." Sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yavuze ko: "kugra amahirwe amwe mu nkino n'umwitwarariko wumvikana kandi kugize ishingiro ryo guhigana mu nkino.Ni kimwe mu nkingi ihiganwa rishingiyeko." Mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu 2020, Semenya yavuze ko ashaka kwiruka 200m i Tokyo , ico gihe akaba  atokenera kwirirwa arafata imiti. Kugira ashobore guhiganwa, yotegerezwa kubanza kwiruka izo metero mu mwanya w'ama sekunda 22,80 umuha uburenganzira bwo guhiganwa  mu gihe gushika ubu umwanya mwiza afise ari amasekunda 23,49. Itangazo ry'abunganira Semenya, Norton Rose Fulbright, ryo kuri uyu wa kane rivuga riti: "N'ubwo sentare ariyo izotanga ikirangaminsi y'aho izocira urubanza rwacu, Caster agumana icizere kuruta na mbere ko vuba azokwemererwa gusubira kwiruka 800m mu mahingwanwa mpuzamakungu."

column2: Papa Francis yagenye abakardinali bashasha: Harimwo Umunyarwanda Antoine Kambanda
column3: Papa Francis ahejeje gutangaza amazina y'abakardinali bashasha 13 muri bo hakaba harimwo Musenyeri mukuru wa Kigali, Antoine Kambanda. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda ni we Munyarwanda wa mbere agenywe kuba umukardinali. Muri abo 13, icenda bari munsi y'imyaka 80, bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu murwi w'abakardinali bashobora gutora umusubirizi wa Papa mu gihe yokwitaba Imana canke agatanga imihoho. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda afise imyaka 61, yavukiye mu Bugesera, mu 2018 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize Musenyeri mukuru (Arkepiskopi) wa Kigali canke umukuru wa Ekleziya Gatolika mu Rwanda. Kambanda yize amashuri mato n'ayisumbuye mu Burundi, muri Uganda no muri Kenya imbere yo kurangiza  ivyigwa vya Tewolojiya muri Seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda mu Rwanda. Inyandiko za Ekleziya mu Rwanda zivuga ko mu kwezi kwa cenda mu 1990 aribwo Papa Paul II yamugize umupatiri. Kuva mu 1993 yagiye kwiga i Roma aho yavanye impamyabushobozi y'ikirenga muri Tewolojiya. Inyuma y'amashuri yiwe, igihe kinini yari umwigisha muri seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda, aza no kuyiyobora kugeza mu 2013. Muri uwo mwaka wa 2013 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Kibungo kugeza mu 2018 ahabwa amabanga yo kuyobora kiliziya mu Rwanda. Kardinali ni rwo rwego rukuru rwo mu butegetsi bwa ekleziya umuntu ashobora kugerako imbere yo kuba Papa, umuyobozi wa Ekleziya Gatolika kw'isi. Ekleziya Gatolika yari isanzwe ifise abakardinali 219, muri abo 29 gusa ni bo bo muri Africa, mu gihe igihugu nk'Ubutaliyano conyene gifise abakaldinali 41. Ibihugu vya Africa bisanzwe bifise abakardinali ni: Aba bakardinali bashasha 13 batowe na Papa Francis bazemezwa kuri iyo mirimo kw' igenekerezo 28 z'ukwezi kwa 11 nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru ya Vatican. Muri bo harimwo uwitwa Mauro Gambetti yari asanzwe ari umupatiri. Urwego rw'abakardinali rumeze nka reta ya Papa. Bamwe bakorera i Vatican abandi baguma bakorera mu bihugu vyabo bakajayo igihe batumijwe. Amategeko abagenga avuga ko Abakardinali igikorwa cabo ca mbere ari ugutora umu Papa mushasha iyo uwusanzwe ahari apfuye canke avuye mu mirimo. Gusa muri bose, 120 ni bo baba bagize inama itora Papa mushasha. Bashingwa kandi iyindi mirimo itandukanye harimwo gukurikirana ibikorwa vy'abasenyeri, guhagararira amashuri ya Ekleziya, ivugabutumwa, eka bakagira n'inteko ijejwe sentare zitatu za ekleziya. Abakardinali ariko kandi baba bajejwe guhagararira diyoseze n'imiburiburi zibiri canke zirenga mu bihugu bakomokamwo. Abakardinali bambara ibara ry'umutuku kuvyo amategeko ya katolika asobanura ko baba "biteguye kumena amaraso yabo mu gukorera uwo basubiriye intumwa Petero."

column2: Burundi-Rwanda: Nta "mugwi w'inkozi z'ikibi wavuye mu Burundi uja mu Rwanda"
column3: Igisirikare c'u Rwanda kivuga ko ico gitero c'abarwanyi ba FLN cabaye mw'ijoro ryo ku wa mungu mu gace ka Bweyeye mu karere ka Rusizi baturutse mw'ishamba ku ruhande rw'Uburundi muri komine Mabayi. Mw'itangazo rwasohoye kuri uyu wa kabiri, urwego rwo kwivuna abansi rw'Uburundi "rurabeshuje ko hoba hari umugwi w'inkozi z'ikibi wavuye mu Burundi ukaja mu Rwanda". Itangazo ry'igisirikare c'Urwanda rivuga ko abarwanyi babiri mu bateye bishwe n'ibikoresho vya gisirikare birimwo imyambaro ibiri  y'igirikare c'Uburundi bigafatwa. Igisirikare c'u Rwanda kivuga ko abateye basubijwe inyuma bakajabuka uruzi rwa  Ruhwa rutandukanya Mabayi mu Burundi na Bweyeye mu Rwanda, "basubira mw'ishamba rya Kibira aho bafise ibirindiro." N'ivyo nyene urwego rwo kwivuna abansi rw'Uburundi ruvuga ko "rubeshuje icese ayo makuru avuga ko ku butaka bw'Uburundi hoba hari umugwi w'inkozi z'ikibi zifise umugambi mubi ku gihugu c'Urwanda". Iryo tangazo ryateweko umukono na Colonel Floribert Biyereke avugira urwego rwo kwivuna abansi rw'Uburundi rirangiza rivuga ko ingabo z'Uburundi ''ziri ku rubibe Uburundi busangiye n'Urwanda zama ziriko zirakizura kugira zicungere neza umutekano aho ku rubibe". Uruhande rw'Uburundi ruvuga ko  amakuru avuga ico gitero rwayabonye ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi canke hwaniro (social media). Ntibiramenyekana niba impande zompi ku rwego rwa gisirikakare canke rw'imigenderanire hari ico ziravugana  ku vyerekeye  ico gitero. Si ubwa mbere Urwanda ruvuga ko hari abarwanyi ba Forces de Libération Nationale (FLN) batera ico gihugu baturutse mu Burundi. Ariko hari haheze amezi menshi ata gitero gishasha kivuzwe. Ahubwo ibihugu vyompi vyari bigize igihe bitera intambwe zo kunagura imigenderanire yavyo yahungabanye kuva mu 2015. Aho ni mu gihe Uburundi nabwo hari ivyo bwagiriza Urwanda harimwo guha indaro abashatse gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu Burundi mu  2015.

column2: Russia yirukanye abakora mu buserukizi bw'ibihugu vy'Ubulayi 'bagiye mu myiyerekano' ya Navalny
column3: Uburusiya bwirukanye abakora mu biro vy'ubuserukizi bw'Ubudagi, Suwede na Polonye bagirizwa ko bifatanije n'abari mu myiyerekano yo gushigikira wa munyapolitike atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Alexei Navalny, yapfunze mu ntango z'iyi ndwi. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya avuga ko aba batatu bagiye mu "myiyerekano iteye kubiri n'amategeko" ku wa 23 z'ukwa mbere. Ibihugu vyabo biriyamiriza iyi ngingo, co kimwe n'Ubwongereza, Ubufaransa hamwe n'ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Bulaya. Navalny ni umukeba ruhebwa wa Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya. Iyi ngingo yo kwirukana aba bantu yagiye gutangazwa haciye amasaha makeya gusa umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Bulaya, Josep Borrell, abonanye n'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya Sergei Lavrov i Moscou. Ku wa 23 na 31 z'ukwa mbere, abantu ibihumbi amajana n'amajana baragiye mu myiyerekano yo gushigikira Navalny mu gihugu cose. Abaharurwa mu bihumbi barahagaritswe. Ubudagi buriyamiriza iyi ngingo bukavuga ko "ata nsiguro n'imwe ifise" kandi ko idashobora kwijana mu gihe Uburusiya butokwisubirako. Suwede ivuga ko ibivugwa ko umuntu wabo yagiye muri iyo myiyerekano yo ku wa 23 z'ukwa mbere ata shingiro bifise kandi ko ifise uburenganzira bwo gusubiriza mu ndumane Uburusiya. Polonye ivuga ko iyi ngingo yo kwirukana umuntu wayo ishobora gutuma "ibintu vyunyuka mu cuka kibi kiri hagati y'ibihugu vyompi". Josep Borrell, kw'izina ry'ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Bulaya, avuga ko yiyamirije yivuye inyuma iyi ngingo kandi ko yiyamirije ivyo bagirizwa ko bakoze ibikorwa bitajanye n'amabanga yabo nk'abakora mu biro vy'ubuserukizi bw'ibihugu vyabo. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji Lavrov avuga ko ibihano ivyo ari vyo vyose vyofatwa n'Ubulayi ku kibazo ca Navalny vyoba biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Ubudagi na Polonye, bivuga ko vyatumyeko abaserukira Uburusiya muri ibi bihugu vyompi kugira vyerekane impungenge zavyo kuri iyi ngingo yo kwirukana abantu bavyo - ingingo ishobora gutuma haba ukwihora mbere n'abandi bategetsi bo mu biro vy'ubuserukiri bakirukanwa. Mu kwezi kw'umunani kw'umwaka uheze, Alexei Navalny, umunyapolitike w'imyaka 44 anegura bikomeye ubutegetsi bwa Putin, yarahawe isumu  yahatswe kumutwara agatwe, biba ngombwa ko ajanwa kuvurirwa i Berlin mu Budagi. Yagarutse mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa mbere guheze, n'aho yari yagabishijwe n'ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya ko ashobora guca ahagarikwa. Yaciriwe gupfungwa imyaka itatu n'igice ku birego vy'uko yarenze ku mategeko ajanye no gupfungwa ic'amaso kubera ivyo yagirizwa vya magendo mu 2014. Navalny yagiriza Perezida Putin kurongora ubutegetsi bwamunzwe n'igiturire kandi ko yateguye igitero c'isumu camukozweko kigahakwa kumwica. Haciye akanya gato gusa ashitse mu Burusiya, Navalny yaciye asohora ireresi ku rubuga rwa Youtube yerekana ingoro yubatswe ku kiyaga Cirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea) avuga ko ari iyo umutunzi ruhebwa w'Umurusiya yagabiye umukuru w'igihugu. Abantu barenga imiliyoni 100 bararavye iyo reresi. Perezida Putin arahakana ko iyi ngoro atari rwiwe. Mu ndwi iheze, umurwizatunga ruhebwa, Arkady Rotenberg yegereye cane Putin, yavuze ko iyi nyubakwa ari rwiwe, ko haciye imyaka ibiri ayiguze. Navalny yiteze gusubira muri sentare ku wa 12 z'uku kwa kabiri yagirizwa gutyoza abakukuruke babiri barwanye intambara ya kabiri y'isi yose.

column2: Coronavirus: Oxford igiye gusubira gutangura rwa rucanco rwari rwabangiriwe
