column3: Igerageza rw'urucanco rwa Covid-19 ruriko rutunganywa n'uruganda rw'imiti AstraZeneca n'ishure kaminuza ya Oxford rigiye kubandanya inyuma yo kubangirwa inyuma y'aho bivugiweko hari uwo rwagizeko ingaruka mbi. Ku wa  kabiri w'iyi ndwi, AstraZeneca yavuze ko iri gerageza ryari ribaye rirahagarikwa mu gihe hariko hakorwa amatohoza kugira barabe nimba ivyabaye kuri umwe  mu bantu bariko barugeragerezwako bifitaniye isano. Ariko nijoro ku wa gatandatu, kaminuza ya Oxford yatangaje ko uru rukingo ata ngorane rufise, ko rero rushobora kubandanya. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza, Matt Hancock, yakiriye n'igishika cinshi iyi nkuru imenyesha ko igeragezwa ry'uru rucanco rigiye kubandanya. "Iyi ngingo yo kubangira yerekana ko twitwararitse ubuzima bwa muntu imbere ya vyose. Tuzoshigikira abahinga bacu kugira no bashobore kuduha urucanco nyarwo vuba bishoboka". Itangazo ryasohowe n'iyi kaminuza rivuga ko vyari "vyitezwe" ko bamwe "mu bariko bageragerezwako uru rucanco bashobora kubona ingaruka mbi" mu magerageza manini cane nk'iri. Ryongerako y'uko ubu bushakashatsi bushobora kubandanya bisunze impanuro bahawe n'umurwi wigenga ujejwe kwihweza ibijanye n'imiti, hamwe n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe kugenzura imiti n'ibijanye n'ubuvuzi. Ntiyategerezwa gutanga amakuru yerekeye umurwayi ku mpamvu z'ibanga, ariko ikinyamakuru New York Times carashoboye kumenya ko umwe mu bitanze kugeragerezwako mu Bwongereza yagize ibibazo vy'ubushe ku ruti rw'umugongo. Ishami rya ONU rijewe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO rivuga ko hafi incanco 180 ari zo ziriko zirageragezwa  mu mpande zitandukanye z'isi, ariko ko gushika ubu ata na rumwe rurashobora kurangira. Hari icizere kinini ko uru rucanco rushobora kuba mu za mbere zishobora gutangura gukoreshwa, inyuma y'aho rugeragerejwe ku ncuro ya mbere n'iya kabiri bikagenda neza. Iri gerageza ryo ku ncuro ya gatatu ririko rikorerwa ku bantu bashika 30.000 muri Amerika co mu Bwongereza, Brezili na Afrika y'Epfo. Incuro ya gatatu kenshi ijamwo abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi kandi igashobora no kumara imyaka itari mike. Ku wa gatatu, umuhanuzi wa leta mu bijanye n'ubuhinga mu Bwongereza, Sir Patrick Vallance, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko ivyashitse muri rino gerageza ririko rikorwa na Oxford ari ibintu bitari bimenyerewe.

column2: Uganda: Uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican yahagaritswe yagirijwe kurenga ibigo
column3: Ishengero rya Anglican muri Uganda ryahagaritse uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru Stanley Ntagali, mu mabanga yo gusoma misa no guserukira iryo shengero gushika ingingo ihindutse, yagirizwa kurenga ibigo. Ntagali yatanze imihoho mu mabanga mu kwa gatatu kw'umwaka uheze inyuma y'imyaka 43 yari amaze ari umupasitori. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa 13 z'uku kwa mbere ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'ishengero rya Anglican, uwamusubiriye, Dr. Stephen Samuel Kaziimba, yavuze ko Ntagali yarenze ibigo aryamana n'umugore afise umugabo, kandi na we nyene akaba yaravyiyemereye. Dr Kaziimba ati: "Yarahemukiye ibiro vy'abepiskopi, arenga indahiro yiwe yo kwimikwa, hamwe n'ivyo yari yiyemeje mu nyifato yiwe." Dr Kaziimba avuga ko ishengero rya Uganda ryiyemeje gukorera mu muco no kwitwararika abo bose bagizweko ingaruka n'ivyabaye, asaba ko abagore bompi bosengerwa, abihana bakihana, abakizwa bagakizwa. Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri Amerika ya Ruguru, Foley Beach, na we nyene yasohoye itangazo aho avuga ko ababajwe n'ivyabaye. Ati: "Stanley ni mwenewacu muri Kristo, kandi ndashima ingene twakoranye mu myaka iheze. Birambabaje cane kwumva ko yatirimutse kw'ibanga". "Ndasaba Imana ko Stanley yobandanya n'inzira yo kwihana, yongere ihe ukwihangana abo bose bakozweko n'icaha ciwe". Uyu yahoze ari umwepiskopi mukuru ntiyabonetse kugira ngo ashobore kugira ico abivugako. Ariko abanya Uganda bazokwama bamwibukira ku majambo yavuze ku vyo yafata nk'ubutabanga mu gihugu. Mu 2019, yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu ariko ahanura abantu ko "bokwigumya mu vyipfuzo vyabo mu bijanye n'uguhuza ibitsina". Ishengero Anglican muri Uganda rifise abanywanyi bashika imiriyoni 13.

column2: Ku bakunzi b’amavuta y’amamesa, ibikuru vyo kumenya
column3: Ni imfunguro itoroshe kwimbura, ariko kandi ubu ibangamiwe, nk'ibindi bidandazwa vyinshi, kubera intambara za Russia - Ukraine.

column2: Umunywanyi w'umugambwe CNL mu Burundi yishwe, batandatu barakomereka
column3: Umunywanyi w'umugambwe CNL yarishwe abandi batandatu barakomereka mu gitero cabaye ku banywanyi babo mu ntara ya Muyinga, mw'ijoro ry'ejo ku wa Mungu nk'uko bivugwa n'uyu  mugambwe. Terence Manirambona avugira uwo mugambwe avuga ko abo banywanyi batewe bari mu nzira bataha mu gihe bari bavuye mu birori vyo kwugurura ingoro y'uwo mugambwe ku mugwa mukuru w'intara ya Muyinga. Avuga ko batumva ingene ivyo vyama biriko biraba kandi abajejwe umutekano bakwiragiye hose, hakaba hari n'amakomite avugwa ko ahurikiyemwo bose. BBC yagerageje kuvugana n'abajejwe umutekano b'Uburundi ku vyabaye kuri aba banywanyi ba CNL ariko kugeza ubu ntibirashoboka. Umugambwe CNL uvuga ko abanywanyi bawo babandanya bakorerwa amabi atandukanye harimwo uguhohoterwa, uguterwa ubwoba, ugupfungwa ata mategeko yubahirijwe, ugusinzikarizwa ubuzima, n'amarementanya. Bwana Manirambona amenyesha ko abo banywanyi babo batewe n'abantu bafise imipanga, ibihiri n'amacupa babarengeramwo barabatemagura, bicamwo uwitwa Nsavyumwami Gregoire. Avuga ko abatewe bashika 300 bariko basubira muri komine Giteranyi, bakaba barashoboye gufatamwo batatu mu bakoze ico gitero bashikirizwa inzego z'umutekano. Bwana Manirambona avuga ko abatewe batatabawe, kuko abajejwe umutekano bagiye kuhashika ibara ryaguye. Avuga ko ivyaraye bibaye bifitaniye "isano n'ibigize iminsi biba irya n'ino mu gihugu vyo gushaka gusomborotsa no kwigenza ku banywanyi b'umugambwe CNL". Hampande y'ivyaraye bibaye i Muyinga, mu gihe hari hasanzwe hategekanijwe kwugururwa ingoro zishika icenda zo muri komine Muha mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, ico gikorwa nticabaye. Bwana Manirambona avuga ko mu gihe indongozi zariko zirategura ico gikorwa zatewe zirakubitwa, ziranyagwa n'amatelefone, ariko guca basivya ico gikorwa inyuma y'ukuvugana n'abarongoye igisagara ca Bujumbura. Avuga ati: "Twama twituye ubutungane ariko ikibabaje ni uko usanga umengo bifatwa minenerwe, ugasanga nta nyishu iboneka mu gihe bibandanya bifata umurindi". Arongera ati: "Bisa n'uko ababikora bakingiwe nk'uko umengo hari integuro kanaka, kuko biboneka ko harimwo abantu bakingirwa ikibaba". Mu mezi abiri, ingoro 18 za CNL ziramaze kwononwa, ziraturirwa, zirabomorwa, zirasigwa amadasahurwa, izindi nazo zirafutanganywa ivyandiko. Umugambwe CNL uvuga ko ivyo uriko urakorerwa vyerekana ukutihanganiranira mu vya politike. Ubutegetsi bwo buvuga ko abakora amakosa nk'ayo bayakora ku gatwe kabo, kandi ko bategerezwa guhanwa ku gatwe kabo. Terence Niyongabo avugira ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati yabwiye radiyo y'igihugu ati: "Ivyo tubona muri kino gihe, ni inkozi z'ikibi zikora ububisha irya n'ino. Asaba ko haba ugukorana mu nyabune kugira ngo abakora ayo mabi bashikanwe imbere y'ubucamanza.

column2: Kardinari w'i Vatican Becciu mu rubanza rwo kunyonyeza miriyoni 412 z'ama dorari
column3: Umukardinari  w'ishengero Katorika yigeze kuba akorana hafi cane na Papa François agiye gucirirwa urubanza i Vaticano, yagirizwa gukoresha nabi amafaranga y'ishengero mu kamaramaza kahombesheje amafaranga menshi mu mugambi wo kugura inyubakwa i Londres/London. Kardinari Angelo Becciu, w'imyaka 73, niwe mwubahwa  akomeye cane mu barongoye Ekereziya Katorika  mu bihe vya none agiye imbere y'ubucamanza  kubera gukekwako ivyaha bijanye n'amafaranga. Yagirizwa gusohora amafaranga y'amanyaburaya, Euro, angana na miriyoni 350 (arenga miriyaridi 800 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) y'ishengero mu mugambi utagenze neza  wo kugura inyubakwa  muri Chelsea watumye hatakara amafaranga menshi cane. Arahakana kuba hari icaha yakoze. Abandi bantu icenda bakurukiranwa muri urwo rubanza nabo bagirizwa ivvyaha birimwo kuronka amafaranga ku nguvu canke kw'iterabwoba, kunyuruza no gukoresha nabi ububasha bw'akazi. Kardinari Becciu yirukanywe mu kazi na Papa François mu kwezi kw'icenda igihe amakuru y'ugukoresha nabi amafaranga yaja ahabona. Amatohoza yamaze imyaka ibiri yerekanye ingene Vaticano yatakaje miriyoni z'ama euro, arimwo amashikanwa, inyuma yo kugura inyubakwa  yahora ari ububiko bwa Harrods kuri Sloane Square  Avenue muri Chelsea, mu 2014. Uwo mukardinari yahora  araba amashikanwa mu biro bijejwe amafaranga ya  Vaticano. Ivyaha akurikiranwako birimwo kurungika amafaranga mu rudandazwa rwari rurongowe n'abavukanyi biwe mu ntara y'amavukiro yabo muri Sardaigne. Urwo rubanza rwitezwe kumara amezi menshi. Intahe zibiri zizosasa muri iyi ndwi - ku bibazo  vy'ubuhinga - zishobora kwungururizwa mu kwezi kw'icumi. Abandi icenda bagirizwa barimwo: Abagirizwa bose barahakana kuba barakoze icaha. Hamwe bokwagirwa n'ivyaha, bashobora guhanishwa umunyororo canke ihadabu, canke vyompi. Abashikirizamanza bavuga ko umuranzi  akorera Londres, Gianluigi Torzi,  yanyonyeje Vaticano mu gukoresha amafaranga yayo mu kugura imitahe yo muri iyo nyubakwa yo muri Chelsea yari guca isubirwawo ngo ivemwo amazu y'agaciro yo kubamwo. Torzi avuga ko ibivugwa bishingiye ku kwumva ibintu ukutariko. Ubutariyano buriko buragerageza ngo burabe ko  Ubwongereza bumubarungikira. Mu kwezi kwa kane Papa yafashe ingingo ko aba kardinari n'abepiskopi bagirijwe ivyaha bashobora gukurikiranwa n'abacamanza basanzwe - aho gucirirwa imanza n'aba kardinari nk'uko vyahora. Umukuru mushasha ajejwe amafaranga muri Vaticano, Juan Antonio Guerrero, avuga ko Vaticano iriko irashiramwo inguvu zitari bwigere ziboneka kugira ikorere ku mugaragaro mu bijanye n'amafaranga. Ku wa 24 ukwezi kw'indwi, ku ncuro ya mbere Vaticano yashize ahabona ido n'ido ry'imitahe yayo: amazu 4.051 mu Butariyano n'izishika 1.120 i Londres, Paris, Geneve  na Lausane. Furera Guerreo yagize ati: ''Twamenyereye gukorera mw'ibanga, ariko twamenye ko mu vyerekeye ubutunzi, gukorera ku mugaragaro bidukingira kurusha gukorera nw'ibanga."

column2: Korea ya Ruguru yagerageje misire incuro zitandatu mu ndwi zibiri
column3: N﻿a Jean Mackenzie & Frances Mao Abanyamakuru ba BBC Seoul Korea ya Ruguru yarashe ibindi bisasu vya misire bibiri kuri uno wa kane  - ikaba ibaye incuro/inshuro ya gatandatu igerageza ibi bisasu bibujijwe mu kiringo kiri musi y’indwi zibiri. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Pyongyang (umugwa mukuru wa Korea ya Ruguru) yavuze ko kurekura ibi bisasu ari “ingingo zo kwihora” imyimenyerezo rusangi ya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na Korea y’Epfo. Ku wa kabiri, Pyongyang yarashe igisasu ca misire hejuru y’Ubuyapani, ivyatumye Amerika isaba inama yihuta y’Inama Nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano. Muri iyi nama, Amerika yagirije Uburusiya n’Ubushinwa ko bukingira Korea ya Ruguru kugira ntifatirwe ibihano ruhasha. Uwuserukira Amerika muri ONU avuga ko mu kwanka ibindi bihano, Uburusiya n’Ubushinwa “biyaye impigi” Pyongyang. Abaserukira ibi bihugu bibiri ntayegayezwa mu Nama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano bavuga ko gukomeza ibiganiro ari yo nzira nziza gusumba ibihano. Mu mezi abiri aheze, Amerika, Korea y’Epfo n’Ubuyapani vyakoreye hamwe imyimenyerezo rusangi mu ntumbero yo kwimenyereza gutsinda no gutesha igitero cova muri Korea ya Ruguru. Iyi myimenyerezo yashavuje indongozi ya Korea ya Ruguru Kim Jong-un, ayibonamwo nk’icemezo ko abansi biwe bariko bitegurira intambara. Mw’itangazo, Korea ya Ruguru yagiriza Amerika gutuma “icuka kibi kirangwa kuri ico kigwa ca Korea mu rwego rwa gisirikare cunyuka”. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Amerika, Korea y’Epfo n’Ubuyapani vyarabandanije imyimenyerezo, bivuga ko yari iyo kwihora Korea ya Ruguru ku gisasu yari yateye ku wa kabiri. Amerika kandi yasubiye kurungika ubwato butwara indege z’intambara USS Ronald Reagan hafi y’ikigwa ca Korea. Korea y’Epfo n’Ubuyapani bivuga ko igisasu ca mbere ca misire zarashwe kuri uno wa kane cashitse ku birometero 350, congera kigera ku burebure bw’ibirometero 100 uja hejuru, mu gihe ica kabiri cari kuguruka gushika ku birometero 800 be no ku birmetero vyababa 50 uja hejuru. Uru rukurikirane rw’ibisasu biherutse kuraswa rwibutsa igihe c’imbere y’igerageza rya nyuma ry’ikirwanisho c’ubumara mu 2017. Ico gihe, nk’uko biriko biragenda ubu, Korea ya Ruguru yagerageje ibisasu vya misire, nta biganiro na Amerika vyari bwabe, hanyuma Pyongyang itera ibisasu bibiri vya misire hejuru y’Ubuyapani. Amasanamu y’ibigendajuru yerekana ko Korea ya Ruguru iriko irasanura imyobo yayo yo ku kigo c’igeragerezo ry’ibirwanisho vya nikleyeriyari yavuga ko yasambuye mu 2018 igihe haba ibiganiro vy’akanya gato na Amerika ku ntwaro ya Perezida Trump. Mu kwezi guheze, Korea ya Ruguru yasubiyemwo amategeko yayo ajanye na nikleyeri, aho indongozi yayo Kim Jong Un yatangaje ko igihugu ciwe kigiye ku rutonde rw’ibihugu bitunze ibirwanisho vy’ubumara “ubutagisubira inyuma”. Mu gihe ubu ibintu vyose bitunganye, Kim asa n’uwurindiriye akanya keza ka poritike kugira ngo agerageza ikindi gisasu ca nikleyeri ku ncuro igira indwi. Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi babona ko igikorwa co kugerageza iki gisasu gishobora kuba mu kadirisha k’indwi zitatu hagati y’ikoraniro kaminuza ry’umugambwe wa Gikomunista w’Ubushinwa mu mpera za kuno kwezi hamwe n’amatora y’abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka muri Amerika mu ntango za Munyonyo (11).

column2: Kardinali Burke anegura Papa Francis ku vyo aherutse gushikiriza ku bubakana basangiye ibitsina
column3: Umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye ba Ekleziya Gatolika aranegura amajambo Papa Francis aherutse gushikiriza ku vyerekeye abakundanye basangiye igitsina, akavuga ko ari ivyiyumviro vyiwe bwite bidashobora gukurikizwa n'Abagatolika. Kardinali Raymond Burke abonwa na benshi ko atava kw'izima ku mico ya Ekleziya Gatolika yavuze ibi mw'ijambo yashikirije haciye umunsi umwe Papa yerekanywe ariko ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokwemerwa n'amategeko. Yari amajambo atari bwaje ku mugaragaro. Ku wa gatatu w'ino ndwi, niho Papa Francis yumvikanye ashikiriza ayo majambo. Bivanye n'aho umuntu ahagaze muri Ekleziya, Kardinali Burke ni ihwa kuri Papa, canke naho umwe muri bake bazovugisha ukuri ku butegetsi. Kurwanya Papa ku bijanye no gushigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bemerwa imbere y'amategeko ni ibintu bidatangaje, ariko amajambo yabivuzemwo niyo kumbure yotangaza. Mu gihe Raymond Burke avuga ko amajambo ya Papa Francis ari "iciyumviro ciwe bwite", yongera ko y'uko abagatolika badategetswe kwumvira uyu mukuru wa Ekleziya kuri iki kibazo, ariko ko abayobozi ba Ekleziya basanzwe bafise igikorwa co gukora ico yise 'gutanga umuco ukenewe'. Arongera agashimangira y'uko ibikorwa vy'abahuje ibitsina babisangiye 'biteye kubiri n'imico' ishingiye ku kwemera kwa Gatolika, akavuga ko amajambo yavuzwe na Papa adahuye n'inyigisho za Ekleziya kandi ko ziteye umubabaro. Mw'ireresi ivuga ku buzima n'ibikorwa vyiwe, Papa Francis yumvikanye ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bakwiye kwemerwa imbere y'amategeko. Ati: "Ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kugira umuryango. Nta n'umwe akwiye gutabwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico. "Ico tugomba gushiraho ni itegeko ribaha uburenganzira bwo kubana. Gutyo bakaba bakingiwe n'amategeko". Mu nyigisho za Gatolika, imibonano mpuzabitsina hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ifatwa 'nk'ukugoka'. Aya majambo yavuzwe na Papa yateye impari, aho hari bamwe bashigikiye ivyo yavuze, abandi nabo babirwanya cane. Gusa impungenge zibandanya zibonekeza ni ingaruka aya majambo ashobora kugira ufatiye aho Ekleziya Gatolika ihagaze kuri iki kibazo. Massimo Faggioli, umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye n'ivy'Imana akaba n'umwanditsi w'igitabo Pope Francis: Tradition, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nta gushidikanya ko ivyo Francis yavuze ari ikintu gishasha muri Ekleziya. Hagati aho, ni ikibazo yagiye agarukako cane kuva muri ino myaka mike iheze".

column2: Germany: Igarariza rya Katolika mu guhezagira ababana basangiye igitsina, n'abagore basoma misa
column3: Ng'izo inkengeri ziravuze, inanga ziratangura gusamirana, maze Patiri Jan Korditschke na we araduga kuri Arutari kugira ahereze inkuka y'imisa. Vyose bisa nk'uko vyahora bimeze iyo hageze imisa ku wa Mungu muri Katolika. Ariko muri ako kanya nyene, hari ikintu kidasanzwe kiri mu mitima ya bamwe kandi kibateye impungenge. Ikintu kigomba kibe ni ikidasanzwe na gato. Patiri Korditschke arafashe ijambo, ati "uwo wese yipfuza umuhezagiro w'Imana ni ahaguruke". Hafi abari mw'isengero bose barahaguruka, harimwo n'abatari bake basanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina. Ng'ako akaririmbo karatanguye, patiri na we aregera, maze abaza umwe umwe ico yipfuza gusaba Imana mu bisabisho vyabo. Hanyuma niko kuganzura ibiganza yubika ku mitwe yabo asengera umwe umwe. Hari benshi bakoroye amosozi. Aba rero si abandi, ni ba bandi bubakanye basangiye ibitsina, inyuma y'imyaka itari mike nibwo bwa mbere bakiriwe ukuri kwamye muri Ekleziya. Umwe muri bo Sangha, umukatolika kuva avuka ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye, Frieda kuva imyaka 25 yose, ati: "Ni ibintu bibabaje cane kandi ubu niho mbonye ingene nakomerekejwe ku mutima". "Mu myaka 49 yose, sinigeze nakirwa. Ariko rero impera n'imperuka, abantu baratanguye kuvuga bati: 'kuba uri ng'aha nta ngorane'". Ku bwa Matthias, na we nyene yavutse ari umukatolika akaba yaronse uwo muhezagiro ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye Thomas, kuja mu misa ntiyigeze iba ingorane. Ariko avuga ko amajambo ashikirizwa n'abategetsi ba Katolika yamutumye yiyumvira guhindura idini. Ati: "Igihe cose namye nibaza nimba ari ngombwa ko nguma mw'idini ritanyemera. Ariko rero, Ekleziya 'nyayo' hano ku rubuga, irongeye kugarura ukwemera kwanje". Mu buryo bw'agahemo, ijambo nk'iri rishikirizwa n'abategetsi ni ryo ryatumye iyi misa igenda uko yagenze. Mu kwa gatatu, Vaticano yasohoye itangazo rikomeye rivuga ko ukwubakana hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ari "icaha", rinashimangira ko abapatiri bose bazohirahira bagahezagira abubakana basangiye igitsina bashirwa ku ruhande. Iki ni ikintu abapatiri bo nyene ku giti cabo bakora - ariko ni gake biba ku mugaragaro. Iri jambo rikarishe rya Vaticano ryashavuje abakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Mu kwishura, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abapatiri, ababikira n'abakirisu baciye batanguza isekeza bise Liebe gewinnt (Urukundo Ruratsinda/l'Amour Triomphe/Love Wins), kugira bemeze ku mugaragaro ko ababana basangiye ibitsina bemewe mu masengero yabo. Patiri Korditschke ati: "Narashavuye numva n'isoni kubera nibaza ko ari ijambo ribabaje cane". Ni umwe mu bapatiri hafi  120 bo mu Budagi bafashe ingingo yo kugarariza ku mugaragaro iri tegeko rya Vaticano. Mu kiringo c'indwi imwe gusa abapatiri baremesheje ibisabisho mu masengero ya Katolika mu gihugu cose c'Ubudagi bahezagira abantu abo ari bo bose babisavye, harimwo n'abubakanye mu buryo Vaticano ibona ko ari icaha, nk'abubakanye n'abahukanye, hamwe n'abubakanye basangiye igitsina. Umunyamakuru wa BBC abajije Patiri Korditschke ingene asigura igituma aja kubiri n'itegeko rya Vaticano, yishuye akorora amosozi. Guhezagira abubakanye basangiye ibitsina biri mu bintu bigenda vyiyongera mu bakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Amashirahamwe aharanira agateka k'abagore, nka Maria 2.0, nayo nyene asaba uburenganzira bungana muri Ekleziya. Haciye umusi umwe inyuma y'iki gisabisho ca Patiri Korditschke i Berlin, abagore baragiye ku ruhimbi basigura ijambo ry'Imana mu masengero ya Katolika 12 atandukanye y'Ubudagi - na vyo nyene Vaticano ikaba itavyemera. Ulrike Göken-Huismann umugore yashikirije ijambo mw'isengero asengeramwo mu karere ka Düsseldorf, avuga ati: "Ekleziya yahora itwigisha ko Isi iringaniye kandi yatwigisha ko twategerezwa kuvyemera uko. Ariko rero vyabaye ngombwa ko Ekleziya ihindura. Canke kandi wibuke ko wategerezwa kwemwera ko Adamu na Eva ari abantu babayeho. Ntibivuga y'uko Ekleziya idategerezwa guhindura ivyo yigisha". Abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika mu Budagi ntibahuza: hari uruhande rumwe rw'abasenyeri  rushigikiye ko ibintu bihinduka, mu gihe urundi ruhande rw'abarongoye Ekleziya ruryumako, rukaba rushigikiye intumbero ya Vaticano itarota iva kw'izima . Hagati aho, ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko hari abakatolika ku giti cabo mu Budagi bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka. Icigwa kimwe cakozwe n'amashure kaminuza yo mu bisagara vya Berlin na Münster cerekana ko ibice 70% vy'abakatolika mu Budagi bashigikiye ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bahezagirwa, 80% nabo bakaba ata ngorane babona ku bantu babanye batarahezagirwa, hanyuma 85% nabo bakaba babona ko abapatiri nabo bokwemererwa kurongora. Inyuma y'igisabisho co guhezagira abubakanye basangiye igitsina i Berlin, abantu baharurwa mw'ijana baciye bakoranira hamwe hanze y'isengero biha agacupa mu buryo bwo kwigina kuri iyo ntambwe. Ariko kw'irembo ry'isengero, abantu bashika cumi bakoze imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyi ngendo, bafise icapa canditseko ngo "Imana ntihezagira icaha". Nta mishamirano iri hagati y'izi mpande ariko zompi zigizwe n'abantu bakomeye muri Ekleziya Katolika badahuriza hamwe. Amwenyura, Patiri Korditschke  wewe yivugira ati "ivyo na vyo ni sawa." Papa avuga iki ku bijanye n'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye? Mu kw'icumi 2020: Papa Francis yabwiye umuhinga akora amareresi ko abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina "bokwemererwa imbere y'amategeko".  "Abahuza ibitsina babisangiye ... ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu muryango. Nta n'umwe yokwirukanwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico". Mu kw'icumi  2014: Ikoraniro ry'abasenyeri b'Ekleziya (synod) bahakanye ivyipfuzo vyari bishigikiwe na Papa ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye bokwemerwa. Mu kw'indwi  2013: Ari mu ndege ari ku rugendo, Papa yabwiye abanyamakuru ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye batokumirwa ahubwo ko boshirwa mu muryango. Yavuze ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye basanzwe bari mu barongoye Ekleziya bogirirwa imbabazi, ivyaha vyabo bigaharirwa. 2013:Mu gitabo On Heaven and Earth (Ku vyerekeye Ijuru n'Isi), Papa avuga ko gufata ku rugero rumwe abahuza  ibitsina babisangiye n'abubakana badasangiye ibitsina kwoba "ari ugusubira inyuma nk'ibirenge". 2010: Igihe yari musenyeri mukuru wa Buenos Aires yariyamiriza ko amategeko yemerera abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina ariko agashigikira ko abasanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokingirwa n'amategeko ku rugero kanaka.

column2: Africa-Urudandazwa ku buryo bwa none: Abagore bahevye iduka bakaja kuri terefone zigezweho
column3: BBC yibanze ku bagore batatu b'abanya-Afrika - uwahora afise iduka, umwigisha n'umushoferi wa taxi - bongereje amafaranga binjiza kuva batanguye gukora urundadazwa ku buryo bwa terefone zigezweho (smartphones na digital platforms). Ikiza ca coronavirus catumye benshi basubira kwiyumvira ingene boronka ikibabeshaho. Ikigo cigenga gikora ubushakashatsi  Caribou Digital catoye ko abagore muri Kenya, Nigeria na Ghana bariko baravyaza umusaruro uburyo bwo gukora urudandazwa uciye ku buhinga bwa none bwo gutumatumanako (smartphones na digital platforms) kuko bwo bworoshe gushikira  no gukora ibitandukanye -gutyo bagashobora kwinjiza amafaranga kandi bakabandanya n'amabanga yo kwitaho abana babo. Madame Tarit  (mubona kw'ifoto aho hejuru) ntiyibaza ko yoshoboye  kugwiza na kabiri amafaranga yinjiza mu kiringo c'amezi icenda. Ikiza ca Covid cari catumye yugara iduka ryiwe ry'impuzu z'abana muri Eldoret mu burengero bwa Kenya, none gukotesha ibibanza aciye ku bigo bikorera kuri internet nka Airbnb bisa n'ibiriko birazibira igihengeri cari catewe no kwugara urudandazwa rwiwe. Ariko, Madame Tarit w'imyaka 29, ari mu bandi bagore benshi bariko baratera imbere mu gukoresha imbuga nka Facebook, Whatsapp, Instagram na apps z'ama taxi nka Uber na Bolt. Yatanguye urundadazwa rwiwe n'ikibanza kimwe haraheze amezi icenda none ubu afise indwi -ubu akaba akotesha ku gihe kirekire hanyuma nawe agapangisha aciye kuri Airbnb. "Ubu ninjiza amafaranga menshi kurusha ayo nakura mu rudandazwa imbere y'ikiza [ca Covid]," niko yabwiye BBC Daily. Abakoresha urwo rudandazwa ahanini n'abakerarugendo babikisha aho bazorara hamwe n'abagwizatunga bashima kurara muri  Airbnb aho kurara mw'ihoteri. "Mu gihe ca Covid benshi mu  bagenzi banje baratakaje ubuzi baca batangura gukorera ku materefone kugira binjize amafaranga. Ubu bagurisha ivyo kurya baciye kuri internet hanyuma bagakora nk'abashoferi bo kubishira abakiriya", nk'uko Madame  Tarit avuga. Umunsi usanzwe kuri Madame  Adzogble w'imyaka 32, utangurwa no gushira ubutumwa bwo kwamamaza ivyo acuruza kuri Whatsapp no kuri Facebook yibereye i muhira i Acra, umurwa mukuru wa Ghana. Ari mu bariko baravyaza umusaruro zimwe mu mpinduka zikomeye cane mu butunzi muri Afrika -ukwiyongera kw'ibibanza vyo gukoreramwo ubucuruzi kw'isoko ryo kuri internet. Agurisha amaterefone ngendanwa, ivyuma vyo kuzana akayaga mu nzu hamwe n'ama-television, ivyo vyose akavyamamaza aciye ku migwi yashinze kuri Whatsapp na Facebook, hamwe no mu yo asanzwemwo, nk'uwo ahuriramwo n'abo basenga hamwe. Madame Adzogble  yahevye akazi ko kwigisha igifaransa kugira aronke umwanya ukwiye wo gukora urudandazwa rwiwe kuri internet. "Bivamwo amafaranga menshi kurusha kwigisha. Ndashobora kugurisha ikintu kimwe nkinjiza ayaruta ayo mara ukwezi nkorera mu kwigisha. Mfise abana. Nkeneye guha abana banje indero nziza ishoboka,  akaba aribo bampa umwete wo kurondera kwigenga mu bijanye n'amafaranga", niko avuga. Ku bwa Madame Adzogble, kwubaka imigenderanire myiza n'abakiriya n'ikintu nyamukuru ushaka guca amafaranga uciye kuri internet. "Aho baraheza bakakugurira hanyuma bakakuvuga neza." Madame Lawal, w'imyaka 34, akorera  ibigo vy'amataxi uhamagara uciye ku buhinga bwa none Uber na Bolt mu gisagara ca mbere kinini muri Nigeria, Lagos. Ariko, ntibimworohera - uyo mugore areze abana bane wenyene avuga ko hari abagabo banka gutwarwa n'umugore. Lawa avuga ati: "Igihe natangura gutwara taxi muri Lagos, abagabo bose baca bafuta urugendo maze gushika kubajana." "Lagos haragoye , bisaba kuba ukomeye cane kugira ushobore  gutwara imodoka mu gisagara. Abagabo bibaza ko izo nguvu atazo mfise, mbanza kubajijura kugira bemere kwinjira mu modoka." Icigwa ca  Caribou Digital cerekana kandi ko abagore benshi barondera ikibabeshaho baciye ku buhinga bwa digital bafise impungene ku mutekano wabo. Umukuru w'abakoze ubwo bushakashatsi Grace Natabaalo yabwiye BBC ati: "Abagore benshi twavuganye bavuze ko baburagijwe bishingiye ku gitsina iyo bitavye ababa  bafatishije ingendo." Ati: "Mu gihe reta ihimiriza abagore bakiri bato gufata bene aka kazi bakeneye no kumenya urundi ruhande rwako - ko hari ingeramizi kandi zitegerezwa gufatwa nk'ikibazo gikomeye n'inzego z'igiporisi na reta." Ariko Lawal avuga ko ivyiza birimwo biruta cane ibibi. Ati: "Ni vyiza cane kuba ushobora kwironkera ikikubeshaho ariko kandi nshaka no kugira ico ntereye mu butunzi muri rusangi mu gutanga amakori (imisoro). Nsaka ko ubwanje ntera imbere, na Nigeria igatera imbere."

column2: Funke Abimbola: ‘Izina ryanje ry’ikinyafrika ryambujije kuronka akazi’
column3: Umunyamategeko akongera akaba n'umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira bw'inkehwa, Funke Abimbola,  avuga ko "yamye arenganywa" igihe cose yagerageje kurondera akazi. Hafi icagatatu c'ama kompanyi 100 adandaza imitahe (FTSE) nta nkehwa afise mu nzego zifata ingingo, nk'uko icegeranyo kibivuga. Ikigo kijejwe kwihweza ingene ubwoko buserukiwe mu ma kompanyi atandukanye, Parker Review Committee, mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza, kimenyesha ko inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo mu makompanyi atari make. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Nahuye n'inzitizi nyinshi  igihe nariko ndondera akazi kubera nari mfise izina ry'ikinyafirika, kandi kubera ndi umwirabure, nta gukekeranya". Yabwiye BBC ko yaterefonye incuro zirenga ijana kugira ngo ashobore guhonyoza ikirenge  mu kazi. Ati: "Baranyinuvye, barankarira cane gusumba abandi  kubera kwitwa umugore w'umwirabure". "Biroroshe kukubona uwo uri we kandi biroroshe cane rwose kukurenganya iyo uri mu nkehwa". Icegeranyo c'ikigo Parker Review Committee  cerekana ko mu makompanyi adandaza imitahe ashika 250 casanze inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, aho 119 kuri 179 amoko adaserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Ico cegeranyo ntikintangaza. Hari inzitizi nyinshi  cane kugira ngo inkehwa zishobore kuronka ikibanza mu nzego zo hejuru". Ico kigo Parker Review Committee cashinzwe kugira ngo gikore ubushakashatsi ku kungene amoko atandukanye aserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo  mu makompanyi atandukanye, casohoye icegeranyo caco kuri ico kibazo mu 2017. Ico gihe, mu makompanyi 51 kw'ijana adandaza imitahe inkehwa ntizari ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, ugereranije n'ubu ari 33%. Ico cegeranyo gisaba ko gushika mu 2021 buri kompanyi mu makompanyi 100 ya FTSE yoba ifise n'imiburiburi indongozi imwe iva mu nkehwa, hanyuma gushika mu 2024 naho mu makompanyi 250 ya FTSE yoba yamaze gukora gutyo. Mu ntumbero yo gufasha kugira ngo inkehwa ziserukirwe, ico cegeranyo gisaba ko buri kompanyi yokwama itanga icegeranyo c'ingene inkehwa ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, n'ingene ubwoko butandukanye buserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola arizeye ko mu gihe hoba integuro yoha ibibanza kanaka inkehwa vyofasha mu gutorera inyishu ico kibazo. Ati: "Hariho amashirahamwe makeya mu Bwongereza aha akazi amoko atandukanye. "Ayo mashirahamwe yama ategura intonde z'abantu bafise ubuhinga butandukanye muy bwoko butandukanye buri mwaka, rero iyo wipfuza kurondera abirabure, abanyaziya hamwe n'inkehwa, biba ngombwa ko uja kuronderera muri izo ntonde". Umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, Andrea Leadsom, avuga ko ico cegeranyo cerekana ko "amakompanyi agifise igikorwa kitari gito" kugira ngo ashobore guhimiriza abakozi b'abirabure, Abanya Aziya hamwe n'inkehwa.

column2: France: Cardinali Ricard ari mu basenyeri 11 bagirizwa guhohotera abana
column3: Umu cardinali w’Umufaransa Jean Pierre Ricard yavuzwe izina na Ekleziya Katolika nk’umwe mu basenyeri 11 bagikorera canke bigeze gukorera iryo shengero bagirizwa guhohotera abana Mw'itangazo, uyo mu cardinali yanditse ko yahohoteye  umwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 igihe yari akiri padiri kw'iparuwase haraheze  imyaka mirongo 35,  kandi ko ubu ashobora gukura meza mu mabanga yiwe. H﻿araciye umwaka, umugwi washinzwe utoye ivyemeza ko hari ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abantu bashurashuza abana, bakorera mw'ishengero Katolika ry'Ubufaransa mu myaka irenga mirongo ibiri. Uko   bagirizwa ari 11 bose barashengejwe mu butungane canke bahabwa ibihano na Ekleziya Katolika. I﻿bi vyagiye ahabona mu gihe mu gihe hariko haraba inama y'abepisikopi b'Ubufaransa i Lourdes, mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'Ubufaransa. Musenyeri mukuru Eric de Moulins-Beaufort yabariye abamenyeshamakuru ko muri abo 11 harimwo Musenyeri wa Creteil Michel Santier yagiye mu karuhuko ko muzabukuru mu mwaka uheze inyuma yo kwagirizwa ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina mu myaka  mirongo ibiri iheze. Bamwe bariko bakorwako amatohoza ajanye n'ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina  mu gihe abandi bagirizwa kubinuma. Musenyeri mukuru yasomeye ku mugaragaro ikete rya Cardinali Ricard, aho yavuze ko yitwaye nabi "mu buryo bukwiye guhanwa" ku mwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 kandi ko  mu vy’ukuri imyitwarire yiwe yagize ingaruka mbi kandi  zitazopfa zibagiwe kuri uwo mwana w'umukobwa. Mu gihe ubu ari mu karuhuko k'iza bukuru inyuma y'imyaka 18 ari musenyeri wa Bordeaux, uwo mu cardinali w'imyaka 78 yavuze ko yamusavye ikigongwe kandi asaba n'imbabazi ku bantu bose yababaje. M﻿usenyeri ahari ubu, Jean Paul James, yavuze ko yifatanije umubabaro n'abakorewe icaha, aca asubira gutera akamo uwo ari we wese yoba yarahohotewe muri iyo diyoseze kubivuga. Umukuru w'imana y'abepisikopi yavuze ko kiretse uwo mu Cardinali na Michel Santier, abasenyeri batandatu bagirijwe n'ubutungane canke ishengero kandi ko  umwe aza yaramaze gupfa. Yongeyeko ati:"A﻿bandi bahoze ari abasenyeri bariko baragirwako amatohoza n'ubutungane mu gihe uwundi wa gatatu amaze kwitaba abashikirizamanza." Mu cegeranyo cayo co mu kwezi kwa 10 mu 2021 , akanama kigenga kashizweho na Ekleziya Katolika yo mu Bufaransa kasanze abana ibihumbi 216 barahohotewe kuva mu myaka ya 1950, benshi muri bo bakaba bari abana b’ababahungu bari gahati y’imyaka 10 na 13. Umukuru w'ako kanama yavuze ko hari ivyemezo ko hari abakoze ihoterwa bashika 3.200 kandi ko ivyo vyemezo vyarahawe  abashikirizamanza mu mice 22 aho ingingo zo gukurikiranwa kuri ivyo vyaha zishobora gufatwa. U﻿bufaransa ni kimwe mu bihugu aho ibivugwa ko habaye ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina vyateye vyanyiganyije ishengero ya Ekleziya Katolika. Mu mwaka uheze, Papa Francis yarahinduye amategeko agenga ishengero Katolika kugira ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina, kwiyegereza abana ugamije kubashurashuza, gutunga ama film y’abana bariko barahuza ibitsina hamwe no gukingiranira ikibaba ku caha c'ihohoterwa, ko ari icaha gihanwa n'amategeko ya Vatikano. Mu butumwa yatanze imbere y'uko hatangura iyo nama y'abepisikopi i Lourde, Papa yavuze ko ishengero ryo mu Bufaransa ryaguye mu gahundwe kubera ihohoterwa ryakozwe na bamwe mu bungere baryo. I﻿yo nama yari ifise intumbero yo guteza imbere uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru no gukorera mu muco ku mabi y'ihohoterwa ishengero rifisemwo uruhara.

column2: U Burundi bugiye guhura na Nigeria muri CAN2019, abakinyi ngo baratekanye
column3: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Ikipe nserukiragihugu y'u Burundi, Intamba Mu Rugamba, ejo kuwa gatandatu izokina na Nigeria mu rukino rwayo rwa mbere rw'igikombe ca Afrika 2019, abayigize bavuga nta bwoba bafitiye ico gihangange mu mupira w'amaguru. Mu zuba rimena imbwa agahanga kuri Alexandria Stadium mu muji wa Alexandria mu Misiri, umumenyereza w'Intamba ahejeje kugenzura ikibuga zizokinirako na Nigeria, yemeza ko ata bwoba bafise. Olivier Niyungeko yabwiye BBC ko ica nkenerwa ari uko Abarundi benewabo babafata mu mugongo aho bari hose, naho batoshika i Alexandria. Yagize ati: "Nka kurya bamenyereye gushigikira umurwi wabo w'Intamba Mu Rugamba, twobasaba ko babandanya badushigikira aho bari hose, kuko iyo umuntu ashigikiwe aravyiyumvamwo agakora cane. "Twaje ngaha kuduza ibendera ry'igihugu cacu kandi abakinyi baravyumva, hasigaye ko umuntu wese yumva ko ari Umurundi avuga ati 'ndashigikiye Intamba Mu Rugamba'". Abajijwe niba ikibazo c'ubushuhe bose bikugura ata ngorane kibateye, bwana Niyungeko yavuze ko abona ivyo gukina mu ma saa kumi bobireka bagakina ku kagoroba izuba ritanguye kurenga,  kanatsinda ngo amatara arahari ku bibuga ngo rero ntabona igituma batobigenza uko. Kizigenza w'Intamba Mu Rugamba, Saido Berahino, yatanguye gukinira iyi kipe igaca inaronka itike yayo ya mbere yo kuja muri iri higanwa, ari mu bakinyi bazeweko vyinshi. Kiretse ko ari muri bake bamaze gukina mu mahiganwa akomeye, nk'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza Premier League, ni nawe azwi cane ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Yavuze ko ari amahirwe adasanzwe kuba akinira ikipe y'igihugu ciwe, ibintu yamye yipfuza kuva kera. Agira ati: "Naragize amahirwe yo gukina mu Bwongereza kandi vyarahinduye ubuzima bwanje. Ariko nk'uko namye ndabivuga, u Burundi niko gataka kanje, namye nshaka gukinira u Burundi. "Kuba noneho ndi  na kapitene w'u Burundi mw'ihiganwa rikomeye nk'iri ni iteka rihambaye kuri jewe." Naho icizere ari cose, u Burundi ntibworohewe na gato kuko Nigeria atari ikipe yo gupfa guta mu ndasa. Imaze kuja muri iri higanwa inshuro nyinshi mbere iranaritwara, eka mbere ikaba imaze no guserukira Afrika mu gikombe c'isi. Ariko naho biri uko, umumenyereza wa Nigeria, Gernot Rohr, avuga ko adashobora gufata minenerwe ikipe y'u Burundi naho ari ubwa mbere igiye mw'ihiganwa rikomeye nk'iri. Bwana Rohr yagize ati: "Twiteguriye u Burundi nk'uko twitegurira ikipe iyo ari yo yose. Twitegurana ukwicisha bugufi, ata gukengera uwo tuza gukina nawe. "U Burundi ni ikipe itigeze itsindwa mu nkino zose zo guhiganirwa itike yo kuza muri iki gikombe. Yaba Gabon, yaba Mali, nta n'imwe yigeze ishobora gutsinda iyi kipe y'u Burundi. "Twarabaravye kuri za video, turabaraba kandi mu rukino rwa nyuma rwo kwitegura, aho bari banganije na Tuniziya ikaza gutsinda mu minota yanyuma." U Burundi buri mu mugwi B kumwe n'amakipe ya Nigeria, Madagascar na Guinea. Urukino rwa mbere ni kuwa gatandatu itariki 22/06/2019 igihe c'isaha 19h00. Ushaka kumenye imigwi amakipe arimwo, amanota aronka hame n'uko atsindana ushobra kuja ngaha

column2: Ukraine: Putin yategetse ingabo kubandanya zisatira inyuma yo gufata Lysychansk
column3: Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya yategetse umushikiranganji wiwe wo kwivuna abansi kubandanya basatira Ukraine inyuma y’aho ingabo z’ico gihugu zigaruriye igisagara ca Lysychansk. Perezida Putin yerekanywe ku mboneshakure y’Uburusiya atera akamo ingabo ziri hakurya kubandanya intumbero yazo nk’uko biri “mu nteguro zamaze kwemezwa”. Ifatwa rya Lysychansk risigura ko ubu intara ya Luhansk yose iri mu minwe y’Uburusiya. Mu ntango buramatari w’umunya-Ukraine yavuze ko iki gisagara bakivuyemwo kugira ngo Abarusiya ntibagisambure bibereye kure. Abasirikare ubu bagiye ku bindi birindiro bishasha vyakomejwe, nk’uko buramatari Serhiy Haidai yabibwiye BBC. Avuga ko guhebera Abarusiya iki gisagara n’intara ya Luhansk cabaye ikintu kibabaje, ariko akongerako ati: “Iyi ni intambara imwe gusa dutakaje, nti dutakaje urugamba”. Yasavye ibindi birwanisho biva mu Burengero kugira ngo bashobore guhangana n’inguvu z’Uburusiya. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky arizeza ko ingabo za Ukraine zizosubirayo kugira zisubize Lysychansk "kubera ibirwanisho bigezweho biriko birongerezwa”. Uburusiya bwarongereje inguvu mu bitero vy’amabombe mu bisagara vyegereye akarere ka Donbas, aho uduce turi mu micungararo ya Sloviansk n’ibarabara riri hagati ya Lysychansk na Bakhmut ari two twiziziwe, nk’uko ingabo za Ukraine zibivuga. Intara za Donetsk na Luhansk zose hamwe nizo zigize akarere k’amahinguriro ka Donbas. Perezida Putin yabonetse abwira umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi  Sergei Shoigu ko ingabo zagize uruhara mw’ifatwa rya Luhansk zikwiye “kuruhuka kugira ngo zitegurire urundi rugamba”. Avuga ati: "Iyindi mirwi y’ingabo, harimwo umurwi wo mu Buseruko n’umurwi wo mu Burengero, itegerezwa kurangura imirimo yayo hakurikijwe integuro zamaze kwemezwa”. Yizeye kandi ko no kuri izo mpande zindi bazoshika ku ntambwe nk’iyatewe mu ntara ya Luhansk. Imbere gato y’uko atanguza igitero kuri Ukraine ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2), Putin yari yemeje Luhansk na Donetsk nk’ibihugu vyigenga. Inyeshamba zegamiye Uburusiya zatanguje intambara muri ako karere mu 2014 - umwaka nyene Uburusiya bwigarurira akarere ka Crimea. Haraciye indwi irenga ingabo z’Uburusiya zigaruriye Severodonetsk – igisagara cabaye umunyota kubera ibibombe vy’Uburusiya. Avuga ku ngingo yo kuva muri Lysychansk, Haidai yavuze ati: "Igisirikare cacu kiba caragumije iki gisagara igihe kirekire, ariko ingabo z’Uburusiya ubu zifise amahirwe menshi ku birwanisho vya rutura n’amasasu. Zari gusambura iki gisagara zibereye kure, rero ntaco vyari bimaze kugumayo”. Haidai avuga ko ubu ingabo zimukiye ku birindiro biri mu ntara ya Donetsk ihana urubibe na Luhansk, ariko ko abantu 10.000 bakiri muri iki gisagara.

column2: Imvo n'imvano ku kibazo ca Afghanistan
column3: Ikiganiro c’uyu musi cerekeye inkuru imaze iminsi ivugwa cane kw'isi, iyo nayo nta yindi n'ikurwa ry'ingabo z'Amerika n'abo bafatanyaga mw'ishirahamwe ryo kwivuna abansi NATO / OTAN mu gihugu ca Afghanistan. Izo ngabo zari zimaze imyaka 20 ziri muri ico gihugu kiri muri Asia yo hagati. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, igenekerezo rya 31 z’ukwezi kw’umunani  ni ho harangira intamabara yahuza Amerika n’incuti zayo hamwe n’aba Talibani  ku mugaragaro nk’uko biri mu masezerano y’i Doha izo mpande zibiri zari zashizeko umukono mu biganiro vyabahurije mu gihugu ca Qatar kw'itariki 29 z'ukwa 2 mu mwaka uheze wa 2020. Amerika yari yagiye muri ico gihugu inyuma y’ibitero vy’iterabwoba vyo kuwa 11 ukwezi kw’icenda mu 2001, vyagizwe i New York bihitana abantu 3.000 mu bibanza bitandukanye, aho ico gihugu cavuga ko kigiye gushigikira demokrasi no kurandurana n’imizi iterabwoba ry’umuhari Al-Qaeda. Ico gihugu n’incuti zaco zihurukiye mw’ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe OTAN, baciye birukana aba Talibani bari ku butegetsi mu ntambara bivugwa ko yagiye iratwara amadolari imiriyaridi 100 buri mwaka.  Inyuma y’imyaka cumi y’intambara y’urutavanako n’uruhigi rukomeye rwo gufata canke kwica  Osama Ben Laden, yari arongoye umuhari wa Al-Qaeda, Amerika yaje kumwicira mu gihugu kibanyi, Pakistan. Kuva Amerika itanguye gukura abasirikare bayo muri ico gihugu, aba Talibani baciye batangura kwigarurira ibisagara bitandukanye harimwo n’umugwa mukuru Kaboul. Bagifata Kaboul, umuvugizi w’aba Talibani yabwiye BBC ko bijeje abanyagihugu ba Afghanistan muri rusangi, cane cane ababa mu gisagara ca Kaboul vy’umwihariko, ko ivyo batunze, ubuzima bwabo,  vyose biri mu mutekano, ko ata kwihora bizobaho. Ufatiye kuri aya majambo umuntu yovuga ko aba Talibani b’ejo atari bo b’uyu musi? Ko Afghnistani kigiye kuba igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro n’umutekano? Coba kigiye kwemerwa n’amakungu? Kazoza k’iyindi mihari yishimikiza idini rya Islam n’akahe? Muri kino kiganiro Cyriaque Muhawenayo ari kumwe na Manirambona Jean Bosco, umwigisha muri kaminuza y’Uburundi, Ismael Buchana umwigisha kuri kaminuza mu Rwanda, akaba ari n’icegera c’uwurongoye ishirahamwe riharanira iterambere ry’abanyafrika mu Rwanda, hamwe rero na Gilbert Mwenedata umuhinga muvyo gucunga imigambi y’iterambere, akaba yarakoreye mu bihugu nk’Urwanda, Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo na Afghanistan. Ubu akaba akorerera muri Amerika mu ntara ya Washington DC.

column2: Cristiano Ronaldo: Uyu musatirizi wa Portugal na Juventus bamusanzemwo coronavirus
column3: Umusatirizi wa Portugal na Juventus Cristiano Ronaldo yapimwe asanga yaranduye wa mugera wa coronavirus, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Portugal, FPF. Itangazo rya FPF rivuga ko uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 35 "ameze neza, nta bimenyetso yerekana, kandi yishize ukwiwe". Ejo ku wa gatatu, bitegekanijwe ko Portugal ihura na Suwede mw'ihiganwa ry'imirwi nserukirabihugu, Nations League. Abandi bakinyi bose ba Portugal bapimwe, inyishu zikerenaka ko ata mugera bafise, kandi bakaba biteguye gukina. Urukino ruheruka rwayihuje n'Ubufaransa ku wa Mungu rukaba rwarangiye iyi mirwi ata n'umwe ushoboye gutsinda igitsindo. Ni yo iri hejuru mu murwi irimwo, ariko ikaba inganya amanota n'Ubufaransa. Ronaldo, kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal, ni we mukinyi wa mbere wo ku mugabane wa Bulaya yatsinze ibitsindo 100 mu nkino mpuzamakungu ku ruhande rw'abagabo, igihe igihugu ciwe gikina na Suwede mu kw'icenda guheze. Kubera yinjiye mu kiringo ca guma mu rugo, Ronaldo ntazoshobora gukina urukino rwa Juventus ku wa 17 z'uku aho izohura na Crotone, hamwe kandi n'urukino rwa mbere ruzoyihuza na Dynamo Kiev ku wa 20 z'uku kw'icumi nyene, muri rya higanwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Champions League). Mu nyuma y'aho, Juventus izohura na Verona ku wa 25 z'uku nyene. Ejo ku wa mbere mw'ijoro, Ronaldo yerekanye ku mbuga hwaniro isanamu yifashe ari kumwe na bagenziwe ba Portugal, yanditseko ati :"Turi bamwe haba mu kibuga canke hanze!".

column2: Umugwi w'abanyepolitike bo mu Bwongereza wasavye irekurwa rya Byabagamba na Rusagara
column3: Umugwi ugizwe n'abashingamateka hamwe n'abakenguzamateka batandatu b'Abongereza wandikiye ikete umukuru w'igihugu c'u Rwanda, Paul Kagame, umusaba kurekura abahoze ari intwazangabo babiri bari mw'ibohero. Frank Rusagara - yigeze kuba ajejwe kwivuna abansi mu biro biserukiye u Rwanda mu Bwongereza - na Tom Byabagambe, haciye imyaka itanu bafashwe. Bagirijwe gukwirakwiza ibihuha hamwe no gucafuza isura y'igihugu c'u Rwanda na leta yaco. Sentare ya gisirikare yabakatiye ibifunga vy'imyaka 20 na 21 uko bakurikirana. Aba banyepolitike bo mu Bwongereza, bagizwe n'abashingamateka hamwe n'abakenguzamateka, bavuga ko ivyo bipfungo bikabije ugereranije n'ivyo baregwa. Bavuze ko batewe impungenge n'amagara y'abapfunzwe, bagasaba Prezida Kagame kubarekura ku bw'ikigongwe. Ibicishije ku bushikiranganji bujejwe ubutungane, leta y'u Rwanda yanditse ikete isubiza uwaserukiye umugwi w'abo bashingamateka b'Ubwongereza. Mw'iryo keye, ubwo bushikirangani bwavuze ko mu gihe ivyo basaba vyokurikizwa hoba habaye kwivanga mu biraba ubutungane. Ngo ivyo navyo leta canke umukuru w'igihugu ntibashobora kubikora kuko kwoba ari guhonyanga amategeko. Iryo kete risoza rivuga ko ku vyerekeye kurekurwa ku bw'ikigongwe, amategeko y'u Rwanda abitegekanya mu gihe uwuregwa abisavye.

column2: Arsenal 2-0 Man U: Intsinzi ya mbere y'umumenyereza Mikel Arteta
column3: Mikel Arteta yaraye aronse intsinzi ya mbere kuva atanguye kumenyereza umurwi wa Arsenal mu rukino rwa nijoro rwari rugize gatatu akinishije uwo murwi kuva abaye umumenyereza wayo. Muri urwo rukino, Manchester United, yatanguye neza, ariko ibintu bikaba vyaje guhinduka mu nyuma kuva ku munota w'umunani, aho Nicolas Pepe yatsinda igitsindo ca mbere ca Arsenal ku mupira yari ahawe na Sead Kolasinac. Igice ca mbere cagiye kurangira biboneka ko Arsenal ariyo yiganziye cane umupira, ifise ibitsindo bibiri ku busa bwa Man U, kuko ku munota wa 42 , Sokratis Papastathopoulos yatsinze igitsindo ku mupira wari utewe na Pepe mu mfuruka z'ikibuga. Arsenal yari imaze gukinira ku kibuga cayo inkino indwi zose ariko ata na rumwe ishobora gutsinda, aho vyaboneka ko yari ifise ingorane. Kuva Arteta afashe uwo murwi mu minwe, biraboneka ko hari icahindutse kuva mu nkino zitatu amaze gukinisha, zibiri zose adashobora gutsinda, ivyatuma hari abibaza nimba koko ariwe mumenyereza yari akwiriye kumenyereza Arsenal. Ku munsi wa Mungu uheze, Arsenal yatsindiwe ku kibuga cayo n'umurwi wa Chelsea, mu rukino abatari bake babona ko yari gushobora gutsinda. Mu nkino zibiri z'imbere y'aho, yanganije n'imirwi ya Everton hamwe na Bournemouth, ariko mu rukino rwa Everton akaba yari umurorerezi gusa. Mu rukino rwa nijoro abakinyi ba Arsenal baraboneka ko bari bashashaye intsinzi imbere y'umurwi wa Manchester United. Eka na Mezut Ozil yari agize iminsi atavyifatamwo neza yakinye n'ishaka ridasanzwe, akaba mbere ariwe yagize ibirometero vyinshi gusumba abandi bakinyi ba Arsenal muri urwo rukino, aho yagize ibirometero 11.54. Mi gice ca kabiri ibintu ntivyoroshe kuri Arsenal kuko abakinyi ba Ole Gunnar Solskjær basatiriye bimwe biteye ubwoba Arsenal, ariko baravyifashemwo neza cane ntivyabagendera nk'ibiheruka igihe Chelsea ibakubita ibitsindo bibiri vyose mu minota indwi ya nyuma. Manchester United yakinye ibuze umukinyi wayo ruremesha Paul Pogba, aboneka ko atorohewe kubera imvune imutumye amara amezi atatu yose adatanguzwa mu kibuga. Urwo rukino ruheze, umumenyereza wa Manchester United yamenyesheje ko uyo mukinyi akomoka mu Bufaransa yakomeretse ku jisho ry'ikirenge bigashobora kumutuma amara ikiringo c'indwi hagati ya zitatu na zine adahonyoye mu kibuga. Kuva mu mwaka wa 2017 inyuma y'imyaka ishika 20, Arsenal ntirigera isubira kurangiza ihiganwa iri muri zine za mbere, bikayituma idashobora gukina mw'ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Uefa Champions League). Ibizigizi abakunzi bayo bari bafise mw'ihiganwa ry'umwaka uheze vyaje kuvamwo amarira aho mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Europa League batsindiwe bikomeye na Chelsea 4-0. Uko gutsindwa kwarababaje cane abakunzi ba Arsenal kuko iyo ikaramuka itsinze urwo rukino iba iri muri Champions League. Mu gihe hasigaye inkino 17 ngo ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza rirangire, Arsenal izoshobora kurangiza iri muri zine za mbere mu gihe ubu iri mu kibanza ca cumi n'amanota 27 gusa?

column2: Theodore McCarrick yahoze ari kardinali muri US arahakana ivyo gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa
column3: Uwahoze ari kardinali wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arahakana ivyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu umwana w'umuhungu w'imyaka 16 mu myaka ya 1970. Theodore McCarrick, 91, yarengutse imbere ya sentare i Massachusetts kugira yisigure ku vyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu no gukubagura (coups et blessures) yagirizwa ko yakoze mu 1974. Uyu mu kardinali yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Washington DC azwi ko ari we mutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Amerika yagirijwe ivyaha vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Imbere y'aho yahora avuga ko atibuka ko hoba hari ivyo guhohotera yoba yarakoze. Mu rubanza rwashinzwe mu kw'indwi, McCarrick yaragirijwe ivyo gukwegakwegera uyo mwana w'umuhungu - ariko atavuzwe izina -  mu buhumbu, mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike. Uyu mugabo avuga ko yakorewe aya mabi yavuze ko igihe kimwe vyabaye mu gihe yari mu bugeni bwa mwenewabo kuri kaminuza ya Wellesley muri Massachusetts mu 1974. Nyene gukorerwa aya mabi avuga ko McCarrick yamukwegeye mu cumba kimwe co muri iyo kaminuza aca atangura kumukuyakuya. Inyuma yaho, uyo mupatiri avugwa ko yaciye abwira uyu mugabo kuvuga ibisabisho kugira ngo akire "ibicumuro". Muri sentare ku wa gatanu, McCarrick yategetswe kutavugana n'uyu nyene guhohoterwa canke n'umwana n'umwe. Yasabwe gutanga ingwati y'ibihumbi 5000 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika, mu gihe bitegekanijwe ko asubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 28 z'ukw'icumi. Buri caha gishobora guhanishwa umunyororo wo gushika ku myaka itanu, kandi agategerezwa kwandikwa ku nguvu nk'umusambanyi (délinquant sexuel/sex offender) McCarrick ni umwe mu bategetsi ba Ekleziya Katorika bagirizwa gushurashuza abana mu kiringo c'imyaka mirongo. Mu 2019, yarakuwe mu mabanga inyuma y'amatohoza yakozwe na Vaticano ku vyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu mu myaka itari mike. Yaragirijwe kandi ko yafashe ku nguvu umuyabaga i New York hagati mu myaka ya 1970, yongera ahatira abagabo kuryamana nawe mu rugo i New Jersey mu gihe bariko bigira ubupatiri. Icegeranyo c'impapuro 450 ca Vaticano casanze Papa Yohani Paulo wa kabiri yarabwiwe ivyerekeye ibi vyagirizwa McCarrick, ariko agahitamwo kwizera abepiskopi ba Amerika bamukingiye ikibaba. Casanze kandi Papa Benoit/Benedict XVI - yatanze imihoho mu 2013 - ashobora kuba yaranse iciyumviro co gukora amatohoza kubera ata "vyemezo vyari bihari" ku vyo yagirizwa.

column2: Burundi: Kugira umunsi w'akaruhuko itariki Pierre Nkurunziza yashengeye vyakiriwe gute?
column3: Abarundi babona ugutandukanye icemezo c'inama nshingamateka y'u Burundi yemeje ko umusi mukuru uhariwe kuzirikana,  gukunda no gukundisha  igihugu uhuzwa n'umunsi uwari prezida Pierre Nkurunziza yashengeye. Inama nshingamateka kuwa kane yatoye kuri 76,9% - amajwi 87 avyemera, 26 abihakana  - ko buri tariki ya 8 ukwezi kwa gatandatu uzohora uba umunsi w'Imboneza mu kuzirikana, gukunda no gukundisha igihugu. Uwa mbere yatewe iryo teka rwo kuba  iyo mboneza ni uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu Pierre Nkurunziza. Uwo munsi uhuriranye n'umunsi uwo yatwaye Uburundi imyaka 15 yashengereyeko mu 2020. Igihe iryo tegeko ryemezwa mu 2020, uwo munsi wari washizwe mu kwezi kw'indwi, ibirori vyawo bigahagarikikwa n'iyo mboneza nyene. Ubu rero iyo mboneza itakiriho, umushikiranganji w'ubutungane yasiguriye inama nshingamateka ko vyari ngombwa ko hagira ibihindurwa muri iryo tegeko. Ibi vyemejwe bitegerezwa guca mu nama nkenguzamateka - aho vyitezwe ko bizoshigikirwa kuko umugambwe uri ku butegetsi uhafise ubwiganze, imbere yo guterwako igikumu n'umukuru w'igihugu. Ku rubuga rwa Facebook rwa BBC Gahuza, iyo nkuru ni imwe mu zatanzweko ivyiyumviro vyinshi kandi bitandukanye mu zatangajwe muri uku kwezi. Mu kwezi kwa mbere 2020 iyo nteguro y'ingingo yo guha iteka Pierre Nkurunziza - yari akiri ku butegetsi - yashikanwa mu nama nshingamateka, yateje impari zikomeye. Abashingamateka bo mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD barashigikiye cane iyo nteguro, abo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe nawo barayirwanije. Inyuma y'ivyemejwe n'inama nshingamateka kuwa kane, ibi ni ivyo bamwe bamwe bavuze ku rubuga rwacu rwa Facebook: Remy Muheto Sinibazako abikwiye uravye ibintu yakoze nko gukingira ikibaba umurwi w'imbonerakure,guhimiriza iyicwa ry'abatavuga rumwe na leta yiwe,mukuvuga ngo,bazohera nk'ifu y'imijira.ngo mujeri aba police bazirase...... Elie Niyonkuru Bénigne Niyonzima  yateje imbere igihugu, akuraho amacakubiri y'intara n'amoko, mbere no mumyaka itanu yanyuma harerekana ko igihugu gishobora kubaho atamfashanyo y'abazungu kironse, kikitegurira amatora atawo hanze abayemwo, ivyo kera wari nk'umugani. Etc amatora atawo hanze abayemwo, ivyo kera wari nk'umugani. Etc Bénigne Niyonzima Elie Niyonkuru urakoze kunyishura ariko ivyo umbwiye igihe mperuka i Burundi ntavyo nabonye.
