column2: Uganda - Covid-19: Abantu babiri bahagaritswe kuko batanze incanco za magendu
column3: Abantu babiri badandaza magendu bafatiwe muri Uganda bagirizwa gutanga icanco za Covid-19 za magendu. Uwundi umwe aracaronderwa. Bivugwa ko abo bantu babiri bari bamaze gutera izo ncanco abantu 800 bakora muri kompanyi yigenga, yari yasabiye incanco abakozi bayo. Igisata kijejwe gukurikirana ivyo amagara y'abantu mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu kivuga ko caronse inkuru ivuye ku bategetsi bo hasi ko abo bagabo babiri baguma batembera mu micungararo ya Kampala, bavuga ko ari abakozi bo mu buvuzi bo muri bimwe mu bitaro bisanzwe vyo muri ico gisagara. Dr Warren Namara wo muri ico gisata avuga ko hataramenyekana neza ibiri muri urwo rucanco bateye abantu, ariko ico gisata ngo kiriko kiragira amatohoza ku birugize. Guterwa urucanco rwa Covid-19 muri Uganda ni ku buntu, zikaba zishobora kuboneka mu bigo vya reta n'ivyigenga bijejwe gucandaga. Abantu barenga 856.000 baramaze gucandagwa. Uganda ihanganye n'umufunda wa kabiri w'ikiza ca Coronavirus, aho abantu benshi baguma bandukirwa hakaba hari n'abamaze gupfa.

column2: Brussels: Bagiye kwitirira ibarabara indaya Eunice Osayande yishwe mu 2018
column3: Igisagara ca Bruxelles kivuga ko kigiye kwitirira ibarabara rishasha indaya y'umunya Nigeria aherutse kugandagurwa, nka kimwe mu bigize isekeza ryo guha iteka abakenyezi mu Bubirigi. Abarongoye iki gisagara bavuga ko iri barabara rizokwitirirwa Eunice Osayande, yishwe acumiswe imbugita n'umwe mu bakiriya biwe mu kwa gatandatu 2018. Uyu mwigeme yari yashitse ku mugwa mukuru w'Ububirigi mu 2016 yemerewe akazi keza kugira ngo yubake kazoza kiwe i Bulaya. Yari azi ko abagabo bamutumyeko bari abakinyi b'amareresi bari bagiye kumugira igihangange mu gukina ama filime. Ariko yasanze bari abacuruza abantu. Amaze kugera i Buruseri, ubwo nyene baciye bamuhatira mu bumalaya, akaba yabwiwe ko aheraniye aba bagabo ama-euros 45.000 arimwo ay'urugendo, agashimwe kabo hamwe n'uburaro. Indwi nkeya imbere y'igandagurwa ryiwe, yarituye ishirahamwe ry'abadandaza imibiri yabo aho yaribwiye ko yakubagurwa agatotezwa muri ako kazi kiwe. Yaratinya kuja kwitura igipolisi kubera ata bimuranga yari afise. Mu kwa gatandatu 2018, afise imyaka  23, Osayande yacumiswe n'umukiriya imbugita incuro 17 zose mu karere ka Gare du Nord. Haciye haduka imyiyerekano y'abimukira badandaza imibiri i Buruseri. Abayikoze basaba kworoherezwa mu kazi kabo, banasaba n'abategetsi b'akarere gushiraho amategeko agenga ico gisata. Amategeko ntabuza ubumaraya mu Bubirigi ariko nta tegeko rihuriweko na bose mu gihugu cose. Maxime Maes, arongoye ishirahamwe UTSOPI ry'abacuruza imibiri yabo i Buruseri, ni we yateguye iyi myiyerekano. Uyu mupfasoni yabwiye BBC ati: "Urupfu rwa Eunice rwarababaje cane abantu benshi, cane cane ku bimukira bakorera mu karere yakoreramwo". "Ubugizi bwa nabi bugenda bwiyongera muri ako karere, abagore ba ntahonikora bakaba ari bo babangamiwe cane". Umusore w'imyaka 17 ni we yagirijwe urupfu rwa Osayande akaba arindiriye gucirirwa urubanza. Bane mu bagize uyu murwi w'abacuruza abantu na bo nyene barahagaritswe, mu kwa mbere kw'uno mwaka, bakaba baciriwe iminyororo ishika ku myaka ine. Mu kwitirira ibarabara rishasha umupfasoni Osayande, igisagara ca Bruxelles kivuga ko gishaka gushira ahabona "abagore bose bazira urucuruza rw'abantu, ubugizi bwa nabi bushingiye ku gitsina hamwe n'ubwicanyi bukorerwa abagore". Iri barabara ni ryo rya mbere rizoba ryitiriwe indaya muri ico gihugu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru RTBF co mu Bubirigi. Iri barabara rishasha ririko rirubakwa mu buraruko bw'igisagara ca Bruxelles ni rimwe mu yandi ari mu twigoro tw'abarongoye iki gisagara two kwitirira abagore ibibanza vyinshi. Hari amabarabara aza yaramaze kwitirirwa abagore batari bake, harimwo Yvonne Nèvejean na Andrée De Jongh bari mu barwanije aba Nazi b'Abadagi muri ya ntambara ya kabiri y'isi yose. Hari kandi n'ikiraro citiriwe Suzan Daniel, umubirigikazi yaharaniye agateka k'abari muri wa murwi w'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye. Ans Persoons ari mu barongoye iki gisagara avuga ko ibice 42% vy'abagore mu Bubirigi bari hagati y'imyaka 16 na 69 bamaze gukubagurwa mu buryo ubu canke buriya. "Uru rugero ni runini cane mu badandaza imibiri yabo. Iki ni co neza na neza gitumye Eunice Osayande yitirirwa ibarabara". Iri barabara ricubakwa ryitezwe kwugururwa icese mu mezi make ari imbere. Abarongoye iki gisagara bavuga ko imirwi y'abadandaza imibiri yabo hamwe n'abimukira bazotumirwa kugira bashikirize ijambo ku musi wo kuryugurura.

column2: Sharia: kubera iki iri tegeko rya Islam ribuza umuzik? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
column3: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia. Muri iri tegeko, hari vyinshi bibujijwe, kimwe muri vyo ni  umuziki. Mu ndwi iheze, umuvugizi w’aba Taliban Zabihulah Mujahid yabwiye ikinyamakuru New York Times ko umuziki ubujijwe mw’idini rya Islam. Mu gihe c’ubutegetsi  bw'aba Talibani mu myaka ya 1990, umuziki hafi ya wose, televiziyo n'amazu ya sinema vyari bibujijwe kandi kubirengako vyashoboraga kugira ingaruka zikomeye. Iri tegeko Sharia ririmwo ibifatwa nk’indenzarugero. BBC yashatse kumenya ico iri tegeko rivuga n’uko Islam ifata umuziki muri rusangi, ikaba yavuganye na Haruna Nkunduwiga yigeze kurongora umuryango w’aba-Islam mu Burundi. Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga ko iri tegeko ari itegeko ngenderwako rikunze gukurikizwa mu bihugu vya Islam, ariko ridakoreshwa mu bindi bihugu nk’Uburundi kubera Islam iri kumwe n’ayandi madini. Fyonda aho hejuru wumvirize ingene Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga.

column2: Zimbabwe-Covid : Reta itegeka abakozi bayo kwicandagisha canke guheba akazi
column3: Reta ya Zimbabwe ibwira abakozi bayo guhitamwo gufata urucanco canke guheba akazi, aho ni mu gihe abo bakozi barindiriye kuronka uracanco rwa Covid -19. Reta ivuga ko iyo ngingo ari iyo kugerageza kurwanya gukwiragiza uwo mugera mu bandi bantu. Mu kiganiro n'amaradiyo yo mu gihugu, ministre wa Zimbabwe ajejwe ubutungane Ziyambi Ziyambi avuga ko abakozi bibaza ko bafise uburenganzira bwo kwiteza canke kutiteza urucanco bihenda. Imbere y'aho, reta yari yashinze ingingo z'uko amazu y'uburiro n'amashengero yakira abantu ari uko berekanye ikarata y'uko biteje urucanco. Intumbero n'ukugirango reta irabe ko yohangana n'ikibazo c'uko abantu bakigonanwa kuja kwicandagisha. Ico gihugu gushika ubu kimaze gucandaga abantu bashika miriyoni imwe n'ibinhumbi amajana indwi, n'ukuvuga 12%  y'abantu barenga kuri  miriyoni 15 baba muri ico gihugu co mu bumanuko bwa Afrika. Ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, abamaze kuronka incanco zuzuye ni hafi 3% gusa. Gushika ubu nta gihugu co muri Afrika kirashinga amategeko atuma urucanco rwa  Covid  ruba ngombwa. Ariko abahinga bavuga ko bishobora kwumvikana ko bene ayo mategeko ajaho nk'inzira yo guhangana n'ico kiza n'amabi yaco ku magara y'abantu.

column2: Indyane hagati ya Britney Spears na murumunawe zigeze kure, aho baryanira ku mbuga hwaniro
column3: Britney Spears na mushikiwe we Jamie Lynn bamaze imisi baterana amajambo biturutse ku kiganiro giheruka ku mboneshakure hamwe no ku mubano wabo wo muri kahise. Uyu muririmvyi yagiriza murumunawe ko yaciye ku kiganiro co ku wa gatatu mu kumenyekanisha igitabo ciwe "akoresheje izina ryanje". Britney avuga ko Jamie Lynn ata "kintu na kimwe yigeze akora" kandi umuryango "ukunda kunyononera no kumbabaza". Jamie Lynn avuga ko amajambo ya Britney ari "ibinyoma vyeruye" kandi ko igihe cose yamye hafi ya mukuruwe. Uyu mugore w'imyaka 30 avuga ko buri gihe yama ariko agerageza gusigurira abana biwe "igituma umuryango wacu ubandanya uterwa ubwoba bwo kwicwa, nk'ingaruka y'amajambo yandikwa na inasenge wabo yo kuwagiriza ibintu bidafashe, cane cane mu gihe tuzi ko yetegerezwa kuvugisha ukuri". Britney amaze igihe anegura umuryango wiwe ku kungene wamufashe mu myaka 13 wamaze ari wo ujejwe amatungo yiwe, igihe amafaranga n'ubuzima bwiwe vyari mu minwe ya se wa Jamie. Urubanza rwagiye kurangirira muri sentare mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Jamie Lynn Spears avuga iki? Uyu mutoyi wa Britney yatanze ikiganiro ku mboneshakure ABC mu kiganiro Good Morning America (twogereranya na Mwaramutse Amerika) mu ntango z'iyi ndwi turiko turangiza asigura igitabo ciwe Things I Should Have Said (mu kirundi twovuga tuti: Ivyo nategerezwa kuba navuze). Iki gitabo kivugwa ko gisigura ubuzima bwiwe, harimwo n'isanganya umukobwa wiwe yagize rigahakwa kumutwara ubuzima mu 2017, imigenderanire yiwe na Britney hamwe n'ikibanza yari afise mu kubungabunga umutungo w'uyu muririmvyi. Muri ico kiganiro, Jamie Lynn yiyise "umufasha wa mushikanje akomeye cane" hanyuma avuga ko "yafashe ingingo zo gufasha" guhagarika ivyo kumubikira umutungo. Ariko nk'uko bivugwa na ABC, yavuze ko inyifato ya Britney muri kahise "itari itomoye", "irangwa n'ubwoba butagira ishingiro"  kandi ko yari "mahindagu". Yabwiye iki kiganiro ati: "Igihe hafatwa ingingo yo kumubikira amatungo yiwe, jewe nari mfise imyaka 17, nari hafi yo kwibaruka, rero jewe sinatahura ivyariko biraba, kandi sinavyitaho". Jamie Lynn abandanya avuga ko mushikiwe yamwegereye akamusaba nimba "yoshobora kumukurikiranira abahungu biwe bakaronka ivyo bakeneye", ivyo yamwemereye. Abandanya ati: "Ariko, urazi ko maze kumenya ko abikiwe umutungo, numva umengo sinashaka kubigiramwo uruhara gushika kumbure aho azobiviramwo. Rero si jewe namucungira amafaranga yiwe canke ibintu nk'ivyo, rero nimba vyari bimeze uko harabaya ukutumvikana, ariko gusa uko vyoba vyaragenze kwose, nta ngingo nafashe yo kuvyinjiramwo". Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Britney yanditse ati: "Naravye muri terefone nca mbona ko mushikanje yatanze ico kiganiro mu kumenyekanisha igitabo ciwe. "Ibintu bibiri vyambabaje mushikanje yavuze ni ingene avuga ko inyifato yanje yari iy'ubutabanga. "Ntiyigeze aba hafi yanje mu myaka 15 iheze ico gihe... none mbega ni kubera iki twobizana atari uko ashaka kugurisha igitabo ciwe akoresheje izina ryanje". Britney avuga kandi ko akibabajwe n'ingene Jamie Lynn aherutse gusubiramwo indirimbo ziwe zamamaye. Uyu muririmvyi rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa pop w'imyaka 40 yanditse ati: "Ndazi ko abatari bake bashobora kuvyumva nk'ibitagira mvura, ariko nanditse indirimbo zanje nyinshi kandi mushikanje yari akiri uruhinja. Nta kintu na kimwe yari ashoboye gukora. Yama ahabwa ibintu vyose". "Namye ndi umuntu mukuru. Vyose barabikoze barankinisha, nkiyicarira aho hanyuma nkabifata uko". Yongerako ati: "Jamie Lynn, ndibaza ko ibintu ari vyiza n'igitabo cane". Jamie Lynn Spears nawe yahavuye yishura ku nyishu yatanzwe wa Britney, aho abwira abamukurikirana ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "N'ukuri, mvugishije ukuri, ibintu bivugwa nta kuri na gutoya kurimwo". Avuga ko igitabo ciwe kiterekeye Britney gusa, ariko akongerako ati: "Gusa sinohava mpakana ngo mvuge ko ntari mwene Spears, kandi ko bimwe mu vyo nzi mushikanje abifisemwo uruhara". Jamie Lynn, yamenyekanye canke mu rukurikirane rw'ibiganiro All That and Zoey 101 vy'imboneskakure Nickelodeon akaba yaranasohoye indirimbo yiwe, agaruka ku buzima bwiwe avuga ko bwabayemwo ibibazo bikomeye igihe kitari gito. Yandika ati: "Namye nkorana umwete udasanzwe kuva mbere nkiri umuyabaga, kandi narashoboye kwubaka umwuga wanje n'aho nitwa ko ndi mutoya wa mushikanje. "Si ndiko ndiyemera canke nishira hejuru, ariko ndiko mvuga ukuri kwanje kugira ngo nkire ibisebe mfise ku mutima, kugira ngo ibi bintu birangire hanyuma mbandanye nja imbere, kandi nipfuza ko na mushikanje yokora uko".

column2: Burundi: Basaba ko ingingo yo gukata umushahara w'abigisha ibangira
column3: Umurwi w'igihugu wigenga ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi CNIDH usaba ko ingingo yo gukata intererano ku mishahara y'abigisha ihagarara kuko yafashwe abo vyega batagishijwe inama. Urunani rw'amasendika y'abigisha COSSESONA yarafashe ingingo y'uko kuva muri uku kwa mbere 2020 buri mwigisha, yaba uwuri muri sendika canke atarimwo, azokatwa amafaranga 500 mu ntumbero yo gushigikirana hagati y'abigisha. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu wa kabiri, Sixte Vigny Nimuraba arongoye CNIDH asaba urwo runani guhagarika igikorwa cose co gukata ayo mafaranga y'intererano. Avuga ko barindira urutonde rushasha rw'abanywanyi bazoba binjiye mu wo mugambi. Abarongoye ama sendika SYGEPEBU na SEPEDUC barapfunzwe kuva ku wa 08 z'uku kwezi inyuma y'aho biyamirije iyo ngingo ya COSSESONA bavuga ko abayirongoye bashaka kwiba abigisha izuba riva. Muri ico kiganiro, Bwana Nimuraba avuga ko umurwi CNIDH ushigikiye umugambi wo gufatana mu nda wiyumviriwe n'urunani COSSESSONA, kuko ujanye n'itegeko ry'umukuru w'igihugu rishirasho umunsi wahariwe ugufatana mu nda. Hagati aho, avuga ko CNIDH inegura amasezerano yashizweko igikumu mu Kayanza ategekanya gutaka amafaranga ku mishara y'abigisha bose, abari mu ma sendika n'abatari muri yo. Ati: "Ntiyakurikije amategeko y'igihugu hamwe n'amategeko mpuzamakungu", akavuga ko ari uguhonyanga uburenganzira bwabo. "Ingingo yafashwe yo gukata umushahara abakozi batagishijwe inama ari uguhohotera uburenganzira bwo ku mutungo wabo". Emmanuel Mashandari, icegera c'urunani COSSESONA yabwiye BBC ko ingingo yo gukata abigisha bose yafashwe kubera ko nabo nyene iyo hari ivyo basavye bakavyemererwa, nabo nyene babironkako. Ati: "Twabigize kubera y'uko na twebwe iyo tugiye gusaba ivyo dusaba, bigashika mbere n'umushahara bakawudukata kubera tuba twahagaritse akazi, ivyo tuzanye barabironkako". "Duca tugira tuti rero ko amasendika arinda arwanira ivyo arwanira hanyuma akazana kandi bakaronkako bose, no kuri iki ciyumviro co gufashanya bategerezwa kuyatanga bose". CNIDH yo ivuga ko COSSESSONA yategerezwa "kubanza kuja inama n'ingingo n'abigisha ikabasigurira inyungu zo kwinjira muri uwo mugambi imbere y'uko babakata intererano ku mishahara yabo". Bwana Nimubara ati: "N'aho CNIDH ishigikiye umugambi w'igihugu wo gushigikirana, ugukata imishahara y'abakozi biba inyuma y'uko abantu bagishijwe inama kandi bikagaragarira mu rwandiko ruriko umukono nk'uko bigenda mu ntererano zindi zitangwa mu ma sendika". "Kireste uburenganzira leta ihabwa n'amategeko agenga igihugu n'ibindi bimwe bimwe bishobora kurekurwa n'ayo mategeko, umushahara nta n'umwe ashobora kuwihagira". Bwana Mashandari aragiriza Antoine Manuma arongoye SYGEPEBU hamwe na Gérard Niyongabo arongoye SEPEDUC ko bifatiye mu gahanga abarongoye COSSESONA mu kubatuka baciye ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. CNIDH  iranegura iyo ngendo, igahamagarira ahubwo abegwa n'ayo matati gushira imbere ibiganiro aho kwama batyozanya. Isaba ko iyo ngingo yo gukata amahera ku mishahara iba irahagaze kugira abigisha bavyiyumvamwo babanza kuvyiyemeza bo nyene ubwabo, batarinze guterwa ubwoba. Isaba kandi igipolisi kurekura "abari mu mashirahamwe aharanira inyungu z'abigisha bapfunzwe bariko baharanira amateka yabo kugira ngo hashirwe imbere umwumvikano hagati y'abari mu matati". Iyo ngingo yo gukata amafaranga yafashwe inyuma y'ayandi mafaranga yakaswe ku mishahara y'abigisha mu 2017 na 2019. Bwana Nimuraba asaba urunani COSSESONA kwerekana ku mugaragaro ingene ayo mafaranga yakoreshejwe kugira ngo buri mwigisha wese abikeneye abimenye. Ati: "Ivyo vyotuma haba umuco no mu kwumvisha abigisha ikoreshwa ryiza ry'amafaranga bakaswe". COSSESONA (Coalition Spéciale des Syndicats des Enseignants pour la Solidarité Nationale) ni urunani rw'amasendika atandukanye y'abigisha rwatangujwe mu 2017.

column2: Abagore babiri barwaye kanseri y’ibere batanguje ishirahamwe ry’ugufasha abandi barwayi nkabo
column3: Abagore babiri barwaye kanseri y'ibere idakira bashinze ishirahamwe bise Secondary Sisters kugira ngo bafashe abandi, ni inyuma y'aho baronkeye ibipimo vyabaciye umutima. Abongerezakazi Nicky Newman na Laura Middleton-Hughes, bompi b'imyaka 31, bafise kanseri igeze ku rugero rugira kane. Bisigura ko igeze ku rugero rwo gukwiragira mu bindi bice vy'umubiri nk'amagufa, amahaha, igitigu (canke umwijima mu Kinyarwanda) canke ubwonko. Igihe Nicky wo mu karere ka Guildford yabwirwa ko kanseri yiwe idashobora gukira kubera yari igeze ku rugero rwo hejuru, avuga ko vyatumye agira "ubwoba budasanzwe". Abo bagore bompi bizeye ko iryo shirahamwe ryabo rikorera ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rizofasha abandi bazoronka inkuru mbi nk'iyi guhangana nayo. Laura ava i Norwich avuga ko gushinga iryo shirahamwe vyabahaye "akaryo keza k'ukuganira ku vyerekeye kanseri yacu". Ati: "Twempi tubona ko dufise kazoza kadatomoye, ariko turafise kazoza kandi tuzobaho uko nyene". "Rero mu gihe twoshobora gufasha n'umuntu n'umwe gusa kwumva amahoro, akumva ko ari umuntu nk'abandi, ico kirahagije". Abo bagore bompi, bakorana n'umugambi wiswe Stand Up To Cancer. Ni umugambi w'isekeza ry'ukwegeranya amahera watunganijwe n'ikigo co mu Bwongereza ca Cancer Research UK kijejwe kurwanya kanseri, hamwe na televiziyo Channel 4. Nicky yagiye kumenya ko afise ikivyimba mw'ibere igihe yari yagiye kwivuza ari kumwe n'umugabo wiwe. Avuga ko yari yavyiketse n'imbere y'uko abimubwira, aravye ingene muganga yahindutse mu maso. Mu gihe yariko arapimwa, yavuze ko yumva ababara mu mugongo, ariho yaca arungikwa ku muhinga afotora mu mubiri. Ati: "Umuganga yambwiye ati: 'Sha nta kundi, ntaco nshobora kugufasha'. Vyaciye bintera ubwoba bwinshi". Ariko, yaciye amuha umuti witwa Palbociclib wari uherutse kwemerwa n'ikigo NHS kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza. Imiti bariko barafata ishobora kuba yaratumye iyo ndwara itabandanya ikwiragira mu mubiri, ariko ikaba yatumye batazigera bavyara. Nicky avuga ko igihe yava kwa muganga, yari ababajwe cane n'uko atazoronka akaryo ko kwitwa umuvyeyi gusumba kurwara kanseri. Mugenziwe Laura yagiye kumenya ko arwaye kanseri yo mw'ibere mu mwaka wa 2014 mu gihe yari mu karuhuko bakamutora ikivyimba. Baciye bamukura ibere rimwe baranamuvura, kandi arakira neza. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane 2016, niho yumva ububabare ku rutugu i buryo bwaguma bwongerekana, baca bamurungika gucishwa mu cuma agapimwa. Niho basanga afise ikivyimba ku mutwe w'igufa bita 'humerus' rifatanya urutugu n'inkokora. Ati: "Nagize ubwoba budasanzwe, 2016 wambereye umwaka mubi, umwaka mubi n'ukuri!" Laura afise ibimenyetso vya kanseri y'amabere vyakwiragiye mu ruti rw'umugongo, mu magufa afatanye narwo no mu gice c'urukenyerero n'amayunguyungu. Avuga ati: "Hagati aho, ndashima ko imiti ndiko ndafata iriko iramfasha kubandanya mbaho".

column2: Vincent Kompany ariko arondera abakinyi muri TP Mazembe ya Kongo
column3: Umumenyereza mushasha w'umurwi wa Anderlecht, Vincent Kompany, ariko arondera abakinyi muri Kongo mu twigoro two gusubira gukomeza uwo murwi wo mu Bubirigi. Anderlecht ntiyashoboye kuronka uburenganzira bw'uguhiganirwa ibikombe ku rwego rw'umugabane wa Bulaya mu mwaka uza w'inkino. Uyu murwi witeguye kugura abakinyi Meschak Elia na Arsene Zola basanzwe bakina muri TP Mazembe muri Kongo. TP Mazembe iremeza igurishwa ry'abo bakinyi, ariko nta nsiguro itanga. Eka n'umurwi Anderlecht ntaco uratangaza. Umukinyi Elia w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akina ku ruhande, yaheruka kuja kwimenyereza mu murwi Standard Liege, yaranageragejwe mu murwi Bursaspor wo muri Turukiya, ariko bikaba bitagenze neza. Asanzwe ari i Cairo mu Misiri mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Kongo uri mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika (CAN 2019), witeze gukina na Madagascar mu gice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma. Bitegekanijwe ko azova i Cairo agenda i Buruseli mu Bubirigi, ivya Kongo muri iryo higanwa birangiye. Arsene Zola wewe yitezwe i Buruseli ejo ku munsi wa gatandatu nk'uko bitangazwa n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ububirigi. Zola yavutse ku wa 23 z'ukwa kabiri 1996 nk'uko vyerekanwa ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'umurwi TP Mazembe. Haciye imyaka itatu atanguye gukina, akaba yarerekanye ubuhinga bukomeye igihe umurwi TP Mazembe watsindira igikombe c'imirwi yabaye iya mbere muri Afrika mu mwaka wa 2017. Sibwo bwa mbere umurwi TP Mazembe ugurisha abakinyi mu gihugu c'Ububirigi. Mu kwa mbere kwa 2017, waragurishije abakinyi Merveille Bokadi, Jonathan Bolingi na Christian Luyinduma mu murwi Standard Liege. Hari haciye imyaka indwi umurwi Anderlecht uguze abakinyi Patou Kabangu na Bedi Mbenza bompi ibakuye muri TP Mazembe nyene, ariko bikaba bitabagendeye neza.

column2: Ni ibiki Donald Trump yagiye avuga ku bijanye na Coronavirus?
column3: Perezida Donald Trump ni we mutegetsi akomeye kw'isi yanduye indwara ya Covid-19. Mw'ijoro ryo ku wa 01 z'uku kw'icumi, Perezida Trump yamenyesheje ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter ko we n'umugore wiwe Melania banduye. Iyi nkuru ije mu gihe gikomeye c'imyiyamamazo mu matora ategekanijwe ku itariki 3 z'ukwa 11, mu gihe kandi iki kiza karanda ca coronavirus kimaze guhitana Abanyamerika barenga 200,000, mu gihe abarenga miliyoni 7 banduye. Ibinyamakuru vya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bimenyesha ko uyu ari we mukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika agize ibibazo vy'amagara akiri ku butegetsi mu myaka mirongo iheze. Ivyagiye bitangazwa na Perezida Trump ku bijanye na coronavirus vyagiye bitera impari zikomeye, mbere akaba yaraneguwe cane ku kungene yavyifashemwo ku biraba iki kiza. Ng'ibi bimwe mu bikomeye yagiye aravuga kuri Covid-19: Ku wa 22 z'ukwa mbere, haciye iminsi ibiri gusa habonetse umuntu wa mbere yanduye coronavirus muri Amerika, Perezida Trump yahaye ikiganiro televiziyo CNBC yo muri Amerika, aho yafashe minenerwe Covid-19, avuga ko ata kibazo iteye ku gihugu. "Ibintu biri ku murongo. Ni umuntu umwe avuye mu Bushinwa, kandi ibintu turabifise mu minwe. Nta ngorane zizoba". Ku wa 27 z'ukwa kabiri, abantu bari banduye Covid-19 muri Amerika bari 25 gusa, ariko Trump yabwiye Abanyamerika ko ibintu vyategerezwa "kuba bibi imbere y'uko biba vyiza". Ico gihe, Trump yari agifise icizere ko uwu mugera ushobora kuranduranwa n'imizi. Mu nama mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu Maison Blanche/White House, Trump yavuze ati: "Izogenda amazimayongo. Ni umunsi umwe gusa, ni nk'igitangaro, izorangira". Ayo majambo yagumye ayasubiramwo mu ndwi nkeya zakurikiye, aho yavuga ko ibitigiri vy'abandura mu minsi mike vyariko "biregereza ubusa[zeru]". Mu kwa gatanu, Bwana Trump  yavuze ko kubona ibiharuro vy'abandura bigenda vyiyongera muri Amerika cari "ikimenyetso ciza". Mu nama nshikiranganji yerekanywe ku mboneshakure, yavuze ati: "Iyo tugize abantu benshi banduye, jewe si mbona ko iyo ari ingorane". "Jewe ingene ndabifata, ku ruhande rumwe, ndabifata ko ari ikintu ciza kuko vyerekana ko ubushobozi bwacu bwo gupima bukomeye cane". Yavuze ivyo yishimikije ibiharuro vyerekana ko ico gihe Amerika ari yo yari imaze gupima abantu benshi gusumba ibihugu vyose kw'isi, n'aho yaza inyuma mu bijanye n'urugero rw'abantu bari bamaze gupimwa ico gihe. Ku wa 22 z'ukw'indwi, Perezida Trump yavuze ko imyiyerekano yo muri rya sekeza Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara) mu bisagara bitari bike vya Amerika ari yo yabaye intandaro y'irwirirana rya Covid-19 mu gihugu. Ati: "Ibiharuro vy'abandura vyatanguye kwiyongera mu Banyamerika bakiri bato inyuma gato y'imyiyerekano, ari yo nk'uko mubizi neza, ariyo yatumye haba ukudebukirwa mu twigoro two kurwanya iki kiza mu gihugu". Mu gihe abahinga mu vy'amagara y'abantu bari bagize ubwoba ko iyi myiyerekano yari gutuma ibitigiri vy'abandura vyiyongera, ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko ata kivyemeza ko ibi ariko vyagenze. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'ibigo vya Kaminuza vya Harvard na Northwestern bwerekana ko iyi myiyerekano "yari ifise uruhara ruto cane rwose" mw'irwirirana ry'abanduye uwu mugera mu kwa gatandatu no mu kw'indwi. Uko iki kiza cagenda ciyongera muri Amerika, Perezida Trump yagenda yipimisha coronavirus iminsi yose. Abajijwe ibijanye n'uku kwipimisha kwa minsi yose, ku wa 21 z'ukwa gatanu yatanze inyishu nk'uko umengo ntaco bimubwiye. Imbere yuko yurira kajugujugu ari imbere ya Maison Blanche, yavuze ati: "Inyishu z'ibipimo ni vyiza cane". "Rero muri kino gitondo, ibipimo vyerekana ko nkomeye, si ko? Rero, ibipimo ni vyiza cane. Ni ukuvuga ko ata mugera nanduye". Mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abandura vyariko biraduga cane muri Amerika, Perezida Trump, ku wa 04 z'ukw'indwi, umunsi w'ukwikukira kwa Amerika, yavuze ko ibice 99% vy'abanduye Covid-19 muri Amerika "ata ngorane na ntoya bateye". Ati: "Ubu tumaze gupima abantu hafi imiliyoni 40. Twakoze gutyo, turerekana ibitigiri vy'abanduye, 99% muri vyo nta ngorane na ntoya biteye". Aya majambo yaciye yiyamirizwa ubwo nyene na Anthony Fauci, umukuru w'ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara zandukira mu gihugu (National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases), hamwe n'umuhinga wa leta yiwe mu bijanye na Covid-19. Muganga Fauci ati: "Ibi si ko bimeze na gato". Ikiganiro ca mbere hagati y'abahiganirwa ikibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu ku wa 29 z'ukw'icenda, caranzwe n'uguterana amajambo hagati ya Bwana Trump n'umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abademokarate, Joe Biden. Bimwe mu vyo yanegura, Perezida Trump yarifatiye mu gahanga Biden k'ukungene yitwararika cane ingingo zo kwirinda Covid-19. Ati: "Igihe cose uzomubona, azoba yambaye agapfukamunwa". "Ashobora kuba ariko avugira ku metero 60 uvuye ... ariko ukabona yambaye agapfukamunwa kanini bitari bwigere bibaho". Mu ntango, Perezida Trump yaranse kwambara agapfukamunwa n'aho yaba ari mu bibanza rusangi, akaba yatanguye kukambara ubwa mbere mu kw'indwi, mbere no ku wa 22 z'ukwa cenda akaba yaritavye ikoraniro ashikiriza n'ijambo ata gapfukamunwa yambaye. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Perezida Trump yarafashe minenerwe ivyo kwambara agapfukamunwa, n'aho abahinga bobo bavuga ibindi. Ubutumwa bwa Bwana Trump kuri Twitter amenyesha ko we n'umugore wiwe banduye Covid-19, bwaherekejwe n'ubundi butanga icizere mu gihe hari abari bafise amakenga ku magara yiwe. Ubwo butumwa buvuga buti: "Muri iri joro, ibipimo vyerekana ko @FLOTUS [Madamu wa Perezida, mu mfunyafunyo] na jewe twanduye COVID-19. Dutanguye igihe ca guma mu rugo ubu nyene. Ibi tuzobirengana TURI KUMWE TWESE!" Uyu mukuru w'igihugu w'imyaka 74, ari mu murwi w'abantu bafatwa n'abahinga ko babangamirwa cane, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara muri Amerika (Centre for Disease Control, CDC). Kugeza kw'itariki 30 z'ukw'icenda, Covid-19 yari imaze kwica Abanyamerika barenga 41,000 bafise hagati y'imyaka 65 na 74, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo CDC.

column2: Intambara ya Ukraine: Poland ivuga ko izobaho n'aho Russia yoyima gaze
column3: Pologne ivuga ko izoshobora "kubaho" inyuma y'aho Uburusiya buhagarikiye igurishwa rya gaze muri ico gihugu kuri uno wa gatatu, nk'uko amakuru abivuga. Ikompanyi ntanganguvu y'Uburusiya Gazprom yabwiye Pologne na Bulgarie ko izohagarika igurishwa rya gaze mu bihugu "vy'abakeba" vyanse kuriha mu ma rouble. Amakuru ava mu bigo vy'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bijejwe gaze yerekana ko gaze yahora irungikwa muri Pologne ubu yahagaze. Pologne ivuga ko izoronka gaze ahandi. Ntibiramenyekana neza nimba Bulgarie nayo nyene yakatiwe gaze. Ibi bihugu vyompi vyaranse kuriha mu ma roubles - ifaranga ry'Uburusiya. Ikompanyi ya Pologne ijejwe gaze, PGNiG, ivuga ko yari yabwiwe ko imihora yose ya gaze yategerezwa kwugarwa kuva isaha zibiri mu masaha yo mu ci ya Bulaya yo hagati (ni co kimwe n'ay'Uburundi no mu Rwanda). Ubushikiranganji bwa Bulgaria bujejwe amasoko ntanganguvu buvuga ko bwabwiwe ko irungikwa rya gaze muri iki gihugu rihagarikwa kuva kuri uwu wa gatatu. PGNiG igendera kuri Gazprom ku rugero hafi rwose rwa gaze yinjiza mu gihugu, 53% ya gaze yinjije mu gihugu yayiguze mu Burusiya mu gice ca mbere c'uno mwaka. Ivuga ko iri hagarikwa ry'igurishwa ari uguhonyanga amasezerano, ikavuga kandi ko izofata izindi ngingo kugira ngo isubire kuronka gaze. Bulgaria,  igihugu gisanzwe kigendera kuri Gazprom ku rugero rurenga 90% rwa gaze gikoresha, ivuga ko yafashe ingingo zo kurondera ayandi masoko ariko nta mategeko yafashwe ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa rya gaze muri kino gihe. Ubushikiranganji bw'ico gihugu bujejwe amasoko ntanganguvu buvuga ko Bulgarie yakoze ivyo yategerezwa gukora mu masezerano isanzwe ifitaniye na Gazprom kandi ko bwarishe ivyo bwategerezwa kuriha. Buvuga kandi ko uburyo bushasha bwo kuriha bwashizweho n'Uburusiya buhonyanga amasezerano asanzwe ahari. Aya makuru amaze kuja ahabona, ubushikiranganji bwa Pologne bujejwe ikirere buvuga ko iki gihugu gifise amasoko ntanganguvu akwiye. Umushikiranganji ajejwe ikirere Anna Moskwa avuga ko bidakenewe kwikora kuri gaze y'integabizoza kandi ko badashobora guhagarika gaze ku bakiriya. Icegera c'umushikiranganji wa Pologne ajejwe imigenderanire, Marcin Przydacz, avuga ko igihugu ciwe cari camaze kwitegura ko Uburusiya bwari gushobora kugabanya igurishwa rya gaz mu gihugu ciwe, gica kirondera ayandi masoko. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Ndazi neza cane ko tuzotorera inyishu iki kibazo". Avuga kandi ko iyi ngingo yo kwugara imihora ya gaze yerekana ko Moscou itari "incuti y'umwizigirwa mu gikorwa ico ari co cose c'ubucuruzi" aca asaba ibindi bihugu vya Bulaya nk'Ubudagi gushigikira ingingo yo guhagarika gukoresha amasoko ntanganguvu y'Uburusiya. Polonge yari isanzwe iri mu nteguro zo guhagarika kugurira gaze mu Burusiya gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka, aho amasezerano y'igihe kirekire na Gazprom azoba arangiye. PGNiG ivuga ko ububiko bwayo bwo mu kuzimu bwari bwuzuye gushika ku rugero rwa 80% kandi ko, kubera ici ririko riregereza, atari benshi bayisaba. Pologne nayo nyene irafise ayandi masoko, harimwo ikigo ca gaze y'amazi (gaz naturel liquéfié/liquefied natural gas, GNL/LNG) kiri ahitwa Swinoujscie. Ku wa 01 Rusama (5), vyitezwe ko uwundi muringoti wa gaze iva muri Lithuania na woe nyene uzokwugururwa, bikazotuma Pologne ironka gaze ivuye muri ico gihugu. Ni mu gihe uwundi muringoti mushasha uva muri  Norvège, uzwi nka "Baltic Pipe", uzotangura gukora muri Gitugutu (10). Ushobora kwuzura rwose gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka ugashobora guca usubirira gaze yose yava mu Burusiya. Ibice vyababa 40% vya gaze ibihugu vyo mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bikoresha isanzwe iva mu Burusiya. Hagati aho, ibihugu vyinshi vyaramaze gufata ingingo yo kuvavanura n'amasoko ntanganguvu y'Uburusiya mu kwihora igitero cabwo kuri Ukraine. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zaramaze guhagarika burundu igitoro, gaze n'ibizuku (charbon) vy'Uburusiya. Ni mu gihe Ubwongereza butegura guhagarika kugurira igitoro mu Burusiya imbere y'uko uno mwaka urangira, hakazokurikira gaze vuba bishoboka, mu gihe Ubumwe bwa Bulaya nabwo buriko buragabanya gaze bugurirayo gushika ku bice bibiri vya bitatu.

column2: Brexit: Boris Johnson arashima amasezerano y'ubudandaji hagati ya UK na EU
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya, EU, n'Ubwongereza bashitse ku masezerano azogenga ubudandaji inyuma ya Brexit, aje kurangiza amezi yo kutumvikana ku burenganzira bwo kuroba n'amategeko agenga ubudandaji. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku biro iwe, Boris Johnson yagize ati:"Twasubiranye ubwigenge ku mategeko yaco hamwe na kazoza kacu." Umushikiranganji wa mbere yongeyeko ko, n'aho ibiganiro "vyari bigoye" ari "amasezerano meza ku Buraya bwose" azotanga akazi n'iterambere. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe rya Buraya Ursula Von der Leyen yavuze ko ari amasezerano "ata ho yegamiye". Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru I Bruxelles, umukuru w'akanama k'ubumwe bwa Buraya yavuze ati:"Rwari urugendo rurerure rurimwo ibihuhusi ariko twaronse amasezerano meza twerekana. "Ni nyayo, nta ho yegamiye, kandi n'ikintu ciza cari gikwiriye gukorwa ku mpande zose." Yongeyeko ko ubu ari "igihe co kwibagira kahise tukaraba muri kazoza" kandi ko Ubwongereza "buguma ari ncuti nyakuri". Yavuze ko hazoba ikiringo mfatakibanza c'imyaka itanu n'igice mu bakora mu gisata c'uburovyi. Hanyuma imigenderanire izobandanya ku bibazo bijanye n'ihindukagurika ry'ibihe, amasoko ntanganguvu, umutekano hamwe no mu gutwara abantu n'ibintu. Mw'itangazo, ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere mu Bwongereza bigira biti:"Turagarukanye amahera yacu, imbibe, amategeko, ubudandaji hamwe n'amazi turobamwo," Risubiramwo icivugo ca Johnson co kwiyamamaza mu matora, ryongeyeko  "Brexit iragiye mu bikorwa". Johnson yashize kuri Twitter ifoto yiwe ariko aramwenyura, yashize intoke z'ibikumu hejuru. Mu kiganiro yatanze, yavuze:"Turarangije amasezerano akomeye aciye imiriyaridi 668 y'amapawundi ku mwaka. "Amasezerano yumvikana ameze nk'aya Canada hagati y'Ubwongereza na EU. Amasezerano azokingira ubuzi muri iki  gihugu cose, azotuma ibidandazwa vyo mu Bwongereza bigurishwa ata makori, ata n'ibice bitanzwe kw'isoko rya Buraya. "Amasezerano azoha uburenganzira amakompanyi gukorana n'ibihugu vy'incuti vy'i Buraya."

column2: Serum Institute: Umuriro wishe batanu mw'ihinguriro rya mbere rinini ry'inkingo
column3: Abantu batanu bapfuye bahitanywe n'umuriro wadutse mw'ihinguriro rya mbere rinini ry'incanco mu burengero bw'Ubuhindi. Uwo muriro wahereye mu nyubakwa yari ikiriko iruduzwa mu kigo ca Serum Institute co mu Buhindi ahitwa Pune  ku muhingamo w'uyu wa kane. Amasanamu yerekanye umwotsi mwinshi uduga uva muri imwe mu  nyubakwa z'ico kigo gikwiye irya n'ino. Ico kigo ariko cavuze ko  ata ngaruka ivvaye bizogira ku bikorwa vyo gukora incanco. Icatumye uwo muriro waduka ntikiramenyekana. Uwo muriro bahavuye bashobora kuwuzimya ariko umukuru w'igisagara yemeje ko abantu batanu bapfuye. Umukuru w'ico kigo Adar Poonawalla yavuze ko ata ngaruka uwo muriro uzogira ku bikorwa vyo gukora urucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca ruzwi aho mu Buhindi nka Covishield ''kubera inyubakwa nyinshi zo gukoreramwo urwo rucanco nategekanije habaye nk'ibi vyashitse.'' Covishield ni rumwe mu nkingo zemewe na leta y'Ubuhindi batara abantu mu kubakingira kwandura umugera utera indwara ya Covid-19, umugambi wo gucanca mu Buhindi watanguye ku ndwi iheze kandi niwo wa mbere muni kw'isi. Ico gihugu gitegekanya guha incanco abantu miliyoni 300 bitarenzae mu ntango z'ukwezi kw'umunani. Hari n'ibindi bihugu vy'uburyo buke canke ububayabaye navyo birindiriye urucanco  rwa Oxford-Zeneca rukorwa n'ico kigo ca Serum Institute co mu Buhindi. Ubuhindi buza ubugira kabiri kw'isi mu bihugu birimwo abantu benshi banduye corona inyuma ya Reta zunze ubumwe za Amerika. Kuva uwo mugera utanguye kuvugwa muri ico gijhugu, kimaze kwemeza abanduye barenga miliyoni 10.6 n'abamaze gupfa hafi 153.000, ku biharuro bitangwa na Kaminuza ya Hopkins.

column2: Burundi: 'Turiyamirije abatwitiranya n'umugambwe' - Abepiskopi gatolika
column3: Inama y'Abepiskopi b'i Burundi imenyesha ko ibabajwe n'uko hari bamwe bashaka kuyitiranya n'umugambwe biturutse ku gikorwa bakoze mu matora aheruka nk'indorerezi, mbere bakanashikiriza amahinyu bayabonyewo. Biri mw'itangazo ryasomwe n'umukuru w'iyo nama musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye atanga umuco ku ruhara rwayo muri ayo matora. Iyo nama imenyesha ko itishimiye ingene sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro yavuze ivyo yashikirijwe "nk'uko yoba yaritwaye ku vyerekeye amatora". Ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu, iyo sentare niho yashikiriza ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa 20/05/2020, aho yanavuze ko utunenge twashikirijwe n'inama y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, co kimwe n'ibirego vyatanzwe n'umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ata shingiro bifise. Mw'iryo tangazo, musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye  arongoye inama y'abepiskopi amenyesha ko itigeze yitwara muri sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingio. Ati: "Ico yakoze kwabaye ukugira ico ishikirije icese ku vyerekeye igikorwa c'uburorerezi yari yaronkeye uruhusha". Abasenyeri b' i Burundi bavuga ko ata mvo n'imwe yari ihari y'uko bitwara ngo kuko uruhara rwabo muri ayo matora cari igikorwa c'umurorerezi kandi bakagendera ku ngingo ngenganyifato y'abarorerezi b'amatora. Avuga ko igikorwa c'abarorerezi kwari ukwandika n'ukugumya gusa amahinyu y'ivyabaye yiboneye n'amaso yiwe gusa. Musenyeri Ntahondereye ati: "Turababajwe n'uko Inama y'abepiskopi yafashwe mu buryo butumvikana nk'uko yoba yaritwaye , ivyo navyo bigatera agapfungu mu mitima y'abantu". "Turanse ko twitiranywa n'umugambwe canke n'umuntu uwo ari we wese yahiganywe mu matora". Inama nkuru y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, CECAB, yararungitse abarorerezi bayo barenga 2,700 mu makomine yose bashoboye kuja mu tuzu tw'amatora bahisemwo, nk'uko babivuga mw'itangazo ryabo ryo ku wa 26/05, iminsi ine inyuma y'ayo matora. Mw'iryo tangazo bari bamenyesheje ko ayo matora yabayemwo utunenge twari gushobora gutuma ivyari gutangazwa ko vyayavuyemwo bishobora kutizigirwa. Inyuma y'iryo tangazo, hari bamwe babonye ko Ekleziya Gatorika mu Burundi itari yishimiye ivyari vyaraye bitangajwe n'umurwi CENI ko ari vyo vyavuye mu matora. Hagati aho, inyuma y'aho Evariste Ndayishimiye w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi atangarijwe burundu na sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro ko ari we yatsinze ayo matora, iyo nama y'abepiskopi yaranamukeje mw'itangazo ryayo ryo ku wa 05/06, inamusaba kuba "umukuru w'igihugu wa bose".

column2: Omicron - USA: Biden yakajije ingingo z'ingendo kubera abagwayi bashasha
column3: Prezida Joe Biden yashize ahabona ingingo zikaze zishasha  ku ngendo mu ntumbero yo kugwanya Covid-19 mu gihe Amerika yemeza ko hariho abantu bari ku rushi banduye ubwoko bushasha bwa Omicron mu gihugu cose. Kuva mu ndwi iza, abantu bavuye mu bindi bihugu baja muri Amerika, harimwo n'abanyamerika, bategerezwa kwipimisha Covid umusi umwe imbere yo gufata urugendo, n'aho boba bararonse urucanco. Abaheruka gukira bashobora kwerekana "icemeza ko bakize". Kwambara agapfukamunwa mu ndege, mw'igariyamoshi n'imodoka rusangi zunguruza abantu bizobandanya gushika hagati mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Incanco imiliyoni n'imiliyoni  zitangirwa muhira kandi zirihwa n'amazu y'ubwishingizi zizobandanya kuboneka. Abantu cumi banduye  Omicron baragaragaye muri Amerika: California, Colorado, Minnesota, New York, no muri  Hawai aho abategetsi bavuga ko uwo muntu yayitowe ata rugendo yari aherutse kugira. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu bamenyesheje ko babonye ibimenyetso bidahambaye cane kuri abo bagwayi. Ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa corona gushika ubu bumaze gutorwa mu bihugu 30 nk'uko vyandikwa mu cegeranyo. Ntibiramenyekana nimba Omicron, ubwoko bwa corona bwihinduye cane, bwoba bwandukira cane canke ko bushobora kuba butumva urucanco. Amerika iriko irahimiriza  abantu bakuze bose kwongera gufata urucanco kugira rwongerereze inguvu umubiri, mu gihe hari imburi ko abazokwandura uwo mugera wa Covid bazokwongerekana muri iki gihe c'ubukonje (winter/hiver). Mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu i Maryland, Biden yavuze ati: "Tugiye kugwanya ubu bwoko bushasha dukoresheje ubuhinga n'ukwihuta, nta kajagari no guta umutwe." Yaheruka gusubiramwo kwemeza ko uwo mugambi "utarimwo gusubira kwugaranwa". Abanyamerika barenga imiliyoni 40 baramaze kwongerwa urucanco rwongerereza inguvu umubiri, ariko abashika hafi imiliyoni ijana  bandi barashobora kuruhabwa nk'uko bivugwa na prezida. Ibigo vyo gucandagiramwo  imiryango amajana n'amajana bizoshirwaho mu gihugu cose mu kugerageza kwongereza igitigiri c'abicandagisha mu bana n'urwaruka. Abategetsi bavuga ko amazu y'ubwishingizi ashobora gutegekwa gusubiza abakiriya babo bashika imiliyoni 150 incanco baguze baronkeye muhira, kandi ko incanco imiliyoni 50 zishobora gutangwa ku buntu ku bantu batagira ubwishingizi biciye mu mavuriro n'ibitaro vyo hagati mu gihugu. Hagati aho, gusubizwa amahera y'incanco ntibizoba biratangura gushika mu kwezi kwa mbere, inyuma y'ikiringo c'akaruhuko kariko karabamwo ingendo nyinshi. Amerika n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi vyarahagaritse ingendo ziva mu bihugu umunani vyo mu bumanuko bwa Afrika. Abahinga muvyo amagara y'abantu bavuga ko kubuza ingendo bizobatwara umwanya wo kwiga ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa Covid. Ku musi wa kane, umukuru w'igisagara ca New York Kathy Hochul yavuze ko hatowe abantu batanu bafise Omicron mu ntara yiwe. Umugabo  yari yitavye inama i Manhattan mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe, bamutoye Omicron. Umwe muri abo banduye  n'umugore w'imyaka 67 yari amaze gucandagwa wo mu karere ka Suffolk yari amaze imisi afise ibimenyetso vyo gukorora no kumeneka umutwe, nk'uko bivugwa na Hochul. Abandi bane bari mu gisagara ca New York. Uwundi vyemejwe ko yanduye ku wa gatatu n'uwo i California, hanyuma i Colorado ku musi wa kane habonetse ingenzi zine zaheruka kuva muri Afrika y'Epfo. Uwasanganywe Omicron i Minnesota yaheruka mu rugendo rw'imisi itatu mu gisagara ca New York ahariko harabera inama. Uwo i Hawai, atari bwacandagwe kandi yigeze kugwara coronavirus mu 2020, nta rugendo yaheruka kugira. Ibi vyerekana ko ukwandukizanya mu mibano bishobora kuba vyaratanguye nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi muvyo amagara y'abantu. Uwo i Hawai yari afise ibimenyetso bibayabaye kandi yari yarafashe ingingo yo kutava muhira nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi.

column2: Nigeria: Uyu muvugabutumwa arindiriye kwumva ijwi ry’Imana kugira yugurure urusengero
column3: Umuvugabutumwa azwi cane muri Nijeriya, Temitope Balogun Joshua, azwi cane mu mpfunyapfunyo nka TB Joshua, avuga ko akirindiriye "ijwi ry'Imana" imbere y'uko yugurura urusengero rwiwe mu gisagara ca Lagos. Abategetsi ba Lagos bamenyesha ko amasengero ashobora gusubira kwugurura ku wa Mungu, akakira igice c'abo yahora yakira, inyuma y'amezi atari make yari amaze yugawe mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Mw'ireresi yashize ku rubuga rwa Twitter,  TB Joshua avuga ko "inyuma y'aho abategetsi baduhereye uruhusha, uru turindiriye ico Imama itubwira". Yongeyeko ati: "Ndabasavye mwizere ko nitwamara kwumva ijwi ry'Imana, tuzobamenyesha igihe ibikorwa vy'urusengero bizotangurira icese". Uyu muvugabutumwa yigize umuhanuzi yateje impari mu gihugu mu ntango z'uyu mwaka igihe atangaza ko coronavirus yategerezwa kuba yazimanganye imbere y'igenekerezo rya 27/03/2020, hasigaye iminsi itari mike ngo ubutegetsi butangaze ingingo zo guhagarika ibikorwa mu bisagara vya Lagos, Ogun n'umugwa mukuru Abuja. Ico gihe yatangarije ishengero ryiwe ati: "Imbere y'uko uku kwezi guhera, twemera canke tutemera, ata kuraba imiti izoba yahinguwe ngo bariko baravura, iyo ndwara izoba yazimanganye uko yaje". Igihe iryo genekerezo rya 27 rirenganiye, uyo muvugabutumwa yarazomerewe yagirizwa "ubuhanuzi bwiwe bw'ikinyoma". Hagati aho, yarisiguye - kandi mbere abanywanyi biwe bamukomera amashi - mu kuvuga ati: "Ico nashaka kuvuga kwari uko uwo mugera uzozimangana harya watanguriye, kandi i Wuhan (mu Bushinwa) umugera warahagaritswe". Ivyatangajwe n'uyo muvugabutumwa TB Joshua ntawe vyatangaje kuko niko abapasitori batari bake muri ico gihugu bameze. Hari bamwe bibaza ko uyo muvugabutumwa ashobora kuba yaramaze kwumva ijwi ry'Imana rimubwira nimba ashobora kwugururua urusengero kuri uyu wa Mungu, ariko abandi nabo bariyorohereza ko ivyo ata vyabaye.

column2: Ubuhindi bwategetse Google kuriha irindi hadabu ry’imiliyoni $113
column3: Ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko caciye Google ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 113 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera ibikorwa biteye kubiri n’amategeko ajanye n’ihiganwa mu gisata c’itumatumanako, igihano kigira kabiri mu kiringo kiri munsi y’indwi imwe. Ico kigo cagiriza Google gukoresha ubwiganze ifise mu bubiko bwayo bw’ama Apps (applications)  mu guhatira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje app yayo. Iki kigo gisaba iyi kompanyi rutura y’ubuhinga kutazibira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje ubundi buryo canke baciye mu zindi nzira. Google yavuzeko iriko irihweza ivyo birego. Umuvugizi wa Google avuga ati: “Mu kugumiza ku giciro gito,  vyatumye ubuhinga bwa digital (numérique) bukomera mbere bwugururira imiryango amamiriyoni amajana n’amajana y’Abahindi”. Uyo muvugizi yagize ati: “Tubandanya kwitaho abakoresha n’abahingura ama Apps, tukaba turiko turihweza iyi ngingo kugira ngo turabe intambwe zikurikira”. Muri iki cemezo canditse ku mpapuro 199 casohowe ku wa kabiri, ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko, (Competition Commission of India, CCI) kivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amategeko amwe amwe mu bubiko bwayo bwa Play Store ategeka abahingura ama Apps “gukoresha gusa” ubuhinga bwayo mu gutanga canke kugurisha ama Apps. Ikinyamakuru Reuters kivugako ico kigo kijejwe ubugenzuzi gisaba Google gufata ingingo umunani zikosora ibi bintu mu mezi atatu, harimwo kutazibira abahingura ama Apps gukoresha ubundi buryo bwo kuriha, haba mu kugura ikibanza muri Apps zisanzwe zirimwo canke kugura ama Apps. CCI  ivuga kandi iti: “Google itegerezwa gukorera mu muco iyo ivugana n’abahingura ama Apps kandi igatanga insiguro ku mafaranga basabwa”. Iyi ni ingingo y’incamugongo ya vuba kuri Google isanzwe ihanzwe n’ibirego bituma itakaza icizere mu Buhindi. Mu ndwi iheze iyi kompanyi yatangishijwe ihadabu ry’imiliyoni 161 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera yakoresheje urubuga rwa Android kugira yiganzire isoko. CCI  ivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amasezerano y’agahato ku bakoresha ububiko bwayo kugira ngo imbuga zayo – nka Google Chrome, YouTube, Google Maps  n’izindi – zikoreshwe. Itohoza rijanye na Android ryaratangujwe mu 2019, inyuma y’imyidogo y’abakoresha Telefone zo mu buhinga bwa Android.

column2: Vatican: Kardinali Becciu yategetswe gutanga imihoho, ibitari bimenyerewe
column3: Umukardinali yari mu bari bafise amabanga akomeye i Vaticano kwa Papa, Giovanni Angelo Becciu, yatanze imihoho giturumbuka ariko akavuga ko yategetswe na Papa Francis. Avuga ko yiketswe gukoresha umutungo wa Ekleziya yihera benewabo, agahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Kardinali Becciu yari umwe mu begereye cane Papa, akaba yarigeze kuba ajejwe amabanga mu bunyamabanga bwa leta ya Vaticano. Yagiye kugira uruhara mu masezerano yateye impari yo gushora imitahe mu nyubakwa nziza ya Londres mu mafaranga ya Ekleziya. Iki gikorwa kuva ico gihe kiriko kirakorwako amatohoza. Ntibikunze kuboneka aho abantu bo ku rwego rwo hejuru i Vaticano batanga imihoho, kandi na Vaticano nta vyinshi yabivuzeko mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa kane. Ariko uyu mu kardinali w'imyaka 72 yabwiye ikinyamakuru co ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi Domani co mu Butaliyano ko yategetswe gutanga imihoho kuko yiketswe ko yahaye benewabo amafaranga ya Ekleziya. Avuga ati: "Nta n'urufaranga na rumwe jewe nigeze niba. Nta matohoza ndiko ndakorwako, ariko ari nka hamwe bonshira imbere y'ubutungane, nokwisigura". Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru yagiye gushikiriza mu nyuma, uyu mukardinali avuga ko ibogozwa ryiwe ryabaye giturumbuka. Avuga ko na Papa "atari agononokewe" igihe yatangaza iyi nkuru. Ati: "Ni ibisigabwenge. Gushika ejo…niyumvira ko nari umugenzi pfa mpfe wa Papa, intumwa yiwe y'umwizigirwa". "Mu nyumn rero niho Papa yambwira ko atakinyizeye kuko yaronse amakuru yahawe n'abacamanza bamubwira ko nakoze icaha co kunyuruza umutungo". Kardinali Becciu ashimangira ko habaye "ukutumvikana", akongera kandi ati: "Nditeguye gusigurira Papa vyose. Nta caha na kimwe nakoze". Uyu mukardinali Giovanni Angelo Becciu ni umutaliyano yamaze imyaka ya mbere akora mu gisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Vaticano. Papa Francis niwe yamugize umukardinali mu 2018, igihe aherewe amabanga mashasha yo kurongora igisata kijejwe ibijanye n'ubweranda. Yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano avuga ati: "Ni uruhombo kuri jewe, umuryango wanje, abanyagihugu b'igihugu canje. Navyemeye ku bugamburutsi n'urukundo mfitiye Ekleziya na Papa". N'aho mu vyo yagirijwe harimwo ibijanye n'amasezerano ajanye n'inyubakwa ya Londres ivugwa ko yaguzwe mu mutungo wa Ekleziya, Kardinali Becciu wewe siko abibona. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa gatanu, uyu mukardinali yavuze ko Papa yamwagirije ko yakoresheje nabi umutungo wa Ekleziya akawushira mu ma koperative n'urucuruza vya benewabo. Ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano kandi bivuga ko Papa atanezerejwe n'ingene imperezwa yo gufashisha abakene yiswe Peter's Pence yagiye gukoreshwa mu bindi bitari biyigenewe. Kardinali Becciu azobandanya afise iki giti n'aho yatanze imihoho. Hagati aho, nta ruhara azogira mu gutora uwundi mu Papa.

column2: UK: Abarongoye amakompanyi bemeye kwongereza abakozi b'abirabure
column3: Amakompanyi Barclays na Deloitte hamwe n'ayandi atari make mu Bwongereza yiyemeje kwongereza igitigiri c'abakozi b'abirabure, ni mu ntumbero yo kurwanya akarenganyo gakorerwa abirabure. Mw'ikete ryateweko umukono n'abarongoye amakompanyi 40, basavye n'ayandi makompanyi gukora gutyo. Umukuru w'umurwi witaho Uburinganire n'Uburenganzira bwa Muntu mu Bwongereza yabwiye BBC  ko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwiha intumbero yo kwongereza abakozi batari abazungu mu nzego zo hejuru. David Isaac avuga ko amakompanyi akeneye "kugira uruhara rukomeye" mu guha ikibanza gikomeye abantu mu butandukane bwabo. Avuga ko urupfu rwa George Floyd muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rwashize ahabona akarenganyo gakorerwa abantu atari abazungu. Icegeranyo ciswe Colour of Power 2020, cakozwe n'ikigo Green Park gitanga ubuhanuzi ku bijanye n'ubutandukane, kivuga ko mu nzego zo hejuru mu makompanyi atari make mu Bwongereza, muri leta no mu bundi butegetsi bw'igihugu, inkehwa zingana n'ibice bidashika 5%. Kivuga ko ibiharuro bisa n'ivyagumye uko muri ino myaka mike iheze. Umukuru wa kompanyi E.On UK, Michael Lewis, yagize ico avuga ku vyo ayo makompanyi yiyemeje akavuga ati: "Tuzokwama duharanira ivyo twemera kandi twerekane ko dushize hamwe mu kurwanya ivanguramoko, kwigisha abandi no kwishimira ubudasa, ivyo bikazoduha inguvu zo guhindura isi ". Mu gutera igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko, abarongoye amakompanyi biyemeje gufata ingingo ziboneka mu ntumbero yo kwongereza igitigiri c'abirabure mu bakozi bayo. Zimwe muri izo ngingo harimwo: Suki Sandhu, uwatanguje akaba ari nawe arongoye ishirahamwe Imvolve ryishinze guhimiriza ubutandukane mu buzi, ni umwe mu bari muri iryo sekeza, avuga ko yatewe intege n'igitigiri c'abemeye gushira igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko. Avuga ati: "Akamo katewe n'isekeza Black Lives Matter ntikagiye uko, kandi amakompanyi akeneye guhaguruka agafata iya mbere mu mpinduka zigamije kwongereza abirabure mu buzi". "Ndafise icizere ko, mu gihe abayobozi benshi bateye igikumu kuri iri kete, dushobora gufatira ku ngingo biyemeje tukazana impinduka mu kazi kandi tukaguma dukurikirana ingene biguma bigenda, kuko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwama atanga ivyageranyo  buri mwaka ". Hagati aho, amakenga ntabura mu bakozi bamwe bamwe b'abirabure. Umwe mu bakozi ba Barclays atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nzovyemera ndabibonye". Icegeranyo Colour of Power 2020 kivuga ko mu bantu 1,097 barongoye inzego nkuru nkuru mu Bwongereza, 1,046 bose ari abazungu.

column2: Ubukritsu - Isilamu: hoba hari isano hagati ya Isilamu hamwe na Yezu/Yesu na Maria
column3: Mu bihugu birwiriyemwo Abakristu, muri kino gihe ikintu kivugwa ni Noweri/Noheli, mu ndimi mvamahanga naho ni Noel canke Christmas. Biragoye kwibaza ko hoba hari ibihugu uyu munsi mukuru utazwi na gato, bobo usanga ari umunsi usanzwe nk'iyindi. Igituma nyamukuru ni uko uyu munsi ari umunsi wo kwibuka ivuka rya Yezu, umunsi wubahwa cane rwose mu mashengero y'abakristu. Mu bihugu uyu munsi mukuru wa Noweri utazwi, canke udahimbazwa harimwo ibihugu bigendera kw'idini rya Isilamu, Nk'akarorero muri Turukiya, iri genekerezo rya 25 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri ni umunsi usanzwe ku kirangamisi cayo. Uyu munsi mukuru ntawuriho ku birangamisi ry'abayahudi, Abahindi canke vy''Abasilamu. Mu bihugu vy'Abasilamu, uyu munsi mukuru usa n'iminsi mikuru ya Eid, ariho Abasilamu baja hamwe, bagatumirara, bagateka, bakagenderanira, bagatanga ishikanwa, bakambara bakaberwa bakaja gusenga mu misigiti. Nimba ushaka gutahura itandukanirizo riri hagati y'aya madini, ntuze wigere wipfuriza Umusilamu Noweri nziza. Ariko rero, si ukuvuga ko Yezu/Yesu atazwi mw'idini rya Isilamu. Yezu/Yesu canke Jesus, uba uvuze Issa? Ibi rero biratangaza abantu benshi batabizi. Abasilamu ntibahimbaza ivuka rya Yezu, ariko barakurikiza inyigisho ziwe. Abasilamu barubaha cane uyu bita intumwa y'Imana kandi afise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu kwemera kwabo. Igitabo c'Ikorowani gifata Yezu nk'umwe mu ntumwa z'Imana zubahwa cane zaboneye izuba Intumwa Muhammad (S.A.W.- Sallā Allāhu ʿalayhi Wa-sallam). Yezu mu rurimi rw'icarabu ni ukuvuga Issa, kandi aravugwa incuro nyinshi cane mw'Ikorowani, mbere aravugwa cane gusumba na Muhammad muri iki gitabo ceranda. Si ivyo gusa, harimwo n'umugore umwe rudende izina ryiwe rivugwa mw'ico gitabu ceranda c'idini rya Isilamu. Maria canke Mariam, Ikorowani imusigura gute? Uyo mugore ni Bikira Maria, mu rurimi rw'icarabu akaba azwi kw'izina rya Mariam/Maryam. Mw'Ikorowani, hari igice cose kimuvuga, kigasigura ingene yavyaye umwana kandi yari asanzwe ari isugi. Gusa iyo iriko irasigura ivy'ivuka rya Yezu, Isilamu ntiyigera ivuga ivya Yozefu, canke ba ba majusi baza bavuye mu buseruko, canke ngo bavuge ingene yaryamitswe mu bwato bw'inka. Maria yibarutse ari wenyene mu bugaragwa, ari musi y'igiti c'umunazi cumye. Aho nyene haciye haba igitangaro, inazi zihiye neza zaciye zitangura gukoroka ziva kuri ico giti cumye maze ziba imfungurwa yiwe. Hanyuma kandi, mu maguru yiwe haciye havuka umugezi w'amazi meza cane maze aba inyobwa yiwe. Umukobwa atararongorwa iyo avyaye bitera ibibazo vyinshi cane ku bijanye n'indero yiwe. Ariko uyo mwana  - Yezu/Issa - amaze kuvuka, yaciye atangura kuvuga nk'intumwa y'imana. Iki gitangaro nico gikura iceyi nyina wiwe. Iyo Abasilamu bavuga Yezu, bategerezwa gushirako Alayhi Salaam- Imigisha y'Imana ibane na we, nk'uko babivuga ku Ntumwa Muhammad n'abandi bahanuzi. Hanyuma kandi, ni nde arindiriwe ku munsi w'iherezo ku munsi w'urubanza no kugarura amahoro kw'isi, kubw'idini rya Isilamu? Ni Yezu, aho azogarukira ubugira kabiri, kandi uku kuninahazwa kwiwe kuri no mu bindi bitabo vya Isilamu, si mw'Ikorowani gusa. Umuhinga w'Umusufi, Al-Ghazali, amusobanura "nk'Intumwa ityorora imitima y'abantu". Ibn Arabi aramwandikako aho avuga ko ari "ikimenyetso c'ubweranda". Mu gihugu vyose birimwo Abasilamu, hari abahungu bahabwa izina rya Issa (Yezu), abakobwa nabo bagahabwa amazina ya Maryam (Maria). Aha urashobora kwibaza nk'umuntu ava mu muryango w'abakristu yokwita umwana wiwe Muhammad ingene vyomugendera? Idini rya Isilamu rirazi neza Yezu, kubera igihe rivuka, mu kinjana c'indwi, idini ry'Ubukristu ryari rishinze imizi mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo Hagati. Muhammad nta hantu na hamwe avugwa muri Bibiriya. N'aho idini rya Isilamu riha icubahiro Yezu, si ukuvuga ko mu binjana vyakurikiye iri dini rya Gikristu naryo ryabasubirije mu ndumane. Ahubwo, mu gicapo kinini co mu kinjana ca 15 kiri mw'isengero nkuru ya San Petronio mu gisagara ca Bologne mu Butariyano, uyu muhanuzi mukuru wa Isilamu yerekanwa ari mu muriro udahera, ariko arababazwa n'amashetani. Harabaye ibishushanyo vyinhi vyerekana nabi cane Intumwa Muhammad. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umutariyano Giovani da Modena yarashingiye cane ku munyavyese azwi cane Dante Alighieri, yashize Muhammad ku muzingi w'icenda w'ikuzimu mu gitabo ciwe c'ivyese citwa Divine Comedy. Iki gitabo carakoreshejwe cane n'abanyatugenegene n'abahinyanyuzi benshi ba Bulaya gushika mu kinjana ca 18 mu gushushanya Intumwa Muhammad bamwerekana ariko arahanwa mu muriro udahera. Kimwe muri ivyo bishushanyo, ni ica William Blake, umunyatugenegene akomeye cane w'umwongereza mu masanamu n'inzandiko ziwe. Mw'isengero imwe yo mu Bubirigi, hari ibishushanyo vyo mu kinjana ca 17 vyerekana iyi ntumwa ya Isilamu aryamitswe hasi ariko ahonyangwa n'abamarayika. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka mu nyuma ku bijanye n'ingene idini rya Gikristu rifata Intumwa muhammad. Ariko gusa gushika muri kino gihe, haracari icuka kibi. Mu mwaka wa 2002, imirwi y'intagondwa ya Isilamu yaragirijwe ko yashatse kubomora ico gishushanyo co mw'isengero ya Bologne. Kuva ico gihe, harabaye ibitero vyinshi vyahitanye abantu, ibitero vyakozwe kw'izina ry'idini rya Isilamu mu bihugu bitari bike vya Buraya n'ibirwiriyemwo Abasilamu. Ibi bitero vyatumye icuka kibi hagati y'ama madini abiri kibandanya ciyongera. Hari ababona ko kumenya isano riri hagati ya Yezu n'idini rya Isilamu, hamwe n'ikibanza afise muri iri dini, bishobora gufasha Abakristu n'Abasilamu kunywana. Babona ko kwibanda ku vyo basangiye hakwibanda ku bibatandukanya bishobora gufasha gukuraho iki cuka kibi kihari.

column2: Kenya igiye kuronka miriyoni zafatiwe muri Jersey zifashe kugwanya Covid
column3: Miriyoni z'ama dorari z'amafaranga y'igihugu bivugwa ko zibwe n'abanya-Kenya babiri ba mbere batunze cane zigiye kugarukanwa mu gihugu zigurwemwo ibikoresho  vyo kurokora ubuzima mu kugwanya  indwara ya Covid-19 hisunzwe  amasezerano y'imbonekarimwe yashitsweko i Londres. Ayo mazezerano na Jersey, izinga ryigenga mu ntwaro mu  kiyaga ca Manche (Ensglish Channel) yakiriwe nk'"intsinzi ku banya-Kenya" n'uwuhagarariye ico gihugu mu Bwongereza, Manoah Esipisu. Urufatangane rwahavuye ruvamwo  ayo masezerano rwatanguriye ku rubanza rwo kwahukana. Mu 2006, Samuel Gichuru, umuntuzi afise kompanyi y'umuyagankuba muri Kenya,  n'umugore wiwe Salome Njeri barahukanye. Hageze kugabura ivyo batunze, Madame Njeri yabonye ko ataronse ibikwiye. Yaciye avuga ko bimwe  mu vyo umugabo wiwe atunze vyanyegejwe hanyuma, sentare, ica ikora urutonde rw'ama konte yose umugore yavuze ko ari  aya Gichuru muri Jersey, izinga risanzwe rizwi gushingwamwo amakompanyi ba nyeneyo batamenyekana kandi rigatangisha amakori ari hasi cane. Ivyo vyatumye haba amatohoza yamaze imyaka icenda akorwa n'abategetsi ba Jersey. Muri ayo matohoza, mu 2011, bagirije Gichuru n'uwahoze ari umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta kujana muri kompanyi yari yanditswe muri Jersey amafaranga ya "commissions" bahabwa n'amakompanyi mpuzamakungu. Abategetsi ba Jersey baciye basohora imitahe yo gufatisha abo bagabo bompi,  kuva ico gihe bakaba bakirinridiye ko barungikwa bava aho bari muri Kenya. Ivyaha vy'ubutunzi bagirijwe vyarimwo amasezerano na kompamyi yo muri Finlande yo kwubaka uruganda rw'umuyagankuba hafi ya Mombasa, igisagara kiza ubwa kabiri mu bunini muri Kenya, aho ngo bahawe miriyoni na miriyoni z'amafaranga y'abongereza ya 'commissions'  bayahawe n'amashirahawe yo kwubakisha yo mu Bwongereza, Norvege, Ubudagi na kompanyi y'igihangange mu gutumatumanako yo muri Amerika. N'ubwo BBC yagerageje kenshi kubarondera, abo bagabo bompi n'abashingwamanza babo ntibashimye kugira ico bavuze kuri ivyo bagirizwa. Ariko iyo kompamnyi yanditswe muri Jersey Windward Trading Limited yahavuye yemera ivyaha bine vyo kugira amafaranga y'inkomoko mbi muri sentare yo muri Jersey. Sentare yaciye ishinga ingingo, ko iyo kompanyi, nyeneyo asanzwe ari Gichuru, itegerezwa kwakwa amafaranga arenga miriyoni 4,9 z'ama dorari mu vyo itunze kubera  amafaranga y'inkomoko mbi. Menshi muri ayo mafaranga niyo bivugwa ko yavuye mu biturire muri Kenya hagati ya 1999 na 2002 ubu ariyo agiye kugarukanwa mu gihugu. Ivyo vyashobotse kubera amasezerano yo mu 2018  yashizweko umukono na ministre wa mbere w'Ubwongereza w'ico gihe Theresa May, umukuru wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta hamwe na reta za Jersey n'Ubuswise.  Ayo masezerano yavuga ko amatungo yibwe ashobora gusubizwa muri Kenya ariko agakoreshwa  gusa ku bijanye n'imigambi y'iterambere. Ayo masezerano azwi nka Return of Assets from Corruption and Crime to Kenya (Fracck) aha abategetsi ba Jersey uburenganizra bwo kurekura amafaranga bazi ko yibwe hanyuma akarungikwa imbere y'uko abagirizwa kwiba bashikanwa imbere ya sentare. Ikoreshwa neza ry'ayo mafaranga kizoba ari igikorwa ca Crown Agents, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ridaharanira inyungu ryitaho iterambere. Umukuru waryo Fergus Drake, yabwiye BBC  ko avugana n'abategetsi bajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Kenya kugira bavugane ibikenewe mu kurwanya Covid -19. Drake yiteze gushikiriza ibikoresho vya nkenerwa cane ku bitaro birenga 10 mu mezi ari imbere. Yavuze ko gupima neza bizofasha abanya-Kenya kurwanya ico kiza neza no kumenya ibice bikeneye incanco kurusha ibindi. Gushika ubu  muri Kenya abantu bamaze kuronka incanco ntibarenga 20% mu gihugu cose. Hasigaye amezi make ngo prezida Uhuru ave ku butegetsi, agishika ku butegetsi akaba yari yiyemeje kurwanya ibiturire. Muri iyo ntumbero abategetsi n'abanyaporotike bariko barasabwa kuvuga amatungo  bafise, hagakorwa isuzumwa ry'uko ata biturire yaciyemwo. Drake yavuze ko ayo mafaranga agiye gusohora -miriyoni 3.5 z'ama dorari - atazokora ''ibintu vyinshi cane'' mu gikorwa c'igihugu co kurwanya Covid-19 , ariko yibaza ko bene iyo mfashanyo igenewe ahantu runaka izogira ingaruka zishika kure mu kurwanya uwo mugera. Abaharanira uburenganzira bavuga ko akarorero ka Fracck ari inzira nshasha yo kwerekana ko amafaranga abantu baba baronse mu buryo butari bwiza ashobora gusubizwa. Ubwongereza busanzwe bwaremeje kandi ayandi masezerano -amasezerano ya ONU yo kurwanya ibiturire -gutyo bukaba butegerezwa gusubiza amafaranga yaciye mu vyaha aho ibikenewe biba vyakwiye kugira asubizwe. Ariko ku bwa Steve Goodrich, umukuru w'ubushakashatsi n'amatohoza muri Transparency International (TI) UK, amafaranga asubijwe ava mu Bwongereza akenshi ntaja mu bikorwa vy'iterambere ata handi aciye. Atanga akarorero k'amafaranga yigeze gusubizwa yari ayo inkomoko mbi y'uwahoze ari umukuru w'intara ya Delta muri Nigeria  James Ibori mu 2012 agahabwa reta ya Nigeria. Afise amakenga ko amafaranga asubijwe ashobora guherera mu biturire. Goodrich  avuga ko ivyo vya Jersey ari intambwe mu nzira nziza. Ariko yongerako ko kugirango hajeko "igitururuza cizewe" ku bantu bibaza kuja kunyegeza amafaranga bivye mu Bwongereza, reta "vy'ukuri ikeneye gukaza umukono wayo" ku gusubira ku matungo (aba yibwe). Nk'akarorero, avuga ko Ubwongereza bukwiye gutangura gusuzuma ivyo yibaza ko ari "ibibanza/amazu biciye amafaranga arenga miliyaridi 5 z'ama pound (£ canke pound:amafaranga y'abongereza)  vyaguzwe mu Bwongereza n'amafaranga yo kwinuba. Aha rero hari n'ukuraba neza ikibazo c'ibiturire muri Kenya. Kenya kiza ubugira 128 ku rutonde rwa Transparency International rw'igipimo c'ibiturire kw'isi, abategetsi n'abagwizatunga bakaba  bavugwa cane mu biturire. Hasigaye amezi make ngo prezida Uhuru ave ku butegetsi, agishika ku butegetsi akaba yari yiyemeje kurwanya ibiturire. Muri iyo ntumbero abategetsi n'abanyaporotike bariko barasabwa kuvuga amatungo  bafise, hagakorwa isuzumwa ry'uko ata biturire yaciyemwo. Uwuhagarariye Kenya mu Bwongereza, Esipisu, yigeze kuba umuvugizi w'umukuru w'igihugu, yabwiye BBC ko amasezerano ya Fracck ari "intererano ikomeye cane" ku mugambi w'umukuru w'igihugu kuko atanga ubutumwa ko "abantu bivye amafaranga " batazotekanirwa ngo n'uko gusa banyegeje amafaranga yabo mu mahanga". Yongerako ati "ayo ni amafaranga yibwe abanya-Kenya, yasahuwe abanya-Kenya, kubera ayo masezerano ayo mafaranga agiye kugaruka gufasha abanya-Kenya ari nabo ubwa mbere na mbere yari asanzwe agenewe. Rero iyo ni intsinzi ku banya-Kenya". Ubu amafaranga ari mu nzira ava muri Jersey aja muri Kenya, ubu abantu bazoca bahindukirira kuraba ko abo bagabo bagirizwa barungikwa muri Jersey. Mu kwezi kwa kabiri,  ibikeneye gukorwa kugira barungikwe vyaratanguye gukorwa muri sentare ya Nairobi City  Magistrates Court, inyuma y'imyaka 10 y'impari zo kumenya urwego rwoja imbere mu kubikora. Ubu igisata c'ubushikirizamanza nico kiriko kirabikora kandi icegera c'umuyobozi waco  Victor Mule yavuze ko intahe yitezwe mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Yavuze ko yizeye ko bitazosubira gufata iyindi myaka 10. Igihe BBC yabarondera, abashingwamanza ba Gichuru bahisemwo kutagira ico bavuze ku biriko birakorwa. Umukenguzamateka Ian Gorst, umushikiranganji wa Jersey ajejwe imigenderanire,  aremera ko ubwa mbere hoho hari ibitagenze neza  kugira ayo mafaranga bivugwa ko yibwe abe yarashitse muri iryo zinga. Agabisha abandi bashobora gukora gutyo muri kazoza ko amategeko y'iryo zinga ubu yakajijwe cane ariko kandi ko amafaranga yose yashitseyo aciye mu nzira zitari zo azoronderwa iyo ari kandi ko "tuzoyasubiza ku banyagihugu bo beneyo".

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Alli, Pogba, Martial, Lingard, Milenkovic, Vlahovic, Castellanos
column3: Newcastle yatanguye kubaza nimba yoshobora kuronka Dele Alli, kandi Tottenham iriteguye kwumviriza umurwi woza urondera uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'imyaka 25.  (Teamtalk) Manchester United iriko irarondera abakinyi bo hagati bashobora gusubirira umufaransa Paul Pogba, 28, biboneka ko azosezera uyu murwi mu gihe amasezerano yiwe n'uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza.  (Telegraph - subscription required) Atletico Madrid iriko iraraba ingene yoronka umusatirizi wa Manchester United Anthony Martial 26 mu kugumuza n'uwundi. (Eurosport) Manchester United ntiyiteze ko Jesse Lingard azohava ava muri uyu murwi mu kadirisha k'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi ko mu kwa mbere, na rirya uyu mwongereza w'imyaka 28 asanzwe akina hagati ariko aregereza amezi atandatu ya nyuma mu masezerano yiwe.  (Manchester Evening News) Nyene umurwi wa Chelsea Roman Abramovich arababajwe n'ingene  Real Madrid yakajije akariro mu kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'uyu murwi wa Stamford Bridge, umudagi Antonio Rudiger, 28, kandi ashobora guhagarika umugambi wo kugarukana umusatirizi w'umubirigi Eden Hazard, 30, ubu akina muri uyo murwi wo muri Espagne. (El Nacional, via Mail) Barcelona iriko irihweza nimba yogura umusatirizi wa Gabon Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang yatswe ikibanza ca kizigenza muri Arsenal - ariko ikibazo kikaba umushahara w'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 32 usanzwe ari munini. (Independent) West Ham iriteguye kubandanya urugamba rwo kurondera umukini w'inyuma Nathaniel Phillips, 24, wa Liverpool mu kwa mbere, n'aho aherutse kuvunika.(Standard) West Ham kandi irafise icizere co kuronka  umukinyi w'inyuma, umunya Serbia Nikola Milenkovic, 24, asa n'uwuherutse kuvyumvikanako na nyene umurwi  wiwe wa Fiorentina, ibi bikumvikana ko ashobora kuba ari mu nzira agenda.  (Teamtalk) Fiorentina yashize igiciro c'imiriyoni 100 y'ama euros ku musatirizi wayo, umunya Serbia Dusan Vlahovic, 21. (Gazzetta dello Sport - subscription required) Paris St-Germain, Barcelona, Liverpool, Manchester City na Tottenham yose ivugwa ko iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'umufaransa akina ku ruhande rw'ububamfu inyuma Rayan Ait-Nouri, 20, ariko Wolves ishobora kuzoronswa 50% gusa vy'ayotangwa kubera ingene umurongo werekeye igurishwa rwiwe uvuga.  (Mail) Barcelona iriko irategura ingene yokora igitero ku murwi Chelsea kugira ngo iwutware umukinyi wo kuruhande rw'ibubamfu inyuma, umunya Hollande Ian Maatsen, 19, asanzwe yaratijijwe mu kiringo c'umwaka w'inkino wose mu murwi wo mu cicaro ca kabiri wa Coventry. (Football Insider) Chelsea nta bushobozi ifise bwo kugarukana umukinyi wo hagati w'umwongereza Conor Gallagher, 21, iyo yatijijwe muri Crystal Palace mu kwa mbere kubera mu masezerano y'intizo y'umwaka wose harimwo umurongo uvuga ko ibi bishoboka mu gihe yoba amaze gukina inkino ziri musi ya 50% muri uyu murwi wa Selhurst Park. column2: Burundi: Uko Gynette Kamwemwe abasha gukina imikino itatu mu mirwi yo mu gice ca mbere
column3: Inkuru ya Marc NIYONKURU Gynette Kamwemwe batazira Ngorore akina mu mirwi yo mu gice ca mbere mu mikino ya Football, Volleyball na Basketball, eka akanaba mu mirwi nserukiragihugu. Bakeya cane nibo bashobora ivyo nk'uko umumenyereza abivuga. Gynette w'imyaka 20 gusa, ni kizigenza w'umurwi w'umupira w'amaguru Faufila-PF, ni umusatirizi mu muri Aigre noir ya Volleyball, akaba n'icegera ca kizigenza mu murwi wa Basketaball wa Muzinga. Avuga ko akiri muto yatanguye gukina umupira abonye wose. Umumenyereza amuzi avuga ko bidasanzwe kubona abakinyi nk'uyu, bashobora no kubifatikanya n'amashure. 'Ngorore' ukunda cane umupira w'amaguru, yishimira cane ko yamaze kuduza ibendera ry'u Burundi mu makungu, kandi ngw'arakeneye gushika kure kuruta. Mu 2013, mu ihiganwa mpuzamakungu rya Volley beach, umurwi nserukiragihugu w'u Burundi yarimwo wararonse ikibanza ca kabiri. Gynette ariko ubu yabaye ahagaritse amahiganwa muri Basketaball kubera "utubazo duto duto turi mu gisata kijejwe amahiganwa ku rwego rw'igihgu" twatumye amahiganwa adindira umwaka wose. Yakuriye mu Ngagara mu mujyi wa Bujumbura aho yahora abona abasirikare bakina mu mugwi wa Muzinga. Ati: "Bahejeje gukina baca batwigisha gukina umupira". Mu nyuma niho yagiye agerageza iyindi mikino. Ati: "Ukwo mbonye umukino nagira nti 'Reka ndabe ko ntashobora uwu nawo kandi'." Gynette Kamwemwe avuga ko kubera imigenzo itorohereza rimwe na rimwe Abarundikazi ubwa mbere abavyeyi biwe batagomba ko aja gukina kuko bikeka ko vyomubuza kwiga. Avuga ko mu nyuma bamuretse kuko babona ko atunganya neza umwanya wa buri kimwe, akabasha kubikora vyose. Daniella Niyibimenya, umumenyereza mu mupira w'amaguru, avuga ko Kamwemwe afise impano yo kumenyera n'ingoga umukino uwariwo wose. Yemeza ko bidakunze kuboneka ko abigeme bakina imikino itandukanye ku rwego rukuru nka 'Ngorore'. Niyibimenya avuga ko igihambaye ku banyeshule bakina imipira itandukanye vyama bikenewe ko bakuriranwa cane kugira amahiganwa ntabasubize inyuma mu vyigwa. Ashima ko Gynette Kamwemwe yisigura neza muri kaminuza yigamwo.

column2: Ntahokatarondererwa: Josiane Kwizera yahisemwo gufotora, abavyeyi bashaka ko yiga kuvura
column3: Uwo mwigeme w'imyaka 27 yahejeje amashure yisumbuye mu gisata c'ubumenyi (scientifique), abavyeyi biwe bipfuza ko abandanya mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu ariko we ahitamwo kwiyigisha gufotora. Avuga ko yakunze umwuga wo gufotora kuva akiri umwana. Ati: "Kuva nkiri umwana narakunda gufotora. Narakina ibintu vyo gufotora nkoresheje telefone canke ibindi bikoresho". Josiane avuga ko ahejeje amashure yisumbuye yinginze abantu benshi ngo bamwigishe uwo mwuga ariko benshi baramwankira. Umwe gusa ni we yamwemereye mu 2018. Josiane Kwizera avuga ko yatanguye kubikora nk'umwuga mu 2019, n'aho abavyeyi biwe bo bipfuza ko yokora umwuga wo kuvura abantu. Agira ati: "Abavyeyi bashaka ko mbandanya kwiga ivyo kuvura, ariko jewe nahisemwo gufotora kuko ari vyo nkunda. "Ubu ndaronka amasoko yo gufotora abana, mu manza z'isabukuru n'iz'ubugeni. "Ndaniyigisha nkoresheje inyabwonko kandi maze kumenya vyinshi." Kwizera avuga ko ubu, afashijwe n'uwo mwuga wo gufotora, hari vyinshi atakizera ku bavyeyi. Agira ati: "Ubu ndirihira inzu nkoreramwo, nariguriye camera-foto yo mu bwoko bwa Canon izimvye cane, ndagura akamoto n'inyabwonko. "Ndafasha n'abavukanyi banje nanje nkifasha ntarinze kugora abavyeyi." Josiane Kwizera ahanura urwaruka gukura amaboko mu mpuzu ngo bironderere akazi. Ati: "Ubu si nka kera aho abavyeyi bacu baheza ishure basanga akazi kabarindiriye, akazi n'ukukarondera. "Ugaye akazi, ntuba uzi ico ushaka gukora."

column2: Tanzania: Ekleziya Katorika iragabisha ko Covid-19 iriko iriyongera ku rugero ruteye ubwoba
column3: Ekleziya Katorika muri Tanzania yaraye isohoye itangazo aho igabisha ko ibitigiri  vy'abandura coronavirus n'abicwa na Covid-19 bigenda vyiyongera, ihamagarira abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zose zo kwikingira. Iri tangazo ryo kugabisha ryasohowe n'umukuru w'Inama y'Abepiskopi Katorika muri Tanzania  (TEC), Musenyeri Gervas Nyaisonga ku wa kabiri. Ariko , ntirivuga nimba no muri Tanzania hariho abariko barandura bwa bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus, rigasaba abantu kuba maso bafatiye ku bivugwa mu zindi mpande z'isi. Iri tangazo rya Ekleziya Katorika rivuga riti: "Mu mwaka uheze igihugu cacu carashoboye kurwanya uwu mugera. Abandura baragabanutse  mu nyuma turizera ko twatsinze". "Ubu hari iyongerekana rishasha ry'abandura. Ibihugu bitari bike biremeza ko biri mu bihe bitoroshe aho corona iriko iriyongera abantu bagapfa. Igihugu cacu si izinga, ni ngombwa ko twikingira, tukaba maso, tugatakambira cane Imana kugira ngo iturinde". Ekleziya Katorika muri ico gihugu yagiye ifata ingingo zitandukanye kuva mu 2020 igihe iki kiza gitangazwa ko cinjiye muri Tanzania, iri tangazo rigasaba ko izo ngingo zibandanya zikurikizwa. Rishimangira riti: "Duhimirize intambara yo kurwanya umugera wa coronavirus mu gukoresha ibirwanisho vyose vy'umutima, umubiri, ubuhinga no mu kibano. Ntiturambirwe no guhimiriza igisabisho, kwirinda gukorakorana, gukaraba n'amazi n'isabuni igihe cose, gufata ingingo igihe cose twiketse ibimenyetso vyayo, tukirinda kandi no kwegerana". Umunyamabanga mukuru w'Inama y'Abepiskopi, Patiri Charles Kitima, yabwiye BBC igisata c'igiswahili ko vyabaye ngombwa ko Ekleziya isohora iri tangazo ryo kugabisha mu gihe bakirindiriye insiguro z'abahinga zizotangwa na reta ku bijanye n'iki kiza karanda. Ati: "Duherutse kubona impfu ziyongera. Mu bisagara, twari tumenyereye kugira imisa imwe canke zibiri mu ndwi zo gusabira abapfuye, ariko ubu ni imisi yose. Hategerezwa kuba hari ikintu kitagenda neza". Abategetsi ba Tanzania babandanya bemeza y'uko ata mugera wa coronavirus uri mu gihugu. Inyuma y'iri tangazo, icegera c'umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Dr Goodluck Mollel, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Mwananchi co muri ico gihugu ko abanyagihugu bobandanya batekanye mu kurindira amabwirizwa bahabwa na reta. Dr. Mollel ati: "Ibi bintu reka tubirekere abahinga. Mu gihe hoba ingorane, reta izobisigura. Abantu bobandanya n'ibikorwa vy'ukugwiza umwimbu". Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, ibinyamakuru vyo muri Danmark vyatangaje ko ingenzi zibiri zari zivuye muri Tanzania zatowe umugera mushasha wa coronavirus wadutse muri Afrika y'Epfo. Mu ndwi iheze nyene, reta y'Ubwongereza yarafashe ingingo yo kubuza ingenzi zivuye nuri  Tanzania na Repubulika ya Demokrasi ya  Congo kwinjira muri ico gihugu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa Covid-19 bwatowe ubwa mbere muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ibihugu bindi 12 nivyo bimaze guhagarikirwa ingendo muri ico gihugu hagati y'ukwa cumi na kabiri n'intango y'ukwa mbere.

column2: Sam Allardyce: umumenyereza wa West Brom asaba ko ihiganwa rihagarara gato
column3: Sam Allardyce umumenyereza wa West Brom avuga ko ihiganwa rya Premier League ryohagarara gato inyuma y'uko hasubiriye kuboneka ibiharuro vyinshi vy'abakinyi banduye coronavirus. Ejo ku wa kabiri, ibipimo vyafashwe ku bakinyi ba Premier League vyerekanye ko 18 banduye. Ibitigiri vy'abanduye umugera mushasha wa coronavirus muri Fulham bisigura ko urukino rw'uno musi ruyihuza na Tottenham ata wuzi ko ruhava ruba. Allardyce ati: "Mfise impungenge kuri jewe ubwanje hamwe no mu mupira w'amaguru muri rusangi". Sheffield United imenyesha ko abakinyi bayo batari bake baherutse gupimwa bagasanga baranduye. Ku wa mbere, urukino rwari rutegekanijwe hagati ya Everton na Manchester City rwarungurujwe hasigaye amasaha ane ngo rutangure kubera iki kiza ca coronavirus. Allardyce avuga ko "akaruhuko gato" ari co kintu gikenewe kugira ngo bahangane n'iki kiza. Inyuma y'aho umurwi wiwe ukubitiwe ku kibuga cawo ibitsindo bitanu na Leeds nijoro, yavuze ati: "Umutekano kuri bose ni co kintu nyamukuru imbere y'ibindi vyose". "Iyo numvise ko uwu mugera mushasha wandukira ningoga gusumba uwa mbere, ikintu gikenewe ubu ni ukubanza guhagarika gato". "Mfise imyaka 66, sinipfuza kwandura Covid". "N'aho twogerageza gute, n'aho twopimisha kangahe, uko twokwambara udupfukamunwa kwose, uko twokaraba kwose, turabandanya kwandura mu gihugu cose". "Mu gihe vyoboneka ko ari vyo bikenewe [akaruhuko], tubikore uko ihiganwa ripfume riba rirerire ariko tubanze duhangane n'iki kiza". Ralph Hasenhuttl umumenyereza wa Southampton yakoreye muhira yifashishije ubuhinga bwa videwo mu rukino rwarangiye ari ubusa ku bundi na West Ham nijoro ku wa kabiri inyuma y'aho umwe mu bo atunze mu nzu asanze yaranduye coronavirus. Eka n'umumenyereza wa Wolves, Nuno Espirito Santo, yagize ico avuga ku bijanye n'ibi bitigiri vy'abanduye uwu mugera muri Premier league inyuma y'aho umurwi wiwe utsindiwe na Manchester United nijoro ku wa kabiri. Ati: "Ibitigiri bigenda vyiyongera ku buryo buteye ubwoba mu gihugu kandi na twe ntaho tuyihungira". "Hariho ibintu udashobora gukwepa. Iyo hari indwara y'icaduka ije, abantu bategerezwa kwicara bakihweza igisumba ikindi". Hagati aho, ryaba ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, ryaba ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru ku rwego rwa Buraya, yaba reta, ntaco izi nzego ziratangaza ku bijanye n'ingingo zikwiye gufatwa.

column2: Imishamirano ya Ukraine: US ivuga ko Russia itegerezwa guhitamwo hagati y'ibiganiro canke guhangana
column3: Icegera c'umunyamabanga wa Reta wa Amerika Wendy Sherman aragabisha Uburusiya ko butegerezwa guhitamwo hagati y'inzira y'ibiganiro canke bugahangana n'Uburengero. Yabivuze inyuma y'ibiganiro hagati ya OTAN/NATO n'Uburusiya, kimwe mu vyaranze ibikorwa vya diplomasi muri ino ndwi mu ntumbero yo kugabanya imishamirano kuri Ukraine. Icegera c'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya Alexander Grushko avuga ko OTAN idashobora kwihitiramwo gusa ibiyorohereza mu vyo Uburusiya busaba. Mu vyo busaba harimwo ko Ukraine itokwigera yinjira muri OTAN. Abasirikare b'Uburusiya bababa 100.000 bavugwa ko biyegeranirije hafi y'urubibe rwa Ukraine, ivyatumye haba ubwoba ko hashobora kuba igitero. Sherman ashimangira ko Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ibindi bihugu vya OTAN bidashobora kwemera ko Ukraine ibuzwa kwinjira muri iri shirahamwe, akerekana ko imiryango y'iri shirahamwe rya gisirikare yugururiwe uw'ari we wese. Intego yo kwinjira muri OTAN iri mw'ibwirizwashingiro rya Ukraine. Ariko avuga ko hakiriho akaryo ko kwumvikana, kandi ko Uburusiya butegerezwa guhitamwo ico bwipfuza ko gikurikira. Ati: "Uburusiya, cane cane buzotegerezwa guhitamwo nimba koko bushaka umutekano, aha naho bugategerezwa gufata inzira, canke nimba ibi vyose vyari urwitwazo. Kandi bashobora kuba batarabimenya". Avuga ko Amerika na OTAN bariko bitegurira ico cose coshobora gushika. Uburusiya bwarasohoye urutonde rw'ivyo bwipfuza bifise intumbero yo kubuza OTAN ko ibandanya yiyagurira akarere amaja mu buseruko, hanyuma iri huriro rikagabanya akariro ko gusugereza imbibe z'Uburusiya. OTAN iriyamiriza yivuye inyuma ibisabwa n'Uburusiya ariko ikavuga ko yiteguye kuganira ku bindi bibazo harimwo kugenzura ibirwanisho no kugabanya imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare. OTAN/NATO (Organisation du Traité de l'Atlantique Nord/North Atlantic Treaty Organisation), ni ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe rigizwe n'ibihugu 30, rikaba ryashinzwe mu 1949. Avugira Uburusiya inyuma y'ibiganiro vy'ejo ku wa gatatu i Buruseri (Bruxelles/Brussels) mu Bubirigi, Grushko yagabishije ko mu gihe umubano wokwononeraka bishobora kugira ingaruka umuntu atazi ku mutekano wa Bulaya. Iri gabisha risa n'amajambo y'umunyamabanga mukuru wa OTAN Jens Stoltenberg avuga ko "hashobora kwaduka iyindi ntambara i Bulaya". Irungikwa ry'ingabo z'Uburusiya hafi y'urubibe buhana na Ukraine ryateje ubwoba ko buriko butegura igitero. Mu 2014, Uburusiya bwarigaruriye akarere ka Crimea kegukira Ukraine, inyuma y'aho abanya Ukraine batembagarije umukuru w'igihugu cabo yari yegamiye ku ruhande rw'Uburusiya. Inyuma y'aho, muri uyo mwaka nyene, inyeshamba zishaka kwiyonkora zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya zarigaruriye uturere tutari duto two mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Uburusiya bushimangira ko iri rungikwa ry'ingabo ridakwiye gutera ubwoba umuntu n'umwe. Ariko Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya avuga ko azofata "ingingo za gisirikare" mu gihe Uburengero bwobandanya poritike y'"agasotoro". Kuri uyu wa kane, hari ibiganiro biza kubera ku cicaro c'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya rijejwe umutekano n'imigenderanire (Organisation for Security and Co-operation in Europe) i Vienne muri Autriche, ubwa mbere muri ino ndwi Ukraine ikaba iza kuronka ikibanza muri iyo nama.

column2: Amnesty International itewe impungenge n’umugambi w'ihungurwa ku nguvu ry’impunzi z’abarundi
column3: Ishirahamwe Amnesty International rivuga ko ritewe impungenge n'umugambi w'ibihugu vya Tanzania n'u Burundi rivuga ko bigiye gutahukana ku nguvu impunzi z'abarundi ziri muri Tanzania. Mw'itangazo ryasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko ryaronse urwandiko rwo mw'ibanga rwerekana ko abashikiranganji b'intwaro zo hagati ba Tanzania n'u Burundi bumvikanye ko ico gikorwa bagitangura mu ndwi igira kabiri y'uku kwezi kw'icenda bakakirangiza ku wa 31 z'ukwezi kwa 12 uyu mwaka. Seif Magango icegera c'umukuru w'iryo shirahamwe ajejwe akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko, ibiyaga binini n'ihembe rya Afrika ati: "Birababaje cane kubona leta ya Tanzania ishaka kurungika abantu batavyiyumvamwo ahantu ishirahamwe ONU rivuga ko ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu ribandanya kakaba akamizwe n'ingoma". Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati w'u Burundi Pascal Barandagiye, yagiriza ishirahamwe HCR rijejwe impunzi kw'isi ko ridashaka guhungura impunzi ku nyugu zaryo.
