Mw'iryo tangazo, Amnesty International  ivuga ko abo bategetsi babiri bumvikanye ko bategerezwa kwihoza akamo katewe n'ishirahamwe HCR bakibandaniriza umugambi wabo w'uguhungura izo mpunzi. Isubiramwo ibiri muri urwo rwandiko ivuga, Amnesty International imenyesha ko bumvikanye bati: " N'aho HCR yokwerekana ko ishobora gufasha canke igashaka kudindiza umugambi, ibihugu bibiri bizobandanya uyu mugambi mpaka aba Barundi basubiye mu gihugu cabo". Bwana Magango ati: "Amaleta ya Tanzania n'u Burundi ategerezwa guhagarika vyihuta umugambi wabo w'uguhungura impunzi z'abarundi ku nguvu". "Mu gihe ibikorwa bikomeye vy'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu  bibandanya, ni nkererwa ko imiryango yobandanya yuguruwe ku barundi bakiri mu gihugu, hamwe n'abo bandi bahunze". Asaba ko impande zose zitatu, Uburundi, Tanzania na HCR zokwumvikana ku buryo uwushaka guhunguka wese yotahukanwa ku gushaka kwiwe kandi bigakorwa mw'iteka n'itekane hisunzwe amasezerano mpuzamakungu. Uburundi buti 'HCR yishakira akazi' Ishirahamwe HCR rivuga ko ridashigikiye na gato ko impunzi zitahukanwa zitavyiyumvamwo. Rivuga ko ingene ibintu bimeze ubu mu Burundi  hataragera ko bahimiriza ko impunzi z'Abarundi zihunguka. Ku ruhande rwiwe, umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati w'u Burundi, Pascal Barandagiye, avuga ko kubona ishirahamwe HCR ridashaka ko impunzi zihunguka ari uko ryishakira akazi. Avugana n'abamenyeshamakuru ku wa 27 z'ukwezi kw'umunani i Bujumbura inyuma y'urugendo rwiwe mu makambi ya Nduta na Mtendeli ku wa 25 z'uko kwezi nyene, bwana Barandagiye yavuze ati: "Wonsigurira gute ingene impunzi iza kwiyandikisha mu nkambi ukamusubiza inyuma ngo ntakwije imyaka". "Urudandazwa rurimwo kubera ata mpunzi zihari bazoca bataha kuko nta kazi bosubira kuronka". "Ntidushobora kwemera abantu bagira urudandaza ku barundi bacu, uno munsi tubabwira tuti hagarika urwo rudandazwa, abarundi bacu turabatahana". Rachel Nicholson, umushakashatsi mw'ishirahamwe Amnesty International ku Burundi n'u Rwanda, avuga ko ivyo umushikiranganji yagirije ishirahamwe HCR bidafashe kuko ngo risanzwe rinafise ingorane, akavuga ko gushika mu mpera z'ukwezi kw'indwi ryahawe ibice 22 % ryamahera akenewe kugira rifashe impunzi z'abarundiu muri kano karere. Izo mpunzi zozo zisaba ko amakungu yofata mu minwe ikibazo cazo, zikavuga ko Tanzania ishaka kubirukana kuko ngo idakeneye "kubona umuntu wese yitwa Umurundi ku butaka bwayo". Amashirahamwe agera kw'13 atacemerewe gukorera ku butaka bw' Burundi yarandikye ishirahamwe HCR arisaba gukingira Abarundi bahungiye muri Tanzania, inyuma y'aho bumvitiye ko Uburundi na Tanzania bumvikanye kubahugura ku nguvu. Maitre Armel Niyongere arongoye ACAT rimwe muri ayo mashirahamwe, avuga ko basaba HCR ko yohanura Tanzania igahagarika uwo mugambi. Amenyesha ko bariko bategura kwitwarira leta ya Tanzania yagiriza ko iriko irenga ku masezerano mpuzamakungu yo mu mwaka wa 1951 agenga impunzi.

column2: Umupfakazi wa TB Joshua mu rugamba rwo kurongora ishengero yasize muri Nigeria
column3: Evelyn Joshua yabaye umurongozi w'imwe mu mashengero akomeye y'abarokore muri Afrika, ariko uwo mupfasoni w'imyaka 52 ahanganye n'ikibazo co kubungabunga iragi ry'umugabo wiwe. Urupfu rwa Joshua rwabaye giturumbuka mu kwezi kwa gatandatu afise imyaka 57 rwatumye hatangura intambara yo kumusubirira yamaze amezi n'amezi kugira ironke inyishu. Ariko imiryango y'iryo shengero ryiwe rya Synagogue Church of All Nations (SCOAN), iri mu gisagara kinini cane muri Nigeria, yasubiriye kwugurugwa kugira yakire abayoboke baryo ubwa mbere mu mezi atanu. Yari rurangiranwa kubera imburi ziwe n'inyigisho, vyatumye ahurumbirwa n'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abayoboke bavuye hirya no hino kw'isi baja Lagos, harimwo n'abanyepolitike bakomeye bo muri Afrika na Amerika y'epfo. Ni gake haba ibiganiro vy'isubirizwa mu mashengero y'abarokore muri Nigeria mbere kenshi uburongozi buca buhabwa umupfakazi w'uwuba yarashinze ishengero. Ariko muri SCOAN, umupfasoni wa Joshua, yari umupasitori yatiwe, ahanganye n'abandi kubera atari mu rwego rukuru rurongoye iryo shengero. Ibi bifatwa n'abo bahanganye ko ari ikimenyetso c'uko umugabo wiwe atigeze amufata nk'uwushobora kumusubirira. Bitandukanye n'abandi bagore b'abapasitori  bo muri Nigeria, ntiyiyerekana cane mu myaka irenga mirongo itatu bari bamaze bubakanye. TB Joshua afatwa n'abayoboke ba SCOAN nk'"intumwa", yakorana n'umugwi  umwegereye cane yita "inararibonye" - umwe muri bo bikaba vyari vyitezwe ko ari we azomusubirira. Ariko inyuma y'urupfu rwiwe, abari begereye umupfasoni wa Joshua barahawe uburenganzira na sentare bwo kumugira umwe mu bagize urwego nshingwantwaro, bica vyorosha kugera ku ntambwe yo gushika kuri ayo mabanga. Iryo shengero ryaciye rimenyesha ko umupfasoni wa Joshua  abaye umurongozi mushasha "Arongowe n'Imana", ivyababaje ayandi mashami ari muri iryo shengero ku kungene bitabaye mu muco. Cane cane umugwi uzwi kw'izina rya Global Congress of SCOAN Members (GCSM), vyitwa ko ushigikiwe n'abayoboke bo mu rwego rwo hejuru, warerekanye amakenga kuri iyo ngingo. Ariko nta madidane yabaye ku mukuru yari kurongora amasengesho ubwa mbere ya SCOAN itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe kuva umugabo wiwe apfuye. Bivugwa ko atahemye kugira yerekane ubutegetsi bwiwe muri iryo shengero, mu gukoresha amezi make ya nyuma mu gusukura iryo shengero. Hari ama Video yagiye ahabona y'abayoboke, benshi b'abanyamahanga, bamaze imyaka baba  muri urwo rupangu runini, bariko baravayo bariko barabazomera. Umwe mu bayoboke yakoresheje imvugo ngereranyo ko "cari icigwa". Abakuwe muri ico kibanza vyavuzwe ko bari abadashigikiye ubutegetsi bw'umupfasoni wa Joshua. Patrick Iwelunmor, yahoze ajejwe kumenyeshamakuru ku muhisi Joshua, yabwiye BBC ati:"Inyuma y'urupfu rw'intumwa, bamwe mu bamugendanira ntibavugisha Evelyn mu rupfasoni." Hari n'inkuru kandi yerekeye igiturire, mbere igisata ca Nigeria kijejwe kugwanya igiturire, EFCC, cemereye BBC ko kiriko kiragira amatohoza ku bivuga ko habaye ubusuma muri iryo shengero. Ntibiramenyekana nimba ibi ari vyo biriko biragirwako amatohoza, kuko ikinyamakuru co muri Nigeria The Punch cari canditse ko iki ari co gituma bamwe mu bayoboke b'iryo shingiro boba banyegeye. Ubu ikigiye kugora cane umupfasoni Joshua n'ugukora ku buryo abayoboke ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bakunda umugabo wiwe biyumvamwo ukwemera kwiwe. Baje kubera igihagararo ciwe n'ubwitonzi hakaba ata co biteze ku mutegetsi mushasha. Gbenga Osinaike, arongoye uruganda rw'abamenyeshamakuru mu kinyamakuru Church Times Nigeria, aremeza ko igenwa ryiwe ryaje giturumbuka. Yabwiye BBC ati:"Yahora asengesha rimwe na rimwe arik TB ntiyigeze amuha icizere." Ariko nk'umuntu atigeze yitabwaho  na benshi, "harimwo n'umugabo wiwe", umupfasoni Joshua yarerekanye " inguvu n'ubushobozi afise mu gutwara iryo shengero." Yaranse ko ahabwa icubahiro c'umugabo wiwe ca " uwujejwe gucungera vyose", avuga ko ari we akibarongoye, ko gusa "atanguriye urugendo aho data yashikanye inkino". Kandi TB Joshua aracafise ikibanza gikomeye muri iryo shengero, amafoto yiwe amanitse hose mu nzu, inyigisho ziwe na zo ziguma zica ku mbuga hwaniro ziwe. Bisa kandi n'uko umupfasoni Joshua yasigaranye iragi ry'ingene umugabo wiwe yigisha - aho yaguma acishamwo indirimbo zo guhimbaza Imana - aho n'umudiho usa n'uwo umugabo wiwe aho yariko arahereza inkuka ari wenyene. Ko ari babiri bahuye ubwa mbere mu 1990 aho yamutangaza mu kumubwira ivyerekeye ubuzima bwiwe, yandika n'izina ryiwe ku rupapuro ata jambo na rimwe amubwiye. Bamaranye iminota 45 incuro ya mbere babonana, aho inyuma y'aho yaciye amusaba ko bokwubakana. 'Impano yo kunywanisha' Ni ihasa akaba n'imfura mu muryango w'abana indwi, yakuriye i Okala Okpuno mu ntara ya Delta mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. N'aho atatanguye ari umupasitori, yaramenyerejwe hanyuma arabuhabwa n'umugabo wiwe. Mu 2009, yavuze ko ari umuntu afise impano zidasanzwe mu kunywanisha - "imigenderanire y'abavyeyi n'abana, abubakanye n'ibindi bintu nk'ivyo." Abasitori bakuru muri Nigeria kenshi bavuga ko baronse umuhamagaro uva muri bibiriya - nk'abahanuzi Samuel na Paul - kugira bakorere Imana. Nk'uko bivugwa na Joshua, umuhamagaro wiwe waje igiye yerekwa mu kiringo c'imisi itatu aho yumva ijwi rigira riti:"Ndi Imana yawe. Ndaguhaye ubutumwa bweranda bwo kugenda gukora igikorwa ceranda c'Imana." Umupfasoni Joshua ntaravuga ko yaronse umuhamagaro nk'uwo, ariko kuri bamwe, kuba bakorana n'umugabo wiwe birakwiye. Iwelunmo agira ati:"TB Joshua yari intumwa kuva avuka, ariko umugore wiwe yamubaye kubera we. Umugabo n'umugore babaye umwe, kubera ubwo bumwe yaciye na we asigwa amavuta." N'aho bamwe mu bapfakazi b'abakuru b'amashengero muri Nigeria, nka Janet Onaolapo wa Abundant Life Gospel Mission na Margaret Idahosa wa Church of God Mission International , barongoye neza amashengero yabo, s'ibintu bisanzwe. Amashengero y'abapantekoti muri Nigeria yubakiye ku gihagararo c'abayashinze, akaba asambuka bamaze gupfa. Osinaike avuga ko ivyo bishobora gushikira na SCOAN. Avuga ati:"Iyo hageze ku bibazo vy'ishengero, abantu baza kurondera inyishu, kurondera ibitangaro, kuraba uwoba yareretswe ibiberekeye. "Icuka gitegerezwa kuzosubira hasi."

column2: DR Congo igiye kwubaka intatemwa ya Lumumba
column3: Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo igiye kwubaka intatemwa y'uwiguze ukwikukira kw'ico gihugu, Patrice Lumumba, nk'uko vyaraye bitangajwe na Perezida Félix Tshisekedi. Perezida Tshisekedi avuga kandi ko Ububirigi buzosubiza ibisigarira vy'iyi ncungu yari umushikiranganji wa mbere igihe Congo yikukira. Vyitezwe ko iyi ntatemwa yubakwa imbere y'uko igi gihugu gihimbaza imyaka 61 y'ukwikukira, mu kwa gatndatu 2021. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Tshisekedi yavuze ati: "Mu bikorwa vyo guhimbaza isabukuru y'imyaka 61 tumaze turonse intahe y'ukwikukira, igihugu kizokengurukira Umushikiranganji wa mbere Patrice Emery Lumumba, umwe mu ntwari z'igihugu, ibisigarira vyiwe bikazotahukanwa kugira ngo bishinguranwe iteka ry'uwiguze igihugu". Patrice Lumumba yagandaguwe mu kwezi kwa mbere 1961. Ikiziga ciwe nticigeze kiboneka, ariko umwe mu bamugandaguwe yashoboye kubika iryinyo ryiwe i Buruseri mu Bubirigi. Mu kw'icenda uno mwaka, sentare yo muri ico gihugu camaze imyaka itari mike gikoroniza Congo yategetse ko iryo ryinyo risubizwa umukobwa wa Lumuba, Juliana Lumumba, inyuma y'aho yandikiye ikete umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ububirigi amusaba ko yorisubiza.

column2: Tanzania uko ndayibona: Ivyo Prezida Samia amaze gushikako mu mwaka umwe
column3: Mu makete y'abamenyeshamakuru b'abanya-Afrika, Sammy Awami arasubiza amaso inyuma ku kugene Tanzania yahindutse mu mwaka umwe kuva Samia Suluhu Hassan abaye umugore wa mbere abaye ategetse ico gihugu inyuma y'urupfu rwa prezida John Pombe Magufuli. Iyo igipimo c'umunezezo canke ukwishima gifatwa mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, cari kwerekana ko aba-Tanzania bari mu bantu ba mbere banezerewe kw'isi, nk'uko bivugwa n'aba-Tanzania bamwe bamwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Mu mayinga make aheze, prezida Samia Suluhu Hassan, azwi cane gusa nka Mama Samia, yarabonanye na babiri mu ndongozi z'umugambwe uza imbere mu yitavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, Chadema, Tundu Lissu na  Freeman Mbowe, ibintu atawari gushobora gucisha mu mutwe haraheze umwaka. Lissu aba mu buhungiro inyuma yo kuraswa amasasu 16 mu 2007 mu kugerageza kumwica vyafashwe ko vyari bifise imvo ya poritike. Mbowe aherutse kuva mu munyororo, aho yari apfungiwe kuva afashwe yagirizwa ivyaha vy'iterabwoba mu kwezi kw'indwi igihe yari yiteguriye kugirisha ikoraniro ryo gusaba ko hagira ibihindurwa mw'ibwirizwa nshingiro. Umunyamategeko akaba n'umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira cane Fatma Karume yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "NDAKWISHIMIYE, SSH [Samia Suluhu Hassan]. Lissu nawe nyene arakwishimiye." Haraheze umwaka, Tanzania cari ikindi gihugu. Ico gihe prezida John Pombe Magufuli yabona ko abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ari ibikoresho vy'inyungu z'abanyamahanga. Ururimi rwiwe ku batavuga rumwe na reta zari inguvu, kandi yari yihaye ihangiro ryo kuzimanganya poritike ishingiye ku migambwe myinshi. Kuba ibintu vyarahindutse nta n'umwe atavyemera mu mice yose ya poritike. Lissu avuga ati: "Si ndi umuntu agenda arakoma amashi, [ariko] hari ibintu Mama Samia yatanguye gukora neza. Kandi kubera yatanguye gukora ibintu neza, tuzomushigikira abikore neza gusumba." Ikidahurizwako n'ukumenya niba prezida Samia ivyo ariko arahindura akwiye kubishimirwa vyose. Tanzania yabaye igihugu gitwazwa igitugu ku mugambwe n'ubu ariwo utwara, Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM), ubu arongoye. Yari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu muri reta yakoze uko ishobora ngo izimanganye ukutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi no guta abantu mu munyororo ku mpamvu zo kuyinegura gusa. Kunyuruza abantu, kubura abandi irengero, ku mvo bivugwa ko ari iza poritike, vyarakozwe kuri reta yazamwo ubwa kabiri mu butegetsi bwayo. Hari n'ikibazo co kumenya niba ashaka gushira mu mategeko impinduka ziriko ziraba. Nyinshi zisa n'izishingiye ku gushaka kw'umukuru w'igihugu ubwiwe gusa. Nk'akarorero, mu gihe kubonana n'abanyaporitike batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ari intambwe nziza mu kwubaka icizere, amategeko agenga imigambwe adahurizwako ntarahinduka. Ivyo biha urwego rujejwe imigambwe ububasha bwagutse kandi budatomoye neza bwo gufuta umugambwe no guha igihano co gupfungwa gushika ku mwaka uwo ariwe wese yihaye igikorwa co kwigisha ibijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu, nko gushishikariza abanyagihugu kwiyandikisha kugira bazokwitabe amatora. Ni nk'uko, n'ubwo ibihano ku binyamakuru vyinshi vyavanyweho, itegeko ryo 2016 rigenga ibimenyeshamakuru, iryo mu 2018 rigenga ibinyamakuru vyo ku mbuga hwaniro n'iryo mu 2015 rigenga ivyaha biciye mu kwinjira mu mashini (Cybercrimes), ayo yose ntarahinduka mu gihe ariyo yakomeje ukubuza ibinyamakuru gukorera mu bwigenge akanabikwegera ibihano nko guhagarikwa canke kwugarwa. Ico prezida Samia yakoze ubu n'uguhagarika umuhindimuko wo gushika ku ntwaro y'igitugu idateye amazi. Yasubije igihugu mu gihe c'imbere ya 2015, ariko nta kinini arakora kugira ahindure amategeko yatumye uwo yasubiriye akandamiza abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi. Ariko ivyo amaze gukora mu nzira ya poritike yihanganira abandi vyerekana ko umukuru w'igihugu ashaka kugira ivyo ahindura. Ariko vyerekana kandi ko ari mu mayirabiri hagati yo kubandanya impinduka no kugumiza umugambwe arongoye ku butegetsi.  Nk'akarorero, abanyaporitike batavuga rumwe n'ubutetegetsi babonanye n'ubu ntibarekuriwe gukoresha amakoraniro. Ariko birasa n'uko ibiriko birahinduka bizorama. Ico cizere kiva mu kwibaza ko prezida Samia ubu yamaze gufata mu minwe umugambwe uri ku butegetsi. Mu mezi ya mbere Magufuli agipfa, yategerezwa kwama ariko aributsa abamwumva ko n'umukuru w'umugore ategerezwa kwubahwa no kwizerwa. Ico gihe abashikiranganji basa n'abashaka kwubaha ivyo bishakiye mu mategeko yabaha. Kimwe mu bishobora kugagaza kuba ubutegetsi bwiwe buguma bukomera n'ifungurwa rya Mbowe - inyuma y'urubanza rwiwe rwamaze amezi umunani kandi ata vyagiriji, abantu nabo badasiba gusaba ko urubanza rwiwe rwofutwa. Vyibazwa ko rwahebwe kuko yihagazeko imbere y'abasigaye bakiri ku ngendo ya Magufuli baterekwa impinduka ziwe. Bamwe bagereranya ibiriko birahinduka nko ku gihe ca prezida Jakaya Kikwete, umwe mu bo Samia yafatirako akaba ari nawe  yatwaye imbere ya Magufuli. Uburyo bwiwe bwo gutwara bwari ubwo gushira abantu hamwe,  amatati ya poritike n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi akenshi yakemurirwa mu biganiro ku kirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu bariko barasangira icayi n'utwuzango. Ivyo vyatuma reta isa n'iyidakoresha amategeko acinyiza. Aho umuntu afatira icizere n'uko hanagarutse poritike z'ubutunzi ziha ikibanza abikorera ku giti cabo. Abanyamitahe b'abanyamahanga bariko barareshwa cane, ibihugu vya Buraya bisigaye birabwa nk'ivyo gufashanya mw'iterambere aho kuba ibishaka kwiganza canke kuba "mabeberu," ni ukuvuga amasuguru (impfizi) y'impene - ijambo ry'akagaye ryakoreshwa na Magufuli. Hamwe na kahise ke ko guharanira agateka ka zina muntu binyuze mu gukorera hamwe, n'amamuko yiwe yo muri Zanzibar aharangwa umuco wo kwicisha bugufi no kwakira abandi, nta gitangaje ko agira ingendo itandukanye mu gutwara. Ariko ashobora guhura n'abatavyuma kumwe na we bakomeye cane muri CCM, hamwe, nk'akarorero, yokwemera ko haba amatora kamarampaka ku mpinduka mw'ibwirizwa nshingiro, ikintu abatavuga rumwe na reta n'abashigikiye demokrasi baguma basaba, kuko vyogabanya ububasha bw'umugambwe wiwe ku butegetsi. Prezida Samia yashitse ku butegetsi mu bihe  vy'igitangaza, mu gihugu n'ingendo ya poritike vyiganziwe n'ijwi ry'abagabo  vyatejwe imbere cane n'uwo yasubiriye. Umunsi umwe mw'ijambo imbere y'abanyagihugu, uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu umuhisi Magufuli yavuze atebura ingene abagore bihagararako bakubitwa, mu rindi naho akekeza mu buryo bujanye n'igitsina umugore w'umushingamateka kubera inzobe y'urukoba rwiwe. Aho hompi yarakomewe amashi cane. Inyuma y'umwaka umwe, prezida Samia yashoboye kuvyura icizere c'intango nshasha. Ariko igipimo kizogaragaza ko ishaka ryiwe ryo gukora impinduka zirama kiri ku muvuduko n'aho azogarukira mu guhindura amategeko ari nayo  yoshimangira iragi ryiwe ariko kandi akanakingira ukwishira n'ukwizana kw'abanya-Tanzania, akanabera inkinzo igihugu ku bategetsi b'igitugu bozokwinjira ingoro y'umukuru w'igihugu muri kazoza.

column2: Pep Guardiola wa Manchester City avuga ko abatsindiye igikombe ari 'ntibagiranwa'
column3: Umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola avuga ko umurwi wiwe ari "ntibagiranwa" inyuma yo gutahukana igikombe ca Premier League kigira kane mu myaka y'inkino itanu. City yatahukanye iri higanwa irushije inota rimwe gusa umukeba wayo Liverpool inyuma y'intsinzi ya 3-2 yaraye ironse mu gutsinda bigoranye Aston Villa ku musi wa nyuma w'ihiganwa ku kibuga Etihad Stadium. Ni igikombe kigize 11 Guardiola atahukanye mu myaka itandatu kuva ashitse mu Bwongereza. Guardiola ati: "Turi intibagiranwa. Tuzokwama twibukwa. Aba bakinyi bazokwama bibukwa muri uno murwi". "Ivyo twashitseko, ni ibintu bigoye cane. Sir Alex Ferguson na Manchester United barabikoze, haraciye imyaka - incuro zibiri canke zitatu - ubu rero ndabonye ic'ari co gushika ku kintu nk'iki". Hasigaye iminota 15 gusa ngo urukino ruhere, City yari imaze guterwa 2-0 na Villa imbere y'uko Ilkay Gundogan yinjira agatera ibitsindo bibiri, hagati yavyo umukinyi wo hagati Rodri akaba yashoboye kwinjiza igitsindo, ibintu vyabaye mu minota itanu gusa itahukana intsinzi. Iyo baramuka batsinzwe canke bakanganya gusa, Liverpool niyo iba yaraye mu munezero. Guardiola  ati: "Urukino rwa nyuma igihe cose rwama ari urukino rudasanzwe - ibigumbagumba vyinshi. Aston Villa ntaco batakoze, ariko igitsindo ca mbere cahinduye vyose. Vyari ngombwa ko dufata ibintu mu minwe". "Iyo utsindiye iri higanwa incuro zine mu myaka itanu, ni uko aba bahungu ari ibitangaza. "Gutsindira muhira imbere y'abantu bacu ni ikintu gihimbaye. Igihe tumariye kunganya, twaciye twumva ko twari dufise amahirwe yo gutsinda ica gatatu. "Ni bwo bwa mbere nari mbaye mu bihe nk'ibi kuva nagashika hano". Liverpool yatsinze umurwi wa Wloves 3-1 ku kibuga cayo ariko ntiyashoboye gutesha Manchester City gukingira igikombe cayo yari isanzwe ifise. Mw'ihiganwa ryose rirangiye, iyi mirwi ibiri yatakarije inkino zitanu gusa, Citi zitatu, Liverpool zibiri. Guardiola  yongerako ati: "Ivyo twaraye dushitseko bifitaniye isano n'ubukomezi bw'abakeba bacu kandi sinari bwigere mbona umurwi nka Liverpool mu buzima bwanje. "Turakeje Liverpool - baratumye uko indwi yose irangiye tugenda tuvyifatamwo neza". Abajijwe nimba afise umugambi wo kubandanya amenyereza uyu murwi igihe amasezerano afitaniye nawo azoba arangiye mu mpera z'umwaka w'inkino uza, yavuze ati: "Nta shaka canke icipfuzo co kwiyumvira ivy'umwaka uza mfise muri kino gihe. "Nta mwaka w'inkino woroshe. Sinshobora guhemukira umurwi  - kumbure banshira mu bihe bidasanzwe mu buzima bwanje ariko ntegerezwa kuvyiyumvamwo, abakinyi bategerezwa kuvyiyumvamwo mbere n'umurwi utegerezwa kuvyiyumvamwo. "Ubu ni igihe co kwidagadura. Dusubiriye gutahukana ihiganwa". Umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Ukraine, Oleksandr Zinchenko yinjiye mu gice ca kabiri aca ahindura ibintu muri Manchester City anagira uruhara rukomeye mu guhereza umupira Rodri agatera ica kabiri. Yahimbaje iyi ntsinzi mu kibuga umupira  uheze afise ibendera ya Ukraine yari akenyeye mu bitugu, yifotoza ayambaye imbere yo kuyambika igikombe aca akorora amosozi. Ati: "[Ibi] ni ibihe vy'ikigumbagumba ntibagiranwa kuri jewe - ku banya Ukraine bose bariko bicwa n'inzara, bari mu magorwa mu gihugu canje kubera igitero c'Uburusiya. "Ndishimiye kuba umunya Ukraine no gutahukana iki gikombe muri Ukraine, kubw'abanya Ukraine bose kubera bagikwiye. "Gisigura vyose kuri jewe - numva nopfira aba banyagihugu n'abadufashe mu mugongo. Ivyo abanyagihugu bampaye n'ivyo bankoreye muri iki gihe - igihe kitoroshe mu buzima bwanje -  ndabishima cane kandi sinzokwigera ndavyibagira mu buzima bwanje bwose". 'Ntuzokwama ubona amahiganwa mensi aryoshe' Uwahoze ari myugariro wa Arsenal Martin Keown avuga ko vyari kuba "biteye agahinda" iyo City ibura igikombe muri uno mwaka w'ihiganwa, mu gihe Liverpool imaze gutahukana ibikombe bibiri mu gihugu kandi ikaba yiteguriye gutana mu mitwe na Real Madrid mu rukino rwa nyuma rw''ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League). Uwahoze ari umusatirizi w'Ubwongereza Alan Shearer nawe yongerako ati: "Twabonye umurwi udasanzwe, umwaka udasanzwe n'urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru rudasanzwe. "Ivyo Pep Guardiola akoze muri Manchester City n'ivyo Jurgen Klopp akoze muri Liverpool ni ibintu bidasanzwe. Wari umutaga uryoheye ijisho ku muntu ataho yegamiye. "Nagumanye umutima uhagaze ariko ntaho nari mpagaze - Imana yonyene niyo izi ivyari mu mitwe y'abafana, kuko uwu ni umuhingamo wari uteye ubwoba. Ibintu bidasanzwe". 'Twasiganywe n'umurwi wa mbere kw'isi yose' Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Klopp avuga ko wabaye "umunezero" kuri we gukorana n'aba bakinyi gihe cose, ariko bari bakeneye " gushiramwo inguvu zisumbirije mu gice ca mbere c'ihiganwa" kugira ngo dushobore gutsinda City muri uru rugamba. Hagati aho, avuga ko ivyo bashitseko bidasanzwe kandi ko bagumye baterana inkokora "n'umurwi wa mbere kw'isi" gushika ku musi wa nyuma. Ati: "Aba bahungu bakinye ihiganwa ridasanzwe. Ntibirangiriye ng'aha, ahubwo niko ihiganwa rirangiye".

column2: Covid: South Africa yakoze ubwoko bwayo bw'urucanco Moderna
column3: Abahinga mu bumenyi bo muri Afrika y'epfo barakoporoye urukingo Moderna rwa Covid, ikintu bavuga yuko kizofasha kwongera igitigiri c'abicandagisha muri Afrika. Uwo mugabane kuri ubu ni wo ufise igitigiri gito kw'isi c'abicandagisha Covid. Ikigo cahinguye uru rukingo rushasha - Afrigen Biologics - kivuga yuko cizera gutangura kugeragereza uru rukingo ku bantu mu kwezi kwa Munyonyo (11). Moderna mu ntango yaravuze yuko itazoshira inzitizi ku kwigana urukingo rwayo, bituma abahinga mu bumenyo b'i Cape Town baronka akaryo ko kwikorera ubwoko bwabo bw'urwo rukingo. Abo bashakashatsi bari bashigikiwe n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS. Petro Terblanche, umuyobozi wa Afrigen Biologics, yavuze ko batanguye buhoro, ariko ko bari bafise umugambi wo kwagura ibikorwa vuba cane. Yabariye BBC ati: "Twakoresheje impinyanyuro isa nk'iyakoreshejwe ku rukingo Moderna 1273. "Ibi biri mu mugambi w'utwigoro two ku rwego rw'isi two kurondera uburyo no kwubaka ubushobozi mu bihugu bifise ubutunzi bubayabaye, kugira bishobore kwirwanako." Uru rukingo ruriko ruriganwa ni urwo mu bwoko RNA messenger / ARN messager rwakozwe n'ikigo Moderna co muri Amerika. Pfizer-BioNTech nayo yarakoze urukino ikoresheje ubuhinga nk'ubwo nyene. Ni zimwe mu nkingo abajejwe intwaro hirya no hino kw'isi, batanguye kwemerera gukoreshwa. Ubu bwoko bw'urukingo bwigisha uturemangingo tw'umubiri ukuntu duhingura umusemburo ukabura ubwirinzi bw'imbere mu mibiri yacu, hako hashirwa mu mubiri agakoko katswe ubukana. Uwujejwe ubuhinga n'ubumenyi muri ico kigo, Dr Caryn Fenner, yavuze ko ivyashitsweko "ari ngirakamaro cane." Yongeyeko ati "Bishira ububasha mu maboko yacu bwo gushobora guhingura inkingo zacu bwite muri kazoza, tugashobora kwitegurira ibindi biza bizoshika, tukageragereza inkingo ku butaka bwa Afrika hanyuma tukaraba n'izindi ndwara zikora kuri Afrika." Vyinshi mu bihuru vyo muri Afrika bimaze gukingira 10% gusa vy'abanyagihugu bavyo, ugereranije na 60% mu Amerika y'uburaruko, 63% i Buraya hamwe na 61% muri Aziya. Naho Afrika y'epfo ari yo ifise ibitigiri vyiza kurusha ibindi bihugu ku mugabane, imaze gukingira gusa 27% vy'abanyagihugu bayo. Vyaratangajwe yuko BioNTech - ikigo cafashanije na Pfizer mu guhingura urukingo rw'ubwoko mRNA - kinafise imigambi yo kwugurura amahinguriro y'inkingo ku mugabane wa Afrika. Hariho n'iyindi migambi yo kwubaka amahinguriro y'inkingo muri Arika, yibanda cane cane ku nkingo zakorewe mu Burusiya no mu Bushinwa. Umwihwezo wa Naomi Grimley, umunyamakuru araba ibijanye n'amagara kw'isi Iyi irashobora kuba ari intambwe ikomeye cane ku mugabane wa Arika. Nyinshi mu nkingo z'ubwoko mRNA zajanywe mu bihugu bikize kandi imigambi yo kwubaka amahinguriro yazo ku butaka bwa Afrika yamye idashemeye. Bitewe n'uko Moderna yavuze ko itazoshira inzitizi ku kwigana urukingo rwayo, abahinga mu bumenyi barashoboye kurwigana bifashishije ikigo cihariye cashinzwe na OMS i Cape Town. Naho igitigiri bamaze gukora gushika ubu ari gito, vyaranyarutse cane gusumvya uko benshi babiziga. Kwongera ibitigiri nivyagenda neza kandi igerageza rigatanga inyishu nziza, birashobora kuzoba intango y'ukungana mu kuronka inkingo zo ku rwego rwo hejuru. Haritezwe kandi kuzoraba ingene Moderna izovyifatamwo mu gihe abahinga mu bumenyi batahuye ubufindo bw'umukenyuro w'urukingo rwayo. Igisata c'ibigo bihingura imiti muri rusange vyariyamirije umugambi wo gukurako inzitizi zibuza kwigana inkingo zavyo, bikitwaza ko zigoye cane guhingura kugira habe hari uwozikorera ukwiwe, ngo kandi vyoca intege ubuhinyanyuzi mu gisata c'abigenga. Abashigikiye ico gikorwa bobo bavuga yuko ivyo bigo vyakoresheje amahera menshi y'abanyagihugu yatanzwe n'amaleta kugira bishobore gutunganya imigambi yavyo y'inkingo.

column2: Tiwa Savage na Burna Boy ntibazoja muri Afrika y’Epfo kubera ubwicanyi ku banyamahanga
column3: Umuririmvyi rurangiranwa w'umunya Nigeria, Burna Boy, yarahiye ko atazosubira guhonyoza ikirenge muri Afrika y'Epfo, eka na mugenziwe Tiwa Savage ahagarika igiteramo yari afiseyo. Mu butumwa yacishije mu rubuga rwa Twitter, Burna Boy avuga ko yaheruka muri ico gihugu mu 2017, kandi ko atazosubirayo gushika leta ya Afika y'Epfo yisubiyeko. Tiwa Sawage nawe avuga ko ibiriko biraba bikomeye kandi ko atawungukira mu kumeneka kw'amaraso. Ati "kwica uwariwe wese w'umunyafrika bimuraba". Igipolisi c'ico gihugu carahagaritse abantu batari bake bari muri iyo migumuko imaze iminsi mu bisagara vya Johannesburg, Pretoria n'ahandi. Abantu bashika batanu baramaze kwicwa. Umukuru w'ico gihugu, Cyril Ramaphosa, n'abandi bakuru b'ibihugu vya Afrika bariyamiriza ivyo bitero. Umukuru w'igihugu ca Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari, yarungitse intumwa muri Afrika y'Epfo itwaye "ubutumwa bwo kwerekana akababaro ku kuntu abanyagihugu baco bafashwe nabi". Umuririmvyi akomoka muri Nigeria azwi cane no muri Afrika, Tiwa Savage yanditse kuri Twitter ko yiyamirije yivuye inyuma ubwicanyi ku bantu b'iwe muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ati: "Kuri iyo mvo, sinshobora kuririmba mw'isabukuru rya DSTV ryimirije i Johannesburg ku wa 21 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda". Tiwa azwi cane mu ndirimbo nka "Eminado" na "All Over" amenyesha ko "kwica uwariwe wese w'umunyafrika bimuraba atarindiriye kuba umunyanigeria gusa". Mugenzi wiwe Burna Boy nawe akomoka muri Nigeria avuga ko ubwicanyi bushingiye ku rwanko ku banyamahanga buteye kubiri n'ivyo yarwaniye. Avuga ko Afrika yashigikiye abanya Afrika y'Epfo igihe bariko barwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango y'abazungu ya Apartheid kuva mu myaka ya 1960  gushika mu 1994 irangira. Burna Boy yanditse ati: "Ndatahura ko abanya Afrika y'Epfo bataye umutwe kubera imyaka bamaze bacurwa bufuni na buhoro, ku buryo basigaye bafata nk'abansi abantu babafashije mu gihe bariko bacurwa bufuni na buhoro, ahubwo  bagashimagiza ababahohoteye". Yongeyeko y'uko hari abanya Afrika y'Epfo "bameze neza, bafise ivyiyumviro birashe, n'aho atari benshi". Ishavu ryavuye kuri iyo migumuko ryatumye ishami rimwe ry'ikigo c'ubudandaji ca Afrika Afrika y'Epfo, Shoprite, giterwa kikanyagwa urukombamazi muri gisagara ca Lagos.

column2: Covid-19: US yemeje Moderna nk’urucanco rugira kabiri
column3: Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zemeje urucanco rugira kabiri rwa Covid-19, Moderna, ubu hakaba hagiye gusohoka amamiriyoni y'amadoze yarwo. Igisata kijejwe imfungurwa n'imiti muri Amerika (FDA) catanze uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uru rucanco rwakorewe muri ico gihugu inyuma y'indwi imwe gusa yemeje urwa Pfizer/BioNTech ruriko ruratangwa mu gihugu. Amerika yaciye yiyemeza kugura doze imiriyoni 200 za Moderna, muri zo imiriyoni zitandatu zishobora kuba ziri aho, zirindiriye gutangwa umwanya n'umwanya. Amerika nico gihugu ca mbere kw'isi gifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye n'abamaze guhitanwa na Covid-19. Ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins risanzwe rikurikiranira hagufi ingene iki kiza karanda cifashe kw'isi rivuga ko muri Amerika abamaze kwandura Covid-19 ari imiriyoni 17.5, ikaba imaze guhitana abarenga 313.500. Umukuru w'ikigo FDA Stephen Hahn avuga ko iyemezwa ry'uru rundi rucanco nijoro ku wa gatanu ari intambwe ikomeye cane mu kurwanya iki kiza karanda gihanze isi. Umukuru w'ico gihugu aherutse gutorwa, Joe biden, yiteze gucandagwa ku wa mbere, avuga ko izi ncanco zibiri Pfizer na Moderna "zitanga umwizero  ko imbere ari heza", ariko akagabisha ko "intambara yo kurwanya Covid-19 itararangira". Mw'itangwa rya Moderna bisaba ko ishirwa mu vyuma bikanyisha gushika ku bushuhe bwa degré 20 musi y'ubusa (-20C) - vyumvikana ko ishobora kubikwa muri firigo isanzwe. Ariko Pfizer ni ngombwa ko ishirwa ku bushuhe bungana na degré 75 musi y'ubusa (-75C), ibi bigatuma bitoroha kuyishikana aho itegerezwa gushikanwa. Co kimwe na Pfizer, urucanco rwa Moderna na rwo nyene rukenera ko umuntu aterwa urundi rushinge rugira kabiri kugira rugire inguvu. Kuri Pfizer, umuntu atewe urwa mbere, bisaba imisi 21 kugira aterwe urwa kabiri, ariko kuri Moderna  uru rwa kabiri umuntu ategerezwa kurutera haciye imisi 28.

column2: Ghana: Abashingamateka barwanye bapfa ikori ku mahera aca ku materefone ngendanwa
column3: Hadutse imishamirano mu nama nshingamateka ya Ghana mw'ijoro ryo kuwa mbere buca ari ku wa kabiri igihe abashingamateka bariko biga ikori ryotangwa ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa. Abashingamateka barateranye inkokora, barasunagurana, bahana amangumi, mu gihe abandi nabo bagerageza kubanguranya. Iyi mishamirano yadutse igihe abashingamateka bo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi bahaguruka bakaja kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka Joseph Osei Owusu ko ahaguruka ngo aje gutora, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Niwe yari arongoye ino nama yahavuye yunguruzwa kubera uru ruhagarara. Umugambwe National Democratic Congress (NDC) utavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi uriyamiriza iri kori ringana na 1.75% ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa, harimwo no kuriha ibicuruzwa ukoresheje terefone ngendanwa. Uyu mugambwe uvuga ko iri kori rizohohotera abadafise amikoro manini hamwe n'abo bose bari hanze y'igisata c'amabanki. Ariko umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca reta Ken Ofori-Artta avuga ko ari ukwagura igisata c'abatangakori, agasigura ko mu mwaka uza igihugu gishobora kuhungukira imiriyaridi 6.9 z'amafaranga y'ama cedi akoreshwa muri Ghana (yababa hafi imiriyaridi 1.15 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika). Iri koraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ryatanguye ku wa mbere mu gatondo, rikaba ryagiye guhagarikwa inyuma y'isaha zitandatu z'ijoro (canke saa sita z'ijoro), nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Graphic co muri ico gihugu. Iki kinyamakuru cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter iyi reresi y'uru ruhagarara. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Abanya-Ghana batari bake bagaye iyi nyifato y'abashingamateka babo, bakavuga ko bategerezwa kubera akarorero keza abandi - hakwifata nk'abana. Ijwi ry'icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ryaboneka ko ari kirumara mu gihe inama nshingamateka yacanyemwo bikomeye kubera integuro y'iri kori. Ava mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi New Patriotic Party (NPP). Umugambwe NDC uvuga ko atategerezwa gutora kubera yari arongoye inama. Ikinyamakuru Graphic kivuga ko integuro y'tegeko rigenga iri kori yemejwe n'umurwi w'inama nshingamateka ujejwe ikigega, ku majwi 13 kuri 12, ariko ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'uyu murwi atangiye ijwi ryiwe ryabanguranije. Inama nshingamateka yasubiye gukorana kandi ejo ku wa kabiri, ariko abashingamateka ntibatoye iri tegeko inyuma y'aho bumvikaniye ko inama yungururizwa mu kwa mbere. Poritike ya Ghana irangwamwo ukutumvikana kuva mu mwaka uheze, inyuma y'amatora aho imigambwe NDC na NPP yaronse intebe 137 umwe umwe. Intebe imwe ni iy'uwigenga, yagiye ku ruhande rwa NPP, agatuma uwu mugambwe uronka akarusho. Mu kwa mbere, abasirikare barinjiye mu nama nshingamateka kugira bahagarike imishamirano hagati y'abashingamateka yadutse bagomba gutora umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Ico gihe, Alban Bagbin wa NDC niwe yatowe inyuma y'aho bamwe mu bashingamateka ba NPP bamuhereye amajwi bakayima uwo mu mugambwe wabo, Mike Oquaye. Bagbin ntiyari muri iyi nama yo kuwa mbere yadutsemwo uru ruhagarara, ari co gituma yaciye irongorwa na Owusu wo muri NPP.

column2: Diego Maradona: Menya ubuhinga bw'uyu mukinyi n'intege nke ziwe
column3: Igitangaza c'umukinyi, agaragara mu kibuga, umuhinga, ntagereranywa, adahuriweko na bose. Diego Maradona. Igihangange mu mupira w'amaguru ateye inkeke. Umwe mu bakinyi b'ibihangange muri uwo mukino, uwo munya Argentine yarishimira uko ahererekanya umupira, ukubona kure n'ubunyarutsi vyashimisha abakunzi biwe. Yaranashavuje abakunzi biwe igihe yinjiza n'ukuboko, mu ciswe 'Hand of God' (ukuboko kw'Imana), aca aja muvyo kunywa ibiyayuramutwe no mu zindi ngorane zimuraba ku giti ciwe atari ku kibuga. Diego Armando Maradona yavukiye mu micungararo  y'igisagara ca Buenos Aires haraciye imyaka 60, akaba yakize ubukene buharangwa mu kuba umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru rurangiranwa bamwe bagereranya mbere ko yasumvya ubuhinga Pele wo muri Brezil. Uwo munye Argentine, yinjije ibitsindo 259 mu nkino 491, yararushije amajwi mugenzi we wo muri Amerika y'epfo mu matora y'umukinyi wa mbere akomeye mu kinjana ca 20, imbere y'uko FIFA ihindura uburyo batoramwo, bose bakaba baciye bagirwa aba mbere. Maradona yerekanye ubushobozi butangaje kuva akiri muto, aho yagejeje umurwi wiwe w'abakiri bato wa Los Cebollitas, ku ntsinzi 136 bikurikiranya, aca agira ugukina umupira w'amaguru umwuga ku myaka 16 n'imisi 120. Mugufi kandi yitsindagiye, ku metero imwe n'igice, si umunonotsi wokwiyumviriye. Ububangutsi bwiwe, ukubona kure, guhagarika umupira, ugucenga no guhereza vyatuma ukutanyaruka cane n'iyongerekana ry'ibiro vyiwe bitagaragara. Ashobora kuba yari umuhinga mu guca mu bakinyi binyuma bahanganye, ariko vyaramugora kwirinda ingorane. Ibitsindo 34 vya Maradona mu nkino 91 za Argentine ni igice kimwe muri kahise kiwe mu gihe yamaze akina. Yarafashije igihugu ciwe gutahukana intsinzi mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi co mu 1986 i Mexico, aranagishikana mu rukino rwa nyuma inyuma y'imyaka ine yakurikiye. Mu nkino z'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma zaheruka, hari habayemwo ukutumvikana kwari gushobora kugira ingaruka ku buzima bwiwe. Urukino rwabahuje n'Ubwongereza na rwo rwadutsemwo ikindi cuka kibi, intambara ya Falklands War hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri yari yatanguye  imyaka ine imbere y'aho. Ku kibuga ho yaciye ikomera gusumba. Mu gihe hari haheze iminota 51 ata gitsindo kiraboneka, Maradona yarwaniye umupira mu kirere n'umunyegoli Peter Shilton aca yinjiza igitsindo. Mu nyuma yavuze ko ico gitsindo cabonetse "hamwe kivuye ku mutwe wa Maradona, ahandi na ho ku kuboko kw'Imana". Inyuma y'iminota ine, yaciye yinjiza igitsindo  kivugwa ko ari "igitsindo c'ikinjana' - yafashe umupira hagati mu kibuga aca arawirukankana, asiga abandi bakinyi inyuma, imbere yo gucenga Shilton, aca arinjiza. Ku ncuro zibiri zose, Maradona yaraguzwe ku giciro kitari bwigere kibaho ku wundi mukinyi  - ava muri Boca Juniors mu gihugu ciwe agana Barcelone muri Espagne ku miliyoni 3 z'amapawundi, n'igihe yaja mu Butaliyano mu murwi wa Napoli, inyuma y'imyaka ibiri ku  miliyoni 5 z'amapawundi. Hari abakunzi b'uwo mugwi barenga 80.000 ku kibuga ca San Paolo, igihe yashika ari muri kajugujugu. Intwari nshasha. Yarakinye mu murwi ukomeye mu Butaliyano, arakundwa n'abarorerezi mu gihe yafasha gutahukana ibikombe vy'ihiganwa rya Buraya mu 1987 na 1990 hamwe n'igikombe ca UEFA co mu 1989. Yaragiriraniye ubucuti n'imirwi y'abicanyi ya Camorra, aja muvyo kunywa ibiyayuramutwe vya cocaine, aranitwarirwa yagirizwa kutemera umwana yavyaye. Inyuma yo gutsindwa igitsindo 1-0 n'Ubudagi mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi mu 1990 mu Butaliyano, ibipimo vyerekanye ko yanyoye ibiyayuramutwe mu mwaka wakurikiye vyatumye ahagarikwa amezi 15. 1977: Yatanguye mu rukino rwahuza Argentine v Hongrie 1982: Yagiye mu murwi wa Napoli inyuma y'imyaka ibiri yamaze muri Barcelone 1986: Yatahukanye igikombe c'isi akinira Argentine 1990: Yakinye urukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi ubugira kabiri akinira Argentine, maze itahukana ikibanza ca kabiri. Atwara n'igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo akinira Napoli. 1991: Yahagaritswe amezi 15 inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe. 1994: Yakinye mu gikombe c'isi incuro ya kane ariko aca arirukanwa inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe. 1997: Yarasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe ubugira gatatu. 2010: Yahejeje ikiringo ciwe co kumenyereza umurwi wa Argentine inyuma yo gutsindwa mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi. Inyuma y'ibipimo bigira gatatu vyemeza ko yafashe ibiyayuramutwe inyuma y'imyaka itatu, yarasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru afise imyaka 37, ariko abandanya agira n'izindi ngorane. Maradona yaraciriwe urubanza rwo gupfungwa imyaka 2 n'amezi 10 ariko yidegemvya azira kurasa abamenyeshamakuru n'inkoho ikoreshwa mu gukina. Akamenyero kiwe ka cocaine n'akaborerwe vyamuteye ibibazo vy'amagara. Yarongereje ibiro gushika ku 128, agira indwara y'umutima mu 2004, ivyamutumye amara umwanya munini ariko aravurwa. Yarabazwe ku nda kugira bamufashe kugabanya ibiro, araja no kuba muri Cuba mu gihe yariko ararwana no guheba gufata ibiyayuramutwe. N'aho habaye ivyo vyose, nticabujije ko Maradona agenwa kumenyereza umurwi wa Argentine mu 2008 akaba yaranawushikanye mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mu nkino z'isi yose  inyuma y'imyaka ibiri, imbere y'uko batsindwa n'Ubudagi ibitsindo 4-0.

column2: Intamba mu Rugamba zikeneye intsinzi kuri Guinea vyanka bikunda, ariko none yova hehe?
column3: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Intamba zirahura na Guinea muri uwo mukino zizi neza yuko kiretse intsinzi yoziha amanota 3, ata kindi gishobora kuzihesha amahirwe y'itike yo kuguma mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika 2019. Iyo ntsinzi yoca ituma u Burundi buheza ari ubwa gatatu mu mugwi B, hagaca rero hasigara kwizera ya mahirwe, aza kuvana n'ukuntu izindi kipe ziza kwitwara mu migwi zirimwo. Guinea nayo nyene ntihagaze neza mu mugwi B mu gihe imaze kunganya rimwe (na Madagascara 2-2), itsindwa irindi rimwe na Nigeria (1-0). Iyi kipe nayo ikeneye intsinzi cane muri uno mukino kugira ishobore kubandanya. Urundi rukino mu mugwi B rurahuza Nigeria na Madagascar ziza gukinira mu muji wa Alexandria, narwo rukaza kuba ari urukino rutoroshe kuko Nigeria, naho imaze kuronka itike yo kubandanya, ishaka guheza ari iya mbere, kanatsinda ni nayo irusha uburambe izo biri kumwe mw'ihiganwa. Madagascar nayo iraza kuba irondera n'imiburiburi inota rimwe kugire yizere ko ijana na Nigeria mu muce w'ijonjora mu kibanza ca kabiri. Guinea ni ikipe itoroshe kandi imenyereye rino higanwa, ikaba kandi nayo ikeneye cane amanota atatu kuko itsinze u Burundi ibitsindo vyinshi hanyuma Madagascar igatsindwa na Nigeria, yoca iheza ari iya kabiri igaca ironka itike. Guinea rero ntiza kworohera u Burundi na gato kuko ikipe zose zirondera itike, bigasigura ko ruza kuba ari urukino rubereye ijisho. U Burundi ariko, kiretse urukino na Madagascar rutagaragayemwo ishaka ryinshi, urukino bwakinye na Nigeria rwari urwo ku rwego rwo hejuru ku buryo bakinye nk'uko uno munsi hogira ikivamwo. U Burundi kandi muri izi nkino zibiri bwakinye bwarabonye ko bukeneye gutumbereza mw'igoli, bisigura ko abasatirizi bategerezwa gutera cane kandi kenshi mw'igoli rya Guinea kugira biyongere amahirwe yo kwinjiza. Aha niho biza gukenerwa ko barutahizamu Saido Berahino na Fiston Abdul Razak bamera magabo bakerekana koko ico bamaze. Berahino akeneye guhindukiza amaso inyuma akibuka ivyo yakorera ikipe West Brom yo mu Bwongereza, aho yaharurwa muri barutahizamu bakomeye mu Bwongereza. Mu gihe bitamworoheye mw'ikipe akinira ubu ya Stock City, urukino rw'uyu munsi rutegerezwa kumubera akaryo ko kwerekana ko agifise umupira w'amaguru mu maraso kandi ko agifise vyinshi vyo kwerekana. Niyumvikana neza na Fiston imbere, barashobora guteza ibibazo ikipe ya Guinea iza gushira abakinyi imbere irondera igitsindo. Kandi mu gihe vyigaraje ko abakinyi b'inyuma no hagati b'u Burundi bahagaze neza, na cane cane umunyegoli Jonathan Nahimana, imyugariro imeze neza. Ikindi coshigikira u Burundi, ni uko Guinea ishira icizere cane ku mukinyi wayo rurangiranwa akina hagati, Naby Keita, ariko mu gihe afise ikibazo c'imvune birashobora kubagora. Ni ukuyita amahirwe kuko ubiravye ni ibintu bigoye cane kiretse amahirwe gusa, ariko nk'uko bikunze kuvugwa, ntakidashoboka mu mukino w'umupira w'amaguru. Ica nkenerwa ca mbere n'uko u Burundi butsinda Guinea, bikaba vyoba vyiza buyitsinze nk'ibitsindo birenga kimwe ariko kandi ntibusubire kwinjizwa. Kubera amakipe mw'ihiganwa ari 24, kandi mu bisanzwe mw'ijonjora hagomba kugenda amakipe abiri ku mugwi, bisigura ko zoca ziba ikipe 12. Ariko umuce w'ijonjora ukenera ikipe 16, bisigura y'uko hari ibibanza bine bizorwanirwa n'amakipe yabaye aya gatatu mu migwi ariko yavyifashemwo neza kurusha ayandi (mu gifaransa bita meilleurs perdants). Aha rero niho u Burundi bushobora kugirira amahirwe kuko buramutse buronse amanota atatu kuri Guinea, mu gihe kandi bumaze kwinjizwa ibitsindo bibiri gusa bukaba kandi bwaritwaye neza mu kibuga, burashobora kuronka kimwe muri ivyo bibanza bine mw'ijonjora. BBC iraza kubashikiriza ibikuru bikuru ry'urukino hagati ya Guinea n'u Burundi kuri Facebook, turangura isaha 18h00.

column2: S Africa: Ramaphosa arashikiriza ivyo azi ku biturire mu gihe ca Zuma
column3: Umukuru wa Afrika y'Epfo Cyril Ramaphosa yahakanye ibineguro vy'uko ataco yakoze ku vyavugwa ku biturire mu gihe c'intwaro c'uwo yasubiriye ku butegets bw'igihugu, Jacob Zuma. Yariko aravuga ivyo azi imbere y'umugwi w'igihugu wiswe Zondo Commission, ukora amatohoza ku biturire mu nzego z'igihugu. Uwo mugwi washinzwe kugirango  ukore amatohoza mu bivugwa ko Zuma yaretse umuryango utunze cane w'aba Gupta ukanyonyeza itunga ry'igihugu igihe yari ku butegetsi, ivyatumye Afrika y'Epfo ihomba miriyaridi 81 z'ama dorari mu kigega ca reta ikongera igatakaza amahirwe atari make. Cyril Ramaphosa yari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu n'umugambwe ANC uri  ku butegetsi ku gice kimwe c'ico kiringo c'ubutegetsi bwa Jacob Zuma. Uwo mukuru w'igihugu w'imyaka 68 yabwiye uwo mugwi ko amaze kumenya ko hari abagirizwa ibiturire yaciye afata ingingo yo kuguma mu nzego z'umugambwe kugira agwanye ibiturire ahereye imbere. Mu nyuma yahavuye yitoza kuba umukuru w'igihugu yemera kuzorwanya ibiturire muri reta no muri ANC. N'amajambo akomeye yashikirijwe na Ramaphosa - amajambo azotuma habazwa ibibazo vyinshi muri uwo mugwi w'amatohoza. Pumza Fihlani, umunyamamkuru wa BBC ari Johannesburg, avuga ko benshi muri ico gihugu biteze ko hari vyinshi bizoja ahabona muri iyo minsi ibiri umukuru w'igihugu azoba ariko arashikiriza ivyo azi. ANC, uvuga ko ari umugambwe  w'uburongozi rusangi, ubu nawo  ushinzwe ijisho. Pumza Fihlani avuga ko abanya-Afrika y'Epfo bifuza kumenya  abazobazwa ibiturire vyaranze imyaka 10 iheze, vyatumye reta idashitsa ivya nkenrwa ku bakene, bituma kandi ubuzi butakara mu mahinguriro amwe amwe. Yaba Zuma, waba n'umuryango w'aba Gupta , bose  barahakana ko ata caha bakoze.

column2: Aliko Dangote na Mohammed Dewji bari mu batunzi ba mbere muri Afrika mu 2021
column3: Nk'uko biri mu kinyamakuru ca Forbes co mu 29021, ubutunzi bw'abagwizatunga 18 bo kuri uyu mugabane bwiyongereye imiriyaridi 4.1 z'amadolari, n'ukuvuga ku bice 12 kw'ijana gusumba mu mwaka uheze. Mu myaka cumi yikurikiranya, Aliko Dangote wo mur Nigeria ni we muntu atunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika, akaba afise ubutunzi buharurwa ku miriyaridi 12.1 z'amadolari. Ubwo butunzi bwiyongereyeko amadolari imiriyaridi 2, ugereranije no mu mwaka uheze bivuye kw'iduga gushika ku bice 30 kw'ijana vy'igiciro c'isima ya Dangote nk'uko vyandikwa na Forbes. Umuntu agira kabiri mu butunzi muri Afrika ni Nassef Sawiris wo mu Misri, ubutunzi bwiwe  bwinshi ni ibice bitandatu kw'ijana y'umutahe afise muri Addidas. Mu kibanza ca gatatu haza Nicky Oppeheimer wo mu gihugu ca Afrika y'epfo, yarazwe umutahe wo muri kompanyi  ya Debeers, akaba yari anahagarariye iyo kompanyi gushika mu mwaka wa 2012 aho yaca agurisha ibice 40 kw'ijana vy'umutahe w'umuryango wiwe kuri kompanyi yimba ubutare ya AngloAmerican ku miriyaridi 5.1 z'amadolari. Uwundi yatunze cane muri uyu mwaka ni umudandaza wundi w'isima, Abdulsamad Rabiu. Imitahe yiwe muri kompanyi ikora isima ya BUA PLC, yashizwe ku rutonde kw'isoko ry'abagurisha imitahe muri Nigeria mu kwezi kwa mbere, yaduze igiciro biteye ubwoba mu kiringo c'uyu mwaka uheze. Vyatumye ubutunzi bwa Rabiu bwongerekana ku bice 77 kw'ijana, gushika ku miriyaridi 5.5 vy'amadolari. Ikintu gikomeye cane n'uko Rabiu n'umwana wiwe bafise ibice 97 kw'ijana vy'iyo kompanyi bagaca batuma imenyekana cane. Umuvugizi w'isoko ry'imitahe muri Nigeria yabwiye Forbes ko ikompanyi y'isima ya BUA  ishitse ku ntambwe ya kabiri - ko Forbes igabanya agaciro k'imitahe mu gihe iyo mitahe yagurishijwe ku banyagihugu ifise agaciro kari muri y'ibice 5 kw'ijana. Umugwizatunga wenyene ava mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika ari kuri urwo rutonde rwa Forbes ni umudandaza wo muri Tanzania, Mohammed Dewji, aza mu kibanza ca 13. Dewji afise ubutunzi bufise agaciro k'imiriyaridi 1.6 z'amadolari, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ico kinyamakuru c'ubutunzi ca Forbes. Urutonde rw'abantu batunze cane kw'isi mu mwaka wa 2021: 1. Aliko Dangote     afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 12.1 $ 2. Nassef Sawiris     afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 8.5  $ 3.  Nicky Openheimer  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 8  $ 4. Johann Rupert  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 7.2  $ 5. Mike Adenuga   afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 6.7  $ 6. Abdulsamad Rabiu  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 5.5  $ 7. Issad Rebrad afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 4.8  $ 8. Naguib Sawiris   afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 3.2  $ 9. Patrice afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 3  $ 10. Koos Bekker afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 2.8  $ Mu gihe bamwe bongereje ubutunzi bwabo ku miriyaridi n'imiriyaridi, ubutunzi bw'abagwizatunga babiri bari ku rutonde rwo mu mwaka wa 2020, bwaragabanutse gushika baje musi y'umuriyaridi umwe. Abapfasoni babiri bonyene ni bo bari ku rutonde rw'abatunzi bakomeye mu mwaka wa 2020, ubu bakorotse ntibakiri kuri urwo rutonde. Nk'uko bivugwa na Forbes, ubutunzi bwa Folonrusho Alakija wo muri Nigeria, afise ikompanyi yo kwimba igitoro bwaramanutse musi y'umuriyaridi umwe kubera igiciro c'ibitoro camanutse. Isabel dos Santos, kuva mu 2013 yari umupfasoni atunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika, ubutunzi bwiwe bwaragabanutse kubera ingingo nyinshi zitandukanye zitumbereye ivyo atunze muri Angola na Portugal. Abo bagwizatunga batunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika bava mu bihugu indwi bitandukanye. Afrika y'Epfo na Misri bifise abagwizatunga batanu, bigakurikirwa na Nigeria ifise batatu hamwe na Maroc ifise babiri.

column2: Malawi: Ishavu kubera ikigongwe ku bategetsi bariye ibiturire
column3: Umushikirizamanza mukuru muri Malawi yagirijwe gukingira abanyaporitike bo muri ico gihugu inyuma yo gutangaza  ikigongwe ku bantu bivye reta  canke bariye ibiturire. Thabo Chakaka-Nyirenda  yavuze ko mu mezi abiri ari imbere umuntu wese azokwemera ko yivye canke yariye igiturire/ruswa atazojanwa mu bucamanza mu gihe azoba yasubije amafaranga yagirizwa. Ivyo bishitse um gihe ibiro vya Malawi bigwanya ibiturire biriko biragerageza gufata umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutaka, Kezzie Msukwa, kubera ubusuma buvugwamwo amafaranga aharurwa muri miriyoni z'amadorari  burimwo umugwizatunga w'umwongereza  aba muri Malawi, Zuneth Sattar. Abo bagabo bompi  bavuga ko ata caha bakoze. Umukuru w'ikigo ca Malawi ca Demokrasi n'iterambere ry'ubutunzi, Sylvester Namiwa, yavuze ko gutangaza ico kigongwe vyerekanye ko uwo mushikirizamanza mukuru yitesheje agaciro ka poritike aca amusaba gutanga imihoho. Amaze kubona ko ariko aranegurwa cane, uwo mushikirizamanza mukuru yahaye ikiganiro abamenyeshamakuru avuga ko ico kigongwe kitazoba cerekeye ibintu vyoze bijanye no kwiba canke n'ibiturire.

column2: Amakuru avugwa ahandi kw'isi kuri Covid-19
column3: Ikompanyi y'u Bushinwa ihingura imiti, Sinopharm, itangaza ko yiteze kuba yakoze urucanco imbere 'yuko uyu mwaka urangira. Umukuru w'iyi kompanyi, Liu Jingzhen, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko uru rucanco ubu rugeze ku ntambwe ya gatatu rugeragezwa kandi ko ruzoshobora kuja kw'isoko imbere 'y'uko ukwa cumi  na kabiri kurangira. Gushika ubu incanco zirenga 200 ziriko zirageragezwa kw'isi, kandi izirenga 20 ubu ziri ku ntambwe yo kugeragerezwa ku bantu. OMS/WHO igabisha ko 'incanco ziriko zigunganywa n'ibihugu bimwe' Iki kiza kiriko kirunyurwa n'uko hari ibihugu biriko birigungana urucanco rwa Covid-19, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi. Mu nama yakorewe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, umukuru wa OMS,  yavuze ati: "Muri kino gihe, igikenewe ni uko ibihugu vyose bikorera hamwe ku nyungu za buri gihugu - mu gihe hazoba hari uwudatekaniwe, nta n'umwe azoba atekaniwe". "Dukeneye kurwanya ko urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwigunganwa n'ibihugu kanaka". Urukino rwa mbere rwo kwugurura ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bufaransa, Ligue 1 rwari rutegekanijwe kuri uyu wa gatanu rwungururijwe ku wa 16 canke 17 z'ukw'icenda. Iyo ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'aho hari abandi bakinyi batatu ba Olympique de Marseille (OM) batangajwe ko banduye umugera, bakaba babaye bane bo muri uyo murwi banduye, vyumvikana ko urukino rwari rutegekanijwe n'umurwi wa Saint Etienne vyabaye ngombwa ko rwunguruzwa. Brezili ni kimwe mu bihugu bibangamiwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus, aho abamaze kuwandura baharurwa mu miliyoni zitatu n'inusu, nayo abarenga 100.000 bamaze gupfa. Umukuru w'ico gihugu Jair Bolsonaro yafashe minenerwe ingaruka z'iki kiza, aho yagifashe n'ibicurane bisanzwe. Mu kiganiro na BBC, icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, Hamilton Mourão, yashigikiye ingendo yafashwe na leta, avuga ko n'aho igihugu catakaje abanyagihugu baco, leta iriko irakora igikorwa gikomeye. Abandanya avuga ko ubugaba buri mu banyabrezili aribwo bwatumye ingingo zo gutandukana zidakurikizwa. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi muri Argentine birengagije ingingo za guma mu rugo ku mugwa mukuru Buenos Aires  baja mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza leta ejo ku wa mbere. No mu bindi bisagara kwari uko. Abari muri iyo myiyerekano bari bafise uburakari, bamwe biyamiriza ingene leta yafashe iki kiza. Leta y'ico gihugu yarafashe ingingo za guma mu rugo kuva ku wa 20 z'ukwa gatatu, ariko zikaba zagiye ziratezurwa mu gihugu hagati, ariko umukuru w'ico gihugu Alberto Fernández akaba yarakomeje izo ngingo ku mugwa mukuru Buenos Aires no mu micungararo yaho gushika ku wa 30 z'uku kw'umunani.

column2: Urutonde rw'imidari ya Olempic Tokyo 2020
column3: Inkino za Olempike 2020 zizoba zirimwo igitigiri kitari bwaboneke c'inkino 33 hamwe n'amahiganwa 339, bibere mu bibanza 42 mu Buyapani. Uru rupapuro, rurimwo urutonde rw'imidari iza iratsindirwa, rurivugurura rwonyene rukerekana igitigiri c'imidari y'inzahabu, umwakaka hamwe n'umujumbu imaze gutsindirwa n'imigwi Olempike ya buri gihugu citabiriye izi nkino. Imidari yambere vyitezwe ko itsindirwa itariki 24 z'ukw'indwi 2021.

column2: Umushikiranganji w’ikigega wa Afrika y’Epfo asaba ko urucuruza rw’urumogi rwemerwa n’amategeko
column3: Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca leta ya Afrika y'Epfo,  Tito Mboweni, asaba leta y'ico gihugu ko urucuruza rw'urumogi rwemerwa n'amategeko kugira ngo amakori yiyongere. Yatangaje ivyo aciye ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, aho yamenyesheje ko ico kibazo azogishikiriza mu nama y'abashikiranganji. Kuri urwo rubuga rwiwe, yashizeko n'isanamu yerekana ingene ico giterwa gitera gikura. Amategeko ya Afrika y'Epfo yari asanzwe avuga ko ukugurisha urumogi, uko rwoba rungana kwose biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Hagati aho, mu mwaka wa 2017, ico gihugu caremereye abantu gukoresha urumogi mu mihana iwabo, ariko nticarekuye kururima canke kurugurisha. Mu bihugu vyinshi vya Afrika, harimwo n'u Burundi n'u Rwanda, kurima, gukoresha canke kudandaza urumogi ntivyemewe n'amategeko kubera rufatwa nk'ikiyayuramutwe. Hagati aho, hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe birukoresha ku rugero runini. Muri ivyo harimwo igihugu ca Lesotho gisanzwe gikikujwe na Afrika y'Epfo, aho urumogi rurimwa ku rugero runini cane, rukaba rwemewe mu vyo ubuvuzi gusa. Mu myaka ya 2000, amakuru yavuga ko ibice 70% vy'urumogi rwagurishwa muri Afrika y'Epfo rwava muri ico gihugu ca Lesotho. Abarimyi bo mu gihugu ca Lesotho basanzwe barima urumogi mu ntumbero yo kurukoresha mu mihana iwabo, hamwe no kurugurisha hanze kubera ubukene basanzwe babamwo. Usanga abanyagihugu bato bato barima urumogi bakarurimana n'ibindi biterwa nk'ibigori kugira ngo barushore muri Afrika y'Epfo. Igihugu ca Zimbabwe naco nyene giherutse kwemera ko urumogi rushobora kurimwa rukimburwa muri ico gihugu, ni inyuma y'aho cemereye ikoreshwa ryarwo muvyo ubuvuzi n'ubushakashatsi mu 2018. Zambia yoyo iherutse gutangaza ko ubu vyemewe n'amategeko gutunganya urumogi no kururungika mu mahanga ku mpamvu z'urudandaza n'ubuvuzi. Leya y'ico gihugu yafashe ico cemezo mu nama yayo yabaye ku wa 04 z'ukwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze nk'uko vyatangajwe na Dora Siliya avugira leta. Ikindi gihugu gikoresha urumogi ku rugero runini cane ni Korea y'Uburaruko, aho mbere n'amashirahamwe ya reta aja kurugurisha mu bindi bihugu kugira baronke amahera y'agaciro. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko bitazwi neza ko hoba hariho amategeko abuza ikoreshwa ry'urumogi, kandi ico gihugu ntikibona ko ikoreshwa ry'urumogi ari ukurenga ku mategeko.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Messi, Gordon, Kante, Martinez, Pickford, Juranovic, Saka
column3: Everton iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n’umukinyi wo ku ruhande umwongereza Anthony Gordon w’imyaka 21 kugira ngo Chelsea ntibandanye imwirondeza. (Telegraph) Umukinyi wo hagati w’Ubufaransa, N'Golo Kante w’imyaka 31 ariko arasatira kugira ngo arabe ko yokwimukira muri Barcelona igihe amasezerano afitaniye na Chelsea azoba aragiye mu ci riza, ibiganiro vy’intangamarara bikaba bigeze kure. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Paris St-Germain igiye gutangura ibiganiro n’umusatirizi wa Argentina Lionel Messi w’imyaka 35, inyuma y’ibikorwa bidasanzwe yakoreye mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n’uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza. (RMC iciye kuri Mail) Bayern Munich iripfuza kugura umunyegori wa Argentina na Aston Villa  Emiliano Martinez w’imyaka 30. (MediaFoot – mu gifaransa) Ariko umunyegori wa  Borussia Monchengladbach n’Ubuswisi Yann Sommer, w’imyaka 34 na we ari mu biganiro na Bayern Munich vyo kumugura inyuma y’aho Umudagi Manuel Neuer avunikiye ukuguru. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Real Madrid Carlo Ancelotti yitandukanije n’ibivugwa ko Brezili imukeneye, agashimangira ko yipfuza kuguma muri uno murwi uherutse gutahukana igikombe c’ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (European champions). (Rai Radio 1 iciye kuri Mail) Kuri uno wa kabiri, umusatirizi w’Ubufaransa Kylian Mbappé w’imyaka 24 ashobora gutangaza mu kanya kari imbere ko azova muri PSG uno mwaka w’inkino urangiye, Real Madrid ikaba imwipfuza. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Barcelona iripfuza kugura umukinyi w’inyuma wa Celtic na Croatia Josip Juranovic w’imyaka 27,  ariko ikaba imurwanira na Atletico Madrid hamwe n’imirwi yo muri Premier League. (Sky Sports) Umukuru wa Napoli Cristiano Giuntoli yankiye Newcastle amahirwe yo kugura umusatirizi wa Georgia Khvicha Kvaratskhelia w’imyaka 21. (Sport Express, iciye kuri Fabrizio Romano) Tottenham iriko irihweza ingene yoronka umunyegori wa Everton,  umwongereza Jordan Pickford w’imyaka 28  nk’uwushobora gusubirira umufaransa Hugo Lloris w’imyaka 35. (Football Insider) Arsenal igiye gutangura ibiganiro n’umusatirizi wayo, umwongereza Bukayo Saka w’imyaka 21, mu “ndwi n’amezi ari imbere” mu ntumbero yo kumuha ayandi masezerano. (Caught Offside) Uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Real Madrid Zinedine Zidane ashobora gusubirira umufaransa mugenziwe Didier Deschamps nk’umumenyereza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubufaransa inyuma y’aho butsindiwe na Argentina mu rukino rwa nyuma rw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose. (Mundo Deportivo – mu ki Espagnol) Arsenal na Leeds yinjiye mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Brezili Matheus Cunha,w’imyaka 23, mu gihe Atletico Madrid iriko irategura kumugurisha. (Goal) Chelsea irafise icizere ko ishobora kuronka umukinyi w’inyuma wa RB Leipzig na Croatia Josko Gvardiol w’imyaka 20, n’aho izi ko hari umukeba amurondera. (90 min) Chelsea kandi iri mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umudagi Youssoufa Moukoko w’imyaka 18 mu kwa mbere. (Give Me Sport) Inter Milan iriko irihweza nimba yogura uwahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati wa Watford Roberto Pereyra w’imyaka 31, igihe amasezerano y’uyu munya-Argentina afitaniye na Udinese azoba arangiye. (Fichajes – mu ki Espagnol) Uwahoze akina inyuma muri West Ham na QPR  Anton Ferdinand avuga ko yari kuba yaragiye gukinira Barcelona ariko ko uwahoze ari umumenyereza w’aba Hammers (West Ham ) Alan Pardew atamwemereye. (TalkSPORT)

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru ku wa gatanu 05.07.2019: Maguire, Fernandes, Niguez, Marcelo, Lukaku, Gomez
column3: Umukinyi Bruno Fernandes arashashaye cane kwimukira muri Manchester United. Bitegekanijwe ko uyo mukinyi wo hagati w'imyaka 24 asanzwe akina muri Sporting Lisbon no mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal afata urugendo rumushikana Old Trafford gupimwa kwa muganga. (Sport Witness) Man U irarondera kandi umunyegori wa Atletico Madrid Saul Niguez w'imyaka 24 kugira asubirire Paul Pogba mu gihe uyu mukinyi w'umufaransa w'imyaka 26 yoramuka avuye i Old Trafford. (Express) Manchester City ntiyiteguye kuriha amahera asabwa na Leicester ku mukinyi Harry Maguire  w'imyaka 26, akaba ari amahirwe kuri Manchester United yo gushobora kugura uyo mukinyi mpuzamakungu w'umwongereza. (90Min) Arsenal nta mahirwe bagize y'ukuronka umunyegori w'umudagi w'imyaka 21, Markus Schubert, yafashe ingingo yo kuja gukinira Schalke avuye muri Dynamo Dresden. (Sport1) Arsenal bariko bakora hasi hejuru kugira bagure Marcelo inyuma y'aho uyo mukinyi w'umunya Brezili asavye ko yova muri Real Madrid. (Sport - via Metro) Arsenal yatanguye kuvugana n'umurwi Gremio kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Argentine, Walter Kannemann w'imyaka 28. (Globo Esporte - via Metro) Inter Milan biriko birayigora kugura umusatirizi wa Manchester United akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ububirigi, Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 26. (Sun) Uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Tottenham, Ossie Ardiles, avuga ko kugerageza kubuza Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27 kugenda ari "uguta umwanya". (Talksport - via Goal) West Ham United iriko irarwanira na Valencia umusatirizi wa  Celta Vigo Maxi Gomez w'imyaka 22 akinira kandi n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Uruguay . (Sky Italia - via Inside Futbol) Leicester umutima wayo wose uri ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Burnley, James Tarkowski, ari nka hamwe Harry Maguire yokwimukira muri Man United. Hagati aho, Leicester izomurwanira na Wolves nayo nyene yipfuza uyo mukinyi. (Birmingham City) Man United iriteguriye kugiriranira amasezerano mashasha n'umunyegori David de Gea akaba yohembwa imiliyoni 85 z'amapawundi milioni 85, aho yoronka umushahara w'ibihumbi 350  ku ndwi. (Star) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Croatia, Dejan Lovren ashobora kuva muri Liverpool akaja muri AC Milan yipfuza cane uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 30, ikaba yoba iriko irategura amahera ngo imushikane i San Siro. (Mirror) Manchester City na Barcelona iriko irarwanira umukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus,  Joao Cancelo w'imyaka 25, akaba kandi akinira n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal. (Sport English - via Mirror) Frank Lampard yifotoreje mu kibuga ca Stamford Bridge aho yakirwa nk'umumenyereza mushasha wa Chelsea. (Mail) Arsenal yugururiwe inzira y'ukugura umusatirizi w'umunyabrezili akinira Barcelona, Malcom w'imyaka 22, ariko ico irondera ahanini  kukaba ari ukugura umusatirizi wa Cote d'Ivoire Wilfred Zaha  w'imyaka 26 akina muri Crystal Palace. (Mirror) Aba Gunners bariko bategura imiliyoni 70 bashaka gutanga kuri Zaha, n'aho Palaceyoyo ivuga ko uyo mukinyi afise agaciro kangana n'imiliyoni 80 z'amapawundi. (Sky Sports) Tottenham yahagaritse ibiganiro vyayihuza na Real Betis ku mukinyi wo hagati akomoka muri Argentina, Giovani Lo Celso w'imyaka 24 inyuma y'aho iyo mirwi inaniranye kwumvikana ku mahera. (Sky Sports)

column2: B﻿urundi: Umwami yashingurwa gute?
column3: Urupfu n’ishingurwa vy’Umwamikazi w’Ubwongereza Elizabeth II vyatumye turondera kwibuka ingene abami bo mu karere - na cane cane bo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda - bashingurwa. Mu Burundi, iyo umwami yatanze - ntibavuga ko yapfuye - haba imigirwa myinshi ijanye n’urupfu rwiwe. Ariko abami babiri ba nyuma b’Uburundi ntibayigiriwe. Mu Burundi intwaro y'ubwami yarangiye mu 1966 igisirikare gifashe ubutegetsi kigashinga intwaro  ya repuburika. Umwami wa nyuma - Ntare V (Wa Gatanu) Ndizeye Charles - , nta wuzi aho yahambwe inyuma yo kwicwa mu buryo butazwi aho yari apfungiwe mw’ibohero rya Gitega mu 1972. Se wiwe, Mwambutsa IV (Wa Kane) Bangiricenge, yahambwe muri Suisse iyo yapfiriye mu 1977. Umwigisha w'ikirundi, amateka, n'imico kama y'abarundi,  Denis Bukuru,  avuga ko abantu basanzwe bakoresha ijambo “gutanga” bashaka kuvuga ugupfa kw’umwami,  ariko ngo umwami yashobora gupfa  mu buryo bune butandukanye, n'amajambo yo kubivuga agatandukana. Umwigisha Denis Bukuru avuga ko mu "gucanira abana b'ingoma" aho “umwami bamwubakira ikirwa (uburiri), bakamuha ubuki bwo kunywa, bagaca bamwubakirako inzu itagira urugi, bagaca bayiturira. Vyashika gake ariko vyarigeze kuba”. Ibwami haba hariho umubitsi (umuntu ajejwe kubika canke kumenyesha ko hari uwapfuye). Umwami atanze (apfuye), umubitsi yaca afata inzira ava aho umwami yatangiye agenda arasemerera  amenyesha iyo nkuru gushika ishikire Abiru. Abiru baba mw’ishamba ryari mu makomine ya Muruta na Kabarorore muri Kayanza y’ubu,  ari naho bajana "kubikira" (gushingura)  abami bapfuye. Abiru bamenye inkuru baca baza gutora Ingogo (ikiziga/umurambo) y’umwami bakayijana hamwe n’ibintu vyose vyari ku kirimba aho yatangiye (inka, ibisabo, ivyimburwa biri mu bigega ), bigaherekeza ingogo. Muri ico gihe ababa ku kirimba bose baba bahunze. Bagaruka ari uko Abiru bamaze gutwara Ingogo y’umwami. Nta waherekeza ingogo y’umwami. Abiru bayitwaye aho baca hose abantu baca bahunga n’ivyabo vyose bakagaruka ar’uko Abiru barenganye. Ikindi  kimenyetso n’uko ahahora havuga ingoma ya Karyenda ku kirimba haca havuga iyitwa Hangarizo, ikamenyesha ko habaye guhangaza (n’ukuvuga kugandarira umwami). Abiru bashikanye ingogo y’umwami muri iryo shamba rya Muruta/Kabarore, bayubakira urusenge, bakayishirako, bagacana akariro gake munsi yayo gushika ikiziga gisanguke. Umwigisha Bukuru avuga ko muri iyo migirwa ibivugwa n’ivyakorwa bitandukanye. Mu bivugwa n’uko umwami atahambwa (atashirwa mw'ivu, kuko ngo isi ntiyari gusubira kumera). Umuganwakazi Esther Kamatari avuga ati: “Umwami ntiyahambwa. Yaserukira Imana, kandi ntawuhamba Imana”. Ariko mu vyakorwa, umwigisha Denis Bukuru avuga ati: "Hasigaye amagufa gusa , Abiru barayegeranya bakayahamba, imva y’umwami ikitwa inganzo”. Umwami yapfuye abantu bavuga ko ijuru ryakorotse. Ubuzima bwaca bumera nk’ubuhagaze mu gihugu. Umwigisha Denis Bukuru avuga ati: ”Nta mugabo yasubira kuryama ku buriri. Nta mpfizi yasubira kwegera inka, baca bazitandukanya (nta nka yasubira kwima). "Abagore baca bakura imiringa n’ikindi cose kiranga ugushaza, n’uwo yanse kuvamwo yaca ayifukisha igishambara gisa nabi". "Nta muriro wasubira kwatswa mu nzu". Igihe co kugandara camara hagati y’indwi (iyinga) zitatu gushika ku minsi 40. Ico kiringo carangira ku munsi umwami mushasha yaba yimye.

column2: Boeing na Airbus zigabisha US ku ngorane zishobora guterwa na 5G
column3: Abakuru b'ikompanyi zibiri za mbere rutura mu gukora indege basavye reta ya Amerika gutevya gutangura gukoresha ubuhinga bushasha bw'ama terefone bwa 5G. Mw'ikete, abategetsi ba Boeing na Airbus bagabisha ko ubwo buhinga bushobora kugira "ingaruka mbi ku bikorwa vy'indege." Amakenga yari amaze gushikirizwa ko ubuhinga bwa 5G bushobora guhungabanya ivyuma vy'ubuhinga bwa electronic vyo mu ndege. Ibihangange vya telecoms (ubuhinga bwo gutumatumanako)  muri Amerika AT&T na Verizon  vyitezwe gutanguza ikoreshwa rya 5G itariki 5 za Nzero (ukwezi kwa  mbere). Abakuru ba Boeing na Airbus Dave Calhoun na Jeffrey Knittel, mw'ikete barungikiye hamwe uwujejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu muri reta ya Amerika Pete Buttigieg, bamubwiye bati: "Uguhungabanya kwa 5G gushobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bw'indege bwo gukora mu mutekano". Iryo kete ryishingiye ku bushakashatsi bwakozwe n'umugwi w'ubucuruzi Airlines for Amerika rwatoye ko iyo amategeko y'urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe indege (FAA)  aba yagiye mu ngiro mu 2019, hafi ingendo 345.000 z'indege z'ingenzi  na 5.400 zitwara imizigo ziba zaracerewe, zarahinduriwe inzira canke zitabaye zikiba. Igisata c'indege n'urwego rwa Amerika rw'indege (FAA) barashikirije amakenga ko 5G ishobora guhungabanya ivyuma  vyo mu ndege nk'amaradiyo y'ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere. Itangazo rya Airbus rivuga ko "Airbus na Boeing bakoranye n'abandi bafise uruhara mu gisata c'indege muri Amerika kugira batahure ihungabana rishobora guterwa na 5G ku vyuma bifata ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere (altmeters)". "Iinteguro y'ingene ingorane zishoboka zoba nke cane ku ndege yarashikirijwe igisata ca Amerika kijejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu kugira yigwe." Uku kwezi, urwego FAA rwaragabishije ko uguhungabanya ibindi vyuma guturutse kuri 5G gushobora gutuma indege zihushishwa inzira, ruvuga ko ruzotanga amakuru menshi imbere y'uko ubwo buhinga butangura gukoreshwa itariki 5 Nzero. Muri Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), kompanyi za AT&T na Verizon  zarasibije gutanguza urudandazwa rwa 5G ikiringo c'ukwexzi gushika itariki 5 Nzero zica zifata ingingo zo kwiyubara zo kugabanya ko haba ihungabanya. Amakompanyi yo mu gisata c'indege avuga ko izo ngingo zidahagije, Boeing na Airbus zikavuga ko zaciye zitanga integuro yazo yo kugabanya imishwarara iturutse ku bikoresho vyo gutumatumanako imbere no mu micungararo y'ibibuga vy'indege no mu bindi bibanza nkoramutima. Ku ndwi iheze, umukuru wa United Airlines Scott Kirby yavuze ko ingingo za FAA zerekeye 5G zizobuza ikoreshwa z'ibipimo z'aho indege igeze mu kirere ku bibuga bishika 40 mu vya mbere binini muri Amerika. Kompanyi ya Amerika y'ubuhinga budaciye mu ntsinga CTIA ivuga ko 5G ata ngorane n'imwe iteye akagiriza igisata c'indege gutera ubwoba no kwerekana ukutariko uko ibintu  bimeze. Umukuru wa CTIA  Meredith Attwell Baker yavuze mu kwezi guheze ati: "Kuducereza bizogira ingaruka mbi ikomeye. Kurindira uwundi mwaka bizotuma habura miriyaridi 500 z'amadorari mw'izamuka ry'ubutunzi, mu gihe igihugu cacu kiriko kirivyukiranya  congera ciyubaka inyuma y'ingaruka za Covid".

column2: Burundi : 17 bapfunzwe bikekwa gushaka kunyaga abanyagihugu mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga
column3: Abantu 17 bo mw'ishirahamwe Crowd1 ricuruza amafaranga ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi bari mu minwe y'igipolisi bagirizwa gukora inama y'ishirahamwe ritazwi n'amategeko. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'umutekano yabwiye Radio Isanganiro ko abo barobowe mu bandi barenga 300 bari bafashwe bari muri iyo nama ejo ku wa kabiri ku mugoroba n'igipolisi c'u Burundi. Pierre Nkurikiye avugira ubwo bushikiranganji avuga y'uko abo bantu bafashwe n'igipolisi bari mu nama muri zone Rohero mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Avuga ko abari mu minwe y'igipolisi ari abariko bakorwako amatohoza kubijanye n'uko  ishirahamwe Crowd1 ryoba rifise intumbero yo kwiba abanyagihugu. Haciye amezi make ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, igabishije Abarundi kwirinda urudandazwa rw'amafaranga rukorwa biciye mu mihora ngurukanabumenyi bita 'monnaies virtuelles' canke crypto-monnaies. Mw'itangazo yasohoye mu kw'umunani umwaka uheze, BRB yavuze ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga yo kuri iyo mihora nka Bitcoin, Ether, Litecoin, Onecoin,  Fahari Cash Coin, Ello Cash Coin rutemewe. Jean Ciza, umukuru w'iyo banki, yavuze ko ayo mafaranga akoreshwa mu buryo butagira amategeko bwisunga ahantu na hamwe kw'isi, kuko ngo nta banki n'imwe y'igihugu kw'isi yose irayemera. Ati: "Ivyo bituma ibikorwa muri ayo mafaranga bisa n'ivyo ubusuma…" Abatari bacye muri iki gihe barinjira mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga mu buryo butandukanye leta z'ibihugu zimwe zivuga ko rutemewe.

column2: Kenya: Evariste Ndayishimiye asaba abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe mu Burundi
column3: Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye atera akamo abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe yabo mu Burundi  kuko ngo mu myaka ibiri canke itatu iri imbere bashobora kuzoba bacerewe. Agishika muri Kenya, yaciye aca mu burengero bw'ico gihugu mu gisagara ca Kisumu, aho prezida n'abagize reta ya Kenya bari, bitegurira guhimbaza umusi mukuru wa Madaraka Day kuri uyu wa kabiri. Mu kiganiro bahaye abamenyeshamakuru, abakuru b'ibihugu Uhuru Kenyatta na Evariste Ndayishimiye bashimagije umubano mwiza, gufashanya muri politike, ubutunzi, gutsimbataza amahoro n'ishaka bafise ryo kubitsimbataza. Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko amaze kuza muri Kenya kenshi, ariko ko ari ubwa mbere ashitse mu gisagara ca Kisumu. Yagize ati:"...Ntangajwe n'ubwiza hamwe n'iterambere nsanze muri kino gisagara." Yavuze ko Uburundi bumaze gutera intambwe mu mahoro n'umutekano, ko butakiri ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bitarangwamwo amahoro muri Onu, ashimira prezida Kenyatta ko "we ubwiwe yabigizemwo uruhara." Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ubu, Uburundi buriko burashira inguvu cane mu guteza imbere ubutunzi, aranashima ko uguhanahana ibidandazwa hagati ya Kenya n'Uburundi bigenda vyiyongera. Yvuze ati:"Ndateye akamo abagwizatunga bo muri Kenya kuza mu Burundi kukoni co gihe ciza, kurindira imyaka ibiri canke itatu, mushobora gusanga mwacerewe." Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi kandi yatumiye mugenzi we wa Kneya Uhuru Kenyatta kugendera Uburundi.

column2: Burundi: Rusansuma y’abashomeri, bamwe barizeye akazi abandi bati ‘nta gishasha’
column3: Igikorwa catanguye ku wa gatandatu uheze co kwandika urwaruka rwahejeje amashure rudafise akazi kizobandanya kubera ubwinshi bwabo, ni mu gihe vyari vyitezwe ko kirangira kw'isaha zitandatu ejo ku wa mbere. Mu minsi itatu, leta y'u Burundi ivuga ko yashoboye kwandika abashika 245.000, ariko kandi ko gushika ejo ku wa mbere hari hakiri benshi bakirindiriye kwandikwa. Abandikwa bavuga ko babazwa vyinshi harimwo ibijanye n'amashure bize hamwe impamyabushobozi bafise, igihe bayizonkeye, n'ibindi. Ntaco babwirwa uretse ko ari rusansuma rw'abashomeri bariko barakora. Bamwe bavuga ko ibi nyene vyabaye no mu myaka myinshi bandikwa buri mwaka, bakabona ko ata gishasha, ariko ubu bamwe barizigiye ko leta ishobora kubafasha. Igihe arahiza abashikiranganji ba leta yiwe, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yatangaje ko yiyemeje gushigikira urwaruka "cane cane bamwe bafise impapuro z'umutsindo ariko batararonka ico bakora". Umwe mu bavuganye na BBC, hampande y'amashure n'impamyabushozobi, avuga ko yabajijwe ubwoko bw'akazi yipfuza canke umutahe abona yoshobora gukoresha mu gihe yoba afise umugambi wo kurangura. Mu gihe abiyandikisha ari abahejeje amashure bakirondera akazi nk'uko binavugwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, uyu mushomeri avuga ko ataco babwirwa kuri iki. Ati: "Nta wuzi ko bagomba kuduha akazi, canke imitahe, gushika ubu turarindiriye". Uwundi mukenyezi atipfuje kuvugwa amazina yavuganye na BBC, avuga ko ico babwiwe conyene ari uko hariko hakorwa rusansuma y'abashomeri. Ati: "Jewe sinibaza ko ari akazi bashaka kuduha, kuko ivy'akazi baheruka gukoresha ikibazo, abaronse bararonse. Ariko baratubwira ko bibaye ngombwa tuzoja hamwe hanyuma bakaduha imitahe tugakorera hamwe". Uyu afise icizere gito kuko ngo sibwo bwa mbere yandikwa kuva ahejeje amashure. Ati: "Nama mbona batwanditse bigaherera iyo, turamenyereye kwiyandikisha. "Kuva umwaka wa mbere mpejeje amashure mu 2014 nta mwaka urengana batatwanditse. Maze imyaka itandatu nguma nandikwa, ariko nta cahindutse". Hagati aho, aremeza ko iri yandikwa ry'ubu ritandukanye n'iryari risanzwe rihari afatiye kuvyo yabajijwe. Yongerako ati: "Mfise icizere ko nzohava nkaronka umutahe kuko muvyo bambajije barambajije umutahe noba nkeneye kugira nshobore kurangura umugambi wo kwiteza imbere". BBC yashatse kuronka insiguro kuri kino gikorwa kimaze iminsi ine co kwandika abahejeje amashure ariko batigeze baronka akazi, uruhande rwa leta ntaco rwashimye gutangaza bikiriko birakorwa. Hagati aho, mw'ijambo ryiwe arahiza leta nshasha Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko mu migambi yiwe itandatu yihutirwa harimwo kuzamura urwaruka, cane cane abahejeje amashure batararonka akazi. Bwana Ndayishimiye yagize ati:"Abo nibo cane cane nshaka ko bazoba intwazangabo zirongora abandi mu rugamba rwo kugwanya ubukene ku rwego rw'intango". "Aho bukera tugira dushware mu makomine yose agize Uburundi, tuje kwegeranya urwo rwaruka mu kibiri, batwereke imigambi bafise, bashaka gukora. "Aho tuzosanga batoye kworora tuzobafasha kworora, aho tuzosanga batoye uwundi mugambi, tuzowubafasha". Ikiriho ni uko biboneka ko abashomeri biyandikisha ari benshi cane mu gihugu, nk'uko vyemezwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere ku rubuga rwabwo rwa Twitter. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ku munsi wa mbere gusa batanguye ico gikorwa handitswe abashika 45.000. Mu gihe gushika ku mugoroba w'ejo ku wa mbere, abashika 245.000 ari bo bari bamaze kwandikwa mu gihugu cose, abandi barenga 35,000 bari baraye bategerejwe kwandikwa.

column2: Kenya: abatemera Imana basaba ko amasengesho mu mashure avanwaho
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'abahakanyi muri Kenya ryandikiye umushikiranganji w'indero w'iki gihugu rimusaba kubuza ivyo gusenga mu mashure ya reta imbere y'uko ibibazo vya reta bitangura. Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko guhatira abanyeshure gusenga ari uguhonyanga agateka kabo. Amashure ya reta muri Kenya afise umugenzo wo gutegura amasengesho imbere y'uko abanyeshure batangura ibibazo vya reta. Muri ino ndwi, amashure yateye akamo abavyeyi ko bokwifatanya nayo muri ano masengesho  yamaze kuba nk'umugenzo kugira ngo abana babo bitegurire neza ibibazo. Muri uru rwandiko, havuga ngo: "Abanyagihugu ba Kenya benshi bari muri ano mashure ya reta aho ivy'amasengesho ari itegeko". Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko abana bakwiye guhabwa uburenganzira bo nyene bwo kwifatira ingingo ku bijanye n'idini.

column2: U﻿kraine ibandanya gushora intete n'aho Uburusiya bwikuye mu masezerano
column3: Ikigo gihagarariwe na UN/ONU kigenzura ingene intete zishorwa ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura ki vuga ko u﻿bundi bwato butatu bwahagurutse muri Ukraine ku musi wa kabiri, n'aho uburusiya bwafashe ingingo yo kwivana muri ayo amasezerano. I﻿co kigo kivuga ko ubwo bwato 'bwemerewe kugenda na Ukraine, Turkia na Onu, mu gihe uburusiya na bwo "bwabimenyeshejwe". K﻿u musi wa mbere, amato 12 atwaye amatone 354.500 y'ibifungurwa yarahagurutse muri Ukraine. U﻿burusiya bwahagaritse gushigikira ayo masezerano ku musi wa gatandatu, bwagiriza Ukraine gukoresha inzira ubwato bucamwo mu gutera  amato yabwo y'intambara. O﻿nu ivuga ko ata bwato na bumwe bwariko buraca muri iyo nzira muri iryo joro. U﻿kraine ntiyigeze yemanga kugira uruhara muri ico gitero ca Crimme  - izinga rya Ukraine riri mu bumanuko ryigaruriwe n'Uburusiya mu 2014. P﻿rezida wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yagiriza Uburusiya "gukangisha inzara amakungu" - ivyo Uburusiya buhakana. I﻿co kigo gifise icicaro I Istanbul ntikiramenyesha ivyo ubwo bwato butatu bwavuye muri Ukraine ku wa kabiri bwikoreye. U﻿burusiya nta co buravuga kuri ivyo. U﻿muzigo wo kuri uyu wa mbere ni wo wambere munini utwaye ku musi umwe kuva ayo masezerano yo gutwara intete atanguye gushirwa mu bikorwa, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuvugizi w'ubutegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Odesa aho yasubiwemwo na Reuters. Ubwo butegetsi bwongeyeko ko bumwe mu bwato butwaye amatoni 40.000 y'intete bwari bugenewe igihugu ca Ethiopia, aho "hashobora gutera amapfa." I﻿nyuma y'aho Uburusiya butereye Ukraine mu kwezi kwa kabiri, amato yabwo yaciye yugariza ibivuko vya Ukraine vyo ku kiyaga cirabura, bwugaranirayo imiliyoni 20 z'intete zigenewe gutwarwa hagati mu gihugu, harimwo n'ibindi bifungurwa nk'ibigori n'amavuta y'ibihoke. A﻿riko mu kwezi kw'indwi harabonetse amasezerano hagati y'Uburusiya na Ukraine bafashijwe na Turkia na Onu, bituma hashobora gusubira gushorwa intete ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura. A﻿riko ku musi wa mbere, prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yavuze ko ayo masezerano yahagaritswe , avuga ko ari kubera ibitero "vyinshi" vy'indege zitagira umudereva ku mato yabwo ku bivuko vya Sevastopol aho yavuze ko Ukraine ibifisemwo uruhara. Y﻿avuze ko hategerezwa kubanza kubaho umutekano wo mu mazi, ko kwubahiriza amasezerano yo gushora intete bikimeze uko koba ari ukwigerezako. M﻿w'ijambo ryiwe ku mboneshakure, prezida Putin yagize ati:"Ukraine itegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ko ubwato butwara abantu butazogeramigwa." U﻿kraine ntiyemeje ko yagize uruhara muri ivyo bitero, ikavuga ko Uburusiya bwateguye kuva kera kwivana muri ayo masezerano mpuzamakungu, mu kugira icitwazo ivyo bitero. U﻿muvugizi w'ibiro vya prezida w'Uburusiya, Dmitry Peskov yagize ati:"Mu gihe Uburusiya buvuga ko bidashoka kwemanga umutekano wo muri ako karere, ayo masezerano aragoye gushirwa mu bikorwa, yafashe iyindi ntumbero - harimwo ukwigerezako kurengeje. U﻿kwikura muri ayo masezerano kw'Uburusiya kwatewe ivyatsi na Amerika, yavuze ko ico ico gihugu "kiriko kirakoresha imfungurwa nk'ikigwanisho". J﻿oseph Borrell ajejwe imigenderanire y'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya EU n'amakungu, yateye akamo Uburusiya kwisubirako, avuga ko kubuza urudandazwa rw'intete n'umwavu bishobora gutera ikibazo c'inzara kw'isi. U﻿wuserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika yamiriye kure ivyo vyagiriji ko igihugu ciwe kiriko kiratuma haba inzara kw'isi, yemeza ko ari akarenganyo kunebagura igihugu ciwe. U﻿burusiya bwafashe iyo ngingo mu gihe bwemeza ko bwaguye igikorwa co gukura abantu mu karere bwigaruriye ka Kherson, n'aho bwari bwavuze, mu mpera z'iyinga, bwari bwarangije ico gikorwa.

column2: Afghanistan: Aba Taliban bagiye kugarukana ibihano vyo kunyonga no guca ibihimba vy'umubiri
column3: Uwahoze arongoye igipolisi c'idini azwi cane mu ba Taliban atangaza ko muri Afghanistan hagiye kugarukanwa ibihano ruhasha nko kunyonga no guca ibihimba vy'umubiri muri ico gihugu. Mullah Nooruddin Turabi, ubu arongoye amabohero yabwiye ikinyamakuru AP ko "igihano co guca ibihimba vy'umubiri ari nkenerwa ku mutekano w'igihugu". Avuga ko ibi bihano bishobota kutazotangirwa ku mugaragaro nk'uko vyari bimeze ku butegetsi bwa mbere bw'aba Taliban mu myaka ya 1990. Ariko ariyamiriza  uburakari bwatewe n'ibihano vyabo  vyo kunyonga muri kahise: "Nta n'umwe azotubwiriza ingene amategeko yacu ategerezwa kumera".
