Kuva bashitse ku butegetsi muri Afghanistan ku wa 15 z'ukwa munani, aba Taliban bagumye bemerera abantu ko bazoshinga ubutegetsi bworoshe gusumba ubwa mbere. Ariko hamaze kuba ibikorwa bitari bike  vyo guhohotera kiremwamuntu mu gihugu cose. Ku wa kane, ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch ryagabishije ko aba Taliban muri Herat bariko "barahiga buhongo abagore bakomeye, babuza abagore kuva mu mihana, banabategeka kwitwikira umubiri wose". Ni inyuma y'aho mu kwa munani ishirahamwe Amnesty International ritangarije ko aba Taliban ari bo bishe abantu icenda bo mu nkehwa z'aba Hazara. Ico gihe, umunyamabanga mukuru wa Amnesty Agnès Callamard yavuze ko "ubwo bwicanyi bw'agahomerabunwa bwibutsa kahise kabi k'aba Taliban, hamwe n'isura mbi y'ubutegetsi bw'aba Taliban bushobora kugarukana". Imisi mike imbere y'uko aba Taliban bafata Kabul, umucamanza w'umu Taliban mu karere ka Balkh, Haji Badruddin, yabwiye umunyamakuru wa BBC Secunder Kermani ko yari ashigikiye ishirwa mu ngiro ry'itegeko ruhasha rya Islam. Badruddin ati: "Biratomoye muri Sharia, kuri abo bose bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina batarubaka, yaba umukobwa canke umuhungu, igihano ni ibikomo ijana akubitirwa ku mugaragaro". "Ariko iyo ari uwubatse afashwe arenga ibigo, uyo ategerewa kwicishwa amabuye...nayo ku wufashwe ari kwiba, naho nyene biratomoye, ategerezwa gucibwa ibikonjo". Ibi vyiyumviro ni vyo biri mu mitwe y'abanya Afghanistan bagendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vya kera. Hagati aho, uyu muhari uriko urihweza ikiruta ikindi hagati yo kugendera kuri ibi vyiyumviro vya kera no kuraba ukuntu bokorana n'amakungu - arico gituma kuva bashitse ku butegetsi aba Taliban bagerageza kwerekana ishusho y'ubwitonzi. Turabi, azwi cane mu gutanga ibihano vy'ubugome ku bantu bafashwe bariko bumviriza imiziki itari iyo guhayagiza Imana canke bamoye ubwanwa mu myaka ya 1990, yabwiye AP ko, n'aho ibi bihano ruhasha bizobandanya, uyu muhari ushobora kuzokwemerera abanyagihugu gutunga amateleviziyo, amaterefone ngendanwa no kuraba amareresi. Turabi - ubu asanzwe ari ku bihano yafatiwe na ONU kubera ivyaha vyo muri kahise - avuga ko ubu inama nshikiranganji y'aba Taliban iriko irihweza nimba ibihano bikwiye gutangirwa ku mugaragaro, kandi ko bazoshiraho amategeko abigenga. Mu myaka ya 1990, ibihano vy'urupfu vyatangirwa ku mugaragaro ku kibuga c'umupira i Kabul, canke mu bibuga bisanzwe vyagutse vy'umusigiti wa Eid Gah. Ico gihe, Turabi yari umushikiranganji w'ubutungane akaba yari arongoye igisata kijejwe gukwiragiza imico myiza no kurwanya ingeso mbi - ari co gipolisi c'idini c'aba Taliban. Muri iki kiganiro yavuze ati: "Bose baradutera ivyatsi kuri ibi bihano vyatangirwa mu bibuga, ariko twebwe nta na kimwe twigeze tuvuga ku mategeko yabo n'ibihano vyabo". Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, aba Taliban barasavye ijambo mw'ikoraniro ry'ishirahamwe ONU ririko ribera i New york. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Ubudagi Heiko Maas avuga ko n'aho ari ngombwa kuvugana n'aba Taliban, "ikoraniro rya ONU siho bikwiye kubera". Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zisanzwe ziri mu murwi ujejwe kwakira abantu, ivuga ko idashobora gufata ingingo imbere y'uko ikoraniro rirangira mu ndwi iza.

column2: Charles agiye kuba Umwami bwoko ki?
column3: Charles, umuntu wa mbere amaze igihe kirekire ari samuragwa muri kahise k'Ubwongereza, ubu ni umwami. Imyaka 70 amaze yiga nka samuragwa, yamutumye aba umwami wa mbere yimitswe yiteguye kandi akaba ari we mwami wa mbere  yimitswe afise imyaka myinshi. Uyu mwami w'imyaka 73 yamanye na nyina wiwe mu kiringo cose yari amaze ari ku ngoma, abategetsi b'isi baza bakagenda, harimwo abashikiranganji ba mbere b'Ubwongereza 15 hamwe n'apaperezida 14 ba Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Inyuma y'ingoma y'akaroruhore, rurangiranwa, ya Elizabeth II, dushobora kuba twiteze umwami w'ubwoko ki? Ni gute kandi umuganwa azwi ko atarya umunwa ku bibazo bimubakiye azomenyera kuvuga ataho yegamiye nk'Umwami? Nk'umwami, Charles ntazoba agifise igitabo c'inzira canke uruhusha rwo kugendesha imodoka vyiwe bwite -  canke ngo ashikirize ku mugaragaro ivyiyumviro vyiwe bikomeye. Kuba umwami birasumba umuntu ku giti ciwe. Ni amabanga atandukanye, intwaro zitandukanye, nk'uko umuhinga mu bijanye n'amategeko ajanye n'ibwirizwashingiro akaba umwigisha wa kaminuza Vernon Bogdanor abisigura. Prof Bogdanor ati: "Azwi kuva kera cane ko ingendo yiwe itegerezwa guhinduka. Abanyagihugu ntibakeneye umwami aza kwiyamamaza". Umwami Charles arazi neza ko ari ngombwa kwinengesera. Mu kiganiro na BBC mu 2018, yavuze ati: "Si ndi ikijuju. Ndazi ko kuba umwami ari igikorwa gitandukanye. Kwibaza ko nzokora nk'uko nkora ni uguhuba cane". Igihugu Umwami Charles  agiye kurongora kiratandukanye cane n'ico nyina wiwe yarazwe, mbere Prof  Bogdanor abona ko umwami mushasha azoyobora Ubwongereza burangwamwo imico n'imigenzo bitandukanye, abanyagihugu bari mu madini atandukanye. Amubonamwo nk'umuntu azogerageza kuba umuhuza, azokora uko ashoboye kwose kugira ngo yiyegereze inkehwa hamwe na ba ntahonikora. Prof Bogdanor amubonamwo kandi nk'uwuzoshigikira abanyamyuga, umuziki n'imicokama - abe cane nka Shakespeare ha kwishinga gusiganwa ku mafarasi. Ariko Sir Lloyd Dorfman yakoranye n'umwami Charles mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike mw'ishirahamwe ryiwe Prince's Trust, ntabona ko azohava yirengangiza ibibazo nkoramutima nk'ivyerekeye ihindagurika ry'ikirere n'uburimyi bukingira isi (Agriculture biologique/Organic farming). Sir Lloyd ati: "Abifisemwo ubumenyi bwinshi, kandi abikora neza cane. Biragoye kwiyumvira ko yoca abiheba ubwo nyene ku musi azoba abaye Umwami". Havugwa vyinshi ku bijanye n'uko Umwami yoba yipfuza ingoma ya cami "iciriritse". Ibi bisa n'uko yokwitaho kugira ab'ingoma y'ibwami bake bazezwa amabanga, aho Charles na Camilla, umuganwa William na Catherine ari bo boba inkingi. Umusiguzi ku vyerekeye amakuru y'i bwami,  Victoria Murphy, avuga ko n'aho bimeze uko, ubutumwa nyamukuru buzoba gukomeza amahoro n'ituze. Ati: "Ntimwitege ubudasa bunini kandi buteye ubwoba. Azokwinengesera cane". Umwanditsi Robert Hardman na we ati: "Twamye twiyumvira ko Umwamikazi ari umuntu azokwama ari mu bintu biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu vyose, ariko uretse we, uyu mwami yamye aseruka gusumba umuntu uwo ari we wese mu buzima bw'igihugu, gusumba umunyaporitike uwo ari we wese". Umwanditsi akaba n'umuhinga mu vya kahise, Sir Anthony Seldon abona ko Umwami Charles aterwa intege n'uko yabonetse ko afise ukuri ku bibazo nyamukuru, nk'igihe agabisha ku bijanye n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere. Nk'akarorero, mw'ikoraniro ry'i Glasgow ryari ryarekeye ibidukikije mu 2021, Charles yarashimagijwe cane n'abategetsi bakomeye nka Perezida  Joe Biden wa Amerika aho,  nk'uko bivugwa na  Hardman, yavuze ko igihagararo afise kw'isi kizomufasha cane nk'Umwami. Ati: "Ntivyari inkuru gusa. Aba bategetsi babiri baricaranye ahantu, hanyuma biden avuga ati: 'Watumye ibi vyose biba',". Ariko ni igiki witeze kubona muri uno mwami mushasha ? Abamuzi bavuga ko muri we afise agasoni, kandi avuga make. "Umutima wumva" ni kimwe c'ukungene bamudondora. Hariho ikimenyetso nk'umuhungu yahoze yidoga ko bamutyekeza kandi bamukumira kw'ishure. Igihe kimwe yanditse ikete rija muhira ari kw'ishure avuga ingene atuntuzwa mu buraro bw'ishire, avuga ati: "Bama bantera ikandambiri ijoro ryose canke bakankubita n'imisego canke bakanterera hanze, bakankubita cane uko bashoboye kwose". Umugore wiwe Camilla, amuvuga nk'umuntu "atihangana. Ashaka ko ibintu vyose birara bikozwe. Uko niko akora ibintu". Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'imboneshakure kw'isabukuru igira 70 ya Charles, yavuze ko hejuru y'ubwitonzi abantu bamubonamwo, arimwo akantu ko gukina. Camilla ati: "Bamubona nk'umuntu atafyinata, kandi nivyo. Ariko nagomba kwereka abantu ikintu c'ukwiyorosha kiri muri we. Arashira amavi hasi agakina n'abana, akabasomera udukuru wa Harry Potter mbere akaganira nabo". Charles arisanzura kandi akiyorosha iyo ari mu bantu, akiyegereza abantu mu kubatera udukuru dutwenza. Kumbure ibi bizohinduka nk'umwami, ariko igihe yri umuganwa wa Wales, yaritwaye nk'umugenzi wa bose, nka sekuru, kandi ataco yisigarije. Nk'umugabo ari mu myaka ya 70, nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko Umwami azohava ahinduka. Chris Pope yakoranye na  Charles ku kigo Prince's Teaching Institute, asigura uyu mwami mushasha nk'umuntu yama afise akazi kenshi, afise umwete kandi akora cane. Pope ati: "Ni umuntu yitaho cane kazoza keza k'abari imbere. Ibi uzobibonera mu bikorwa vyinshi akora". Mu bikorwa vy'ubugiraneza nk'umuganwa harimwo gukingira iragi no kubungabunga ubuhinga kama - ariko kandi agahimiriza impinduka n'iterambere". Pope ati: "Yama afise umwitwarariko ko akaranga katotakara, ariko ibi ntibisigura ko avuga ko dukwiye gusubira ku vya kera". Inyifato y'uyu Mwami mushasha  isa n'iyishaka gufatira ibi vyose hamwe , ikintu gishobora kuboneka nko kutagira aho ahagaze, gushaka ihinduka mu gihe ashaka kubungabunga akaranga. Rimwe na rimwe, asa n'umuntu yahoze ari umurimyi wo mu kinjana ca 18. Ikindi gihe, akumvikana nk'umuntu ashavuriye ihinduka, ababajwe n'ukungene abantu bamwe bamwe batitaweho kandi bibagiwe. Hari vyinshi azokora yarazwe na nyina wiwe mu gukunda ibikorwa, ariko kandi Umwami Charles  yaratoranye ukwemera n'uburwaneza vya nyina wiwe. Hitan Mehta yarakoranye nawe kuva igihe amufasha gushinga ishirahamwe British Asian Trust  mu 2007. Mehta avuga ati: "Umutima wiwe wuzuye ubugiraneza. Nibaza ko abantu batazi urugero rw'ukungene yitaho abantu. Igihe cose yama ariko aravuga ku vyerekeye isi ashaka gusigira abuzukuru  biwe. Ni ikibazo kimuhagaritse umutima". Ibi bishobora kubonekera ku kungene ahamagarira abantu kugira ico bakoze. Mehta ati:  "Hategerezwa kuba hari nk'isaha zitatu umusi umwe, hari ku wa gatanu mw'ijoro, aho naza numva terefone yiwe akambwira ati: 'Mpejeje kwumva imyuzurira yateye muri Pakistan. None turiko dukora iki'?  Ibi ntibisigura ko ata kintu yari afise akora. Ariko yumvise ikibazo kandi ariko aragikorerako. Ni ukuri ni umuntu yitaho abandi". Avuga kuri se wiwe, umuganwa Harry avuga ati: "Uyu ni umugabo ashobora gufungura ijoro ryitereye, yaheza agaca asubira ku meza kwandika, akavamwo asinzirira kw'ikaye". Charles Philip Arthur George yavukiye ku kirimba ca  Buckingham ku wa 14 z'ukwa 11 mu 1948. Igihe BBC imenyesha ivuka ryiwe, inkuru ntiyari iy'uko Umwamikazi yavyaye umwana w'umuhungu, ahubwo yari iy'uko nyina wiwe "yibarutse umuganwa". Haciye imyaka ine, yaciye aba samuragwa. Mu kiganiro co mu 2005, Charles yavuze ati: "Nisanze navutse mfise iki kibanza. Rero ni ngombwa ko ndagikamisha. Kandi ngakora ico nshoboye cose kugira mfashe". Arongoye amashirahamwe arenga 400, hanyuma mu 1976 yatanguje ishirahamwe ryiwe bwite, Prince's Trust, akoresheje amafaranga yatekerewe avuye mu gisirikare kirwanira mu mazi (Royal Navy). Rimaze gufasha ba ntahonikora bakiri bato bababa 900.000 bava mu bice bimwe bimwe bikenye cane mu gihugu, rikaba kandi ryamutumye ashobora kubona ingorane zitari nke zijanye n'imibereho y'abantu. Imigambi yari afitiye ishirahamwe Prince's Trust kugira rishobore gushikira ico yise "abagoye gushikirwa" ntiyaguye neza abategetsi. Mu 2018, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati ntibwabona ko ari iciyumviro ciza. Vyaragoranye gutangura". Igikorwa ciwe catumye yagirizwa gutoba no kwivanga muri poritike, ibi birego bikaba vyari bishingiye cane cane  ku ciswe "black spider memos" (twogereranya mu kirundi nka Inzandiko zirabura z'igitangurirwa ). Iri zina barifatiye ku nyadiko ya Charles y'igitangurigwa, aya akaba yari amakete Charles yandikira abashikiranganji bari muri reta kuva mu 2004 no kubandanya. Aya makete yinuba inzira reta yakoresha mu guhangana n'ibibazo nk'uburimi, gutunganya ibisagara, inyubako,  indero n'ibindi. Uwahoze ari umushikiranganji yarungikiwe aya makete ya Charles avuga ko atumva ko atewe igitsure cinshi, ariko abona ko umwami mushasha ari umuntu afise ivyiyumviro ntabanduka. Abona ko aje afise ivyiyumviro vyiwe ashaka kubandanya, aho kwemera kwakira ivyiyumviro bidasa n'ivyiwe. Ati: "Si numva ko mbangamiwe. Yarashikiriza ivyiyumviro vyiwe hanyuma ukaronka amakete. Si wa muntu yategeka canke yakara, ni umuntu yubaha". Ku vyo yagirizwa ko yariko aratoba, mu kiganiro yatanze mu 2006,  Charles yavuze ati: "Nimba uko ari ko kwivanga mu bintu, aho rero ndavyishimiye". Ariko aremeza ko yari mu bintu atabona "amaherezo yavyo". Ati: "Iyo ata kintu na kimwe ukoze, ata kintu na kimwe, bazokwidogera. Uhagurutse ukagerageza kugira ico ukoze kugira ngo ufashe, naho nyene barakwidogera". Mu kiganiro cakurikiye, yavuze ko yagerageje kwirinda imigambwe, ariko ko hageze aho bimubera ngombwa ko aterera ijwi hejuru ku vyerekeye "ingene abantu bari babayeho". None abanyagihugu bazoshigikira umwami Charles ku rugero rungana gute? Charles  avuga ati: "Ikintu nk'ingoma ya cami ntigishobora kumara kabiri mu gihe utokwishimikiza ivyiyumviro vy'abanyagihugu. Erega abanyagihugu batagishatse, ntaco bazobona". Nk'uko ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'ikigo YouGov muri Kigarama (12) 2021 kivyerekana, abantu baramukunze cane, aho hafi bibiri vya bitagu vy'abanyagihugu bamubonamwo umuco mwiza. Ariko amatora ngereranyo abandanya amwerekana ko adakunzwe nk'uko nyina wiwe, Umwamikazi Elizabeth II, canke umuhungu wiwe umuganwa William, bakunzwe, rero haracari benshi ategerezwa kwiyegereza. Cane cane, abakiri bato ntibamwiyumvamwo cane. Victoria Murphy avuga ko ibi bishobora kuba vyerekana ingaruka y'amashusho mabi ya Charles mu mareresi no mu biganiro vy'imboneshakure ku vyerekeye umubano wiwe n'umugore wiwe wa mbere , Diana, Umuganwakazi wa Wales, yapfiriye mw'isanganya ry'imodoka mu kwa munani 1997. Aya mashusho afise kuba ari uruvangatirane rw'ay'ukuri hamwe n'amakorano, ariko afise ingaruka zikomeye. Umupfasoni Murphy ati: "Ikintu gitangaje kuva mu myaka mike iheze ni ukungene Diana abandanya agaruka mu biyago vyerekeye umuryango w'i bwami". Mu gihe Charles yariko atera yegereza ingoma, habaye ukugerageza guhindura ivyiyumviro biri mu mitwe y'abantu, nk'uko umwigisha wa kaminuza, Pauline Maclaran, abivuga. Kuva batanguye kumucisha mu dukino dutandukanye nk'akitwa Spitting Image, bukebuke yagiye yerekanwa nk'umunyacubahiro, "umushingantahe" afise ibintu ngirakamaro avuga ku vyerekeye ibidukikije, nk'uko Prof Maclaran abivuga. Kumbure ivyo abanyagihugu bipfuza na vyo nyene si ukuvuga ko vyera. Hanyuma we nk'umukuru w'umuryango w'i bwami, azotegerezwa guhangana n'ikibazo giteye inambu isi ku bivugwa ku Muganwa Harry, na Meghan, umgore wiwe, hamwe n'iimgenderanire yabo n'umuryango w'i bwami. Umwami Charles azohangana n'ibindi bibazo vyo mu muryango, nk'ivyerekeye ikibazo c'uko Umuganwa Andrew ashobora guhabwa amabanga canke ntayahabwe, ni inyuma y'umwumvikano wabaye inyuma y'ibirego vyo gufata ku nguvu vyatanzwe na Virginia Giuffre. Hanze y'Ubwongereza, ikibazo nyamukuru kizoba ugutunganya gushasha imigenderanire igezweho n'ishirahamwe Commonwealth. Nk'umukuru mushasha waryo,  ni gute mu ngendo ziwe mu bihugu vya Commonwealth azoshobora guhangana n'ibibazo vy'umurage ugoye w'ubukoloni canke ibibazo nk'ubucakara? Umwami Charles abaye umukuru w'ibihugu 14 hamwe kandi n'Ubwongereza. Bimwe muri ibi bifise kurondera ubwigenge ariko biri muri Commonwealth, mbere umwami Charles aramaze gusigura neza ko yiteguriye ibiganiro nk'abantu bakuze ku bijanye n'ivyohinduka. Hari ingingo zimaze gufatwa zoroheje inzira y'ingoma yiwe nshasha. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, yaranezerewe cane igihe nyina wiwe yafata ijambo akavuga ko Camilla akwiye kwitwa Umutambukanyi w'umwami, hakwitwa umuganwakazi. Camilla azoba kirumara cane mu gihe Charles atanguye amwe mu mabanga akomeye cane kw'isi, ku myaka y'aho hafi abantu bose baba bakukurutse. Iki ni igihe camye kimurindiriye ubuzima bwiwe bwose. Ku Mwami Charles, ik ini igihe ciwe.

column2: Burundi: CNL ivuga ko integuro y'amatora irangwamwo utunenge
column3: Umugambwe utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi CNL uridogera umurwi ujejwe amatora mu Burundi CENI ko ataco uriko urakora kugira ngo utunenge tubandanya twibonekeza mu nteguro y'amatora ategekanijwe ku wa 20/05/2010. Mw'itangazo wasohoye ejo ku wa gatandatu,  uwo mugambwe umenyesha ko amategeko agenga amatora ariko arahonyangwa, kandi ko CENI ataco ishaka kubivugako. Haciye indwi abashaka kwitoza mu bibanza bitandukanye vy'igihugu batanguye kwiyamamaza, hakaba kandi haciye iminsi ine igikorwa co gutanga amakarata y'itora gitanguye, aho abanwanyi b'uwo mugambwe berekana imyidogo ko batariko baroroherezwa. Umurwi CENI ntaco urashobora kubwira BBC, ariko umukuru wayo aherutse gusaba abari muri ivyo bikorwa gukurikiza no kwisunga itegeko rigenga amatora n'amakoraniro mu bikorwa vy'imyiyamamazo barimwo. Mw'iryo tangazo ry'umugambwe CNL, uwo mugambwe uvuga ko hari ibibazo bitari bike bigenda vyibonekeza mu bice bitandukanye, bakanagiriza mbere abaserukira CENI mu ntara no mu makomine ko babirenzako uruho rw'amazi. Tumwe mu tunenge CNL yerekana, iravuga ko amakarata ariko atangwa ata ntonde z'abatorera ku biro vy'amatora runaka zatangajwe, kugira ngo abazahatorera bamenyekane. CNL kandi uvuga ko hari abatorera amakarata abandi batarinze no kwerekana ibibaranga, ivyo navyo ngo bigashobora gutuma haba abanyururizwa amakarata yabo. Ivyo ngo bigatuma bamwe babwirwa ko amakarata yabo ataboneka mu gihe bari bariyandikishije, mbere no mu matora y'ibwirizwashingiro rya 2018 baranatoye. CNL inagiriza CENI ko mu gushiraho umurwi ujejwe amatora mu ntara, CEPI, be no mu makomine, CECI , batakurikije ukunganisha hagati y'abanyamigambwe nk'uko amategeko abivuga. CNL ivuga ko abanywanyi bayo mu ntara zitari nke z'igihugu bahohoterwa kandi bakanaburagizwa n'abanywanyi hamwe n'abategetsi bakomoka mu mugambwe uri kubutegetsi  mu bikorwa vyabo vyo kwiyamamaza. Térence Manirambona avugira uwo mugambwe akaba ari we yasohoye iryo tangazo, atanga akarorero ka buramatari w'intara ya Kayanza asanzwe kandi azokwitoza nk'umushingamateka w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD akamwagiriza ko "abandanya akora ibikorwa bigenewe CEPI mu kuburagiza aba CNL", aho avuga ko nko ku wa 30/04 yirukanye abanywanyi ba CNL gukorera mu kibanza bari bahawe. BBC yashatse kumenya ico umurwi CENI uvuga ko kuri ivyo vyagiriji vyose bishikirizwa n'umugambwe CNL ariko abawurongoye bakaba ataco bashimye kuyimenyesha. Hagati aho, umuvugizi w'uwo murwi, Philippe Nzobonariba, yabwiye iradiyo y'igihugu, RTNB, ko ibibazo bijanye n'utugorane twibonekeza mw'itangwa ry'amakarata bamaze kutwumva, agasaba ko hagize uwubura ikarata yoca abimenyesha CECI hanyuma nayo ice imenyesha CEPI, iyi nayo imenyeshe CENI kugira ngo barabe ko mu mamashini yabo iyo karata atayiriyo. Nayo ku kibazo c'uko hari abatora amakarata y'abandi baba batanabatumye, Bwana Nzobonariba amenyesha ko ivyo bamaze no kuvyibonera, akibutsa ko "umuntu kugira ngo atorere uwundi aba yamuhaye uburenganzira bwo kumutorera". Ati: "Rero hari aho twamaze kubona, aho usanga hari nk'uwuza akavuga ngo naka yantumye atacemeza ko yamutumye, uyo ntushobora kumuha ikarata yiwe". Yanavuze ko n'abari hanze nabo nyene bashobora kurungikira urwandiko ruteyeko  umukono uwo bipfuza ko bobatorera. Ati: "Andika 'procuration', utereko umukono, hanyuma urungikire uyo muntu azogutorera, aheze agutorere". Mu gihe hari bamwe bafise amakenga ko ku munsi w'amatora hashobora kuba abantu batorera abandi benshi, Bwana Nzobonariba yibutsa ko umuntu afise uburenganzira bwo gutorera umuntu umwe rudende.

column2: Ronaldo na Messi babaye abagenzi inyuma y'aho Van Dijk abakubitiye hasi
column3: Rimwe na rimwe amatombora mu mupira w'amaguru canke iminsi mikuru y'ugutanga ubushimwe birashobora kutaryoha kubera amajambo menshi y'umwanya muremure, ugasanga abariko babikurikira bararambiwe. Ariko iyo ubonye babiri mu bihangange kw'isi - Lionel Messi na Cristiano Ronaldo - bemeye ubwa mbere gusangirira umukate hamwe, ni ibintu bidasanzwe. Kari akamwemwe gusa hagati y'umusatirizi wa Juventus Ronaldo na mugenziwe wa Barcelona Messi igihe bari bicaranye batebura eka banatwenga. Hari igihe batangaza ko Virgil van Dijk ari we atahukanye agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza i Bulaya mu 2018/2019. Vyari ibintu bigoye kwiyumvira ko abo bantu babiri bigeze kuba ari abakeba mu kiringo c'imyaka icenda Ronaldo yamaze mu murwi Real Madrid, banarwanira umupira w'inzahabu, ubu bariko batebura. Ronaldo ati: "Twari tumaze imyaka 15 yose duhurira hano. Sinzi ko ivyo vyari bwigere bibabo mu myaka iri inyuma - abantu babiri bakama bahurira ng'aha igihe cose". "Nivyo ko dufise ubucuti bwiza. Ntiturigera dusangirira hamwe, ariko ndibaza ko bizotinda bigashika muri kazoza". "Twarahanganye cane muri Espanye. Naramuhenuye, nawe arampenura. Nico gituma biryoshe kuba mu bagize amateka y'umupira w'amaguru". Uravye ingene bari bakundanye muri ako kanya, ni nde yokwiyumvira ko hari ukutumvikana hagati y'abo? Igihe c'abo bakeba babiri c'ukwiganzira umupira w'amaguru gitera kirangira, aho muri iri joro ryakeye ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Uefa, ryatangaje umwami mushasha w'umupira w'amaguru ku mugabane wa Bulaya Uyo nawe si uwundi ni Virgil van Dijk, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool. Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 28 akomoka mu Buholande yahawe agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza gusumba abandi i Bulaya mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2018/2019. Van Dijk yafashije Liverpool gutahukana igikombe c'igihanwa ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Liverpool yatsinze Tottenham ibitsindo 2-0 mu rukino rwa nyuma rwabereye i Madrid mu kwa gatandatu guheze. Van Dijk abaye umukinyi agize kabiri atsinze ivyo bihangange inyuma y'aho mu mwaka uheze, Luka Modric wa Real Madrid atahukaniye ako gashimwe ashize hasi Ronaldo na Messi. Van Dijk kandi niwe mukinyi w'inyuma wa mbere atsindiye ako gashimwe, katanguye guhiganirwa mu mwaka wa 2010/2011. Ati: "Si noreka gushimira bagenzanje dukinana, kuko iyo ataba bo sinari gushika ku ntambwe ngezeko. Rwabaye urugendo rurerure".

column2: Africa-Ukraine: Ingaruka z'intambara ziguma zigaragaza uko bukeye uko bwije
column3: Gaz (umwuka)  yo gutekesha (Liquified Petroleum  Gas, LPG)  yaduze igiciro muri Kenya  gushika kuri 11 kw'ijana mu ndwi imwe gusa, mu gihe intambara Uburusiya bwateye muri Ukraine iriko iragira ingaruka ku biciro v'ibitoro kw'isi. Ubu igiciro ca gaz yo gutekesha muri Kenya kimaze kuduga gushika kuri 50 kw'ijana mu kiringo c'umwaka, ubu kikaba congeye umuzigo ku banyagihugu bari bahanzwe  n'uburyo bwagabanutse kubera ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ubu igiciro co kwuzuza icupa rya gaz ry'ibiro 13 ciyongeyeko 11 kw'ijana muri iyi ndwi n'ukuvuga ko bica bisaba amafaranga angana n'ama dorari ($) 29.30 (hafi 60.000 mu marundi canke 30.000 mu manyarwanda) rivuye ku ma dorari 26.26 ku ndwi iheze. Ubu icupa ry'ibiro 6 ryuzuzwa kuri $13.68 kare ryari kuri $12.43. Ni  ikimenyetso ko ibihe biri imbere bitagiye kworoha ku bantu b'uburyo bubayabaye basanzwe bari bahanzwe n'ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya vyaduze cane. Bitandukanye n'ibindi bikomoka ku bitoro  nka essence, amazutu na kerosene, muri Kenya ibiciro vya gaz yo gutekesha ntibishingwa na reta, bisigura ko abaguzi baca bahura n'ingaruka uko ibiciro bihindutse kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Kuri uyu wa mbere igiciro c'ibitoro bitayunguruye caduze gushika ku $140 ku kagunguru (barril)  kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika biramaze kuduza ibiciro vy'ibitoro. Mu Rwanda havugwa kuduga kw'igiciro c'ibitoro... No mu Rwanda kuva kuri uyu wa mungu hari ibiciro bishasha vy'ibitoro. Mazutu yavuye kuri 1.140Frw ija kuri 1.201Frw, essence iva kuri 1.225Frw ija kuri 1.256Frw. Itangazo ry'ubuyobozi bubijejwe rivuga ko n'aho ryirinze kuduza igiciro uko vyategerezwa kugenda kugirango ibiciro  muri rusangi ntibice biduga cane ngo vyonone umurindi wo kwivyukiranya ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ariko abaraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko  ibintu bishobora kwunyuka hamwe ihererekanywa ry'ivyo bitoro ryohungabana. Rolake  Akingube-Filani wo muri  Africa Energy Chamber avuga ati: "Amaherezo ingaruka zizova i Buraya zishike muri Afrika  aho ibiciro bishobora kuduga kurusha aho bigeze ubu." Yongerako ati: "Dukeneye kurondera uburyo bwo kwikwiza ku bitoro muri Afrika. Aho niho dushobora kwihagararako habaye ihungrana nk'iryo muri kazoza."

column2: Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri UK arasaba imbabazi ku ruhara rw'Ishengero mu bucakara
column3: Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasavye imbabazi inyuma y’aho amatohoza yerekaniye ko ikigega c’imitahe y’Ishengero rya anglicane mu Bwongereza gifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Aya matohoza yakozwe asabwe n’ishami ry’iri shengero, Church Commissioners, rijejwe amatungo yaryo, yerekana ko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 100 iki kigega cashize amafaranga menshi cane mw’ikompanyi yari ijejwe gutwara abantu mu bucakara. Ico kigega cari kizwi mu kinjana ca 18 kw’izina rya Queen Anne’s Bounty, cahavuye gihinduka ikigo c’imitahe ishika ku miriyaridi 10,1 z’amapawundi. Musenyeri mukuru Justin Welby avuga ko yababaye cane kwumva ishengero arongoye rifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Ikigega Queen Anne's Bounty cashinzwe mu 1704 mu ntumbero yo gufasha abakozi b’Imana bari bakenye. Itohoza ku makonte yaco mu 1739 ryerekana ko umutahe  w’amapawundi 204.000 (ubu yababa imiriyoni 443 y’amapawundi nyene) washowe mw’ikompanyi South Sea Company yagurisha abacakara b'abanye-Afrika. South Sea Company yari ifise amasezerano yihariye yo kuvana abacakara muri Afrika ibatwara mu bihugu vyatwarwa na Espagne muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 kuva mu myaka ya 1710. Yatwaye ibihumbi mirongo vy’abacakara, amatohoza akerekana ko hafi 15% yabo bapfiriye mu nzira. Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza ryabandanije rishora imitahe muri South Sea Company gushika mu kinjana ca 19. Uyu musenyeri mukuru avuga ati: “Uru rudandaza rw’agahomerabunwa rwafashe abagabo, abagore n’abana baremwe mw’ishusho y’Imana rubaka agateka kabo n’ubwigenge bwabo. “Birateye isoni kubona hari bamwe mw’Ishengero bashigikiye bikomeye bakegeranya amatungo muri uru rudandaza. “Inzira yonyene yo gukira koko kunywanisha – ari yo Yezu Kristu/Yesu Kristo aduhamagarira gufata – ni uko duhangana n’uku kuri kubabaje hanyuma tugafata ingingo”. Ku ruhande rumwe, Ishengero ry’Ubwongereza ririshimira uruhara ryagize mu guhagarika ubucakara, rigafatira ku ruhara umuvugabutumwa wa Anglicane, William Wilberforce, yagize. Ku rundi ruhande, ni ngombwa ko ryemera ko ryagiye ryungukira mu bucakara. Mu myaka iheze, Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza riherutse gusaba imbabazi ku bakozi baryo batari bake babonetse ko bari bafise abacakara. Ryasavye imbabazi kubera ishami ryaryo rijejwe ubutumwa, The Society for the Propagation of the Gospel (twogereranya mu kirundi tuti “Umuryango wo gukwiragiza Inkuru nziza”), ryari rifise itongo ahitwa Barbados, maze rishira ikimenyetso ku bacakara ryakoresha mu gikiriza cavuga ngo SOCIETY (twogereranya n’ijambo UMURYANGO). Ubu rero, ku matohoza yaryo ryo nyene, ryemeye ko mu kiringo c’imyaka mirongo ikigega caryo cashoye imitahe y’amafaranga hafi yaryo yose – hampande y’ayo ryakoresheje mu kugura amatongo – mw’ikompanyi yari ifise uruhara yiharije rwo gutwara abacakara muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko. Mu gihe abarenga inusu y’abanywanyi b’Ishengero rya Anglicane kw’isi yose bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, iyi nkuru ishobora kutorosha ibintu. Ishengero rya Anglican mu Bwongereza ryatanguje aya matohoza mu ntumbero yo gushira ahabona kahise karyo rikavuga ko hagiye gutumwako umurwi wo kwiga inyishu ikwiriye. Ariko umuvugizi ntazi nimba ibi bisigura ko hagiye kuba ayandi matangazo n’amasengesho, canke nimba hashobora kubamwo n’ibiganiro ku bijanye n’indishi y’akababaro mu buryo bw’amafaranga. Aya matohoza yerekana kandi ko iki kigega cahawe intererano z’abantu bungukiye canke bafitaniye isano n’ubu bucakara bwabaye hagati y’imigabane hamwe n’ibikorwa vy’ubutunzi bwari bushingiye ku burimyi muri uru rudandaza rw’abantu. Uyu musenyeri mukuru yongerako ati: “Ndasabiye abo bose bakozweko n’iyi nkuru kandi nibaza ko dushobora gukorera hamwe tukihweza iyindi nzira twofata”.

column2: Ukraine: Kyiv iriyamiriza ivyo yagirizwa na Russia ko igomba gutera ‘ibombe y’umwanda’
column3: Ukraine iriyamiriza ibivugwa n’Uburusiya ko Kyiv (umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine) ishobora gukoresha “ibombe y’umwanda”  - ibibombe bisanzwe bivangwa n’ubumara (matières radioactives). Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky avuga ko ibi vyerekana ko Uburusiya bwonyene bushobora kuba buriko butegura gukora igitero nk’iki. Incuti za Ukraine nazo nyene ziriyamiriza ibi bivugwa n’Uburusiya, mbere Amerika ikiyamiriza “icitwazo ico ari co cose cotuma ibintu biyangara”. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi w’Uburusiya Sergei Shoigu yavuze ivy’amabombe y’umwanda mu gihe yavugana na mugenziwe w’Ubwongereza Ben Wallace kuri terefone. Yavuze ko afise “amakenga ku gishobora kuba agasotoro ka Kyiv karimwo ikoreshwa ry’ibombe y’umwanda”. Ku wa Mungu, Shoigu yagiranye kandi ibiganiro n’abashikiranganji bo kwivuna abansi ba Amerika, Ubufaransa na Turukiya, abashikiriza impungenge za Moscou. Nta vyemezo yatanze bishigikira ivyo yagiriza Ukraine. Mu kwishura kuri ibi, Perezida Zelensky yagiriza Uburusiya ko ari bwo “ntandaro y’ibintu vyose vy’umwanda bishobora kuba muri ino ntambara”. Avuga ko Uburusiya buriko butera ubwoba isi bukoresheje “akaga k’inguvu z’ubumara” ku kigo ca nikleyeri ca Zaporizhzhia bwigaruriye. Anavuga kw’iterabwoba rya Moscou ryo kumena urugomero rukomeye rwo mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine. Kremlin (ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya) iriyamiriza ibi birego. Umukuru wa Ukraine kandi arashimangira ko “amakungu yofata ingingo zose zikomeye zishoboka”. Hagati aho, Wallace avuga ko yamiriye kure ibivugwa na Shoigu ko "Ukraine iriko itegura imigambi ifashwe mu mugongo n’ibihugu vy’Uburengero, harimwo n’Ubwongereza, yo gutuma ibintu biyangara muri Ukraine”. Yagabishije kandi ko ibirego nk’ibi "bitoba icitwazo co gukora ikintu cotuma ibintu vyunyuka”. Amajambo nk’ayo kandi niyo yavuzwe n’umunyamabanga wa Amerika ajejwe kwivuna abansi, Lloyd Austin, igihe yavugana na Shoigu ejo ku wa Mungu, mu kiganiro kigira kabiri nawe kuri terefone mu misi mike cane. Mw’itangazo rusangi, abashikiranganji bajejwe imigenderanire b’ibihugu vy’Ubufaransa, Ubwongereza na Amerika bavuze ko ibihugu vyabo “vyiyamirije amajambo y’ikinyoma ceruye ko Ukraine iriko itegura gukoresha ibombe y’umwanda ku butaka bwayo”, banavuga ko bazobandanya bafata mu mugongo Ukraine "muri ino ntambara y’ubugome ya Perezida Putin". Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi mu gisirikare bavuga ko ivyo Uburusiya bwagiriza Ukraine bije inyuma y’aho bugize imisi butsindwa ahatari hake, be no mu gihe ingabo za Ukraine zibandanya ibitero vyo kwivuna mu buseruko no mu bumanuko bw’igihugu. Mu rukurikirane rw’ubutumwa cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, ikigo ca Amerika cigisha ivy’intambara, Institute for the Study of War (ISW), kivuga ko Shoigu "asa n’uwariko arondera guhagarika canke kugabanya umurindi w’imfashanyo za gisirikare Uburengero buha Ukraine, hamwe kandi kumbure no kurondera ingene aca intege urunani rwa OTAN/NATO  mu kurutera ubwoba”. Hagati aho, ISW yongerako iti: "Kremlin ntavyo irimwo vyo gutegura igitero ca vuba ca bombe y’umwanda. Ibivugwa na Shoigu bije gukomeza isekeza ry’akarimi Uburusiya bumazemwo igihe kirekire”. column2: Kidum nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus
column3: Umuririmvyi Jean Pierre Nimbona, Kidum, nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus. Abajijwe igituma yasohoye  iyi ndirimbo Kidum yagize: "Ni kubera ari ikiza kuri ubu kibangamiye isi yose kandi caduteye umutima uhagaze twese". Umviriza iyo ndirimbo aho hejuru.

column2: Leta ya Tanzania yasubije abagaya ingene iriko irahangana na coronavirus
column3: Tanzania yiyamirije ivyagiriji vy'uko itariko irakora ibihagije mu kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus cugarije ibihugu nka vyose vyo kw'isi. Iki gihugu kivuze ibi nyuma y'umunsi umwe ibiro biserukiye Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika i Dar es Salaam, bivuze ko ico kiza gishobora kwimonogoza vuba muri ico gihugu. Umuvugizi wa leta Dr Hassan Abbas yabwiye BBC ko ibiro vy'igihugu biberamwo ubushakashatsi n'ibipimo bicugaye kandi ko gupima vyahagaritswe. Ivyo ngo ni kubera yuko bariko barakora itohoza ku bikoresho vyifashishwa mu gupima, ngo ariko abarwayi bafise ibimenyetso vya Covid-19 barabandanya kuvurirwa mu bitaro hose mu gihugu. Uwo muvugizi yagize ati: "Dushaka kwihitiramwo tubanje kwihweza uburyo bwose bwo gupima bukoreshwa kuri ino ndwara, kandi turiko turatera intambwe. "Kandi abanye Tanzania barabandanya ubuzima bwabo. Hari uwufise ibimenyetso, turamaze kuvuga ko akwiye guca aja ku bigo vy'ubuvuzi biri hirya no hino. "Rero ivy'uko tutariko turahangana na Covid-19 mu gihugu, si vyo". Iki gihugu co mu buseruko bwa Afrika nta mategeko akaze cashizeko yo kubuza uruja n'uruza kubera iki kiza kandi nta cahindutse ku buzima ugereranije n'uko bwari aho ico kiza catangazwa ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Amasoko hamwe n'ibibanza vy'urudandazwa vyama vyuzuye abantu, bigatera impungenge ko iki kiza gishobora gukwiragira vuba. Abantu benshi ubu bahitamwo kwambara udufuka-munwa hamwe n'ibindi bifuka mu maso mu kwikingira. Ku buryo bugenda burigaragaza, amaduka, amasoko, ububare hamwe n'ibibanza biberamwo amasengesho, haza harashirwa indobo z'amazi n'isabune ku bwinjiriro bagahimiriza abantu gukaraba intoke imbere yo kwinjira.

column2: Africa yahomvye miriyoni z'ama dorari kubera ihagarara rya Facebook, Instagram na Whatsapp
column3: Abifashisha  imbuga hwaniro muri Afrika kugira bagurishe ibicuruzwa bitandukanye bariko baraharura igihombo baraye bagize mu masaha atandatatu Facebook, Instagram na Whatsapp vyamaze bidakora. Ikigo kigenzura ingene internet ikora Netblocks kigereranya ko iryo hagarara rishobora kuba ryateye ubutunzi bwa Africa yo munsi y'ubugararwa (ubutayu)  bwa Sahara igihombo ca miriyoni 19,8 z'ama dorari (miriyaridi hafi 40 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). Abahinga bavuga ko ibigo vyari vyarateye imbere cane  muri urwo rudandazwa rwo kuri internet na cane cane muri ibi bihe vya Covid arivyo vyakozweko cane n'ico gihombo. Kuri bamwe bamwe iryo hagarara ryashitse mu masaha arijo haba hageze ko bagurisha cane. Kafui Adza  atwara kompanyi ya Akosombobar, inzu y'uburiro igurisha ivyo kurya kuri internet no ku bahishikiye hagati mu gisagara ca Accra AirportCity, irabana n'ikibuga mpuzamakungu c'indege ca Kotoka. Avuga ko izo mbuga hwaniro zabaye mu masaha yo kurya ivyo ku murango. Kafui avuga ati: "Nico cari igihe cacu ciza kuko 80% y'ivyo tugurisha ni ku  bakiriya baciye kuri internet. Abakiriya bake bashoboye kuza n'imiduga muri ico gihe c'urutavanako mu mabarabara nibo bonyene bashitse ku buriro. Igihe izo mbuga zahagarara , abakozi banje baciye babona ko tutariko turaronka abadusaba kubarungikira ivyo kurya uko twahora. Benshi baca barungika ubutumwa busanzwe bwa telefone, ariko ingorane ni uko udaheza ngo urungike igoto y'ivyo kurya ushaka". Kafui yabwiye BBC ko akoresha amadorari hafi 3.200  (miriyoni zirenga 6 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) ku mwaka kugira amenyekanishe ivyo akora kuri Facebook na Instagram. Ahandi nko muri Afrika y'ubuseruko, , Richard Gikonyo  afise Rickys Home Interiors. N'urudandazwa rushingiye i Nairobi, umurwa mukuru wa Kenya, rukoresha internet  mu gushira abakiriya ibikoresho bitandukanye vyo mu mazu mu gihugu cose. Ihagarara ry'imbuga hwaniro ryabaye mu gihe ku munsi usanzwe ariho akazi kaba gashushe. Gikonyo avuga ati: "Buno nyene naciye mbona ko habaye ikibazo kuko nama ndi ku murongo. Hagati y'isaha cumi z'umuhingamo n'isaha imwe y'ijoro, niho turonka abantu benshi ku mirongo yacu, kuko abantu baba bari mu rutavanako rwo mu mabarabara baca baja ku mbuga hwaniro bagatangura kugura ibintu". Yagiye kumenya ko vyahagaze atanguye kuronka ama terefone menshi y'abakiriya bidoga bamuhamagara  bavuga ko abakozi biwe batariko barishura ubutumwa bwabo. Avuga ati: "Tugereranya ko hari abakiriya 50 tutatunganirije, none uyu munsi (ku wakabiri), imirimo iri hasi cane". Karen Wambugu, umuhinga mu kugurisha kuri internet avuga ati: "Abakozweko cane n'abahembwa kuri buri kintu bagurishije hamwe n'imangazini ntonto, kuko nini nini zo zifise imbuga zazo (websites). Iyo imbuga hwaniro nka Facebook na Instagram zihagaze, imangazini ntonto ntizishobora kugurisha kuko nta yindi  nzira zifise" Aho iryo hagarara ribereye, abantu baciye baja ku zindi mbuga hwaniro nka Twitter kugira baronke umurongo. Ariko nko muri Nigeria, Twitter ntaco yafashije. Reta y'ico gihugu yarayihagaritse mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa gatandatu inyuma y'aho ikuriye ku rubuga rwayo ubutumwa bwa prezida Muhammadu Buhari imwagiriza kurenga ku mategeko yayo agenga "inyifato itari nziza". Ariko abanya-Nigeria bamwe babandanije kwandika kuri Twitter baciye ku buhinga buziguye bwa Virtual Private Networks (VPN).

column2: Nigeria: Uyu mupatiri yiyemeje gukingira ibigirwamana vy'aba Igbo biriko biraturirwa
column3: Mu gihe abavugabutumwa bo mw'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu buseruko bwa Nigeria bagenda baturira ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyo muri kahise babona ko ari ibigirwamana, umupatiri umwe w'umukatorika wewe abandanya avyegeranya. Ibi bibumbano bifise ikibanza gikomeye mu madini kama yo muri ako karere kabamwo abo mu bwoko bw'aba Igbo, basanzwe babifata nk'imana zabo kandi bemera ko bifise ubushobozi ndengakamere. Gusa abanywanyi b'aya madini kama bagenda bagabanuka kubera idini rya Gikristu - ahanini rigizwe n'amashengero ya Pentecote - rigenda ryigarurira abatari bake. Abanyamakuru ba BBC Igbo Chiagozie Nwonwu na Karina Igonikon barerekana utwigoro tw'uyu mupatiri two gukingira kahise kariko karatokombera kubera ibikorwa vy'abavugabutumwa bamwe bamwe. N'aho bamwita "umuriro waka", nta kintu giteye ubwoba kuri Patiri Paul Obayi arongoye inzu ndangamurage ishinguwemwo ibigirwamana mu gisagara ca Nnsuka kiri mu buseruko bwa Nigeria. Iyi nzu ndangamurage y'ivyumba bitatu iherereye mu kigo c'Isengero nkuru ya Katorika yitiriwe umweranda Tereza (Saint Theresa), irimwo amajana n'amajana y'ibigirwamana bitandukanye, ikibumbano c'intambwe hamwe n'ibishusho vy'imana z'aba Igbo. Iyo hagize abava inyuma y'izi mana kama, cane cane kubera inyigisho z'amashengero ya Pentecôte bamwe mu bavugabutumwa baca baturira ibi bibumbano, bavuga ko biteye kubiri n'ukwemera gushingiye ku Mana imwe, kandi ko ari "impwemu mbi zitera imikoshi". Rimwe na rimwe, hari n'abemera izo mana kama bo nyene ubwabo bavyituririra bishimikije umugani wo mu migenzo y'aba Igbo uvuga ngo: "Iyo imana ibangamye cane, icika urukwi rwo guturira". Ariko Patiri Obayi wewe yafashe iyindi nzira mu gukingira izo mana n'imanakazi, akavuga ko akoresha ububasha ahabwa n'Imana kugira ngo azake izo nguvu ndengakamere. Ibi vyamutumye bamutazira Okunerere - "umuriro uturira ibigirwamana muri mutima". Ari kuri iyo nzu ndangamurage, yavuze ati: "Naramaze gusambura izi mpwemu". "Iki ubona hano ni ikibarara. Nta kintu na kimwe kirimwo". Patiri Obayi avuga ko ahanini yigiye ku mazu ndangamurage yo mu bihugu vyo mu burengero bw'isi biriko biraterwa igitsure kugira ngo bigarukane ibibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni, aho atanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Benin Bronzes/Bronzes du Bénin (ibibumbano vy'ivyuma birenga igihumbi vyari bishashije ingoro y'umwami w'icitwa Ubwami bwa Benin, ari yo Nigeria ya kino gihe). "Naragendeye amazu ndangamurage yo mu burengero nca nsangayo ibi bibumbano, harimwo mbere n'ivyavuye muri Benin, ariho naca nigira inama yo kubibungabunga". Uwurongoye iyi sengero nkuru, Patiri Eugene Odo, arashigikiye aka kigoro kiwe, aho agereranya iyi nzu ndangamurage n'iyindi yegukira Katorika mu Butaliyano. Ati: "I Roma nk'akarorero, hari inzu ndangamurage ibitsemwo ibintu vyahinguwe mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwa gipagani bw'Abaromani, kandi ingenzi zama zigendera iyo nzu mu ntumbero yo kwiga ingene umuntu yagiye atera imbere". N'aho iyi nzu ndangamurage ibitse ibi bigirwamana yakira ingenzi ziva kure mbere n'i Lagos, irakeneye kugarukirwa. Ibibumbano, bimwe mbere bimaze ibinjana, bisanzaye irya n'ino hasi muri iyo nzu, vyuzuye inkungugu. Hari mbere n'ivyamaze kuribwa n'umuswa. Ibi vyose ni ivyo yegeranije mu "butumwa amaze akora mu kiringo kirenga imyaka 20 aho agenda yigisha mu bisagara no mu mitumba itandukanye mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. Ati: "Abantu barandikira isengero ryanje bansaba ko ngenda kubakuriraho ibi bigirwamana bibabujije amahoro". Ni itunga rikomeye ryerekana imana z'aba Igbo z'ubwoko bwinshi. Ariko iyikomeye muri izi zose ni Adaada leja, ikigirwamana cambitswe inkofero y'injishano yasengwa n'abarondera kuvyara. Patiri Obayi avuga ko iyi imaze imyaka hafi 200. Odinani, idini kama ry'aba Igbo, ryariho imbere y'umuzo y'idini rya Gikristu n'ubukoloni.  Ni uburyo bwo guterekera aho abantu basenga umuzimu userukiwe n'igishusho kizwi kw'izina rya chi, kugira ngo ubasabire kuri Rugira Vyose, bita Chukwu. Izindi mana basenga harimwo: Si benshi bagisenga izi mana kama, kandi abenshi barahamwa cane n'abakirisu basanzwe ari na bo benshi. Imisi mikuru yabo irasuzuguritse, kandi n'imigirwa imwe imwe isa no kubandwa ibonwa nabi mbere birashika n'utuzu tw'indaro tugaterwa mu bikorwa bijanye n'ubukristu. Muri kino gihe, abenshi mu bakigendera muri aya madini kama ni abatama, n'aho ubu hari bamwe mu rwaruka bagenda bagarariza ubukristu bagashira imbere imigirwa barazwe n'abakurambere. Chinasa Nwosu, umusenyeri w'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu rusengero rwa Royal Church ruri mu gisagara Port Harcourt kiri mu buseruko, ararwanya bikomeye uku kwemera kama. Musenyeri Nwosu yatanguye kumenyekana mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1990 igihe yasambura utuzu tw'indaro, aturira ivyitwa ibigirwamana, anarandura ibiti avuga ko vyari "ibiti vya shetani/satani". Ibi biti, bimwe muri vyo bikaba ari ivya kera cane, bizungurutswe hasi n'ibitambaro vy'amabara atukura canke yera, bigafatwa nk'ivyeranda ku bayoboke bavyo babisenga bakanabitambira. Hari bimwe usanga biri ku mihana y'abantu ariko vyinshi biri mu mashamba. Ati: "Imana ntishaka ko dusenga ibigirwamana. Idini kama rya Afrika akenshi rishingiye ku gusenga ibigirwamana". Asubiramwo amajambo yo muri Bibiriya, yongerako ati: "Imihezagiro uyironka mu gihe utaye ivyo bintu vyavumwe". Avuga ko ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni mu burengero bwa Nigeria ubu bikaba bibarizwa mu mazu ngandamurage yo mu bihugu vy'uburengero, bitirirwa Imana iyo ari yo yose, akaba ashigikiye ko bigarukanwa mu gihugu. Hagati aho, aragabisha reta ya Nigera ko mu gihe yogarukana ibibumbano bishobora kuba vyaragizwe ibigirwamana, agatanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Ikenga biri mu nzu ndangamurage y'Ubwongereza, ko bikwiye guturirwa. Ibi vyiyumviro birarwanywa bikomeye na Patiri Obayi yiyemeje gukingira ibi bibumbano mu nzu yiwe ndangamurabe. Ati: "Ibi ni ibibumbano abana bacu bazokwigirako kugira ngo batahure neza ingene abakurambere babo bari babayeho".

column2: Umunsi ntarengwa ku bihugu vyifuza gusaba kwakira Can 2025
column3: Na Oluwashina Okeleji Yandika ku nkino Urwego rw’umupira w’amaguru muri Afrika (Caf) rwashinze itariki 11 Munyonyo(11) nk’umunsi ntarengwa ku bihugu bishaka kumenyesha ko vyifuza kwakira inkino z’igikombe ca Afrika, Can 2025. Hategerezwa kuboneka igihugu gishasha cakira izo nkino inyuma y’aho Guinee (Conakry) yakiwe  uburenganzira kubera amakenga ku bikorwa-remezo vyo kwitegurira izo nkino. Urwo rwego rushaka ko bitarenze itariki 16 Kigarama (12) rwoba rwaronse ku cicaro carwo i Cairo integuro zuzuye z’ibihugu vyifuza kwakira izo nkino zirimwo inyandiko zikenewe, ibisagara vyoberamwo inkino hamwe n’icemezo c’uko reta ibishigikiye. Abagenduzi ba Caf  bazogendera ibihugu bizoba vyatanze integuro z’uko bishaka kwakira inkino kuva itariki 5 gushika kuri 25 Nzero (ukwezi kwa mbere) mu mwaka uza mu butumwa bwo kuja kuraba uwubereye gusubirira Guinee. Ivyo abagenduzi babonye bizoshikirizwa komite nshingwabikorwa ya Caf igizwe n’abantu 24, iyo nayo izoca itangaza igihugu kizokwakira inkino canke ibihugu bizofatanya mu kuzakira ku wa 10 Ruhuhuma (ukwezi kwa kabiri). Umwe mu bategetsi bo hejuru ba Caf yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ko urwo rwego rushaka kwirinda gusubira kumaramara mu guha izo nkino ibihugu “bidashobora kwubaka ibikorwa-remezo n’aho kwakirira abashitsi vyo kwereka amakungu”. Cameroun niyo yakiriye inkino za 2021 uyu mwaka mu gihe Cote d’Ivoire ariyo izokwakira iza 2023, zizokinwa mu ntango z’umwaka wa 2024. Hari ibihugu bimaze kwerekana ko vyifuza gusaba kwakira izo nkino z’igikombe kigira 35, ariko hasigaye ko bibitangaza icese. Moroc, ari nayo yakiriye inkino za nyuma z’igikombe ca Can mu rwego rw’abagore muri Mukakaro(7), ishaka gusaba kwakira inkino z’igikombe c’abagabo naco, nk’uko vyavuzwe n’isoko ryo mu rwego rujejwe umupira w’amaguru muri Maroc. Iciyumviro ca Nigeria co kwakira izo nkino ifatanije na Benin ntaco giherutse kuvugwako kuva Amaaju Pinnick avuye mu mabanga yo kurongora urwego rujejwe umupira w’amaguru muri ico gihugu (NFF). Ivy’uko Algeria, Afrika y’Epfo na Senegal navyo bishobora gusaba kwakira izo nkino vyavuzwe n’abantu gusa, n’ubwo benshi bifuza ko Senegal ariyo yokwakira izo nkino. BBC Sport Africa yamenye ko urwego rw’umupira w’amaguru muri Tunisia rukiriko rurarondera gushigkirwa na reta imbere y’uko ruja mw’ihiganwa. Tunisia niyo yakiriye inkino zo mu 1994 na 2004.

column2: ‘Vyanka vyakunda’ Mohamed Salah azoguma muri Liverpool
column3: Umusatirizi wa  Liverpool Mohamed Salah avuga ko "ivyo ari vyo vyose" mu mwaka w'inkino uza azoba ari muri Liverpool, ariko ko adashaka kujanwa mu mpari z'amasezerano mashasha. Amasezerano ya Salah azorangira muri Ruheshi (6) 2023, ibituma haduka amajambo menshi ko ashobora kugurishwa mu gihe atotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha kuko inyuma y'umwaka yoca yigira ahandi ata rufaranga na rumwe aguzwe. Abajijwe kuri kazoza kiwe imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma rwa Ligue des Champions/Champions League ku wa gatandatu, avuga ati: "Si nshaka kuvuga kuri ibi bintu. "Ico nipfuza ni ukubona Hendo [Jordan Henderson] ateruye igikombe". Uyu musatirizi w'umunyamisiri w'imyaka 29 avuga kandi ati: "Sinitaho ivy'amasezerano ubu. Si nshaka kwigungirako. "Ivyo ari vyo vyose ndacari ng'aha mu mwaka uza w'inkino". Mugenziwe Sadio Mane, wewe avuga ko azoshikiriza ingingo ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe inyuma y'urukino rwa nyuma na  Real Madrid i Paris. Uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Sénégal  amaze kwinjiriza ibitsindo 120 mu nkino 268 amaze gukinira Liverpool, na we nyene mu kwa gatandatu yinjira mu mezi 12 ya nyuma y'amasezerano yiwe. Yabwiye imboneshakure Sky Sports News ati: "Iki kibazo [kuri kazoza kanje] nzocishura inyuma ya Champions League. Nimba nzoguma aha canke ntazoguma aha, nzovyishura inyuma ya Champions League". Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp ntabona ko ibizova mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu ari rwo fatiro ku bakinyi bamwe bamwe mu gufata ingingo yo kwongereza amasezerano canke kuyahagarika. Ati: "Oya, oya na gato. None, mu gihe twotsinda, boca bashaka kugenda ? Turiko turaganira n'abakinyi bose, ubu si igihe co kuvuga ibijanye n'ivyavuye muri ibi biganiro. Nta n'umwe azi ivyo turiko turategura. "Gusa nta mwanya uhari, buri misi itatu turakina. Abakinyi barabizi, turabizi, rimwe na rimwe turahuza, ikindi gihe ntiduhuze, hanyuma rero tugakorera hamwe. "Turazinanye kuva kera". Salah yinjiye muri Liverpool avuye muri Roma mu 2017 akaba amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo 156 mu nkino 253 amaze gukinira Liverpool. Yarafashije uyu murwi gutsindira ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza (Premier League) mu 2019-2020, igikombe c'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League) mu 2019, igikombe FA Cup hamwe n'igikombe c'ihiganwa (League Cup) uno mwaka w'inkino, igikombe c'isi yose gihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere  (FIFA Club World Cup)  be n'igikombe ca Uefa Super Cup mu kiringo amaze muri Liverpool. Mu kwa gatatu, Klopp yavuze ko Salah ari we wenyene azofata ingingo ku vyerekeye  gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha. Uyu musatirizi yahoze akinira Chelsea aherutse kuvuga ko ashaka kuguma muri Liverpool, ariko ko kazoza kiwe kari mu minwe y'uyu murwi kandi ko atariko arasaba "ibitagenda". Ku wa Mungu, Liverpool yarangije ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza isumbijwe inota rimwe ritarenga ntirirenguke na Manhester City, ivyarangije ibizigizigi bari bafise vyo gutsindira ibikombe bine mu mwaka w'inkino umwe, ibitarigera bibaho mu Bwongereza. Urukino rwo ku wa gatandatu ruzoyihuza na Real Madrid i Paris mu Bufaransa ruzokwibutsa urundi rwa Champions League rwo mu 2018 aho uyo murwi wo muri Espagne watsinze 3-1, Salah akaba atarurangije kubera yavunitse mu gice ca mbere agonganye na Sergio Ramos mu buryo bwateje impari nyinshi. Salah yongerako ati: "Numva mfise ishaka, ishaka ryinshi cane, inyuma y'ivyabaye igihe giheze [mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa 2018], kandi ku wa Mungu - bose bafise ishaka kuri iki". "Iki turakirwanira kandi bose barabishashaye".
