column2: India: Umupatiri n’umubikira bakatiwe guherayo bagirizwa kugandagura uwundi mubikira
column3: Umupatiri w'umugatorika n'umubikira bo mu Buhindi baciriwe umunyororo w'ubuzima bwose bagiriwe n'icaha co kugandagura uwundi mubikira, haraciye  imyaka irenga 28. Patiri Thomas Kottoorna hamwe n'Umubikira Sephy baciriwe urubanza ku wa kabiri bagiriwe kwica uwundi mubikira yari afise imyaka 21, Umubikira Abhaya mu 1992, maze baca bazimanganya ivyemezo vy'ubu bwicanyi. Aba bantu babiri bagandaguye uyu mubikira mu gihe yari abafashe bari mu busambanyi. Mu ntango, igiporisi cari cibajije ko uyu mubikira yari akiri muto yoba yariyahuye. Ariko haciye hatangura amatohoza yimbitse inyuma y'aho umuryango wiwe n'abaharanira agateka ka muntu berekaniye amakenga ku rupfu rwiwe. Sephy w'imyaka  55 ntaco aravuga kuri uru rubanza, ariko Patiri Kottoor ubu afise imyaka 69 ashimangira ko ari umwere. Ejo k uwa gatatu asomewe urwo rubanza, yabwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri ici o gihugu ati: "Jewe nta caha nakoze. Imana iri kumwe nanje". Hari uwundi mupatiri agira gatatu, Patiri Jose Poothrikkayil, na we yagirijwe n'abashikirizamanza ko yasambanije Umubikira Sephy. Yarahagaitswe mu 2008 kuri ubu bwicanyi ariko mu nyuma ararekurwa kubera habuze ivyemezo. Ikiziga c'uyu mubikira Abhaya catowe mu kinogo hafi y'uburaro bw'ababikira bwitiriwe umweranda Piyo mu gisagara ca Kottayam kiri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi. Sentare yavuze ko imbere y'uko yicwa, Abhaya yaravyutse mu gaturuturu ku wa 27 z'ukwa gatatu 1992, aja mu gikoni c'ubwo buraro bw'ababikira agiye gutora amazi yari muri firigo. Mu gihe yashika mu gikoni, yafashe mpiri Kottoor na Sephy. Sentare ivuga ko ku gutinya ko yohava abamenera ibanga, baciye bamwica hanyuma banyegeza ikiziga. Amatohoza ku rupfu rw'uyu mubikira yari akiri muto yarabaye ikibazo ngorabahizi mu Buhindi. Mu ntango, igiporisi c'akarere n'ic'igihugu vyari vyavuze ko yari yariyahuye. Ariko, mu 1993, ikigo c'Ubuhindi kijejwe igendereza (Central Bureau of Investigation, CBI) caciye gifata mu minwe iki kibazo, maze gisanga yarishwe, ariko nticashoka gitora abamugandaguye. Kw'itegeko rya sentare nkuru y'igihugu mu 2008, CBI yaciye isubira kwugurura amatohoza, irahagarika yongera iragiriza Kottoor, Sephy na Patiri Jose Poothrikkayil, ariko mu nyuma bararekuwe batanze ingwati. Niho haca hakurikira urubanza rwamaze igihe kirekire. Jomon Puthenpurackal aharanira agateka ka zina muntu akaba ari mu baharaniye ko uwakoze aka kabi kabishe akubitwa intahe mu gahanga avuga ati: "Ubutungane burarenganuye Umubikira Abhaya. Agiye kwiruhukira mu mahoro".

column2: Wagner: Ivyakozwe n'abacangero ba Russia muri Libya vyashizwe ahabona
column3: Amatohoza mashasha ya BBC yashize ahabona urugero rw'ibikorwa vya gisirikare vyakozwe n'umurwi w'abacangero b'Abarusiya ukorera mu kinyegero mu ntambara yo muri Libya, bifitaniye isano n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara n'igisirikare c'Uburusiya. Terefone ngendanwa ya Samsung yatawe n'umurwanyi w'umurwi Wagner irerekana uruhara wagize - hamwe n'amazina yo kwiyoberanya abarwanyi bakoresha. Hanyuma kandi BBC ifise "urutonde" rw'ibikoresho vya gisirikare bigezweho abahinga bavuga ko ahantu honyene vyashobora kuva ari mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya. Uburusiya burahakana ko ataho buhuriye na Wagner. Uwu murwi watanguye kumenyekana mu 2014 igihe wari ushigikiye uruhande rwagomba kwiyonkora, rwari rushigikiwe n'Uburusiya mu ntambara yo mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Ico gihe, wagiye wibonekeza mu bice bitandukanye vy'isi harimwo Syria, Mozambique, Sudan, no muri Centrafrique. Abarwanyi ba Wagner bagiye kuboneka muri Libya mu kwa kane mu 2019 igihe bahambije ingabo z'umu mujenerali yarwanya ubutegetsi, Khalifa Haftar, igihe agabiye igitero kuri reta y'ico gihugu yari ishigikiwe na ONU ku mugwa mukuru, Tripoli. Iyi ntambara yagiye kurangira habaye amasezerano yo kuyihagarika mu kw'icumi mu 2020. Uwu murwi ukorera mw'ibanga rikomeye, ariko BBC yashoboye kuvugana mu buryo budasanzwe na babiri mu bahoze ari abarwanyi bawo. Barahishuye ibirabwa ko muntu ashobora kwinjira muri Wagner - n'ingene ari umurwi utagira amategeko ngenderwako. Nta gukekeranya ko bica impfungwa  - ikintu umwe mu bahoze ari abarwanyi bawo yemeza atarya umunwa. "Nta n'umwe akeneye kugaburira uwundi munwa". Iki kiza gishigikira ibiri mw'ireresi (documentaire)  yiswe Haftar's Russian Mercenaries: Inside the Wagner Group - yateguwe n'ibisata vya BBC  bitangaza amakuru mu carabu no mu kirusiya. Mu bindi vyerekanwa muri yo harimwo ibivugwa ko ari ivyaha vyo mu ntambara, harimwo n'ubwicanyi bwakorewe abasivire n'ibigirankana. Umunyagihugu wo mu kigwati kimwe avuga ko yigize uwapfuye igihe abo mu muryango wiwe bariko  baragandagurwa. Ivyo yavuze vyarafashije BBC kumenya uwikekwa ko ari we yabishe. Asigura ikindi cerekana ivyaha vyo mu ntambara, umusirikare wa reta ya Libya aribuka ingene umugenzi bakorana yishikanye  ku barwanyi ba Wagner ariko akaba yaciye araswa amasasu abiri mu nda. Kuva ico gihe ntiyigeze asubira kumubona, co kimwe n'abandi bagenzi batatu bafashwe ico gihe nyene. Iyo terefone ya Samsung irerekana kandi uruhara rw'abo bacangero mu gucukura ubutare no mu gutega imitego mu turere tubamwo abasivire. Gutega ama mines udashizeho ikimenyetso ni icaha co mu ntambara. Iyi terefone ngendanwa yatawe n'umurwanyi wa Wagner atazwi igihe abarwanyi w'uwu murwi basubira inyuma bavuye mu turere two mu bumanuko bwa Tripoli  ku mpeshi yo mu 2020. Muri yo harimwo amakarata yanditse mu kirusiya aberekana bari ku rugamba, ivyerekana uruhara rudasanzwe rw'uwu murwi Wagner n'ibikorwa vyawo vya gisirikare. Harimwo amashusho ya drone hamwe n'amazina abarwanyi ba Wagner bakoresha, harimwo n'uwo BBC ivuga ko yamenyemwo. Iyi terefone ngendanwa ibitswe ahadata. Urutonde rw'ibirwanisho n'ibindi bikoresho vya gisirikare ruri ku mpapuro 10  ziri mu rwandiko rwo ku wa 19 z'ukwa mbere 2020, rukaba rwahawe BBC n'umukozi wo mw'igendereza rya Libya, rushobora kuba rwatowe ahahoze hari abarwanyi ba Wagner. Uru rwandiko rwerekana abashobora kuba ari bo batanga uburyo bw'amafaranga mu gushigikira urugamba. Rwerekana ibikoresho bikenewe kugira ngo bashike ku "ntumbero ya gisirikare" - harimwo vya bimodoka vya burende (blinde) bine, inkoho za kalashnikov ziharurwa mu majana hamwe n'ivyuma vya radar bigezweho. Umuhinga mu vya gisirikare yabwiye BBC ko ubuhinga bumwe bumwe bwo guhingura ivyo birwanisho bushobora kuba burangwa mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya honyene. Uwundi muhinga, uyu akaba ari umuhinga mu bijanye n'umurwi wa Wagner, avuga ko uru rutonde rushobora kuba rwerekana uruhara rwa Dmitry Utkin. Uyu yahoze akora mu gisata c'igendereza ry'igisirikare c'Uburusiya avugwa ko ari we yashinze uwu murwi Wagner ari na we yawuhaye iryo zina (izina ryahoze ari iritazirano ryiwe). BBC yaragerageje kurondera Dmitry Utkin ariko vyaranse. Hanyuma mu mwihwezo wakozwe kuri uru rutonde hamwe no mu rundi rwandiko, uyu muhinga avuga ko amajambo  Evro Polis na General Director yerekana uruhara rwa Yevgeny Prigozhin, umurwizatunga afitaniye ubugenzi bwa hafi cane na Perezida Vladimir Putin. Igisata kijejwe ikigega ca Amerika (US Treasury) carafatiye ibihano Evro Polis mu 2018, kivuga ko ari ikompanyi y'Uburusiya yakodeshejwe kugira ngo "ikingire" ibibanza vyo muri  Syria bicukurwamwo igitoro "bigenzurwa canke vyegukira" Prigozhin. Amatohoza yakozwe n'abanyamakuru bo mu burengero bw'isi yerekana ko hari isano hagati ya Prigozhin na Wagner. Abandanya ahakana ko ata sano na rimwe afitaniye na Evro Polis canke Wagner. Umuvugizi yabwiye BBC ko Yevgeny Prigozhin ata migenderanire n'imwe afitaniye na Evro Polis canke Wagner. Prigozhin avuga ko ata kintu na kimwe arigera yumva ku vyerekeye ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu muri Libya ryakozwe n'Abarusiya: "Ndazi neza ko iki ari ikinyoma ceruye". Ubushikiranganji bw'Uburusiya bujejwe imigenderanire bwabwiye BBC ko buriko burakora "ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo bushigikire agahengwe n'utwigoro two gutorera umuti ikibazo ca Libya biciye mu nzira ya poritike". Ubu bushikiranganji bwongerako y'uko ibivugwa kuri Wagner muri Libya bishingiye "ku makuru y'ibinyoma" kandi ko bifise intumbero yo "gucafuza poritike y'Uburusiya" muri Libya. Uwu murwi ntubaho ku mugaragaro, ariko abantu bagera ku 10,000 bemeza ko bagiranye amasezerano n'imiburiburi incuro imwe na Wagner kuva itangura kurwana n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya mu buseruko bwa Ukraine mu 2014. Abarwanyi b'aba Wagner bababa 1000 nibo bavugwa ko barwanye ku ruhande rwa Jenerali Khalifa Haftar muri Libya kuva 2019 gushika 2020. BBC mu Burusiya yarasavye umwe mu bahoze ari abarwanyi gusigura ico ari co Wagner. Yishuye ati: "Ni umurwi ufise intumbero yo gutsimbataza no gushigikira inyungu za reta hanze y'imbibe z'igihugu cacu". Nayo ku bijanye n'abarwanyi bayo, avuga ko hamwe usanga ari "abantu bamenyereye ivyo kurwana", abantu barondera akazi canke abakunda igihugu bashaka kugikorera. Uwundi yahoze ari umurwanyi yabwiye BBC ko ata mategeko ngenderwako atomoye uwu murwi ufise. Iyo uwufashwe ata makuru afise atanga, canke adashoboye gukora nk'"umucakara", aha rero "igikurikira kirazwi". Andrey Chuprygin, umuhinga akorana n'inama mpuzamakungu mpanuzwajambo y'Uburusiya (Conseil international de Russie/Russia International Council), avuga ko Uburusiya bwavuga buti: "Reka binjire muri iki kintu, hanyuma turabe ingene bigenda. Tubonye harimwo akarusho, turashobora kugikoresha ku nyungu zacu. Tubonye ivyaco bibaye nabi, twebwe ntaco tuzokibazwako". Itembagazwa rya Gaddafi mu 2011: Ubutegetsi bwa Col Muammar Gaddafi bwari bumaze imyaka irenga mirongo ine bwagiye kurangira muri ca gihuhusi c'imigumuko y'abarabu. Yaragerageje guhunga ariko yarafashwe aricwa. Igihugu carasambutse: inyuma ya  2014, hadutse imirwi yari ihanganye mu buseruko no mu burengero Intambara zashitse i Tripoli mu kwa kane mu  2019: Jenerali Haftar arongoye ingabo zarwanira mu buseruko, yarateye umugwa mukuru Tripoli na reta yari ishigikiwe na ONU. Impande zompi zari zifise ibihugu vy'akarere bizishigikiye mu vya gisirikare n'imigenderanire, n'aho igihugu cari mu bihano cafatiwe na ONU Agahengwe mu kw'icumi mu 2020: Hanyuma mu ntango za 2021 hashinzwe reta y'ubumwe kugira ngo itegure amatora mu kw'icumi na kabiri. Abarwanyi mvakamkungu n'abacangero bategerezwa kuba bagiye, ariko hari ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bakiri mu gihugu.

column2: Ndayishimiye: ‘Karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?’
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko ibibazo Uburundi bwagiye buracamwo vyatumye igihugu gisigara inyuma mu bisata bitandukanye. Akebura  abakozi gukura amaboko mu mpuzu kugira bagwize umwimbu. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije Abarundi buca bahimbaza umusi mpuzamakungu wahariwe abakozi, Perezida Ndayishimiye ahamagarira Abarundi kwemanga ko basamaye hanyuma bafate ingingo yo gukura amaboko mu mpuzu. Mu gihe abakozi ba reta bari biteze ko umusi nk'uwu ari akaryo keza ko kwongerwa imishahara, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko batokwitega ko bahava bongerwa agashirukabute mu gihe "n'umwenda Reta yafashe mu myaka iheze kugira ihembe abakozi utararihwa". Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko gushika ubu hari abakozi bironderera kwongerezwa impembo mu gihe ataco bariko bafasha reta kugira ironke uburyo bukwiye, bakagomba ko reta isaba imfashanyo kugira ngo ibahembe. Ati: "Uno musi urasanga umukozi wa Reta ashaka agashirukabute gakirurutse ariko we nyene abona abanyonora ikigega ca reta akihorera canke akabakingira ikibaba. Mbere hari naho usanga ari we nyene ariko aranyonora agaca asaba impembo irengeye. "Hari abandi bareka ibidandazwa vyari gutanga amakori bigaca ku ruhande ariko ukwezi kwahera agasaba impembo. None yibaza ko iyo mpembo ica iva hehe, ko hari aho nyene?" Perezida Ndayishimiye ntiyumva ivyo gusaba imfashanyo, kuko kubw'iwe, abakeneye imfashanyo ni abatishoboye. Ahamagarira  abarundi gutahura ko ivyo bagiye baracamwo  vyatumye basamara. Ati: "None ko umuntu wo gufashwa ari uwutishoboye, koko karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?  Jewe si uko ndavyumva; sindanavyemera; ni co gituma bintera isoni gusega". Perezida Ndayishimiye abona ko uwutakoze atari akwiye guhembwa ukwezi guheze kuko ku bw'iwe, "ni we ngumba y'ukuri kuko imana yamuhaye ubwenge n'inkomezi hanyuma abipfisha ubusa". Avuga ko muri kino gihe igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro, agasaba Abarundi guhaguruka bakiyishura ivyo bataye, bakarangura imigambi yo kwiteza imbere. Ati: "Twarabuze vyinshi, twarataye umwanya mwinshi kubera ububegito bwa benshi muri twebwe bwatumye tubura amahoro. "Muri uwo mwanya twataye, ibikorwa bitakozwe ni vyinshi kandi biraturindiriye. "Kurima, tukworora kijambere ntavyo twitaho; twarira ikija mu nda gusa, umusesekara ntiwotubajije, tukitwaza imyibutsa yataye igihe ngo ivy'ejo biraba ab'ejo. "Guhingura itunga kama uwo wari umugani kuko biteba kwimbuka ... gutunganya aho abamukerarugendo ... vyari umugani." "Ivyo vyose vyari akazi koduha itunga dukeneye kandi n'ubu karacaturindiriye".Atera akamo abarundi ko bova hasi bagakora kugira ngo bahamvye ibindi bihugu kuko vyovyo vyamaze kugera kure. Ati: "Abandi barakamaze. Barubatse amabarabara, barubaka amashure, barubaka ingomero z'umuyagankuba, barubaka ivyo ba mukerarugendo bakenera, barubaka ibikoresho vy'ubuhinga ngurukanabumenyi, barubatse amahinguriro, ubu ntaco basigaje. "Twebwe, ivyo vyose biracaturindiriye, dukure amaboko mu mpuzu dukore".

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Diaz, Ronaldo, Longstaff, Origi, Cantwell, Coutinho, Traore
column3: Liverpool iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano yo kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Porto, umunya Colombia  Luis Diaz, 24, ku miriyoni zirenga 81 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Umusatirizi w'umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo, 36, ashobora kuva muri Manchester United mu ci riza mu gihe atokwishimira umumenyereza uyu murwi uzohitamwo burundu. (Star) Manchester United yemereye umukinyi wayo wo hagati Paul Pogba amasezerano mashasha y'igihe kirekire - ashobora kumuha umushahara w'ibihumbi birenga amajana 540 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku ndwi - kugira ngo uyu mufaransa w'imyaka 28 ntazohave agenda kuri gusa mu ci riza mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na'uyu murwi azoba arangiye.  (Sun) Newcastle yanse ivyo yemerewe na Everton ku mukinyi Sean Longstaff.  Uyu mwongereza w'imyaka 24 akina hagati azorangiza amasezerano afitaniye n'aba Magpies mu mpera z'iri higanwa ry'uno mwaka, bakaba bizeye ko bazokwumvikana ku masezerano mashasha.  (Shields Gazzette) Newcastle n'uwundi murwi wa Premier League nyene iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Norwich Todd Cantwell, 23. (Sky Sports) Newcastle iripfuza kandi umukinyi w'inyuma wa West Ham umufaransa Issa Diop, 24, kandi iriko irategura imiriyoni zababa 13,5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo batangure urugamba rwo kumugura. (L'Equipe via Hammers News) Umusatiri wa Liverpool umubirigi Divock Origi, 26, hamwe n'umusatirizi wa Bournemouth umwongereza Dominic Solanke, 24, bari mu bakinyi bariko barakurikiranirwa hagufi na  Newcastle mu gihe iriko irondera uwosubirira Callum Wilson yavunitse. (Telegraph - subscription required) Imirwi ibiri yo muri Premier League iriko irarwanira kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona umunya Brésil Philippe Coutinho, 29, akaba yiteze gufata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe kuri uwu wa gatanu.  (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Paris St-Germain Mauricio Pochettino ariteguye kwakira ico bomwemerera cose kugira ngo abe umumenyereza wa Manchester United. (Sun) Tottenham iriteguye gusubira gutangura urugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Wolves umunya-Espagne Adama Traore, 25. (Athletic - subscription required) Chelsea nta mugambi ifise wo gutanga amafaranga akenewe kugira ngo igumye burundu umukinyi wo hagati yatijijwe ava muri Atletico Madrid Saul Niguez, 27.  (Express) Manchester United ifise amahirwe make yo kugura umukinyi n'umwe muri kuno kwezi ariko ifise umugambi wo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati mu ci riza, igashobora kuzorondera Declan Rice, 22, wa West Ham.  (Talksport) Arsenal yemeye kuzotanga umukinyi azokwiyongera ku mafaranga yemeye gutanga kugira ngo ironke umusatirizi wa Fiorentina umunya-Serbia Dusan Vlahovic, 21. (Ben Jacobs - CBS) Watford yemeye kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool umwongereza Nathaniel Phillips, 24, yamaze kubwirwa ko afise uburenganzira bwo gusezera uyu murwi muri uku kwezi.  (Football Insider) Aba ba Hornets kandi bamenyesheje umukinyi wabo w'inyuma w'umwongereza Danny Rose, 31, ko atazosubira gukinira uyu murwi kandi ko afise uburenganzira bwo kwigira muri kano kadirisha k'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi. (Sky Sports) Leicester City n'iyindi mirwi itari mike ya Premier League izotegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni zababa 45 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika nimba ishaka kugura umusatirizi wa Club Bruges, Charles de Ketelaere, ariko yipfuza cane kwimukira muri Premier League muri uku kwa mbere. (Voetbal Nieuws - via Leicester Mercury) Barcelona iriko iraraba ko yotira umusatirizi wa Manchester United umufaransa Anthony Martial, 26, harimwo n'umugambi wo kuzoshobora kumugura burundu mu mpera z'iri higanwa.  (Sport - in Spanish) Newcastle nayo nyene iripfuza gutira Martial kugira ngo ashobore gusubirira umusatirizi Callum Wilson yavunitse. (Times - subscription required) Barca kandi iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea umunya Danemark Andreas Christensen, 25. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Everton na Newcastle yahambije Arsenal mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya Brésil Bruno Guimaraes, 24, asanzwe akina hagati muri Lyon mu Bufaransa.  (Standard) Umunyegori wa Liverpool  Loris Karius, 28, vyanse ko yimukira muri Greuther Furth, inyuma y'aho uyu murwi wa Bundesliga mu Budagi unaniriwe no kuronka amafaranga asabwa kugira ngo imukure i  Anfield. (Fussball Transfers via Daily Star) Umusatirizi wa Jamaica Michail Antonio, 31, yateye igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri  West Ham azomushikana mu ci rya 2025. (90 Min)

column2: Ubufaransa bwemeje amakori ataguye neza Amerika
column3: Inama nshingamateka y'Ubufaransa yemeje integuro y'itegeko rigena amakori acibwa ibigo bikomakomeye nka Google, Facebook na Apple. Guca 3% nk'ikori ku bikorwa vy'ibigo bikoresha itumatumanako bigera ku 30 birwiriyemwo ivyo muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bishobora kuzanira leta y'Ubufaransa miliyoni 400 z'ama euros muri uyu mwaka wonyene. Abashingamateka birengagije akamo ka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zavuga ko ari akarenganyo, kandi ko zigiye kwihora mu kuzoshiraho amakori nk'ayo. Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca Leta w'Ubufaransa Bruno Le Maire yiyamirije impungenge za Amerika, avuga ko ibintu nk'ibi bikwiye gutoregwa umuti mu biganiro. Ubufaransa buvuga ko bikwiye ko ibigo vyifashisha itumatumanako, bitanga amakori aho bikorera aho kuyatanga aho bifise icicaro gikuru, ivyinshi bikaba bibarizwa muri Amerika. Ubufaransa bwananiwe kwumvisha ibindi bihugu gufatira hamwe iyo ngingo mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, bari kwita 'GAFAs' mu majambo avunaguye, n'ukuvuga Google, Apple, Facebook na Amazon. Ubu rero bwahisemwo gutangura bwo nyene guca ayo makori, ariko bukizera ko iyi ngingo yabwo izoba iy'igihe gito. Hari ibiganiro hagati y'ibihugu bitunze kuruta ibindi bigize umugwi G7 hamwe n'ikigo kijejwe kuraba  imigenderanire mu butunzi n'iterambere mu kugabangana amakori avanwa mw'ikoreshwa ry'itumatumanako muri kino gihe rifise ikibanza gikomeye. Gutyo rero hakaboneka umwumvikano uvuye mu nama ugasubirira ingingo nka bene iyi y'Ubufaransa. Ubwongereza bwatangaje umugambi wo gushiraho amakori asa n'aya y'Ubufaransa, ico cemezo kikazoshobora kuja mu bikorwa mu mwaka uza. Espagne yo yakoze umushinge w'itegeko muri uyu mwaka. Umunyamakuru Dave Lee akorera muri Amerika ya ruguru ati 'Ubufaransa burikumiriye'. Ubutegetsi bwa Washington bwamaze kuvuga ko bugiye kwugurura ingingo yitwa 'Section 301', mu nzira yo gutohoza nimba hari aho burenganywa. Ni ingingo yakoreshejwe mbere, nk'inzira yo gushiraho ibiciro bishasha ku bihugu ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwibaza ko biriko biburiramwo mbege. Nimba Ubufaransa bugiye gukura miliyoni amajana z'ama euros mu mifuko y'ibi bihangange vyo muri Amerika, Amerika nayo ishobora kuvuga iti :'kuki tweho tutokura amafranga mu vyo Ubufaransa bukorera iwacu?' Uko niko vyagenze ku Bushinwa,  bigahamba Amerika mu ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora no gukomera muri kazoza. Amakori ku bikorwa vy'itumatumanako, ni ikibazo giteye impungenge ku Bufaransa, kuko bwikumiriye. Ibiganiro vyigeze gutangura hagati y'ibihugu kuri ayo makori vyahavuye biburizwamwo kuko bamwe muri bo batari bashigikiye ayo makori. Aha umuntu yovuga nka Irland yavyungukiyemwo mu guhamagara abashoramitahe bashaka isoko ku mugabane wa Bulaya. Ibindi bihugu nk'Ubwongereza, Espagne na Autriche biracagonanwa gufata iyo nzira. Ico impande zompi zihuriyeko n'uko igihe carenze co kwiyumvira ingene ibigo vyungukira mw'itumatumanako bitozwa amakori. Ubufaransa bushobora kwitega ibintu bibiri. N'uko ibihugu bitera ikirenge mu cabwo bishiraho amategeko yavyo, bigatuma Ubufaransa butaba nyamwigendako. Ikindi n'uko iyo ntambwe Ubufaransa bwateye ishobora gutuma n'ibindi bihugu bibona ko hageze kwumvikana uko bitoza ayo makori biri hamwe. Ivyo vyotuma amafranga ivyo bigo vyahora vyikwegerako ataha mu bigega vy'ibihugu.

column2: Tanzania: Perezida Samia Suluhu Hassan ariyama abamunegura ku madeni yo hanze
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania Samia Suluhu Hassan ariyamiriza akarwi k'abategetsi bo hejuru b'ico gihugu banegura reta yiwe ku madeni yasavye mu mashirahamwe yo hanze mu ntumbero yo kurangura imigambi y'iterambere. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ari mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu rigacishwa ku mboneshakure, Perezida Samia Hassan arasigura akamaro k'amadeni mu kurangura imigambi y'iterambere ya reta. Yariko arakira icegeranyo kivuye mu bushikiranganji butandukanye c'ukungene amafaranga agenewe kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19 igihugu cahawe n'abatanga imfashanyo y'iterambere ariko arakoreshwa. Perezida Samia avuga ko mu gihe ibindi bihugu bikoresha ayo mafaranga mu kugura ibikoresho vyo kwikingira nk'udupfukantoke n'udupfukamunwa, Tanzania yoyo yakoresheje mu bwitonzi ayo mafaranga mu gukomeza igisata c'amagara y'abantu no mu kwubaka amavuriro mashasha. Aya mafaranga yafashije kandi kwubaka amasomero mashasha y'amashure n'ibigo vy'ukwigiramwo mu turere dutandukanye tw'igihugu. Avuga ko yumva ko yahemukiwe n'abanegura reta yiwe kubona yakiriye aya madeni mvamahanga. Ati: "Birababaje kubona umuntu wari wizigiye afise amabanga nk'ayo akomeye muri reta agukorera ivyo". Ashikirije aya majambo inyuma y'umusi umwe umukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Job Ndugai, asavye imbabazi ku mugaragaro ku majambo yari aherutse gushikiriza, yafashwe ko yayabwiye reta ya Samia Hassan ku bijanye n'amadeni yo hanze. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza iri jambo, Perezida Samia Hassan yavuze ko amwe mu majambo yo kumunegura afitaniye isano n'amatora yo mu 2025, abatari bake bakaba babona ko azorondera kwitoreza ikindi kiringo. Samia Hassan yashitse ku butegetsi mu ntango z'umwaka uheze inyuma y'urupfu rwa Perezida John Pombe Magufuli yari atanguye ikiringo ciwe kigira kabiri kikaba n'ica nyuma gitegekanywa n'ibwirizwashingiro.

column2: Burundi: Kwugara ububare 21h 'birababaje kubura ico ukeneye mu mwanya wipfuza'
column3: Inyuma y'igisagara ca Bujumbura, ubu na Gitega eka no mu ntara ya Muyinga - ihana urubibe n'u Rwanda -  ububare bwose butegerezwa gupfunga isaha zitatu z'ijoro, abanyagihugu bamwe barabishimye abandi bavuga ko ari ihohoterwa. Buramatari w'intara ya Muyinga na musitanteri wa komine Gitega intara ya Gitega ubu nabo nyene batangaje izi ngingo bavuga ko ari izo kubungabunga umutekano. Abo bategetsi bompi batangaza ko "amasaha yo kwugurura ubunywero ku minsi y'ikirimo ari kuva isaha cumi n'imwe z'umuhingamo gushika isaha zitatu z'ijoro". Izo ngingo ziriko zirafatwa mu gihe ubutegetsi bw'u Burundi bubandanya bumenyesha ko igihugu cose kirangwa mwo umutekano. Izo ngingo zifashwe inyuma y'igitero mu ntara ya Cibitoke, abategetsi bavuze ko cagizwe n'abavuye mu Rwanda bateye ikirindiro c'abasirikare bagasubira muri ico gihugu. Abo bategetsi ntibavuga nimba izo ngingo zifitaniye isano n'ico gitero co mu ntara ya Cibitoke. Umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura wewe, Freddy Mbonimpa, avuga ko ata sano rihari, ahubwo izo ngingo zatangajwe bahejeje ukwisuzuma bagasanga harabayeho ukudebukirwa mu gucungera umutekano. Ku biraba ivyo kwugara akabare vyovyo, Bwana Mbonimpa yavuze ko yafashe izo ngingo kubera ko hari abantu bata akazi, bakigira mu kabare aho kuba bari ku kazi. Muri Komine Gitega bamwe bishimira izo ngingo mu gihe abandi babona ko bahotowe. Ntibipfuje gutangazwa amazina yabo. Umunyagihugu umwe avuga ko izo ngingo zari zaratevye, akabona ko zigiye gushira ku murongo ibitari bike, hampande y'umutekano. Agira ati: "Ubu nta muntu azokwiraza ahantu atamvo iboneka ihari, nta n'uwuzoraza umuntu mukinyegero, ahubwo lmana yakoze gukoresha izo ndongozi kugira bagire ico ciyumviro ". Uwundi abona ko gufata izo ngingo bifise imvo, ariko kwugara akabare isaha zitatu hakiri kare cane. Ati: "Ntivyumvikana ukungene isaha zitatu ubunywero bwose buzoba bwugaye. Izo ni ingorane kandi abantu benshi bagiye guherera mu gasho". Eka n'abadandaza inzoga babona ko bagiye kuhahombera, na rirya ngo isaha betegekwako kwugara ariho abakiriya baba batanguye kunywa. Uwundi munyagihigu abona ko abafashe iyo ngingo bibagiye ko hari vyinshi bituma umuntu aja mukabare, atari uko aba agira ate umwanya gusa. Ati: "Murashobora kuba muri no kwi'jambo ryofasha benshi, canke uvuye ahantu. "Ubundi twizera abarongozi bacu ko ingingo badufatira baba babona ko ari zo zikwiriye, ariko si ukuvuga ko bihimbaye kubura ico ufata wari ugikeneye mu mwanya wipfuza".

column2: Gloria Estefan avuga ko yakorewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina afise imyaka icenda
column3: Umuririmvyi Gloria Estefan yanyeguruye ko yahohotewe bishingiye ku gitsina n'umuntu wo mu muryango igihe yari afise imyaka icenda. Uwo muririmvyi w'amamamuko ya Cuba na Amerika  w'imyaka 64 avuga ko yashurashujwe ari kw'ishure ry'umuziki n'umuntu nyina yizera. Yavuze ko "93% y'abana  bahohoterwa bazi kandi baba bizeye ababibakorera. Kandi ivyo ndabizi kuko nari umwe muri abo." Yavuze kuri iryo hohoterwa ubwa mbere mu kiganiro co kuri Facebook Watch  ari kumwe n'umukobwa wiwe akuze n'umukobwa w'uwo bavukana. Clare Crawley azwi mu biganiro vyo kuri television nawe nyene yagaragaye mu kiganiro Red Table Talk: The Estefans, nawe avuga ingene yashurashujwe n'umupatiri. Madame Crawley yavuze ko yashurashujwe "n'umujenama'' igihe yiga kw'ishure rya Katolika. Madame Estefan yamubwiye ati: "Nashaka kuvuga iki kibazo kuko birakenewe cane ko cokwirindwa. Kandi sinashaka kwicara ngaha ataco mvuze nawe uriko uratubwira ivyagushikiye kandi mu butwari". Madame Estafan yaririmvye indirimbo zizwi cane nka Conga na Rythm is Gonna Get You, yavugiye muri ico kiganiro ko incuti itari iya hafi yafatiye ku kwizerwa nyina yari ayifitiye kugira imushurashuze. Umukobwa w'uwo bavukana, Lili, w'imyaka 54 yaciye yishura uwo muririmvyi ati: "Waindiriye  uwu mwanya igihe kirekire". Yavuze ati: "Yari incuti, ariko atari iya hafi. Yari afise ububasha kuko mama yari yanshize mw'ishure ryiwe ry'umuziki aca atangura kumubwira buno nyene ingene nari mfise impano nyinshi n'uko nari nkeneye kwitabwaho bidasanzwe, nca ntangura kwumva ingene yari amahirwe kubona anyitaho gutyo." Madame Estafan , yavukiye muri Cuba hanyuma akimukira Miami n'umuryango wiwe akiri umwana w'igitambambuga, yavuze ko iryo hohoterwa ryatanguye  "buke buke hanyuma birihuta". 'Igihe kibangamye' Uwo muririmvyi amaze gutwara agashimwe ka Grammy Award gatatu yavuze ko yabona ko ari "mu gihe "kibangamye" ariko atashobora kwishitura uwo mugabo. "Naramubwiye, 'Ibi ntibibaho, ntushubora gukora ibintu nk'ibi.' Nawe agaca avuga: 'So ari muri Vietnam, nyoko ari wenyene kandi nzoca ndamwica hamwe womubwira." "Nari inzi ko uwo mugabo ari igipfu nico gituma nibaza ko vy'ukuri yashobora kugirira nabi mama." Yavuze ko ayo maganya yatumye atakaza ibice vy'umushatsi , ariko araruha arabwira nyina ivyariko biraba. N'ubwo nyima yabibwiye igiporisi, yagiriwe inama yo kudashingisha urubanza kuko yari "kurushirizaho guhahamurwa no kuja guhagarara  imbere ya sentare kuvuga ivyamushikiye".

column2: Umwamikazi Elizabeth II na Africa: Ibihe bikomeye vy'ingoma yiwe
column3: Umwamikazi Elizabeth II yagendeye ibihugu birenga 20 vyo muri Afrika ku ngoma yiwe, igihe ingoma y'Ubwongereza yariko irarangira, ukwikukira nakwo kuriko kurashwara Afrika. Ubucuti budasanzwe bwarabandanije biciye mw'ishirahamwe rya Commonwealth, umwamikazi yari arongoye. Yari imigenderanire ikomeye - rimwe na rimwe igoye - imigenderanire iri hagati y'ingoma y'Ubwongereza  hamwe n'igihe c'ubukoloni. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth yavugiye ijambo imbere y'inzu ya reta i Cape Town, muri Afrika y'Epfo igihe yashikana imyaka 21, yiyemeza ko ubuzima bwiwe bwose azokorera ishirahamwe rya Commonwealth. "Ahantu hose nagiye muri iki gihugu ciza ca Afrika y'Epfo.... abavyeyi banje, mwenewacu nanje nyene twarakunzwe cane n'abanyagihugu baco, gushika aho twiyumva nk'abantu bari muhira ngaha, nk'uko umenga twabanye na bo ubuzima bwabo bwose. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth agaragara ngaha mw'ihoteli Treetops muri Kenya ari kumwe n'umugabo wiwe, Duke wa Edinburgh. Mu nyuma akiri muri urwo rugendo, yumvise amakuru ko se wiwe, Umwami George VI yatanze kandi ko ategerezwa kuba umwamikazi. Uru ni rumwe mu ngendo zibiri umwamikazi Elizabeth yagize muri Nigeria. Yafashwe ifoto ngaha ari kumwe n'umutegetsi Oba Adenji-Adele II i Lagos. Yaragendeye kandi Calabar, Enugu, Jos, Kaduna, Kano na Port Harcourt. Umwamikazi Elizabeth ariko aratambana na Kwame Nkrumah, prezida wa mbere wa Ghana inyuma yo kwikukira, yaza n'imbere mu muhari w'abashaka kwikukira. Yatamvye umuziki wateguriwe urwo rugendo wiswe Welcome Your Majesty. Umwamikazi Elizabeth n'umuganwa Philip bafashwe ifoto bari kumwe n'igikomangoma Haile Selassie wa Ethiopia i Addis Abeba, mu rugendo rw'akazi. Ico gikomangoma carahungiye mu Bwongereza hagati ya 1936 na 1941 inyuma y'aho Ubutaliyano bwigaruriye igihugu ciwe aza kugaruka ku ngoma mu 1941 igihe Ubwongereza na Commonwealth batsinda Ubutaliyano. Umwamikazi Elizabeth na prezida El Tigani El-Mahi bariko barava ku kibuga c'indege ca Khartoum mu modoka. Urugendo rwiwe muri Sudani harimwo n'umuhingamo w'isiganwa ku ngamiya hamwe n'urugendo rwo kuraba ibikorwa vyo kwubaka urugomero rw'umuyagankuba rwa Roseires kuri Nil Bleu, rwarangiye mu mwaka ukurikira. Umwamikazi ari kumwe na prezida Julius Nyerere atanguye urugendo rw'akazi rw'imisi itatu. Imyaka 18 imbere y'aho, Dr Nyerere yari yashikanye Tanganyika yahoze ikoronijwe n'Ubwongereza ku ntahe yo kwikukira, aca aba uwa mbere akibereye umushikiranganji wa mbere hanyuma aba prezida w'ico gihugu wa mbere. Uko imyaka yagenda, yagiye yanka cane Ubwongereza n'Uburaya. Ariko, reta y'Ubwongereza yamubona nk'umuntu afise inguvu zo guhoyahoya mu karere karimwo ibihuhusi vyinshi. Prezida wa Zimbabwe yarahawe ikidari n'umwamikazi mu 1994. Ariko igihe imishamirano yongerekana hagati ya Zimbabwe na reta y'Ubwongereza ku mugambi w'isubirwamwo ry'itangwa ry'amatongo, Zimbabwe yarikuye muri Commonwealth mu 2003 - hanyuma Mugabe aca yakwa ico kidari mu 2008. Umwamikazi Elizabeth yafashwe ifoto ashitse ku kibuga c'indege ca Durban. Yari mu rugendo rw'akazi rw'imisi itandatu muri Afrika y'Epfo, hakaba habaye igihe c'imvura ciza mu myaka 10, aho yaciye atazirwa Motlalepula canke "umwamikazi w'imvura". Umwamikazi ari kumwe n'umukuru w'igihugu wa mbere wa Afrika y'Epfo w'umwirabure, Nelson Mandela, bivugwa ko bakundana cane. Umwamikazi yarandikiye amakete prezida Mandela aho yakoresha "Umugenzi wawe  nyawe, Elizabeth R" kandi bisa n'uko yamuhamagara "Nelson", mu gihe bivugwa ko na we yamuhamagara bisanzwe "Elizabeth" aciye ku ruhande amategeko agenga ubwami. Umwamikazi yaragendeye Nigeria ubugira kabiri mu 2003. Ico gihugu cari carahagaritswe muri Commonwealth kubera kutubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu ku butegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Sani Abacha mu 1995, gisubira kwemererwa kugaruka mu 1999, hagarutse ubutegetsi bwa gisivile. Umwamikazi na prezida Obasanjo bagaragara ngaha mu birori vyo kwugurura inama y'abakuru b'ibihugu bihurikiye mw'ishirahamwe Commonwealth i Abuja. Mu rugendo rwa nyuma ku mugabane wa Afrika, uwo mwamikazi amaze umwanya muremure ku butegetsi yarahuye n'umwe mu baprezida bamaze imyaka myinshi ku butegetsi, Yoweri Museveni, na we ari ku butegetsi kuva mu 1986. Yari yarigeze kugendera Uganda imbere y'aho - mu rugendo rwa mbere rw'akazi muri Afrika nk'umwamikazi mu 1954.

column2: Ubwato bubiri bw'intambara bwa Amerika bwaciye mu micungararo ya Taiwan
column3: Igisirikare kigwanira mu mazi ca Amerika camenyesheje ko ubwato bubiri bw'intambara bwaco buriko buraca mu micungararo ya Taiwan. Ni ubwa mbere igikorwa nk'ico kibaye kuva habaye imishamirano hagati ya Taiwan n'Ubushinwa bivuye ku rugendo umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ya Reta zunze Ubumbwe za Amerika yagize muri Taiwan mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Mu kwishura, Ubushinwa bwaciye bukoresha imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare muri ako karere. Muri iyi myaka ya vuba, igisirikare ca Amerika n'ica Buraya bigwanira mu mazi vyagumye bifata iyo nzira ica mu micungararo ya Taiwan. Amerika ivuga ko ayo mato abiri yose atera misile zeretswe inzira - USS Antietam na USS Chancellorsville - ariko arerekana uburenganzira bwo guca mu mazi mpuzamakungu. Ubushinwa bufata ibikorwa nk'ivyo nk'agasotoro kandi bukabandanya bwemeza ko iryo zinga rya Taiwan ari igice c'ico gihugu. Ku musi w'Imana, igisirikare c'Ubushinwa cavuze ko kiriko kirakurikiranira hagufi ingendo z'ayo mato, ko kigavye kandi ko citeguriye kwivuna igihe cosotorwa, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya Reuters. Mw'itangazo, igisirikare kigwanira mu mazi ca Amerika  cavuze ko guca mu micungararo ya Taiwain vyerekana ko " Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika" zishigikiye ukwishira n'ukwizana no kwisanzura mw'ibahari Pacifique. Iryo tangazo ryongerako riti:"Aya mato yaciye mu muhora uca kure yahagenzurwa n'igihugu ico ari co cose." Umushikiranganji wa Taiwan ajejwe wivuna abansi yavuze ko ayo mato yariko aragenda yerekeza mu bumanuko kandi ko ingabo z'ico gihugu ziriko zirayakurikirana, ariko ko "ibintu vyifashe neza". Taiwan n'igihugu gifise intwaro yaco, ariko Ubushinwa bukibona nk'intara yabwo ishobora kuzosubira kwiyunga na bwo, binakenewe ku nguvu. Taiwan yabaye iyindi ngorane ikomeye hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa muri iyi myaka iheze, aho Amerika igenda yinengesereye kuri ico kibazo. Amerika irubaha politike "y'Ubushinwa bumwe" - umushinge wa diplomasi hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri, aho yemera reta imwe y'Ubushinwa - ikaba ifitaniye n'imigenderaniye ku mugaragaro n'Ubushinwa hamwe na Taiwan. Ariko kandi irafitaniye ubucuti "butari ku mugaragaro" n'iryo zinga. Ivyo bikaba birimwo kugurisha ibigwanisho kuri Taiwan kugira ishobore kwivuna.

column2: OMS/WHO ivuga ko intambara yo kurwanya malaria itava aho iri
column3: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS riragabisha ko ata ntambwe iraterwa mu ntambara yo kurwanya malaria. Mu cegeranyo c'umwaka kuri iyo ndwara, iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko ibitigiri vy'abayirwaye n'abamaze gupfa atacahindutse muri iyi myaka ibiri iheze, bikaba bitandukanye n'ingene vyari vyakorotse bitangaje twinjira muri iki kinjana. Malaria yica abantu 400.000 buri mwaka, benshi muri bo bakaba ari abo musi y'ubugaragwa bwa Sahara muri Afrika. Hari ubwoba ko imfashanyo mu migambi yo kurwanya malaria zizogabanuka kubera amarorerwa ikiza ca coronavirus kiriko kirakora. Utwigoro two kurwanya iyo ndwara iterwa n'imibu kandi tugenda tuburizwamwo  n'ingene iyo ndwara itakivurwa n'imiti imwe imwe. Icegeranyo c'igisata ca ONU kijejwe ubutabazi, OCHA co mu 2019, kivuga ko abantu imiliyoni zitanu n'ibice indwi banduye malariya muri uwo mwaka mu Burundi, igitigiri kingana hafi igice c'abanyagihugu bose bo muri ico gihugu. Muri abo bantu bose, abangana 1801 barahitanywe n'iyo ndwara iterwa n'umubu kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere gushika ku wa 21 ukwezi kw'indwi mu 2019.
